28a7(mdo): dang sran chung mon sran dang // shing tog mun 'brus a ru ra// de dag kun la ba ba'i// srin bu srur bu pe ma leb// bye'u dang byi ba ne tso dang // me tog za ba Sha bcings na// zhing kyi khyon dang sbyar nas kyang
28a8(mdo): byem pa dngalal pa sa// bzlas brjod brgyan cha brgyad bzlas// 'ang dpa zhing tog tor byas na// de dag kun kya la bcing sa 'gyur// gca char pa ches pa na// bcom ldan 'das la phum pa'i// 
28b1(mdo): me ton sran ma re re la// bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bya// gzang zhing bde ba'i gnas dag tu// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus dag tu// bum gang ba'i steng dge tu// 'am por gcang ma'i nang du yang
28b2(mdo): me tog gcang sa bzlas pa de// bsregs na char pa 'chad par 'gyur// ser pa drag po 'ong ba na// se ba nya phrig lcag sa la// bzlas brjod pa rgya mi rtsa brgyad bzlas// ser ba gang nas 'o
28b3(mdo): ngos su// klad la bskor zhing byabs na 'chad// yang na thal chen nyungs kar la// bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bya// thum po byas te lkug ma la// btags te btsugs na ser ba 'chad// 
28b4(mdo): 'byung po sha za yi dgas dang // rjed byed gdon gyis zin pa la dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// bum pa chang ma lnga bzha ka ste// gu gul dud pas 'dugs byas na// yungs kar
28b5(mdo): tsan dan ga phur dang / kla rtsi la sogs sman sbyar te// ba zlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas// gos dang zas ni dkar por sbyar// dkyil 'khor de'i nang du bzhugs// bum paM
28b6(mdo): chu yis bkru bar bya// sangs rgyas sku bsil byas pa'i chus// bkru zhing brud na rab tu phan// nad dang gnod pa kun las thard// 'byung po rjed byed sha za yis// glags kyang rnyed par myi 'gyur ro// 
28b7(mdo): byis pa gdon gyis 'jigs pa la// 'gyi hwang la ni sngags bzlas nas// snying po stobs chen 'di bris gdags// oM badz+ra kro ta ma ha ba la/ ha na da ha/ baH bid d+han/ sa ya dza ti la// lam pa ra
28b8(mdo): tsu ru sh+ma/ kro ta su 'um paT sa hA// cang spa byas te mgul bar gdags/ de bzhin yungs kar dag la yang // bzlas brjod byas te btums la gdags// mkhal 'gro gdon
29a1(mdo): kyis zin pa ni// yungs kar dang ni ku kul la// sngags gnyis lan ni bdun bdud bzlas// dud pas bdugs na 'tsho bar 'gyur// de la the tsom gyi za'o// byis pa gdon dang
29a2(mdo): nad las thar// bud myed bu ni thogs 'gyur na// chu la bzlas brjod lnga bdun byas// brud na legs par bcas par 'gyur/ bud myed mo sham bu myed la// sangs rgyas sku bsil byas pa'i chu// 
29a3(mdo): de la bzlas brjod nyi shu bya// khrus byas lus ni cang ma la// chu de blud na bu tsha 'phan// rigs rgyud dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur// lam du zhugs te 'gro ba na// skud pa dang ni gos kyi grar// 
29a4(mdo): bzlas brjod bdun bzlas mdud pa bdun// mdud cing bzlas te song ba na// bde bar 'gro zhing don yang 'grub// dgra dang nye zho myed par 'gyur// yid ni gzhungs par 'dod pa na/ 
29a5(mdo): shu dag mtshon gar tsam dag la// bzlas brjod sum brgya tsam bzlas la// mar srang sum brgya drug cu la// bzlas brjod byas te bsres nas kyang // bum pa gcig tu blugs la
29a6(mdo): dkrug/ nyi ma re re lo cig tu// shu dag ki ni dus re dang // me srong dag ni re re la// bzlas brjod re re byas shing bkra// des ni yid bzhungs sgo ldan 'gyur// de bzhin pa ni ser skya'i// ma ma dang 'o
29a7(mdo): sadag la yang // bzlas brjod brgyan rtsa brgyad du// bzlas te'o brag dkrug cing bab// yid gzhungs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// myi dang 'grogs zhing mja' 'dod na// gang dag yod dpa 'azad pa sa// 
29a8(mdo): me tog dang ni ci shing la// 'bras bu 'am ni 'ji ba dag/ lag pa g.yas pa'i chag par bcug/ de la bzlas brjod pa gcig btab// gang gi lag tu phyin pa na// de dang rtag tu mja' bar 'gyur
29b1(mdo): nyam sogs pa'i phyugs rnams kun/ 'chibs nye bar gnas pan// chu dang yungs kar bcas pa la// bzlal brjod pa rgyani cha brgyad bya// de sa tor na mos par 'gyur// yang na yungs kar
29b2(mdo): brgya brgyad la// bzlas pa'i thum po mgul du gdags// de ni nad byed bde bar 'gyur// phyi rnams 'chi bas 'jigs 'gyur na// yungs kar la ni bzlas brjod bya// thub po byas te sgo la gdags
29b3(mdo): bzlas brjod brgya stong 'bum yang bzlas// myi'i nang dang phyugs nad kun// mying yang myed cing bde bar 'gyur// de dag kun gyi bzlas brjod ni// 'di dag kun tu rgya cher gsungs// 
29b4(mdo): na mo rang na tra ya ya/ au ye d+ha ma he du pra b+ha ba/ he dun te/ shan ta tha ka to/ h+ya ba dad de/ shan tsa yo ni ro d+ha/ mai baM pa te mu ha ShA ma na ye sA hA// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas
29b5(mdo): pa na// bsam pa yongs su dag par 'gyur// gnod pa cis kyang tshugs myi 'gyur// dem chos yongs su bzung // bar 'gyur// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni// mthu dang
29b6(mdo): rdzu 'phrul pasam gyi khyab// cho ga 'di dag thams cad ni// gang la dad pas yid ches na// 'grub par tho tsom myed par 'gyur// bzlas brjod 'bum ni byas 'gyur na// dgos pa thams cad 'grub
29b7(mdo): par 'gyur// 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po'i cho ga'i gzungs// rdzogs s+ho// / ston pa shag kya'i thug pa rje 'di// dge slong de pa
29b8(mdo): raka sha~M tas// phyagar yul nas rnyed pa ste// 'gro ba kun gyi dpal du sha / @// d+ya kar skad du/ sa r+ya me tri da nyan nam d+ha
30a1(mdo): bod zad du/ 'phanas pa byams pas dam bcas pa'i gzungs// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rang na tra ya ya/ na mo b+ha ka hA
30a2(mdo): te shag kya mu ne ye ta tha ga ta ya/ a ra ha te/ sam myags sam b+hud drA ya/ tad ya tha/ au a tsi te/ o dze nan dza ya/ ha ra ha ra/ mai tri a ba lo ki te/ ka ra ka ra/ ma ha sa ma ya snying d+he
30a3(mdo): b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma ha b+ho ti man d+ha bi tsa/ sma ra s+pha ra/ a sma kaM sa ma ya/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ ma ha bo dwi swa hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM mo ha mo hi/ ma ha mo hi swa hA/ snying po'o// oM mu ni mu naM
30a4(mdo): sma ra swA hA// nye ba'i snying po'o// // gzungs 'di nyan pa tsam dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshuladebazhin du yid la sems pa dang / bsgom pa tsam gyis
30a5(mdo): gang gi tshe bdag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur da pa na/ bdagagis nges par sems can de btsal bar bgyi ste/ bla na myed
30a6(mdo): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand par bgyi'o// thA na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur rad pa'i rigs dang / bya rnams kyi yang rna khung du sgrogs par byed na/ de dag kyang bla na byed pa
30a7(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob bo// 'di thos btsam gyis nam du yang ngan pong gsung du 'gro bar myi 'gyur ro// ngan song gi drims kyang myi gos so// ma'i mngal du yang kyi
30a8(mdo): skye'o// lha'i zhal pa stong du 'khab los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// dge ba bcu'i lam dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ji ltar bsams zhing don tu gnyer ba'i longs spyod 'grub par 'gyur ro// 
30b1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / sems de bskyud par myi bgyi lags so// nges par bdag byang chub kyi snying po la mchis nas/ de ji ltar gyurd pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
30b2(mdo): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand par bgyi'o// 'phags pa byams pas/ dem bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // 
30b3(mdo): rgya kar skad du/ ar+yas po kA ba sha ka sa pa ra tsa// bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i cho ga zhim mo'i rgyal po bam po dang po'o// / sangs rgyas
30b4(mdo): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa rgyaradaras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
30b5(mdo): bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri bo ta la na gyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang/ shrIng sa la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / mya ngan chad da
30b6(mdo): sa tag sa tshogs yang sas legs par brgyan pan/ dge slong gi dge 'dun can po 'a mdzadabyang chub sem sa dpal mas rgya ba bran brgya stong zag dgra bcun dgu dang pags ga ci/ tu
30b7(mdo): 9gnas kyang ma'i ris kyi sku'i bu brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis thamapa te/ dbang phyug dang / dbang phyag chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / kwa'i bu rnams kyi dbang du mdzad
31a1(mdo): pa'i nga po bdag gis gse ga ldan sogs su 'jig rten gi 'phas nas @/ de bzhin gshegs pa
31a2(mdo): rten dbang phyug rgyal po la mnos nas/ 'di ltar bdag gi dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po la bags pa lha'i bu rnams dang / gnas chang ma'i lha'i bu brgya stong phrag mang po/ bla na byed pa yang dag par/ 
31a3(mdo): rdzogs po'i byang chub 'dzin du tha med nam/ bdag gis mongs pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes bkod pa la sogs te/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu thob par bgyis lags so// bcom ldan 'ad
31a4(mdo): 'di ltar yang sa phyogs gang du snying po 'di pyod pa'i sa phyogs de/ dbang phyug dang / dbang phyugs chen po la sotsogs pa lta/ 'i bu khri nyis stong srung ba dang / sba ba'i slad du gnas par
31a5(mdo): rig par bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang na don yo da pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i snying po 'di/ spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du bkur bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das
31a6(mdo): sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgya la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur lags so// gang zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di nyan par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das sdig
31a7(mdo): pa gyod pa 'am/ sdig pa'i chos kun tu pyod pa 'am/ 'phags pa la bskur ba 'debs pa 'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba 'am/ mnar byed par gzhol ba 'am/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
31b1(mdo): dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams pad spong ba de 'gyod par 'gyur zhing / sa 'ongs pa ma pa thob par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das de shig pa nyid kyis nag cig sung ba bgyi
31b2(mdo): bzlas brjod bgyis na tshe 'di nyid la/ las de rnam par dag pa dang / gdug pa bas lad par 'gyur ro// rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa 'am/ nyin gsum pa 'am/ nyin bzhi pa 'am/ de
31b3(mdo): bzhin du rims nyid bdun pa 'am/ myig nad dam/ na nad dam/ sna nad dam/ so dang mchu'i nad dam/ lce dang dkan gyi nad dam/ snying nad dam/ lto nang dam/ ro rgyab dang / byed pa'i nad dam
31b4(mdo): yan lag dang nying lag gi nad dam/ gzhang 'brum 'am/ pho ba'i nad dam/ chad pa 'am/ lag pa dang / rkang pa'i na dad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ klad pa'i nad dam/ sha bkra chen po
31b5(mdo): 'am/ sha gzi gu 'am/ mdze'am/ rkang shu 'am/ 'bru ma bu pra mo 'am/ lhog pa 'am/ mtshan mar rdol pa 'am 'brum bu 'am/ rjed byed dam/ byad dam/ gzhan gyis
31b6(mdo): bgyis pa'i gsod pa dang / 'ching ba dang / reg pa 'am/ smod pa 'am/ bden pa ma lags pas bskur pa 'debs pa 'amang / bcom ldan 'das mdong na lus kyi gdung ba 'am/ sems kyi gdung ba 'am/ 
31b7(mdo): rmyi lam ngan pa'i las de yongs su gdugs par gyur da na/ sems can dag pa lhag par dad pa rnams kyi/ yongs su sbyang bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang mi 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das gal te 'khor bzhi 'am/ 
31b8(mdo): rigs pa'i las gang dag sgra dang ga so sa bdag ring yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di nyan par bgyid/ 'dzin par bgyid/ 'chang bar 'gyid/ thog par bgyid/ 'dre bar bgyid/ 'drir 'dug par rlom
32a1(mdo): kun chub par bgyid/ sems can gzhan la yang sgrogs par bgyid cing / tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su rtogs pa rnams kyi rnga khung du gtad de/ rna bar bzlas brjod bgyid la/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di/ 
32a2(mdo): a rnams sems par bgyid de/ sdud pa ma mchis pa dang / gzugs ma mchis pa dang / rnam par myi rtog pa dang / kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / ring du 'gro ba ma mchis pa dang / bgyid pa ma mchis
32a3(mdo): pa dang / gos pa ma mchis pa dang / sems mnyam pa nyid dang bral ba dang / phung po lnga dang bral ba ste/ rnal 'byor de 'das sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyid na/ de la phyogs bcu nas sangs
32a4(mdo): rgyas stong zhal ston par mdzad par 'gyur zhing / nongs pa chag par 'gyur ba la btogs pa rgyas par sbyar ro// glegs bam du bgyis te/ khyim na 'chang bar bgyid na/ rje dpon gis srag
32a5(mdo): pas sas/ bdag gi ngor ram gzhang gad tsam gi rgyus nyan par bgyid na bcom ldan 'das mkhas pas 'phags pa rgya na ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus/ de dag gi nakhung du
32a6(mdo): sgra de zag pa lags par 'chas par bgyi'i/ bcom ldan das dper na skyes bu 'gal zhig gis can dan dpa/ gsung / baji rigs 'thob lam/ yongs su sadang / rdos btum
32a7(mdo): da su 'dus su sa da/ 'a/ sa su pa'i dri mdam par gyi gyi'o// gyi mas kyi ga zha
32a8(mdo): madri gan la'ar bgyin lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gi dan yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di yang gang su yang rung bas/ gzhad gad cas kyi zhes bya ba rgyam par sbyang // bcom rten
32b1(mdo): 'das bdag ni ga yo dang smras mdod par bgyid na/ yang de nyid sems can dmu rgod de dag gi dge ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba lags so// gang dang gang tu skye bar 'gyur bar tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang
32b2(mdo): shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi rmi dang bral bar myi 'gyur te/ tshul khrims kyi ji gdal bar bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das kapa yang rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rigs kyi bu po 'am
32b3(mdo): dge slong ma 'am/ dge slong ba 'am/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i sems can su yang rung bas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ched du yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad
32b4(mdo): la/ bsrung ba bgyis te/ gzhan myi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das des tshe 'di nyid la/ phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig thob
32b5(mdo): par 'gyur te/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste de'i chu sa la nad rnams 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// de'i lus las kyi dang nga gI nad nams 'byung na yang / myur du zhi bar 'gyur zhing lus
32b6(mdo): mdangs dang ldan pa pa dang / yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro// skye bo mang po'i snying du sdug pa dang / dbang po sbas par 'gyur ro// de'i don rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// de'i don grub pa yang chos kun gyis myi chub
32b7(mdo): par 'gyur ro// zhugs kyis kyi 'tshig/ chab kyis kyi 'tshal/ rgyal po'i mthus dbrog par ngo myi thog par 'gyur ro// de'i las kyi mtha' rnams rgyas par 'gyur te/ ser bas ma lags so// cha
32b8(mdo): kyis 'jigs pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ rlung dang / char kyi 'jigs pa ma lags so// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po thal ba dang / tshul lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ zhing gi phyogs
33a1(mdo): mtshams dang / steng 'og tu bcing bar bgyis na// gnod pa thams cad nye bar 'gyur ro// kazi brjid dang mdangs dbrog par po gyi thog par 'gyur zhing / sems can thams cad
33a2(mdo): kyi snying du sdug pa dang / yid du 'thad par 'gyur ro// de la dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// de la dgra'i 'jigs pa byung na yang myur tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// de la phyi ma lags pa'i 'jig
33a3(mdo): pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// de la dgra'i 'jigs pa byung na yang myur tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// de la myi ma lags pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ byad kyi 'jigs pa ma lags/ mkha' 'gro
33a4(mdo): ma'i 'jigs pa ma lags te/ de la nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa drag po 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// me dang / mtshan dang / dug gis 'gum par myi 'gyur ro// de la yang lha nas
33a5(mdo): kyis rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / spyod pa'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skye ba pa la/ gyur par byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang
33a6(mdo): snyoms dang bral bar gyi 'gyur te/ de phan yon nyi shuHpo 'di dag thob par 'gyur lags so// gzhan yang chos brgyad thob par 'gyur te/ brgyad ga zhe na/ 'gum pa'i dus su 'a
33a7(mdo): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong gi gzugs su mngon gsum du zhal stond par 'gyur ro// bde bar 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par 'gyur ro// lta ba 'khrul bar myi 'gyur ro// lag pa myi g.yong
33a8(mdo): pa dang / rkang pa myi g.yob pa dang / gzhang gcim mchis pa dang / khre'i steng du 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par 'gyur ro// dran pa shin tu nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// khas yub du 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyi
33b1(mdo): na du dus gsum du bathal brjod 'bya'o// cang dag dang / nagatsang dang / kye'u dang / zhog sgra dang 'dres pa dang / lhag rol dang / 'din pas khyad par don tu gnyer bas spang bar 'gyul/ 
33b2(mdo): song ba'i zhags pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang / sems can rnams la mthu mchis pa 'chal bar bgyis nas/ bsgrags par 'gyi'o// slob dpon gyi dpe 'byung gyi bgyi'o// 'di ltar
33b3(mdo): drim dang bral zhing phra rog dang / ser b+hA sbyangs pa ni/ chub sems dpa' rnams lags te/ sems can rnams da kyi don babyi ba'i srad du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob papa 'gyu
33b4(mdo): bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs kyi nang du rtoH/ sa so// byang chub zhes bgyi ba ni shes rab lags la/ mas dpa' zhes bgyi ba ni thabs lags te/ chos 'di gnyi
33b5(mdo): sems can rnams kyi don bgyi ba'i slad du kho nas thob pa lags so// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang na 'di ltar bdag gis snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'khor bzhi
33b6(mdo): rnams dang / gzhan yang sdig pa pyod pa rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du bsgrags par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
33b7(mdo): dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' sa la to// sems can dag pa de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod smros shing / de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su yi rang bar mdzad zin te/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na
34a1(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can rnams la pha'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug myig myi 'dzums par/ bcom ldan
34a2(mdo): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde bar
34a3(mdo): 'jig rten la thugs che ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don tu/ bdag la kasan du gsol// dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la byas/ 
34a4(mdo): 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la bya ga 'tshal lo// yang dag par song ba rnams dang / yang dag
34a5(mdo): par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ la phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa la batshogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// 
34a6(mdo): 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa ji gas pa'i sangs rgyal 'od dpag byed la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa'
34a7(mdo): na pa dang ldan pa ldam su sa dang thug / da 'i/ #
34b1(mdo): pUd d+ha/ d+ha ba d+ha ba/ kaN ka Na/ ki ni ki ni/ ku rba kur+Na/ par ma shud d+ya sa data/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma ha sA ma pra ba ta/ tsal tsas/ san rtsa la san nal/ bi mas e
34b2(mdo): ta ta/ e TaT/ bA ra bA ra/ b+hi ri bI ri/ pU ru b+hu ru/ e h+ye ti ma ha ka tsu ni ka/ ma ha pa u pa ti be/ sha d+ha pa/ b+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa ma sa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ha ra ha pa/ hA hA hA hA/ hi hi hi hi/ hU hu hu hU
34b3(mdo): o ka ra pra mA b+he Sha dA pa/ d+ha ra drA ra/ dwe ri dI ri/ dU ru hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra pA ya ka/ rash+mi sha ta sa ha pra ti/ man ti man ti ta/ sha rir/ 
34b4(mdo): dza la dza la/ pa ta pa ta/ bA ga bAn/ so ma a tid t+ya/ ya ma ba ru na/ ku be ra/ pra men dra/ ri shi de ba ka te/ adabyA hi ta tsa ran/ su ru su ru/ tsu muna? ru/ mu ru su ru/ 
34b5(mdo): pu ru pu ru/ sa nad ku ma ra/ rud dra/ b+ha sa pa/ b+hi sha d+ha na da de pa ri shi na ya ka/ ba phu bi bi dA/ b+he sha pA ra dA ra dA pa/ !ri hi ri/ d+hu ru dru ru/ za ra tha ra/ kA ra ka ra/ ya ra ya / 
34b6(mdo): lar la ma/ b+ha ra hAm/ ma mas ra/ pa rab pa/ bar bar/ ba ra d+ha la ka/ sa sanata/ ma \u0f7f mo ka ti/ ba lo ki ta mo ki bA ra/ ma ha sha ra/ mu su mu sh+ya/ su mu su ru/ sul mu la/ mun tsamum
34b7(mdo): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag dang / sems can thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / 'che ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig/ bsad pa dang
34b8(mdo): bcing ba dang / rgyal po dang / chom po dang / rkun po dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon las yongs su thar par mdzad pa// ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku N+ya ku d+ha/ ma man ra/ min dri ya/ 
35a1(mdo): pa ma 'a druban/ tsa rung / sa rgyas dam+b+ha/ sam pra ga sha ka/ ta ma ta ma/ dam dang/ sa ma sam/ ma ga tu mon d+ha ka pa/ ma ha ta yon drug pa/ bai d+ha ma na shad/ par myi ta pa'i phur/ 
35a2(mdo): ka/ mi li mi li/ dza/ [।]9/ ti Ti Ti Ti/ tu mu rmar+tha/ e ne ya tsapa ma kri ta pa ri ka ra/ e h+ya hi/ mi shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ ma ha pU ta/ ka na b+han dza ka/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra ba ra/ 
35a3(mdo): kar kar/ ka rba ka rba/ ma rba sa rba/ bi shud d+ha/ bi sha ya bAn sin ma ha ka hu ni ka/ shA ta yang nyo pa bi ta rad na/ ro ku ta ma la d+ha ra/ sarbad nya/ ni ri sa tra~M mu ku ta/ ma la d+ha pa/ ma ha
35a4(mdo): ma had b+hud ta ma la/ tI ta/ ka ra ta la/ d+yA na sa d+hi/ b+hi mo kA/ a pra kam bya ba hu sad tra san ta ti pa ri pa tsa ka/ ma ha ka ru ni/ sarba kar ma a ba ni bi/ sho d+ha ka/ sarba bya di pra mo tsa ka
35a5(mdo): sarba sa sha pa ra~M pu ra ka/ sarba sa ta ma sha sa ka ra/ na mo/ stu te swA hA// klags pas las thams cada'/ grub par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du bzlas brjod 'byed na
35a6(mdo): 'tshams byed pa lnga 'byang bar 'gyur zhing / las kyi sgri pa thams cad kyang yongs su dag par bgyid do// mtshams gcad pa la ni/ a ga ru'i 'dug pa 'am/ thal ba 'am chab pa
35a7(mdo): yungs kar dang / seng ldeng kye phur bu la stsogs pas so// rims thams cad la ni skud pas so// nad thams cad la ni mar ram/ 'bru mar dang chag la bzlas brjod bgyis te/ tor bar brgyan
35a8(mdo): byad dgrol ba la ni mtshon gyis so// ston pa la ni bsrung ba'i skud pas lam chus so// rug gsad pa la ni sa 'am chab gyis so// byig dang la ni skud pa dkar pos rna ba la gdags par bkyem
35b1(mdo): na sa ni zhing ka nar 'imo zhing shes pa marnams gcad pa sa ni/ dos lnga lnga'i srung bas/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlam 'arjod 'gyis te/ seng ldeng gi phurang bu bzhi la macingam nas byas
35b2(mdo): bzhir gzugs par bgyis na/ mtshams chen po bcings par 'gyur ro// thams cad bsrung ba ni srung pa 'am chab barba/ thal bas so// gdon thams cad la ni mchod sA lnga'i skud pamatho
35b3(mdo): rims thams cad la ni skud pa dkar pos so// g.yan pa dang wa rdo dang / ldog pa dang / 'grin pa 'gags pa thams cad la ni snang ci dang / pi li ling bsregs pas so// myig nad la ni dri mu 'am
35b4(mdo): shing pa la sha'i chu 'am/ shing ngang gi chus so// rna ba'i nadad la ni 'bru mar gis so// 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / bskur pa 'debs pa thams cad
35b5(mdo): la ni/ chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te/ kha bshal bar bAgyi'o// dpung dang yul dang / rgyal srid dang / yul 'jornams srung ba la ni/ bum pa gang ba bzhag la gtsang ma
35b6(mdo): gos chang ma bgos pas/ mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nas/ klag par bgyis na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// des yang chab kyis tor bar 'gyis te/ sems can thams cad la bsrung bar bgyis par
35b7(mdo): 'gyur ro// yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa dang / glags lta ba rnams la ni/ tsan dan la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ snying kar byug par
35b8(mdo): bgyi'o// mtshams ma mchis pa'i las thams cad bas par bgyi ba la ni/ rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis so// khyim srung ba la ni pad ma'i sbyin sreg gis so// sems can thams cad bskyang ba dang
36a1(mdo): 'byung pos 'jigs pa dang / gdon thams cad las srung ba la ni tsan dan gyi sbyin sreg gis so// dza ya dang byi dza ya dang / na ku li dang / 'gan du na ku li dang / ba ru ni dang / tse'i dra ba
36a2(mdo): ru ni dang / a b+ha ya pa Ni dang / in dra ba Ni dang / 'gan dA pri yang ku dang / rgya spos dang / tsag kra dang / ma ha tsaka kra dang / bi shA kan d+ha dang / so ma ra tsi dang / su nan da rnams la lan brgya rtsa brgyad
36a3(mdo): bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ nor bu bgyis nas kyi bo 'am dpung pa la gdags pas bsrel bar bgyi'o// khye'u rnams la ni mgul bar ro bu mo rnams la ni sta zu chas te ni dpal dang ldan par bgyid
36a4(mdo): pa dang / dkra myi shis pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa'i nor bu 'di bsrel na/ thams cad las bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// dug dang mes myi tshugs lags so// dug gis gnod pa
36a5(mdo): bskyed par myi 'gyur ro// skyes na yang gnod pa bskyed par bya bgyid cing / myur tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ gdon rnaMs zhi bar 'gyu ra ro// rlung dang / 'brug dang ser ba bcad pa dang / char gyi
36a6(mdo): rgyun dang / ser ba bzlog pa la ni/ shing ka ra bai ra'i lcug ma dag ste/ las thams cad bgyid par 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po grub pa dam pa bsgrubs par las 'di rnams bgyid
36a7(mdo): bar 'gyur lags so// de nas sgrub par 'chal na/ cho ga ni ras la lhag ma ma yin pa'i/ mchod nyis sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa phyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs rnyan ral pa'i thor tshugs dang
36a8(mdo): e ne ya'i pags pa dang / phyags bdag gi cha lugs 'chang brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bgyi ste/ ri yo mkhan gso sbyong can 'dri baN lad par 'gyi'o// de nas smra pa pos sku gzugs de'i/ 
36b1(mdo): gyan spar ba'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor ba kyi ste/ me tog dkar po'i sis ma bkram la/ spos kyis bkang ba'i sdong bu 'ug par bgyi'o// sna nyin zhag gcig gas/ nyin zhag gsum du bsru ba bgyis te/ 
36b2(mdo): zas dkar gsum 'tshal te/ dus gsum du khrus bgyis nas/ gos chang pa bgos na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid mchis nas/ bsam pa thams cad brgyad pa 'am/ 
36b3(mdo): drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa 'am/ gzhan yang lha bshos sha dang khrag dang ma 'dres pa bsham zhing drangs la/ a ka ru'i bdug pas bdug ste/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// thams cad yongs su rdzogs
36b4(mdo): par bgyi'o// ldong gros sam dmyig sman la bzlas brjod bgyis ste/ myig la bskus na/ de nad myi gda' bar gyu rad nas/ nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur zhing / don yod pa'i ye shes
36b5(mdo): bkod pa zhes bgyi ba ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro// de ni bsgrub pa'o// bcom lda/ na 'das kyis de skad ces bka' sa lad nas/ byang chub
36b6(mdo): sems dpa' 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / gnas rtsad ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu de dag dang / myi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnas
36b7(mdo): yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// / de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho rab 'phya
36b8(mdo): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa rgyargyan gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ tha gos 'phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus so
37a1(mdo): g.yas pa'i lta bas la btsugs te/ nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar 'od zer stong 'phro zhing 'od zer sna tshogs 'gyed pa'i lus kyis/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te
37a2(mdo): zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing rdzogs la zhi ba/ 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i mthus yid la byed pas rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten la phan pa dang / snying rtse bas don thams cad
37a3(mdo): grub pa rigs sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi/ bla na myed pa de kho na nyid grub pa mchog sbyin thob par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod pa'i
37a4(mdo): zhags pa'i rgyal po'i snying po 'di mchis te/ 'di pad ma rgya ngan po'i dkyil 'khor de kho na nyid chen po'i snying pos 'phags pa nga por gyurd pa/ de kho na nyid grub pa dam pa dkyil 'kho
37a5(mdo): chen po 'di'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po rim par bye ba gsang ba dam pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor tshig dang / bsgrub pa gsang ba 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi
37a6(mdo): spyan sngar bsgrags par 'gyi'o// lha dang k+Sha dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / la ma yin dang / rnam malal lding dang / rtsi 'am ci dang / ma byo chen po mang po'i 'khor chen pa'i mdum
37a7(mdo): rigs sngags grub pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun 'dir yang bsgrags par bgyi'o// gang yang dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha dpag shin rje dang / chu lha dang / 
37a8(mdo): yum ngan dang / dang bra ga tshogs dang / zla ba dang nyim dang / skad ma'i tshogs dang / phyun pa dang / rigs sngags 'ang grub pa'i lha mo rnams kyi bdun tu khon nyid kyi shing po la dag pa 'dzin
37b1(mdo): te las 'dus pa dang / dngas grub rtsub pa thags pas sgrub pa dang / bskob pa 'grub pa bcom ldan 'das kyi gyad sngar rigs sngags chen po 'chang ba'i sngags kyis yongs su ba skor ba'i mdun du de'o// 
37b2(mdo): na nyid kyi snying po gsang ba dam pa bsgrags shing bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pashag kya thub pa bsod nams stong gis brgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis
37b3(mdo): rnam par sras pa phyag dpung pa'i mchog gser gi kha tog lta bu 'od zer du ma 'phro ba'i 'phreng ba dang / sos kyi glang po che'i snga lta bu'i phyag brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
37b4(mdo): pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyi bor bzhag nas/ glad pa la byugs te/ 'di skad ces bkalasaHlad to// sems can dag pa dam pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod spros shig/ 
37b5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs te/ ngas kyang da ltar byin gyis rlabs kyis khyod gsang ba dam tshig spros shig/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
37b6(mdo): kyi rjes su yid rang bzhin byin gyis brlabs pa kang ka'i klung gi 'bum phrag bye ba brgya stong gyi bye ma'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs shing rjes su yi
37b7(mdo): rang bar mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gyis phyogs bcur bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyan snga ra rab gyi snying po de kho na
37b8(mdo): nyid/ gsang sngags 'di dag gsol to// oM pad ma ha sta/ sA hA ma mo kA bA sha sa d+ha ya sa ma ya tre d+ha ya na tsa ra Na ra hU~M// / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzugs
38a1(mdo): kyo gang po na no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dugs pa kya sa gzigs dbang thun gam/ gsang ba'i snying po 'di brjod pa pag tu ra rgyal po ta la 'di thadapa/ 
38a2(mdo): ma nags tshal dang / ci shing du bcas pa dang ri rab 'khor yug dang / 'khor yug chen po dang / bcas pa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing / lha'i gnas rnams ldeg par 'gyur te/ thams cad 'ang
38a3(mdo): 'dar por 'gyur ro// klu'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas rnams 'khrugs par 'gyur to// rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs kyang 'gyur te/ chu gter rnams kyang 'khrugs par gyur to
38a4(mdo): de ma thag tu phyogs btsun/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs rnyan bags pa rnams kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te// 'di skad ce sa bka' sa lang to// rgyal ba'i bdag nyid du skyes pa
38a5(mdo): don yod pa'i snying po klags pas/ 'grub pa bla na myed pa smra/ sa pa legs so// legs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhi na gshegs pa shag kya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' sa lang
38a6(mdo): to// sems dpal dag pa khyod kyis gsang ba'i klag pa'i cho ga de kho na nyid bsgrub pa dang bcas pa rgyas par smros shig/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i
38a7(mdo): snying po'i gzungs 'di lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis/ de'i yod la phyogs bcu tha dad pa nas/ kang ga klung sa ya bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag brkyang ste/ kyi bo la bzhag nas legs so
38a8(mdo): zhes bgyi ba smra gsungs te/ gsungs pa tsam gyi mod la sngon bskasad pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i sgrib pa rnams nyams par bgyid/ zhig par bgyid/ sdig pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad
38b1(mdo): dang de bzhin du gnod pa zhi kham bgyid do// sdig pa dang sems can gdug pa rnams dang / zas kyi rgol ba dang / byi mdza ba rnams 'jig par 'gyid de/ 'di la be com myi bgyi'o// rtag tu/ 
38b2(mdo): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin lta 'tshal bar 'gyur lags so// rigs sngags 'di'i cho ga sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ rigs sngags 'tshang rtsang mar gyur pas/ shi nad tu
38b3(mdo): khrus bgyis te gos cang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// byams pa dang / snying rje yid la bgyis pas 'byung po thams cad la mchog tu snying brtse bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni
38b4(mdo): ri mo'i gzugs la mchod par bgyi'o// me tog dang / badz+ra dka pa dang / dri dang / 'breng ba dang / byug pa dang / mar me dang / dbul bar bgyi'o ches brgyad dam/ tshes bco lnga la bsgrub
38b5(mdo): pa'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi ma dun du thog mar dkyil mo krung bcas nas/ don yod pa'i/ zhags pa'i snying po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
38b6(mdo): bgyi'o// tshig gzhan myi smra bar 'khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad brjod bgyis te/ chab dang yungs kar gyis dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi ste/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bcing bar
38b7(mdo): bgyi'o// gsang sngags kyi dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu don yod pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gi snying po stong rtsa brgyad/ bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas
38b8(mdo): brjod 'don pa tsam gyis de'i mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po// 'khro bo'i rgyal po dang bcas pa 'bum 'gyur du bzlas brjod bgyis par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod rdzogs nas ri mo'i gzugs 'a
39a1(mdo): 'gyur zhing// rigs pas 'a ban snying dka' ba dang / kyi bo'i drug 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni rtsub pa'i rtag pa yin no// zhes sgrub pa'i rtags dang / legs po zhes bya ba'i
39a2(mdo): 'byin te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas dgos pa thams cad dpalas thams cad brjod pa tsam gyis de'i mod la 'grub par 'gyur lags so
39a3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa sa ya bye ba brgya stong gang ga'i klung gi bye ma drang mnyam po'i phyag gser gi kha tog 'dra ba/ spyi bo'i phrug tu 'jog par myi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags
39a4(mdo): pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang bzhin gyi lus shin tu dri ma dang bral zhing / yongs su dag pas dri ma myed pa'i ba dag nyid kyi lus kyi rang bzhin mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// 
39a5(mdo): mchog thams cad la thol bar 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams ca da du grub pa col bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya grub pa la grol bar 'gyur ro/ 
39a6(mdo): ji ltar snying las skyes pa'i bu bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob kyi bar du yongs su skyob par bgyid do// de lta bas na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dag/ yongs su
39a7(mdo): rdzogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhingab rtsegs par brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas par 'ang pa theg sa logs par brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri mchog la/ 'jam
39b1(mdo): pa rgyal ba 'od dpag myed 'od zer ba rgya stong phrag 'bum 'phro ba'i/ skus bzhugs shing chos ston pa lta bar 'tshal zhing / rigs sngags 'chang des legs par bkru ste/ thang par gyurd pas gos
39b2(mdo): rtsang ma bgos te/ cho 'phrul gyi zla ba yar gyi ngo la/ byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pas gus pa dang / dang ba dang / zhe sa dang bla mar bgyi'o// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs
39b3(mdo): dbang phyug gi ri mo gzugs la ci 'byor da pa'i/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'breng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / lhab lhub dang / ba dan gyis mchod par bgyi'o// 
39b4(mdo): tshes brgyad nas bcu gsum gyi bar du zas dkar gsum 'tshal par bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu
39b5(mdo): rtsa gcig dang / tshig gzhan myi smra bar 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po brgya phra ba/ rgyang bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ ri mo'i gzugs de nyid
39b6(mdo): kyai mdun du mchis la nyal bar bgyi'o// mchod yon dang yon chab dus gsum du dbul bar bgyi'o// a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ska dang / ku gul me tog zhu ba dang bcas pa/ gra thi dang / 
39b7(mdo): lhan cig bsres nas bslang bar bgyi'o// dgug pa'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa khams gsuM rnam par grags pa 'dug pa'i rgyal po bra na myed pa gang phyir gdug
39b8(mdo): pa tsam gyis ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend kyi khams kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bdug pa'i sprin chen po'o khregs pas rgyas par 'gyur ro// dri 'khrigs pa de
40a1(mdo): dag gis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po / 
40a2(mdo): amyi ma yin pa rnams dri chen po'i mchod pa dang / bdug pa chen po'i mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur zhing de dag thams cad dka' bar 'gyur ro// kang yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su rtogs pa'i sems can gang dag
40a3(mdo): gis/ bdug pa'i dri tshong na de dag thams cad ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su gdugs par 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang zab mo dang mu ge dang rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / nong 'jun
40a4(mdo): pa dang / 'jug pa dang / skyil ma ngan pa dang / khams kyi nang dang gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / gdung ba dang / yid kyi bde bzas cad dang nad thams cad 'i bar 'gyur ro// rlung dang ser 'dra/ 
40a5(mdo): grang ba dang tsha ba'i srin thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// byang dang g.yengs byed dang / sngags kyi sbyor ba thams cad dang / dug dang / dbyig dun
40a6(mdo): dang / smar ma thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// gdod thams cad dang / jed byed thams cad dang / rims dang / bzil nges dang / gnod sgrib dang / gnod snyam thams cad gdun pa'i dris cwom
40a7(mdo): par 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi snying po la zug gi bar du lan 'ga' yang tshugs par gyi 'gyur ro// 'dug pa'i rgyal po 'di rtag tu sbyang bar bgyi'o// 'di lta ma chem bcu bzhi'i nub ma mchis la dod yong/ 
40a8(mdo): nga'i gas pa'i rkang po brgyam brgyad dang 'gro ba'i rgyal pa brgyam brgyad 'a rnam dzad na gyi'o// bas dag pa ga sus kyi sto kyi 'byod par dbus par bgyi ma/ snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po
40b1(mdo): brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la/ dri dang 'bru bar gyi mar me dbul bar bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du nam nangs kyi bar du mchis nyal bar bgyis te/ rmyi lam du dbyig dug gi mdzod mthong / 
40b2(mdo): bde ba can gyi 'jig rten ki khams gzhal myed khang dang bcas/ rin po che'i ri dang bcas/ rdzing dang bcas gnas dang bcas/ khang pa thegs ma dang bcas/ gzhal byed khang dang bcas/ rdzu 'phrul
40b3(mdo): dang / cho 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa mthong ngam/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing khang pa rtsegs pa na bzhugs la/ lha dang
40b4(mdo): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
40b5(mdo): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom lnga na 'das tshe dpag myed de yang / rigs sngags 'chang de la dbu gas 'byin par mdzad cing / legs so zhes bgyi ba
40b6(mdo): yang thold par mdzad de/ kye skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis rigs sngags 'chang gi skyes bu'i byed pa yang du byas pa dang / khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba yang du skul pa dang / khyod kyis lhag par mang du byas par
40b7(mdo): khyod kyis bya ba gang yin pa byas pa dang / khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya chen po dang / gsang sngags rnam par bye ba'i snying po sgrub pa ni grub zin te/ 
40b8(mdo): legs so// legs so// khyod kyis rigs sngags 'chang gi sangs rgyas nyid du gyurd cig/ khyod 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal gyi skye ba blangs te/ tshe rjes nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyu
41a1(mdo): byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// zhes phyag g.yas pa klad pa'i spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa'i
41a2(mdo): dngos grub thams cad rtsol cing / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa ste/ 'di ni dam pa yin no zhes bdag nyid sad nas dga' bar mthong ste/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral zhing yongs su dag par
41a3(mdo): 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug bram ze'i gzugs kyi mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing / 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog gsol bar 'gyur ro// skye bo dang / rgyal po dang
41a4(mdo): blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag thams cad gzug kye ri mo de 'bar zhing 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yon tan brgya stong mang po gzhan yang thob par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten po'i
41a5(mdo): phun sum tshogs pa 'ang thob par 'gyur ro// skye bo dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag thos cad dbang du 'gyur zhing cher mchod par 'gyur ro// dge slong
41a6(mdo): dang / bram ze rnams las don yod pa'i grub pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// grub pa chen po bla na myed pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// nyin cig bzhin du dus gsum du phyag rgya bcing bar 'gyi'o// 
41a7(mdo): de nas tshes bcu bzhi la thog yang dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams la ci 'byor pa'i yon tan dang bcas pa'i mchod ston thal bar bgyi'o// de nas bdag nyid yongs kyang par bgyi'o// gang gi tshe yang
41a8(mdo): sangs rgyas la blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la blta ba dang / lha rnams la lta bar 'tshal ba na de'i tshe gdug pa'i rgyal po la dgug pa'i gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod pa byes te/ 
41b1(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gdug par bgyi'o// bdug pas 'dugs pa tsam ki mod la zhal ston par 'gyur zhing / dge ba 'am/ myi dge ba thams cad dam nyams pa 'am bri ba de thams cad gsung
41b2(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// cin mtsho'i mthar thug pa'i bar du gsung ba 'am 'gro ba 'am 'ong ba gsung bar 'gyur ro// de nas gsang ba'i cho ga dang bsgrub pa'i cho ga yang ji lta ba zhig du bshad par bgyi'o// 
41b3(mdo): pad yang ba/ a yo g+ha dza ya de/ tsu ru tsu ru swa hA/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so// oM pa ma ba sha d+ha ra ma mo gA ba rang pan tso ya hUM// de bzhin
41b4(mdo): gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldeng dang / mye 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang
41b5(mdo): myi dang myi ma yin pa la stsogs pa bskul ba'i gsang sngags/ te/ bdug pa'i rgyal pos bdugs na/ chab dang yungs ka/ ra bsres la/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas
41b6(mdo): phyogs bcur rtor na/ thams cad bskul ya bgyis par 'gyur ro// oM tre log kya ya a bA ha na/ ma mo gA pa shwa/ pad ma zi lo ki ta/ ma ya tu/ b+hu ba ne ru su ru su ru/ byi ma le hUM/ 
41b7(mdo): bdug pa'i gsang sngags te/ ku gul gyi bdug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ chu dang me tog bsres pas phyogs bcur rtor bar bgyis te/ thams cad gdug pa dam pa lags so// 
41b8(mdo): oM pad ma b+hu ma ha pa sha d+ha ra ni man tra yA mi/ a mo gA ba la yan tu b+hu ba swa mu ru mu ru hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thos cad/ 
42a1(mdo): ma mas ldanas pa'i gan da pa tham pa sapa kyi thugs da dang matog dang / rgyal zhings 'dug pa'i rgyam#
42a2(mdo): te/ thams cad la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ thams cad spyan drang ba'i gsang sngags so// oM padam ma mo 'ag 'jab ti thA na kA ru ku ru Sha hA// ma 'i kyil 'khor bcing
42a3(mdo): chab dang sungs kar lan 'argya sa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ sa la ho man dpag yad sum rgyas kun nas 'khor ba'i sa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro// de thams
42a4(mdo): cad bsrungs pas ni rdo rje sra ba'i sems su 'gyur ro// dgra rnams kyis myi mthong ba dang bgyegs dang khron 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha zang brjed
42a5(mdo): byed dang / ro langs dang / 'dod dkur sbyar ba'i gzug thams cad kyis myi mthong ste/ rnam pa thams cad du myi ma zong bas rdo rje sra bar 'gyur ro// oM a mo ga pa sha par
42a6(mdo): mo tu ra sing ha sa na tu ti si ri si ri hUM// gdan ni gsang sngags te yungs kar la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ sa la rtor na/ pad ma chen po'i gzhal myed khang gi ba dan tu byin gis brlabs
42a7(mdo): par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rin po che bdun las byas pa'i seng ge'i gdan du byin gyis brlabs nas/ legs par bul bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang kis rang
42a8(mdo): gi stan lnga chab dang / yungs kar la lan nyi shu pa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas rtor te/ rigs sngags 'chang grub pa'i pad ma'i bdan gsang ba'i gsang sngags so// oM ma ha ka run pad ma
42b1(mdo): a mo kA pa sha driN+Da badz+ra a tiSh+Tha ta pU ru b+hu ru b+hu ba na d+ha re swa hA// dkyil 'khor mtha' dag na/ khyim dang / nags tshal dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / phrug lag khang dang / bsti gnas dang / 'chag sa dang
42b2(mdo): phug dang / dgon pa dang / gnas bsang ba'i phyir dri chab dang yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ rtor par bgyi ste/ gnas su rtogs pa thams cad gsang ba chen po bgyis
42b3(mdo): par 'gyur ro// nyes par bgyis pa dang / bkyegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad 'bros par 'gyur te/ gnas gsang ba'i gsang sngags so// 
42b4(mdo): oM pad ma a mo g+ha pa shenas man ta/ da sha su dig pu si ra ban d+ha ya tu ru tu ru hU~M// lcags kyi phur bu song brgyad pa'i cha da lnga la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas dkri ste/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas
42b5(mdo): brjod bgyis nas/ phyogs bzhir gzugs par bgyi'o// lnga po ni dbus kyi bzhir gzugs par bgyi'o// rgyang gra/ bdun 'khor bar 'tshams bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// 
42b6(mdo): ji srid phur bu ma phyung ba de srid du/ mtshams chen po bcing ba bo myos par 'gyur ro// oM a mo gA man dA la b+han d+ha ya/ sa man te pad ma ma ha pad me dru ru dru ru swa hA// dkyil 'khor bcing ba ste
42b7(mdo): yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang / de bzhin du 'og dang steng du yang rtor te/ dkyil 'khor chen po bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// bgyegs dang
42b8(mdo): log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha pa mchi bar 'os pa thams cad kyis mchi bar gyi 'byung ngo ro// sems can gdug pa dang / lha 'am klu 'am/ gdug pa gang sum
43a1(mdo): rung ba de dag thams cad zil gyis mnan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i bgyi ba ngan pa dang sngags ngan pa dang sems can ngan pa dang / bgyid pa ngan pa thams cad yongs su spangs par/ 
43a2(mdo): 'gyur ro// mdzes mo gA pa ri shud d+he no dra ya sa man te na d+hi ri dwi ri/ shud du skad tra ma sA pad me hUM// 'dis pa'i rnam pa lnga la lan stob rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ dkyil 'khor gyis 'chi
43a3(mdo): mtha' dag na thug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa 'am/ bya skyebs sam/ chang tshing ngam 'chag sa 'am gnas sam nags tshal lam/ skyed mos tshal lam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ brangs 'am/ 
43a4(mdo): skyabs sam/ 'a pa la rtong na stong pa 'am/ byi stodapa 'am/ 'dam rdzab dang / myi chang ba dang / phyag dang gisagang ba dang / 'byung po dang / sha ba dang / yi dgas pa
43a5(mdo): sogs te/ rigs ngan pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa ra 'gyur ro// zang ma dag par 'gyur ro// gnas chang 'gyur ro// bdag nyid la dbang bskur bza' nyes dang
43a6(mdo): bgos nyes dang / gnod ltas dang / gnod sgribs kyi ngan pa thams cad yong su dag par 'gyur ro// myi chang ba zang bar 'gyur ro// tshangs par pyod pa ma lags tshangs pa pyod par 'gyur ro// 
43a7(mdo): bsnyen gnas ma bgyis pa ni/ bsnyen gnas bgyis par 'gyur ro// de nas lha thams cad bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyid par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen
43a8(mdo): po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'dug dang / dbang phyug dang / gzhan rje dang / chu lha dang / yus ngan la sogs pa bsrung ba dang bskyal pa dang / zla ba'i srad du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'phru
43b1(mdo): 'jig rten thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang / mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// dad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang sgrib pa dang / chad pa sa stsoms pa thams cad las bdang
43b2(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// phyogs pa'i kun tu tor na/ 'thab pa dang / mam mo dang / cod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ge dang / gyi ngas dang / yams dang / gnod pa dang / 'che ba dang / laH
43b3(mdo): pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du bdag nyid la dbang bsgyur ram/ reg par bgyis na/ rigapa sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rim par byed pa dang / 
43b4(mdo): las chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro// do/ yod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du mchi ba de dang der cher mchod pa'agyur ro// thams cad kyis myi zlog par 'gyur ro// 
43b5(mdo): nyin gcig bzhin gzhal myed khang rgya chen po bkra zhing / rnam par bkra ba chen po rmyi lam du mthong ba dang / rnam pa thA mas cad du mchog rgya chen po thob par 'gyur ro// dge
43b6(mdo): myong dang / bram ze dang / rgyum rig pa dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing mchod par 'ob par 'gyur/ 
43b7(mdo): rtag tu kyang ma pyod pa cang zhing dag par 'gyur ro// rtag par dus kun tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog grol par
43b8(mdo): 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag byed rmyi lam du rtag tu mthong zhing / shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rtend kyi khams bde ba can
44a1(mdo): du skye bar 'gyur ro// oM pad me sa ra sa ra/ ti shwa tiSh+Tha ma ta ma mo gA sa ma ya swA hA/ gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig gi gsang sngags so// oM bi pu la pad ma a mo gAs/ 
44a2(mdo): ra pra bi sha tu ku ru ku ru swA hA/ 'jug pa'i gsang sngags so// oM a mo g+ha a nu sha ya ma ha pad ma bAn du re hUM/ slob ma'i gsang sngags so// oM a mo g+ha pad ma shi khye tu ru tu ru/ te shwa
44a3(mdo): badz+ra pa ne d+he swa hA// kyai chug bcing ba'i gsang pa sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo gA pad ma dza log kle bI ri b+hi ri hUM// chab bteg pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig/ 
44a4(mdo): bzlas so// oM a mo gA bi ka Ta sa ma ra pad ma/ a das ne je la ba ti ku ru ku ru hUM// bum pa'i gsang sngags te la na brgyad rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM pad ma pra sa ra a mo 'a
44a5(mdo): bi ma le b+ha ra bA ra swa hA// chab kyi rgyun gyi gsang sngags ti lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// au a mo ga pad me da / na ka re dI ri dI ri bi ma le sA hA// lag pa'i gsang sngags te/ 
44a6(mdo): lag pa gnyis la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / bslab pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyi ste/ bsgrub pa zas
44a7(mdo): cad la sgrub par bgyi zhing / las thams cad du bgyi'o// oM a mo 'ag bi ma le/ 'jib ha gra sa sho da ni pad ma ko ma la 'dzi ba ha/ sad sho d+ha ya d+ha ra dA ra bi ma le swa hA// lce spyang ba'i gsang sdug
44a8(mdo): te dri chab la lan stong brgyad rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ kha bshal na lce'i dri ma thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// pad ma dang ku ma ta li 'dab ma dang 'dra bar lce mnyen par 'gyur ro// 
44b1(mdo): so dang rkan dang mgul pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// oM ma mo gA gAn d+ha pa ti su ru su ru/ pra s+phu ru dpe bya ka na dwe'i pad ma pra b+he sA hA// gsang sngag pa 'dis khar stsa la pa'i ri lu tsan dan dang / na la swA/ 
44b2(mdo): ka dang / sung pa la dang / kur kum dang / tha ci lhan cig bsang ba bgyis la/ phye ma zhib mor btags te/ ri lu 'o gnyis tsam pa'i chad du spa rtsi dang lhan cig spya la/ ka mang sdug pa stong rtsa brgyad
44b3(mdo): chang bar bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ zangs kyi snod du su lad nas bzlas brjod 'gyid pa'i tshe/ khamasaH lad nas/ skad cig tsam zhig bsdad par bgyis na/ rtag tu kha mas ud pa la'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 
44b4(mdo): rgyang grags tsam du the tsom myed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' 'ang dgyes 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mgon po mchog tu
44b5(mdo): dga' bar 'gyur ro// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhi ba mo'i rgyal mo// bam po gnyis pa// 
44b6(mdo): bzlas pas bde bar 'grub par 'gyur bas don yod rig pa bri na byed// rigs sngags 'chang dang rtam bgyis pas// dus kun rul dro spang bar bgyi// 'grin pa bad kan sngabs dag dang // de bzhin
44b7(mdo): kun 'jig myur du ni// kha nas lha'i dri dag 'byung // su la tshig dag smras pa ni// de ni myur du dbang du 'gyur// lha rnams dbang du mchis pa dang // bde thogs bdag po dbang po dang // gshin rje chu lnga
44b8(mdo): de bzhin du// tshangs pa khyab 'dug dbang phyug che// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang // zla ba nyis nyid dang ni// thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis// 'di ni Sha na sur bgyid na// tshig ldan khrem/ 
45a1(mdo): rtse mo la/ mchis pas tshig ni gsal bar 'gyur// rtag tu myi byin dbyangs 'gyur te// dri ma'i skyon ni rnam par spangs// tshigs bcad stong ni klags pa dang // sngon klags pa ni
45a2(mdo): nyams myi 'gyur// hUM zhes bgyis pas lha kun dang // lha gang dkyil 'khor gnas pa 'ang mchis// phaT zhes bgyis pas gdug pa dang // bgyegs dang log 'dren rnam par 'jig gnod sbyin srin po
45a3(mdo): sha za dang // brjed byed 'byung po gsang ba la// thams cad mod la dbyer 'gyur zhing // khas bub du yang 'gyel bar 'gyur// ri lu la na thogs na ni// dus kun tu ni mkhas par 'gyur/ 
45a4(mdo): grub pa myur du thob 'gyur te// thams cad du yang tshe ring 'a gyur// tshig mnyen 'jam zhing snyan par 'gyur// ri lu 'di ni bcang bgyis na// don yod pad ma dri ma myed// re lu zhes
45a5(mdo): bgyi 'grub par 'gyur// / oM ma la byig de pad ma pi ba re/ san tsa ra tse ra sA hUM/ a mo gA sid dwe sho d+ha/ ya hUM// na ka bus bi shun pa dang / ud shi ra dang / tsan
45a6(mdo): ngan dang / li shi dang ka lo dang / spang spos dang / rgya spos dang / gur kum dang / pra bun d+ha ri ka dang / e la dang / sa ma ka dang / mu kra dang / su kan d+hi dang / 'di rnams cha mnyam par brgyas
45a7(mdo): ste/ zhig tu btags nas gsang sngags lan stong rtsa brkyang bzlas nas char pa'i chab dang / bsres pas khrus bkyi zhing 'tshal lam/ chab dron pos khrub bgyi ba 'am/ 'chal pa 'am/ nin
45a8(mdo): tu zhus bgyis pa grang pa dag pas pas mab ma mchis par bton pacas kyis rjon gyi nag po'i sas rnams dang / gnod gdon kun 'joms 'grub pa dang // nad kun rnam pam nyams pa dang / 
45b1(mdo): 'dod chags zhe sdang ti mug ki// mun pa gyi bzang spong bar gsungs// bkrus 'tshal tsam gyi mod la ni// dris kun zhi pon nyi byed// dpal gyi lha'i bzhin du 'bar// bsod nams phung po
45b2(mdo): rnam par 'phel// gzi brjid phung po rtag tu 'bar// zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes// gtsang ma'i lus su gyurd pas na// lus ni lha'i bzhin du 'gyur// myi thang ba ni phang bar 'gyur// 
45b3(mdo): ma dag pa ni dag par 'gyur// tshangs par spyod byin tshangs khyod 'gyur// thub myin thub pa kho nar 'gyur// mgo skya gnyer ma spangs pa dang / rtag tu 'gro nad ma mchis 'gyur// myi rtsang lus
45b4(mdo): la lha'i dri rnams 'byung // pad ma ku mu mnyen pa'i lus sngon ki dri ni bar sngags te/ lha'i tsan dan dri dag ni// mad rgyang kang du som nyi myed// rtag tu bde bor nyal bar 'gyur// 
45b5(mdo): bde bar yang ni sad par 'gyur// gnod sbyin srin po 'a/ byung po dang // lha myin gdug pa log 'dren dang // gdug pa'i bgyegs kun mthong myi 'gyur// myi bzad dgra rnams
45b6(mdo): kyis kyang myin// lus nyid sbyang ba bgyis nas su// bzlas brjod pa'i sgrub pa bgyi// legs par bsgrub pa'i las bgyis na// de nyid bde ba 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal ba byang chub sems dang/ 
45b7(mdo): kun// de bzhin mod la gzigs par 'gyur// lha rnams kun dang gang dag gzhan// dkyil 'khor gnas pa myur tu mchis// ci 'dod yid la bzlas pa'i// rtag tu don yod 'grub par 'gyu
45b8(mdo): thog mar lus spyang cho ga bgyi// de nas gsang sngags legs par s+yad// oM a mo gA pad pa lo tsa ne dbi bya di shI pa ri shud d+he/ su ru su ru pad ma a ga kri b+hu ru b+hu ru/ sa man ta bya ba lo gi na sAH
46a1(mdo): sdong gros 'gilu wang rgya mtsho'i// dbu pa sA hAdza ud pa la// smang rtsi lhan cig reng bu 'di bgyis la// gsang sngags sum stong rtsa brgyad byas pa'i myig smad 'di// de bzhin gsheg
46a2(mdo): pa rnams kyi mchog tu bzang zhes gsungs// 'di ni 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin gyis// kun pas dkra shis 'di khyig nad kun 'joms par bgyid// de dag g.yar lam bzang po rmyi// yid du
46a3(mdo): mchi ba nyid mthong myi 'gyur// ngan par snang dang ngan par lta// nam yang mthong bar myi 'gyur ro// gtum po 'joms pa rtum po dang // lhag ma sags pa mgoms nyes dang // bza nyes gnod pasgris
46a4(mdo): gnod sbyin dang // srin po dang ni sdig sprul dang // thams du nyin dang mtshan dag tu// myi snang bar ni the tsom myed// myig/ gis bzang po mthong ba dang // rmyi lam bzang po mthong bar
46a5(mdo): 'gyur// zla ba srid du rab sbyar bas// lha rdzas dag nem/ zong bar 'gyur// myig yongs su sbyang ba'o// oM pUd d+ha/ b+hud d+ha/ bi bud d+ha/ pad ma a mo gA me khi ba ra ba ra bar de
46a6(mdo): sA hA// rigs sngags 'dis 'gyi'u 'apal lan stong rtsa brgya da bzlas brjod bgyi'o// don yod pa'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 
46a7(mdo): snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po lan brgya pa brgyad bzlas brjod pagyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyid pa'i tshe yang 'di klags te// bram ba'i dbus su thig le bgyis te/ thig le lan gcig bgyis pas
46a8(mdo): bral ba'i steng na skam ma'i dbyings lta bur gnas par 'gyur ro// gdug pa thams cad dbang 'gyur mchis// gnod sbyin 'byung po gang dag dang / srin po brtsegs dang log 'dren nyid// thams
46b1(mdo): cad 'jig 'gyur po cos byed// sems can gdug pas gtsug bsams kyang // phyi ma zhing bzod par myi nus pas// de dag thams cad 'jig 'gyur te// me la ye ma leb bzhin no// rtag tu rgyal pa/ 
46b2(mdo): skye bor bcas/ 'khor bcas blon por bcas pa dang / blon po che dang 'dun ma 'dod// btsun mor tshogs bcas dbang du 'gyur// dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dang / thams cad dbang du mchi bar 'gyur/ 
46b3(mdo): rgyal rigs dmangs rigs nyid dag ste// thams cad dbang du mchi bar 'gyur// mchod pa chen po'i 'os su 'gyur// rigs sngags lha ni thams cad dang // gang dag dkyil 'khor gnas pa ste// de dag
46b4(mdo): thams cad dam tshig gi// rjes su sgrub cing skyong bar 'gyur// phyogs bcur bsrung bar bgyid 'gyur zhing // rtag tu grub pa \u0f7f/ myed stsolang// thig le 'di bgyis grogs myed rgyu ba dag/ 
46b5(mdo): chom rkun dang ni chom po g.yon can dang // g.yul 'gyed nyid kyi 'jigs pa gang yin pa// kun las bsgral bar 'gyur te/ som nyi myed// seng ge stag dang do ma dang ni// glang chen khro bo
46b6(mdo): myi bzad dang // wa dang gdug bcas srog chags dang // so gdug sprul kun 'go nas ni// gang dag srog chags gdug par bcas// de dag thams cad nub 'gyur te// nam yang 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// 
46b7(mdo): ser ba me dang tshig pa dang // char pa myi bzang mtshon chu byed// mkhas pa thig le 'chang ba'i lus// khyim rdib pas kyang non myi 'gyur// mkhab pa rig sngags 'chang ba'i don// thams cad 'di yis bgyi
46b8(mdo): bar 'gyur// shin tu grub pa gsal bar yang // 'grub par 'gyur te the tsom byed// bcom ldan 'das rigs sngags gis bdag dran par bgyid cing / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran par bgyis na/ 
47a1(mdo): bcom spyan 'das des pag tu rigs sngags 'chang/ de'i mdun tu bdag mchis nas/ ying la khamams pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// thams cad kyi mchog thams cad ji skad gsungs
47a2(mdo): pa bzhin bcal bar bgyi'o// dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// sa yod grub pa rjes su phul bar bgyi'o// bden par dam bcab pa dam tshig rje su bskyang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te rigs
47a3(mdo): sngags 'chang gis ji skad du/ gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo bsgrub par bgyid na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas rjes su gnang ba de dag thams cad bdag
47a4(mdo): gis stsa lad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te rigs sngags 'chang sgrub pa dang bral bar gyur da na/ bcom lda na 'das de ni bdag ki ma nongs so// de lta bas na rigs sdug
47a5(mdo): 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo bsgrub pas/ gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya bsgrub par bgyis ste/ dgos pa de dag thams cad the tsom ma mchis par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ 
47a6(mdo): de nas gsang sngags bzlas te// oM a mo gA kau sha da ra sa ra pra sa ra hUM// mchod phyir thogs pa'i skud pa'i gsang sngags te/ gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa la/ lan brgya phra bzlas brjod bgyis
47a7(mdo): nas mdud pa gsum dor bar bgyi'o// os mo g+ha pra ba ra Na mu ru pu ri/ dib bya ka shi kam/ sam b+ha ba tu ta ra ta ra swa hA// gos kyi gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oMs
47a8(mdo): po 'ag pra sA sta/ rgyad zhi ba mi/ bi dini med me sa hA// gos bteg pa'i gsang lpags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig 'bras so// mda'i byo taka sa ma b+ha ta ma mo grwa 'a mun tse de 'i shin rgya hU~M// thu/ 
47b1(mdo): grags te sa na nyi sa ca gcig bathas so// chom gri nyi ma mo ga yang ma ma la cheb me 'di/ nam sacas pa// nye reg gi lpags te lan nyi cha gcig bzlas so// ma mo ga dag lani lus sa sa/ 
47b2(mdo): bdag srung ba de srungs kar dpa ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/ rang gi yum la dbang bskur ba'o// oM ma sogs pa ya sa ha pad pe ti Sh+Tha tiSh+ThahUM// dam tshig gi gsang sngags te yan bdun
47b3(mdo): bzlas so// oM sa pa da tA a mo kA ba ti tiSh+Tha raka sha du hUM/ slob ma dang grogs 'gyid pa bsrung ba de thal ba la lan bdun bzlas nas/ bral bar thig le bgyi'o// oM tre log kyi pad ma a ma
47b4(mdo): kA/ kra mi li swa hA// gom pa dor ba'i sngags te/ dalan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM pad me ma ha pad me sa pa ra sa man te/ na ba ri be shA ya a mo gA pa she Ta hu ru mur+ra
47b5(mdo): sA hA// tshon skud sna lnga la lan bdun bzlas te/ bkre bar bgyi'o// au bid tsing tra a mo gu bstan na rab \u0f88\u0f90/ bi shud d+ha ya/ kai Ni ki Ni hUM// ba dan gi ka sang sngags
47b6(mdo): te lan bdun bzlas so// oM a yo gA sha ra badz+ra tun de tha ra tha ra swA tra// mda'i gas pa sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM bi pu la a mo gA ma ha dar ni byi shud de si ri si ri swA hA/ rta babs
47b7(mdo): kyi gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// su dag der bzhugs nas mtho ris kyi sgor zhugs par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad yongs su sbyangs par 'gyur ro// 
47b8(mdo): na na bi tsi tra ma mo kA pus pa pa ya la ta ki na pu ra ya pa ra hA// bus pa gang ba'i gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzlas so// mdzes mo g+ha rad nabye ma na ka tad \u0f7fa ti sta ta dbi bya kan
48a1(mdo): dad ngal mtshan pa yin tan / kyi sngags te lan 'dun 'a baN+Di danas ma ma'i ldang ga gas te lan bdun 'thas@/ 
48a2(mdo): au da bi bya bA tsa na a mo kA pad ma pa re pu ru ya hUM/ 'am por gyi gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzlas so// os mo g+ha sam pa ra ni dron gan d+ha pa ti swA hA// thig le'i gsang sngags te/ lan
48a3(mdo): bdun bzlas so// oM sa ni sa ra yam mo 'ag b+ha dza ne ma da ma de ni hU~M// ril pa 'phrin rings kyi gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzlas so// ma rid na dpe bya rad na kum pa gnyis ka ra sam
48a4(mdo): b+hu ra ni swa hA/ bum pa'i gsang sngags te/ lan bdun pa zlas so// au pi tsing tro dza na na rang gi ba bA ga ta ya sang sho ta ya ru ti swa hA// mtshon rtsi'i gsang sngags te/ lan bdun
48a5(mdo): bzlas so// au bi de d+ya.a pa lo ki ni bi da dza ya tu sa man te/ na sa ma ra ne swa hA/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ so sor dbye bar bgyi ste/ au na na pra ha ra na/ a mo gA muH
48a6(mdo): ta dza la dza la swa hA// phyag mtshan bri ba ste lan bdun bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha rad na su tra d+ha re ki ri ki ri swa hA// theg spyad gi gsang sngags te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
48a7(mdo): bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor tsam ri mo bri ba'i ras sam gzhan zhig ci yang rung ba las yang gdab par bgyi'o// oM bi bu la ba re pra be sha ya a mo kA pad me hUM/ sgo'i cha dbye ba ste/ sgo re rer yang lan
48a8(mdo): nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM su pa bka ti su mang ka la dA ra ba ban ti oM dbi bya b+ha dza na a mo gA pa shan pa na ba re gi ri gi ri hUM/ oM sam bu na/ rub bya dbi bya b+ha dza ne a mo g+ha pad me swa hA/ lan bdun
48b1(mdo): bzlam par 'gyi'o// oM bi bi d+ha mu ma hA ro ba ka ra na Na la dza la a po kA ba ti swa hA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// ma 'i byag drumyas ri mim mo kA ba le d+ha ra bAr sa hA/ mchod yon gyi samapa/ 
48b2(mdo): sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// o gAn d+ha s+pha ra ni sa man ta a mo gA pra u ra hUM/ dri'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM ni ma la ki ya sho d+ha ni dbi bya gan d+ha pra bu ra ni pu ra ya hUM// byAka
48b3(mdo): pa ligasang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM g+han d+ha nurna pra bu ra ni tsu ru nu ru swA hA/ dri'i bye ma'i gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzlas so// oM sa ra sa ra gra ba ti sarba byi d+ya a dI shwa te sam pU ra ya
48b4(mdo): hUM/ gtor ma sna tshogs can gyi gsang sngags te/ lan nyi rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM dbi bya b+ho tsan sam bu ra yo baM pu de la b+he swa hA/ khazas kyi gsang sngags te/ lan nyi
48b5(mdo): shuHkacig bzlas so// A tri shug kra b+ho dza na pa laM pi pu la ra sa pra ba te su ra pra su ra hUM// zas dkar gsum gyi toraH'am/ gzhan la yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// 
48b6(mdo): oM b+ha la ba ti pa ra byi ta/ da'i bya ba na kA ti ta rata rA/ tu ni sA hA/ 'bras bu'i gsang sngags te/ lan 'dun bzlas so// oM di pa bya ku mu mod pa la nan pus swa ba ri sha ni b+ha ba swa hA// me toH/ 
48b7(mdo): gi gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzlas so// oM bi bi d+ha la ta pa sha kun gyi gnas/ swati a ha mas ma bu na kum b+he swA hA/ me tog tor ba'i gsang pa sngags te/ lan bdun bzlas so// 
48b8(mdo): mA ma ha du pa ye ga pa ta la san ced yas san te na hA m+buswa hA/ bdug pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlam po// mdzes thar pa ni dzas jal de mu le sa hA/ me'i gas sngags te/ 
49a1(mdo): bas mo byung ba'i gsang 'gas te / pakun bran tan na ma pas tu
49a2(mdo): phyag bgyi ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun pa zlam mo// mo shi zhim band na tha sa matu hU~M// bskor ba'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM bi bi drA u drA dza li ti pra ni pra dza
49a3(mdo): za mur dzA// thal ma 'og sang sngags te/ lan nyi gcig bzlas so// med mi bya ma mo kA'i lul pa rim du da ni mgon nu de na ran hUM// dril bu'i gsang sngags te/ 
49a4(mdo): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// yang na brgya rtsa brgyad do// oM ra gling la sa man te na a ba b+ha sa ma ya ma ha ma ni rang man/ She swA hA// mar me'i gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad
49a5(mdo): bzlas so// oM pU ru b+hu mu sa pa ha yo sha~M kra dza be hU dgug pa'i gsang sngags te gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM du shA sad tra b+hi d+hon sa ma ya sa ma ya ba re swA hA// dam
49a6(mdo): tshig gi gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM bi tsi tra ma ma ni pi pu la pra pa parta ni hU~M// bgrang 'phreng ki kasang sngags te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM bi mi tra rang
49a7(mdo): no/ rdo la dpe bya/ ku su ma ba re pu shwa ra ti sA hA// me tog 'phreng ba'i gsang sngags te/ lan bdun bzlas so// o dbi bya lo tsa ni/ a mo g+ha pra b+ha re/ sa rarba byid r+ya sa dri shwa ta si
49b1(mdo): 2/ kun pa'i gsang sa[।] // ma sa pangs pa sna te/ bra 5/ mas pa na nga gshegs sug
49b2(mdo): ba'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM ti ba bya sa ma pU ra ne/ na ka bi lo ka ni hUM// khar sil gi gsangapa sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM pad tra pu ra ni
49b3(mdo): thu la ya/ ma mo b+ha ba ti/ sa man ta pra b+he swa hA/ lhung gzed ki ka sang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM dung g+ha sa pas pa byed bya/ a tiSh+Tha ta pra sa ra/ su ru su ru bi ni bu
49b4(mdo): te sA hA/ rtsa bting ba'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gan+ti kra bzlas so// AM dza la d+hu ma dza la shi khi ral+li ga rarbe sA hA/ sbyin sreg gi gsang sngags te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ 
49b5(mdo): au pad mi ni pad ma sa ne ba ra pra ba re/ na ka b+hu ba ne swa hA/ oM kha ga ni tsi ro ni/ ga ma ga ma ya ba ta pra tsa ri ni hUM/ len pa'i gsang sngags te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// 
49b6(mdo): mos rbad tra a mo kA bi she ka ya hA nA ta bi ma ye/ ma 'chashin tshwa tu man pra ba ra pra ni pU dze pad ma dwe tse swa hA// dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// rig+sa
49b7(mdo): sngags 'chang gis gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad so mor cho ga zhib mo'i cho ga sgrub pa ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad ma mor sbyar nas/ cho ga bsgrub na dgos pa rgya chen po'i 'byord pa'i mthu 'di dag dang
49b8(mdo): me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rin po che'i snod sna tshogs dang / nor bu sna tshogs kyi gzhal byed khang rgya chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa
50a1(mdo): pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ji tsam de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i gzhal byed 'badag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i gzhal myed lang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
50a2(mdo): klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkhal ldi rnams dang / myi 'am mi rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / so so'i gzhal myed khab ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'gyu
50a3(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// myi rnams kyi khang pa ji lta ba dang / kha zas kyi mchog ji lta ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de lta bas na dgongs pa'i rnam pa thams cad dang / de kho na nyid bsgrub par ji skad
50a4(mdo): gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang / cho ga dang gsang sngags pa/ sgrub pa rnams bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis glu/ pa pa/ bla na myed pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// gal te/ 
50a5(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang gis las thams cad yongs su rdzogs bar 'gyi ste// sdug pa dang sgrub pa dang / gnad pa thams cad 'jog ngan yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di brjod pa tsam gyis
50a6(mdo): rigs sngags 'char kyi mdun tu bdag rang gi gzugs kyi nye bar mchis nas/ bsam pa dang / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// sdig pa dang sgrib pa dang // nod pa thams cad 'jig par
50a7(mdo): bgyi'o// yongasu dag pa'i lha'i bu chen po ltar lus dag par bgyi'o// cho ga zhib mo dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / dkyil 'khor dang / don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par thar gyi
50b1(mdo): dkyil 'khor grub pa'i mchog thams cad bstsal bar bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// de kho na nyid yang dag par sgrub pa'i
50b2(mdo): grub pa sal par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa'i grub pa chen po brtsal bar bgyi'o// shin tu rgya che zhing bag tsha ba ma mchis pa dang / mchod pa dang / bkur
50b3(mdo): sti chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams thams cad kyi mchog khyad par du 'phags shing / nor 'du ba'i dkra shis dang / dpal gsal bar bgyi'o// 'di la yid gnyis dang / som nyi skyed par myi bgyi zhing
50b4(mdo): dngos po gzhan du yang yid la myi bgyi'o// sems canathams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyis brtse ba la mchog du brtson par bgyi'o// 
50b5(mdo): bu gcig pa bzhin du sems can du gyur pa thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o// bden par smra ba dang / bde na bar rga ba dang / snyan pa smra ba dang / snying rje'i lhag po'i
50b6(mdo): bsam pas dmyigs nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas par bgyi'o// bzlas brjod kyi chog bgyi zhing phyag rgya dang / sang sngags kyang bzlas par bgyi'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs
50b7(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yid la bgyis nas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
50b8(mdo): dgyi'o// 'phags pa byan ngas gzigs dbang phyug sa phyag bgyis nas/ mngon sum du bcang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa sun ras gzigs dbang byug kar po'i gzugs
51a1(mdo): dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs sa phyag bgyis te/ mdun du rtsa bting ba/ bting nas dkyil mo krung bcas te/ mchis nas gzhan gyi smra bar bzlas pa bgyis te/ 'di ni gas
51a2(mdo): pa'i de kho na nyid bsgrub pa'o// de nas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o// bdag la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po de kho na nyid grub par gyurd cig/ 'jig rten dbang phyug 'gon po
51a3(mdo): thugs rje can sems can la byams pa/ sems can dag pa lag na pad ma sems can thams cad la byams po'i bdag nyid can gyi byin brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin
51a4(mdo): gshegs pa kun dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // srin po lha min gsang ba pa// 'jig rten skyong dang tshangs pa dang // dag po khyab 'jug gzhon nu sogs// gshin rje chu lha lus
51a5(mdo): ngan dang // drang srong tshogs dang de bzhin du// zla nyi kun 'gyed gzhon nu dang // de bzhin dbang phyug chen po dag/ phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// de dag myur du 'du bar 'gyur
51a6(mdo): sgrol ma bdun ni 'du bar 'gyur// de bzhin pha ro lang phyin bcu dang / 'grin sngon de bzhin gos kar can// de bzhin pad ma gar gi dbang // rgyal dang nam rgyal nyid dang ni// lcags sgrog rdo rje
51a7(mdo): lcags sgrog dang // lha mo 'khro gnyer ma ma gyi// dpe myed pho nya mo dang ni// 'jigs myed dpal dang dbyangs can dang // pad ma kon ti ud pa la// pad ma'i so can de bzhin du// ti se'i ni
51a8(mdo): the mon// 'phrog ma 'byung po'i ma dag dang // de bzhin lag na rdo rje bcu// mthu chen ji bzhin rin ced dbang // rdo rje 'cha chen de bzhin du// bcu gsum lnga dbang lhan cig dang // sum
51b1(mdo): // ded/ ma ca 'du ba gyur/ bcu'i de bzhin sacad kyis rnam pa
51b2(mdo): sto dad par mdzad do// de'i yod la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam par gzigs shing / rtag tu mchog gsol bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu mgon po 'phags pa brgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyan
51b3(mdo): stong pa phyag rgya sna tshogs 'dzin pa lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ bram ze cha lugs don yod zhags// mthong bar 'gyur te/ som nyi myed// mgrin sngon dang ni Na
51b4(mdo): 'grin dang // de bzhin rgya mtsho gling dang ni// mgo bo zhal ni bcu gcig dang // de bzhin zhal ni bzhi dag dang // mgon po 'jigs pa brgyad 'phrog dang // de bzhin gzigs pa
51b5(mdo): bsam myi khyab// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dang ni// s+yA ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzinang // phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// mgon pos thams cad ston par mdzad// bde ba can gi 'dzan
51b6(mdo): rten khams// rgyal ba 'dren pa 'od dpag myed// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bskor ba// mgon po mod la mthong bar 'gyur// gzhan yang sangs rgyas zhing ni stong dag ni// chu bo gang ga'i bye ma dang
51b7(mdo): mnyam pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum bye ba brgya phrag stong // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas yongs bskor 'gon// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis mthong bar 'gyur// mthong ba chen po'i nam
51b8(mdo): pa gzhan mthong ste// nyin cig bzhin du byang chub snying po dang // chos kyi 'khor lo de bzhin rdo rje bdan// de dag rmyi lam snang ba mthong 'gyur bar// de la yid gnyis som nyi the tsom myed// sangs
52a1(mdo): rgyas rnams kyis bshud pa 'am mtshams byed lnga// mgon po che la gdug sems nyid dang ni// byang chub sems dpa'i bar chad 'phags pa la kha zer nyid dang / dam chos gru
52a2(mdo): ba dang rgyal bas gsungs spong mnar myed gzhol ba dang // myi bzad dmyal ba drug cu gnas pa dang // bskal pa 'bum 'phrag stong po thams cad 'grol// phrag brgya gsang sngags bzlas pa
52a3(mdo): tsam gyis sam// thos sam mthong ngam mying ni bzung bas kyang // sdig pa de kun 'jig 'gyur som nyi myed// don yod zhags snying phyag rgya mthong ba yang // 'jig rten mgon dang mtshungs te
52a4(mdo): khyad par 'phags// sangs rgyas 'bum phrag stong dpag dka'i// bye ma brgya stong dag ni mthong bar 'gyur// byang chub snying por rtogs pa thams cad dang // chos kyi 'khor lo// 
52a5(mdo): rab tu bskor bar mtshungs// don yod rgyal po'i snying po phyag rgya dang // gsang sngags mthong na bsod nams phung chen kyo// bsod nams phung po 'di dag 'phel bar 'gyur// 
52a6(mdo): de'i tshe yang rnam par 'phel 'gyur bas/ de ni dpag tu myed par lom nyi byed// de nasarigs sngags 'chang ba gcang gyur nas// gtsang ba'i gos bgos nas ni thog yar yang // yo byad sgrub
52a7(mdo): pazang zhing mchod pa cang // rtag tu yan lag grol ni sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs bdug pa rab tu gdug bgyid cing // dpung pa lag pa lnga'i spos kyis byugs// thang pa'i la phyogs grang mol
52a8(mdo): sman bshams par// dkyil mo krung bcas dpa ni byams sems dang // snying rje'i lhag yas mas de nyid mnyam gzhag nas// phyogs bcu'i dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // 
52b1(mdo): shin tu 'jig rtend dbang la phyag bgyi zhing // rtag tu bla ma mchod nas chas la brtson// shin tu rig pas tshig bzhin gyi smra bar// shin tu rig pas bsrung ba'i cho ga bgyi// shin tu bkra shis
52b2(mdo): bra ma de nyid gus// bden par smra zhing stan par smra ba dang // sems can kun la snying rje'i bdag nyid can// lhan cig je sa mthun gyur nas ni// de nas phyag rgya 'di bcing bar bgyi lag pa
52b3(mdo): bad ma'i tshul du bzhag la/ sor mo rnams mnyam par bcings te/ mthe'u chung zla ba'i tshul du snying kar bzhag ko// phyag rgya 'di ni don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ste// byang chub
52b4(mdo): snying po'i bar du gsal bar bgyi'o// 'gon po 'jig rten dbang phyug dgug pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM sa mo g+ha b+hi kur bi ta sa man ta a ba lo ga ya man ste yang tA/ ma
52b5(mdo): ti sta a mo pad me tsa ra byi tsa ra san tsa ra hUM hUM/ de ma thag tu dus gsum la rnam par lta ba/ don yod pa rgyas pa pad ma 'a/ bar ba gsal ba'i cho 'phrul dang / bcas pa'i phyag rgya'i
52b6(mdo): rgyal pos shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang / mnyam pa'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po mtha' dag/ cher g.yos par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du bshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sa
52b7(mdo): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'bum phrag brgya stong du ma dag byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu dges shing / sangs rgyas yid la mdzad pa'i thum
52b8(mdo): chen pos/ phyag gser gi kha tog la bu brkyang nas/ rigs lags 'a kye/ phyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro// thub pa dam pa dang yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byid kyis bdu/ 
53a1(mdo): gyung// rab ga dang / sang tun can pa dang / / 'ibu / gzhin rje dang / chuwa dang / sum ngan dang / #
53a2(mdo): dang / kun pagang gzhodan du la sogs pa/ lha rnam pa bsrung ba dang / thob pa dang / sred par bgyid par 'gyur ro// phyag rgyabacing brtsam gyi yod la/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / 'jig
53a3(mdo): pa brgyad rnams dang / mchod pa thams cad las yongs su tha rad par 'gyur ro// de'i grub pa'i yid du mtsho bar 'gyur ro// las thams cad bgyid pa'i phyag rgya thams cad du mchog lags par thag
53a4(mdo): lags so// don yod dam tshig mchog drags pa'i pad ma rgyas pa'i phyag rgya bcing / 'dzub mo gung mo rnams pad ma lcagakyu'i tshul du bgyis la sen mo mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyag rgya
53a5(mdo): 'di bstand te/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor che ba'i bya/ rgya 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM a mo 'gapa dmang ku sha sa ma yin/ 'grin dA ra dA ra ma ha srad tra hUM/ 
53a6(mdo): phyag rgya bcings te/ bcings ma thag tu'am/ bzung ba tsam gyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bgyi ba 'acol par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de
53a7(mdo): dag thams cad dgos pa dang / mnyes pa dang / rab tu dges pa dang / tshim pa dang / thug pa dges pa skye bar 'gyur zhing / rigs sngags 'chang la thugs rje chen po rgyal po'i snying po grub pa dam pa gsol
53a8(mdo): bar 'gyur zhing / yang nas yang du mthong ba bcol par 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad rtsol bar 'gyur ro// don yod par dam tshig grub pa rtsol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
53b1(mdo): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chog zhib mo/ phyag rgya dang gsang sngags 'dzin pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor bzung ba tsam gyis/ dam tshig gi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro// thams cad du 'phags
53b2(mdo): pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gyis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du dgos pa'i gsang sngags grub pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras
53b3(mdo): gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa rtag tu lta 'tshal par 'gyur ro// lag 'thil pad ma ltar dkyis la/ 'dzub mo gung mo rdo rje ltar bgyis 'the chung brkyang ba'i phyag rgya ni/ pad ma 'chang ba 'dug pa
53b4(mdo): dang // me tog la sogs dri rnams dang // 'phreng ba byug pa ste ma dang / ba dan gos dang rgyan dang ni// tor ma mchod yon ra ba tu 'bul// bum pa gang ba dri mtshogs dang // tshon srung
53b5(mdo): sna lnga tshon bye'o// gzhan yang zas ni sna tshogs la// phyag/ rgya 'di ni kun la mchog/ 'di ni dbul ba'i phyag rgyar gsuthams cad du ni don yod mchog/ go bar bgyid pa'i phyag
53b6(mdo): rgya 'di// pad ma'i phyag gis byin gyis brlabs// gung mo nor bus dkris pa'i lta bu'i phyag rgya 'di ni/ bag chab myed pa'i pad pa rin po che'i phyag rgya lags te/ 'di ni grub pa dam pa lags so/ 
53b7(mdo): spyan drang ba'i gsang sngags ni// oM a mo gA pad ma ma ha sad ta/ a ya tu ma ha man du lo bi bai ri pa ri pad ma b+hu dze swA hA// dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// gsol pa gdab
53b8(mdo): pa'i gsang ldags te// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / phyag na pad ma gsol gdab dkrug/ lha rnams kun dang de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor gyini lha rnams dkrug/ phyag rgya 'dzin
54a1(mdo): bcings pa'i ba// phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin byang chub sems dpal 'ang 'du// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za lta sbyin de bzhin du// nam mkha' ldi
54a2(mdo): dang myi 'am ci dang // lto maphye chen po nyid dag ste// de kun skad cig 'du 'gyur zhing // bsrung ba'i phyir ni som nyi myed// lag pa rdo rje'i tshul du zhag la lag pa'i the'u chung rnams pad ma'i mtshams
54a3(mdo): su byas te/ gung mo rnams yid tsam bskums pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa ni/ grub ldan 'di ni phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing bar bgyi ba'i srung ba la bag cha myed// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings
54a4(mdo): tsam dang // gsang sngags stong ni bzlas tsam gyis// dang dag tshad bdun ni 'khor yug bcing // dkyil 'khor dag ni/ bcing ba dang // bsrung ba'i las ni bgyis par 'gyur// 
54a5(mdo): o a mo g+ha badz+ra dri dA pad ma ban dA sa man te/ ma ha si man dag shan tu man/ tsu ru tsu ru hUM phaT// de nas don yod phyag rgya ste// grub ldan sems can kun sman pa// don yod pi
