54a6(mdo): phyag rgya ni// khyad par 'phags pa gzhan yang bstan// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas sor mo rnams mnyam par gzhag ste/ srin lag kha gdengs nas/ sor mo rnams yid tsam bskums pa ni// don
54a7(mdo): yod sna tshogs rgyal po'i// pad ma'i phyag rgya chen por bsgrags// phyag rgya 'di ni las kun dang // 'jug pa'i las la sbyang pa dang // dkyil 'khor phyag rgya mchog kun gsungs// phyag rgya 'di ni bcu
54a8(mdo): tsam dang // gsang sngags dam pas bsrung bgyis na// rigs sngags 'chang ba 'jug par 'gyur// dus gsum gshegs pa rnam thard pa'i// dkyil 'khor dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// 
54b1(mdo): badz+re badz+re/ a d+hi ni ta prad me bi wA ru ba d+ha re/ bA ra dA ra hUM/ pra bi shi Shu sI yang d+ha ga tan d+hi ri tu ti swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis de nyid 'grub pas phyogs bcu'i// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni na
54b2(mdo): drug tu// g.yo bar 'gyur bar som nyi myed// phyag na pad ma'i lus 'bar nas// mgu ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// rigs sngags 'chang la 'dzum bzhin gyis// rtag tu lta zhing mdun na mchis
54b3(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun dang // mtho ris sgo rnams 'byed par 'gyur// sum bcu rtsa gnyis gnas rnams na// gnas pa'i lha rnams sgo 'byed cing // sum bcu rtsa gsum gnas smon// gnas
54b4(mdo): pa thams cad sgo 'byed do// bde can 'jig rten khams dag/ gi// sgo na gnas pa sgo 'byed do// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis// gnas kun tu ni 'jug par 'gyur// phyag rgya
54b5(mdo): sdig pa thams cad 'phrog// nye ba'i nyon mongs thams cad/ 'joms// sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol// gnod/ pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyid// dmyal ba bcu drug rnam
54b6(mdo): las tha dang / phyag brgya bcings pa tsas gyis ni// myi babad 'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang // nyes byas thams cad 'jig par bgyid// dmyal ba'i sgo ni bcad par 'gyur// byi babad 'jigs
54b7(mdo): lam bsngal bar 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam gyis// mtshams myed lnga ni bgyis pa dang // sdig pa kun las rnam par ba dang // sems can kun la rtag tu sdug/ de bzhin gshegs kun
54b8(mdo): byin gyis rlob// phyag rgya 'di nyid 'the bo'i rtse mo cung zad bkug la bzung ste/ gung mo pad pa'i ral pa'i tshul du bgyis ste/ spyi bo la ral pa la gzhag pa ni// pad ma'i ral pa'i phyag rgya lags
55a1(mdo): 'dzin do yod pa'i lag pa zhes pa sgrunas te/ sems can thams cad la ldan pa'i mangs/ gsang sngags 'di brjod par 'gyi'o// sbom po ga/ padas rdzamaman rdzam dzu/ bi mi'i / 
55a2(mdo): ma le swa hA// phyag rgya kyi bor bzhag nas chab dag gis// bkrus nas chang mas gsang sngags ni// brgya brtsa brgyad du bzlas nas su// phyag rgya gsang sngags dogs byed pas// rtag tu ba
55a3(mdo): pa'i mod tsam gyis// myi phrang ba ni rtsang bar 'gyur// myi zang spyod pa chang ba dang // tshangs spyod ma yin tshangs spyod 'gyur// myi thub pa ni thub par 'gyur// bsod nams phung pos lha bzhin
55a4(mdo): 'bar// zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes// 'jig rten du dan snying rtag tu sdug/ gsang sngags bla na myed pa 'grub/ grub pa don yod zhags pa'o// don yod de dag 'grub par
55a5(mdo): 'gyur// lha rnams kun ni 'du 'gyur te// bsrung ba'i phyir ni som nyi myed// mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzig sems dpa' mchog sprin dag pa po// mchog sbyin rgyun tu
55a6(mdo): thams cad du// nyi ma re re mthong 'gyur zhing // tshe 'phel rtag tu nad byed 'gyur// de bzhin mgu dang rgyas par 'gyur// thams cad du ni las 'grub ste// gnod pa kun las rnam par grol// sgrib
55a7(mdo): pa rnams las rnam par thard// thams cad du ni dkra shis mchog// khrus kyi rnam pa 'di dag ni// don yod khrus kyi mchog yin no// lag gnyis bsdams la 'og tu bstan// srin lag gnyis yid
55a8(mdo): tsas bskums na// pad la'i nong du lags te/ kun nas kyang ni mnyam par gzhag/ phyag rgya ting nge 'dzin lta bu 'di// dkyil mo krung bcas mchis nas su// phyas rgya 'di dag bcing bgyi zhig/ 
55b1(mdo): mnyam pa gzhaganas gsang sngags pathas// bcings pasam gyi yod nas ni// dkyil krung rdo rje sun mnyam 'gyur// kun napa go char gyur nas ni// brtseg pa dang lon 'dred thams cad dang / 
55b2(mdo): gnod sbyin 'byung po srin por bcas// lha byin mkha' lding gis myi mthong // phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams dag tu// de dag thams cad rgyang ring 'bros// bgyegs myed pa ni las 'grub pas// 
55b3(mdo): bzlas pa'i las la mo nyi myed// sa po kA badz+ra tri pA pad me shar hU~M// phal mo mnyam par sbyar la/ 'dzub mo dang gung po bsug nas/ 'the bong pad ma la bye ba ltar bgyi ste/ doran yod dbang phyug
55b4(mdo): rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag gi mdun du gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// oM pad me shar/ a mo g+ha ga nga / bI ri b+hai ri swa sA/ 
55b5(mdo): 'dis thog mar bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyi'o// de'i'og tu phyag rgya bcings nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po/ de kho na nyid sems dpa' bsams pa rtse gcig pas bzlas
55b6(mdo): brjod bgyi'o// lan cig bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas/ 'bum phrag brgya gang ka'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
55b7(mdo): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ rigs sngags 'chang de la legs so zhes bgyi ba rtsol bar 'gyur ro// dbugs 'byin par mdzad do// rigs sngags 'chang de la 'od zer
55b8(mdo): sna tshogs rtong par mdzad do// mgon po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug dran par bgyis pa tsam gyis mod la mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar bcings pa tsam gyis/ pha rol
56a1(mdo): tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyind pa bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gsheg
56a2(mdo): pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// myi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad yongasu dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya 'di bcings la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying
56a3(mdo): po dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la/ yon tan dang / phan yon rnams thob par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis la/ phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcings nas/ zhag cig smyung ba bgyis te
56a4(mdo): bzlas brjod bgyis na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs da du phyag bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin du bdun na mchis nas/ rigs sngags 'chang ba legs so zhes bya ba sol te/ rigs sngags
56a5(mdo): 'chang legs so legs so// 'di ni bzlas brjod kyi dam pa yin no// zhes dpung pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i lag pas/ rigs sngags 'chang gi phyi bor bzhag nas/ dbugs 'byin
56a6(mdo): par 'gyur te/ chur shog bu gang 'dod pa'i mchog spongs shig dang / sbyin no khyod rjes su bzung zhing byin gyis brlabs pas/ nga'i bu rigs sngags 'chang gi chu bor gyur cig/ rigs sngags
56a7(mdo): 'chang byed kyis don yong pa'o nags pa'i da po grub pas rnam par grol ba'i dkyis 'khor gyi phyag rgya sa par dbye ba dang / cho ga zhib ma'i rgyal po la btad par gyi sa shig/ snying rje chen po'i ma
56a8(mdo): kyis sems can thams cad la dgongs par gyis shig/ khyod 'di ni me 'ongs pa'i mngal du gnas nas zhi 'phos te/ 'jig rten gi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / khyod pad pa'i da
56b1(mdo): du thul te skyes nas/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing / mtshan dang / dpe byad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du med pag tu byed par 'gyur ro// 'di lta tshig
56b2(mdo): gzhan gyi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lan stong pa rgyad tshang na nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa/ rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor kyi 'khor
56b3(mdo): las bsar bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig bcwo brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// tshe dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ro// don yod rgya chen snang zhes bgyi
56b4(mdo): ba'i rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gang gis maHdas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend gi khams/ dbu/ rab bskums pa las brkyang ba tsam gyis/ mchi zhing slar
56b5(mdo): ldog par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod brgya stong bgyis la/ phyag rgya brgyad stong bcings na// tshe 'di nyid la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// sgyu
56b6(mdo): ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind kyis rnam par rol pa/ don yod pa'i myig yongasasu dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dang / drag po dang
56b7(mdo): dbang po dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gzhon nu dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan pa la tshogs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs
56b8(mdo): kyi bar du mthong bar 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba/ de lta de lta bu'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i bzlas brjod sprub pa 'bul lags so
57a1(mdo): 'bum pa rnam pas 'jig rten las 'das pa phyogs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhingathams cadadu/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'ams cad mngon sum du snang ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin/ 
57a2(mdo): gshegs pa thams cad las lung bstan thos par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du phyir gyi ldog par byin gyis brlabs kyis/ byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bcing / 
57a3(mdo): te dkyil mo krung bcas nas/ sems can thams cad la brtse ba dang / 'byung po byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems kyi rang bzhin gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan cig bzlas brjod bgyi'o
57a4(mdo): bzlas brjod bgyis ma thag kho nar/ lan drug brgya bzhi bcu ra bzlas brjod bgyis par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa/ thams cad dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing / dran pa dang blo
57a5(mdo): gros dang / gzi brjid lus la 'jug par bgyid do// bzla/ sa brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la/ pha rol tu phyind pa drugayong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ri mo'i sku gzugs de la yang
57a6(mdo): 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid rmyi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad gsol bar 'gyur ro// de'i las kyi sgrib pa
57a7(mdo): thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su gsal ba dang / gtugs par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro// 'jig rtend pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa
57a8(mdo): rnams kyi dam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bas/ sangs rgyas rje su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po gsu// 
57b1(mdo): thal mo lhan cig sbyar te bsdams te sbyar la/ rtse mo yid tsam bkug ste/ khar ka tad la srin lag gnyis phyir bgyid cing / gung mo pad ma ltar bgyis te/ sngags 'di brjod do// oM tu ru tu ru pad me a
57b2(mdo): mo g+ha sid d+hi hU~M// phyag rgya 'di ni don yod grub// las rnams grub dang ldan pa'i// 'di ni bcing ba bgyis pa yis// kun rig myur tu grub par 'gyur// myur tu ston pa bco lang 'gyur te/ rnyed dga'
57b3(mdo): don yod grub pa mchog/ mchog kun rab tu stond par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das pa de bzhin 'jig rten pa// sgrib pa thams cad las ni rnam par grol// bsod nams phung po dag ni rtag tu 'phel
57b4(mdo): dkra shis sgra ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o// lha rnams rtag tu sru par 'gyur// rdo rje bcing ba shin tu bcing // rtag tu sems ni brtan por bgyi// 'dzub mo dag ni yid bskums nas
57b5(mdo): snying po dag ni rab tu brkyang // don yod pa'i pad ma'i ngargya la 'khor phyag rgya dang / snying po gsungs pa dang / pad ma'i'o// dbang phyug gis phyag rgya las dang / don thams cad grub pa
57b6(mdo): gsang sngags de dag gsungs nas/ de nas don yod pa'i rgyal pos gsungs pa/ mo ma mo ga mre ta ya/ pad me pA du ra pad ma dang / ma ha man dz+wa la phred ya hUM// snying po phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa la
57b7(mdo): pad ma 'chang ba'i don yod snying po'i// grub pa de nyid yang dag som nyi byed// thams cad du ni las rnams thams cad dag/ de ni grub par 'gyur te som nyi myed// shin tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzung / 
57b8(mdo): shin tu gas pa'i gsang sngags bzlas// shin tu bkrus pas gos chang mgo// rtsang ba'i sems kyis 'chang bgyid cing // sems can kun la cher gyur nas// rtag tu bla ma gus par bsgom// rtag
58a1(mdo): tu shin pa dnga'agyi zhing // pad ma'i rtsag sa dka' bar bgyi// rgya rgyalas grul gyu bam// pad pa'i 'ang dang pangs rgyam tho'o// myang cu 'dzin byed dang byub thos/ 
58a2(mdo): som can kun pa na ldan// lag pa g.yon pa brkyang bcam gyis/ khar pad ma'i tshul du bzhag la lag pa bsgyur nas/ 'grub mo gyen tu baspre 'the bo yid tsam bkug la/ lag pa g.yas pa bcun
58a3(mdo): ste sor mo rnams pad ma'i tshul du bzhag la/ 'the bo yid tsam bkug ste/ bung mo don yod pa'i zhags par bgyi ba ni/ don yod pa zhi ba chen po'i myig sems can thams cad la byams pa'i seMm
58a4(mdo): dang / snying rje'i bdag nyid can lags te/ gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM pa shu pa ti be sha pA pan tam ha pra la hrI thA/ ti man ti tag ya a ka ra sha Ni/ samachod ni/ pU ru pU ru
58a5(mdo): a mo gu pa sha sid d+he hUM/ phyag rgya 'dis gsang sngags la na nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// de nas yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas nas/ lag pa g.yas pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i
58a6(mdo): tshul du bdeg cing / slar yang rang gi gnas su bzung zhing / gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas te/ lan bdun ni yang gdeg go// don yod rgyal po bzlas pa ni// bsam pa mchog tu dag pas brgya
58a7(mdo): bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la ni// don chen zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i sa// byang chub thams cad dgug pa dang // mod la sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs dag/ ji ltar yid la
58a8(mdo): bsams pa bzhin// mod la grub pa bla byed dang // mod la thams cad dgug par 'gyur// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za lha min mkha' lding dang // myi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che// rigs
58b1(mdo): sngags 'chang la blta ba'i phyir// thams cad de'i mod la 'du// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dag/ de nyid gzigs pas gzugs par 'gyur// rigs sngags 'chang la phyag bgyi'i phyir/ 
58b2(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' 'du bar 'gyur// 'gon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// mchog sbyin gyi bor phyag 'jog 'gyur/ yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi// rang bzhin mod la ston par mdzad/ 
58b3(mdo): gang dag mnar myed song ba dang // sems can mtshams myed lnga bgyid dang // gang dag 'phags la bkur 'debs dang // gang dka dab chos spong ba dag/ phyag rgya 'di mthong 'dzin bcug kam
58b4(mdo): bcings pas yod la sdig pa kun// 'jig 'gyur mod la 'dzin pa mthong // phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// dgongs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam pa
58b5(mdo): rjes su zlos par bgyid pa dang // rigs sngags 'chang // pa mthong de// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang ni// mngon du mthong bar blta ba bya// tshe rabs brgyud par bskal
58b6(mdo): pa ni// brgya dang stong du bsags pa'i// sdig pa las kyi sgrib pa gang // phyag rgya bcings sam mthong tsam gyis// de kun 'byung 'gyur som nyi byed// thal mo lhan cig tu sbyar te/ 
58b7(mdo): mkhas pas pad ma'i tshul du bgyis la// 'dzub mo nor bur bgyis te/ gung mo yid tsam zhig bkug pa ni/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi the mo ste/ lag pa kyi bor brkyang nas
58b8(mdo): sde bo dbang bsku pa stsolod pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do// / oM s+t+rai yad d+ha/ nu ka ta/ a bi shin matu/ sa ra ba rje yang d+ha/ a bai She k+She/ pad ma ma ni su pad me/ ma mo kA
59a1(mdo): sarba ta tha ka te/ a driSh+Thi te hUM// 'dis dbang bskur ba tsam gyis rigs sngags 'chang la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzig
59a2(mdo): dbang phyug gi phyag gis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro// rigs sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam
59a3(mdo): par dag par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi rtse bo gcig pu'i gnas su 'gyur ro// kyi zug rdo rje'i pad ma bcing // rtag tu sor mo'i rtse mo brkyang // 'dzub mo lcags kyu'i tshul du bgyi
59a4(mdo): rang kyi gdon gis 'khro gnyer bzhin// 'khro bo'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya che// las kun sgrub par bgyid pa'i// thams cad grub 'gyur phyag rgya ste// kun grub dam pa'i gsang sngags pas// 'di
59a5(mdo): dran grub pa kun gyi mchog/ oM kr-i dra radza dA ma ha a mo g+ha/ ha na ha na/ sarba duShAN hU~M// phyag rgya 'di dra// na tsam gyis kyang // mthu chen po'i gsang sngags kyis
59a6(mdo): bdug pa kun ni rnam 'jig ste// ri rab kyang ni snyil ba bgyid// phyag rgya bcing ba bgyis pa'is// sdig pa mas cad 'jig par bgyid// sems can gdug dang gdus
59a7(mdo): pa'i grwa/ bkyigs dpa log 'dren 'dug pa ste// de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// phyag rgya bcings pa nam gyis ni// thams cad dbang su gyur nga nas mchis// mA dang kyi dang den
59a8(mdo): skyong dang // bram ze rgyal rigs gang lags pa// thams cad dbang du gyur da napa ni// mchis par gyu pa som nyi myed// rgyud ni rtag tu mnyam gnags// mthe'u mnyam du bden dpa ni/ 
59b1(mdo): shung mo'i ni gung mo nyid// yid tsam bkug nas bsgreng bar bgyi// 'di ni pad mo chen po'i// lha mo sgrol ma'i phyag rgya ste// grub pa bla na byed pa'i// thams cad kyi ni dam pa lags// thal mo pang/ 
59b2(mdo): me'i tshul du sbyar// 'the bong nyid ni brkyang bgyis la// 'phe'u chu pa med tsal bkug pa ni// ga ga ma ched po phyag rgya 'o// 'di ni kun 'byung bar byed// rdo rje'i tshul du zas spya dam ba
59b3(mdo): shing // shes rab can gyis g.yas pa'i lag bsgyur la// 'khro nyer bzhin ni de bzhin 'khro ba dang // phyag rgya chen po kun 'dod rab tu smin// lag pa gnyis kyis thal sbyar brkyang nas ni// 1sa?
59b4(mdo): bde brkyang kung mo bskums nas su// 'the'u chu brkya ngan/ sa lcags sgrog pad ma'i// tshul du snying ka'i gnas su gzha/ ka par bgyi// phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che// phyag rgya 'ad ni
59b5(mdo): bcings pa'i sa// dkyil 'khor kun nas lha dag dang / dkyil 'khor lha kun dga' bar 'gyur// thams cad chog sa shing 'du ba dang // kun gyis srung bgyid som nyi myed// 
59b6(mdo): phyag rgya 'di nyid bshig nas lag pa ni// bal sbyar pad ma'i tshul du bzhin byas te// snying kar bzhag pa'i gnod sbyin po nya mo 'i// 'di ni phyag rgya lags par legs par bsgrags// dang po
59b7(mdo): rje'u chur legs bcings la// gong mo lhag ma bskum zhing 'the bo bzhag/ pad ma tshul gyi bzhin dran sgrol bdun gyi// grub pa kun kye za byed phyag rgya 'di// sdig pa thams cad 'jig cing nyon
59b8(mdo): mongs kun// nad kun nye bar zhi bar som nyi myed// don yod pa'i grub pa bla myed kyi// cho ga zhib mo thams cad rab tu 'grub// lag pa gnyis ni mnyam gzhag ste// rdo rje'i tshul du pad ma
60a1(mdo): bcing // 'dzub mo bskums pa bgyis nas ni// 'the bo yang ni dgug par bgyi// 'di ni 'grin phyag rgya ste// cho ga zhib mo'i dam pa lags// pad ma'i tshul du bal mo sbyar/ 
60a2(mdo): 'dzub mo 'khyud la gud mo ni// lugs kyu'i tshul du bsgreng bar bgyi// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya 'di// rgya mtsho grong gi mkha' lta bu// rdo rje za ba nyid kyis gsungs// 'di ni las rnams babyed/ 
60a3(mdo): pa po// grub pa kun gyi bla na myed// phyag rgya 'di ni 'dzub mo 'the bo rnams// lcags sgrog lhag ma bskums nas ni// pad ma'i tshul du snying kali// gnas su gzhag pa 'grin sngon gyi/ 
60a4(mdo): 'di ni dogs myed lag kun phyag rgya lags// lag gnyis pad ma li'u chur te// g.yas g.yon du ni bzhag nas su// kun denas zhi ba'i bzhin du bzhag/ byams pa'i byig gnyis brgya
60a5(mdo): pa ni// zhal ni bcu gcig phyag rgya ste// de bzhin kun gyi/ sa kyi thub pa'o// mthe bo mnyam par bsum bgyid la/ sor mo'i rtse mo bskum pa dang // 'dzub mo gnyis ni pad ma'i/ 
60a6(mdo): tshul// rigs pa'i dbang phyug phyag rgya lags// phyag rgya 'ang nyid dbus su ni// 'khor lo'i yul du 'dzub mo bskum// g.yon pa brkyang ba dbang chen gyi// phyag rgya 'byung po thams cad 'joms// 
60a7(mdo): sa pa sgrog dam du bsdams nas ni// lag pa gnyis sa brgyad nas kyang // snying ka bzhag pa'i phyag rgyaste// 'di ni sbyin tu gshin rje lags// lag pa ga yon sa brgyang nas su// ba sa ba
60a8(mdo): pa'i tshor to 'grus// gsas pa nyi gang bzhaganas su// ma po dang ni chu sun// 'di ni su ma'i byag bya'o// ku kun dgug pa mchog sags so// lag gni brnams bgyis sa/ 
60b1(mdo): ma bying ga log tu stsol// g.yas pa dang ni g.yon pa dang // snying ka'i gnas su gzhag bgyi ste// phyag rgya 'di ni lus ngan ki// gnod sbyin thams cad zag par bgyid// lag pa gsas pa kyi bor ya
60b2(mdo): 'the bo 'dzub mo bkug bgyis la// lag pa g.yon pa brgya nas su// 'dzub mo gan du bsgreng ba ni// 'di ni tshangs pa'i phyag rgya ste// thams cad du ni las sgrub bo// phyag rgya 'di nyid g.yas pa/ 
60b3(mdo): 'the'u chung ni bkug bgyis te// drang srong tshogs kyi phyag rgya 'di// lha rnams kun gyis phyag bgyis pa'o// lag pa gnyis ni dam bcings pa// blta sdug 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ste// lha byin thams cad
60b4(mdo): 'gums pa'i// khyab 'jug phyag rgya 'di zhes gsungs// degayas pa byi tsa pu rabagyi// g.yon pa che gsum tshul du bgyi// 'the bo 'the chung bskums pa ni// 'byung po thams cad spag
60b5(mdo): bgyid pa// 'di ni drag po'i phyag rgyang gsungs// g.ya sa pa khu tsur bcings nas su// 'dzub mo brkyang nas g.yon ni// bkur brtan khu tshur bcangs nas gzhag/ sor mo
60b6(mdo): rnams ni brkyang bar bgyi// drag po rgyun tu lta bgyid pa// de bzhin lha'i sde dpon gyi// gzhon nu phyag rgya 'di zhes gsungs// rkyen tu lag pa gnyis bsgreng nas// sor mo gsum ni brkyang bgyi/ 
60b7(mdo): 'am thong 'dul po bkrug pa ni// 'ad zer stong dag 'phro bgyid pa// 'di ni nyi sa'i phyag rgya lags// phyag rgya 'di nyid mang po gsum// bkug napa mang mo gnyis ka btug// skangs
60b8(mdo): tshogs kyis mdzes gyur da pa// 'di ni zla ba'i phyag rgyang gsungs// gsang sngags chen po'i phyag rgya 'di dag ni// las dang don kun sgrub pa grub par bgyi// sdig pa thams cad spong zhing nyon
61a1(mdo): mongs kun// nyams par bgyid cing sgrib pa thams cad 'byung // las kun zad par bgyid cing don yod pa'i// las smrab don yod sgrub pa grub par 'gyur// oM pad ma ta re taH/ 
61a2(mdo): ya/ pad ma pU dze hUM/ au ma ha pad me she tang ge/ hu ru hu ru sA hA/ oM bI ku Ti pad me ta ra ta ra hAM/ au pad me pa Na Da ra ba si ni/ kun Da kun Na swa hA/ o a mo g+ha pad ma pa ra de/ sid pyA si/ 
61a3(mdo): dUt+yA phU/ oM sarba da tra kA byin ni/ a pa ha5/ ro'u dri tsi hU~M/ ma mo kI ni ta ra ya/ pad me b+hu dz+re hU~M/ oMd mu ta nu la/ pad mo mchog hU~M/ oM ba ta 'a cu la Ni trin ta ya sun hUM/ 
61a4(mdo): pad me ni la kan the sha ra/ b+hu ru b+hu ru hUM/ au so'uma?de ba da ne pra si da sha sa ya/ hUM swo pad me sha re sa pA ya hUM/ da mo gI sho raM hUM/ au sa ma ri ta re ta re hUM/ mAM ya ka kA di pa te
61a5(mdo): s+ya ru mu ru hUM/ mo ma mo ste pra sA ra te hUM/ min ba ra te/ ma mo kA pU dze hUM/ ma mo g+ha dzar pad man b+he/ sa ra sa ra san te/ pU dze hUM/ rung tra tu ti mi li swA hA/ 
61a6(mdo): sheg ti d+ha re/ sa mo g+ha ba ti swa hA/ sa ha sra ki ra ne hUM/ ru ti sA hA/ au so ma pra b+he hUM/ de bzhin phyag rgya gsang sngags gsungs pa yang // phyag rgya tha dad gsang sngags tha dad sgrub// gsa?
61a7(mdo): sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i las// rtag tu kun bgyid 'dor na thams cad bgyid// yang ma 'apyad pa rtsang ma dag/ legs bkrus thang ma'i gos bgos nas// dri zhim dri'i sa
61a8(mdo): dpung pa dang // lag pa yan lag byugs nas su// phyag rgya lan re bcings pa na// gsang sngags lan re bzlas par bgyi// phyag rgya dag ni bcings pa dang // gsang sngags bzlas
61b1(mdo): pa'i mod la ni// brgya stong phrag ni 'bum phrag 'bum// phyag rgya dag ni bcings par 'gyur// phyag rgya bcings pa bgyis pa na// bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs
61b2(mdo): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis lung bstand pa dang / byin kyis brlab par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod
61b3(mdo): gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rim par phye ba dam tshig thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur ro// tshe dpag tu ma
61b4(mdo): mchis par 'gyur ro// don yod rigs sngags 'chang grub par 'gyur ro// tshig brtan par 'gyur ro// dran pa dang / dgros bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro// glo gros thogs pa
61b5(mdo): ma mchis par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gazla gas dbang phyug mchog sbyin rtag tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// !ga tu dam pa rtsol bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu dgra dang phas kyi rgol
61b6(mdo): ba dang / myi mjal ba dang gdug pa dang / rab tu gtug pa thams cad 'pham par 'gyid par 'gyur ro// rtag tu thams cad du rgyal por 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / 'byung po dang / 
61b7(mdo): sha za dang / bgyegs dang / log 'dren dang / lha ma yin dang / klu thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa chen po thams cad la bag cha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang blon po
61b8(mdo): dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// thams cad du gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur ro// thams cad du bla ma'i gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro// 
62a1(mdo): rigs kyi bu chur khyod 'jig rtend kyi khams bde ba can du song shig/ ces shin tu dran pa nye bar gzhag nas dus bgyid par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
62a2(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'jig rten dbang phyug srul pa'i phyag rgya'i rtags ni brjod par bgyi// khru gang kho na tshig dag ni// dkyil 'khor lham pa bri ba
62a3(mdo): bgyi// gang zhig mthong ba'i mod tsam gyis// dga' ba da/ do ni mgu bar 'gyur// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// de nyid dag ni 'grub par 'gyur// rgyun tu gang gi cho ga
62a4(mdo): yis// rtag tu go cha bgos par 'gyur // ko cha'i go ni 'bar ba dang // mdzes pa rtag tu rtsol bar 'gyur// cho ga zhib mo legs sgrub ste// gsang sngags bla myed thams cad grub// phyag
62a5(mdo): rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris tsam gyis// gnod sbyin srin po 'byer par 'gyur// mthong ba tsam gyis gdon kun kyang // 'jig par 'gyur te yo ma nyi myed// gnod pa kun las grol 'gyur te/ 
62a6(mdo): nad kun las kyang de bzhin no// pha rold dpung ngam rang dpung ngam// myi thub pa'i dgra kun las// rtag tu legs par rgyal bar bgyid// rtag tu gnod las bsrung ba dang // dus kun tu
62b1(mdo): yang 'grub par 'gyur// rigs sngags 'chang rnams bde bgyi phyir// de nyid dam pa 'grub 'gyur zhing // 'phags pa byan ras gzigs dbang gi// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma mtshon cha dag/ 
62b2(mdo): dgos pa kun gyi rjes mthun par// gang dang gang du bkod pa dag/ de dang der ni phyag rgyar 'gyur// pad ma 'phye zhes bgyi ba// pad ma 'dab yas mdzes pa dang // kun nas 'khor ba
62b3(mdo): ba'i 'phreng // rnam par rtog pa myed par bgyi// phyag rgya 'di kun srog las byung // 'di dag thams cad 'bras bu mo lang// rdo rje rtse gsum rdo rje'i mdal/ dkyil 'khor pad ma rdo rje dang / 
62b4(mdo): pad ma'i 'phreng ba rdo rje'i mtshan// pad ma rab gnas par ma gnyis// rtag tu pad ma legs par bgyid// pad ma'i khu chur de bzhin du// pad ma'i 'dzub mo pad ma
62b5(mdo): bsgyings// pad ma'i lcags kyu thal mo sbyar// pa dang ma'i lcags sgrog pad ma'i gzeb// rtag sgrub pad ma se mas dpa' dang // nor bu pad ma rdo rje gsungs
62b6(mdo): don yod pad ma de bzhin du// pad ma'i ral gri pad ma'i dril// rtse gsum zhes bgyi rkun shing 'dzin// nor bu dbyug pa me tog dbyuka// de bzhin zhags pa bdun 'dzind dang / 
62b7(mdo): chu srin 'dzin dung 'khor lo phyed// byi dza bur rtag tu se'u// zla 'dzin nyi ma 'dzin pa dang // zo ba 'dzin dang tshems 'dzin dang // me tog phur ma bgrang 'breng dang // rdo rje rtse lnga don yod
62b8(mdo): zhags// don yod grub pa de dag ste// thams cad pad mo'i steng du dgod// lag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bri ba// gang dang gang du dkod pa ni// lag pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bcu tham// 'di dag
63a1(mdo): kyang ni bri bar bgyi// kun nas kyang ni 'bar bar bgyi// nor bu'i rgyan kyis grub par bgyi// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i ras sa ma ni// ra ba 'am tshig par bgyis pa 'am/ 
63a2(mdo): ci yang rung ba de dag ste// de dag mthong ba tsam gyis sam// mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ni// rtag tu sdig pa thos cad spong // mnar myed ka nas su rtog pa dang // mtshams myed pa ni lnga nyid de
63a3(mdo): thams cad skad gcig gcig gis 'byang // sems can dag pa dran bgyid na// phyir myi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur// sems dpalas bcur rab tu gnas// 'di ni phyir myi ldog pa'o// gnas la/ 
63a4(mdo): dkyil 'khor mthong ba ni// 'phags pa spyan ras gzhig/ dbang mchod sbyin ni// rtag par rgyun tu kyi bo lag na thogs// gang gis phyag rgya 'di mthong ba// rgyun tu mchog sbyin 'dzin
63a5(mdo): te dbang // rtag tu mngon gsum mthong ba'i// de dang mtshungs te khyad par 'phags// gsang sngags sum bcu rtsa lA 'i tshig/ rtag tu dran bgyid thams cad 'grub// de'i
63a6(mdo): dus rnams kun tu yang // ngan 'gro mchi bar myi 'gyur ro// nam grol dkyil 'khor phyum mthong ba// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// 'od dpag byed kyi sram po'i// thu bor 'gyur ba
63a7(mdo): mopa nyi byed// 'jig rten makon gyi thugs zhal nas/ skyes zas rtag tu zhu por 'gyur// 'dren pas 'dini chos nyid dang // chos las skyes pa lung ston 'gyur// gang ka'i klung gi sa ma byem
63a8(mdo): brgya stong dang // mnyam pa'i bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la/ dge ba'i za ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// chad byed grangs byed dpag tu
63b1(mdo): pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang gis sug par phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di mchis par gyur pa na/ phyag rgya 'di las 'di lta bu'i phan yon ma zhing / che ba mchis/ 
63b2(mdo): par bsgrags so// de la gsang sngags ni// o sa mo sta man dze li mi li tsi li hUM/ o a sha sa ya kA ni byi ka te hUM/ au a b+ha ya ba ra de ti hUM/ mo sarba ta tha ka tha/ a d+hiShI te/ dI ri d+hi ri hUM
63b3(mdo): pad ma hrid ya/ mu ShI hU~M/ oM bi sa ra bi sa ra/ sarba ma yan tar dza ya hU~M/ ma sa ku sha/ a mo g+ha ka ri sha ya hUM/ ma~M ka pa tsa ya tu mu hu ru NAM/ mo ma mo kA shang ka li/ mi li mi li hU~M/ rmo ma mo
63b4(mdo): tsi da ma Ni/ tu Ti tu ru nAM/ o a mo g+ha ma ni/ tsi li tsi li tsA oM a mo ka hI ta ya/ tsa ra tsa ra shud d+ha sa hA hUM/ au g+ho sha ba r+thi/ tsi Ti tsi Ti NAM/ oM byid du khyad ga tsin d+ha ya/ shun tun hUM/ 
63b5(mdo): tri ma la pa ri shud d+he/ b+hi rdi b+hi ti hUM/ o su rba su ru tA/ oM mi Ni ma Ni hUM/ oM pu shu pa ti dza ye hUM/ maM b+h+yo ti tsi ti pa/ dA ra drA tAM/ mo pad ma pa sha bi shud te/ hUM/ oM badz+ra ba e
63b6(mdo): b+ha ba tu/ mu ru mu ru hUM/ oM tsin da ma ni pa sha pa de hUM/ au ka kra pa shwa swa nire k+Sha ta ka/ du ru du ru hU~M/ oM tri shu li ba shwa/ bo lo ka ya ta ra ya hUM/ sau na ka pa sha bAn d+ha ya/ kad ta ya drA shA na
63b7(mdo): kan pa sha ta ya hUM/ mAM dza lod pA pa da ra da ra ya hUM/ mo tsan tra bi ma le byi sho da ya/ an dra ka rar sh+mi pa re hUM/ sngon po d+ha ya hUM/ mam ba dza sa burna ba re hUM/ oM pa yod bA tu ri hUM/ so bu
63b8(mdo): na man a le dza ya hUM/ oM ta sa swa ra bI ki ra ne hU~M/ sa rba du ShA na pra ta ra sha ya ya hU~M/ mA ma ni bi sho d+ha ya/ ma la bi sa le hUM/ oM bu shra pa ti su kun d+ha ba re hU~M/ na ta sa tra pra ku ni/ kAn/ 
64a1(mdo): kA na dz+dza/ brjod ke ba su tsi mu Sha/ tsi tsi tsiTi hU~M/ oMm mo g+ha sa pra ti ha ta pasha ha ste hUM/ oM sarba ta a mo gA/ sid pya sad drA ya hU~M// lag pa'i phyag rgya 'di dag dang / 
64a2(mdo): de bzhin gsang sngags phyag rgya dag// lan cig bzlas pa tsam dang ni/ phyag rgya mthong ba kho nas kyang // sdig pa thams cad mod la 'joms// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// cho ga
64a3(mdo): zhib mo myur tu 'grub// don yod zhags pa rnam grol ba'i// dkyil 'khor dam pa/ 'gyur// de la mtshon cha'i phyag rgya ni// nor bu rin po che dang // me tog dang / pad ma dang / ril pa
64a4(mdo): blugs dang / nor bu'i 'phreng ba dang / bgrang 'phreng dang / dung dang / 'khor lo dang / dbyug to dang / mdung thung dang / rdo rje dang / rtse gsum dang / rtse gsum kha ka de dang / 
64a5(mdo): mtshon ti sha ka dang / rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / rtse gsum pa/ gnyis dang / nor bu dang / rdo rje dang / mtshon shu li dang / las kyi rdo rje dang / yid bzhin nor bu dang / mtshon cha dang / 
64a6(mdo): be con dang / dbyug pa dang / dbang phyug chen po'i tshig sum dang / rim gri dang / zhags pa dang / lugs kyu dang / sbrul dang / ljon shing dang / bi rU dang / dgra sta dang / 'khor lo dang / dgra sta yul sngo
64a7(mdo): dang / lag pa dang / phrug bud dang / nor bu smon pa dang / 'od dang / 'od zer dang / rkun shing dang / 'phyang mo nyug pa dang / dgra sta dang / snod zlum po dang / bum pa dang / brag dang / ri dang srur
64a8(mdo): po dang / sprul 'khyim pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / chu srin dang / nya dang / ru sbal dang / g.yung drub 'khyil pa dang / rigs sngags kyi dkyis 'khor dang / rigs sngags dang / 
64b1(mdo): phyag rgya dang / rtse gsum dang / dkyil 'jam dpa/ ral gri dang / kri dang / pad ma'i phreng ba dang / rtse gsum dang / mu sun di dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / phyag rgya bzhi dang / mche ba bzhi dang / zlum
64b2(mdo): po dang / dung dang / 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / dung dang / rtse gsum dang / dung dang / nor bu'i dung dang / pad ma'i dung dang / su rnga dang / gos dang / seng ge'i gdong dang / shang shang de'u dang / ka la bing ka
64b3(mdo): dang / ngang ba dang / gzhad dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / gshin rje'i dbyug pa dang / gding gzhi dang / dkyil 'khor bzhi dang / rtse gsum dang / bu bkang ba dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / nyi
64b4(mdo): ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / pad ma bzhi dang / pad ma gsum dang rgya mtsho dang / me tog dang / pur ma dang / glegs bam dang / ri dgas kyi g.yang bzhi dang / rdo rje dang / lcags sgrog dang
64b5(mdo): rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / rta babs dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / 'khar sil dang / so yangs dang / 'khyer dang / ska rags dang / thug pud dang / mchod phyir thogs
64b6(mdo): pa dang / 'breng ba chen po dang / mu gsum dang / kun nas rdo rje se/ phyag rgya mtshon ma 'di dag ni// 'jig rten 'dren pas gsungs pa bzhin// nam grol dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'di// don yod
64b7(mdo): zhags pa'i cho gar dran// ras sam gos sam/ rtsig pa 'am/ ci yang rung 'tsho bgyid pa 'am/ don myed legs gsal legs 'byor da pas// mtshon gsal kun ka pad par gzhag/ 
64b8(mdo): phyag rgya kun nas 'bar bar bgyi// thams cad srog las byung bas na/ don dang las rnams kun tshol cing // phyag rgya mod la sdig pa 'phrog/ de ni yod la 'bras bu ste// 'dren pa 'jig
65a1(mdo): rten dbang phyug kun// phyag rgya 'di ni byin gyis brlabs// sangs rgyas kun dang shag kya'i// rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas brlabs// de lta bas na mkhas pas su// rtag tu
65a2(mdo): kun nas brtson bcangs na// sangs rgyas rnams ni dgyes 'gyur te// sras kyi thu bor som nyi myed// phyag rgya rim phye dam pa 'chang ba gang // 'jig rten mgon po'i sras kyi thu bor 'gyur// 
65a3(mdo): don yod zhags pa'i snying po gsung ba'i// rnam par grol ba'i snying po bla na myed// phyag rgya dang ni gsang sngags dam pa dag/ 'di 'chang ba la myung du 'grub par 'gyur// de nas don yod pa las
65a4(mdo): thams cad pa dang // rjes su mthun pa'i zhags pa bdun bshad par bgyi ste/ de nyid bsgrub pas ji lta bu'i cho ga'i tshe/ ka bsgrub pa bzhin// so so so sor 'tshal ba'i// de dag
65a5(mdo): kun ni rtogs par bgyi// de nyid sgrub pas ji lta bu'o// mtshan nyid gzugs ni ji bzhin pa// de nyid bsgrubs pasazhags pa ni// skud pa lnga las grub gyur te// gsapa
65a6(mdo): sngags 'dzin pa'i mod la ni// grub par 'gyur te som nyi byed// ras skud pad pa'i skud pa dang // a rka Sha tse dang dag gi// skud pa kun pa'i skud pa ste// skud pa 'di dag bkal nas/ de kho na
65a7(mdo): nyid kyi chog dang / chog zhim mo bsgrub pa dang / zhags pa ras srun kyi rgya las blangs te/ mang bzhin bka' sa la nas/ rtag tu bsrung ba gagyis la/ legs par 'grus pa gos yang sa can/ tshangs
65a8(mdo): par pyod pas zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas/ gnas phrang ma'i phyogs bcu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po mdor na/ byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas dran par bgyi'o// de nas shin tu panyam gzhag
65b1(mdo): bas/ brkyang sgril du bkal te/ don yod rgyal po thal mo sbyar bas pad ma kha phye ba thogs ral pa'i bor tshugs kyis bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa'i lus phyed pa/ sor bzhi'i
65b2(mdo): tshad bzhi'o// bgyis nas gzugs rnam pa gsum du bgyis te/ nges pa'i gzugs dang / khro gnyer gyi bzhin dang / khro bo'i rgyal po'i gzugs te/ dngul lam gse pa las bgyi'o// de nas zhag
65b3(mdo): pa srid kyi tshad khru bcu drug pa/ zhags pa'i thor to gcig rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang / skyu ru ra lhan cig spel la gdags par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gyis yar gyi ngo'i ches bco lnga 'am
65b4(mdo): ches brgyad la legs par bkrus te/ gos cang ma bgos na zhag gcig mchis te/ dkyil mo krung bcas nas/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis te/ tshig gzhan gyi
65b5(mdo): smra bar zhags pa la/ lan stong pa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas stong phra brgyad tshang ba dang / stan bzang po bshams nas/ de'i steng du zhags pa gzhag par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i/ 
65b6(mdo): zhags pa'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// me tog dang / 'dug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / ba dan bzang po la tshogs pas mchod par bgyi'o// a ka ru dang / 
65b7(mdo): tsan dan dang / hu ru ka'i bdug po dbul bar bgyi'o// mar me yang dbul bar bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis yungs ka pa la lan nyi shu tha gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ zhags pa'i steng du
65b8(mdo): tor bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la yang / ci 'byor da pas mchod par bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis/ zhags pa de'i mdun du dkyil lo/ 
66a1(mdo): nga pa te/ 'byugs pas gzunas po'i bar du mchod par bgyis nas bzlas brjod 'akyi/ sungs kar re re la bzlas marjod de 'gyis te/ 'gas pa'i steng du rta nang / 
66a2(mdo): stong tha brgyad chang ba'i bar du/ gdugs re re mchis par bgyi ste/ jo ci thog pas gdugs ze'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// mchod par bgyi'o// kha zas ngan pa sang bar bgyi'o// lhag
66a3(mdo): ma dang spags pa spang bar bgyi'o// gos chang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas/ zhags pa 'bar bar 'gyur te/ gal te 'jig rtend pa'i 'grub na ni/ me'i kha tog tu 'bar
66a4(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'jig rtend las 'das pa'i grub na ni/ kha tog sna tshogs 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ don yod pa de'i lus de yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 
66a5(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi zhags pa/ 'di 'grub kyis/ khyed kyis byang chub kyi sems bla na myed
66a6(mdo): pa khrug cig/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang / pha rol tu phyind pa bcu'i khongs su rtogs pa/ yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig/ 'on te 'jig rten pa'i sgrub na ni/ yid bzhin kyi nor bu ba pa
66a7(mdo): ba ji lta ba bzhin du/ yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin lag pas 'phangs nas/ gsang sngags kyis thams cad 'grub par bgyid de/ thams cad dkrug par
66a8(mdo): 'gyur ro// phyogs gang dang gang du 'phangs pa de logs su don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas par bkye ste/ mod la bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gal te mtshams
66b1(mdo): byed pa lnga bgyis pa 'am/ mnar myed par sami ba zhig na yang de'i legs pa yang 'grub pa 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis dang mas nyi bskyed par gyi bgyi'o// 'jo ga nye gi bzhin gis gang du las/ 
66b2(mdo): na lnga dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang / myi ma yin pa rnams bkug nas/ rigs sngags 'chang 'i
66b3(mdo): mdun du mchi bar 'gyur zhing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bran bzhin du mchis par 'gyur ro// 'khro bo'i rgyal po'i zhags pa la/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags lan nyi shu cha gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas
66b4(mdo): 'phang bar bgyi'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la/ bgyegs dang log 'dren dang / bdug pa'i sems can thams cad zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang / blon po dang // btsu
66b5(mdo): po'i 'khor thams cad mchis par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten/ thams cad kyis cher mchod par 'gyur ro// gang gi don tu zha gas pa 'phangs pa'i don de 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'khro ba'i
66b6(mdo): rgyal po'i zhags pa la/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas 'phang bar bgyi'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la/ bgyegs dang log 'dren dang / bdug pa'i ses
66b7(mdo): can thams cad zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// gal te 'tshal na lo 'am/ lo brgya 'am/ lo stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya stongad kyi bar du zhags pas bcings par bkyi'o// nam byams
66b8(mdo): pa dang / snying rje bskyed nas/ de'i tshe don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan gsum bzlas na/ phyir bkrol bar 'gyur ro// dpung gi nang du 'phangs na dpung rnams zhags pas bcings par
67a1(mdo): 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa'i dbus su 'phangs nas/ mtshon dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang / mdung dang / ral gri dang / rtun zhing dang / mu sun di dang / 'khor lo dang / thag mdu
67a2(mdo): dang / mtshon cha thams cad dang / go cha dang / ya lad thams cad zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// chab dang / yungs kar la bzlas brjod lan bdun bgyis te rtor na/ grol bar 'gyur ro// 
67a3(mdo): zhags pa la gdugs gcig bzhin 'byord pas mchod par bgyi'o// gang gi don tu bsams pa de dag 'grub par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// 'on te myi snang ba sgrub
67a4(mdo): bar 'tshal na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lag pas bci sa te/ g.yas pa g.yon pa gong du ji skad gsungs pa bzhin zhags pa bzung nas/ don yod pa'i zhags po'i snying po
67a5(mdo): la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis na/ myi gda' bar 'gyur/ brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod ba gyis na/ nam ma// Shal la mchi bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rigs sngags
67a6(mdo): 'chad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang brgya stong phrag 'bum gyis yongasu bskor bar 'gyur ro// lo bye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// sma cung zad 'khyil par 'gyur ro// stob
67a7(mdo): dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol gyi zil gyis myi non par 'gyur ro// char pa 'tshal bas mchod pa bgyis na/ ji tsam gsol ba btab pa bzhin 'bab par 'gyur ro// ha cang char che ba'i dgag
67a8(mdo): pa'i slad du mchod pa bgyis na char pa bkag par 'gyur ro// yams kyi nad dang gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / myi ngas thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'tshal bas/ rigs
67b1(mdo): sngags 'tshal legs par zhus bgyis pa/ thang mes gos kyang ma bgos la/ lag par zhags pa blangs te/ gnas mthon por 'dzegs nas/ don yod pa'i phyag rgya dang zhags pa bcing
67b2(mdo): te don yod b+ha'i snying po phyogs bzhir lan bdun bzlas nas/ zhags pa 'phangs na/ de dag thams cad dran pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rang kyi dpung dang / gzhan
67b3(mdo): kyi dpung thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dang / myi mdza ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / byi ngas chen po dang / 
67b4(mdo): mu ke'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// ha chang char che ba dang / dus ma lags pa'i char dang / grang dang / rlung dang / tsha ba myi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa rnams rab tu
67b5(mdo): zhi bar 'gyur ro// dpag tshad brgya 'khor yug tu mtshams chen po bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa de lta de ltar thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba/ 
67b6(mdo): don yod rgyal po mchod par bkyi zhing bzlas brjod bkyi/ gsol ba yang bgyi'o// mchod pa dang / gsol ba bgyis pa tsam gyi mdo la thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis
67b7(mdo): dang sos nyi bskyed par myi 'gyi'o// cho ga zhib mo las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin/ las bgyis pa rnams kyi chog de bzhin du/ bsgrub par bgyi'o// des na skad cig de'i yod la thams cad 'dum
67b8(mdo): par 'gyur ro// byams pa dang snying rje dang / dka' ba dang btang snyoms bsgom par bgyi/ sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la ma
68a1(mdo): par bgyi'o// dkon 'dum mchog gsum la gus par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gus pa dang / bla mar yid la bsgom par bgyi'o// byi chang ba spyod pa
68a2(mdo): cang mar bgyi zhing / yongs su dag pa'i ngang tshul can du bsgom par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa de kho na nyid kyi cho ga sgrub pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu/ byang chub 'gug par bgyi'o// de nas
68a3(mdo): zhegs pa'i 'khor lo'i cho ga sgrub pa bshad par bgyi ste/ rigs sngags 'chang de kho na nyid/ sgrub pas phug tu 'jug pa'i sgrub pa thams cad kyi mchog/ phug tu 'jug pa dang / lha ma yin/ 
68a4(mdo): gyi gnas su 'jug pa dang / phyi 'am ci'i gnas su 'jug pa drang / dri za'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / lha'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa
68a5(mdo): gnas su 'jug pa dang / 'og myin gi gnas kyi bar// tu 'jug pa dang / klu'i rgyal po'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / thang la rgyu ba dang / nyi ma'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / 
68a6(mdo): zla ba'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / skar ma'i gnas suskar gi gnas su 'jug pa dang / ri la rgyu ba dang / 'bab chu chen por 'jug pa ste/ ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa de lta
68a7(mdo): de ltar 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga bsgrub pa tshogs chu d+ya dang / bstsal pa chu dus grub par 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par myi bkye'o/ 
68a8(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang cang mar gyur pas/ legs par khrus bgyis te gos rtsang ma bgos nas/ zas dkar gsum 'tshal la/ chang ma de kho na nyid la gus pas/ sangs rgyas rjesu
68b1(mdo): dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o// byams pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag nas/ snying rje'i bsam pa dag pa'i yid kyis chos bcu gsum nas/ brtsams te zla ba nya ba'i bar du gsal bzhin tu/ 
68b2(mdo): dgra shis pa la dus gsum du 'byor da pa'i rnam pa rnams kyis mchod pa bgyis la/ ni rtag tu brgyam brgyad pa'i// dus gsum rgyun tu bzlas brjod bgyi// nyin pang dus su lan gsum
68b3(mdo): mtshan po'i dus su lan gsum bgyi// 'tshang lo zhags pa ba myed ni// skud pa gsum las bsgrub bkyis te// ma srud pad pa'i skud pa dang // a sha'i ud pa gsum 'byung du// den
68b4(mdo): legs par chad bzhin du// khru ni sum bcu rtsa drug pa/ gyi// 'khor lo rnam pa gsum las bgyi// rgyar na sorabazhi'i tshad lags te// snying por bcas shing mu khyud pa
68b5(mdo): kun nas rtsibs dang ldan pa dag/ gser dang rdul dang zad las byis pa'i// chos stan legs par brgyan pa'i// bzang po'i stan la gzhag par bgyi// sos kyi dkyil 'khor me
68b6(mdo): tog ki/ 6/ sil ma bkram nas bum pa dgang // de bzhin mchod yon snod kyang bsham// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du chos kyi bstan bshams pa'i steng du/ 'khor lo'i zhags pa bzhag ste
68b7(mdo): mchod pa bgyis la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ dus gsum du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya'i nyin zhag gcig mchis par gyur pas tshig gzhan myaM
68b8(mdo): smra bar/ 'phags pa 'aspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod par bgyi zhing / bdug pa rnam pa gsum po// a ga mu dang / can dan dang / ku kul rnams dbul bar 'gyi'o/ 
69a1(mdo): ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun chos kyi stan mchis pa la/ mngon tu phyogs te mchis nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ yungs kar re re bzlas
69a2(mdo): brjod bgyis pas/ zhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o// stong pa brgyad chang nas zhags pa 'bar zhing / 'khor lo nam mkhal la mchis nas 'bar zhing lding bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags
69a3(mdo): 'chang kyi lus kyi stod dang / spyi bo nas 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ri mo'i gzugs las legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags
69a4(mdo): ba'i snying po'i 'khor lo'i zhags pa'i cho ga chen po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gyis mtsho dra pa rgya chen po bgyis la/ don yod 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong
69a5(mdo): rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ de'i 'og tu rigs sngags/ 'chang gis zhags pa blang bar bgyi'o// lag pa g.yon pa'o// khor lo phyag rgya'i tshul du bcing bar bgyi zhing g.yas pa zhags
69a6(mdo): pa'i phyag rgya dang / 'khor lo'i tshul la rten nas blangs te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brjod nas phyogs bzhi 'phang b.rabagyi'o// de nas phyogs bcu 'i 'khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags
69a7(mdo): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bgyi'o// de nas bdag nyid kyi lus la dbang bskur ba'i tshul du lan bdun du bskor bar bgyi'o// de phyag rgya'i tshul du bskor ba tsam gyi mod la rig sngags 'chang 'kho mo
69a8(mdo): sgyur ba'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// dam pa chen po grub par 'gyur ro// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po legs mthong gi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis nas/ rigs sngags 'chang kyi rkang / 
69b1(mdo): pa la gyi 'os blangs nas/ 'di skad ces kyang smra bar 'gyur te/ rigs sngags 'chang ci bkal sa \u0f7f lad pa/ de bgyi'o zhes ci bsgo ba'i don de dag thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// bran gyi rang bzhin
69b2(mdo): kyis thams cad du las bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gi gnas su 'jug par 'tshal bas 'di ltar nub gsum du mchis par 'gyur bas/ zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i lag pas
69b3(mdo): blangs par bgyi'o// phug gi sgo ka lags pa der zhags pa lan gsum du bskor ba bgyi'o// don yod pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis te/ zhags pa gdab par bgyi'o// zhags pa btab
69b4(mdo): tsam gyis mod la gnas kyi phug gi sgo thams cad bye bar 'gyur// 'khrul 'khor dang / btan pa dang / phug dang / 'bab chu chen/ po dang / rtseg ma dang / 'bab chu dang / gnod sbyin dang
69b5(mdo): srin po dang / lam myi bde ba thams cad bsal ba dang / bcom pa dang / bshig par 'gyur ro/ btan pa dang / sbron/ gegs dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / lugs sgrog rnams
69b6(mdo): dum bur chad cing shes par gyur / nyams par 'gyur da/ 'jig par 'gyur ro// shin tu dag pa shin tu dri ma byed pa/ shi nad tu rgya che ba'i gzhal myed khang 'byor da pa rnam par 'phrul pa dag mtho
69b7(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkram pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'i gnas/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi ljon shing gyis brgyan pa'i gzhal byed khang mthong bar 'gyur ro// 
69b8(mdo): me tog sna tshogs kyi ra bo shin tu dri zhim po'i gzhal myed khang mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis lag pa'i zhags pa dang / 'khor lo phyag rgya'i tshul mngon tu bgyis na
70a1(mdo): don yod zhags pa'i snying po bzlas te 'jug par bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang gnas su zhugs pa tsam kho nas/ gnas mchog de yang rnam pa drug tu 'gul ba dang / g.yo ba dang / 
70a2(mdo): ldeg pa dang / 'ung 'ur/ chem chem ste/ lha'i 'od zer gi snang ba chen pos snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas don yod pa'i rnam par dag pa dri ma myed pa zhes pabye'i/ 
70a3(mdo): sman/ bud byed kyi gzugs kyu'i rgyun kyis rgyan pa lha'i gos kyi rgyan gyis klubs pa/ kha tog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ lnga'i gzugs chen po 'chang ba'i bi dza bu thogs pa mchis par 'a
70a4(mdo): sman bud myed kyi gzugs 'chang de mthong ba tsam kho nas dpag tshad gang tsam nas gzi brjid thams cad dang / stobs thams cad nye bar bsgrub par bgyid do// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis don
70a5(mdo): yod pa'i 'khor lo'i zhags pa mdun du bcang bababakyi ste/ mthong ba cas kyi mod la de'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / kazi brjid nyams par 'gyur mthu chung bar 'gyur ro/ 
70a6(mdo): de nas bud myed de dgod pa dang // oM zhes bgyi bas gnang rabagyi'o// 'khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas par bgyi ste/ khas bub du 'gyel nas chab byung bar 'gyur te// chab de sa ngon par gyi brgyan
70a7(mdo): don yod rgyal po bzlas par bgyi ste/ de nas phyig tshugs kyis blta bar bgyid na/ rig sngags 'chad kyi zhags pas bzhu bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi'i chab 'byung ste/ thang bar bgyi byug
70a8(mdo): par bgyi'o// kun tu byugs pa tsam gyis nam mazhal la mchi bar 'gyur te/ thog mar rlung kyi phung po nas 'dzeg par 'gyur ro// myig la byugs na phyogs bcu thams cad du gtogs pa'i de bzhin
70b1(mdo): gzhanas pargyang chub sems da tshogs kyi lan dang bcas pamams cad dang / ngas rgyas kyi zhing de'i gzhal byed khang dang / gnas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / gang dag bzhugs shing bzhes pa/ 
70b2(mdo): 'tsho ba dag ci ltar lag 'thil dang mchis pa de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang dag yongs su mya ngan las/ 'das pa dang / gang dag 'das pa dang / gang dag ma byon pa dang / gang dag da ltar byung ba
70b3(mdo): sangs rgyas rnams dang / gang ring khrel gyi snying po'i mchod rten chen po'i srog shing gi tshogs can dag dang / de bzhin du ji ltar 'khor gi dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa de dag thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// bdag
70b4(mdo): nyid la kun nas byugs te/ des byugs pa tsam gyis pag/ pa'i mdog lha'i gser dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// skra sngo la cung / zad 'khyil par yang 'gyur ro// myig lha'i ud pal la
70b5(mdo): sngon po mchog dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// tshe lha'i bskal dpa brgya stong du 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba 'bum phrag bcwo brgyad kyis yongasu bskor bar 'gyu
70b6(mdo): lha'i bu mo brgya bzhi bcu dang / myi 'am ci'i bu mo dang / rigs sngags kri bu mo gang ka'i klung gi bye ma brgya stong phrag 'bum snyed kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar yid la bsams pa dang yong
70b7(mdo): la banags pa tsam gis/ lha'i zas kyi mchog ro brgya dang ldan pa dag mdun du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i btung ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i tshe bro ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug ga/ 
70b8(mdo): bar du 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po legs mthong mdun nas rgyug par babyed do// dgra thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad bcom pa dang / nyams pa dang / gtubs
71a1(mdo): ba dang / bshags pa dang / 'chal ba dang / skyes pa dang / bye ma pa bgyis par 'gyur ro// yang na sman gyi bud myed de'i sgra kun bton te/ ska rags su bgyis nas bcings par bgyi'o// 
71a2(mdo): kang du bcings pa de yang rin po che sna bdun du 'gyur ro// gang tu zhugs pa thams cad du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// de la lha thams cad gnas 'am bar 'gyur ro// klu thams cad dang / lha thams cad dang / 
71a3(mdo): myi 'am ci thams cad dang / rigs sngags 'chang thams cad de'i dbang du mchis par 'gyur ro// 'khor de thams cad byang chub kyi snying po la zug gi bar du de'i phyir bzhin rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// / 
71a4(mdo): de nas rigs sngags 'chang gnas su 'jug par 'tshal zhing / sngar yang ldog par 'chang na/ sman gyi bud myed de dang / rtam myi bgyi/ reg par myi bgyi bar lag pa'i zhags pa'i phyag
71a5(mdo): rgyas gnas mchog tu 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas gnas thas cad na gnas pa'i bud myed dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / mo thams cad phyir byung nas mdun na/ sdod par 'gyur te/ 
71a6(mdo): kha cig gi lag na ni bum pa gang ba'o// kha gcig gi lag na ni 'dugs so// kha cig ni lha'i gos thogs so/ shAcig ni lha'i rin po mi thogs so// 'acig ni dri dag go// 'acig ni me tog danan
71a7(mdo): kha cig ni 'phreng ba dag go// kha cig ni rgyan dang / lub grub sna tshogs sogs so// kha cig ni byug pa dag ko// cig ni dri'i 'phreng ba dag ko// kha cig ni rin po che sna bdun gi sdod bkang ba dag go
71a8(mdo): ni lha'i me tog sna tshogs thogs te/ pad ma dang / ku ud da dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man snang ba dang / man d+ha pa chen po dang / man 'dug ka dang / man 'jusha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / 
71b1(mdo): mdog mdzes chen po dang / a ti mu ta kA dang / tsam pa ka dang / mthon ka dang / mthon ka chen po dang / ka dam pa dang / snga ma dang / su ti dang / klu'i me tog dang / ko ta dang / kan dA ba ra
71b2(mdo): shi ki me tog thogs so// kha cig ni lha'i bdug pa can dan kor shi sha dang / sbrul gi snying po'i bdug pa dang / a ka ru dang / du ru ska dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i bdug pa thogs so// kha cig gi lag
71b3(mdo): pa na ni rma bya'i bsil yab thogs so// kha cig gi lag pa na ni ral gri'o// kha cig gi lag pa na ni mdung zung ngo // kha cig gi lag pa na ni rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung dang / 
71b4(mdo): rtun shing dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / gzong kha gnyis pa dag go/ kha cig ni go cha dang / ya lang bgos nas/ bsrung ba'i phyir kun nas 'du zhing mchi bar 'gyur ro// kha cig ni
71b5(mdo): rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod dang / gser gi snod dang / dngul kyi sdod dag thogs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog dang / gseng gi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / bkang nas
71b6(mdo): thogs te/ de dag thams cad rigs sngags 'chang la 'bul bar bgyid do// rigs sngags 'chang gis byams pa dang / snying rje chen po yid la bgyis pa dang / sangs rgyas yid la bgyid pa dang / 
71b7(mdo): sangs rgyas yid la bgyis pas/ 'phags pa phyan ram gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i ma lugs 'chang ba yid la bgyi'o// mchog tu phye ba yid la bgyid pas/ tshig gzhan gyi smra ba
71b8(mdo): dbyugs dbyung bar 'akyi zhing / lam drang po nas 'dug par bgyi ste/ ming ge'i khril mngon du lachis nas/ dad yod 'khor lo zhags pa log par seng ko'i ba'i steng du 'azhugs par 'gyi'o// 
72a1(mdo): bram po bzhi pa'o// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// / de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang rang nyid mchis nas/ 
72a2(mdo): steng du rtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bgyi zhing / 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa la yang phyag bgyi'o// des na dgra thams cad 'pham par bgyis pa
72a3(mdo): 'gyur ro// gal te 'og tu phyag bgyis nas/ 'khor los rig sngags 'chang gi phyir rgol ba rnams mgo bcad par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang mchis ma thag tu gnas rnam pa drug du g.yos nas
72a4(mdo): sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ca co'i sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i rol mo'i cha byad yan lag lnga dang ldan pa de dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ nam mkha'i lha rnams kyis kyang / 
72a5(mdo): gzhal myed khang chen po nas/ dbu rgyan cod pan gyis rigs sngags 'chang gi mgo bo la dbang bskur bar bgyid do// dbang bskur ba tsam gyi yod la/ rin po che sna bdun gyi snod du/ 
72a6(mdo): bdud rtsi'i bcud 'tshal te/ mchis nas 'bul bar bgyid do// rigs sngags 'chang gis blangs nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzla bar bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis reg par
72a7(mdo): bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang gis reg pa tsam gi mod la lnga'i lus rnam par dag pa thob nas/ pakas pa'i mdog gser 'dra bar 'gyur ro// swa lhag par sngo ba dang / myig ud pa la sngon pa
72a8(mdo): ltar lha'i myig yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// tshe'i tshad bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya stong du 'gyur ro// gal te phyir ldog par 'tshal na/ de'i bcud kyis len mchog las/ ci tsam 'tshal ba blang
72b1(mdo): lha'i chab tsan dan ki dri dang ldan pa'i nang du bzhugs nas khrus bgyi'o// khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la/ phug gi sgo dbye bar 'gyur zhing / ji ltar dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'dra bar mthong ba ni/ 
72b2(mdo): 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod gnas gi pho bo gcig pur 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin du rigs sngags 'chang 'di yang mchod pa dang / bkur sti dang / brams
72b3(mdo): bla mar bgyi ba de lta bur 'gyur ro// gang bcud kyis len mchog 'dis reg na/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// rtsig pa 'am/ ri'am/ ka pa 'am/ ljon shing ngam
72b4(mdo): snod dam/ bum pa 'am/ rdza bo 'am/ gos sam/ bong ba la reg na/ de dag thams cad 'dzam bu tshu'i gser yodadas su dag par 'gyur ba nas/ dgos pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// 
72b5(mdo): de nas rigs sngags 'chang klu mo 'am/ lha mo 'am/ myi 'am ci mo 'itshal na rigs sngags 'chang de gtsang ma bgos na sa legs par khrus bgyi'o// tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi
72b6(mdo): 'am/ bco lnga la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa bgyis nas/ nyin gcig gnas par bgyi'o// 'khor lo'i zhags pa chen po 'di chos kyi stan legs par
72b7(mdo): brgyan pa'i stan bzang po'i steng du gzhag par bgyi zhing / mchod pa chen po bgyi ste/ de nyid kyi mdun du tshig gzhan myi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar re re nas bzlas brjod bgyis pa
72b8(mdo): zhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o// lan stong pa brgyad tshang ba dang / zhags pa de yang sprul bzhin du yongs su 'khyil la 'khor lo ni// gdengs ka'i tshul du mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas rig+sa
73a1(mdo): sngags 'chad kyis zhags pa blangs te/ klu gnas pa'i mtsho 'am/ myi 'am ci gnas pa'i mtsho 'am/ lha mo gnas pa'i mtsho 'gram du mchis nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying / 
73a2(mdo): bzlas te/ gnas kyi nang du zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi'o// 'phabs ma bag kho na sa yang drang bar bgyi ste/ ji lta bu'i don yid la bsams pa'i don de 'gas pas bcings nas/ ji ltar bsams pa/ 
73a3(mdo): de bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i nor ram/ dbyig gam/ gser ram/ nor bu 'am/ mu trika gam/ bye du r+ya'am/ shang ka shi la 'am/ byi ru 'am/ 
73a4(mdo): se le sbram 'am/ dngul lam/ gos sam/ chas sam/ rgya/ na nam/ gzhan yang gzhag myed khang ci lta bu 'byor da pa can da/ gdon du gnyer na/ zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi ste/ de zas
73a5(mdo): cad 'dren par bgyid do// gad dang gang du 'phangs pa de dang de ra ci ltar yid la bsams pa de nyid shi nad tu gsal bar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ dngos po gzhan du myi 'gyur ro// rgyal
73a6(mdo): po'i rigs sam/ bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs sam/ khyim bdag gi rigs sam/ rje bu'i rigs kyis ci dang ci bsams pa 'grub par bgyid do// skyes pa 'am/ bud byed dam/ khye'u 'am
73a7(mdo): bu mo'i mying nas brjod de zhags pa 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la/ zhags pas bcings nas 'dren par 'gyur ro// tha na ri dgas dang / bya dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / glang po che dang / ma he yang 'dren
73a8(mdo): par bgyid do// gang gi mying nas brjod de g.yul 'byed pa'i nang du 'phangs na/ de yang zhags pas bcings nas mdun du mchis te/ ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin du thams cad 'grub par
73b1(mdo): bgyid do// zla ba dang nyi ma dbab par 'tshal na/ zla ba dang / nyi ma'i mdun du mchis nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan 'dun bzlas te/ zla la dang nyi ma'i mngon sum du zhags pa 'phan
73b2(mdo): nas slar yang drang bar bgyi/ zla ba dang nyi ma zhags pas bcings nas drangs par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' las babs nas rigs sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ ci ltar yid la bsas
73b3(mdo): ba bzhin dgos pa thams cad sgrub par bgyid do// 'on te zla ba dang nyi ma'i gnas su mchi bar 'tshal na/ zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa lags pas blangs te/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po
73b4(mdo): bzlas pa dang / rigs sngags 'tshang nam mkha' la 'phur nas / nyi ma dang zla ba'i stan la ci srid du 'tshal bar longs spyod par 'gyur zhing / slar bde ba dang / ma smas pa dang / legs pa
73b5(mdo): 'bab par 'gyur ro// nags khung du 'jug par 'tshal// na cang ma legs par khrus bgyis pas/ gos rtsang ma brko// bar bgyi zhing / nags khung gyi sgor lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
73b6(mdo): bzlas brjod bgyis te/ zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi'o// lag pas zhags pa 'phangs pa tsam gyis/ nags zhung gi ga nas kyi gzhal myed khang gyi klu thams cad rigs sngags 'chang
73b7(mdo): ki mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing / rigs sngags 'chang la phyag bgyis nas/ rigs sngags 'chang khyod gnas chen po mchog tu zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang
73b8(mdo): gis don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas te/ lag pas zhags pa'i phyag rgyas nags khung du 'jug par bgyi'o// zhugs pa tsam/ kho nas nags kyi gnas rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar 'gyur zhing
74a1(mdo): dbus kyi nags kyi mthan rin po che sna bdun gyi rdzing / lha'i cha ba dang / rnyog pa ma mchis pa shi nad tu gsal ba/ lha'i tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa/ ha cang drang ba/ ha cang myi dro ba/ reg na bde
74a2(mdo): ba ro dang ldan pa/ bdud rtsi'i bcud can mchis te/ 'di ltar don yod rgyal po'i snying po yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ rdzing gi dbus su zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi'o// 
74a3(mdo): 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bud myed rin po che/ gzugs 'dra ba'i lha'i bu mo lus byed phyung nas/ lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyad cing / rin po che sna bdun gyi bum pa gang ba bos
74a4(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang la 'bul zhing / phyi bo ldad de 'a dam pa dang bcas pas rigs sngags la smos pa/ rje btsun ri/ sngags 'chang khyod ma bzhengs par gnas su bzhugs shig
74a5(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang gi grub pa'i tshig gsum brjod par brgya/ ste/ 'jig rten pha rol kyi don dang / rigs sngags 'chang nyid dang / 'jig rten dngos grub ste/ bdag nyid kyis ma
74a6(mdo): dang sring po dang / mang gzhugs zhes gar bde bar 'arjod la/ de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis smra bar bgyi ste/ sring mo khro bo la 'jig rten pa ro lad kyi don byin cig ces 'dug par bgyi'o// de yang
74a7(mdo): sa lags 'chang khyod rang bzhin gyi gnas su rnams kyi zhugs shig ces smra par 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis lag pa zhags pa'i drug rgyas 'jug papa byi nga / don yong ba'i rna
74a8(mdo): pa'i rgyam pa 'i rkang po bzas so// den pa gan chen pa mchog can pa dun gyi gnas byed 'ang gA'i dris bu me ga' dra ba dang / gseng dang / gos byangs pa dang / dang ge tun 'byung rab tu
74b1(mdo): pa dang / dang gi chun 'phya ba rab tu dbyangs par gda' ba nas/ bu mo de yang nor bu rin po che chen po thogs te/ rigs sngags 'chang 'jig rten pha rol kyi don tu/ nor bu rin po che chen po bzhes shi
74b2(mdo): ces 'bul bar bgyid do// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis stan bshams pa'i steng du zhags pa legs par yongasu bskyil te/ stan tu bting la/ nor bu rin po che chen po de zhags pa'i steng du bzhag ce
74b3(mdo): me tog dang / 'dug par dbul bar bgyi'o// don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzlas par bgyi'o// bzlas pa cas kyi mod la zhags pa nor bu rin po che dang bcas te 'bar bar 'gyur ro// nor bu rin po che chen
74b4(mdo): po de las yang 'o ma'i chab 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rigs snga/ kas 'chang gis 'o ma'i cha ba de las blangs te/ skor ba bcu la/ na bdun du rig par bgyi'o// 'o ma'i chab kyis reg pa tsam
74b5(mdo): gyi mod la lus thams cad dri ma dang bral zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// don yod snang ba nor bu gzhal myed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer gyi dra ba'i 'od zer zhes bgyi ba thob nas
74b6(mdo): sa bcu la gnas te phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzind sgyu ma lta bus rnam par 'phrul pa thob pa/ 
74b7(mdo): 'gyur zhing / shi nang tu yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi/ rang bzhin gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha lugs 'chang ba/ rigs sngags 'chang gyi mdun du mchis nas/ lag pa g.yas pa gyi bor bzhag ste
74b8(mdo): rang gi rigs sngags 'chang gi bu bu bor khyod kyis grol ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su dag pa 'thob bo// zhes dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa
75a1(mdo): rnams mthong nas/ thams cad kyis legs mo zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur te/ sems dpa' chen po sen pa po lems so// khyod ni byang chub lam du zhugs// khyod kyi/ 
75a2(mdo): sangs rgyas nyid thob ste// grol ba'i lam zhes bya ba sbubs// 'on te rigs sngags 'chang nyid don tu gnye na/ de'i tshe gser gyi me tog rtsol bar 'gyur te/ blangs la bu po de nyid kyi spyi bor
75a3(mdo): gzhag nas/ au zhes bgyis pas gnan par bgyi'o// oM zhes bgyi ba'i sgra brjod nas/ skye bor gzhag pa tsam gyi mod la/ bu mo'i myig mchog gnyis nas mchi ma 'dzag par 'gyur ro// de nas
75a4(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang gis blangs te nye reg bgyi'o// nye reg pabyes pra tsas kyi mod la/ rigs sngags 'chang gi 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyur ro// swa cung zad tsam 'khyil cing lag pa na 'khor lo'i zhags
75a5(mdo): pa thogs te/ nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro// rig/ sa sngags 'chang bye ba 'bum phrag bcwo brgyad kyis yongs su ba/ skor bar 'gyur ro// tshe lo drug khri nyis stong du 'gyur zhing / 
75a6(mdo): skye ba bdun stong rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// 'on te gas sngags 'chang 'jig rtend pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga spong na de'i tshe 'di lta bur 'gyur te/ rigs sngags 'chang gis bdag gi sgra 'di sdoms
75a7(mdo): shika/ gcig de'i tshe bud byed des sgra'i ral pa bton nas rigs sngags 'chang la 'bul ba na sra thams cad blangs te dum bu gsum du bkum nas/ smad bu nyi shu rtsa gcig bkal te/ mgo la btags/ 
75a8(mdo): pas ni/ ci ltar yid la bsams pa de bzhin du myig 'phrul ston par 'gyur/ 'bras bu dang me tog 'tshal ba thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// bden pa ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin ston par 'gyur ro// 
75b1(mdo): 'gul du btags pas ni myi gda' bar gyur da nas gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang 'byung po dang / sha za 'am/ grul bum dang / lto 'phye chen po dang kyi myi ma yin pa rnams dbang du gyurd nas/ mahA
75b2(mdo): par 'gyur ro// dpral ba la btags pas ni lha dang / klu thams cad dbang du gyur du nas mchis par 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yas pa la btags pas ni/ glang po che bcu'i mthu stobs dang ldan par
75b3(mdo): 'gyur te/ phas kyi dgra bo dang / myi mjal ba dang / gdug pa thams cad kyis myi tshugs pas stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yon pa la btags pas ni/ rig pa
75b4(mdo): bzhi'i 'jig rte nad dbang du gyur da nas mchis par 'gyur lag pa g.yon pa la btags pas ni/ kang la reg pa de dang du 'gyur zhing ga bdag gi nor bur 'gyur ro// lag pa ka
75b5(mdo): pa la btags pas ni/ grong khyer kyi shar phyogs kyi sgon rgyal po'i sgo la lan gsum thal mos bdabs na/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang grong khyer dang / yul
75b6(mdo): 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / bu phyed dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam nor dbang du gyur nam mchis par 'gyur ro// zan dud 'gro'i skye gnas su rtan
75b7(mdo): pa bya dang / gcan can dang / ridag sa dang / gdug pa dang / gzhan yang gdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags rnams dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// bcugs pa pas btags
75b8(mdo): ni tshal lam gser ram/ ri 'omangs/ bug gas/ dkon pa'am/ ni gnas gang du zhugs te/ shugs pa tsam gyi yod pa/ nor thams cad dang / sman thams cad dang / yulab padzan
76a1(mdo): rang kyi gzugs su mngon sum na mchis par 'gyur ro// byin pa g.yas pa dang / rkang pa la btags pas ni rgya mtsho chen po'i pha mthar yang 'gyur na/ chu drung chen po'i chab kyis byin pa
76a2(mdo): nub tsam du 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ byin pa g.yon pa la btags pas ni/ nyi ma re re zhing dpag tshad brgyar phyin zhing / dub pa ma mchis par slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro/ brla g.yon pa la
76a3(mdo): btags nas/ dur khrod chen por zhugs nas dur khrod thams cad na gnas pa'i gcer bu pa thams cad dbang du gyur da nas mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gnas de nyid na spyod na/ 
76a4(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang des lag pa g.yon pas bum pa gang ba ba zung zhipa/ lag pa g.yas pas bud myed de bzung nas/ ka nas chen po'i mchog tu 'jug par bgyi'o// gnas mchog de'i
76a5(mdo): dbus na/ rdzing me tog gi chal pa bkram pa bgyis te/ rdzing / der gnyis ka khrus bkyi zhing / chab kyis nye reg bgyi'o// bkrus shing reg pa tsam kho nas 'khor rigs sngags 'chang
76a6(mdo): zhags pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang 'bum phrag bdun stong gis yongs su bskor cing / tshe bskal pa khrir 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil pa
76a7(mdo): yang 'gyur ro// nags kyi gnas kyi gzhal myed khang bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi dpon por 'gyur ro// gal te ma zhes bgyi bas don tu gnyer na ni/ bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su skyong bar 'gyur/ 'bras
76a8(mdo): bu dang / 'bru dang kos dang / chas dang / nor bu dang / mu tika dang / byi nu dang / gser dang / dngul yongs su sgrub par bgyid do// sring mo zhes bgyi bas ni/ dgos po'i yo byad thams cad chang
76b1(mdo): bar 'gyur zhing / yan lag spong bar bgyid do// nyi ma le re zhing rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa'i lha'i bu mo khrid de mchi bar 'gyur/ lha'i gzhal byed khab 'byor pa stobs par bgyid/ lha'i khyim dang
76b2(mdo): gzhal myed khang stobs par bgyid do// mngag gzhug ma zhes bgyi bas na/ gang dang kang du mngags pa de dang / der mchi bar 'gyur te/ lha'i gnas sam/ klu'i gnas sam/ gnod sbyin gi gnas pa
76b3(mdo): srin po'i gnas sam/ 'byung po'i gnas sam/ gzhan yang mngag gzhug pa'i sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs yid la bsams pa bzhin du bgyid do// nags bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / 
76b4(mdo): de nas rigs sngags 'chang thar la rgyu bar 'tshal na/ nga mas khrus bgyis pas gos cang ma bgo bar bgyi/ gnas dben pa'i thang ma'i phyogs bcu dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas la/ dri swa
76b5(mdo): tshogs kyis byug/ ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i rtor ma bsha/ mas la/ a ga ru'i bdug pa bsregs te/ nub gsum du mchis nas/ 'khor lo zhags pa'i lag pa'i phyag rgya
76b6(mdo): don yod rgyal po'i snying po'i bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis te/ lan stong sa brgyad tshang ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas du ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas par ba
76b7(mdo): de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na skyes pa nag po chen po tshul myi sdug pa/ mche ba brtsigs pa spa gyen du 'greng na/ mgo 'bar ba/ myig dmar ba/ mchu dang / lce dmar ba/ sen mo dpar ba
76b8(mdo): swa sngo ba/ dpung pa mkhrang zhing brtan pa gsus 'byangs so// mchod phyir thogs dang ldan pa/ mgo lnga pa sprul ltar lde sbyar ba/ stag gi sham thabs bgos pa/ lag pan dgra sta dang / dril bu
77a1(mdo): thogs pa/ nyig sul byed ces byang nas/ phyogs bcum bas par bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'ang gis skrag par gyi bgyi ste/ btan par bgyis la 'tsho bo'i rgyal po bzlas dag
77a2(mdo): 'khor lo'i zhags pas 'phangs te/ mgo bo bcad la khrag mang du byung ba dang / rigs sngags 'chang kyis khrag des lus thams cad byug par bgyi'o// byugs pa tsam gyi mod la bdag nyid kyi lus kyi
77a3(mdo): chod pa dang / byi shigs pas rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// byig gnyis phyung la/ rang gi phyig phyis nas myig la bskus na/ lha'i myig tu 'gyur ro// rkang brus te byugs na tshe bskal pa bcur
77a4(mdo): 'gyur zhing / thos pa bsags pa'i rgyal por 'gyur/ bskal pa brgya stong gi skye ba'i skye ba dang / tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// du phyung ste 'chal na nam mkha' la mchi'o// khrag gis snying kam
77a5(mdo): thig le bgyis na myi gda' bar 'gyur ro// lce bcad na ral grir gyur nas/ dgra thams cad brlag par babyed do// ka ti thang la rgyu bar 'tshal na/ de'i tshe 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya
77a6(mdo): rtsa brgyad zhags pa dang / 'khor lo la bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'khor lo zhags pa gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i tshul gyis sa la brdabs par bgyi ste/ lan gsum du thal mo brdabs pa dang / de'i 'og tu zang ga
77a7(mdo): sgo dbye bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar rang gyi khyim bzhin du 'jug par bgyi ste/ zhugs nas skur pa chi zhing dgos pa gzhan thams cad bgyid pa dang / zang thams cad la gnas pa thams cad dbang du gyur da nas
77a8(mdo): gnas par 'gyur ro// 'on te nam mkhal la mchi 'tshal na/ gyen du bltas na/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po yungs mar la stongab rtsa brgyad bzlas te lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ bdag nyid la byugs te/ 
77b1(mdo): rgyas rgya rnam bar 'gyur zhing / dmapa' 'go byed par 'gyur ro// ka'i gnas su mami ba 'phel na/ lha rgyam du mchis nas/ gags pas u 'azum pa das bcing bar/ 
77b2(mdo): bgyi zhing / don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ lha bcings pa gang lags pa de'i mying nas brjod na/ lha de babs nas rigs sngags 'chang gyi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// tshang
77b3(mdo): pa dang khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rigs sngags 'chang la/ rigs sngags 'chang ci zhig gi don tu gnyer ba de sdoms shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang lha'i gnas su 'gyur ro// 
77b4(mdo): zhes brjod par bgyi'o// gal te gzhan bsam pa zhig mtshis na/ mchog thams cad rtsol bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i gnas nas mchi ba na/ lha'i gnas lha'i rdzu 'phrul gyis lag
77b5(mdo): pa na thogs te/ nam mkhal la mchi bar 'gyur ro// dzA srid 'tshal ba lha'i gzhal byed khang chen por longs spyod par byung ro/ 'on te myi 'tshal na lha'i gnas nas slar yang 'bas
77b6(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// gzhan ci ltar rang gi glo gros dang / yid la bsams pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur zhing / thams cad du 'grub par 'gyur te/ de la som nyi dang yid gnyis bskyed par myi
77b7(mdo): bgyi'o// 'khor lo zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang pad ma'i zhags pa bsgrub par 'tshal bas rigs sngags 'chang de langs chang ma legs par bkrus te/ gos chang ma mgo
77b8(mdo): bar bgyi'o// nub gsum mchis sam/ nub lnga mchis sam/ nub cig mchis nas/ rigs sngags 'chang gi zhags pa'i skud pa sgrub par bgyi ste/ ras kyi skud pa 'am pad ma'i skud pa bye dur+ya'i
78a1(mdo): kha tog cam lta zur tshon gyis la bsgyur bam bgyi zhing / lan+da nyi shu rtsa gcig par bkal te/ de la yang pad ma bgyis te/ rin po che sna gsum gi 'dab ma kha bye ba po bzhi pa'i tshad kyi
78a2(mdo): pad ma gser gyi 'dab pa dang / dngul gyi 'dab ma dang / bye dur+ya dang / min dra ni la 'am/ rin po che ka rka ti ka las bgyi zhing mu tig gis bskor ba bgyis te/ de nas zhags pa la gdags par
78a3(mdo): bgyi'o// zhags pa'i thor to cig pa la pad ma'i phyag rgya gdags par bgyi'o// de nas legs par brgyan pa'i chos bstan bzang mo bsham par bgyi'o// ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis la dkyil
78a4(mdo): 'khor gyi steng du dri'i pad ma bsams par bgyi zhing da dkyil 'khor gyi steng du chos kyi gdan bshams la bum pa gang ba da brgyad par 'gyi'o// me tog silam bkram zhing / m-i ga su dang / 
78a5(mdo): can dan dang / du ru ska'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// mchod yon gyi snod kyang gzhag par bgyi'o// pad ma'i zhag/ pa de yang chos kyi stan kyi steng du gzhag par bgyi'o// 'phags
78a6(mdo): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang gi mdun tu rig sngags 'chad kyis dkyil mo krung bcas nas// don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan khri bzlas te// bzlas pa'i nyung kar re re nas/ de'i steng du rtor par bgyi'o// 
78a7(mdo): san khri rdzogs nas de nas ches bco lnga'i zla ba nya'i nub mo mchis nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bgyi'o// zhags pa de la yab mchod par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa/ 
78a8(mdo): phyag rgya bcings nas/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// de nas 'khro bo'i rgyal po'i lan brgya cha brgyad bzlas te/ nyin mtshan dus gsum du bzlas brjod dang mchod par gyu/ 
78b1(mdo): de nas pad pa'i zhags pa 'bar zhing / kha tog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// legs so legs so zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'byin par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan rab gzigs dbang phyug/ 
78b2(mdo): gi lus la kha tog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang phyag rgya'i dkyil mo krung gis mchis nas/ myig myi 'dzums shing / bzhin 'dzum pa'i snying rje chen po yid la byed/ 
78b3(mdo): pa bsgom par bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gdong du blta ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan gsum bzlas par bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
78b4(mdo): dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi lha'i rang bzhin mdun tu mchis nas/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ rigs sngags 'chang gi spyi bor gzhag nas legs so zhes bgyi ba gsol bar 'gyur zhipa/ 'di
78b5(mdo): skad ces kyang dbugs 'byin par bgyid do// rigs snga/ kas 'chang ba'i snying las skyes pa'i bu thu bo/ bzlas brjod kyi/ cho ga chen po dang / mchod pa'i cho ga chen po 'dis pa la mchod pa
78b6(mdo): mchog byas pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi mchog dang / grub pa'i mchog ste/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po grub cing khyod kyis pad ma'i zhags pa chen po grub kyis/ ji ltar yid la
78b7(mdo): bsams pa bzhin mchog khyer cing / khyod kyis yid kyi brnag pa thams cad ni yongs su rdzogs par byas/ khyod 'khor ba'i 'jigs par rgyu ba las ni grol/ khyod skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi
78b8(mdo): ba'i phyi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa las ni za dang/ khyod dmyal ba chen po myi bzad pa bcu drug las ni yongasu grol/ 'jigs pa chen po phyi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba brgyad las ni yongs su ba rad/ 'di na
79a1(mdo): phyi ma'i skye ba'i mngal du gnas nas/ sdug bsngal gyi bzad pa las shi 'phos te/ rigs sngags 'chang khyod byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du 'jig rten kyi khams bde ba can du pad ma la/ 
79a2(mdo): rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// khyod kyi gang ka'i 'bum phrag stong brgyad cu rtsa bzhi snyed kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba cher bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po
79a3(mdo): dang ni ldan/ rigs sngags 'chang khyod kyis lhag par bya ba mang po ni byas/ khyod rigs sngags 'chang chen por ni lung bstan/ dmyal ba dang / sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa myi bzad pa thams cad las
79a4(mdo): ni grol gyis/ ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin mchog khyer cig/ de nas rigs sngags 'chad kyis ji ltar yid la sems pa bzhin de'i tshe mchog thob par 'gyur ro// de nas
79a5(mdo): rigs sngags gI sa pa'i zhags pa de blangs te/ gnas chang yar gus pas mchod pa rgya che bgyi'o// nam dgosapa de'i tshe zhags pa blang bar bgyi ste/ las thams cad bgyid
79a6(mdo): par 'gyur ro// pad ma ni 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lag par gzhag la/ lag pa g.yas pas zhags pa bzung ste/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
79a7(mdo): nas/ sems can nam lha gang gi mying nas brjod do// bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mdun na mchis nas/ 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad tshol bar 'gyur// de nas
79a8(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang byang chub tu lung bstan pa don tu gnyer bar 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang ba tshang ma legs par khrus bgyis te/ gos rtsang ma bgos pas nyin zhag gcig mchis par 'gyur ba
79b1(mdo): yangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhag kya thus pa sa mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nam pad pa'i zhags pa de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag du 'bul bar 'gyi'o// zhags pa tho ma ho la cig gis ni raba'i
79b2(mdo): mgul du btags la/ dod yod rgyal po'i lan stong chang bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sru kaser gi mdog can rigs sngags 'chang gi mdun tu bzhun
79b3(mdo): shing / rigs sngags 'chang gi skye bor phyag bzhag ste/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad/ lung ston par mdzad yid kyi nag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro// sgrib pa dang sdig pa
79b4(mdo): cher bapa stong du 'phags pa thams cad gdugs par lu/ dar ro// lhag ma ma lus par gdugs par gyur nas/ yus dayong su dag par 'gyur ro// dri ma dang bral zhing phra dog dang mangs
79b5(mdo): spangs par 'gyur ro// 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba'i ma ral du gnas nas/ lha dang myi'i dpal nyams su myong bar bah+yaM sa nas/ sems can thams cad kyi bla ma gcig tu 'gyur ro// / 
79b6(mdo): mchod par 'os pa dang / bla ma'i gnas su yang 'gyur ro// nad rnams dang bral bar 'gyur ro// skye bo thams cad dka' bar 'gyur ro// 'gum pa'i dus su phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa zas
