79b7(mdo): cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur/ dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/ legs pa'i lam ston par mdzad par yang 'gyur ro// 'phags pa byin ras gzigs dbang phyug mdun tu mchis nas/ dbugs 'byin pa
79b8(mdo): bgyid cing / lag pa g.yas pa'i gyi bor 'jog par bgyid do// de bde bas shin tu dran pa nye bar gzhag nas lus 'dor bar 'gyur ro// bor bcam gyi sod la/ zhal pa mnyam pa'i 'de ba can gyi
80a1(mdo): 'jig rten kyi khabs su skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyan thams cad kyis brtan pacan dang pe byed kyis phras pa'i lum pa ma las rdus te sto bar 'gyur ro// tsher bas dran par 'gyur te/ 
80a2(mdo): bskal pa brgya stong gi skye ba'i tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo 'di mtha' dag rdzogs par g.yang
80a3(mdo): bor du 'gyis nas/ bcu la gnas shing snyin rje log tum gyur pas/ phyir gyi ldog par 'gyur ro// rgyu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba chen pos lha'i 'angab margyag sa pa dang / gzhas byed 'dadang / 
80a4(mdo): gnas mchog dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du/ mchi bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang bde ba can
80a5(mdo): gyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba'i chos 'o na la lta bar 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang kyi gnas gtsang ma'i phyogs sam/ gnas sam/ khang pa 'am/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ 
80a6(mdo): 'khor gyi khyams sam/ 'chag sa 'am/ khang pa rtseg ma 'am/ spyil po phrang ma phyi bdar legs par brgyas pa'i sa phyogs su dkyil 'khor grub bzhi mdzes pa 'khru gang ba 'am/ 'khru do ba'i dkyil
80a7(mdo): 'khor bgyis te/ gru bzhi lham pa/ gra kun nas cha mdzes pa/ sa dang sbyar ba'i lci bas shin tu legs par byi bdar bgyis la/ phra sngon po gnyer po lta bu la mkhas pas/ dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi cha
80a8(mdo): dbye ba'i thig gdab par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gi dbus kyi snying po la pad ma rgya chen po mdzes pa/ 'dab ma brgya pa mtshon sna brgyad kyi mtshon gyis bkra bar bgyi shing / mdzes par bgyis pa la
80b1(mdo): snying po rin po cheg ka ti ka las 'gyi'o// pad ma'i mtha' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis bskor la/ za bzhin sa 'a khyer bor bzhi'i chad du 'gyi'o// pad pa'i zur thung su sud pa la sngon po legs
80b2(mdo): par bris la/ 'khyer bye phyi rol nong bus 'khor ba'i mtha' de mtshos bskor bar bgyi'o// lha'i chab rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal myed khang gis mdzes par bgyis la/ chab la me tog sna tshogs kyi
80b3(mdo): sil ma bkod pa/ bya sna tshogs gnas 'cha ba dang / ngang pa dang / gzhed dang / khrung thung dang / dur ba dang / shang shang de'u dang / ka la byid ka dang / bya'i tshogs kyis mdzes par bgyis la/ nya dang / 
80b4(mdo): chu srin dang / chu srin byis pa gsod kun nas rten 'cha bar bgyi'o// mtsho'i 'gram na rin po che'i ljon shing dang / 'bras bu'i ljon shing dang / me tog gi ljon shing sna tshogs kha khyer dang bcas par bgyi'o// 
80b5(mdo): dkyil 'khor gyi 'khyer gyi phyi rol nas lag pa dang thal mo// de'i phyag rgya bris sgo bzhi rnams su rgyal po chen po bzhi bgyi'o// de nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor la pad ma'i gdan bzang po
80b6(mdo): bshams te/ de'i steng du bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag myed dang / 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu che na po thob pa gzhag par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor bum pa
80b7(mdo): gang bas brgyan pas bgyi'o// me tog gi il ma dang / dri dang / byug pa yang dbul bar bgyi'o// ba dan bzang po sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// rtor pa dkar po dbul bar bgyi'o// yon
80b8(mdo): chab kyi snod dang mar me'i 'breng ba 'bul bar bgyi'o// pad ma'i zhags pa 'od dpag myed kyi phyag tu dbul bar bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang chang las gos thang sa bgo bar bgyi'o// legs pa
81a1(mdo): kyim rnapa kyi/ sa na yang 'gyuran gas su / kyis @
81a2(mdo): pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ bzlas brjod bgyi'o// byams pa dang / brtse ba'i sems kyis lhag par brtson par bgyi'o// snying rjes mchog tu rtse bar 'gyur bas/ sems can thams cad la gse ba
81a3(mdo): bgyis nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ ci tsam na thun tha a la 'od dpag byed 'bar bar 'gyur nas/ dkyil 'khor chen po de la yang 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rig
81a4(mdo): sngags 'chang g.yo bar 'gyur nas/ lus 'bar bar 'gyu dar ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis skya rengs shar tsam ma de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
81a5(mdo): sangs rgyas 'phags pa 'od dpag byed gser srungs so/ la bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i lkugasang gi kha tog gis rigs snga/ sa 'chang gi mdun du bzhugs nas/ phyag g.yas pa'i rigs
81a6(mdo): sngags 'chang gi gyi bor bzhag ste/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing / yid kyi rnag pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par mdzad nas/ phyi gda' bar 'gyur ba dang / shi nad tu rnam par dag pa dri ma byed pa'i snang
81a7(mdo): ba zhes bgyi ba nyid thob nas/ 'di ltar nyal ba tsam 'am/ myig btsums pa tsam gyis/ 'jig rten dkyi khams bde ba can gzhal myed khang dang / gnas dang / 'jig rtend dang yul ljongs dang / 
81a8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mtha' dag dang / bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa mthong bar 'gyur lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa de chos ston par mdzad pa yang mthong bar 'gyur lags so// 
81b1(mdo): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa dang / gzhal myed khang dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / mo 'phrul thams cad mthong bar 'gyum lags so// 'di/ 
81b2(mdo): nas ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba nas shi 'phos te/ 'jig rten gi khams bde ba can du skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur te/ skye ba bdun stong rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// de yang
81b3(mdo): nas zhags pa la lan stob rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ lag pa g.yas pa nas bzung nas/ nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro// lo khror 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// zhags pa grub pa rnams dang / reg
81b4(mdo): sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyur ro// 'khor khri brgyad stong dang ldan par 'gyur ro// pad ma'i zhags pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas rigs sngags 'chang
81b5(mdo): rdo rje'i zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ shing shun dang / ra/ sa skud dang / kha che dar kyekyi skud pa mnyam du lhan cig bzhal te/ khru nyi shu rtsa gcig gi tshad tsam du bgyis la/ tsan dan dkar po
81b6(mdo): las rdo rje sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bgyis te/ rtse lnga pa 'byung ba la sogs pa'i mgo dang / sprul kyi ska rags kyis bcings la/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo'i dri ba'i 'phreb bas bkri ba bgyis
81b7(mdo): zhags pa la gdags par bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos rtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// legs par khrus bgyi'o// ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o// rtsa'i sten bting nas ri mo'i gzugs kyi
81b8(mdo): mdun tu lag pa g.yas pas zhags pa mnan nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khri bzlas so// 'khro bo'i rgyal po stong bzlas so// de na pa zhogs pa de 'bar bar 'gyurd te/ de bzung na nam mkha
82a1(mdo): sa 'thung bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nong bu'i rin pa dang / pad ma 'i rigs gang dag lags pa de dag thams cad bdun na bzhugs par 'gyur
82a2(mdo): lag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar gzugs dang mthu dang / brtson 'grus pha rol kyi zil gyis myi non par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar rigs sngags 'chang gi dbang por 'gyur ro// lo khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ 
82a3(mdo): las thams cad bgyid pa rdo rje'i zhags pa dgra thams cad 'joms par bgyid pa'i zhags pa steng ngam/ 'og kar 'phangs par yid la bsams pa bzhin thams cad bcings nas 'gug par bgyid do// 
82a4(mdo): phyogs bcur 'phangs ste/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas nas/ skyes pa 'am/ bud myed dam/ gzhan gang mi yang rung ba thams cad zhags pas bcings nas/ myur du 'gug par bgyid do// 
82a5(mdo): som nyi myi bgyi'o// gal te lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod skye na nam/ srin po 'am/ dri za 'am/ lA ma yin nam/ nam maSha'o ldeng ngam/ myi 'am tsi dang / 'byung po 'am/ lto 'phye che/ 
82a6(mdo): po thams cad zhags pas bcings nas/ myur du dgug par bgyid do som nyi myi bgyid do// zhags pa la 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis ste/ mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i mtshan mo
82a7(mdo): nam phyed na zhags pa phyogs bzhir 'phang bar bgyi'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bgyeg pa dang log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bdug pa thams cad zhags pas bcings nas rigs sngags
82a8(mdo): 'chang gi mdun na mchis shing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du gyur nas mchis te/ bran bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// bltas pa tsam gyis gdon thams cad las tha dad par 'gyur ro// 
82b1(mdo): zhags pa la 'khro bo'i rgyal po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lag pas zhags pa blangs te/ dur khrod du zhugs nas phyi snang bar 'byu da cing / gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur ro// 
82b2(mdo): phug gi sgor mchis nas rdo rje'i zhags pa bsdams nas/ phyag thams cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur zhing / 'khrul 'khor dang / brtan pa thams cad dupa bur chag par 'gyur ro// lam ngan pa dang mya ngan
82b3(mdo): pa dang / phyi ma yin pa dang / 'bab chu ngan pa dang / sprul dang dbugs gdug pa dang / srog chags gon sa dang / bdug pa dang / bcas pa'i srog chags su rtogs pa thams cad myi gda' bar 'gyur ro/ 
82b4(mdo): gyi drung po dang / lam drang por ji ltar rang gi gnas sam/ phyag lag khang ngam/ 'ang pa bzhin du zhugs nas/ dgos pa thams cad bsgrubs te/ slar yang gnas nas phyir ldog par 'gyur ro// 
82b5(mdo): rdo rje'i zhags pa las thams cad bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas rigs sngags 'chang nor bu'i zhags pa spu/ ba par 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang des nor bu btsal
82b6(mdo): bgyi ste/ rdo rje 'am/ bye du r+ya 'am/ shel rang 'byung ngam/ mar gad dam/ min dra ni la sor mo 'i tshigs pas lhag tsam/ shin tu phyis pa/ shin tu yongs su dag par bgyis pa/ gser gi me tog
82b7(mdo): gi tshul du bgyis pa/ mu tig gyis dkris pa/ ge sar kha bye ba/ tsam pa ka'i me tog ji lta ba de bzhin du bgyis la/ ras bzang po'i skud pa tshon gyi mdzes pas kha bsgyur ba/ shin tu tshad la bab par
82b8(mdo): bkal ba/ khru nyi bu pha gcig pa/ sor mo gung mo'i cad tsam gyi nor bus brgyan la/ thor to gcig shos su nor bu 'am/ kaser las bgyis pa'i lcags kyu gdags par bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngag
83a1(mdo): rtsang mas gos bgo bar bkye'o// legs par bkrus nas/ ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun tu spos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor tshad dang ldan pa bgyis la/ 
83a2(mdo): grwa bzhir bum pa gang ba bzhag cing / pog phor gi snod bshams nas/ a ga ru'i bdug pa dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ska'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su chos kyi stan bzang po
83a3(mdo): tshad dang ldan pa bshams la/ ba dan sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor bskor bar bgyi'o// me tog gi sil ma dang / dri dang / rol mo'i cha byad dag dgod par bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang kis dkar gsum
83a4(mdo): 'tshal bar btung ba ngan pa dang / lta ba ngan pa dang / gnas ngan pa drang / lhag ma dang / spags pa rnams yongasu spang bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po nyi khri chig stong bzlas nas
83a5(mdo): lag pa g.yas pas chos kyi stan kyi steng du bzhag pa'i zhaH/ sa pa la gnan no// lan nyi khri tshig gong chang ba dang / de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis 'khro bo'i rgyal po lang stong sa brgyang
83a6(mdo): chang bar bzlas te/ srung sa kar mede pa dbang bskyang ba // lan po ca brgyad cang ba dang / r-i sa 'ang gas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dang byug kau ri ba'i gnan pa sa
83a7(mdo): stsa ba rgyas te/ pa'i bgyid/ tsun du sa ded pam cad ma dzin pa pa pa'i nas pam / ma 'a 'gyib dang / dbul par ma
83b1(mdo): dkyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas/ nyin mtshan kun tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlos te/ yungs kar re re nas brdeg par bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad chang ba dang / ma ched/ 
83b2(mdo): g.yos par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs las kyang // 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nor bu'i zhags pa de yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 
83b3(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang gi mgo bo yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'bar ba tsam gyi mod la rigs sngags 'chang gi lag pa g.yas pas nor bu'i zhags pa blangs nas/ sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de na
83b4(mdo): 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis rigs sngags 'tshang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur/ ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag myed dang / de bzhin
83b5(mdo): gshegs pa shag kya thub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa s+ya/ na gzigs 'od kyi rgyal po sku gser gyi kha tog gis nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis zhugs nas/ rigs sngags 'chang la legs
83b6(mdo): so zhes bgyi ba thol bar 'gyur/ phyag dpung pa gser gyi kha tog dang / 'dra ba brkyang ba'i phyag gis rigs sngags 'chang gi mgo bo'i spyi bor gzhag nas/ rigs sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin par
83b7(mdo): mdzad de/ rigs sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par dag pa grub po/ khyod kyis 'jig rtend pa dang / 'jig rten las 'dra
83b8(mdo): pa'i las sgrub pa'i cho ga bra na myed pa grub ste/ rigs sngags 'chang gi 'dod dkur sbyar ba thams cad de/ 'phags pa rgyad ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i grub pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i
84a1(mdo): nags pa thogs nas/ rigs sngags 'chang gis 'bad gyi dgos pang/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po dan yod pa'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i rang bzhin 'dis/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dan/ 
84a2(mdo): brnam pa sna tshogs sgrub par byed pa la go shig/ yid la ji lar bsams pa bzhin/ rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul sna tshogs la gos shig/ rigs sngags 'chab khyod ni 'phos nas/ 'jig nyid kyi'o/ 
84a3(mdo): bde ba can du song shig/ 'on te bde ba can 'tshal lam/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i lha rdzas kyi mchod par 'tshal lam/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i srin gyis mchod par 'tshal la/ 
84a4(mdo): lha'i me tog dang / lha'i dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye mra dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu/ dang / ba dan dang / lha ba lbub dang / rgyan dang / gos kyis
84a5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rigs/ sngags 'chang des spyi bo'i gtsug tu dri'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ me tog dang bdug pa yang dbul lo// yid bzhin gyi nor bu
84a6(mdo): chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mchog 'di lag pa g.yon pas mnon la/ lag pa g.yas pas don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mchog bzung nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ 'di lta
84a7(mdo): bu'i yid la bgyid pa chen pos/ ci lta bu'i bsam pa yid la bgyid pa de lta bu yang bsams nas/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te phyag bgyi'o// yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod 'di bzlas
84a8(mdo): nas/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su gdungs pa'i snying gis sems can thams cad la mchog tu
84b1(mdo): dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das
84b2(mdo): pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par song ba dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// glo gros chen po sha ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
84b3(mdo): gnas kyi mchog dgal ldan na gnas pa 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa
84b4(mdo): 'od dpag myed la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la/ phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
84b5(mdo): phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dbang phyug la gsogs pa'i lha'i bu'i gzugs sna tshogs mnga' ba/ spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// 
84b6(mdo): tad ya thA/ oM ma ha pad ma tsin drA ma NaM/ ma Ni ma Ni/ oM mo kA ma Ni/ su ma Ni/ ma ha ma ni/ sarba ta tha ga tha/ a lang ka ra/ ma ha ma mo gA ma Ni/ tsa ra tsa ra san tsa ma/ Ne Sha tsa re na ya ma ha pad ma
84b7(mdo): b+hu dza ba raN/ ma ha ka ru ni ka/ ma ha byi shwa du ba d+ha ra/ pra ba ra ma ta b+ho d+hi sid ta/ pad ma dar pad ma/ a pa na pad ma/ ma ku ta/ ma la d+ha ra/ pad ma ko lum/ pad ma a la tri ta Ta n+ya
85a1(mdo): ta/ mam dzan sa 'angs hU~M/ ni tag nga/ kyi la/ ci / til dra bar dathas/ pa teb dartsub byang/ 
85a2(mdo): sha ra/ lo ke sha pa/ ya ma kha ru na/ ku bye ra re shi ka Na/ ku ma ra/ sen pa Ti be sha dar/ du ra d+ha ra/ dwi ri dri ri/ dU mu d+hu ru/ ma ha pUd ta be sha d+ha ra/ sarba ta tha ka ta/ ma bi shi ka ta a ma ya
85a3(mdo): nu swa ra b+ha ka ban/ gru ya ya shan ta ma ya ba ran/ shA sa yA sa tran/ ta mja la du ShA na/ pa ta la big nan ma ya/ ya lda do nam lam/ pa ra sa ra pa kham/ hA hA hU~M/ phaT pa pa
85a4(mdo): bid d+hu sid s+ya/ ma ha tsin du mo ne/ a mo g+ha ba sha d+ha ra/ ma dA/ ya sa drA ya/ bi pu la snyid dring / ma ma pra yad tsha ma ha ka tsu na ka/ b+hud du brud d+ha/ bo d+ha ya bo pA ya/ sam b+ho ta ya/ 
85a5(mdo): ma ha ha pa shu ba ti pe sha d+ha ra/ ma nan bi kur ba na/ rid d+hi san dA ri sha ya/ tu ru tu ru/ ta ra ta pa/ ga ga ne bi pU la pi ma na/ san dra ri sha ka/ na mo sU te bi pu la pun n+ya/ ko shwa dA ra ma ha/ a mo
85a6(mdo): gA sid dwe hU hUM// a be shin tsa tu man/ bi pu la ki rti ka re swa hA// b+hu ba swa hA/ b+hu ba pU ba swa hA/ a mo gu bi pu le swa hA/ ma ha tsin drA ma Ni sid d+he swa hA/ sarba pid d+hi ba ra d+he swa hA/ au bi pu le
85a7(mdo): shwa ma/ lo ke shwa pa/ ma ha tsin du ma ni/ ma ha ma mo kA sid d+he hU~M phaT swA hA// don yod nor bu'i zhags pa chen po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas ma thag tu/ rigs sngags laH/ 
85b1(mdo): byam 'brul chen ma spyod par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gi khams bdeb can mthong bar 'gyu // de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag myed dang / tshogs dang bcas 'khor dang bcas pa byang chub sem
85b2(mdo): dpa' mam sa dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang / gzhal byed khang mchog dang bcas pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// bde ba can gyi gnas mapa' dag tu mchod pa'i rtsa gyi/ 
85b3(mdo): srin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag khyed kyi mthus mchod pa'i srin chen por gnas par la gyur ro// bde ba can na gnas pa de dag thams cad dang / 
85b4(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed de/ rigs sngags 'amapa la legs so zhes bgyi ba gsol bar 'gyur ro// rigs sA gas 'chang des kyang sgra de dag thams cad thos par 'gyur zhe
85b5(mdo): mchod pa'i char chen po de yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// gal te rigs sngags 'chang nam mkha' las babs par 'tshal na de'i tshe/ bsams pa tsam gyis 'babs par 'gyur ro// 'on te myi 'tshal na
85b6(mdo): nam mkhal de nyid na// nam mkha' la grub pa dang / rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog don yod rgyal chen grub pa yid bzhin nor bu lag pa zhes bya ba la 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// 
85b7(mdo): dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 'khob los sgyur ba'i rigs sngags 'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// tshe bskal pa chen po stong phrag brgya bcu rtsa gnyi su 'gyur ro// 'odan te babs na lo khA
86a1(mdo): 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// mchod pa dang / gus pa cher bgyid par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi cho bo gcig pur 'gyur ro// 
86a2(mdo): rnams kyang babs nas rigs sngags 'chang de la mchod pa'i mchog rgya chen po dag bgyid par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// mchod
86a3(mdo): 'os su yang 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis kyang / kun tu srung zhing phyag bgyi ba'i 'os su yang 'gyur ro// thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro// gal te rigs sngags 'chang phyogs bcu
86a4(mdo): dus gsum thams cad kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba dang bcas pa/ rab sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun zhes
86a5(mdo): cad dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin pa dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'bye chen po sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa dang / 
86a6(mdo): bcas pa la mchod pa bgyid par 'tshal ba 'am/ phyogs bcu dus gsum du rtogs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsod nams kyis phung po chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'tshal ba 'am
86a7(mdo): dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'tshal ba 'am/ lha'i zas kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang / lha'i bcud kyis len kyi mchog gis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs
86a8(mdo): rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyon thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la stobs par 'tshal ba 'am/ sbyin pa mang po dang / chen po rtong par 'tshal ba 'am/ nyin re zhing mchod sbyin bgyid par 'tshal na/ rigs
86b1(mdo): 'chang des legs par khrus bgyis te/ thang mas gos chang ma bgos nas/ ci 'dod pas dkyil 'khor bgyi bgyis la/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ma rug tu me/ 
86b2(mdo): tog dang / bdug pa yang dbul bar bgyi'o// pus mo btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas zhags pa bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bgyi'o// yid bzhin nor bu chen po rgya chen don
86b3(mdo): yod 'di yang mchod pa bgyi'o// 'phags pa rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po lan bdun bzla bar bgyi'o// yid la bgyi ba yangs pa rgya chen po mchod pa'i sprin chen po dang sprin tong chen po dang / 
86b4(mdo): kha zas dang / btung ba dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa drang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bu dan dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lbub dang / rgyad 'phyang
86b5(mdo): dang / rol mo dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdo ba dang / rin po/ che'i ljon shing / 'bras bu'i ljon shing dang / mar me dang // rten shing dang / dpag bsams kyi ljon shing yid la bgyi ste/ 
86b6(mdo): gsang sngags kyi gzungs bzlas nas ji ltar yid la bsams shing don du gnyer ba bzhin phyogs bcu 'phangs na/ de'i tshe phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag tu rtogs
86b7(mdo): pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad ma tshang ba ma mchis pas ci bsams pa bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i char kyi srin
86b8(mdo): chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po ma tshang ba ma mchis par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mthu chen po'i nor bu rgya chen po don yod la mchod pa'i/ 
87a1(mdo): gzungs bzlas shing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'di yang nyin cig bzhin du nyin dus gsum mtshan dus gsum du bzlas par bgyi'o// de na rigs sngag
87a2(mdo): 'chang kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag mnyes par bgyis pa dang / mchod pa bgyis pa dang / ri mor bgyis par 'gyu ro// bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi phung po chen po dang
87a3(mdo): dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du rtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis rigs sngags 'chang la dran pa dang / blo gros dang / 
87a4(mdo): stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / kazi brjid 'acol par ma dzad do// nyin cig bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cadadang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis
87a5(mdo): dgongs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dang phyug rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu mchog skye/ na mthong bar 'gyur ro// mthong ba'i chos la 'khor ba'i sdug
87a6(mdo): bsngal 'jigs pa 'jigs su rung ba dang / skrag pa dang / sdang ba rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro// nad kyis gnod par myi 'gyur te/ rims kyis ma lags/ dug gis ma lags/ dug sbyar mas ma lags
87a7(mdo): mtshon kyis ma lags/ mes ma lags chus ma lags te/ lus la ser ba 'bab par myi 'gyur ro// dgras 'jigs par myi 'gyur te/ pha rol kyi dpung gis 'jigs pas ma lags/ pha rol kyi
87a8(mdo): sdes 'jigs pas ma lags/ phas kyi gol ba dang / phyi mnga' ba'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ khwa'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ klu'i 'jigs pas ma lags te/ gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / 
87b1(mdo): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'dod rgur sbyar ba dang / sbyor ba mo'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// dpag tshad/ 
87b2(mdo): gcig gi nang tshun chad du bzung bar myi nus shing / rgyang ring por 'bros par 'gyur te/ de la babyegs bgyid par myi 'gyur te/ gang dag mnar myed par gnas par 'gyur ba'i sems can nam/ mtshas
87b3(mdo): byed pa lnga bgyid pa 'am/ 'phags pa la bsrung ba 'debs pa 'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba 'am/ bskal pa bye bar bsags pa'i las kyi sgribs pas lus yongasu bkris pa gang lags pa de yang
87b4(mdo): mthong ba'i chos thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yong su rtogs par 'gyur/ yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// gal te tshig gzha na myi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyid cing / smyung ba
87b5(mdo): lan cig bgyid/ bzlas brjod bzlas na/ de bas khad pa bye ba brgya stong du 'khor bar skye ba las phyir ldog par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi bzlas brjod kyi las kyis snga ma rnams kyang 'byang
87b6(mdo): bar 'gyur zhing // bskald pa stong du bsags pa'i sdig pa rnams nyams par 'gyur ro/ 'khor ba'i nyes pas phyir yang gos pa ra myi 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyis pad pa bzhin
87b7(mdo): du gos par myi 'gyur ro// mthong ba'i chos las lnga pa thob par 'gyur ro// bsten pa tsam 'am cho ga'i bzlas brjod la nges par gnas na/ phyir myi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro// dran bcam gyis pa
87b8(mdo): rol tu phyind pa drug yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyind pa bcu'i rjes su mchis par 'gyur ro// nyin cig bzhin du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ mthong ba'i chos la kun tu
88a1(mdo): bzang po nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang / dam tshig thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur ro// 
88a2(mdo): yang dag par bskyed pa thams cad kyi rjesu 'brel bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang mthong ba tsam gyis mnar myed par gnas pa thams cad kyi sdig pa rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// chu dun rigs sngags
88a3(mdo): 'chang dur khrod du zhugs nas gum pa'i rus pa 'am/ gum pa'i sha 'am/ gum pa'i ro rul pa 'am/ chung ngu na gum pa'i gos bor ba 'am/ cig pa'i ri mo la rigs sngags 'chang de'i grib mas phog par gyur
88a4(mdo): na/ sems can de gang dang gang gis dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ba/ de dang de nas mod la tha rad nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par myi bgyid
88a5(mdo): na/ gang dag ches mang du lhag par bgyid par 'gyur ba lta ste/ pa kyang mi 'tshal gang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ba 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ 
88a6(mdo): dge bsnyen ma dad pa'i rje su 'brang ba 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di la chang bar bgyid/ brjod par bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ 'don par bgyid/ sems par bgyid/ sgom par bgyid/ mchod pa/ 
88a7(mdo): bgyid/ 'dri bar bgyid/ 'drir 'jug par bgyid na/ de nges par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// mthong ba'i chos la yon tan chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ 
88a8(mdo): 'di nyid bcangs na mthong ba'i chos la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang rjes su mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di nyid re shig kun chub par bgyis/ 
88b1(mdo): mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyur na/ dgon pa mang pos grims par bgyid pa lta smos kyang mi 'tshal/ de nas rigs sngags 'chang don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa bsgrubs nas
88b2(mdo): yid la bsapas te/ bsams pa'i las thams cad bgyis na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// dgos pa dang / bgyid pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
88b3(mdo): dbang phyug mchog sbyin mngon sum du mthong nas/ lung bstand pa bzhin du don yod nor bu'i zhags pa 'di lta bur bgyi ste/ 'di la yid gnyis su myi bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis zhags pa
88b4(mdo): 'grin par btags la lag pa g.yas pas nor bu blangs te/ gra pa g.yon pas lcags kyu blangs nas/ myi gda' bar gyur da na kar dga' ba der 'jug par 'gyur te/ mtshan mo yang nor bu
88b5(mdo): 'od kyi snang bas nyid par ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro// zas cad du lha'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin da / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / byi
88b6(mdo): ci'i gnas dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas dang / ri sul gyi phug dang / ri dang nags tshal dang / zang gi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur zhing / thams cad du myi mngon par zhugs nas/ slar yang ldog par 'gyur
88b7(mdo): zhing / mi 'chal ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro// myi rnams kyi nang du lha'i tshe lo brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa dang / nyes pa'i skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro// 'on te rigs sngags 'chang gis
88b8(mdo): grub pa'i don la brtag par 'tshal na/ zla ba yang gi ngo'i ches brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi la legs par zhus bgyi'o// chang mas kos yang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// gtsang ma'i gnas sam phyogs su ba'i lji ba/ 
89a1(mdo): ste/ ba'i rnam lngas yongs su spyang bar bgyi'o// gnas de'i nang logs kyi dbus su dri'i dkyil 'khor bgyi'o// me tog gi sil ma bkram zhing bum pa gababs brgyan cing / spom snga
89a2(mdo): tshogs kyis bskos pa'i bdug pa gzhag par bgyi'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun tu stan bzang po bshams te/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas sprul skyil pa'i tshul du
89a3(mdo): zlum mor bskyil nas gzhag par bgyi'o// dbus su nor bu gzhag par bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang kis mchod par bgyi'o// don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu gcig bzlas brjod pagyis
89a4(mdo): nas/ 'khor khro bo'i rgyal po'i lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas badz+ra du bgyi'o// de nas don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ de'i 'og tu tsan dan dang / a ga ru dra
89a5(mdo): du ru ska'i bdug pa dbul zhing / nor bu la brtag par bgyi ste/ zhags pa dang / de thams cad nor bu'i nang nas rnga bar 'gyur ro/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnga ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpal
89a6(mdo): gda' ba 'am/ lha gda' ba 'am/ klu gda' ba 'am/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkhal lding dang / myi 'am ci rnga ba 'am/ 'byung po 'dang / lto 'phye chen po
89a7(mdo): dpa 'am/ g.yul 'gyed pa dpa 'am/ me ring ba rda ba 'am/ tshe nyams pa pa 'am/ tshe 'phos brnga ba 'am/ rgyal srid da pa 'am/ grong 'thob pa 'am/ yul thob pa 'am/ grong khyer 'thob
89a8(mdo): pa 'am/ dbyig dang / ser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang bye du r+ya dang / shang ka shi dang / byi ru dang / se le sAm dang / rdul dang / gos dang / lhab lbub dang / rgyan da pa 'am/ nor sgyur ba sla ba
89b1(mdo): 'am/ myig 'phrul smra ba 'am/ zhing smra ba 'am/ gter spa ba 'am/ 'bru smra ba 'am/ bud myed 'phrog pa 'am/ las grub pa 'am gas pa bsngags 'grub pa 'am/ dbang du bgyi ba 'am/ ngo man
89b2(mdo): ba de dag nor bu'i nang na rnga bar 'gyur zhing / dge ba 'am/ myi dge ba de thams cad rnga bar 'gyur ro// lo 'am lo byed dam/ gnod pa 'am/ 'tshe 'am/ yams sam/ myi ngas sam/ myi ngas chen
89b3(mdo): bo dang / phyugs sam/ kor ram/ rta nad dam/ glang po che'i nad dam/ rang gi dpung ngam/ gzhan gyi dpung gyis 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa chen po de dag thams cad me long kyi dkyil 'khor la
89b4(mdo): lta ba de bzhin du dra bar 'gyur lags so// kang bsams te/ nga gang gnyer ba grub pa 'am/ myi 'grub pa 'am/ dge ba 'am/ myi dge ba thams cad rnga bar 'gyur te/ de la the tsom dang
89b5(mdo): yid gnyis dang so pa nyi myi bgyi ste/ dngos po don gzhan du myi 'gyuraro// char myi 'bab pa'i dus su klu'i gnas su nor bu gzhag na/ ci tsam 'tshal bar char kyi rgyun 'bab par 'gyu
89b6(mdo): ha cang char ches na nam mkhal la nor bu bstan na/ char chen po 'chad par 'gyur ro// nyi ma 'chamakhas nyi ma la bstan na/ nyi sa la babs nas mchog thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro// phra ba tshes
89b7(mdo): pa la bstan na/ zla ba ches pa babs nas/ 'dod dkur thams cad kyi mchog grol bar bgyid do// chu rlung chen por bstan na rin po che rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// nags khung du bstand na/ smad
89b8(mdo): kyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas/ kang gnyer ba de len par 'gyur ro// ri phug tu bstan na sman thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur te/ ci 'chal ba de brang b.rabakyi'o/ 
90a1(mdo): 'bru'i phung po la bstan na/ 'bru thams cad du 'bar bar 'gyur ro// ka tu 'tshal ba der 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ma mo'i gnas sam/ nag po chen po la bstand te/ spyi bo'i
90a2(mdo): drug tu bzhag na nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas/ dbang du 'gyur zhing dgos pa dang / las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i mngon
90a3(mdo): sum du bstan na/ yan lag bzhi'i dpung dang bcas btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbyig dang gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tika dang / bye dur+ya dang / shang ka shi la dang / bi ru dang / sa le
90a4(mdo): sbram dang / rdul dang kos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / khang pa dang / ngo mtshar du bcas pa dbang du gyur da nas/ ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyid par
90a5(mdo): 'gyur ro// skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i nang du zhags pa/ 'phangs te/ don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i gzungs bzla/ sa na/ ji ltar 'tshal ba yid la bsams pa bzhin me
90a6(mdo): tog dang 'bras bu dang / gzhal myed khang 'bab par 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i rtse mor bzhag ste/ rgyal rigs kyi bor dbang bskur la/ khyim gyi steng ngam/ khyams su gzhag la 'pha
90a7(mdo): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas kyis sems can thams cad la mchog tu banye bar bgyi'o// don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ 'kho bo'i rgyal po lan
90a8(mdo): nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bgyi'o// de nas don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad gsang bstod de bzlas brjod bgyi'o// lan brgya rtsa brgyad chang nas/ ji ltar yid la bsams pa
90b1(mdo): bzhin char du 'bab par 'byung ngo ro// nor dang 'bru dang / kos dang / lAb lbub la tshogs pa me tog dang / 'bras bu'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / cod pa dang / 
90b2(mdo): 'gyed pa dang / mu ke'i danan pa'i 'jigs pa dang / yams dang gnod pa de dag thams cad 'phags pa yun ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus babs par 'gyur/ thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 
90b3(mdo): sems can thams cad la yid myi 'jigs pa thal bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang sha khon thams cad las tha rad par 'gyur ro// gdug pa nas gcan zan khro bo thams cad kyi bar du yang byams pa
90b4(mdo): la gnas par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad mthun pa rabagyid par 'gyur ro// yid kyi rnag pa thams cad yongasasu rdzog par 'gyur ro// // don yod yid bzhin
90b5(mdo): nor bu'i zhags pa chen po sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas rigs sngags 'chang ral gri dang / zhags pa sgrub pa/ ra 'chal na/ rigs sngags 'chang gis lcags chen po las
90b6(mdo): ral gri sor bcu drug gi tshad du bgyis la/ lag gzungs kyi ngo rdul las bgyis te/ gser gyis 'bar bar bri'o/ shing shun gyi skud pa dang / a rka'i skud pa dang / Sha tse dad kyi skud pa lhan cig tu
90b7(mdo): khru bcu drug byung ba shin tu tshad la bab par bkum pa sgrub pa'i dgos pa yongasu rdzogs pa la um sgril du bkal bar bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis legs par zhus bgyis te/ thang mas
90b8(mdo): kos grangs bgos te/ zhags pa dang / rab gri mnan la lag pa g.yas pas dkyil 'khor la bzhag ste/ bzung bar bgyi'o// 'khros pa'i 'kho gnyer gyi bzhin gis dkyil mo krung bcas te/ 
91a1(mdo): mchis nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun tu 'jo bo'i rgyal po lan stob rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod lan stong tshang nas
91a2(mdo): ral kri 'bar bar gyur nas rigs sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur zhing / ral gri grub pa'i rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi tso bor 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ngo ro// gzhan gyi mthus
91a3(mdo): zil kyis non par myi 'gyur ro// lo khri brgya stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'on te lag pa g.yon pas zhags pa bzung la/ g.yas pas ral gri bzung ste/ 'khros pas hUM zhes bgyi bas mnan na
91a4(mdo): myi rnga bar gyur nas myi rnga ba dang / zhags pa dang ral gri grub pa'i rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi tso bo rgyal po 'khor los sbyar bar 'gyur ro// tshe lo khri thub par 'gyur ro// 'on te
91a5(mdo): rigapa sngags 'chang 'khros pas/ ral kri bskor na/ tebagyegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin tho gdug pa thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi rigs sngan
91a6(mdo): bcad par 'gyur ro// g.yul gyi dbus su lan cig bskor na/ g.yul 'byed pa'i tshe mtshon cha thams cad gtubs par rengs par bgyis par 'gyur te/ thams cad phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur/ 
91a7(mdo): dur khrod kyi nang du bskor na/ dur khrod na gnas pa'i gdug pa rgyu ba thams cad kyi rigs sngags rngubs par 'gyur zhing / gnas thams cad stongs par 'gyur ro// phug gi sgor bskor na 'khrul
91a8(mdo): 'khor dang / sgo grags pa thams cad dkrugs par 'gyur ro// brtan pa thams cad chubs par 'gyur ro// gdug pa'i myi ma yin pa bar chad bgyid pa thams cad bcom par 'gyur/ thal bar rug
91b1(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos pa thams cad rnam pa zas cad du ji ltar 'tshal ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// / ral gri sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas rigs sngags la
91b2(mdo): sprul gyi zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang des sdud pa lnga las bsgrub ste/ tshon nyis la bsgyur ba'i skud pa tshad bzhin du tubs pa/ bsgrub par shin tu 'os pa las bsgrub
91b3(mdo): par bgyi'o// de nas zas bzang po'i phye ma dang / ban du'i me tog dang / gnyis pa'i me tog dang / ldong gros dang / pad ma ge sar dang / na ga pus pa dang / shing a rka'i 'o ma lhan cig tu sbyar
91b4(mdo): ba der bcag brtsal te/ dus gcig tu lhan cig mnyam du btags shing spyi bor legs par smras te/ de la don yod rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ sprul
91b5(mdo): 'khyil pa/ mgo bo gsum gyi gdengs ka can yongasu 'khyil pa gser gis g.yogs pa/ legs par spel ba ni/ zhags pa'i mchog lags so// rigs sngags 'tshang gis
91b6(mdo): legs par zhus bgyis la/ cang ma gos kyang sa bgos nas/ ba'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi tshad bzhin bgyis te/ dris mchod par bgyi'o// me tog gi si la ma dang / bum pa gang bas brgyan
91b7(mdo): par bgyi'o// bA dan kun rtsis brgyan par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su stan bzang po bshams te/ de'i steng du klu'i zhags pa bskyil nas gzhag par bgyi'o// sbrul gyi mgo bo'i
91b8(mdo): gdongs ka dbus ma ni/ kha shar phyogs su bstan no// dkar gsum gyi tor ma gzhag par bgyi'o// mchod yon dkar po'i snod dang / bdug pa rnam pa gsum po can dan dang / a ka ru da
92a1(mdo): du mug rnams bsreg so// 'bram yos dang / yungs kar bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ 'phags pa kyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du bzhag la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyi
92a2(mdo): te/ rigs sngags 'chang kyis dkyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas/ 'thul brjod mang du 'gyi'o/ thog ma don yod zhags pa'i snying po yan stob ca brgyad 'azlas brjod bgyis nas/ 'gro bo'i rgyas pa
92a3(mdo): lan stong lnga brgyad bzlas pa'i yungs kar re re la/ sprul pa'i mgo la tor ba pa brgya'o/ sprub pa thams cad chang nas ni/ rgyun tu sprul ni 'bar bar 'gyur/ stan las zhags pa g.yo ba ni/ sor bzhi
92a4(mdo): tsam gyi tshad du stan las gyen du 'phang bar 'gyur te/ de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis bzung nas/ myi gdal bar gyur da nas/ klu'i gnas su mchis te/ klu'i mtshor mchis na klu'i gnas
92a5(mdo): kyi sgo rnams dbye bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang / sa zhugs te/ don yod rgyal po bzlas nas/ sbrul gyi zhapas lan gsum du bskor bar bgyi'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po
92a6(mdo): btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa mchis nas/ rigs 'chang la mngon du smra bas/ rigs sngags 'chang gis zhugs shog ces smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis sbrul gi zhags pa
92a7(mdo): bzung ste/ bskor nas 'jug par bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis klu'i skyon de myi mthong zhing / nub par 'gyur ro// sgo gleg dang / rten pa thams cad rkubs shing bcag par 'gyur ro// zhug
92a8(mdo): btsam gyi yod la/ klu'i bu mo gzugs bzang ba mdzes ma rgyan thams cad kyis klubs ma mdzes ma mchis nas/ rin po che'i 'phreng ba thogs te/ rigs sngags 'chang la 'bul bar bgyid do// 
92b1(mdo): rig sa sngags 'chang gis blangs nas kyi bor bzhag ste/ gzhag pa tsam gyi yod la gru mo nam mkha' la 'phur nas// nu la gnyis nas 'o ma gzags nas/ rigs sngags 'chang gis bzed nas btung bar
92b2(mdo): bgyis te/ che lo nyi khri thub par 'gyur ro// swa cud 'khyil par 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// mthu dang brtson 'grus chen pos pha ro lod
92b3(mdo): gnon par 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis sbrul gyi zhags pa bzhag la/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po shing ka ra bi ra'i lkug pa la bzlas brjod de/ gang dang gang gi mying nas drangs shing yid
92b4(mdo): la bsams pas/ mod du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// char myi 'bab pa'i dus su sprul gyi zhags pa gnas mthon por bskor bar bgyi ste/ lan cig bskor ba tsam gyis char kyi rgyun
92b5(mdo): chen po 'bab bo// ha cang char che ba'i dus su sprul gyi zhags pa gnas mthon por bzhag na/ char ha cang che ba las 'chad par/ 'gyur ro// grang ba'i rlung ngam/ ser ba 'bab pa'i dus su nang
92b6(mdo): bar sngar klu'i zhags pa phyogs bzhir bskor na/ dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu ser ba 'bab par mya 'gyur te/ grang ba'i rlung dang / sor ba drag po thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// lo khyud kor tshang ba
92b7(mdo): 'tshams chen po bcings par 'gyur ro// nyin cig bzhin don yod rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ zhags pa lag pa g.yas pas bsdogs la lag pa g.yon pas bskrad par bgyis na
92b8(mdo): nyin cig bzhin zhal zas dang / btung ba/ 'dod dgur thams cad klu'i gnas nas byung nas/ skye bo stong stong tshal ma grol bar 'gyur ro// de'i dug thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis dug ma lags par 'gyur ro// 
93a1(mdo): sbrul gyi zhags pa lag pa g.yas pas bzung la lag pa g.yon pas klu bzung nas/ dpyid dam/ ston ka 'am/ srin chags pa'i dus su zhags pa bskor la 'khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod
93a2(mdo): bgyis te/ nam mkha' la phangs na me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog gang ci yang rung ba bzang po shind tu sbyin pa dang / kha zas shin tu bzang po thams cad nam mkha'i ngos las sa la 'bab par 'gyuraro/ 
93a3(mdo): gal te len nyi shu rtsa gcig bskor la/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis na/ klu'i gzhal byed khang dang / gos dang / lhab lbub dang / rgyang 'phyang dang / rgyan thams cad sa la/ 'bab par 'gyur ro// 
93a4(mdo): gal te rigs sngags 'chang kyis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig las lhag par bskor cing / 'khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de'i klu 'khor dang bcas pa gzhal khyed khang dang bcas par sa'i steng du ltung bar/ 
93a5(mdo): 'gyur ro// gal te rigs sngags 'chang gis rgyal po'i/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na// zhags pa bzhag la yungs kar la don yod rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad
93a6(mdo): bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ bsnun la de nas sbrul gyi zhags pa blangs te/ rgyal po'i khyim gyi phyogs gang lags pa der lhag par zhags pa bskor na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa
93a7(mdo): dbang du gyur nas/ kyi srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// g.yul 'byed pa na 'gro ba'i rgyal po 'azlas brjod pagyis nas/ zhags pa yul gyi dbus su 'phangs na/ sprul gdug pa byig dgrang
93a8(mdo): lce sgyur ba dmyig me mdag ltar dmar ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam gyi mod la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa phyogs bcur dbye bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i
93b1(mdo): don de lta de lta bur thams cad bsgrub par bgyid par 'gyur ro// / sbrul gyi zhags pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// de nas 'byung po'i dbang phyug gi zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ 'bri'i cing pa dang / 
93b2(mdo): cid pa chen po lhan cig tu bkal ba dang / lcags las mdupa che gsum pa sor bzhi'i tshad tsam du bgyis la/ de nas don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong tha brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na/ 'khro bo'i
93b3(mdo): rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas ste/ nyin zhag gcig mchis la legs par khrus pa gyis te/ chang mas gos thangs bgo bar bgyi'o// zla ba mar gyi ngo'i ches bcu bzhi'i nyin gcig kyis bsgrub pa
93b4(mdo): bgyi'o// de nas mdupa che rtse gsum pa'i zhags pa blangs na 'byung po'i dbang phyug gi gzugs dpa'adra bar 'gyur ro// dbyung po thams cad kyi bdag po lo stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ 
93b5(mdo): 'byung po'i gnas kyi gzhal myed 'ang thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// zhags pa lag par thogs nas/ dur khrod na gnas pa thams cad mdun du mchis te/ gnas kyi sgo zas
93b6(mdo): cad 'byed par 'gyur zhing / khyod ci dag rabazhugs shig ces mi 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro// ro'i 'gul du btags nas 'khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na/ de nas ro langs nas ci dris pa de smra bar
93b7(mdo): 'gyur zhing / tso bsgo ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro// bkrol na mchi bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gi mgul du btags so// 'khro ba'i rgyal po bzlas la zhes pas drangs nu/ gnod sbyid de yang bdun du
93b8(mdo): mtshos napa rigs sngags 'chang la/ rje bcun bka' macomad cig dang / thams cad bgyi'o zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'char kyis khyod ci srid mtsho'i bar du 'khro bo'i mngag gzhun
94a1(mdo): pe'i las kyis shig ces smra bar bgyi ste/ de nas bka' bzhin 'chal zhes de nas nyin cig bzhin bsgo ba bgyis nas/ las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin mo'i mgul du btaH/ 
94a2(mdo): te/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na/ gnod sbyin mo mchis nas rigs sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ rigs sngags 'chang la dbyig myi 'dzum par lta zhing / rigs sngags 'chang ci zhig don tu gnyer we
94a3(mdo): smra bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang gis kho bo la ma dang chung ma dang / sring mos sgrub par bya ba'i dgos pa gsum byo ba shig ces bsgo bar bgyi'o// kal te ma zhig tu bgyid na bu cig pa bzhin du baba' ba
94a4(mdo): dang / 'atung ba dang / mal dang / gos dang / nor dang / 'dra sa yongasu myong bar bgyid do// chung ma bzhin tu bgyid na/ kho ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis dbang phyug dang / bdag por ba
94a5(mdo): cing de dang lhag par dga' bar rtse bas phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyu ra ro// gal te sring mo zhig tu bgyid na/ yid la rnag pa/ 'i 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// dgos
94a6(mdo): pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// thams cad rgyug cing slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro// nyin cig bzhin lhab lbu ba dang / gos dang / rgyan rnams rtsol bar bgyid do// nyin gcig bzhin gzhan yang lha'i bu
94a7(mdo): mo dag med mo'i don tu 'gug par bgyid do// rnam thos kyi bkul tu btags te/ 'khros pas drangs nas 'khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de rnam thos mchis nas nyin cig bzhin dor tse stong
94a8(mdo): gsol bar 'gyur/ gser stong gsol bar 'gyur te/ des nyin cig bzhin sbyin pa yang sal/ bsod nams kyang bgyi'o// nag po chen po'i mgul du btags la/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzla/ 
94b1(mdo): brjod bgyis nas/ 'khros pas lag pa g.yas pa'i tha lug gis bdeg par bgyi'o// nag po chen pos sba phyung na rigs sngags 'chang skrag par myi bgyi bar slar yang 'khros pas bdegs par bgyi'o// de nas/ 
94b2(mdo): mchi ma zags pa dang / rigs sngags 'chang kyis mchi ma bzed de thig le bgyis na gyi gda' bar gyur na/ gter thams cad mthong bar gyur nas/ de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis yang thal mos brdegs
94b3(mdo): parabakyi ste/ de nas nags po chen po khrag tu spyug par rigs sngags 'chad kyis byugs na nam mkhal la mchis nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen por 'gyur ro// ku kul gyi bdug pas bdugs nas/ 'jo
94b4(mdo): bo'i rgyal po bzlas nas/ nag po chen po rang gi gzugs kyis ma dun na mchis nas/ ci tsam 'tshal ba'i mchog thams cad gsol ba ra bgyid cing / ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du
94b5(mdo): mchis par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang mi 'tshal ba bgyid pas/ dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// // mdung rtse gsum pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// 
94b6(mdo): de nas zhags pa dang rje su mthun pa'i ri mo cho ga de nyid bsgrub pa 'i cho ga bla na myed pa brjod par bgyi ste/ 'jig rten mgon pos sde tshogs pa'i// rnam pa'i kha tog gzugs bstand pa// sgyu ma lta bus
94b7(mdo): ting la 'dzind kyi// cho 'phrul sna tshogs gzugs bstand te// lag pa spong dang byig stong dang // mtha' yas pa'i phyag rgya bstan// rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs// khams gsum dag tu
94b8(mdo): bstand pa ni// gdul bya 'dul phyi gzugs bstand to// gsang ba 'di'i gzugs bstand pa// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// rigs sngags grub pa zla byed pa// de nyid zhags pa
95a1(mdo): sgrub phyir ro// de bas 'jig 'dzin shes rab can// 'jig rte nad pha rol rjes su mthun pa// sangs rgyas nyid don gnyer ba dang / de bzhin gshegs kun blta ba dang // bde can lta bar
95a2(mdo): 'chal ba dang // de nyid 'jig rten 'das pa'i// 'jig rtend dbang 'gon mthong 'tshal na// mchog tu gus par bgyi ba'i// cho ga'i rgyal po 'di brjod kyis de nyid gus par dad pa dang // shin da du dang
95a3(mdo): ba nyid du bgyi// grol ba sna tshogs 'tshal ba dang / sna tshogs pa'i gzugs bstan te// sna tshogs thabs kyis grol bar 'gyur// don yod rgyal po cho ga mchog/ don yod grub pa 'jig rten 'das
95a4(mdo): don yod 'bras bu dam pa po// don yod kun tu grub pa 'thob sangs rgyas kun kyis byin gyis brlabs// don yod 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa/ 
95a5(mdo): don yod 'jig rten ci 'tshal ba// mgon 'tshal ba ni spu/ kha par 'gyur// don yod rgyal chen rdzu 'phrul gyi// cho 'bru// la rnam 'phrul rgyun myi 'chang // de lta bas na kun bsgribs
95a6(mdo): te// bdag nyid yongasu dag bgyis nas// ji ltar go cha bkod pa bzhin// rjes su mthun par ri mo'i gzugs// rtag tu ri mo'i gzugs lta zhing // zhags pa gzugs ni sna tshogs dang / 
95a7(mdo): de bzhin 'khro bo'i rgyal po dang // rigs sngags rgyal po de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor lha dang me lha dang // sbyin sregs rlung lha chu lnga dang // 'khro bo'i gzugs dpa zhi pa dang // lha dang klu yang ston pa
95a8(mdo): dang // gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs dang ni// 'byung po lha myin dri za dang // nam mkha' lding dang myi 'am ci// lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs kun tu// 'jig rten mgon mchog kun sbyin bstan// 
95b1(mdo): gshin rje dang ni lus ngan dang // tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// gzhon nu dbang phyug lha dang ni// dbang phyug chen po nyi ma dang // zla gzugs spu skar ches grangs lha// 'di dag rnam pa
95b2(mdo): sna tshogs pa'i// gzugs su 'jig rten mgon pos bstan// sems cad rnams la phan 'tshal bas/ gdul ba'i don tu 'gro ba'i lam// sems can rnams la bstand pas na// de bas
95b3(mdo): som nyi nyid myi bgyi// mchog tu dad par bgyi ba lags// ji ltar mthun pa'i dgos pa rnams// ji ltar mthun pa nyid du bsgrub// ji ltar mthun pa'i ri mo'i gzugs// ji ltar mthun pa'i zhag/ 
95b4(mdo): pa sbub// gnas ni gang du 'os pa dang // gang du sems ni/ kar 'byung ba// goms pa gang gis phyag rgya dang // kang kau dkyil 'khor chad dbye ba// 'phags pa rgyan ras gzigs dang
95b5(mdo): 'gon// rtag tu sgrol ba 'dren pa'i tshe// don yod 'bras/ bu rtsol ba'o// don yod pa'i grub pa thob// don yod dgonapa thams cad dang // thub pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ni// mtsha
95b6(mdo): nyid la yang reg par 'gyur// / zhags pa dang ri mo sgrub pa'i cho ka'o// // de nas don yod pa'i las dang / dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad kyi sbyin sregs kyi cho ga bsgrub par bgyi
95b7(mdo): ste/ sdig pa thams cad mod la 'phrog pa/ sgrib pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ dgra thams cad 'joms pa/ bgyegs thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ gdug pa thams cad zlog pa'i mtshon/ 
95b8(mdo): thams cad mod la 'phrog pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal bcu drug las gol bar bgyid pa/ 'jigs pa myi bzad pa brgyad rtag tu 'phrog pa/ myi mdzas
96a1(mdo): rnams 'joms pa/ pha rol kyi dpung klog pa'i mchog/ nad thams cad 'joms pa/ mod la 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / thod pa dang / 'gyed pa zhi bar bgyid pa/ mu ke'i
96a2(mdo): dkon pa 'jig par bgyid pa/ yabs kyi nad dang / gnod pa 'joms pa/ lha'i bde ba 'dren par bgyid pa'i mchog/ de kho na nyid sangs rgyas sgrub pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na myed pa'i mchog
96a3(mdo): thams cad grub par bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad kyi thun mod kyi mchog sbyin shi nad tu snyed par dka' ba lha rnams rtag tu mgu bar 'gyur/ klu rnams dga' ba thob par 'gyur ba/ de bzhin
96a4(mdo): gshegs pa rnams nyin mtshan du gzigs par sdom nyi ma mchi sa pa/ byang chub sems dpal rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba/ dus kun tu shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas/ 'jig rtend dbang
96a5(mdo): phyug mchog sbyin rtag tu mchis par som nyi ma mchis pa/ rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa/ blon po dang bcas/ pa srung ba'i don tu/ thams cad rtag tu rjes su 'brang
96a6(mdo): bar 'gyur lags so// de nas rigs sngags 'chang shes rab dang ldan pas chang ma'i gnas su mchis nas sbyin sreg bgyi ste/ nga ma'i phyogs sam/ cacom mchis dben par zhi ba
96a7(mdo): ni rgyas pa dang // drag shul spyod pa rnams bgyi'o// zhi ba sems can thams cad kyi// don tu sdig po thams cad 'joms// rgyas pa rgyas pa thob 'gyur te// thams cad phun sum tshogs
96a8(mdo): par 'gyur// dgra dang log 'dren gdug pa dang // gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba bas// gdug sems can rnams bred pa dang // skrag pas sdig pa drag shul gyod// gsang sngags sgrub
96b1(mdo): ba'i sbyin theg ste// gsang ldanas sgrub pa bla na byed// 'jig rten 'jig rten pha rold kyi// sbyin srog gi ni las bgyi'o// me lA lha dang klu dang / de bzhin rig pa 'jig pa 'ang 'akus/ 
96b2(mdo): zhu thonas de la pad la'i tshul// pad ma rtag tu bri 'am bgyi// cho ga ji bzhin khung nang gi/ pad ma la ni ge sa bkyi// gru bzhi 'am ni bram po ste// de lta bur ni brko bar bgyi// legs
96b3(mdo): par byugs shing shin tu bdig/ shin tu sbas shing tshad la 'dabab// tshes grangs rgyu skar nyid dag kyang // shin tu bkra shis dag la bkye// bkra shis phyag rgya chen po'i// bzang po rtor ma
96b4(mdo): las bgyi'o// bdug pa me tog la sogs pa// @dang po dag ni 'khor bar dgod// 'og mar me lha bkug nas/ ni// de nas sbyin sregs las rnams bgyi'o// rig
96b5(mdo): 'chang ba chang gyur da pa// legs bkrus cang ma'i gosabagos nas// gsang sngags bzlas pa'i cho ga bgyi// de la 'tshams kyang bcing ba bgyi// bdag srung phrug tor
96b6(mdo): bcing ba dang // de bzhin grogs bgyid bsrung ba dang // rgyun tum rka'i shing snga ma nye ka/ dri'i shi pa rnams nyid dag dang // sar dang nyungs kar 'bras yos dang // nyi shu rtsa gcig dbul la me skong
96b7(mdo): de nas be lha dgug ko// / oMn ma aka ni dza la/ ma ha dza la/ d+yod snga b+ha man Na/ sa pa 'di a hu ti/ pra hu ti/ rag ni rang du shA dza la/ dru pa sha sa/ achin mra
96b8(mdo): ti bA/ ra smid pa a ga ni shu bid du ta sha na mu khan te/ sarba de ba na/ sarba ya kra ma ha naM byi rgya ma ha dza ba/ ma ha ba la ni ra min shan/ parbad han pra phu la/ sa ka sha sa mu ka ta ka sa sh+tsa/ a
97a1(mdo): sang ka shan/ man Ta la bu dzi to// ma ni ta sarbad da bi bya ru pa/ pi sha da/ ma pa ha na/ sarba da tri de ba hu ta/ sha na tu ta/ sha na ta ma si b+hi da ma kan/ an ka ran mug ta ra
97a2(mdo): shI na pri yang gu kan d+ha pa la ha ra/ ra sa ra sa a gra dza/ suka smA su tig shA sh+tsa/ mri ta san dzi bi na/ pri yo bA yA b+hash+masta tsa b+ha shwa ba ne/ se pa kam/ b+he swa san tsa/ dA nid t+yan hU ma ma gu la
97a3(mdo): dza ya se/ ba ka sid dA ra/ sa gra tsa sarba da tra pra d+ha pa rai sha/ sa rbad tra nar mo ni sha No/ nid t+ya sIShA na ma mun dza si/ dra tid sha/ ba bA no de ba a ga ni/ mu kha de ba ta/ ma ru tsi ru/ dza ba la/ 
97a4(mdo): ba drA ka ma ha na ta/ a tha pa ra No/ de ba de ban pi sha ra/ de sa yan du sa shiM g+ha kar ma sa ta ya/ trad dra ta/ au dza la dza la// tri sha sa ma yan/ tsu ru hu ru hUM phaT sA hA// 
97a5(mdo): gsang sngags 'dis ni lan bdun du bzlas nas me ni da kug par bgyi// ku gul yungs kar mar sbyar ba// / s+phar/ bdun spar bar me la dbul// mchod yon sdod nas
97a6(mdo): 'bul ba yang // de bzhin spar ba'i spang bas so// dri rnams dang ni byug pa dang // gdug pa rgya chen 'bul bar bgyi// de bzhin 'bras bu spang bas dbul// de nas chab kyis bsang ba
97a7(mdo): bkye// ci ltar lha rnams rims bzhin du// nye reg dag kyang dbus par bgyi// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis su// sbyin sregs las ni yang dag bcam// dri zhim zhin tu dag pa dang / 
97a8(mdo): zag ga su dru ba pa dang / sna ma'i me tog cam pa dang // gad da ga pa nyid dag dang // pad ma mud pa la yang shi // de bzhin rjegada'i yi na da dang// byang dru ljon zhing shing dag dang // de bzhin
97b1(mdo): gzhan gang dri gda'i shing // 'on te 'bras bu'i zhing yang dang // sha myi zhi ba'i las lags pas// mchod yon de bzhin pa dag dang // de dag gis ni me sbar nas// sbyid sregs kyi ni las bsko// 
97b2(mdo): 'bras yos tsan dan phye ma dang // a ka ru dang du ru ska// kun tu ru la sogs pa dang // du ru skar bcas sri ka dang // spang spos pri yang ku blangs te// de dag lhan cig sbyar bsregs shing // 
97b3(mdo): mar ram a ra sar lhan cig brdzil// don yod rgyal po'i gsang sngags ni/ 6/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas me la dbul// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du lan stong sa brgyad kyi
97b4(mdo): sbyin sregs bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / me da lha rang gi gzugs 'bar bar shi nad tu gnas pa langs nas// phyogs bcur lto zhib/ kun tu brtags nas// rig
97b5(mdo): sngags 'chang legs so zhes bgyi ba krol bar 'gyur te/ rigs sngags 'chang legs so legs so// bdag tshim parabyas pas/ rig pa sngags 'tshang khyod kyis sbyin bsrem
97b6(mdo): kyi cho ga grub kyis/ mchog spongs shig dang / thams cad sbyin no// de nas rigs sngags 'chad kyis ji lta bu'i 'dod pa'i mchog rnamapa bslang bar bgyi ste/ ji ltar spangs pa bzhin thams cad
97b7(mdo): rtsol bar bgyid// de nas rigs sngags 'tshang kyis mchod yon gyi snod dag dbul zhing / rtor ma dbul ba'i las kyang bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chad kyis mar dang bsres pa'i gong bu chen po
97b8(mdo): dag gis sbyin sregs bgyi zhing / 'bras bu'i shing sbar nas/ don yod 'gas pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / zab kyi dbus nas skyes pa zhig lus phyed
98a1(mdo): tsas phyung nas/ rdul gyi gzhong pa kha zas kyis bkang ste/ pus mo nub tsam du dbul bar bgyid do// rigs sngags 'chad kyis blang bar bgyi ste/ blangs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la 'phur bar
98a2(mdo): 'gyur zhing / rigs sngags 'chad kyi lus las me 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de 'tshal na tshe lo khrir 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i rigs sngags 'chad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa
98a3(mdo): bcu chud kyis sngon gyi skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// don yod rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor kha ton tu gnas par 'gyur ro// gal te sdod myi len ma de'i tshe yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sregs
98a4(mdo): bgyis na/ sa cher kayo bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras/ zig sa rAng kI gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas/ rigs sngags chang la dbugs 'byin par bgyid de/ rigs sngags 'chang
98a5(mdo): legs so legs so// rigs sngags 'chang khyod kyis n+yoH/ de bsgrub sa zin gyis mchog spongs shika dang / sbyin no zhes de'i tshe/ rigs sngags 'chang gis ji bsams pa'i mchog spras pa/ 
98a6(mdo): de'i tshe chos thams cad rtsol bar bgyid do// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis skyes pa de las snod blangs te/ rang gi lag nas rigs 'chang la grol bar bgyid do// rigs sngags 'chang kyis blangs
98a7(mdo): nas/ zas kyi gong du de bza' bar bgyi'o// 'tshal ba tsam gyi yod la nam mkhal la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro// yul las me'i snying po 'bar ba'i kha tog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don yod rgyal
98a8(mdo): po'i rigs 'dzin 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bas po drug pa'o// 
98b1(mdo): gang ka'i klung gi bye ba zhi phrag brgya thong la gnyis kyi phye ma dang mnyam pa'i rigs sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los sbyar ba rnams kyi rigs sngags 'chang kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// gang ka'i klung kyi byos brgya song / 
98b2(mdo): rgu bcu gnyis kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i gnas kyi gzhal myed khang don yod rab tu gnas pa'i gnas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal myed khang ri dang tshal dang nags tshal dang bcas pa me tog dang
98b3(mdo): 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs yal ga dang / sbal myig dang / lo ma dang / rtsa ba dang / myu gur bcas pa'i kha cig ni gser gi me tog/ kha cig ni rdul gyi me tog/ kha cig ni rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i me
98b4(mdo): tog dag go// gzhan yang lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs sul dang tu ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / lkug ma'i me tog dang / ta la dang kun dra bar shi ka dang / snga ma dang / yu ti dang / ta ran dang / 
98b5(mdo): kub bya ka'i me tog dag dang / tshal dang / nags tshal dang / skye/ da mos tshal dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gnas kyi gzhal myed khang gyis/ mdzes par bgyes pa'i gzhal byed khang thams cad 'byung bar
98b6(mdo): 'gyur zhing / dka' ba dang / yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro// lha'i chu rlung dang / 'bab chu dang / rdzing lha'i tsan dan gyi dri'i chab kyis yongs su gang ba de la/ rin po che sna bdun gyis byung ba'i gzhal myed khang dang / lha'i
98b7(mdo): pad ma dang / ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar pos legs par brgyan pa'i kaser gyi bye ma legs par brdal ba'i gzhal byed khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu mo dang / myi 'am ci'i mo'i chog
98b8(mdo): kyis dga' bar bgyis pa/ lha dang lha ma yin dang / dri ba dang / klu dang / rigs 'dzind dang / phyi 'am ci'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor zhing / lha'i 'byor pa'i gzhal byed khang legs par bstabs pa'i gnas na/ 
99a1(mdo): thams cad du che bar bgyid pa/ dka' bar bgyid pa/ dka' makur gyod par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la thug pa nas/ byang chub la mchis kyi bar dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas/ 
99a2(mdo): yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du ci'i chang gcig ca du sbyong bar bgyid do// de bzhin du grub pa tha na byed pa chen po 'phags pa kun ngas gshigs dbang phyug nyid byang chu kyi snying po la bug gi bar du/ katu
99a3(mdo): 'brang bar 'gyur te/ de ltar zas kyi gong du sgrub pa'i cho ga shin tu rnyed par dka' lags so// phyogs bcu mtha' dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / lhan cig 'grogs nas
99a4(mdo): mchi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las man gsum du chos nyan pa thos par 'gyur ro// de'i 'od zer 'bar ba 'i snying pos stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten kyi khams
99a5(mdo): snang bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa 'phags pa spyan/ ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po/ byang chub sems dpa' tha/ mas cad kyis phyag bgyis bgyis pa/ rnam par grol ba'i
99a6(mdo): dkyil 'khor gyi gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par sgrub pa'i cho ga thams cad dang / cho ga she ba mo mtha' dag gi dkyil 'khor 'di kha ton du gnas par 'gyur/ 
99a7(mdo): lags so// klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag brgya stong rnams de'i dbang du gyurd nas/ rtag par rgyu nad tu mchis par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
99a8(mdo): lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dbang du gyurd nas/ mchis par 'gyur ro// 'og rkyen gyi gnas kyi lha rnams rigs sngags 'chang de'i phyi bzhin du rtag tu 'bra ba zhing / rtag par rgyun tu yod
99b1(mdo): bskor bar 'gyur ro// lha'i ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i gzhal myed khang rnam pa sna tshogs dag lhun gyis grub par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gos dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / ldan
99b2(mdo): ba'i gzhal myed khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la batshogs pa sbyin sregs kyi cho ga don yod pa bsgrub pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i grub pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'on te skal ba chung ngam/ sangs rgyas dang / 
99b3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sa bon ma mchis pa zhig mchis pa zhig mchis sam/ des snod de blangs pa tsam gyis mod la/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thob par 'gyur te/ lha dang myi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ 
99b4(mdo): reg pa tsam gyi mod la tshe lha'i lo brgyad khri bzhi stong thub par 'gyur ro// de la phyis kyang nad 'byung bar myi 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa rnams kyis nyon mongs par myi 'gyur ro// phas kyi rgol
99b5(mdo): ba dang / myi mdza' ba dang / gdug pa dang / rab tu gtug po/ thams cad nub par 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi
99b6(mdo): dgas kyi yul thams cad las yongs su krol bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi mchod gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro// bud byed dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / sems can
99b7(mdo): thams cad lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// tshig brtsan zhing don yod pa thob par 'gyur ro// mgum pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs bzhed par
99b8(mdo): 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ram gzigs dbang byug mngon sum du mngon par 'gyur ro// dran bzhin tu nye bar gzhazhanas/ dus bgyid par 'gyur ro// dus bgyis ma zhal pas nyam par 'jig
100a1(mdo): kyi khams bde bcan du skye bar 'gyur ro// bdes las nupa te skye bar 'gyur zhing / skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// lan 'gal yang phyi ma ngan song du mchi bar myi 'gyur te// phyim ma
100a2(mdo): mngal du skye bar myi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blta ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rtag tu mchi bar 'gyur
100a3(mdo): bral bar thig le bgyis na thams cad du myi gda' bar 'gyur ro// me lha rtag par rgyun tu dran pa tsam gyis rang kyi gzugs kyi mdun na mchis nas/ mchog thams cad gsol bar 'gyur ro// dgos pa thos
100a4(mdo): cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas don yod dgos pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang des 'bras bu dang / kul ma shar bsres te/ bsgral la ba spongs nas mer dang 'bru mar dang
100a5(mdo): sha ka ra dang / spang rdzi lhan cig brdzis nas bil ba'i tshad tsam/ du bgyis ste/ de'i 'og tu shing ka ra bi ra'i me spar nas/ bskongs pa de dag lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ me'i nang
100a6(mdo): du sbyin sreg bgyi ste/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sregs bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chad kyis yungs kar dang / me tog ji snyed pa dang bsres te/ lan nyi shu rtsa ka tsa
100a7(mdo): bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ me'i dbus su gsal bar bgyi'o// 'bras yos dang / yungs kar la 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas rtor bar bgyi'o// de nas me'i dbus nas me lha
100a8(mdo): lus phyed tsam phyung nas/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i snod zas bsgongs pas bkang nas/ rigs sngags 'chang la/ rigs sngags 'chang khyod kyis zas bsgongs pa sgrub pa'i cho ga grub zin gyi
100b1(mdo): lha'i zas bskongs pa chen po long zhig ces stobs par bgyid do// de nas rigs sngags 'chad kyis zas bskongs nas sdod de blang bar bgyi'o// blangs pa tsam kho nas bcud kyis len par gyurar nas/ nam
100b2(mdo): mkha' 'phur bar 'gyur ro// sgra cung zad 'khyil par yang 'gyur ro// pakas pa yongs su dag par yang 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang gi
100b3(mdo): 'khor los sgyur ba drug khri brgyad stong gis yongasu bskor bar 'gyur ro// me lA ga nas gzhal myed khang dang bcas pa 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du mchis nas/ las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// 
100b4(mdo): gang dang gang gos zas bsgongs pa la reg pa de yang thos pa brtsegs pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro// don yod zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par
100b5(mdo): grol ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / gsang sngag/ rim par phyed pa dang / bcas pa cho ga zhi ba mo mtha dag rdzogs/ par kha ton du gnas pa dang / 'di nyin cig bzhin du shu
100b6(mdo): log stong klog kam/ 'chang bar bgyid na/ tshe rjes nas 'a jig rten gi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad ma la rdzus to// skyes nas skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang phyis
100b7(mdo): dran pa brjed par myi 'gyur ro// tshig btsun par 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// mchod pa chen po'i 'os su 'gyur ro// bral ba la thig le bgyis na myi dbar/ 
100b8(mdo): gyur nas/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dbang du gyur nas/ gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// bud myed gang zhig bu'i ched du zas bsgongs pa de 'tshal na
101a1(mdo): thugatsunas patha sa sedzes pa bsas thug pa/ mnyan pa zang po rgyam pa mchog dang ldan pa rnyed nas/ sun ring du 'tsho zhing yid gsungs pa dang mkhas pa dang / bstan macos pams cad la
101a2(mdo): ma pa 'gyung // de nas skye bo 'bum zas thal par 'ams / lo la'i thug pa 'phrub pa kyi ste/ gnas gtsangs gcom pabyungs par shrI ga dbyi 'i lkugasas dkun ci dang yang
101a3(mdo): 'i snang pa'i gsang ldan su brjod par bgyis/ denas 'gro ba'i rgyam po che ba dang nyungs kangs bzlab brjod bkyis nas tshor bar 'gyi'o// denas pas barmongs pacig thaMd kyin nas byung nas/ 'thun / 
101a4(mdo): nang du tha lad to// de nas char 'gos te/ thog mar dkon dmachog gsum la bsod snyoms dbul bar bgyi'o// de'i 'o// tu byang chub sems dpal 'phags pa byan ras gzigs dbang
101a5(mdo): phyug la dbul bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu 'phags pa 'ja ma dpal la dbul bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu dge slong dang bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs
101a6(mdo): rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud byed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang / bkren pa dang / sdug 'phongs pa dang / lam gyis dub pa dang / slongs mo pa rnams la rab tu gsal bar bgyi'o/ 
101a7(mdo): ci tsam du skye bo 'bum ci 'tshal bar kha zas 'tshal du rtsal kyang / snod de gang ba 'am bri bar myi mngon zhing de dras par myi 'gyur ro// gang dag zas de 'tshal bar de dag sngon gyi sdig pa dang / sgrib
101a8(mdo): ba dang / chad pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad dam/ phas kyi rgol ba dang / mye mdza ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis tshugs
101b1(mdo): bar gyi 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis myi tshugs par 'gyur ro// lus mnyen cing 'jam par 'gyur ro// nga ro lta ltar mnyen zhing snyan pa dang / 
101b2(mdo): dka' bar bgyid pa/ kye ma yin pa'i dbyangs su 'gyur ro// rtag tu dub pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro// rtag tu ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de yang dag par spobs par 'gyur
101b3(mdo): che rjes nas bde 'gro thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'o ma'i phug pas lhung bzed bkang nas/ de gnas mthon por zag pa byed pa pa dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag ngas
101b4(mdo): phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lhung bzed de/ dbul bar bgyi'o// phul ba tsam gyi mod la chu bo gang ka bye ba 'bum phrag brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
101b5(mdo): kyi zhing gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ de bani na gshegs pa'i re re'i phyad sngar lnga'i zhal bas lo brgya dang lnga/ na pa'i lha'i zas barmongs pa dang / lhol lo thug gis srung zed/ 
101b6(mdo): bkang ba dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor lha'i me tog sil ma bkram pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ 
101b7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa la lha'i zhal bas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i mchog gis bsgrubs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'khod kyi dkyis 'khor dang bcas pa/ byang chub sa
101b8(mdo): dpa'i tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis rigs sngags 'chang yon bdag de'i yon spyod bar mdzad do// gang gi phyir yon spangs nas bskal pa dang / mthun pa'i tshe
102a1(mdo): 'di nyid dang / gzhan du na dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur ro// grub pa chen po'i gser gyis 'byor da par 'gyur ro// mdzod dang / bang mdzod mang pos rgyas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin
102a2(mdo): gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// 
102a3(mdo): de nas rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa/ dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang des legs par khrus bgyis te/ wang mas gos cang ma bgos nas/ 'o
102a4(mdo): thug mar dang bsres pa'i das lan brgya pa brgyad sbyin sregs pabyi'o smon shing dang / ma rga'i shing gi yam sreg shing kyis e sbar bar ba dkyi'o// sbyin sregs lan spong dang ba dang / rgyal po'i btsun
102a5(mdo): mo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa bad/ ga nyid dam/ nor du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// nub gsum du bgyis na/ klu'i rgyal po thams cad gnas pa dang
102a6(mdo): 'khor du bcas pa dbang du gyur nas/ mchis par 'gyur ro// nub lngar bgyis na 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / byi 'am ci dang / lto
102a7(mdo): 'phye chen po dang / myi ma lags pa thams cad dang / myi thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyurd nas/ mchis par 'gyur ro// nub bdun du bgyis na/ rigs 'dzin thams cad dbang du gyur nas
102a8(mdo): mchis par 'gyur ro// nub sems cad du bgyid na/ brgya byin la tshogs te/ sum bcu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs thams cad dang / cang ma'i lha'i bu mo rnams babs nA/ 
102b1(mdo): dba'adu gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bzhin bkur ba gyid cingasams par 'gyu // za ba nyanas brtsams te/ mar bya nga'i nyi shu gsum 'am/ gnam ska gi bar du dus gsung dulan nyi bu phya gci byung/ 
102b2(mdo): theg pa gyos la/ ma rka'i shing gi lam sreg zhing gis e s+phang nas/ gnas stong gis rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis mdun du mchis nas/ rigs sngags 'chang leg ma che/ 
102b3(mdo): nem bgyi bar thol bar bgyid de/ rigs lpags 'chang legs so legs so// nga mnyes par byas kyis/ rigs sngags 'cha smom zhig dang / mchog sbyin te/ gang gnyer ba de thams cad sbyin no// 
102b4(mdo): gter smras pa 'am/ nor sbyar ba smras pa 'am/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/ myi snang bar bya ba 'am/ kasang sngags spa ba laHcho ga zhib mo 'grub pa de dag thams cad sbyin no// rgyal po
102b5(mdo): nyid dam/ blon po nyid dmang / yul gyi bdag po nyid dam/ phyug po nyid dam/ grol rdal 'thob pa 'am/ kos 'thob pa 'am/ ba lang dang / rta dang / ma he dang / rnga mo dang / lus
102b6(mdo): 'thob pa 'am/ nor 'thob pa 'am/ 'bru thob pa de dag thams cad sbyin no// nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/ myi snang bar bya ba 'am/ rdzu 'phrul thob pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa 'am/ gzungs 'thob pa la
102b7(mdo): phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo bsgrub pa 'am/ nor blang bar bya ba 'am/ rigs 'dzin grub pa nyid dam/ ral gri'i rigs 'dzin nyid dam/ nam mkha'i rigs 'dzin nyid dam/ phug tu 'jug pa
102b8(mdo): 'am/ dur khrod du 'jug pa 'am/ nags su 'jug pa 'am/ ri la rgyu ba de dag thams cad sbyin no// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsams shing smras pa/ de dag thams cad rtsol bar
103a1(mdo): bgyid do// rigs sngags 'chang la bstan pa tsam gyi mod la/ dri myed don yod lta ba zhes bya ba'i lus yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// tshe rjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can
103a2(mdo): du skye bar 'gyur ro// pad ma'i ze ba'i dbus nas brdzus te/ pad ma las skyes nas/ skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag
103a3(mdo): bgyis pa/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par bye ba dang bcas pa/ cho ga zhim mo mtha' dag dang / bcas pa 'di rdzogs te/ byang chub kyi snying po la zug gi bar du
103a4(mdo): kha ton du gnas par bgyi'o// de nas la tu'i sbyin sregs kyi cho ga sgrub pa grub par 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang des zas las la tu stong pa brgyad bgyis la/ de nas rigs sngags
103a5(mdo): 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong pa ba/ rgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas legs par khrus bgyis ste/ cha mas gos chang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// de nas la
103a6(mdo): tu mar dang bsres te sbyin sregs bgyi'o// shin tu dri zhim po'i shing gi yam sreg shing gi me spang bar bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / me'i dbus nas khye'u zhig byung nas/ snod lha'i la tus bkang nas
103a7(mdo): dbul bar bgyid do// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas te/ khye'u de'i la tu la rtor ro// khye'u des rigs sngags 'chang la smras pa/ rigs sngags 'chang ji zhig don tu
103a8(mdo): gnyer/ rigs sngags 'chang gis 'dod pa thams cad byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// des smras pa/ rigs sngags 'chang snod kyi la tu khyer cig dang / 'dis khyed kyi dgos pa dpag tu myed pa 'dra
103b1(mdo): par 'gyur ro// 'di ni khyod kyi bcud kyi mchog yin no// rigs sngags 'chang long zhig 'di khyod kyi grub pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis sdod gang ba de blangs te/ khye'u la yang
103b2(mdo): khyod kyis kho bo'i grogs gis shig ces brjod par bgyi'o// khye'u'i sa smras pa/ dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa'i grogs bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang kang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe/ ku gul dang
103b3(mdo): da ldan cin bzlas pa/ bar dang cung bkar du byamams da med ga rgyal lan bdun 'thas te/ mazlas brjod 'gyu'o// mthal zhing gis sa ma // sbyin thegs bkyis pa mi byab
103b4(mdo): la bdag bkug pas mod la mchis nas dgos pa thams cad sgrub par bgyi'o// las thams cad bgyi'o// ji srid 'tsho'i ba du bsnyen bkur gyis mchis shing bkur stir khyad par 'gyi'o// 
103b5(mdo): brtsegs dpa log 'dren dang 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o// de nas rigs sngags la chang gis la du de la reg pa 'gyis nas/ nam mkhalas
103b6(mdo): 'phur nas/ rigs sngags thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor lo sbyar bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sbyar ba ma ya phrag gnyis dang
103b7(mdo): bye ba phrag 'dun gyis yongasu bskor bar 'gyur ro// tshe'i ched lha'i skal pa drug khrir 'gyur ro// sA cung 'ad 'khyil par yang 'gyur ro// la ru lung zed kyi nang du phal te/ 'phags pa byan ram gzigs dang
103b8(mdo): byug gi mdun du bzhag nas/ don yod rgyal po 'gro bos dbang bskur te/ de nas dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rde'u rigs dang / mangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud myed dang
104a1(mdo): khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad 'artsal bar bgyi ste/ longs spyod du phal kya bas par gyi 'gyur ro// sbar zhing slar zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ji srid du lhung zer na ya du mchis pa de srid du
104a2(mdo): 'phel bar 'gyur te/ de srid du skye bo 'bum mang zhing 'phel che bar thal kyang zhugs par gyi 'gyur ro// la hu la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de'i 'og tu reg pa de
104a3(mdo): yang gsem bzang por 'gyur ro// la tul lan bdun bzlas brjod 'gyis te/ klu'i gnas su 'phangs na/ de'i me rgya mtsho chen po'i mthar gtugs pa'i klu'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas
104a4(mdo): mchis par 'gyur te/ bsgo na char myi 'bab pa'i bsgo ba bzhi na char 'byebs par bgyid do/ ci bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// ha cang char ches na bsgo ba bzhin/ ha cang char chen po
104a5(mdo): 'gums par bgyid do// rlung dang grang ba dang tsha ba dang / ser/ ba thams cad bsgo ba tsam gyis gcod par 'gyur ro// phug ka sgor la tu la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ phug gi
104a6(mdo): sgor bsrun na mug gi sgothams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro// le'u la 'khor dang btan pa dang go theg thams cad dus bur bcag par 'gyur ro// gnas na gnas pa thams cad phyir byung nas/ rigs sngas
104a7(mdo): 'chang gi mdun du mchis te/ bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// nags chang tshing gi dbus su 'phangs nas/ nags chang tshing gi gnas gi sgo thams cad bye nas/ sman gi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzug
104a8(mdo): kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// la tu la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dur khror chen po'i dbus su 'phangs na/ 'byung po dang / god sbyin dang / srin po dang / bcas pa'i gnas kyi sgo zas
104b1(mdo): cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad spen mor gyur nas/ thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur zhing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin mchis par 'gyur/ 
104b2(mdo): mam byung ba'i myi ro dri chab kyis khrus bgyis la/ la tu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lag pa gnyis su la tu phal la/ kos kar pos ro g.yogs nas/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po yungs
104b3(mdo): kar dang / chab la lan bdun bzlas nas/ dbang bskur na/ ci dris pa de thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ bde ba dang lo legs pa dang / lo nongs pa dang / nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'che ba dang pha rol dkyi
104b4(mdo): dpung dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / myi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa dang / myi ngas dang / sems kyi nad de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyuro/ lha'i 'jig rtend du skye ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba
104b5(mdo): smra bar 'gyur ro// dmyal bar skye ba smra bar 'gyur ro// ring ba 'am tshe zung ba smra bar 'gyur ro// dus ma lags pa'o// 'chi ba smra bar 'gyur ro/ rteng gi rtam smra bar 'gyur te/ 
104b6(mdo): nor sbyar ba'i rta ma 'am/ zhing kai rtam 'am/ myig 'phrul gyi rtom smra bar 'gyur ro// cho ga zhib mo'i grub pa dang / gsang sngags 'grub pa dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'grub pa smra bar 'gyur ro
104b7(mdo): dmyig 'phrul 'grub pa smra bar 'gyur ro// nam mkhal la mchi ba dang / myi gdal bar bgyi ba dang / ro sangs bslang ba dang / rims bkag pa dang / dgra chad pas gcad cing dbang du bgyi ba de thams
104b8(mdo): pad smra bar 'gyur ro// smra thams cad smra bar 'gyung ngo ro// nyams pa smra bar 'gyur ro// 'phel ba smra bar 'gyur ba nas/ bskas pa las 'das pa'i 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung
105a1(mdo): 6ba'i bar du smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis chab kyis kham thal na/ la du blangs na mo 'phel bar 'gyur ro// la tu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas
105a2(mdo): rgyal po'i sgor bsnun na/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam/ nor bu bdag tu gyur da nas mchis par 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi sgor bsnun na/ grong khyer na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang / bud
105a3(mdo): byed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur zhing / nor chen po 'du ba 'grub par 'gyur ro// mchod gnas chen por 'gyur ro// la tu la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te
105a4(mdo): dpal lha mo chen po'i lag par gsal na/ dpal lha mo chen mo dbang du gyurd nas/ nor chen po tshol cing / ci srid mtsho'i ru du mchis par 'gyur ro// la tu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
