105a5(mdo): brjod bgyis nas/ khug ma'i nang du rtsal te mtshan khung du bsgre la bar bgyi ste/ ci tsam du bsrel ba de srid du myi gda' bar rgyu/ rad nas/ kang du btsal ba der 'jug par 'gyur ro// 
105a6(mdo): gang na shing gcig gam 'bab chu gcig par la du la 'khro bo'i rgya la po lan nyi shu phra gcig bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ dbang bskur nas shing gi drung du brdegs na/ 'dod nur sbyar ba thams cad dbang du
105a7(mdo): gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// ji ltar bsams pa'i 'dod pa thams cad nye bar mchis nas/ yongs su gyod pa dang / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// la du la lan nyi shu bzlas bcwo/ 
105a8(mdo): bgyis te/ ma mo'i gnas su nag po chen po'i phyi bo'i thug tu bzhag la/ 'khro bo'i rgyal lo lan 'dun 'bras te/ chab dang yungs kar kis dbang bsku bgyis na/ de nas spyor ba mo khams
105b1(mdo): cad dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du gyur da nas/ mngag gzhug pa las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// la tu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ nag po chen po'i lte ba'i phyogs su bzhag na
105b2(mdo): ma mo'i tshogs thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas mchog thams cad rtsol bar 'gyur ro// las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// la tu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ 
105b3(mdo): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi lhung bzed kyi nang du stsal te/ 'khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bsrung bgyis nas/ ci srid du lhung bzed nal du mchis pa de srid du/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
105b4(mdo): kyi spyan sngar lha'i zhal zas ro sna tshogs kyi ro'i mchog dang ldan ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang bcas pa tshim par bgyi
105b5(mdo): par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas/ ba de dag gis rigs sngags 'chang de'i yon spyod par mdzad
105b6(mdo): par 'gyur ro// la tu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ 'jo bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur la/ lcags kyu'i rgyal pos chab la bzlas brjod bkyes naswA/ me thab kyi mtshams bcing ba pa brgyan
105b7(mdo): de nas a rka'i yam shing gis me spar la/ la tu de me zab kyi dbus su bzhag ste mar dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / spang rtsis bsres pas/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sregs bkye'o// lan brgya
105b8(mdo): brgyad tshang ba dang / me lha me'i rang bzhin gyi gzugs kyis byung nas/ rigs sngags 'chang la smras pa/ rigs sngags 'chang legs so legs so// bdag tshim par byas so// bdag dka'
106a1(mdo): par gyur to// rigs sngags 'chang gis mchog tu dgal 'thob kyis yin pa sngags 'chang mi ltar yid la bsams shing / 'dod pa spros shig dang mchog sbyin no// rigs sngags kyis ji
106a2(mdo): ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin mchog brjod par bgyi'o// me lha des kyang thams cad tshol cing dbang du gyurd nas mchis par 'gyur ro// las thams cad grub pa tshol bar 'gyur ro// me'i phung po'i dbusu
106a3(mdo): zhugs nas/ 'od zer stong 'phro ba rnams grangs bzhin du bsil bar gyur te/ chab nas 'byung ba bzhin no// lag pas me rnams 'tshig par bgyid do// 'bar bzhin du klad pa'i gyi bor bzhag na sA
106a4(mdo): nyag ma gcig kyang 'tshig par myi bgyid do// me'i dbang dumachi bar myi 'gyur ro// 'bar bzhin du g.yar ki nang du bsrel na cung zad dro ba tsam du yang myi 'gyur ro// lus la bab na dza
106a5(mdo): ltar tsan dan bzhin du bsil zhing bde bar 'gyur ro// zhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs bgyid par 'gyur ro// gos kyi/ mtha' mar zlum po bgyis na tshig par myi 'gyur ro// chab
106a6(mdo): kyi nang du gsal na 'gum par gyi 'gyur ro// sbyin sregs thams cad kyi cho ga so so'i gzugs su mchis par 'gyur ro// thams cad du dgos pa 'grub pa gsol bar 'gyur ro// dgos pa gang dang
106a7(mdo): gang du bskos pa de dang der dgos pa 'grub par grol bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga grub pa thams cad lung 'bog par 'gyur ro// du ba dang / rlung dang / 
106a8(mdo): me 'bar ba'i shugs kyis dpag tshad stong du mchis shing / slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad nye bar stond par 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// zas
106b1(mdo): grub pa thol bar 'gyur ro// de nas don yod me 'bar ba// bla byed 'bar bzang sgrub 'tshal da / yid bzhin nor bu lta bu dang // ka'i brjid nyi ma dang mnyam pas/ phyogs bcu long 'or yug gi// kun
106b2(mdo): nas su ni gsang bar bgyid// sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang // 'tshed pa bla na myed pa 'grub// bcud kyi mchog ste/ dam pa lags// nor bsgyur smra ba bla na byed// gzhan yang 'tshed pa sna tshogs pa
106b3(mdo): grub pa bla na myed pa lags// ji ltar nyin bzhin mtshan 'da' bas/ nyin par gyi ni gdugs dang mtshungs// lan cig dgos pa sgrub pa na// legs par las bgyis nor bu dang // rdzas bsres legs
106b4(mdo): par bgyis pa la/ hAng mas bzlas pa'i las rnams dang / dag zang mas phyed pa sgrub pa dang // don yod chu dang me dang ni// me 'i shing rnams brjod par bgyi// me 'bar 'od dang mtshungs pa
106b5(mdo): ste// de dag thams cad gcig spungs pa'i// yam sreg cho bran byed// tsan dan dang ni seng ldeng dang // pa tang ka ra 'i dang // a rkan gyi sdug pa dang // shing sha kar na ka ri dang // 
106b6(mdo): 'o pa'i shing dang byang chub shing // prag sha dang ni snga ma dang // kAn dA par shi pad ma'i// phra ba dang ni lo mar bcas// pad ma dkar po ku mu ta// ud pa la me tog lo ma \u0f7f// bi dza pu ra bil ba shing // sid
106b7(mdo): du ba rnas pa ka/ drig mi tsu ma de na/ sa ba da tsi thAka/ shing de kun ka bskus pa'i// lam sreg shing gi las bgyis te// nyungs kar yar dang zho dang ni// skang ci 'bral yos sbyin sreg bgyi/ 
106b8(mdo): bzang po'i zas las srang gsum dang // mtshal las nyis 'gyur kar dgus kyang // srad cig can dan dkar po nyid// srang bcu ldong gros srang gcig sten / de dag bsrem pa'i rdzas rnams dang // de rje/ 
107a1(mdo): yung ni nyis 'gyur dag/ zhig dag ni bkang nas su// me zab dbus su gzhug par bgyi// sbyin sreg stong ni rtsa brgyad du// shin tu mnyam gzhag legs gsal ba// chang ma chang mar spyod pa'i/ 
107a2(mdo): gos 'chang legs par khrus bgyis pa// dri zhim dri'i sra bsgos pas bgyi// ro sna tshogs pa'i rtor ma dang // me tog 'bras bu nyid kyang dgod// bzlas brjod kyi ni sbyin sreg bgyid// stong rtsa brgyad ni tshang
107a3(mdo): ba dang // de nas lha bzhos rtor ma dngan/ me tog bdug pa mchod yon sdod// dbul te 'o mas bdag ma bkum// 'o mas zhi bzhi ba bkyi// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis bzlas// bzlas brjod
107a4(mdo): stong rtsa brgyad bgyis nas// yungs kar kyis bsnun par babya'o// 'khro bo'i rgyal po nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// de nas zhig 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gI
107a5(mdo): zhig de la mchod par bgyi'o// de la zangs kyi sbom bu 'am/ dngul gi sbom bur zhi ga nas nor bu de blangs te/ sbom bu de / bzhag par bgyi ste/ yid bzhin nor bu ji lta ba bzhin du 'di/ 
107a6(mdo): yang don yod pa 'bar ba/ mthu chen po'i mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// mtshan mo ni zla ba'i 'od bzhin du gdal bar 'gyur ro// nyi mo ni nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur ro// nam 'tshed pa'i dus kyi
107a7(mdo): tshe nor bu de bzhi ka na 'tshe ba dang / sreg pa dang / 'tshed pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// nam hom bgyid pa de'i tshe/ thab kyi drabs u bzhag ste/ bsreg blags kyis sbyin sregs pa gyis na/ me
107a8(mdo): chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro// thams cad kyi thams cad du dgos pa rnams sgron mas gsal bar bzhin du 'gyur ro// ka yul ngo chen por g.yul 'gyed pa'i dbus su skyes pa dpa' bo legs par khrus bgyis pa/ 
107b1(mdo): gos zhang ma bgos pa/ ya lad dang go char bsdams pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che de skye bo'i thug tu bzhag nas/ gcig yu g.yul gyi dbus su zhugs na/ de nas skyes pa de me 'bar ba gcig pur 'gyu'o// 
107b2(mdo): de nas g.yul 'gyed pa'i pha rol kyi dpung rnams 'pham par gyur da nas/ phyogs bcur 'khrugs nas/ 'ber bar 'gyur ro// phyi nas lan 'ga' yang pha rol kyi dpung dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar
107b3(mdo): myi 'byur ro// pha rold kyi dgra dang myi mjal ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// lag pas nor bu bzung na/ phug gi gnas su zhugs na/ gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro// gnas na
107b4(mdo): gnas pa thams cad mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// klu'i kaHthams cad du mchis nas/ lag pas nor bu bzung ste/ kan sa kyi nang du zhugs na chab thams cad kyis phyir myi tshugs par 'gyur
107b5(mdo): de nas klu thams cad mdun na mchis nas/ bde bar dam pa par 'gyur ro// dbang du gyur nga nas/ ji srid 'tsho'i ba las bgyid par 'gyur ro// bsgo ba bzhin 'gyid par 'gyur/ 
107b6(mdo): lo tog dang / tshe dang / shing gyel ba dang / nags tshal thams cad bde bar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// snyan cing mdangs dang ldan pa dang mnyen par 'gyur ro// gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang
107b7(mdo): myi bde ba chung bar yang 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag gis yang lo rtog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la long khyod par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad dang / gzhan ches mang ba dag gi dgos pa mang po bgyid
107b8(mdo): par 'gyur ro// nor bu chen po'i don yod 'bar ba'i nor bu me 'bar ba chen po lags so// de nas don yod snang bas rnam par lta bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bkug ste/ rang gi gzugs
108a1(mdo): su lta bar 'tshal na/ de nas rigs sngags 'chang chang mas gos zang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// lus legs par bkrus te/ spos chab kyis byug par bgyi'o// shing a rka'i yam sreg shing gis
108a2(mdo): me spang bar bgyi'o// nyungs kar dang / a ga ru dang / can dan dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar sbyar bas/ stong pa brgyad sbyin sregs bgyi'o// de nas don yod lcags kyu gul las lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi
108a3(mdo): sbyin sregs thugs kyi sbyin sregs bgyis na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas/ mchog thams cad bsams pa bzhin yong su rdzogs par bgyid do// ji ltar
108a4(mdo): yid la bgyid cing / bsams pa'i mchog tshol bar bgyid do// dri nas rigs sngags 'chang gyis ji ltar yid la bgyis shing bsams pa'i mchog sprul pa dang / de'i 'og tu 'phags pa gyan ras gzigs
108a5(mdo): dbang phyug gis thams cad zhol bar bgyid do// // de nas myig sman grub par 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chab/ des legs par zhus byas te/ tha mas gos cha sa bgo ba pa
108a6(mdo): bgyi'o// nub gcig bsrung ba bgyis te/ des zangs kyi tha ma tog bgyis la/ de nas dmyig sman so'i bir dang / yung ba gnyis gyur bsres pas dag par bgyi'o// de nas stob rtsa brgyad bzlam
108a7(mdo): brjod bgyis nas/ zab kyi dbus su gzhag par bgyi'o// de'i steng du su shing ra dang / nyungs kar dang / tsan dan dang / zho dang / spang rtsi dang / mar bsreb pas lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyid sregs bgyi'o// shing
108a8(mdo): a ka'i me spar bar bgyi'o// lan stong ma brgyad chang ba dang / des phyig sman blangs la/ kun gyi steng du legs pa zhib du btags la/ ldong gros dang / ka pung dang / bla thir bsres nas/ spar yang
108b1(mdo): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po san brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la/ don yod snying po'i rigs sngags rgyal pos len nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa ni/ thams cad 'gug pa legs par
108b2(mdo): sbyar te/ de nas don yod rgyal pos dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// don yod zhags pas lan bdun phyag rgya bcing ngo // de nas myig sman kis byugs na/ nam mkha' la 'phur nas/ rigs sngags 'chang
108b3(mdo): thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro// sgra cung zad 'khyil par yang 'gyur ro// bskal pa khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// bral bar thig le bgyis na/ myi gda' bar 'gyur ro// myig la bskus te tshig gzhan
108b4(mdo): myi smra bar rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo la khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur da nas mchis par 'gyur ro// ma dad pa phal po ches char mchod par 'gyur ro// nor 'du ba 'grub
108b5(mdo): pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// bsgrub pa'i dus sam/ bzlas brjod kyi dus su myeka la bskus na/ bgegs dang / loga'adren dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyis myi mthong bar/ 
108b6(mdo): 'byung ngo // phyis kyang babyeg pa babyed par gyi 'gyur te/ bab cad pabyed par kyi 'gyur ro// med par ltab pa'i chog 'grub par 'gyur ro// rgyad tebya ba mang po'i nang zhugasar/ de dag
108b7(mdo): de dbang du gyur da te/ dong dang 'bru dang / gos dang / ltab srub dang / rgyan phal po che 'grub par 'gyur ro// bud byed kyang byig kyi 'dzums pa pa lnga bzhin du bdag nyid dam nor dbang du 'gyur ro// myig la byugs te
108b8(mdo): dgon pa chen por zhugs na/ chos po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun po dang / gcan zan gdug pa dang / sbrul gyi dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar gyi 'gyur te/ bde lags su spar mchi bar 'gyur ro
109a1(mdo): 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / thong pa dang / 'byed pa thams cad la myin la bsdus na/ smra ba rnams kyi bla na myed par 'gyur te/ thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// g.yul ngor g.yul 'gyed
109a2(mdo): ba'i nang du mchis nas/ myig la byugs na thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing / 'jigs pa thams cad las bsgral par 'gyur ro// gdug pas zin pa thams cad la myig la'ang snum na gdug pa sa
109a3(mdo): mchim par 'gyur ro// rims dag gcig pa dang / nag gnyis pa dang / 'ag gsum pa dang / rim pa zhag pa'i pa thams cad la myes la bskus na/ rim sa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// dus kyi
109a4(mdo): bza' bar 'chal na myig la bskus na dug ma mchis par la gyur ro// gdod thams cad kyis zin pas myig la bskus na gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong las thar par 'gyur ro// kyig zo
109a5(mdo): 'chal ba la bskus pa tsam gyi mod la byang bar 'gyur ro// grad pa byed bro 'chal ba la yang myig la bskus pa tsam gyis 'bya nga bar 'gyur/ srin po'i gdon dang / brjed byed kyis zin
109a6(mdo): pa la myig la bskus pa tsam gyis thar par 'gyur ro// rgyal po 'khros pas bsad par 'os pa gang du yang rung ba khrid pa myig la bskus pa tsam gis/ 'jigs pa thams cad yangs pa'i tha rad par 'gyur ro// 
109a7(mdo): nag po chen po'i myig la bskus na/ rang gi gzugs kyis 'dus nas mdun na mchis nas mchog thams cad rtsol cing / dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// ma mo'i tshogs thams cad dbang du
109a8(mdo): gyur na pa mchis par 'gyur ro// dpal lha mo'i myig la bsdus te/ myig myi gzums par don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan gsum bzlas na/ dpal lha mo mchis nas dgos pa thams cad dang / 'bru rab
109b1(mdo): tu mang po tshol bar 'gyur ro// nyal ba'i tshe myig la bskus te nyal na/ rmyi lam bzang po mang zhing 'phel che ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs mthong ba rtsol
109b2(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad tshol bar 'gyur ro// dran pa dang / glo gros rgya chen por 'gyur ro// myig la bskus te tshogs kyi dbus su zhugs na/ mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa
109b3(mdo): rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs rnyan gyi myig la bskus na/ rtag tu mchog grol bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu lta 'chal bar 'gyur ro// 'di wang dang / lhan cig sbyar te/ myig la bskus nas rgyal po'i po
109b4(mdo): brang du zhugs nas/ dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po 'thob par 'a gyur ro// yongs khyod chen po phun sum 'tshogs par 'gyur ro// do chen po 'grub par yang 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i btsun mo dang / zor
109b5(mdo): po'i tshogs dang / 'khor thams cad dga' bar gyur nas/ thams cad dbang du gyur ra te mchis par 'gyur ro// dpal lta/ ma chen mo'i gzugs rnyan gyi byig tu bskus pa/ 'byung po mas
109b6(mdo): cad kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing las bgyi ba ci mchis shes pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// nag po chen po'i gzug sa don gyi bral ba dang rtsig la bskus na/ gnad sbyin thams cad dbang tu
109b7(mdo): 'gyur ro// bya ba'i gyis pa 'gyus na/ snang bar 'gyur / pang sngags dang tu/ sbyang pa dang / byid kyis yin pa bamang med kyi myig la 'grus la/ du/ sbyang ba dang byad dang / pang ldan pa
109b8(mdo): bzhig par 'gyur zhing / lan 'gal ya ska bris kyis non par myi 'gyur ro// bkres pa'i myig la bsdus te/ grong du zhugs na bza' ba dang 'atung ba ston mo sun gyis grub cing 'thob par 'gyur ro// bzod/ 
110a1(mdo): snyoms pa'i myig la bskus te bsod snyoms la mchis na/ kha zas sna tshogs mang po dang / yod phal mo che 'thob par 'gyur ro// sme ba dang / ling tog dang / rab rib dang / chu'ur dang
110a2(mdo): mtshan mo mthom pa dang / g.ya' ba dang / chag po dang / myig gi rdzim rdung ba dang / myig sre bo de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// myig nad thams cad las sos par 'gyur ro// lha'i myig dag pa
110a3(mdo): 'dab bzangs dang mtshungs pa dang / 'dal ba bangs kyi mthong ba thob nas/ thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang / dbang du gyur nas/ nor rnyed pa dang / don grub pa yang thob nas/ dbang phyug bran byed par 'gyur/ 
110a4(mdo): de nas nor dnga' bru dang / gos dang / lba ba lbu ba dang / rgyan 'phyang thams cad dgug pa dang / 'phel bar bgyid pa dang / don da yod me lha dgug pa'i sbyin sreg rgya chen po brjod par bgyi'o// 
110a5(mdo): grub pa kun kye bra na myed// don kun sgrub pas mod la ni// mkhas rnams mchog tu dka' bar bgyid// dbang phyug bskal pa phun sum tshogs// mdo nyid kho na thob par 'gyur// the tso
110a6(mdo): du yang myi 'gyur zhing // yid gnyis nyid kyang ma lags so// chang mas chang ma'i gos dag dang / legs par bkrus pas las bsgrub bo/ sbyin sregs bla na myed phel ge// 'di ni rgya chen bsam myi khyab/ 
110a7(mdo): ka ran rtsa ba sdong bur bcas/ 'dab la me tog 'bras bur bcas// a rka'i shing dang brags shing dang // yam sreg dag gis me spar la// sa bon bdun po 'bras dang bcas// 'bras yos til dang
110a8(mdo): yungs kar dang // zho dang sbrang phyi mar dang ni// yungs kar dag dang bsres pa yis// sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad chang bar bgyi/ 'khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur nas/ don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya
110b1(mdo): bcings te/ de nas khyig la smras kyis bskus na/ nam mkhal la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro// phyig sman grub pa'i rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyis cho bo/ rgyal po 'khor los sbyar bar 'gyur
110b2(mdo): srazhu pa 'khyil par yang 'gyur ro// bskal pa khrir 'tsho bar ya// lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ba tshang ba dang / de nas don yod lcags kyu'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal po lan brgyud bzlas nas/ ku gul dpa che
110b3(mdo): 'bras bu dang / mar du sbyar bas sbyin sreg bgyi'o// dgos pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang / de'i tshe bza' ba dang btung ba dang / ga nas mal dang / stan dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad dang / nor dang 'bru dang / 
110b4(mdo): mdzod dang / bang ba 'phel bar yang 'gyur ro// gos sna tshog/ dang / stab lbub dang / rgyan dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / me tog dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams lhun gyis grub pa 'byung
110b5(mdo): par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug gi 'byor da pa chen po 'thob pa/ ra 'gyur zhing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas zla ba yar kyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la nyin zhag cig mchis
110b6(mdo): nas/ byig la bskus te don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu bzlas brjod bgyis la/ 'khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur nas/ don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ de nas myig la
110b7(mdo): sman kyis bskus na/ nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro// myig sman grub pa'i rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi cho lo/ rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// sra cung zad 'khyil par/ 
110b8(mdo): yang 'gyur ro// bskal pa khrir 'tshe bar yang 'gyur ro// myig sman 'dis myig la byugs na/ nyin mo ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan mo mthong bar 'gyur zhing // myi gda' bar yang 'gyur ro// 'byung po da
111a1(mdo): gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad du zhugs na thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro// // 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo
111a2(mdo): rgyal po// bam po bdun pa// / myig sman 'dis myig la byugs nas/ ma mo'i gnas su zhugs na/ lha tso bo de dag myig myi 'dzum par lta bar bgyid pa la/ khro bo'i rgyal po las
111a3(mdo): cig bzlas par bgyi'o// de nas ma mo dang tso bo'i lha thams cad mdun du mchis nas// mchog thams cad tshol bar 'gyur ro// ci srid 'tsho'i bar du las thams cad bsgrub par bgyid pas mchis par 'gyun
111a4(mdo): ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bskor cing snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// rtag par rgyun tu bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / spa ba'i phyir gnas shing rje su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de nas la/ 
111a5(mdo): wang bsgrub pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bsgrub par bgyi ste/ don yod rgyal po grub pa'i sa// rigs sngags 'chang ba bde myong zhing / lha dpalha myin mchod pa dang // sgrub pa'i don kun 'grub pa dwa
111a6(mdo): dbang du gyurd pa dam pa dang // mkhala' la mchi ba dam pa dang // phyi snang shin tu rnyed dka' dang // mod la phug tu 'jug pa dang // nags kyi nang du 'jug pa dang // ri sul dag tu 'jug pa dang // thang dag la
111a7(mdo): ni rgyu ba dang // klu gnas mtshor ni 'jug pa dang // de bzhin chu rlung che bsgral dang // rdzu 'phrul grub pa bskyed pa dang // de bzhin 'jigs dang sgri ba kun dang // nad kun zhi bar bgyid pa nyid// sdig
111a8(mdo): pa thams cad nyams par bgyid// g.yul ngor g.yul las rgyal bgyid de// rtag tu dgra kun brlag par bgyid// gdon rigs kun ka tshar gcod cing // rims rnams thams cad bzlog
111b1(mdo): par bgyid/ sngon gyi sgrib pa 'jig pagyid cing // sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid/ dbang phyug grol cing skal pa rtsol// nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel bar bgyid// 'thab pa 'thab mo phod pa dang
111b2(mdo): 'byed pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid// bcing ba dang ni shing sprog dang / khong sgril lcags sprog phye mar klog/ rgyal po gdug pa khros pa'i sa// gsad par 'os pa sel bar 'gyid// da ltar 'di la bsnyed du/ 
111b3(mdo): na// myi bdag bu sdug bzhin smra zhing // myi bde kun las grol bar 'gyur// 'di ni kun tu sdug pa dang // gnas kun mchis par mchod par 'os// lus snyan snying du rtag tu sdug/ rgyal po btsun mo
111b4(mdo): 'khor bcas pa'i// rtag tu gnang chen rtag tu 'gyur/ dge sbyong bre nyid dang ni// rgyal rigs rje'u rigs mangs rigs/ dang // bud myed kun dang de bzhin du// skyes pa khye'u dang
111b5(mdo): bu mo'i// rtag tu gnang chen dag tu 'gyur// 'gi wang bla na myed pa'o// 'di la gang dag rtag bsten na// 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug ste// mchog sbyin rtag tu mchod
111b6(mdo): par bgyid// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// nyin dang mtshan du bsrung ba dang // rtag tu mchog cos phyir mchis so// gzhan yang lha ni mang po dang // klu'i rgyal po mthu chen dang // 'byung po
111b7(mdo): gnod sbyin srin po dang // grul bum gyi byin lho rgyu// dri za lha min nyid dag dang // nam mkha' lding dbang mthu chen te// de dag thams cad bsrung ba'i// ched du nyid dang mtshan dag tu// rang dbang nyid kyis
111b8(mdo): gnas par 'gyur// 'gi wang grub pa dam pa po// de ltar stobs dang ldan pa laka// de nas rigs sngags 'chang ba yis// cang 'gyur legs par khrus bgyis nas// cang ma'i ni kos bgos ste/ 
112a1(mdo): 'di legs par bsgrubab nas su// dmar po chen po nyid dag dang // s+yAd kum dag dpa sa nyas sbya la// 'das kyi snod du bka su// ngan yong 'gas pa'i gzugs bdud du/ 
112a2(mdo): brgyad ni yang bzlas das/ bye dkyis ni la dbus po// / de nas yang snang gi zhing dang / ma ka'i zhing gi yam theg gis me ska sa/ 'bral yos dang / lungs kur dang / ku sul dang / 'bras
112a3(mdo): dang / til dang / bsrel la zho dang / sbrang thi dang / mar du bsres te lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bkye'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / de nas me zhi zhing / me mdag phra mo yang zhi ba dang / thal ba brang
112a4(mdo): te snod kyi dang du chal nas/ de nas slar yang lan brgya rtsa bang bzlas la 'khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te/ phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ro// de nas dpral ba'i
112a5(mdo): dbus su thig le bgyis na/ nam mkha' la 'phur nas rig/ sngags 'chang chen po'i rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur zhing
112a6(mdo): swA cung zad 'khyil par yang 'gyur ro// lo chu khri gu stong du 'a tsho bar 'gyur zhing / gnas kyi sgo thams cad rtag tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// bral ba la thig le bgyis ma gyi gda' bar gyur nas
112a7(mdo): gnas thams cad du zhugs na/ gnas thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang / gnod
112a8(mdo): sbyin dang / srin po mthu dang / bcas pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor nas/ mchis par 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// myig la bskus na ji ltar
112b1(mdo): nyin par bzhin du mtshan mo snang zhing / thams cad du ter mthong bar 'gyur ro// sa'i phug dang / zang gi sgo bye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang gi gnas su zhugs nas/ zang gi dgos pa thams cad
112b2(mdo): ste/ slar yang mchis par 'gyur ro// chu rlung chen po'i nang du zhugs na khyim dang gzhal myed khang ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro// chab la gnas pa ga lags pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchen
112b3(mdo): par 'gyur ro// klu'i mtsho dang gnas su ji ltar rang gi khyim du ji ltar rang gi khyim bzhin du 'jug cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lus mtha' dag la byugs te g.yul ngor 'byed pa'i nang du zhugs na/ ya
112b4(mdo): lad dang / go cha bgos pa bzhin du mthong nas thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// khang bsrel te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis
112b5(mdo): par 'gyur ro// ka pa la tshig smras pa de thams cad bgyid par 'a gyur ro// gapa la bslangs pa de thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro// gang la bsgo ba de thams cad bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur/ 
112b6(mdo): khar 'chos nas kar dang gang du mchis pa de dang der skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad bdag nyid dam/ nor dbang du gyur da nas mchis par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yas pa la
112b7(mdo): byugs na u la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / bran mo dang / las bgyid pa dang / zho nas 'tsho ba dang / mngag gzhug pa rnams dbang du gyur da nas/ bsgo ba bzhin mchis
112b8(mdo): par 'gyur ro// 'dzub mo g.yas pa la bsdus na/ ser ba dang / sprin dang / 'brug gi dus su srin la mngon sum du bstan te/ bsdigs na grang ba dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// 
113a1(mdo): dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu zil kyis mnan par 'gyur ro// char ha cang ches na lag pa g.yas pa srin la mngon sum du bstan pas ha cang ches pa gcod pa 'gyur ro// char gyi 'bab
113a2(mdo): pa'i dus su lag pa g.yas pa'i/ 'thil la byugs nas/ klu gnas pa'i mtsho chu la thal mo lan gsum brdabs na/ de'i mod la klu'i rgyal pos char gyi rgyun chen po rtong par 'gyur ro// gal te mod la char
113a3(mdo): myi 'bebs na de'i tshe lan lnga rdegs pa dang / klu de dag thams cad kyis char gyi rgyun rtong bar 'gyur ro/ gang gi tshe char myi 'bebs pa de'i tshe/ klu thams cad la klad pa'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gal te lan
113a4(mdo): bdun bsnun na klu'i rgyal po thams cad tshul ma yin pa'i sdug sngal 'byung bar 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi rigs phu bar 'gyur ro// gnon gyis zin pa thams cad kyi myig la
113a5(mdo): bskus na/ bskus pa tsam gyi yod la/ gdon brgyad khri phan stong rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// rims kyis thebs pa rnams rkyel ba la thig le bgyis na/ rims nyin gcig pa 'am/ 
113a6(mdo): nyin gnyis pa 'am/ nyin gsum pa 'am/ nyid bzhi pa'i rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// nad kyis zin pa thams cad la khrus bgyis na mod la nad thams cad las tha rad par 'gyur ro// sha bkra da
113a7(mdo): mdze dang / rkang shu dang / g.yan pa dang / shu ba dang / 'brum bu rnams las tha rad par 'gyur ro// lba ba dang / lhog pa dang / mtshan mar rdol ba dang / shu ba mched pa dang / 'brum bu phra mo mched pa la/ 
113a8(mdo): byugs pa tsas kyis tha dad par 'gyur ro// gdug pas zin pa thams cad la byugs pa tsam gyis myi gdug par 'gyur ro// dug gis myos par bgyis pa thams cad la 'chal ba tsam gyis tha dad par 'gyur// 
113b1(mdo): ljon pa dang sman dang / dmu chu dang / mchin pa na ba dang / phrib logs na ba dang / 'jang na pa dang / tshad pa dang / ka cin sri ba dang / gsung pa dang / ma zhu ba dang / rtug skam la bsros nas/ 'tshal/ 
113b2(mdo): bcas kyi yod la zhi bar 'gyur zhing / phyis lan 'ga' yang gnod par myi 'gyur ro// tshogs mar 'gi wang ki ril lung bgyis te/ phug gi sgo dang / nye bar mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa la yang byugs te/ 
113b3(mdo): thas mapa pa bas na/ brag ga na thams cad 'phye bar 'gyur ro// bgamab ma mchis par 'ju pa#ste/ ma zung bad kyang bshegs pagyid par gyi 'gyung ro// gnas de gnas pag
113b4(mdo): lags pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur nas mdun na mchis pa nga 'gyur ro// dgos pa chen po thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// nga pa gnyis byugs te me 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs na/ me lha rang
113b5(mdo): ki gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas lag pa nas bzung na/ sa/ rigs sngags 'chang la/ rigs sngags 'chang ba gzha la myedakhang gnas su zhugs shika/ rigs sngags 'chang
113b6(mdo): ke zlo ba thams cad bsgo bar bgyi'o// zhes smras nas/ de'i tshe ga sngags kyis bgyi ba ci mchis pa de bsgo bar bgyi ste/ thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// dbu pa gnyis la byugs na/ glang po che
113b7(mdo): bdun gyi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bcu gnyis la byugs natshugs pa la mchis pa'i khyad du 'gyur ro// byin pa la byugs maglang po che'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'phrin pa la byugs nas das/ 
113b8(mdo): khung du zhugs na/ nags khung gi gnas kyi sgo thams cad be nas sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// mi 'tshal ba de blang bar bgyi'o// 'gi wang ki ril lu bgyis te/ 
114a1(mdo): khar bsrel nas ri sul dang / sman gshong du zhugs nas/ skad drag po lan gsum gdon par bgyi ste/ ri sul dang / sman shong gi gnas gsang ba'i sgo gang dag lags pa de dag thams cad/ 
114a2(mdo): rang gyi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing / las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas rtsa dang shing gel ba dang / nags tshang tshing gi sman gi rdzas gang lags pa dag rang gyi gzugs kyi mdun
114a3(mdo): na mchis par 'gyur zhing / gang dag bcud kyi mchog de dag 'dzag la/ bcud srung ba de dag kyang rab kyi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas// thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// ci ltar 'tshal ba bas
114a4(mdo): ba ma mchis par dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// dasnying kar thig le byas na snying la cung zad ci bsams pa dang / yid la bsams shing brnag pa'i dgos pa de dag thams cad mod la
114a5(mdo): 'grub par 'gyur ro// lto la thig le bgyis na/ kha zas da nga btung ba'i ston mo 'dod dgu thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// pun sum tshogs pa thams cad lhun gyis grub par 'gyur ro// 
114a6(mdo): thib logs gnyis la byugs na/ ji ltar bsams shing don tu gnyer ba'i gos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// skal tshigs rnams la byugs na ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i mal dang / stan thob par/ 
114a7(mdo): 'gyur ro// rna ba la byugs sam/ gnad dang gnad rnams kyi gnas su byugs na/ ji ltar bsams pa'i rgyan dang / lhab lhub thob par 'gyur ro// mdung do la byugs na rta'i bzhon pa thob par 'gyur/ 
114a8(mdo): nyin cig bzhin nang par tshig gzhan gyi smra bar/ 'gi 'ang ris su re re la don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzlas nas/ 'tshal te nyi ma dang mo la tshigs su bcad pa stong brags na 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 
114b1(mdo): nyin cig bzhin nyis 'gyur du bgyis nas klags na 'dzind par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun gyis thos pa mang por 'gyur ro// zhag bcu bzhir bgyis na myi 'am ci mo lta bu'i sgra dbyangs su 'gyur ro// lan
114b2(mdo): nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bgyis na zos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro// ga la bing ka'i dbyangs ltar mnyen zhing snyan la rno ba'i dbyangs su 'gyur ro// bu'i ched du mar dang / lhan cig chal na bya rog lta
114b3(mdo): bu dang / mo gzham rnams kyis kyang bu rnyed par 'gyur ro// btson rang rtsal ba dang / shing srog dang / lugs sgrog dang / nyan pa dang / 'od skal la byugs na/ byugs pacas gyi mod la dum bung cag par
114b4(mdo): 'byung/ 'thor bar 'gyur ro// ches brgyad dam/ ches ban bzhi 'am/ ches bco lnga la don yod pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas da la/ 'gro bo'i rgyal pos rab la dbang bsrung nas 'di 'a
114b5(mdo): gai ri lu dang / blom cham 'asres pas zhum bgyi'o// zhus bakhyim pa tsam gyi yod la sdig pa thams cad dang / sngon gi ts+lipa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// nub gsum
114b6(mdo): du khrus bgyis na gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang sgrub pa dang / grub pa'i mchog thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// phas kyi rgol ba dang / byi mjal ba dang / gdug pa dang / sdig pa thams cad kyis bye chug+sa/ 
114b7(mdo): par 'gyur ro// lan 'gal yang thams cad kyi thams cad du 'jigs pa kyi 'byung zhing yong su tha rad par 'gyur ro// byis lan 'gal yang sdig pa'i dri mas gos par myi 'gyur ro// 'di wang gi li lu tis
114b8(mdo): yar dang 'phres te/ lagadang la byugs nas/ rgyam po'i 'dun du mchim ma thu bzhin bdudu 'thun nas dga' ba chen ma thob pa dang / rgyal ba'i 'dra ba'i 'jigs pa mas cad ni bapa gyung ro// sumathon
115a1(mdo): bag tu byugs na/ mtshon gyis phog par myi 'gyur te/ dum bu dum bur chags par 'gyur ro// mda' 'bangs na lus la 'bar bar gyi 'gyur zhing / gzhu chag par 'gyur ro// 'di nga gi
115a2(mdo): ril lu mgul du matags nas 'brog dgon pa dang / ri dang nags cha cing gi bgrod dka' bar zhugs na/ chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun po dang / gnod skyid dang / srin po dang / myi dngakyi ma lanas par
115a3(mdo): gcan zad gdug pa dang / sprul gdug pa'i 'jigs gathams cad 'byung bar gyi 'gyur te/ myi gda' bar 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na thams cad du pha ro lad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// thams
115a4(mdo): cad du mchod gnas chen po yang 'gyur ro// thams cad du lamra da dang 'artson 'grus cher por rdzi bskyed pa pa rom dazil gyis gnadar 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yon pa la btags na skyes pa dang
115a5(mdo): bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad kyi gnang chen du 'gyur te/ thams cad lto 'chol bar 'gyur ro// mchod pa/ 'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro// dgos pa mang po chen po 'grub par
115a6(mdo): 'gyur ro// byid pa g.yas pa la btags na/ dub pa la mchis par dpag tshad stong du mchi bar 'gyur ro// 'di wang gi ril lu khar 'asres la/ lag pa g.yas pas yungs kar gyis don yod lpags kyu
115a7(mdo): namad par 'dzi/ phyogs ga tha bams pa'i skyes bu dang / bud byed dang / dang / tshum pas 'i byod sasub
115a8(mdo): 'gyug par 'gyur te lami par 'gyur ro// ga byed pa ga da brgyas pan/ gnas pa zhigan yang gdon gyi 'jas par di lag gsum khyim mchi 'ar 'gyur te/ yid gnyis kyi brgya'o// 
115b1(mdo): lan yogaso pas 'ag gi sa su ba/ par dngas/ 'bru dang / rong bud dang / gnas dang/ dang/ snyapa dang / @/ @
115b2(mdo): spabs pa de dag thams cad bkug nas mchi bar 'gyur te/ je 'chal pa de ma mi bar 'gyur ro// byam chang du zhugs na/ chabacang kyi mamabal mo bdabs na/ chang gi bum pa thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro// 
115b3(mdo): bang po'i sgor thal mo brdabs na/ 'bru thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro// bcud 'byin pa'i khyim du zhugs na/ 'khrul 'khor la reg par bgyis na/ bu ram gyi khu ba dpa sha kha ra'i glegs bu thams cad mo che/ 
115b4(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// gang du 'tshal ba der mngags par 'gyur ro/ grong khyer gyi sgor mun tshab tshub na/ thal mo brdabs na/ grong khyer na gnas pa thams cad gnyid srog par 'gyur ro// dgra'i skor
115b5(mdo): btab ma bskrad pa bgyid par 'gyur ro// mtshon cha mkhan gyi khyim du 'phangs na mtshon mnan cad la bgyid par 'gyur ro/ rgyal po'i sgor btab na/ phas kyi rgol ba dang / myi mdza' ba dang / 
115b6(mdo): sems can gdug pa can thams cad bcings pa dang / rengs pa deng rmugs par bgyis par 'gyur ro// dung la byugs nas pus na sbas gong du grags pa de dag tu 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / chod pa dang
115b7(mdo): 'gyed pa dang / byang dang / dug sbyar ma dang / dug dang / nad las yongasu tha rad par 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi skor bus na/ yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / mya ngas thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 
115b8(mdo): phyugs lhas su pus na 'o ma thams cad phrogs par 'gyur ro// gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro// ra lug gi lhas su bus na/ lug gi 'o ma phrogs par 'gyur te/ gar 'tshal ba der mchi bar
116a1(mdo): 'gyur ro// skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i nang du bus na thams cad sgren mor gyur da nas gos thams cad 'gug par 'gyur ro// rdza rnga la byugs te khyams mthon po'i steng du bdungs na/ grang ba dang / 
116a2(mdo): rlung dang / ser ba thams cad bcings pa'i dang bshig par 'gyur te/ tshugs par myi 'gyur ro// dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu srer ba bkag par 'gyur ro// grong khyer ram/ yul 'khor mtha'
116a3(mdo): dag tu bus na nad dang / yams kyi nad dang gnod pa dang / 'che ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / cod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// myi ngas dang / mu
116a4(mdo): ke'i 'dzegs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos dpa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong dag bgyid par 'gyur te/ thams cad la spang bar bgyi'o// de nas sems can thams cad dang thun mong ba
116a5(mdo): zhi ba dang / rgyas pa nadang thams cad zhi bar bgyid cing / sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa/ thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ mu ke'i dgon pa thams
116a6(mdo): cad rab tu 'i bar bgyid pa/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdon dang / brjed byed thams cad brlag par 'byed pa brjod pa ra bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang cang par gyurd pas legs
116a7(mdo): par khrus bgyis te/ spos dri zhim pos lus byugs la kos chang ma bgos pa/ sos dri zhim pos bsgos pas/ byams pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag cing / sems can thams cad la lhag par ba
116a8(mdo): ba dang / snying rje chen pos snying brdungs pas/ sbyin sregs kyi las 'di bgyis te/ sa rka'i shing dang / sha myi shing dang / shing 'o ma can nam/ ji ltar yang byang chub kyi shing ste/ de dag gi yam sreg shing gis
116b1(mdo): me spar la 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / pad ma'i ldum bu dang / 'dab ma dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar du bsres pas sbyin sreg bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ 
116b2(mdo): nas/ de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa 'khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcing ngo // de nas sprin sreg gi dgos pa mthar byin pa'i yod kho nang / dpag tshad
116b3(mdo): gcig 'or yug tu yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad dang / mu ge'i dgon pa myi bzad pa dang / rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung 'jigs pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / myi mjal ba'i
116b4(mdo): 'jigs pa thams cad dang / chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun ma dang / kacan zan gdug pa dang / sbrul dang dug myi bzad pa dang / dug pa dang / bcas pa'i srog chags kyi 'jigs pa thams cad
116b5(mdo): rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// myi tshugs par 'gyur ro// dpag cha/ da kho ra khor yug tu rims myi 'byung ste/ gnod pas ma lags nad kyis ma lags te/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdon
116b6(mdo): rnams kyis myi zhugs te/ rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dpe 'thob mo dang / thod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / nang 'jug pa dang / 'jug pa dang / brod pa dang / mnangs gcod pa dang / 'ching ba dang / sdig
116b7(mdo): pa rnams kyis kyi tshugs te/ rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ro/ shin tu lo legs shing mdangs rgal/ skye bo dang / gyi mang pos rab tu gang zhes me tog dang 'bras bu phun
116b8(mdo): sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// nor dang 'bru dang / lo tog rab tu mang po 'grub par 'gyur ro// shi nang tu po dang ldan pa dang shi nad tu sbyin pa dang / yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// Tha dang / shing gyel pa dang / 
117a1(mdo): sman dang / nag chang tshing dang / myu gu dang / rtsa dang / 'bras bu bzang po yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyir zhing ci srid 'tsho'i bar du yul de na yid du myi mchi ba'i reg pa myi 'gyur ro// de yul de/ 
117a2(mdo): na dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang rde'u rigs dang / mangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud byed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams rtag tu nad ma mchis par 'gyur ro// bde bar tshor ba dang / yid
117a3(mdo): la dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur ro / byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyur ro// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
117a4(mdo): chen po de dag thams cad kyang legs par bsrung ba'i phyir rtag tu bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir dpag tshad brgya 'o ra yu ga tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / zhi ba dang bde leg
117a5(mdo): su bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhi yang dpung dang bcas te yongasu sbyong ba dang / bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed/ par bgyid par 'gyur ro// gdug pa thams cad zlog pa dang
117a6(mdo): bsrung ba dang / yongasu sbyong bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams rtag par rgyun tu bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dpo/ sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po brgyal po sul cu rtsa
117a7(mdo): gsum pa'i lha'i dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa dang / khyab 'byug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad kyis yul de legs par srung bar 'gyur ro// gzi brjid thol bar 'gyuraro
117a8(mdo): dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug du sems can thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / yongasu spyong bar 'gyur ro// dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u'i rigs dang / rlangs rigs dang
117b1(mdo): byas pa dang / bud byed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la srung ba dang / bslab pa dang / med pa 'byed par 'gyur ro/ zhi ba'i lam 'di'i mthus sems can thams cad sdig pa dang / rnab pa thams cad/ 
117b2(mdo): las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yul de la dgongs par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad
117b3(mdo): yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la dbugs 'byin pa ston pa 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad yongs su bsrung ba'i don tu nyi ma dang zla ba'i don tu nyi ma dang zla ba rgyu skar gyi/ 
117b4(mdo): tshogs dang bcas pa legs par 'byor par 'gyur ro// 'phya klas pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag par rgyun tu skyes pa dang / bung ma po thams cad la bu cig pa bzhin du dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro// 
117b5(mdo): yongs su bsrung ba dang / yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyid par 'gyur ro// yang nas yang du lta bar 'du/ ra ro// de nas des sbyin sreg gi thal ba dang / dri chu'i stsol
117b6(mdo): bgyis te/ phyogs bzhi kun tu dbang bskur na 'tshams byed pa ba cad pa babyis par 'gyur ro// nad kyis gzir ba thams cad kyi nad nye ba ro zhi bar 'gyur ro// rims thams cad la thig le bgyis na
117b7(mdo): nad kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// btson ran mchis pa 'am phyag sbal na mchis par grol bskus na ral bar 'gyur ro// gdug pas zin pa dang / dug gis myong
117b8(mdo): pa thams cad la bskus na gdug par myi 'gyur ro// me dgug pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o// rdzogs s+ho// / de nas pad ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor
118a1(mdo): 'dir/ pad ma rigs 'phags pa rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'kho mchog chen po mdzod par bgyiste/ 'di ni sa bsgrubs pas las/ 
118a2(mdo): brgya stong bgyid par 'gyur ro// chos grangs rgyu skar bzang po dang / shi nad tu kra shis mchog dge la/ legs par khrus bgyi gos chang bgyi'o// byams pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag/ sems can kun
118a3(mdo): ngal brtse ba dang // snying rje dam pas brgyan pa dang / don yod zhags pa rigs sngags che// grub pa bla byed cho ga'i rgyal// grags pas las rnams thams cad dag// 'grub par bgyid de som nyi byed// 'jig
118a4(mdo): rten bla ma'i snying po dag/ de bzhin gang dag rtag brjod na/ lus can rtag tu mchog sbyin kyi// phyag na pad ma dag tu 'gyur/ ji ltar gang ga'i bye ba snyed kyi// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong la
118a5(mdo): bsod nams phung po khri phrag ste// dge ba'i phra ba sogs pa dang // sangs rgyas bya ba bgyid par 'gyur/ bsgru pa bgyis na pa bzlas brjod gcig/ mkhas pa'i myig ni brjod bgyid
118a6(mdo): dge slong pa dang dge slong ma/ dge bsnyen po spos de bzhin du// bde ba can du myung du mchi// sdug bsngal gyi bzad myong 'gyur ba'o// nyon mongs pa las tha da par 'gyur// rtag tu sangs rgyas byang chub dag
118a7(mdo): mthong bar 'gyur te/ som nyi myed// de nas don yod zhags pa'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du/ bzlas brjod cho ga brjod bgyi ste/ bzlas brjod kyi ni las bgyis na// rigs sngags 'chad pas de nyid 'grul
118a8(mdo): don yod zhags pa'i gzugs rnyan gyi// mdun du lci ba'i dkyil 'khor bgyi// gru bzhi kho khor yug tu// mtshon tshi kar po zhib mo'is// gru bzhi lham par thig gdapa'o// ngos bzhi rnams su/ 
118b1(mdo): zho bzhi dag/ dbus nas ngos bzhi shis su gdang// tsan dan dkar pos bri ba ni// dkyil 'khor mchog la pad ma dag/ 'dab brgya gur kus kyis tor cing // pad pa'i ze ba'i dkyil dag tu// 
118b2(mdo): mazhom pa'i bum pa ni// gos chab kyis ni bkang ba'i// yungs kar ldan pa gzhag par bgyi// a ga ru'i bdug pa dbul// bum pa gang ba 'ang dgod par bgyi// me tog sna tshogs brgyan par 'gyi// 
118b3(mdo): macad yon ldod ki gzhi bzhin 'o// rigs sngags 'chab ba zang gyur da pas// thang pa'i gas ni bgo bar 'gyi// legs bkrus rnam par dag pa dang // daso sbyong dag ni thangs pa dang / dgar gsum
118b4(mdo): zas ni yal nas su// dus gsum du ni khrus pakyi'o// dus gsum bzlas brjod bkyi bani// don yod zhags pa'i snying pod/ dus gsum su yang 'khyab brgyad// 'phags pa 'jig rten
118b5(mdo): dbang phyug gi/ mngon gsum dkyil mo krung bcas te/ bzlam brjod phyag rgya bcings nas su// bgrang 'breng dag ni tha par bgyi// 'dub mo dang ni 'am bo dag// brkyang napa'i
118b6(mdo): zhing dul ba'i// yid kyis byams sems mnyam par gzhag/ ting 'dzin brtan pas lus spobs par// legs par bzhag ste 'i bor bas tshig gzhan gyi smra babras brjod pagyi// bzlas brjod
118b7(mdo): bgyis sa tham gyi mod la/ ma chen pa g.yo bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ phyag bgyis mas chen po yang g.yo bar 'gyur ro// btan pa'i sems kyis skrag par gyi 'byo'o// 
118b8(mdo): sems can thams cadapa mchog tu brtse bas/ 'phags pa spyan ram gzigs dbang byag dan med pa'i zhags pa mthong pa cas du brims/ lan tshwa ba'i byam pa lan 'dun 'arnam so// yan 'dun pas
119a1(mdo): pa tsam gyi mod la/ sa chen po g.yo zhing sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzig pa dbang phyug gi bral ba nas/ 'od zer byung nas kun tu snang bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang de
119a2(mdo): yang cher snying dka' ba dang / bzhin 'dzum pa dang / shin tu rab tu dga' bas su zing zhes bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdong du blta bar bgyi ste/ dong du bltas pa tsam gyi yod la/ 
119a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ngo g.yas pa nas/ legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byig bsgyur bar bgyid cing / shin tu legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra byung nas
119a4(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang gis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa / ba nas/ lus yongasu dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mA ya phrag brgya stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa
119a5(mdo): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rnam par dag/ pa thob nas/ lus 'jam pa dang / shin tu gzhon sha chags pa dang / mnyen par 'gyur ro// sra cung zad 'khyil pa dang
119a6(mdo): mnyen pa dang / snyan pa'i tshig smra bar 'gyur ro// myig yongasu dag pa thob par 'gyur te/ lul yongasu dag pa dang / yid yongs su dag pa dang / gnyer ba dang sra skya bo spangs par 'gyur ro// sems can
119a7(mdo): thams cad la lta ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// ji tsam du gdugs che na 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs ston cing / dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ 
119a8(mdo): lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag nas/ mchog thams cad bcol bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la mchi ba 'am/ byi rnga bar bgyi ba 'am/ lha'i myig thob pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing lta ba 'am/ ting nge
119b1(mdo): 'dzin rab tu thob pa 'am/ gzungs rab tu thob pa'am/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa 'am/ phrug lag smra ba 'am/ kasang sngags smra ba 'am/ bos pa 'dzin pa nyid
119b2(mdo): dam/ gter smra ba 'am/ nor sgyur ba smra ba 'am/ myig 'phrul smra ba 'am/ 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ phug tu 'jug pa 'am/ klu'i gnas su 'jug pa 'am/ zhing smra ba 'am/ gnod sbyin dgug
119b3(mdo): pa 'am/ srin po dgug pa 'am/ ro langs bslang ba 'am/ gnas khrod du 'jug pa 'am/ ri la rgyu ba 'am/ grong khyer du 'jug pa 'am/ sman lta ba'i phyir 'jug pa 'am/ ral gri'i rigs sngags
119b4(mdo): 'chang nyid dam/ grub pa'i rigs sngags 'chang nyid dam/ khor los sgyur ba nyid dam/ rgyal po 'thob pa 'am/ yul 'thob pa 'am/ yul gyi bdag po nyid dam/ dpung chen po rab tu
119b5(mdo): gzhom pa dang / bslad pa 'am/ rgya mtshor 'jug pa de dag thams cad tshol bar 'gyur ro// dgos pa grub pa thams cad // la bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar gang 'tshal bar yongs su spyod par
119b6(mdo): 'gyur ro// mtshams ma mchis pa lnga rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na sems can thams cad la lta ba/ sgrib pa dang bral ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind thob par 'gyur ro// / 
119b7(mdo): myig sman sgrub par 'tshal bas des zla ba yar gyi rol ches brgyad ya/ ldong gros kyi myig sman zangs kyi snod du tshal te/ can dan gyi dkyil 'khor bgyis la/ 'phags pa rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du
119b8(mdo): bzhag nas/ legs par khrus bgyis te/ gos chang ma bgos nas/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du dkyil mo krung bcas te/ mchis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o// don yod zhags pa/ 
120a1(mdo): phyag rgya'i mtshams bcing bar bgyi'o// 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun du bzlas par bgyi'o// zas kar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o// / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo su yang rung / 
120a2(mdo): bas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas la goms par bgyis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi yod la zangs kyi snod 'bar ba dang / drangs pa dang / dbu ba 'byung
120a3(mdo): bar 'gyur te/ de blangs nas myig la bskus na/ nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchis nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
120a4(mdo): rnams mthong ba dang / rigs sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ba chen por 'gyur ro// phug gi gnas bye ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyuraro// darter byung ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// lha'i gnas
120a5(mdo): thams cad kyi sgo bye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang du 'tshal ba// der mchi bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / gdon dang / myi dang / myi ma yin pa dang
120a6(mdo): pas kyi rgol ba dang / myi mdza' ba thams cad kyi gda' bar 'gyur ro// ches brgyad dam ches bcu bzhi 'am/ bco lnga la tshig gzhan gyi sba bar/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du
120a7(mdo): dkyil mo krung bcas te/ mchis nas lan stong sa brgyad bzlas brjod pagyi'o// / bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi yod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ lA li
120a8(mdo): bdag nyid kyis rang bzhin gyis mdun du mchis nas/ lag pa g.yas pa kyi bor gzhag pa dang / dri myed 'phags kyi lta ba'i cho 'phrul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzidad 'thob cing / de bzhin gshegs pa
120b1(mdo): mas cad kyin zan pa pa'i byin kyi rnam pa bkod pa yang dag par la ba spang ba zhes bya ba'i du 'phrul lo' nas 'i cad lha'i bgal pa stong du 'gyur ro// bdag nyid snga'i rang bzhin thob pa dang / de bzhin
120b2(mdo): gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag myed kyis/ dam pa'i chos kyi rtam gleng bar mdzad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// bde ba can na
120b3(mdo): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad bsu ba'i slad du lha'i gzugs mdun namachis par 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil bar 'gyur ro// pad ma snang ba'i gzhal byed 'ang / 
120b4(mdo): zhes bgyi ba'i khang pa rtseka pa'i gzhal byed khang thob paradagyur ro// de nas rang gi lus rdo rje sra ba'i bdag nyid kyi snying po'i rang bzhin thob par 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang des spos chab
120b5(mdo): des bum pa bkang nas/ lam khri nyis stong bzlas brjod dbya/ ma ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa byad ras gzigs// dbang phyug gi mdun du nyin zhag gcig mchis par gyurar pa zhus
120b6(mdo): bgyi'o// khrus bgyis pa tsam gyis mdo la lus rdo rje las byung ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de la gzig sa par 'gyur ro// tshe lha'i lo khrir 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / 
120b7(mdo): srin po dang / gdon thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// lha dang klu thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub pa bgyid par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam 'am/ sems bskyed pa
120b8(mdo): tsam gyi mod la/ gnod pa thams cad dang brjed byed thams cad babs nas/ thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// bde ba 'am myi bde ba 'am/ yang dag pa 'am/ yang dag pa ma lags pa 'am/ skal pa dang / 
121a1(mdo): ldan pa 'am/ rgal ba dang kyi ldan pa 'am byung ba 'am/ mabyung ba 'am/ 'byor pa 'am/ rgyas pa 'am / bde ba dang / lo legs par de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// de la sogs te/ 
121a2(mdo): las bgyid pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// bran bzhin du las rtag tu bgyid par 'gyur ro// yang na 'jig rten thams cad so sor bskal pa thams cad 'tshal lam/ thams cad dbang du gyurd nas gzhag par
121a3(mdo): 'tshal lam/ thams cad sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten las tha rad par bgyi bar 'tshal lam/ don yod ye shes bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind thob
121a4(mdo): par 'tshal lam/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor sgrub par 'a tshul lam/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo sgrub par 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang des gzugs rnyan so so bani/ 
121a5(mdo): ru/ 'phags pa yun rab gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i gzugs su bgyis te/ ral pa'i thor tshugs dang / ridags e me la'i pags pas brgyan pa/ phyugs bdag gis
121a6(mdo): lugs 'chang ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dkyil mo krung ngam/ 'greng ba drung na nor bzangs pus mo g.yas pa phab pa/ g.yon na 'khro bo'i rgyal po gdong gyen du lta ba/ 'khro bo'i gzugs lag pa
121a7(mdo): drug pa/ 'od dpag byed kyi dbu rgyan thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs pa/ thams cad ring srel dang bcas par bgyi ste/ ri'i steng du pad ma'i stan la mchis par bkyi'o// phyang mas gos kyang ma bgo/ 
121a8(mdo): te/ dus gsum du khrus bgyis nas/ nyin zhag gcig mchis te/ rigs sngags 'cha kil pa'i nam sngas nye reg bgyi'o// chab dang yungs kar gyi dbang bskur bgyi'o// snying rje chen pos gdungs
121b1(mdo): pa'i snying gis blta bar bgyi'o// gal te 'di ltar bu'i cho gas myi bgyid na/ klags pa tsam gyi mod la yang 'grub par 'gyur na/ bzlas brjod kyi las kyi cho ga lta smos kyang ci dgos/ yang rig sngags 'cha
121b2(mdo): kang zhig kang ko'i klung ki bye ba phrag brgya bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod par 'tshal lam/ lta bar 'tshal lam/ dge
121b3(mdo): ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bskyed par 'tshal lam/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i cha ba la rab tu gzhag par 'tshal lam/ thams cad kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag par bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rigs sngags 'chang des
121b4(mdo): dge slong pa 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rgyal po 'am btsun mo 'am/ gzhan su yang rung bas thams cad go cha bzhin bgyi ste/ des ci 'byor dpa'i
121b5(mdo): gser las don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs rnyan bgyi'o// de nas kha shar phyogs su bstan te/ gzhan la gur kum gyi dkyis 'khor bgyi ste/ gru bzhi mang byes par li kris thig gdab pa
121b6(mdo): bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor kyi dbus su pad pa'i 'phreng ba bgyi'o// pad ma'i 'phreng ba'i dbus su ril pa gyi thugs dang bzang 'phreng gzhag par bgyi'o// me tog sna tshogs kyis yengs par 'gyi'o// thom pa kyi
121b7(mdo): bkang ba'i bum pa me tog ci 'byord pas legs par brgyan pa bzhi bzhag par bgyi'o// mchod yon gi snod lnga bzhag par bgyi'o// pog por ldanas a ga ru li bdug pas bdug par bgyi'o// dris bsgom
121b8(mdo): pa'i ma me bcu drug grang par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par 'gyi'o// me tog dang / 'dug pa dang / dri dang / 'bring ba yang dbus par 'byar/ 'jig rten dbang thun na
122a1(mdo): mdun du dkyil mo krung bcas te/ mchis nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
122a2(mdo): thams cad la dmyigs pa yid la bgyis la phyogs bcur yid kyis mchod cing phyag bkyi'o// bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis pa dang / sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur ro// 
122a3(mdo): bdag nyid dga' bar gyur nas 'bar bar mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang zhal mngon sum du ston pa nye bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ral pa'i gseb 'bar bar gyur da nas
122a4(mdo): du legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad pa ldan gnyis bzlas brjod bgyis na/ grub pa chen po'i rtags ston par 'gyudar ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyang na
122a5(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang kyi phyi bro 'jog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin pa/ shegs pa thams cad gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob para'agyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rigs sngags 'chang bar
122a6(mdo): 'gyur ro// nyi ma yem de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mthong bar skyer nas/ sangs rgyab kyi zhing thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i phra ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// brgya sa brkyad
122a7(mdo): lan gsum babras na/ 'phags pa gyu rab gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs skya rer 'chang ka'i dus su mdun du mchis nas / pad ma dril byed pa zhes bgyi ba'i 'gas pa thol bar 'gyur ro// grub pa thams cad myos
122a8(mdo): bar gyur ro// bral ba 'dod pa byed kyang legs po zhes kyim thos par 'gyur ro// gar bu yang rung bas 'angags pa kun ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs mayo na/ deni de bzhin gshegs pa rgya ma
122b1(mdo): byed pa gyu/ grug rgyan can po'i sa#// da pam da#
122b2(mdo): sam pa cid pa su rdzogs das/ ga sa rjes su 'brang zhing bzung ba dang / sprob pa dang / 'ad par gyid par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang bral par 'gyur ro// dad yang pa'i 'anas
122b3(mdo): ga zhi bso / sa po bca / denas kyi 'byung ba'i gaman sa gshegs dang thug dang pa pa [।]@#@
122b4(mdo): bsad ste sa / susmras su kyis 'a'o chu banis dgas par byes par byas te/ ye khris bag btab la dkyil 'khor kyi bras su pa nga bri mad pa'i 'breng ba'i dbus su mas pa 'bri
122b5(mdo): ma po 'bring bri/ me ton sna tshogs pa kram la/ bum bcu sa bka pa me tog ci 'byor dpas legs par brgyan pa bzhi 'an/ mchod yon gyi snod lnga bzhag par bya zhing / drog yor ldan sa
122b6(mdo): ka ma'i 'dug pas bdug par bgyi'o// spom snga drug cu dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam ste/ 'phags pa rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bya zhing / me tog dang 'dug pa dang / dri dang 'bre sa
122b7(mdo): dag kyang dbus par bya'o// 'jig rtend dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs te/ dkyil mo krung brnas la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings la bdag nyid dbang bskur ro// 'tsho bo'i rgyal po ya gcig bzlas la/ 
122b8(mdo): phyogs bcu 'odi bzhin gshegs pamams cad yod la byas te/ 'od kyis phyag byas sa lus kyis kyang phyag byas te/ 'bral brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings la 'bras brjod pakye'o// brgyam brgyad bzlas pasas na pa
123a1(mdo): 6/ g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / bdag nyid snying dga' la 'bar bar snang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad zhal nye bar ston par mdzad do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dbu ras/ 
123a2(mdo): ba'i gseb 'bar zhi ba legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ngo // brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa gnyis pas ni/ dngos grub chen po'i mtshan ma ston to// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag brkyang ste/ 
123a3(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind thob par 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang la don yod pa'i zhags pa grub
123a4(mdo): par 'gyur ro// pho rangs de bzhin gshegs pa de dag zhal ston par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par
123a5(mdo): 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad gsum pas ni skya rengs/ shar ba'i dus kyi tshe/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug ra nga gi gzugs kyis mdun na bzhugs te/ pad ma'i dri ma myed
123a6(mdo): pa zhes bya ba'i zhags pa sbyin par mdzad cing / dngos grub thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// rgyal ba 'od dpag myed kyang legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad do// gang la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
123a7(mdo): phyag gi sku bstan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi la dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad dang tshangs pa la sogs pa dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu dzAs
123a8(mdo): rtag tu lung stod 'dod par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad yong su rdzogs pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par
123b1(mdo): 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de nas dngul las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs snga ma bzhin byas la/ tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor dang
123b2(mdo): can dan dkar po'i dri cheb kyis bkang ba bzhag pa bya zhing / mchod yon gyi snod lnga bzhag par bya'o// me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing can dan dkar po'i bdug spos kyis bdugs te/ 'phags pa rgyan ram gzigs
123b3(mdo): la mchod par bya'o// dri sA bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i til yar kye mar me bsnyam par bya zhing / bdug spos kyi snod bzhi bcu bzhag par bya'o// 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byams
123b4(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang chang mas gos kyang ma bgos te/ don yod dpa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun bcing ngo po// bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bsra te/ dkyil mo krung du 'dug la lag pa g.yod pa'i 'dub ma
123b5(mdo): btu ba med pa'i rgyal du byas la/ bzlas brjod lan 'amabargyad bya'o// lan brgyam brgyad cang ba dang / shar phyogs nas so gas po zhes bya ba'i sngagrags par 'gyur zhing / 'ad
123b6(mdo): dang / rnas thugs pa dang su gyur zhing / napa pazhi na par 'gyur / gang pan pa byed pa gyur pa/ rgyam la yi pabanam dzan kyid kyi ga da man yangasu su mi
124a1(mdo): rtsa brgyad lan gsum bzlas pas nyi ma dang zla ba nam mkha' las 'bab cing mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro// mtshan mo'i lha dang bcas pa nam mkha'i lha 'ongs nas/ mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing / dpag
124a2(mdo): du 'gyur ro// thams cad rtsi bgyi zhes pa'i bya ba byed cing 'dug par 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan bzhi bzlas pas/ klu thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur te/ rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' la
124a3(mdo): phyogs pa'i bar thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur ro// zangs las byas pa'i 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa la/ tsan dan dmar po'i dkyil 'khor byas te/ me tog dmar po bkram
124a4(mdo): la/ bdug spos kyi snod bzhi nas bdug par bya zhing / mar gyi/ dmar me lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bltam par bya'o// mchod yon gyi snod bzhi pa zhug la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par
124a5(mdo): bya'o// 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rjes su dran parabya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig pa/ cing bar bya'o// ras la bris pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar dkyis
124a6(mdo): mo krung du 'dug ste/ sems can thams cad la dmyigs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bya'o// phyogs bzhir byams pa'i lta bas blta bar bya'o// sems can dmyal ba dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
124a7(mdo): rten dang / lha ma yin dang / yi dgas kyi yul thams cad yid la bya'o// sems can dmyal ba chen po rgyad yid la bya zhing // snying rje'i sems kyis blta bar bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ bzlas/ 
124a8(mdo): brjod bya'o// brgya ma brgyad zab pa dang / phyogs bzhi g.yo zhing sgra grags par 'gyur ro// dmyal ba'i sems can de dag thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// dmyal ba'i skamams cad bcad par 'gyur zhe/ 
124b1(mdo): bcom pa dang thal bar klags par 'gyur ro// dmyal ba'i sems can de dag bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid kyang byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad las
124b2(mdo): yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// lus kyang mtshan bzang pos brgyan par 'gyur zhing / sems can gang dag gis mthong ba de dag thams cad phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod
124b3(mdo): byas pas ni/ sa'i 'og gi sems can mun nag pa snang ba dang bral ba de dag don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mthu pa mun nag dang bral bar 'byung zhing / 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yongs su krol ba'i sa
124b4(mdo): can de dag 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas su rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing / dka' ba dang 'chi ba spangs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du kun nas mthus 'phags pa
124b5(mdo): dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// bskal pa thub par 'gyur ro// shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rtenagyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar
124b6(mdo): du de nyid kyi zhabs drung du gnas par 'gyur zhing / mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// tsan dan dkar po dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / spos kyi rigs sna tshogs gzhan dag phye ma zhib mor byas te
124b7(mdo): yang legs par btags te/ kun tu ru dang / sra pri pog dang / kan d+ha ra sa dang / chu dang lhan cig sbyar te/ sha kha ra btab la legs par btags pa las/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug don
124b8(mdo): yod pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad du byas te/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ral pa'i thor tshugs dang / e na ya'i pags pas bzhugs pa phyugs bdag gi cha lus 'dzin pa/ phyag bzhi gcig na pad ma thogs/ gnyis
125a1(mdo): pa zhags pa thogs/ gsum pa gsal shing thogs pa dbugs 'byin pa/ bdan pad ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gis brgyan par bya ste/ g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma/ g.yon tu
125a2(mdo): dri byed 'gro bar bya'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi 'og tu ni 'khro bo'i rgyal po'o// gong du ni 'od dpag myed do// de nas rigs sngags chang mas gos thang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du zhus bya yang gos mu/ 
125a3(mdo): phrugs bgos la tshes brgyad nas bco lnga nya'i bar du dus gsum du bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// spos sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor byug pa bya zhing / tshon lnga lngas bri bar bya zhing / dkyil 'khor kyi dbus
125a4(mdo): su don yod pa'i zhags pa dang / rigs sngags kyi lha phul mo ba tsugs te/ gyen du lta kha bri bar bya'o// ma ba'i bdabang phyug dang / dadabang phyug chen po dang / gzhin rje dang / tshul bri bar bya
125a5(mdo): sgo bzhi'i me mdzes par bya'o// dkyil 'khor khor yug tu pad/ sa bri bar bya'o// sra bzhir spos kyis bkapa pa gzhan pagro bzhi dri dang / tor ma dang / bum pa ga pa bzhan no/ 
125a6(mdo): dkar gsum tor la dang / mtshad yid kyi snod brgyad bzhan go// me tog sna tshogs bkram par bya zhing/ a ka rbu dang / can dan gi gdun pa bul bar bya'o// thom pa nyi shu ma brgyad dang ldan pa'i
125a7(mdo): mar gyi me bskam par bya/ 'ab gdugs pazang po sna tshogs kyis legs par 'argyan par bya nye/ bya chub sems dpa' 'phags pa khyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug zhas shar phyogs su bstan la mchod par bya
125a8(mdo): rab kyi tshod spyang lnga lnga pa/ srid du khwa ban drug pa/ bor to gcig tu gse gi yang myig yang togacig tu su tig mun kos btags te/ sprul 'khyil pa bzhin du bskyes la/ dkyis 'khong gi 'bum su
125b1(mdo): bzhag ste/ khams gos cang mas g.yogs par bya'o// rigs sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor la mngon du 'phyogs te/ dkyil mo krung du 'dug la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan sum bcu rtsa gnyis
125b2(mdo): bcing ba byas la bdag srung ngo // 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas la/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang phyogs bcing ba yang bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis bzhin 'dzum gyis rgyas
125b3(mdo): par byas la bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ myi smra bar yungs kar 'bru re nas/ bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ ras kyi srad pu'i steng du rtor bar bya ste/ stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / 
125b4(mdo): ras kyi srad bu de 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / 'od zer sna tshogs byung bar 'gyur ro// legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod kyis don
125b5(mdo): yod pa'i zhags pa grub kyis long la/ dgos pa thams cad byos shig/ khyod kyis yid bzhin nor bu chen po gnyis don yod pa/ 'i zhags pa dam pa grub pasang/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig
125b6(mdo): ten las 'das pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de yang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku las 'thos kyi srin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur
125b7(mdo): sos des dpag tshad tsam du khyab par byed do// kapal dri mnam pa tsam gyis nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ sdug bsngal gyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / byad dang / 
125b8(mdo): dbyig dug dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba rnams 'jig par 'gyur ro// lus thams cad dri ma myed par 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis yid bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa de blangs la/ ga ba che bzang pon
126a1(mdo): nang du bcug ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du gzhag par bya'o// nam dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe/ chang mas khrus legs par byas te/ blang mar bya zhing dgos pa bya'o// 
126a2(mdo): nyin re zhing dus gsum du mchod pa bya'o// rigs sngags 'chang de yang nam mkhal la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / lus yongs su dag pas sngon gyi rigs sngags 'chang rnams dang / lhan cig che zhing thams cad dbang
126a3(mdo): du 'gyur ro// che lo stong thub par 'gyur ro// shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rtend kyi khams su skal pa mnyam pa rnams kyi nang du pad ma'i snying po la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang thams
126a4(mdo): cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// sna' ma'i me tog la la na brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs la re de nas dbul bar bya ste/ brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / rgyal po
126a5(mdo): dang blon po dang / btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyu/ ra te/ rang nyid nor dang bcas dbyig dang bcas 'bru dang bcas/ gron po dang bcas/ bran mo dang bcas te las byed par 'gyur/ 
126a6(mdo): snga ma'i me tog de bsdus la sbra rtsi dang bri yang ku dang / rgya spos dang / ru rta dang / gur ku ma dang / spang spos dang / sa ma ga dang / sprig ka dang / na la dang / bo la dang / yungs kar rnams zhib du btags pa
126a7(mdo): bye ma char pa'i chud ba sbyar ba'i ril lu ni dug byed par byed pa'i mchog dam pa zhes bya ste/ phog par grags pa dang pal du byed/ nad thams cad sel ba dang / rims thams cad nye bar sel bar byed do// brtson
126a8(mdo): shu dang / 'bras dang / me dpal dang / gang shu dang / bol myig dang / ldog pa dang / de thams cad la ni bsdus na bde bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// zhes gsung ngo // nad de thams cad la khrus byas na/ sdig
126b1(mdo): sel to zhes thub pa gsung ngo // tshe sbyin par byed rgyal po dag yul sbyin par byed do// thig le byas te g.yul ngor song na/ thams cad las rtag tu rgyal ba dang / bud myed rnams dga' ba dang / dbang du 'gyur ba/ 
126b2(mdo): byed pa'i cho ga yin no// / byad 'joms shing dug dang / dbyig dug dang / phye ma'i dug dang / gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba dag kyang de bzhin no// zas za ba dang khrus byed pa na/ thig le byug pa rtag tu byas na/ de
126b3(mdo): thams cad las 'gro ba rnams bde bar tha rad par 'gyur ro// zhes 'jig rten dbang phyug gapung ngo // klad pa'i nad kyi bzad pa la ni byug par bya'o// byig na ba la ni myig sman gyi thung mas so/ son pa la ni 'ang
126b4(mdo): mur ro// ston pa la ni chu rnon po dang ngo // rtsib logs na ba lA da ni mA dang byug ko/ yan lag dang nying lag na ba la ni lag 'chidal bsrubs so// nad tshabs tshu la ni bsku mnye dang khrus bya'o// 
126b5(mdo): gnod sbyin gi gdon bsal ba la ni sna nas btang ba'i lasabya'o// bdug pas gdon thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro// sa thebs pa la ni 'tshogs mar thig le bya'o// snying na ba la ni
126b6(mdo): chu dron dang / lan cha bsregs pas so// khyim zhi bar bya ba ni 'bras yos dang / gsum sbyar gyis zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// thams cad du lan nyi shu cha gcig bzlas so// 'thab pa dang / phod pa la ni
126b7(mdo): ba brang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la/ me tog bkram ste/ dri chus bkang ba bzhi bzhag cing / 'o mas bkang ba bzhi dang / mchod yon bzhi dang / pog phor bzhi bzhag ste/ sa ka ru dang / du ru
126b8(mdo): skas bdug go// ku gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te bdug par bya'o// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri chab kyis mchod par bya'o// 'khro ba'i rgyal po yungs kar la lan brgya
127a1(mdo): tha brgyad bzlas te/ phyogs bzhir rtor bar bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan sku bcu rtsa gcig bzlas na 'thab pa dang thod pa rnams smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// g.yul 'byed pa las/ 
127a2(mdo): rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rang gi dpung dang gzhan gi dpung yan lag bzhi pa thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// gal te brgya byin rang dang / lha ma yin lhan cig pas kyang ma yin na/ myi rnams kyis lta ci smos
127a3(mdo): brgya byin dgug par 'dod na/ pad ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ brgya byin gyi mying na brjod la/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug nas re re nas dbul bar bya zhing dri chab kyang dbul lo// gu gul
127a4(mdo): dang / mar dang / yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ shid u rka'i me spang la/ tshes bcu bzhi'i nya la sbyin sregs bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rdzogs pa dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po 'ongs nas mdun
127a5(mdo): na 'dug ste/ bsgo ba bzhin byed cing thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// brgya byin gi go 'phang ma rtogs pa gang bslangs pa de sbyin par bye// da de de ni sems myi bzod do// tshangs pa rdog pas mnan te
127a6(mdo): lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / tshangs pa rang gi gzugs kyi mdun no 'dug ste/ mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do// yid la ji 'dod pa sgrub par byed do// ku gul la lan chu bcu bzlas te/ khyab
127a7(mdo): 'dug la bdug cing / chu dang yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ spyi bor tor na/ khyab 'jug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// gzugs sna tshogs
127b1(mdo): brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar la lan nyi shu pa gcig bzlas nas/ spyi bor tong ro// gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug cing / a rka'i chu la lan bdun bzlas te/ dbul bar bya'o// de nas dbang phyug chen
127b2(mdo): po'i gzugs 'gul bar 'gyur zhi pa/ legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ngo // de nas dbang phyug chen po rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing / rang gyi 'khor gi tshogs dang bcas pa thams
127b3(mdo): cad dbang du 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do// mchog gang 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed do// nag po chen po dgug par 'dod pas/ gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ 
127b4(mdo): khrag dang chang dbul bar bya zhing / yungs kar la lan nyi shuHgcig bzlas shing / nag po chen po'i steng du tor na khugs par gyur na te/ bran bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur zhing
127b5(mdo): gar mngags pa der 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / 'khor gi tshogs/ dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gi gnas thams cad kyi sgo ba bar 'gyur zhing 'gang 'dod pa de byed do// zas
127b6(mdo): cad byams par 'gyur zhing / las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// myi smra bar mtshan mo'i dus mtshams gsu du lon nyi shu ma re bzlas na mtshan mo la lce 'khor dang bcas pa dang / mtshan mo rgyu ba dang / nyid
127b7(mdo): par rgyu ba'i lha dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkhal lding dang / phyi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / phyi 'am gyi ma yin pa dang / thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// las thams cad
127b8(mdo): byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad rang gi zugs kyis rtag tu mdun na nye bar gnas so// mtshan mo longs spyad par gzhal byed 'ang thams cad sbyin par byed do// cha mas gos tshabs bgos te// khrus
128a1(mdo): legs par byas nas/ bden par smra zhing / byams pa'i sems nye bar gzhag nas/ sems can thams cad la rtag tu brtse ba dang / snying rje chen pos lhag par dmyigs te bzlas brjod rtag/ 
128a2(mdo): tu bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rim par bye ba'o// / de nas rtag tu lam thams cad byed pa/ dge bzhi pa rgyas pa/ drag shul spyod pa/ bsrung ba/ nad thams cad sel ba/ byang
128a3(mdo): 'jigs pa/ dbang du byed pa/ sbyin sregs kyi chog bshad par bya'o// khyim bsrung bar 'dod pas a ka'i lam sreg shing / pad ma dang / sungs kar las sbyin phrag brgya ma brgyad byas te/ don yod 'a/ 
128a4(mdo): pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ khyim chen po srung bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / cod pa dang / khrag khrug thams cad dang / byir/ 
128a5(mdo): rgol ba dang / myi mdza' ba thams cad dang / rims nad thams/ cad dang / yams kyi nad dang / nad 'gro ba thams cad dang / don thams cad dang / mu ge'i dgon pa dang / myi ngas dang / 
128a6(mdo): skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i myi ngas thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sra ba byed par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po yang rtag
128a7(mdo): phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa gyun ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang rtag tu rgyun gyi 'chad bang zhu ston bzhed pam 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg gi mar dang / yungs kar dang / ku gul gyi sbyin sreg
128a8(mdo): stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ yul dang yul 'khor dang grong khyer dang / yul gru dang / re khrod dang / ljongs rnams zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan snga zla ba nya la me to/ 
128b1(mdo): dkar po dang / kan da pri yang gu dang / h+ya spos rnams yungs mar dang bsres te/ sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas nas/ rgyal po blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / yul gru dang / grong khyer dang
128b2(mdo): dgrong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / ba lang dang / ma he rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// shing a pa marga'i yam sreg shing / zho dang / spang ci dang / mar bsres pa dang / me tog dkar po rnams
128b3(mdo): lus ldan stong cha brgyad sbyin sregs byas na/ yul gru stong thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa rgyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zho dang / sprang ci dang / mar dang bsres pa dang pad pa'i sdong bu'i yam sreg
128b4(mdo): shing rnams las brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sregs byas na/ mtshan mo za da pa dang / di na ra brgyad brgya thob par 'gyur ro// me tog ku ma? ta dang / pad ma'i sdong bu dang / rtsa ba dang 'dab mar bcas pa dang / 
128b5(mdo): yungasu kar bsres te shing se ldeng gi me spar la/ sbyin sregs brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/ log 'dren thams cad las yongasu grol ba ra 'gyur ro// zla ba yar gyi ngo'i ches brgyad la srung ba byas te
128b6(mdo): chang mas khrum legs par byas la kos dkar po bgos te/ tsan don dang / bri yang ku'i shing dang / 'bral yos dang / yung me kar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong cha brkyang byas na/ nas byed kyi nab su
128b7(mdo): gnod sbyin ma 'ongs nas/ zong lnga sgo ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// za mar gyi ro ches bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig srung ba byas te/ rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu d+hu gi 'gram du song la/ shing bil ba'i me sbru
128b8(mdo): te/ bil ba'i me tog dang / mar bsres pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sregs byas na/ de'i 'og tu gnod sbyin gi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro// nam phyed na rin po che'i za ma tog/ 
129a1(mdo): thogs nas 'ong bar 'gyur te/ rigs ldag pa 'thang des blang bar bya'o// gdob du sdig sa par ni gyi byal/ yang 'argyam brgyang bzlas brjod byas pa dang / rkang pa'i drung du srid po nas
129a2(mdo): btud ste/ rigs lags 'a 'ayum so zhes zer ro// den pa rigs 'grus 'chang gis 'tho bo'i rgyal pa lan nyi sa rtsa gcig bzlam badzad pa'o// den sa ga ga mengan par byung ba'i 'i mad pa byed pa
129a3(mdo): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/ gnod sbyin mo 'ong bar 'gyur te/ dgos pa thams cad byed cing bran bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// zla ba mar gyi ngo'i ches bcu bzhi la gang na rter yod pa de
129a4(mdo): song ste/ stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ tor ma'i kra yang gzhag par bya zhing 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa la mtshodad pa byas la/ sna ma'i me tog dang / 'dab ma dang / nyungs
129a5(mdo): kar dang / mar bsres pa rnams sbyin sreg stong pa brgyad byas te/ chu dang yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas/ sa la bdebs na/ de'i 'og tu rter thams cad 'byung bar
129a6(mdo): 'gyur ro// blangs la dkon mchog gsum gyi sku skal dbul bar bya zhing / lhag ma rang gis brang bar bya'o// ba ru ra'i shing ki me spang la 'brem yos dang / mar bsres pa las sbyin sregs stong rtsa brgyad byas na
129a7(mdo): rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / dpung gi yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa dang / nor dang 'bru dang bcas pa dang / dbyig dang gser dang / bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas par
129a8(mdo): 'gyur ro// yungs kar dkar po dang / tsam pa ka'i me tog dang / pad ma'i yam sreg shing dang / spra rtsi dang / mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ yul thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing / bud
129b1(mdo): byed dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dbang du 'gyur ro// 'bras bub lan cha dang ldan pas lan du bcu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na/ rigs bzhi'i 'jig te nang du 'gyur ro// a ka sti'i shing kyis spang la
129b2(mdo): sprang rtsi dpa mar bsres la dang / sa rka'i me tog las sbyin sregs brgya rtsa brgyad byas la/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na/ nyin re zhing des na ra brgya thob par 'gyur ro// ba la/ 
129b3(mdo): sha'i yam sreg shing dang / 'bras yos las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na gser brgya phrag stong thob par 'gyur te/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa bya zhing / bgo bsha' byas na yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
129b4(mdo): tshes bco lnga zla ba nya la snyung ba byas te/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu chung ngam/ chu rlung chen po'i nang du rkyed pa nub tsam du zhugs te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la yungs kar la lan
129b5(mdo): nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/ khros pas chu rlung de la 'bab/ par bya'o// de chu'i nang nas bu mo zhig byung nas/ rin po che ma nga po dag sbyin par byed na blangs la/ phyed kyis dkon mchog
129b6(mdo): gsum la mchod par bya zhing / 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyag la yang mchod par bya'o// tshes bcwo lnga zla ba nya la skung ba byas te/ nam phyed na bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs
