129b7(mdo): dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas/ a pa marga'i yam sreg shing dang / sba thi dang / mar dang sra rtsi pog bsres pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ rang gi mying kis sbyin sregs byas na/ sdig pa'i
129b8(mdo): sgrib pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur zhing / nad thams cad dang gnod pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba thams cad dang myi mdza' ba thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// shing a
130a1(mdo): rga dang til mar dang / yungs kar dang / ku gul dang / mer bsres pa las sbyin sregs byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// 'bras yos dang / 'o ma dang / mar dang / yungs ka pa dang / 68
130a2(mdo): dan kar po bsres pa las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/ rgyas pa dang / mchog tu dge bar 'gyur ro// tshes bcu bzhi la kar pi ka ra'i me tog dang / lan tsha rnam bdun bsres pa dang / shing tsher ma can gyi yam
130a3(mdo): sreg shing gyi yungs mar la bsres la drag shul spyod pa bya'o// char myi 'bab po'i tshe pad ma dang tsan dan dang / yungs kar dang mar bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ sbyin sregs brgya rtsa brgyad byas nas
130a4(mdo): 'khro bo'i gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas na ji srid 'dod pa de desrid du char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// thal ba de thA ngas la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te nam mkha' la rtor na ha cang chad
130a5(mdo): che ba zhi bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bzhir rtor na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyu ra ro// ser ba rnams 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi sde
130a6(mdo): mnan pa ni til dang / 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis so// phyogs bzhir rtor na ni sa bon bdun gyi sbyin sreg gis so// phug sgrub pa ni shing a rka'i sbyin sreg gis so// ar ko'i lo ma dang / mar bsres
130a7(mdo): pa'i sbyin sreg byas na phug gi sgo thams cad bye bar 'gyur ro// nags su 'gro ba'i tshe ku mu ta dang rgya spos dang / yungs kar dang / mar bsres pas nags kyi sgo thams cad bye bar 'gyur zhing / sman gyi dngos
130a8(mdo): po thams cad dang rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// shing pa la sha'i me sbar te/ na le shas brgya stong sbyin sregs byas na/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / 
130b1(mdo): nyi ma 'ongs nas mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro// snga ma'i me tog dang / kar ni ka'i me tog dang / ud pa la rnams mar dang bsres pa las// sbyin sreg brgya stong byas na// zla ba nya ba dang nyi ma 'ongs nas mtsho/ 
130b2(mdo): sbyin zhing / lus la 'od zer btang nas nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// a shwad zas yam sreg shing byas la shu ti dang / nye'u shing dang / ar rga dang / tsan dan dang / yungs kar dang / nas dang / mar
130b3(mdo): bsres pa las nyi ma bdun gyi dus mtshams gsum du sbyin sregs nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// kadon dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad chad pas
130b4(mdo): bcad na/ 'bras so ba dang nyungs kar dang / lan pa'i sbyin bregs gis ste/ thams cad la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i bachi dpab bya zhing / 'khro bo'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags lan cig rjesu
130b5(mdo): dran par bya'o// // spyan sreg gi cho ga'o// / de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga'i rgyal po'i rim kyi sku gzugs mthong ba tsam gyi mod la mnar myed pa'i mthar thug
130b6(mdo): ba dang / mtshams myed pa lnga byed pa 'byang bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya ste/ ras zhu do gru bzhi lham pa 'a chams bcad pa skra byed pa/ zag ngan ba'ang ba shin tu kar ba shi nad tu sbyangs pa la ri mo mkhan gyi sgra'o/ 
130b7(mdo): dga' grub can paskyed gnas la gnas pa/ kyang bgos yangs bags pa/ zas kang gsum tha ba/ dus gsum du thub byab pa sngags pa yin pa'i mtshan mi da ya banan par ma
130b8(mdo): 'phags pa phyin ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhengs pa 'am/ bzhugs pa 'am dkyis mo krung du bzhugs pa bri bar byaste/ ral pa'i lor zhugs kyis brgyan pa e na ya'i lags pa bsdams pa byugs
131a1(mdo): bdag gi cha mugs 'chang ba/ rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag bcu drug pa zhal zhi ba rgyan bye ba/ dbu rgyan la 'od dpag byed bzhugs pa zhal g.yas pa'i thor tshugs la zla ches kyis/ 
131a2(mdo): brgyan pa phyag gnyis rdo rje'i thal mo sbyar ba las gyen du pad ma'i tshul du bya'o// phyag gnyis thur du kun tu zhal gyi phyag rgya bya'o// phyag gnyis bzlal brjod kyi phyag rgya byas la/ 'dzub mo g.yas pa ba
131a3(mdo): ste pad pa'i tshul du byas la/ par na 'grang 'breng 'dzin par bya'o// phyag gnyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bya'o// phyag gcig na rtse gsum gnyis pa na pad ma gsum pa na don yod pa'i zhags
131a4(mdo): pa'i glegs bam bzhi pa na don yod pa'i zhags pa/ zhags dpa ze yul ba 'dra ba lnga pa dbugs 'byind pa/ drug pa na ril pa kyi thugs/ bdun pa na rin po che sna bdun kis bkang ba'i
131a5(mdo): snod/ brgyad pa na me tog sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i snod khro/ gas pa re bye zhing / 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ sku me to// ga sna tshogs bkram pas mdzes par bya'o// ri bo ta lo'i
131a6(mdo): khang pa brtsegs pa/ shin tu mdzes pa/ gru bzhi snyam pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ wa~M 'bang stegs bu mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ rin po tshe sna tshogs kyis mdzes par brgyan pa/ pad ma'i 'phreng ba
131a7(mdo): mdzes par byas pa/ rdo rje'i 'phreng bas brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang / chu shing gi yal gas mdzes par byas pa/ g.yas logs kyi steng na nyi ma g.yon logs na zla ba/ cang ma rigs kyi lha'i
131a8(mdo): bu dag lag na me tog sna tshogs mang po thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po byed par bya'o// ri pad la 'dra ba zhig snying pos mdzes par bya zhing / snying po dang ldan pa mtsho mdzes par
131b1(mdo): byas pa/ mtsho nyams dga' zhing chu srin ma ka ra dang / ngang pa dang gzhad dang / shang shang de'u dang / dur bas brgyan pa nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i ri'i steng du pad ma'i ga dan dang / seng
131b2(mdo): ke'i khri bya'o// g.yas phyogs kyi phyi rol khang pa'i gnas su dbang phyug bya'o// g.yon tu dbang phyug chen po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o// nang gi nas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
131b3(mdo): ko// g.yas su 'phags pa sgrol ma lus btud de/ 'dzem pa dang bcas pa bya'o// g.yon tu dri myed 'grol lag pa dbugs 'byin pa dang / nor bzangs pus mo btsugs pa bya'o// pad ma'i snying po
131b4(mdo): dbus kyi gnas su 'khro bo'i rgyal po khros pa'i gzugs can la ga pa bzhi pa/ lag na mtshon cha thogs pa de zhags pa dang / drubyA dka to dang / rtse gsum dang / pad ma'o// pad ma'i stan la
131b5(mdo): dkyil mo krung phyed bcas pa/ lus cung zad btud pa mgo bo'i steng g.yas phyogs su drang srong stong rabs byed pa bya'o// de nas 'og gi g.yas g.yos su rdo rje zom chen po lag na rdo rje
131b6(mdo): 'i tshogs mang po 'dug pa dpag shin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha dang / dbang po dang / lha'i tshogs dag bya'o// g.yas phyogs kyi mtsho dang / ri'i bar du brgya byin dang / tshangs pa bya'o// g.yon phyogs su
131b7(mdo): rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu pad ma'i rigs ma lags pa 'brel pa bya'o// lha mo dpal chen mo dang / dbyangs ldan pa dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dang / 
131b8(mdo): pa'i lha mo dang / so tog gi lha mo bya'o// dbang phyug gi drung du 'khro gnyer can bya'o// dbang phyug chen po'i drung du kos kar mo'o// ri mo dang po nya'i bar du srin mo ral pa gcig pa'o// ri'i Shor
132a1(mdo): yug gru bzhi rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa bya zhing / ljon shing dang / lcug ma sna tshogs dang / me tog gis brgyan cing / mtshe'u mdzes pa me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang / seng ge dang
132a2(mdo): stag gis gang ba dang / klu'i phrug gu dang / grul bum dag bya'o// g.yon du gsang ba ba lnga bya'o// thams cad brag gi stan dang / lag na rin po che'i me tog gi phur ma thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la lha
132a3(mdo): bar bya'o// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du rig sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs te/ lag na me tog dang / pog por thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la lta bar bya'o// steng ge ba
132a4(mdo): rim du thub chen pa chen po rgyal ba 'od dpag myed dang / shag kya'i rgyal po dang / 'jig rtend dbang phyug rgyal po bya'o// rab kyi skusathugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyi mod la/ tshe rabs brgya stong du man
132a5(mdo): byed par bsags pa dang / mtshams myed pa lnga'i las byas/ pa de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// rnam par 'jig par/ 'gyur zhing / sems can de dag thams cad kyang yongasu grol ba/ 
132a6(mdo): gyur da nang / sems can dag pa rnams lta ci smos/ dad pas mos pa rnams dang / dkon mchog gsum mchod pa don tu gnyer ba de dag no tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu che ba dang / phan yon mang po dag tu shes
132a7(mdo): par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kang ka'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur zhing / de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / ras
132a8(mdo): kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lon pa'i snying po dngos su mthong ba yin no// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyis/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang
132b1(mdo): phyug dgongs par 'gyur zhing / sku yang stond par 'gyur ro// nyams zag pa tsam gyi mod la sku ston par 'gyur zhing / mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'grus
132b2(mdo): par 'gyur ro// nad kyis thebs pa dang / nad tshabs chen pos ka bir ba dang / nad sna tshogs dang sdug bsngal brgya stong gis dkrugs pa de dag thams cad kyis mthong ba tsam gyi yod la/ nad thams cad dang / 
132b3(mdo): sdug bsngal thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur zhing / sgrib pa dang / nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// tha na dud 'gro la skye gnas su rtogs pa dag kyang mthong ba tsam gyi
132b4(mdo): mod la yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// ras kyi sku gzuga'adi 'khor mang pos mchod pa dang / bkur sti chen po dang / sil snyan dgrol ba mang po dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 
132b5(mdo): ba dan gyis legs par brgyan par bya ste/ grong khyer chen po' rgyal po chen po'i pho brang ngam/ chug lag khang ngam/ ljongs lam/ khyim 'am/ klong du zhugs na/ ras kyi sku gzugs
132b6(mdo): bzhugs pa tsam gyi mod la 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab mo dang / khrag zhu ka dang / mu ke'i dkon pa dang / myi ngas dang / rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gi dpung gi 'jigs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro// gnod
132b7(mdo): sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / skyes byed dang / grib gnon zhi bar 'gyur ro// bde ba dang lo legs pa dang / dga' ba dang gyi mang po bde ba mang po
132b8(mdo): 'gyur ro// dga' ba dang yid bde ba mang por 'gyur // pha ro mad tu byin pa drug gi rjes 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'di mthong bsam gyis thams cad bde ba can gyi zhing khams su lci bar 'gyur ro// 
133a1(mdo): bskal pa stong phrag bdun nur tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// pad pa'i 'od dri ma myed cing rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma thob pa thob
133a2(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// pad ma rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid thob par 'gyur ro// // ri mo'i gzugs sgrub pa'i cho ga dang cho ga zhib mo'o// 
133a3(mdo): de nas don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo chen po'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ chu rlung gi 'gram 'am/ pad mo'i mtshe'u 'am/ ud pa la'i mtshe'u 'am/ me tog skyed mos tshal lamaH/ 'bras bu'i kun dga'
133a4(mdo): ra ba 'am/ 'ang bzangs sam/ sa gzhi dag pa sa gzhi po dar su sbyangs pa/ cha dang shing bal dang / ska dang phub ma dang / bol/ ba dang / phyag dar gyi phung po gyo mo dang / shing dang / bong ba dang / 
133a5(mdo): gseg sa dang / zod pa'i rus pas gang ba rnams spangs pa'i sa gzhi phyogs na mche'u dang / 'bab chu dang / 'bab chu byang rgyang gas su 'bab pa dang / nye ba na chu yod cing / shin tu mdzes
133a6(mdo): pa dang / lho phyogs dang byang phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / shar phyogs gang na ljon shing kyis mdzes par byas pa/ ga na nyams dga' ba dang / kha tog dang / gzi byin du ldan pa'i gnas de lta bu rnyed nam
133a7(mdo): chu dang yungs kar la bathas te kun tu rto // pa kazhi de sa bu snar ba ni mchog yin no// 'tsho ba'i rgyal pos yungs kang la lan nyi shu cha gcig bzlas te/ phyogs bzhir tor na/ kun nas dpag
133a8(mdo): tshun chad phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / 'tshams bcings par 'gyur ro// sngang pa sems cad dang / bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad skad cig kyang kyi gnas par phyogs bzhir byed/ 
133b1(mdo): 'jong ngo // srog chanas sdang ba dang / sdang ba'i sems can sdang ba'i gcan ldan mo so ga pa yin pa de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing / lha thams cad srung bar 'gyur ro// gnas kyi phyogs de mkhas
133b2(mdo): bas dkyil 'khor bya ste/ gru bzhi lham pa ngos re re zhing khru sum bcu rtsa gnyis gzhal bar byas te/ cha 'byes pa/ gru bzhi ma mnyam zhing mdzes la khro bani dang / ta babs bzhir ldan pa 'bras kyi bye ma'i
133b3(mdo): snod snga bzhi sbyar la de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ tshon sna lnga'i thig skud kyis thig btab nas/ tsan dan kar po'i phung bu btab ste/ zla ba yar gyi ngo ches brgyad dam tshes bco lnga la/ tshes grangs rgyu
133b4(mdo): skar bzang po brnams te/ dkyil 'khor gyi mchog bri bar bya'o// dang por ni kar por bri bar bya'o// gnyis par ni dmar pos so// kasum pa ni ser pos so// bzhi pa ni nam mkha'i kha tog gis so
133b5(mdo): lnga pa ni myig sman gyi kha dog gis ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po 'jigs pa myed par cha rnam par mdzes shing gsal bar/ pi sar pa dang / tshon dang sdod sar pas bri bar bya ste/ dkyil
133b6(mdo): 'khor gyi snying por pad ma 'dab ma stong pa khor yug stegs bu dang bocas pa bri zhing / pad ma'i 'phreng ba mtshon kyis mdzes par bris la/ de lo dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po shag kya'i rgyas
133b7(mdo): dang / 'od dpag myed dang / 'jig rted dab po'i rgyas po bananago// gsas su mgon po 'jig rten dbang b+han dang yong pa'i zhags pa'i mabya 'chang ba sa sngags kyi the su 'brang ba
133b8(mdo): g.yon tu phyag na rdo rje rnga ya ba dang rdo rje thogs pa/ bzhin 'khro gnyer can 'od 'bar bas bskor ba'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du lha mo sgrol ma dang / dri byed 'gro bya'o// 
134a1(mdo): ma bsdigs pa bya'o// g.yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bram ze'i malugs 'chang ba/ ral ba'i bor tshugs kyis bzhugs pa/ 'od dpag byed kyi tho bcugs kyis brgyan par bya'o// 
134a2(mdo): gsas g.yo su dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po bya'o// dol 'og tu dpal lha mo dang / lamo dbyangs can ma dang sa tshan po'i l+h+wa mo dang / sa'i lham dang / ma tog gi lce mo dang / 'bra
134a3(mdo): 'i lha mo bA'o/ de la'og khor yug tu gshin rje dang / lA dang / rlung lha la logs pa bya'o// ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa'i drang srong yang gzhag par bya'o// thang rgyal mo/ 
134a4(mdo): chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa gzhag par bya'o// dkyil 'khol kyi snying po'i dbus dpa' bar du lcags kyu dang / dpra g+ha dang / rdo rje dang / dbyug pa dang / zhags pa dang / lugs sgrol dag bya'o// 
134a5(mdo): rol tu tshangs pa dang / drag po dang / lha mo dbum dang / tshangs pa'i drung du la po dbyangs ldan sa 'jos pa'i gzugs can no// de gnyis kyi bar du dbyug pa dang / rim pa gyi thugs bri bar bya
134a6(mdo): grwa gcig tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi rnam grangs bzhag go// gra gcig tu shi ba ba ta bzhag go// de nas shar phyogs kyi sgor 'khro bo rta 'grin 'jin
134b1(mdo): ma'i rigs mdzes ma lag pa pad ma'i rtse mo nas 'dzin pa bya'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po zom zhes bya ba'i tshogs/ lag na rdo rje dang / zhags pa thogs pa bya'o// de nas 'jug pa'i sgo nas
134b2(mdo): gaper gi bum pa rlom chus bkang ste/ dpal sa macings la/ rgyad thams cad dang / me tog kyi 'phreng bas brgyan nam/ bsam pa jil pa bzhin du dkyil 'khod kyi dbus su bzhag ste/ steng du ma
134b3(mdo): bcog gi gdu bu bzhag par bya'o// can dan dang kur kus dang ka pung gi mu dang thogazor ba'i bzhag cibs ka nu'i bdug pas sa/ dag tshon lnga lnga'i ras kyi thad bu mchod byed kyi srad bu'i

134b5(mdo): la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byas te/ nyungs kar la don ye dpa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong phra brgyad bzlas te/ de la gdab par bya'o// tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / kra rtsi'i phye mas gos la
134b6(mdo): bsgo bar bya'o// sgo bzhi'i gnas su dri chab kyis bkang ba'i bum pa dang / zas dkar gsum gyi tor ma gzhag par bya zhing / gser rdul gyi mchod yon gyi sdod sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / sos chus pa/ 
134b7(mdo): bkapa pa brgyad gzhag par bya'o// ro dang dri sa tshogs kyis bkapa pa brgyad dang / zho dang / 'os dang / los zhus bkang ba brgyad dang / tor ma la sogs pa bul ba lnga tshogs dang / sna brgyad dang / 
135a1(mdo): dashul ba 'anan brtsam bzhi pa rnams ga dang / zhag dang / sman dang dang / ki'u dang / 'ams ngan pa dang / btu ba ngan pa langs te/ dpas ca bya'o// metog partogs kyi ga

135a3(mdo): ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya/ dkyil 'khor khor yug tu pad ma'i 'phreng ba bri bar bya'o// rigs sngags 'chang chang mas gos chang ma bgos par bya'o// dus gsum du khrus byas la gos gsum

135a7(mdo): kye sgrib pa thams cad rnam par grol ba dang / bde ba thams cad kyi rjesu 'gro zhing / lha dang myi'i dpal thams cad myong bar 'gyur ro// lha dang lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i tshogs kyi bgo skal la
135a8(mdo): dbang bar 'gyur ro// nal 'byor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / gsang 'gas la rten par 'gyur ro// bdeg pa dang / kyo ba dang / phung bus gdab pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / g.yeng ba dang / gsad pa dang / 
135b1(mdo): dbang du bya bas myi zhugs so// gang dag de lta bu byed pa de nyid kyi lus lam/ mgo la brgya phrag stong 'gyur du 'bab par 'gyur zhing / gzhan gyis phyir zlog cing 'gro thar gyi nus te/ rigs sngags 'chad des

135b4(mdo): la ras kyi sku gzugs de yang kha tog sna bdun du 'bar zhing / shas da cher 'gul bar 'gyur zhing / rigs sngags 'chang snying dga' bar 'gyur zhing / ras kyi sku gzugs las legs so zhes bya ba'i

135b6(mdo): zhags pa 'di yang grub/ khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i zhags pa'i mchog 'di yang grub kyis/ khyod kyis las thams cad byos shig/ de dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa mchog grub nas/ bum pa spos
135b7(mdo): chus bkang ba de blangs la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ rgyu skar rgyal la khrus bya 'am/ zla ba yang ngo ches grangs shis pa la khrus byas pa tsam gyi mod la lus thams cad dri ma myed cing yongs su dag
135b8(mdo): thob par 'gyur zhing / dbang po lnga'i bdag nyid yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur te/ rna ba lnga yongasu dag pa dang / myig lnga yongs su dag pa dang / sna lnga yongs su dag pa dang / lce lnga yongs su dag pa
136a1(mdo): rnam par shes pa lnga yong su dag pa dang / dbang po lnga yong su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin par 'gyur zhing / rtag tu zhu ston
136a2(mdo): bzhed pa mas pa 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhal stond par 'gyur ro// rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dgos par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang de la bsrung ba dang
136a3(mdo): bskyab par dang / slab byed par 'gyur ro// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung kyi tshogs dpa bcas te/ sa'i phyogs der 'o bar 'gyur zhing / rtag tu rgyun gyi
136a4(mdo): 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyu ra ro// sred byed kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / nor bu bab dang po dang / gang ba bzang po dang / gsang ba ba brgya stong phrag tu/ 
136a5(mdo): ma bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur zhi// bzhi ba dang bde legs su byed par 'gyur ro// shes pa don / yod pa dang / zos pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtson 'grus
136a6(mdo): thob par 'gyur zhing / sbyin pa don yod pa'i sbyin pa por 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po don yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / 'di ste ste pha rol tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul
136a7(mdo): dpag tu myed pa la mkhas par yang 'gyur ro// rigs sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo yang 'grub par 'gyur ro// stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa dron yod par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
136a8(mdo): gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs par thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed sa ya phrag brgya stong drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i dge ba'i zla ba yong su rdzogs par yang dag pa bzung
136b1(mdo): nga zung ngo // sems can thams cad dkyi brtsod pa dang / 'aku gi bya bar 'gyur zhing / thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// mchod rten rgya gang po dang dra 'i'i sa su 'gyur // dkyis ma rgya ga zhis
136b2(mdo): mo// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po rku ba'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
136b3(mdo): pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar te btud nas

136b8(mdo): s+yag ka ta nan na ma sas s+yag pra ti pan da nan na ya sha yarba ti pre ShA ya ma ta la ti ye/ na mo sa rgyas tre la ra/ mu She b+h+yo/ ma bo sti sa rba tra~M/ a h+ya kan par bya/ na ma a d+ya mi ya ta ba ya/ ta rba ka ta
137a1(mdo): ya a ra ha te pam myag sam b+hu ta ya/ na mo rang na tra ya ya/ na ma a r+ya ba lo ki te sha ra ya b+ho d+hi sad tA ya ma ha sad ta ya/ ma ha ka ru ni ka ya te byo/ ma ha ri shi a r+ya ka na ba re b+h+yo/ 
137a2(mdo): na ma s+thi ta/ si nan a r+ya pa lo ki te sha ra mud kyi rnam/ sa mo ga ra dza na na ma hrid yan/ ta tha gaM ta sa ma mu khan b+ha She ta na ma ha ta pa ri shad ma d+he/ ma ha myi da nin/ a parta yi shu mi/ si d+han du me sa/

137b7(mdo): ka ma la kri ta ka ra ta la/ b+ha na sa ma d+hi'i o kra ma pra ka ma bya/ ba us tra/ san ta ti pa ri pa tsa ka/ ma ha ka ru ni ka/ sarba ka rma ma pa ran bi sho d+ha ka/ sa rba bya d+hi/ pra mo tsa ka/ pa rba a sha pra/

138a1(mdo): pa'i rnal pa 'di ba zhad pa cas kyis 'khor yang po dang dgas rgyam du bcas pa 'di rnam pa drug tu gsos so// 'jig te nang du ldang ba chen por 'byung bar 'gyur to// sa'i me tog mud pas dang /

142a6(mdo): byas te/ zang mas gos wang ma bgos te/ a ka ru'i bdug pas bdug par byas zhing / spos dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam pa byas na/ bzlas brjod byas pa tsam kyi mod la byung ngan pa
142a7(mdo): thams cad myed par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang / rmyi lam ngan pa dang / ltas b+ha dang / sgrib pa bsal na/ gser ram/ rdul gyi bum pa spos chus bkang ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ blugs
142a8(mdo): na de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing / 'jig rten pa'i dpal chen po nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad char bcad nas/ til dang 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis so// nad dang
142b1(mdo): gnod pa thams cad bsal na chu la bzlas pas so// dus ma yin par 'chi ba zhi bar bya na/ dus gsum du rtag tu lan gsum bzlas pas/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba zhi bar 'gyur ro// bcing ba dang
142b2(mdo): lcags sgrog dang / khong sgril gzhom na/ nyin re zhing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas so// rgyal po dbang du bya na/ lam po cher brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// chom
142b3(mdo): po dang rkun po rengs par bya na/ ra dza ka sha ko ta'i sa bon gyi sbyin sreg gis so// me rengs par bya na seng ldeng ki shing la bzlas te/ mer bcug nas bzlas na me rengs par byed par 'gyur ro// chu rengs

142b6(mdo): byind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pa'i rigs sngags 'chang dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma des bgrang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ma kun tu 'byes par byas

143a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rom tu phyind pa gzhag par bya/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya zhing / spos kyi mar me bltam par bya zhing / dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dkyil mo

143a7(mdo): thams cad kyis dbang bskur thob par 'dod pas/ song sum bcu rtsa gnyis bzlas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang 'askur bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin du thos chu'i bum pas dbang bskur bar bya'o//

147b3(mdo): mo thams cad don yod pa/ de kho na nyid sgrub pa 'grub pa dran pa tsam gyi mod la ni cogro bzhi yang do rga la 'gyur la/ sum bcu'i lha rnams g.yo 'gyur zhing // lha bcas rgya mtsho lhun por bcas// klu rnams
147b4(mdo): 'dar ni yid yod cing // gnod sbyin po/ 'bros 'gyur ba// lha dang lha myin gyu lo 'gyed che// rigs sngags rgyal po bla myed kyis// phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin bcas// dpung dang bcas shes
147b5(mdo): gzhon bcas pa'i// lus skyes 'bar ba'i 'phreng \u0f7f/ ne 'dor zhing kun tu 'dar yid yod// rgyal po chen po bzhi po'i// gnas mchog dag ni g.yo 'gyur zhing // de dag
147b6(mdo): thams cad 'dus 'gyur nas// 'jig rten dbyung la skye bos 'dong zhing // bcom ldan 'gon pos skyabs su gsol// thugs rje'i bdag nyid bskyabs su gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
147b7(mdo): sems dpa' chen po 'amagom thos byin ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la grub pa don
147b8(mdo): yod pa'i snying po rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po gang gis blags pa cas kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po myu tu 'grub cing / dran pa tsam kyis 'bags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lnga'i lus kyi
148a1(mdo): lung stond par 'gyur ba// dngos grub dang mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ba mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyan sngam 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i nang
148a2(mdo): du yongasu bsgrags par bgyi'o// / na mo rad na tra ya ya/ na mo a mi ta b+ha ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ na mo ar+ya a ba lo ki te sha ra ya/ b+ho ta sa ta ya/ ma ha sad ta ya/ ma ha ka ru ni ka ya
148a3(mdo): tad ya tha/ o pad me pad me/ pad ma dA ra/ bI bA sha ta pu dz+re/ tsa ra tsa ra/ pra ma b+he sha da ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ bi tsid tra mo'u li d+ha ra/ ma Ni ka ra/ ka badz+ra be du r+ya la ba kri ta sha ri ra/ ta ra ta raM/ ta ra ya
148a4(mdo): b+ha ga pa ti/ pa ran d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma mo 'ga' ba sha ta ste/ ba rA ba ra ba ra da ya ka/ sa man ta a ba lo ki ta ma ha b+ho d+hi sa tra ba yad pad ma sa na/ pad ma ko'u ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sarba ta tha ka/ 
148a5(mdo): ta/ sa b+ha she ga te/ me ha ka ru ni ka/ pa la pa la/ ma ha/ be ga d+ha ra/ bi tri na ya na dang shA ka ra la ma ha te dza/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ pi pu la dza na ba ra da/ ma ha ka ru ni ka/ ma d+ha pa shu ti be
148a6(mdo): sha drA ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pra ba ra bu mya sa ma b+ha ra/ su ga ta pUn sa ma d+hi/ sa man ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ mi sha ra/ ma te sha ra/ dush+tsa du ma ka/ ro'i dra pra la da ma ka/ kro d+ha ra dza ma ha be ka da ra/ sa ma?
148a7(mdo): sa ma/ swa sA ma pra ba ta/ tsan tra su r+ya sa ti re ka pra b+he/ ma la ma la/ sarba ma la b+hi sho d+ha ka/ sarba ri sha ki na/ san ta ti/ ma ha ma he/ sha ra ru pa d+ha ra/ a mi ta b+ha dzi na/ lang kri ta dzata
148a8(mdo): d+hakli ni tsan tra/ lang tre ta shi ra/ ma rba ma tha sarba ya kra ra kA sa b+hu na ka na ban/ dza ka ta ra ta ra/ ta ra ka na sa ma lang kri ta na krad tra ma lA/ sarba bika nA/ bi na sha na ka ra ya/ pa ra mai ta tsid ta ma
148b1(mdo): ka ru ni ka pa ra pa ra/ ba ri bu na man da la/ so'u s+ya mun kha/ shad pa myi tra ba ri ra ka/ mi li mi li/ e ne ya/ tsa sA ni ba sa na bya gra ma mod ta ri ya/ d+ha du ra/ parba ta thA ka ta/ a bA lo kI tA/ 
148b2(mdo): tI shu lA d+ha ra/ badz+ra dz+wa la d+ha ra/ a mo g+ha pa sha ha ste/ ya mA ba ru na ku be ra ru pa drA ra/ na gyen kra ru pa dA ra bi ma li bi shud d+he ha/ sArba pA pa/ pra sha ma ka/ sarba b+ha ra ni bi sho d+ha kaH/ sarba ki la
148b3(mdo): sha na sha ka/ stAM log kya ba shang ka ra/ sa rba sad tra bi sho d+ha ka/ b+ho d+hi sad tA ba ra da/ sa rba ta tha ka ta/ a d+hi shi te/ oM pad ma bi pU shi ta shud sme/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ a ba lo ka ya man/ sa ma sa pa/ 
148b4(mdo): na ka mra me/ sa drA yA/ a mo g+ha pa sha hr-i da ya sid d+he/ g+huH ni pa yid ne/ ba ra d+ha/ hUM phaT/ na mo stu te swa hA// / grub pa don yod pa rigs sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bshad ma
148b5(mdo): thag tu 'byung po'i tshogs dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang bgyegs dang / log 'dren de dag thams cad khas phub du 'gyel/ te/ gcig tu 'bar bar gyur cing gnas kyang 'bar bar
148b6(mdo): 'gyur ba dang / de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje dga' bas pa su langs te/ skrag par 'gyur ba'i lha'i tshogs thams cad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug
148b7(mdo): chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / skrag par 'gyur ba'i lha dang / lha ma yin dang / drang srong spa kong ba thams cad dang / rgya mtsho na gnas pa'i klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang / chu bran thams cad dang
148b8(mdo): lha dang klu gang dag chun gnas pa thams cad dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i lha dang / lha gang dag lang ka'i grong khyer na gnas pa dang / rigs sngags 'chang ki 'khor los sgyur ba thams cad dang / kang dag
149a1(mdo): kanas kyang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / nam mkha'i lha thams cad 'khrugs par gyur da nas/ nam mkha' las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las dang / byang chub sems
149a2(mdo): dpa' 'phags pa byan ras gzigs dbang phyug de yang mchod pa'i phyir/ lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / ku mu ta dang / ud pa la dang / pun dA ri ka dang / man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen
149a3(mdo): po'i char dang / lha'i rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyi char pus mo nub tsam ri po ta ltar phab ste/ lha'i sil snyan dang / gru dbyangs len cing / ha ha zhes ca co dang / ga zha'i sgra bton nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'phag
149a4(mdo): pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sems can thams cad kyi don tu rigs sngags chen po 'di bshad do// zhes ched du brjod pa chen po ched du brjod do// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
149a5(mdo): phyag na rdo rje/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'a/ pakas pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gabang ba de song ste/ na gsum bskor ba byas nas mchod pa'i phyir/ mu tika gi do shas/ 
149a6(mdo): brgya stong ri ba phul te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis regs sngags 'tshong chen po'i cho ga zhib yo sems cad kyi mchog bshad do// don yod pa'i rgyal po rigs sngags chen po'i snying po mgod po thub pa chen pos
149a7(mdo): bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das cho ga zhib mo mtha' dgag/ don yod pa'i rgyal po grub pa'i mchog/ las thams cad grub pa bshad du gsol/ de nas de'i don tu 'phags pa yun ras gzigs
149a8(mdo): dbang phyug kis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo grub pa don yod pa/ rigs sngags kyi rgyal po ras kyi sku gzugs bsgrub pa'i mchog/ cho ga dang / yo byad du bcas pa bshad pa
149b1(mdo): ras gru bzhi pa kun nas cha legs par phye ba/ kha tshar ma bcad pa/ swa byed pa/ ri mo mkhyen gtsang mas khrus byas kos zang sa bgos le/ gso sbyong dang ldan par byas pas/ mtshon lhag ma ma yin pa/ 
149b2(mdo): snod sar par gzhag pa la bri bar bya ste/ dbus su 'phags pa byan ras gzigs dbang phyug ral pa'i zo tshugs kyis bzhugs shing / rgyal ba 'od dpag myed kyis brgyan pa/ thor tsugs kyi g.yas su zla
149b3(mdo): chos kyis brgyan pa/ ri dkas e ne ya'i pakas pa gon pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dbu gsum spyan gsum phyag bzhi pa/ ri'i steng na pad ma'i bdan la
149b4(mdo): bzhugs pa/ zhal dbu ma zhi ba'i zhal/ bzhin 'dzum pade'i zhal g.yas pa 'jigs su rung ba khro gnyer can/ thor tshugs 'od dpag myed kyis brgyan pa/ dbu zla tshes kyis brgyan pa
149b5(mdo): zhal g.yon pa 'jigs su rung ba/ bzhin sgyur cing mche ba ba rtsigs par/ rgyal ba 'od dpag byed dbu la bzhugs pa/ phyag gcig na pad ma thogs pa/ gnyis pa na rtse gsum thogs pa
149b6(mdo): gsum pa don yod pa'i zhags pa sku'i phyed na 'dzind pa la/ bcom ldan 'das zhal 'khro gnyer can s+yan gtod pa bya zhing / bzhi pa dbugs 'byin pa'i phyag tu bya zhing / 'od 'dom gang 'khor yug 'bar ba
149b7(mdo): dang ldan par bya'o// g.yas phyogs na lha mo sgrol ma mdzes bag dang bcas shing / lus 'dud par mchog sbyin pa'i phyag la myig rtod par bya'o// g.yon du pad ma'i rigs mdzes ma mdzes bka dang bcas/ 
149b8(mdo): ba/ gsang sngags kyi tshul dang / rjes su mthun zhing / don yod pa'i zhags pa la myig rtod par bya'o// lha mo sgrol ma'i bar du gnod sbyin mo ral pa gcig ma bya'o// pad ma'i rigs mdzes ma'i 'jo ga te
150a1(mdo): can bya'o// phyogs gnyis par lha mo lag na pad ma thogs pa bya'o// pad ma'i rigs mdzes ma'i 'og tu pho nya mo'i gsang sngags kyi rjes su 'bra ba bya'o// ral pa gcig ma'i 'og tu lha mo
150a2(mdo): chen mo 'jigs byed ma bya'o// kong du gnas wang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po me tog sna tshogs thogs te/ bcom ldan
150a3(mdo): 'das la mchod pa byed par bya'o// 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gyi 'og tu/ 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba gad rgyangs can khro bo'i don yod rgyal po/ 
150a4(mdo): dang smra bar 'gyur ro// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba tsam gyis nga/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug raM bo ta la na gzhal myed kha dang dang bcas pa mngon sum du mthong par rig par bya'o// 
150a5(mdo): 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa/ bam po bcu pa// / mthong ba tsam gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad las tha rad par 'gyur// 'jigs pa
150a6(mdo): chen po brgyad las yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ mtshams myed pa lnga byed pa yang yongs su tha rad par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad spong bas mthong ba tsam
150a7(mdo): kyi sod ya/ rnam par dag par 'gyur/ mnar myed pa la gzhol ba'i mthar thug pa yang yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa chen po'i bsod nams brgya stong gi dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur/ 
150a8(mdo): 'jig rten thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog thob par 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du stond par 'gyur zhing / dbugs 'byed par 'gyur/ 
150b1(mdo): shi nas bde ba can kyi 'jig rte nad kyi khams su skye bar 'gyur/ sgrib pa thams cad dang bral nas/ tshe rabs brgya stong phrag lnga rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po mthar thug gi bar du skye ba
150b2(mdo): 'di tha ma yin te/ 'di mthong ba tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po dang / ldan par 'gyur na/ lhag mang du byed pa lta ci smos te/ de ni phyir myi ldog par 'gyur/ bla na myed pa yi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
150b3(mdo): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor da
150b4(mdo): bcas pa'am/ btsun mo'i dam pa gang la la zhig gis ra/ sa kyi sku gzugs sgrub par bya ba de'i spyan sngar don yod pa'i zhwa dgas pa'i snying po dran par byed cing / 'phags pa spyan ras
150b5(mdo): gzigs dbang phyug de la yang mchod pa byed na/ des na khyod kyi sa 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong phrag brgya 'gyur du bzlas shing / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga chen
150b6(mdo): bo byas pa yin no// gang zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar smra khar lan gsum bzlas brjod byas te/ chus dbang bskur na/ des na khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ 
150b7(mdo): dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis/ bdag byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bdudadu dbang skur bar 'gyur ro// snyam du de ltar shes par bya'o// gang gis don yod par grub pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i gzungs
150b8(mdo): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi spyan sngar mngon gsum du thal mo sbyar te/ 'dugs nas lan bdun ba zab te/ bskor ba lan bdun byas la/ chu'i mchod yon dang / lha bshos dang / bdun spos dang
151a1(mdo): me tog phul nas phyag 'tshal lo zhes spras na/ des na khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste/ gzungs thams cad so sor lan stong phrag brgya brgya bzlas par 'gyur zhing / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam
151a2(mdo): par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam grangs chen po 'di lan stong phrag brgya bzlas par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i phyag rgya byas la/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal du myig rtad de/ lag pa
151a3(mdo): g.yon gnyis spyan pa snying kar gzhag pa'i tshul 'dis/ phyag re re nas lan stong phrag brgya byas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma
151a4(mdo): rgyal po 'am/ btsun mo dam pa gapal la zhig/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying na po 'di lan stong phrag khri bzlas brjod bya bar 'dod pa dang / de
151a5(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong phrag khris dbang bskur bar 'dodapa dang / rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi cho ga zha ba mo 'di rdzogs par lan brgya stong khri bzlas par 'dod pa dang / 
151a6(mdo): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya 'di lan brgya stong phrag khri bya bar 'dod pas/ rab kyi sku gzugs bzhag nas bzod par bya ste/ rab kyi sku gzugs mngon du bzhag nas/ gnas zang zhing dben pa
151a7(mdo): gnas sam/ 'chag pa 'am/ dkon pa'i gnas snyam/ phug gam ri'i rtse mo 'am/ thug lag 'ang dam/ 'ang par gtsang s+tha dang / byi dor byas te/ bser po'i lci ba legs par mnyes la ba lnga
151a8(mdo): byung ba lnga dang ba bres te/ bskus ma phyim tshogs kyi blag pa byugs la/ ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan lnga can dan dgang ba'i dkyis 'khor byas te/ gung gus kyis lda tsas kyi sa dpral la/ 
151b1(mdo): dang / gsun gyis mchod par bya'o// dri chab kyi bus pa drirnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ste/ ras kyi mgul chings kyis bcings pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag par bya/ me ton dang
151b2(mdo): bdug spos dri zhim po dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba nyi shu rtsa gcig bzhag par bya/ dri chab kyis bkang pa brgyad phyogs bzhir bzhag par bya'o// 'o mas bkang ba'i snod brgyad bzhag par bya/ 'o thug dang
151b3(mdo): sbyar khug dang / khan d+ha khya d+ya dang / 'bras chan dang / lag pan dang / bu ram dang / sha kha ra dang / zhun mar gyis bkang ba'i snod bzhag par bya/ a ka ru nag po dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / ka phur dang
151b4(mdo): kun tu ru dang / shi ri ba sa ka dang / cung per rnam snod dang ba zhag nas sa ga ru'i yam sreg shing gis bsreg par bya/ me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya/ mar gi mar me sum bcu rtsa
151b5(mdo): gnyis bltam par bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang gyang mas gos cang ma bgos shing / khrus legs par byas pas/ tshes bcu bzhi nas/ bca lnga nya'i bar du 'phags pa s+yan ras
151b6(mdo): gzigs dbang phyug gi ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu rigs sngags 'chang gis 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas te/ dri chab kyis dbang bskur bar bya/ don yod pa'i zhags pa
151b7(mdo): la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bya/ de nas myi smra bar dkyil mo krung du 'dug ste/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya/ de'i 'og tu don
151b8(mdo): yod par grub pa'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas na/ de nas ngas kyi sku gzugs las 'od zer bdun byung nas/ kun tu snang bar byas te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ 
152a1(mdo): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi bral ba'i gyen du zhugs par 'gyur ro// zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / rigs sngags 'chang snying dga' zhing ba u ldan
152a2(mdo): bar 'gyur/ mdog mdangs yong su dag par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin pa'i phyag rgya sor mo las lha'i chu 'dzag par 'gyur// zhags pa gnyis las 'o mi 'dzag par
152a3(mdo): 'gyur/ don yod pa'i phyag rgya 'bar bar 'byung / phyag na pad ma'i lo ma g.yo bar 'gyur ro// rtse gsum g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu legs so
152a4(mdo): legs so// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub kyis las thams cad byos shig/ khyod kyis don yod grub kyi cho ga zhib/ mo'i rgyal po chen po dam pa grub zhes nas/ de nas 'phags
152a5(mdo): pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang kyi gzugs ston par ma/ dzad do// 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog sbyin par mdzad do// 'di ni grub pa'i cho ga bla na myed pa ste/ ma bsgrubs par las/ 
152a6(mdo): byed pa'o// de nas dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ me tog pad ma lo lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ 'phags pa 'byan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phul te/ gang gi mying brjod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// 
152a7(mdo): sna ma'i me tog la yan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phul la/ yang lan bdun bzlas nas/ me tog rnying pa blangs te/ gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// 
152a8(mdo): gdon gyis zin pa la byin na/ gdon thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro// nad kyis thebs pa la byin na/ nad thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i sgor rtor na/ rgyal
152b1(mdo): rdzun pa'i lal da pa du 'gyur ba/ 'ag / mapa pad de mas cad myal ba lam yong su thos pa / na byed pa gnas
152b2(mdo): la tong na/ zhad cig de la yong su grol bar 'gyur/ nyal ba'i rdzas su bzhag na/ phyil ma chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang b+hag su ston par mdzad cing / ming du 'ang/ 
152b3(mdo): ba thams cad gsung bar 'gyur ro// skyes pa 'am bud myed gang gi steng du rtor ba de dbang du 'gyur zhing / grib ma bzhin phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i steng du tor na/ bran bzhin du 'gyur ro// 
152b4(mdo): lha'i gzugs rnyan gyi steng du bzhag na/ 'gug par 'gyur zhe/ nga/ las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// myig sman bsgrub pa dar 'dod pas ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar sman sdong gros la
152b5(mdo): stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ grub pa'i rtags gsum ston par 'gyu ra te/ 'bar bar 'gyur pa dang / dbu ba 'byung ba dang / dud pa/ 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas myig la bskus na mya snang bar
152b6(mdo): 'gyur ro// rter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gi gnas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// dpral bar thig le byas na phug thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/ sgo thams cad dang 'khrul 'khor
152b7(mdo): thams cad dbye bar 'gyur/ yan lag dang / nying lag la bskus na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ spyi bor thig le byas na/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// 
152b8(mdo): myig la byugs na khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po la sotshogs pa lha rnams rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur zhing / dgos pa thams cad grub par byed do// mtshan mo myig la bskus na nyin mo bzhin mtho/ 
153a1(mdo): bar 'gyur zhing / rter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'am phub nas 'dong bar bya'o// rang kyi lus la byugs na/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du go cha bgos pa'i lus su 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang / 
153a2(mdo): srin po la sosogs pas myi mthong bar 'gyur zhing / las thams cad byed par 'gyur/ tshe bskal pa stong thub par 'gyur ro// bza' ba dang snying kar bsku ba byas na/ nag po chen po'i gzugs su 'gyur
153a3(mdo): zhing / lha thams cad kyi gzugs ston par 'gyur ba nas/ tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs dang / gzugs sna tshogs mang po ston par 'gyur/ zla ba dang nyi ma ston par
153a4(mdo): 'gyur ro// ldong gros dang / 'gi'u wang dang / bo'u bi ra ka ra dang / kur kum dang / kra kud la/ don yod par grub pa waM bzlas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad
153a5(mdo): bzlas/ 'gro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad zlas pa byas te/ sa cad du kyi smra bar bya zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dang nga phyug gi spyan sngar btags la/ ras kyi gzugs la mngon du/ 
153a6(mdo): 'phyog sA steng/ cang mas gos cad ma bgos ya/ tshes bco lnga nya la nyin zhag gcig bsrung ba byas/ bye ma zhib du btags te/ yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / don yod par grub pa'i rig
153a7(mdo): sngags kyi rgyal po brgya cha brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag tu bzhag ste/ mchod pa chen po byas na/ ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod pa byas la/ nyin
153a8(mdo): zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te/ ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar dkyil mo krung du 'dug la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bya/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po la lan nyi shu rtsa
153b1(mdo): gcig bzlas pa bya ste/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas khro bo'i gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas te/ de'i 'og tu myig la bskus nas don yod pa'i grub pa'i gzungs bzlas pa byas na/ bskus pa tsam gis/ 
153b2(mdo): 'phags pa 'aspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ri po ta la dang bcas gzhal myed dang bcas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs gzhal myed khang dang bcas pa ri po ta la na gnas pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// bde ba can
153b3(mdo): kyi 'jig rten gi khams mthong bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag byed chos 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur/ chos bshad pa de yang thos par 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub
153b4(mdo): sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang ba cus/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhal myed khang dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur ru zhing / chos 'chad pa'i gsung gi sgra de yang thos par 'gyur ro// 
153b5(mdo): 'di ltar rigs ngan gyi rigs su skye ba dang / mnar myed pa la/ gzhol ba dang / 'tshams myed pa lnga byed pa gang yin pa thams ca/ da kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin kyis brlabs/ 
153b6(mdo): dang / 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs rje su dgongs par 'gyur zhing / rmyi lam du ston par mdzad do// sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par spyod par 'gyur/ mchog thams cad
153b7(mdo): sbyin par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur/ lha'i lo stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing / lha'i bde ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ nad thams cad kyis thebs pa thams
153b8(mdo): cad la myig sman 'dis bskus na/ nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing / rims thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro// dug thams cad la bskus pa tsam gis dug myed par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa zas/ 
154a1(mdo): cad la myig la bskus na myi mthong bar 'gyur/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo dang / g.yon can dang / chom po dang / rkun po thams cad kyis myi mthong bar 'gyur/ mtshon bzang po'i 'jig
154a2(mdo): pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug la myig la bskus na thams cad du rgyal zhing lan thebs par 'gyur ro// g.yul ngo thams cad du myig la bskus na/ g.yul 'gyed pa
154a3(mdo): las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing / dpung gi tshogs rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro ba'i tshe/ myig la bskus na rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// bye smra bar grong khyer du song na
154a4(mdo): skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo grong khyer na gnas so cog thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// myig g.yas pa la bskus na/ rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gang mthong ba de thams cad
154a5(mdo): dbang du 'gyur ro// myig g.yon pa bskus na rigs ngan thos cad dbang du 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyu ga gi phyag g.yas pa nas bzung ste/ don yod par grub pa'i rig
154a6(mdo): sngags kyi rgyal po lan stong cha brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na/ des don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / 'khro bo'i rgyal po dang / gzungs
154a7(mdo): thams cad ma sor lan stong phrag brgya brgya bzlas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag bcu'i bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ 
154a8(mdo): thams cad kyis mying bzung ba byas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag drug cu rtsa gzhi mngon sudu mayong ba thob par 'gyur/ 'dzig te/ 
154b1(mdo): pa'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ sngon gyi sgrib pas mnar myed pa'i gnas su 'gro ba yong su dag par 'gyur/ nams kyang ngan song du 'gro bar myi 'gyur/ tshe rabs tshe rabs su skye bar dran par 'gyur
154b2(mdo): lha thams cad kyang mchog sbyin par gyurd cing / rtag tu bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro// phyag g.yon pa mnan te lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/ bzlas pa tsam gyi
154b3(mdo): mod la lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la batshogs pa bkug par 'gyur zhing / thams cad dbang du 'gyur te gnas so// gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe/ don yod pa'i grub pa'i rigs sA
154b4(mdo): kyi rgyal po lan bdun bzlas pa byas na/ lha dang klu la sog/ sa pa thams cad kyang las thams cad byed cing / rtag tu rgyun 'chad par phye bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// lte ba'i gnas su
154b5(mdo): mnan te bzlas na klu la sogs pa thams cad char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur te/ 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag tshim par ts+tsha da par 'gyur ro// snyan du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na gang
154b6(mdo): dang gang du song ba der skyes pa 'am/ bud byed dam/ rgyal po 'am/ dge sbyong ngapo// bram ze 'am/ dge bsnyen nas/ dge bsnyen ma la gang brtsams pa dang / gang bcol pa smra ba'i las de thams cad
154b7(mdo): byed par 'gyur ro// shu nas bzung ste/ bzlas na tshangs pa'i 'jig ton gi bar du dbang du byas par 'gyur te/ thams cad dbang du skur zhing / bsgrol bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// thog sa
154b8(mdo): bzlam brjod stong cha brgyad byam par 'gyur ro// zhabs gnyis mnan te stong phrag bcu bzlas pa byas na/ sa'i 'og yan chad dbang du byas par 'gyur zhing / las thams cad byed par 'gyur te// 
155a1(mdo): mngag bzhug thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// pa da ma la stong cha brgyad bzlas nas pad ma'i mtshe 'ur khor na/ pad ma zad myi shes par 'gyur zhing / pad ma'i dus thams cad par 'gyur ro// 
155a2(mdo): ud pa la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ ud pa la'i mtshe 'ur bor na/ ud pa la sngon po zad myi shes par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / nams kyang nyams par myi 'gyur te/ dus thams cad du me tog 'byung bar
155a3(mdo): 'gyur ro// de bzhin du snang ma'i me tog dang / kan d+ha pan ri ka dang / yu ti ka dang / na ba ma li ka'i me tog rnams kyang dus thams cad du me tog 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / zad myi shes par 'gyur ro// 
155a4(mdo): 'bras bu dang / me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te skyed mos tshal lam/ nags tshal gyi nang du rtong na/ me tog dpa' bras bu zad kyi shes shing / dus thams cad par 'gyur ro// 
155a5(mdo): dpal lha mo dgug par 'dod pas/ sra tshil las lha mo la sa lha mo dpal chen po dkyil mo krung phyed du 'dug pa/ rgyan zas cad kyis brgyan pa/ lus btud pa/ lag na pad ma thogs pa
155a6(mdo): brang rgyas pa byas la 'bras bu dang / me tog dgras par bya zhing / ka bur dang / gra zhi dang / tsam dan dang / dkar pos mchod pa byas la/ ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar gzhag par bya zhing / sngar can
155a7(mdo): dan dkar po lngas byas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzhin byas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ras kyi sku gzugs la/ a ka ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ dpal lha mo chen po la can
155a8(mdo): ngan dkar po'i 'dug pa dbul bar bya zhing / gnyis la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya/ doms dgar po dang / dri chab dbul bar bya/ mchod son stong dbul par bya ste/ rigs sngags 'cha thams
155b1(mdo): dus gsum khrus byas zhing / gos cad ma bkos te/ mngon du phyogs te/ dkyil mo krung du 'dug nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun byas la/ ji snyed pa'i dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / me tog/ 
155b2(mdo): la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ dpal lha mo chen mo'i mgo la gdags par bya/ me tog gzhan gis mchod pa bya zhing / tsan dan dkar po la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i bdug
155b3(mdo): spos dbul bar bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chad kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya zhing / nyungs kar re re la bzlas nas dpal lha mo chen mo la bsnun par byas te/ stong
155b4(mdo): rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / dpal lha mo chen mo 'bar bar 'gyur zhe dpa/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi bral ba nas/ 'od gzer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad gang yin pa
155b5(mdo): thams cad gser du snang bar 'gyur ro// dpal lha mo chen mo bkug par 'gyur zhing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'da' bar myi 'gyu ra ro// lha'i dpal rjes su spyod par 'dod na/ nyin re zhing
155b6(mdo): 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang dpal lha mo chen mo la dus gsum du mchod pa bya zhing / mchod yon gyi snod kyang gzhag par bya zhing / dkon mchog gsum mchod par bya/ sbyin par bya longs
155b7(mdo): spyod par bya/ bsngonams kyang bya zhing / dpal lha mo chen mo la dus gsum du mchod par bya'o// dpal lha mo chen mo rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par 'dod pas/ don yod pa'i rgyal po 'khro bo'i snying po stong
155b8(mdo): rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya zhing / can dan kye ri lu stong rtsa brgyad kyis bdug par bya/ yungs kar stong rtsa brgyad kyis bsnun par bya ste/ yungs kar stong pa brgyad tshang ba dang / dpal lha mo chen mo rgyan zas cad
156a1(mdo): kyis brgyan pa/ lha'i nor bu dang / gser dang / mu tika ki rgyan kyis brgyan pa'i lus snang gsal/ zhal pad ma kha phye ba lta bu s+yan ud pa la sngon po ltar gsal ba/ pad ma bsnams pa bdan
156a2(mdo): pad ma nor bu dang / rin po che dang / gser mang po'i pad ma'i char 'bebs pa/ rin po che'i 'bar ba'i bum pa stong phrag brgya thogs pa/ lha'i bu mo dang / gnod sbyin gi bu mo brgya stong mang po thams cad lho'i
156a3(mdo): rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ lus gsal zhing 'bar la mdzes pa mang pos yongasu bskor ba/ mdun na 'khod par 'gyur te/ rigs sngags 'chang gis 'jigs par myi bya zhing / sems dka' bar byas la gsang
156a4(mdo): sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas par bya'o// / na mo ra na tra ya ya/ na mo a n+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sad ta ya/ ma ha sad tra ya/ ma ha ka ru ni ka ya/ ma ha ma mo gA/ pa rad
156a5(mdo): ya/ tad ya thA/ oM pad ma ni/ pad ma ne ta/ pad mang shepad ma ha re/ pad ma pa ti/ pad po pre ye/ pad ma ko'u mi/ @ ma bri b+he/ pad ma sa na pra tiSh+Tha te/ a ba lo ki to pr-i ye/ @
156a6(mdo): de ba ra dA yi ni/ pra sid/ prA pa da ya/ ku ru ku ru/ a byas pa lo kI ta/ ba ya de su ru phu ru/ ba rang gi ni/ tsal tsal/ pad ma bi pU sha ta/ pad ma pri ye/ bcing ta na da / bA ra bA ra/ sam bA ra/ swa
156a7(mdo): ma yan/ a byas pa lo ki te sha ra sa ye/ sad t+ya/ a dI Sha ta de bi/ a lo g+ha pa sha par de hUM/ na mo su te sa hA// / lan bdun bzlas pa tsam gyis lha mo dpal chen mo lag pa brkyang ste/ 
156a8(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang gi phyi bor 'jog par 'gyur zhing / 'di skad ces kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu tshur shog thugs las skyes pa/ gsung las skyes pa/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags 'i/ 
156b1(mdo): snying po'i 'jo bo dang / bcas pa grub kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma dri ma byed pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i gzungs la bzhugs zhing / nga'i gnas la rang gi khyim bzhin du las su bya ba thams cad byom shig// 
156b2(mdo): de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis yang rig sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs sngags 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod bya'o// na mo rad na tra ya ya/ na mo a r+ya.a pa lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi sad tA ya
156b3(mdo): ma ha sad tA ya/ ma ha ku ru ni ka ya/ au b+ha ga ba ti/ ma ti/ dza Ne tI/ ba ra ba ra/ a ba lo ki ta ba ra te/ kri ri Ni sra ba tu am ba/ am ba/ pi pu la/ kirti ka ra/ pra ba rA pU dze/ a mo 'ag+ha pa sha ha
156b4(mdo): ste swA hA// / de'i 'og tu lha mo dpal chen mo'i nu ma hA/ nyis las 'o ma'i rgyun 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'o ma'i rgyud de la kha bze da de 'thungs na/ 'thungs pa tsam gyi mod la/ lha'i me tog pad
156b5(mdo): ma dang / ku mu ta ltar 'jam pa'i lha'i lus su 'gyur/ sra cung zad 'khyil cing 'khyil pa/ myeg ud pa la sngon po lta bu dang / tshig gsal cing myi 'am ci'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ 
156b6(mdo): don yod pa'i rgya mtsho nor bu chen po dam pa la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po mngon sum du 'gyur/ cho ga zhib mo mang po grub par 'gyur/ tshe lo stong phrag drug cu thub
156b7(mdo): par 'gyur/ rgyal ba 'od dpag myed byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / thabs gcig tu gzhal myed khang mchog na chos bgro ba mthong bar 'gyur/ rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ nor bu chen
156b8(mdo): po lta ba zhes bya ba/ don yon pa'i zhags pa chen po'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i cho bo gcig pur 'gyur/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang
157a1(mdo): phyug gi sras su 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras gcig pur 'gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
157a2(mdo): po rnams kyi bu'i tho bo gcig pur 'gyur/ rgyal po bzhi'i bu gcig pur 'gyur/ thams cad kyis stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa dang / brtson 'grus thogs pa byed pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gsheg
157a3(mdo): pa thams cad kyis phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par bye ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang ba'i gzungs kyi rgyal po cho ga zhib mo zab pa dag mngon sum du 'gyur/ lha thams cad kyi gnas dang / klu thams cad
157a4(mdo): kyi gnas dang / myi 'am ci thams cad kyi gnas dang / phug dang / khung gi gnas thams cad kyi sgo dbye bar 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad sgo dbye bar 'gyur/ thams cad
157a5(mdo): dbang du 'gyur zhing / bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bya bar byed cing / 'dug par 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi ston pa bla ma gcig pur 'jig rten 'gon po dang 'dra bar mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur/ 'jig
157a6(mdo): rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad grub pa chen por 'gyur/ dpal lha mo chen mo 'khor dang bcas pa la sbyin sregs byas na/ rigs sngags 'chang de la
157a7(mdo): bu bzhin du byams pas rang nyid bsnyen bskur yongs su khyad pas yongs su khyod do// 'dod pa thams cad dang / yid du 'ong ba thams cad kyi dgos pa byed par 'gyur ro// nor bu dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / 
157a8(mdo): gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tika dang / bye dur+ya dang / shang ka shi la dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / lha'i nor bu chen po rin po che'i bar thams cad sbyin par byed do// yul ka shi ka'i kos
157b1(mdo): bzang po mang po sbyin par byed cing // lha'i bza ba dang / btung ba'i bar dang / bdud rtsi'i ro'i bar du sbyin par byed do// gnas thams cad du song ba na yang / rtag tu rgyun gyi 'chang bar bu la/ byams pa/ 
157b2(mdo): tshul gyis rtag tu phyi bzhin 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang rang gi khyim yang rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can ci lta ba bzhin du rig sngags 'chang gi gzhal myed khang mchog tu 'gyur ro// rnam thos kyi
157b3(mdo): bu'i gnas na 'byor da pa ci lta ba bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dus kun tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje 'chang yang rigs sngags
157b4(mdo): 'chang gyi tshogs thams cad gnod sbyin chen pos gang ba'i 'khor dang / rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / swA bu byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dpal lha mo chen mo 'khor dang
157b5(mdo): bcas pa dang / rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye bas yongasu bskor/ ba nyin mtshan du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / spa ba byed par 'a// gyur ro// de nas don yod pa'i rgya mtsho nor bu chen po pad ma la
157b6(mdo): lta ba'i dpal dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo klags pas grub par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung / 
157b7(mdo): gi bye ma snyed bye ba phrag drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i gdul phra mo rnyed las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong
157b8(mdo): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nas/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis lha'i nor bu rin po che chen po dang / nor bu rin po che chen po sna bdun dang / lha'i gser dang / gser gi me tog dang / dbus kyi me tog san
158a1(mdo): po dang / lha'i gos dang / lha'i rgyan dang / lha'i dri dang / me tog dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams re re zhing 'phang du ri'i rgyal po mi ba tsam gyis phung po byas nas/ de dag de bzhin gshegs/ 
158a2(mdo): pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rdul 'phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la tshul de
158a3(mdo): lta bus so sor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la nyin re zhing lo cig gi bar du 'bul bar byed/ mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i spyan sngar dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i mar rgya mtsho
158a4(mdo): tsam gyis bkang ba'i mar me bltam par byed pa'i bsod nams kye phung po dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gal te don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu
158a5(mdo): chen po pad ma rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma myed pa don yod pa'i zhe gas pa'i snying po 'di klog pa dang / bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byed pa 'di ni bsod nams kyi phung po de dang ldan por 'gyur zhing / dge ba
158a6(mdo): rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
158a7(mdo): kyi sku stond par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung stond par 'gyur/ dpal lha mo chen po de yang mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur zhing / dus kun tu de'i khyim du dpal gnas par 'gyur te/ 
158a8(mdo): gang na dpal lha mo chen mo gnas par 'gyur te/ gang na dpal lha mo chen po gnas pa der de bzhin gshegs pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi la rdul phra mo dang mnyam pas phyogs
158b1(mdo): de nyid du gnas par 'gyur te/ dpal lha mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum yin pa'i phyir ro// lha dang / klu dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i gsang sngags dang / chog zhi
158b2(mdo): mo dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / drag shul spyod pa dang / las sna tshogs dag pas dpal lha mo chen po'i mchog bstan to// / dpal lha mo chen mo ni thams cad kyi ma yin no
158b3(mdo): dpal lha mo chen mo ni don yod pa'i mchog sbyin pa'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa rgya chen po sbyin pa'o// don yod pa'i nam mkha'i gzhal myed 'ang 'chad pa'o// don yod pa'i mchog yon tan bsgrags pa'i mchog
158b4(mdo): sbyin par byed pa'o// dpal lha mo chen po ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od byed pa gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi nang na/ dpal lha mo chen mo mchog tu bstan to// de nas rigs sngags 'chang cang mas khrus legs par byas pa
158b5(mdo): dri chus bsangs shing / ba las byung ba lngas byugs pa gos rtsad ma bgos pa/ kha zas chang ma bza' bar bya zhing / chang dang / sha dang / brag tsong dang / sgog skya dang / kye'u rnams dang / 
158b6(mdo): 'dres pa dang / 'bags pa rnams yongs su sang bar bya/ kha zas ngan pa dang / btung ba ngan pa dang / gos ngan pa dang / dri ma ngan pa can yongasu spang bar bya/ sems can ngan pa bsten pa dang / 
158b7(mdo): ngan g.yo can dang / sod skyon can dang / khrel myed pa dang / snying rje myed pa dang / byams pa dang / bral ba dang / thub chod can gyi skye bo ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya'o// gnas ngan pa dang / gnas rten ngan pa
158b8(mdo): bgo nyis dang / bza' nyes dang / grib ma ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya/ gcig gis gcig 'bags pa'i kha zas ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya zhing / dri dang bdug spos kyis bsangs te/ myi smra bar bzlas brjo
159a1(mdo): byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / yid bde bar bya/ bkra shis tshang bar bya zhing snying dka' ba dang / mgu ba dang rab tu rga ba'i sems su byas nas brjod bya'o// 'phags pa rgyan
159a2(mdo): ras gzigs dbang phyug la a ga ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la du mu ska'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ dpal lha mo chen po la can daMn gi gdug spos dbul bar bya zhing / dus ji lta
159a3(mdo): ba'i me tog dbul bar bya ste/ gsang sngags 'dis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ thams cad la dbul bar bya'o// / na mo ra da na tra ya ya/ na mo ma d+ya ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+ha sad tA ya
159a4(mdo): ma ha swad tA yA/ ma ha ka ru ni ka yA/ tad ya thA/ au pu shwa/ bi lo ki te/ kAn dA sa re/ a mo g+ha dza la sam b+hu ri/ ta ra ta/ ra/ mu di te hUM phaT sA hA// / lan nye shu \u0f7f gcig/ 
159a5(mdo): bzlas te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / mchod yo na dbul lo// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan/ 
159a6(mdo): bdun bzlas/ 'khro ba'i rgyal po lan gsum 'azlas/ sa ka ru'i bdug spos dbul bar bya zhing / ci snyed pa'i me tog dbul bar bya/ spos dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya zhing / de nyid kyi
159a7(mdo): zhabs drung du dkyil mo krung du 'dug la/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bltas ste/ snying po'i gzungs sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas te/ don yod pa'i sa
159a8(mdo): pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun bcing ba byas na/ bcings pa tsam kyi mod la sku gzugs g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / sku thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur/ rang gi lus spu zing zhes byed par 'gyur/ tho rangs 'phags pa s+yan
159b1(mdo): ras gzigs dbang phyug su ston par 'gyur te/ yid la bsams pa thams cad bka' thol bar 'gyur/ mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/ 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/ dbun pa
159b2(mdo): kyang 'byin par 'gyur/ yid du 'ong ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed/ tshe 'di la nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang / sdig pa
159b3(mdo): thams cad zad cing bsrabs par 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ phas kyi rgol ba dang / dgra bo thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing / myi tshugs par 'gyur/ g.yul
159b4(mdo): ngor 'jug pa'i cha rigs sngags kyi rgyal po 'di yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/ dmag gi nang du rtor bar byas na/ thams cad rengs par byas pa dang / rmugs par byas pa
159b5(mdo): 'gyur ro// 'di'i snying po dang gsang sngags yin no// / na mo rad na tra ya ya/ na mo a bya ba lo ki te shwa ra ya/ bo d+hi sad tra ya/ ma ha sAd ta ya/ ma ha ka ru ni ka ya
159b6(mdo): tad ya dza/ oM ma yo g+ha pA sha hri da ya/ pad mi ni pa ra de/ dzA la dzA la/ pra sa ri ta pad ma 'bru dze swA hA// / snying po'i sngags so// o a ba lo ki te/ pad mi ni ba rang gi ni/ tu pu tu ru
159b7(mdo): hUM swA hA// nye ba'i snying po'i gzungs so// don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu pad ma rnam pa blta ba'i dpal dri ma byed pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i gzungs 'di rtag tu bzlas brjod
159b8(mdo): byas na/ mtshams myed pa lnga zad par 'gyur/ lha mo dpal chen mo rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par mchog sbyin par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dus kun tu sku ston bzhed par 'gyur/ 
160a1(mdo): de'i lus la dug thams cad kyis myi tshugs par 'gyur/ 'jigs pa chen po myi bzad pa brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ rims thams cad dang nad thams cad kyis myi tshugs par 'gyur// / 
160a2(mdo): gdon thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas ste/ mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor la/ gu gul gis bdug ste/ mgul du btags na/ gnod pa thams cad las yongasu grol bar
160a3(mdo): 'gyur ro// gal te nag po chen po dang / ma mo 'ongs te rgyas btab pa gang yin pa yang / gdon thams cad las yongasu grol bar 'gyur ro// skud pa nag pos rims nyin gcig pa las yongasu grol ba 'gyur
160a4(mdo): gzhan dag la ni thams cad la naM srad bu dkar pos gsal ba dar bya'o// thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug thams cadal 'gi'u wang la lani nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te thig le byas na
160a5(mdo): thams cad du thogs pa myed par 'gyur ro// snying kar thig le byas na/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za la sogs pa thams cad kyis myi mthong bar 'gyur ro// lag
160a6(mdo): 'thil du thig le byas na/ skyes pa dang / bud byed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang la reg pa dbang du 'gyur ro// sbyin mtshams su thika le byas na/ rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ 
160a7(mdo): mgul bar byugs na/ rnge'u rigs thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// dpung pa gnyis la byugs na/ rgyal rigs thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// dbral ba'i sramamams su thig le byas na/ bram ze sam pa can
160a8(mdo): dbang du gyur mo// lte ba'i gan su bag le byas na/ dmangs cheg sa mams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// rkang pa'i rdzi mal byugs na/ dpag can brgyang ngas bskyed par gro zhing / grang yang 'ong bar 'gyura'o// da
160b1(mdo): la byugs na chu rlung chen po'i pha rol da tu phyi nad par 'gyur zhing / rgya mtsho' bar du rgal bar 'gyur ro// dpung pa gnyis la byugs na gyad kyis myi thub par 'gyur ro// pus mo gnyis la byugs na/ me'i phur
160b2(mdo): po chen po 'bar zhing / rab tu 'bar bar zhugs na tsan dan dang / pu shel ci bzhin du bsil bar 'gyur ro// ba ser skya'i 'o ma dang sbyar te/ myig la bskus na mtshan mo yang nyin mo bzhin du snang bar 'gyuraro// 
160b3(mdo): rter thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / gal te de bskal pa stong du bzhag pa zhig nas yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du lto bskus na ci srid du lto chus ma bkrus pa de srid du kha zas dang btung ba myi 'dod
160b4(mdo): par 'gyur ro// pho mtshan la bskus na khu ba 'gags par bya/ sa par 'gyur ro// ba las byung ba lnga dang bsres te 'thungs na/ lus dag cing dri ma myed la chang zhing spyod pa rtsang ba dang ldan par
160b5(mdo): 'gyur ro// bgo nyes dang / bza' nyes dang / grib ma ngan pa dang / blta nyes su myi 'gyur/ 'jigs pa thams cadalas yongasasu grol bar 'gyur sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad
160b6(mdo): las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ rmyi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / bkra mya shis pa'i dngos po thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ dug dang / dbyig dug dang / byad thams cad 'jog par 'gyur ro// 
160b7(mdo): gsang sngags sbyor ba dang / na rtor ba rnams 'jig par 'gyur/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug rnams kyi lan thebs par 'gyur zhing / thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur/ phas kyi rgol ba dang / myi yang
160b8(mdo): ba dang / pha rold kyi dpung gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// zhun mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / lhan cig sbyar te/ zo rangs kyi dus su myi smra bar byas nas zos na/ klags pas tshigs
161a1(mdo): bcad pa stong 'dzind par 'gyur ro// sbyor ba zhag bdun byas na/ bstan bcos thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyor ba byas na/ gsang sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo dang
161a2(mdo): dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba thams cad grub par 'gyur/ zla ba cig tu sbyor ba byas na/ zos pa mang po rgya mtsho stsogs par 'gyur ro// sbyor ba lo gcig gi bar du byas na tshe
161a3(mdo): lo stong thub par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyur zhing / dga' ba dang / tshig brtsan par yang 'gyur ro// til mar dang lhan cig bskol te/ mgo la bsdus na/ spa cung zad
161a4(mdo): 'khyil cing lca lo can du 'gyur ro// bzhin gyi dkyil 'kho/ ra la bskus na ston ka'i zla ba nya dang mtshungs par 'gyur zhing / me tog pad ma dang / ku mu da ltar 'jam par 'gyur/ lus
161a5(mdo): thams cad byugs na mar dang 'dra bar 'jam por 'gyur zhing / rka la ga shin tu gzhon sha can du 'gyur/ rna ba la byugs na/ rnab ci tsam 'dod pa skye bar 'gyur/ sna nas btang na klad pa'i
161a6(mdo): nad do// cog 'jig par 'gyur zhing / snabs dang mchil ma 'byung bar myi 'gyur/ lha'i spos kyi dri marnam par 'gyur zhing / nams kyang yid du myi 'ong ba'i dri marnam par myi 'gyur/ gnyer ma dang / swa kar
161a7(mdo): spangs par 'gyur/ so rgal ba yang gsar du skye bar 'gyur/ lce pad ma'i lo ma ltar 'jam par 'gyur/ mid pa'i nad dang / skye 'gags pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ 'jam tsam du byas te
161a8(mdo): na ba bkang na/ sim par byed cing lha na pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ sA yid du 'ong ba dang / bkra shis pa'i sgra bos par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na/ 'gi'u wang gi cho ga chen po bsgrub par bya'o// de nas
161b1(mdo): legs par grub pa/ mchog tu dge ba/ dge bar 'gro ba/ spyig rkang zhes bya ba bshad par bya ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas nas/ 
161b2(mdo): don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu pad ma la rnam par lta ba'i dpal dri ma myed pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ rtsang mas gos chang ma bgos shing / khrus legs pa
161b3(mdo): byas pas kha zas dkar po zos la/ myig rkang gi ril lu khar bcug na/ ji snyed bshad pa dang / klags pa 'dzind par 'gyur ro// lce pad ma dang / ku mu ta'i lo ma ltar 'jam par 'gyur/ mye 'am/ 
161b4(mdo): ci'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ de nas lha'i sgra yang la byung bar 'gyur/ ka pa la smras pa de dang bran po dang / bran mo bzhin gnas par 'gyur ro// kang la dri mnam pa de yang
161b5(mdo): dbang du 'gyur/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye ga nas su gyur da pa yangadabang du byed do// gnod sbyin mo dang / srin mo dang / yi dag/ sa dang / sha za la sosogs pa thams cad dang / brjed byed

161b7(mdo): sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa thams cad dri des 'byer bar 'gyur zhing / byams pa'i sems kyis dbang du 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na lag pas glang po che non par 'gyur ro// sto

162a1(mdo): gcig pus dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing / slar yang 'od 'phro bar 'gyur ro// byi bor gzhag ste/ rgyal po'i pho brang du song na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang

162a3(mdo): pa la btags na ga pa la reg pa de thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / gser la reg pa tsam gyis zad myi shes par 'gyur/ sa bon gdab pa

163a1(mdo): cad myed par 'gyur ro// nad kun 'phrog pa 'grub pa ste/ sdig pa thams cad 'jig byed pa// bsod nams phung po che dang mnyam// grub pa lta rnams kun gyi mchog/ brgya
163a2(mdo): byin sum bcu'i lha dang ni// lha myin lhan cig g.yul 'gyed che// bdug pa 'di'i sa bdugs pa dang // lho myen de bzhin 'pham par 'gyur// drag po'i sa ni sum theg bsregs// khyab 'jug gis
163a3(mdo): ni ba la bcings// myi'i thung gis ni sa bzhi mnan// lha myin dbang pos nyi zla dang // gza' rnams 'pham byas 'khrugs par 'gyur// bdud ni bye ba stong phrag brgya// 'dren pas byams pa'i stobs kyis

163a6(mdo): yang rang gi khyim 'ongs te// rtag tu rgyal mtshan ze btags nas// bdug pa 'di yis bdug byas shing // nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du ni// rin chen bdun gyi char pa phab// de ltar bdug pa spobs
163a7(mdo): ldan yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dmyigs te/ 'jig rtend dbang phyug gi zhal nas byung ba/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po stong pa brgyad// don yod

163b3(mdo): pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin da 'khor lob sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i 'dug pa'i rgyal po yin te/ na dmang de bzhin gsheg pa pa thams cad la ljags 'di lan 'dun

163b7(mdo): 'og tu mtshan mo rang gi gzugs ston par 'gyur zhing / mchog sbyin par mdzad do// don yod pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur/ 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ sngon gyi sgrib pa dang
164a1(mdo): sdig pa dmyal ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba zad cing mthar thug par 'gyur ro// gang dag gis lus la bdugs pa tsam gyis thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// yul 'khor dang / grong khyer dang
