164a4(mdo): dkyil 'khor byas la/ me tog dang / mchod yon gyi snod// zhag par bya/ rtor ma dkar po nye bar gzhag par bya/ de ba zhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmyigs/ byang chub seMs
164a5(mdo): dpa' thams cad la dmyigs te/ phyogs bzhir phyag byas la bdug pa'i rgyal po 'dis bdug pa byas na/ bdugs pa tsam gyi mo de la phyogs bcu'i mtha' yas mu myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
164a6(mdo): rnams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas yongasu gang ba la 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re zhing de bzhin gshegs pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgya la/ bdug pa/ 
164a7(mdo): sprin 'khrigs pa lha'i spos kyis bsgos pa myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bdug spos chen po tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / gor shi sha dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / bdug spos nam mkha'i ngos khyebs par mtsho
164a8(mdo): par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum na gnas pa'i lha brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la stsogs pa 'og myin gyi gnas na
164b1(mdo): gnas pa'i lta ba'i bar thams cad bdug pa'i dris rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// rgya skar dang skar ma'i tshogs dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba thams cad dka' bar 'gyur te/ 'di la the com kyi bya zhing / yid gnyis bskyed
164b2(mdo): par myi bya'o// skad chen pos don yod pa'i snying po bzlas pa byas na/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ni bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur zhing / rigs
164b3(mdo): sngags 'chab de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa byin gyis rlob par 'gyur// dus kun tu dgongs par 'gyur/ yang dang yang du gzigs pa'i phyir byon par 'gyur ro// bde ba can na de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed
164b4(mdo): dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad thugs rab tu dges par 'gyur/ rigs sngags 'cha/ 
164b5(mdo): la don yod pa'i dngos grub gsol bar mdzad gzigs bzhed par 'gyur ro// klu thams cad la bdugs pa tsam gyis dbang du 'a/ gyur zhing / ha cang char chen gcod par byed cing / char myi 'bab/ 
164b6(mdo): nachang 'bebs par 'gyur ro// rlung dang / ser ba dang / srin thams cad gcod par byed/ gdugs pa tsam gyis gdon thams cad 'jig po ma 'gyur/ bgyegs dang / log 'dren thams cad phyogs bcur
164b7(mdo): dpag tshad stong du 'bros par 'gyur/ ma mo'i gnas su bdugs na/ rlung dang / ser ba dang / sprin thams cad gcod par byed/ ma mo'i tshogs dang / nag po chen po la sogs pa 'gug par 'gyur zhing / 
164b8(mdo): dbang du gyur nas 'dug par 'gyur bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa'i tshe/ bdugs na/ dpung kyi tshogs yan lag bzhi las rgyal bar 'gyur/ thams cad bdugs pa tsam gyis rgyal
165a1(mdo): par 'gyur/ thams cad du sbyor ba byas na kun tu grub pa chen por 'gyur ro// bdug pa'i cho ga'o// // 'phags pa don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po'o// 
165a2(mdo): bam po bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas rigs sngags 'chang rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir thig le bya ba dang / gdong bkru ba dang / lus bsdu ba byas na/ ya yang dang go cha bgos pa dang 'dra bar
165a3(mdo): 'gyur ba/ bshad par bgyi yis// bcom ldan 'das gsan du gsol/ don yod pa'i nor bu chen po rdo rje'i zhags pa zhes bya ba'i gang skyor ba byas pa tsam gyis thams cad grub pa bla na byed pa/ mkhas pa
165a4(mdo): mdzod su rnams su thig le byas na/ tshogs kyi nang dang / skye po mang po'i nang dang / dge 'dun gyi nang dang / de bzhin rig byed/ kyi tshogs bzhi'i nang du skar ma'i tshogs kyi na na/ zla ba
165a5(mdo): ches bzhin du mdzes shing 'jigs pa byed do// lha rnams thos cad ya mtshan skye// drag po'i ni cod pan 'chang // 'jig rten makon po'i g.yas kyi dbu'o// rnabu rgyan tha'i nang du rnam ma 'cho
165a6(mdo): kyi nang na/ zla ba tshes bzhin du mdzes shing 'jigs pa myed do// lha rnams thams cad ya mtshan skye/ drag po'i ni cod pan 'chang // 'jig rtend mgon po'i g.yas kyi dbyal// dbu rgyan rtse bran zla ches/ 
165a7(mdo): bzhin// gdong bkru ba ni mchog yin te// zla ba nya ba'i 'od dang mtshungs// smin ma zla ba bral ba dag/ pad ma dkar sham shin tu 'jam// myig gnyis ud pa la sngon po 'dra// sems can thos
165a8(mdo): cad dga' bas lta// dga' zhing rtag tu tshig btsan 'gyur// de'i myig gis kar mthong ba// thams cad dbang du gyur par 'gyur// skyes pa dag la bsku byas pa// rtag tu rig sma glo che zhing // rtag tu/ 
165b1(mdo): ya yang go bgos pa'i// 'jigs pa myed pa'i las su 'gyur// 'byung po rnams ni gyi bzod cing // gnod sbyin 'byung po gsang ba pas// rtag tu thub par myi 'gyur ro// stobs chen pha rol gno/ 
165b2(mdo): pa dang // rtag tu sred myed stobs ldan zhing // grang chen stong kyi stobs ldan 'gyur// lha rnams 'dar ni yid yod cing // klu rnams mtshon skrag par byed// gal te rigs sngags smra ba yis reg na
165b3(mdo): ri rab lhun po yang // g.yo bar 'gyur bar the tsom myed// rtag tu sred myed stobs ldan zhing // stobs dang gzugs dang thal ldan 'gyur// nor bu'i rgyal po bla na myed// 'di ni thogs pa tsam gyis su
165b4(mdo): sdig pa kun las nges grol zhing // dug rnams thams cad 'joms par byed// dpal dang skal bzangs rtag thob 'gyur/ gang gi lag tu thob 'gyur ba// sgrib pa kun las nges grol
165b5(mdo): zhing // de bzhin 'jig rten dga' bar 'gyur// de ni de ba zhin gshegs kun kye// thugs skyes gsung skyes sras su 'a// gyur// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ 
165b6(mdo): bla ma rtag tu rjes 'brang zhing // rigs sngags smra bas dbugs dbyung phyir// de bzhin du ni bsrung ba dang // rtag tu mchog ni sbyin pa ra 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po thub chen gyi// bsod nas
165b7(mdo): phung po chen po thob// gang zhig nor bu 'di 'chang ba// de bzhin gshegs pa gang ga'i bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi snyed las/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad mthong zhing dbus
165b8(mdo): 'byin pa dang / byi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// dpal dang skal pa bzang po thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ rtag tu lus dang / ngag dang / yid yongs su dag par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyi
166a1(mdo): mchod pa gcig pur 'gyur/ dgra thams cad kyis sod par myi 'gyur// phyag na rdo rje rtag tu bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyur/ phyag na pad ma yang rtag
166a2(mdo): tu mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa ste/ 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nor bu chen po bzung bas/ sdang ba bdud la
166a3(mdo): sogs pa thams cad dang / bgyegs dang / log 'dren thams cad las rgyal te/ pha rol pham par mdzad nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo ba skord to// 'dis rnga bo che la bskus te bdungs na/ chos kyi rnga
166a4(mdo): bo che la bskus te bdungs na/ chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs par// 'gyur ro// gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi ma// tshams myed pa lnga'i sdig pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// tha na dud
166a5(mdo): 'gro'i skye gnas su rtogs pa/ ri dgas dang / bya gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa la bskurd pa 'debs pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 
166a6(mdo): mnar myed pa la gzhol zhing // gnas pa dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ dmyal ba chen po bcu drug las yongasu grol bar 'gyur/ 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ de la
166a7(mdo): dug gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur/ me'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur/ mtshon gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar gyi 'gyur// dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur/ rims zas
166a8(mdo): cad kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur/ 'dis dung la bskus te/ bus na chos kyi dung chen po bus par 'gyur/ za na dung ki sgra zos pa'i bar der de dag thams cad kyang slar ldog par bya 'gyur// skyes pa dang / 
166b1(mdo): bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag kyang skye ba dang / dka' ba dang / na pa dang / 'chib dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal mapa yongs su sgrol bar 'gyur// 'di ni skye ba khyim yi / 
166b2(mdo): shin sa thams cad rigs mthun par bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad ma la brdzus te/ skye bar 'gyur/ lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang / dpe byad kyis brgyan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis 'atsun
166b3(mdo): pa/ pad ma las dkyil mo krung bcas te skye bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du/ 'od dpag byed las mngon sum du chos kyi 'brel tam zos par 'gyur ro// zla ba yang gi ngos cod
166b4(mdo): pan dkar pos bcings te/ nor bu chen po 'di rgyal mtshan dbye rtse mo la btags na/ bsgreng ba tsam gyi mod la/ chos kyirgyal mtshan bsgreng bar 'gyur ro// 'di rgyal mtshan gyi che
166b5(mdo): la btags pa mthong ba tsam gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa bya nga chub kyi snying por chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud 'a/ la ba'i rgyal mtshan sbreng ba mthong bar reg par bya'o// 'di
166b6(mdo): bsgreng ba tsam gyis 'thab pa dang / thod pa dang / khrag khrug thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ gnod pa thams cad dang / myings dang / mu ge'i dkon pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ chom po dang / g.yon can dang / 
166b7(mdo): rkun ma dang / phyir rgol ba dang / myi mdza' ba rnams 'jigs par 'gyur/ rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung dang / sdang ba'i sems can rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ dug myi bzad pa dang / gcan zan
166b8(mdo): rtum po dang / bya dang sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dang / byi ba dang / sdig sbrul dang / 'bras dang / lu'u ta dang / dug dang / shu ba dang / lhog pa dang / mtshan ma rdol pa dang / skye 'gags pa 'jig pa
167a1(mdo): 'gyur/ sdang ba'i klu dang / ser ba dang / grang ba dang / rlung gis myi tshugs shing / bde ba dang / dga' ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo mang po dang / myi mang pos yongs su gang zhing 'byor par
167a2(mdo): 'gyur/ chos 'dod cing chos kyi kun dga' ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur te/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / zas dang / skom ro zhim pa dang / shin tu 'jam pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ sdang ba
167a3(mdo): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / 'phra med ma dang / yi dgas dang / brjed byed dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / skyes byed dang / grib ma dang / bza' nyes dang / smyung
167a4(mdo): nyes dang / blta nyes dang / greg ma ngan pa zhi bar 'gyur zhe myi tshugs par 'gyur/ sems can de dag thams cad phan tshun// byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/ mchog tu yid bde ba'i gnas
167a5(mdo): na gnas par 'gyur ro// yon tan dang / phan yon chen po de de ka ni/ nor bu'i rgyal po'i byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras
167a6(mdo): gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bzhin/ 'dzum zhing / myig myi 'dzums bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das grub pa'i rdzas kyi mchog nor bu ka dgas pa
167a7(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin kyis brlabs shing / lung bstand pa bdag gi snying po yid bzhin gyi nor bu/ nor bu chen po sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa/ rjesu
167a8(mdo): bsgrags par bgyi'o// kaser dang / na la da dang / 'gi'u wang dang / ba blang dang / ldong gros dang / pad ma dang / srud pa la dang / dgur kum dang / na ga pus pa dang / dra tsha dang / ta ga ra dang / 
167b1(mdo): tsan dan rnam gnyis dang / sprig ka dang / ka la ka dang / ru rta dang / shu ti dang / bri yang ku dang / ha re nu ka dang / sug smel dang / lo d+ha dang / dza ta pa ti ka su ma na dang / sa ma ka dang / sra tsi phog dA/ 
167b2(mdo): shing a rga'i 'o ma rnams pas rtogs te/ cha mnyam pa byas la gser nyis 'gyur du byas te/ rgya skar bzang po dang / tshes grangs bzang zhing dge ba la khrus legs par byas te/ gos rtsang ma bgos nas
167b3(mdo): nyin zhag cig byams pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag ste/ phye ma zhib mor byas ste/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i gzungs stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ tor/ 
167b4(mdo): la dri chab bzang pos bsangs te/ sbyar la gser dang bsres lha dag pur dang / kla pri'i 'dug pas bdugs te/ nor bu zho gnyis pa'i tshad du byas nas/ phug la ras srud kyis btags te/ gser zhes
167b5(mdo): g.yogs pa la yang / don yod pa'i snying po stong tha brgyad/ bzlas/ 'jo bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ 'phags/ pa gyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi byan sngar myi smra bar sprub
167b6(mdo): par byas la/ de nyid kyi zhabs drung du grib pa la bskam par bya ste/ byed dam bzhi cha gsen gyis g.yog par bya zhing / byed g.yog par myi bya'o// gang la gser gis g.yogs pa 'di ni gang la don
167b7(mdo): yod pa'i rnags pa'i yid bzhin gyi nong bu chen po dang 'dra ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / 'jig te nad pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las chen po grub par byed do// se
167b8(mdo): g.yogs pas ni 'jig rten gyi dgas pa mams thang sgrub par byed de/ nad thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / su ta dang / 'brab dang / 'gro ba'i nad dang / shu ba dang / ldog pa dang / an/ 
168a1(mdo): par rdol ba dang / phol myig dang / sha bkra dang / myig nad dang / zad pa na ba dang / gzhogs byed na pa dang / kha nad dang / sna nad dang / rna nad dang / so nad dang / dkan na ba dang / khyen pa dang / 
168a2(mdo): mchun pa dang / snying na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / ljon pa dang / mchin pa na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / gcin sri ba dang / zug zer dang / 'khru ba dang / pho ba'i nad dang / gzhang 'brum thams cad
168a3(mdo): rab tu zhi bar dad thams cad la chu dran dang spyan na// pa rald kyi nad thams cad dang / 'gyur te/ rim pa nyin bzhi pa dang / rlung las gyu da pa dang / 'dres pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur da pa
168a4(mdo): dang / 'dus pa las byu pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// mu/ sa kyi nang kyi nad thams cad la chu dron dang sbyin no// pha rold kyi/ nad thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad la byugs pa tsam
168a5(mdo): gyis yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du dgos pa thams cad la sbyar ba tsam gyis/ thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ the tsom myi bya'o// gser gis g.yogs pa dpung pa la btaH
168a6(mdo): te/ thams cad du thogs pa myed par 'gyur te/ stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnod pa phyag na rdo rje dang / pad ma 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad grub pa bla na myed pa
168a7(mdo): rnam pa gsum po 'di la sbyang bar bya ste/ thig le dang rdong bkru ba dang / lus bslu ba'o// yid la ji ltar bsams pa'i dgos pa bsgrub pa'i de kho na nyid 'grub pa ste/ the tsom myi bya'o// rgyal po btsun
168a8(mdo): mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang skye bo dang / blon por bcas pa'i bran bzhin du dbang du 'gyur ro// nor bu gyi thug tu bzhag nas/ rigs sngags bzlas na bgegs myed par thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// 
168b1(mdo): lag pa g.yas pa la btags te rig sngags bzlas na/ bzlas brjod kyi cho ga brgya 'gyur du byas par 'gyur te/ lan cig bzlas pas stong phrag brgya rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// mgul bar btags
168b2(mdo): bcangs na khrus ma byas pa khrus byas par 'gyur/ mye phrang ba rtsang bar 'gyur ro// tshangs par myi spyod pa tshangs par spyod par 'gyur/ thub pa ma byas pa thub pa byas par 'gyur/ bsnyung ba ma byas pa bsnyung ba
168b3(mdo): byas par 'gyur/ tshig myi mnyan pa baphan par 'gyur/ ma grub pa grub par 'gyur/ dam tshig myi shes pa dam tshig shes par 'gyur/ byams pa'i sems dang / ldan par 'gyur/ sbyin pa gang du yang stong/ 
168b4(mdo): phrag brgya 'gyur du/ sbyin pa chen por 'phel bar 'gyur/ pha rom dra tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ nor bu 'di lag 'thil g.yas pa la btags na/ ga pa la reg pa de zad myi shes par
168b5(mdo): 'gyur ro// su la brjod par myi bya ste/ de'i 'og tu de dag tha/ sa cad 'phel bar 'gyur ro// skyid pa la btags te chu'i nang du// zhugs na/ chu rlung chen po'i rting slebs par 'gyur ro// de na
168b6(mdo): nor bu sgrub par 'dod pas/ dngul shin tu yongs su dag pa las pad pa 'dab ma sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa 'a bye ba/ dbus kyi snying po dang / ze ba ba ma tog 'dra ba/ sor bcu drug chad du byas la/ de'i dbus
168b7(mdo): su gaper gyi dor bu bzhag par bya'o// ga lang gyi sgrib/ ba yang kyi gcin dang ldan pas/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la byas la/ con sna tshogs kyis bri bar byaste/ kho kho zhug tu pad ma thil la/ pa sa
168b8(mdo): das kyi che bar dngus las byas pa'i bdal gzhag ste/ bum pa gang bzhi dang / nor ba'i bus pa bzhi bzhag par bya zhing / me tog bkram par bya mod nam pa sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya/ a ka mu dang / ca
169a1(mdo): dan dang / du ru ska'i bdug pas bdug cing / rtor ma dkar po bzhag par bya/ 'phan gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya/ mar gyi mar me sum bcu rtsa gnyis bltam par bya/ 
169a2(mdo): 'bras bu dang / me tog phreng ba sna tshogs gzhag par bya/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du phyogs par gzhag te/ rig sngags 'chang tha mas gos cang ma bgos te nyin mtshan gcig
169a3(mdo): smyung ba byas la tshes bco lnga nas/ nyi shu rgu dang kanam stong gi bar du dus mtshams gsum du mchod par bya zhing / pad ma za ma tog de dang / 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yang mchod pa byas
169a4(mdo): me/ dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su mngon du 'phyogs te/ 'dug bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bya/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po stong / rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar dang / chus dbang bskur bya
169a5(mdo): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan stong rtsa brgyad bya de bzhin du 'khro bo'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya bya'o// myi smra bar dag sa pa thams cad byas na/ de'i 'og tu tshes bco lnga la zla ba
169a6(mdo): 1ba'i nang par kye dus/ 'tshams su nor bu'i rgyal po pad ma dang bcas te/ gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas sgra 'byung bar 'gyur rig sngags 'chang
169a7(mdo): dka' bar 'gyur/ nam mkha'i dkyil nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po mthong bar 'gyur/ de nas rigs sngags 'chang gis pad ma 'bar ba de lag
169a8(mdo): pa g.yas pas blang bar byas te/ blangs pa tsam kyi mod la nam mkhal la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ kho bo'i rgyal po gser gyi mdog can
169b1(mdo): lta na sdug pa chen po mdun na gnas par 'gyur/ sdang ba dang phyir rgol ba dang / myi mdza' ba thams cad zlog par byed par/ 'khor bye ba stong phrag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i rigs sngags 'chang kyi rgyal/ 
169b2(mdo): por 'gyur/ tshe bskal pa stong thub par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i rnam par lta ba'i nor bu chen po rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzind thob par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i dri ma myed pa'i rtse mo la/ 
169b3(mdo): rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i don yod pa'i zhags pa thob par 'gyur/ phyogs bcu kun kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis
169b4(mdo): dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/ nor bu chen po yongs su dag / dpa rdo rje la rnam par lta ba'i 'od kyis lus rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri zad
169b5(mdo): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / byi 'am nI dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams bgyi ba ci mchis zhes dbang du 'gro bar/ 'gyur/ mgo bo'i spyi bor btags na/ nor bu chen po'i/ 
169b6(mdo): rdzu 'phrul gyis nub phyogs su song nas/ bde ba can gyi rab tu dbye ba gzhal byed khang dang bcas 'khor dang bcas/ legs par ba rgyan pa 'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
169b7(mdo): dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// khar bcug ma nyis re re tshigs su bcad pa sto lobs par 'gyur ro// byid pa tsam gyis thos pa rgya mtsho bsags par 'gyur ro// lce'i che mor bzhag na ste
169b8(mdo): pad ma dang / rba mu ta ma pa 'jas par 'gyur nang/ ma sa sang ba 'dzin par gyung // lag pa la phyugs na reg pa de sa gyi pa de kyi mchis zhes/ de bzhin ga shegs pa de dag la mchos
170a1(mdo): sgo'i chos bshad pa chen po thos par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa s+yan ras/ gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs dang / rgyan dang / gzhal myed khang ston par 'gyur/ mgul tu btags na/ phug gi kan
170a2(mdo): thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/ thams cad du rgyal po'i sde dpon dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// phug stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i sgo 'byed par 'gyur/ dpung pa g.yas pa la btags/ 
170a3(mdo): myi snang bar 'gyur zhing lus myi snang bar gang ga'i klung bye ba stong phrag brgya snyed kyi lus myi snang ba rnams kyi mchog rje dpon dang rgyal por 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yon pa la btags na/ gnod sbyin dang / srin
170a4(mdo): po dang / 'byung po la stsogs pa thams cad mye snang bar byas// par 'gyur/ thams cad kyi gnas kyi gzhal myed 'ang sgo 'bye zhe/ pa 'dug par 'gyur ro// rkyen pa la btags na/ gnyer
170a5(mdo): thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// pus mo g.yas pa dang / brla g.yas pa la btags na/ nags kyi phug gi gzhal myed gi gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye zhing / sman gyi dngos po thos
170a6(mdo): cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na gnas par 'gyur zhing / thams cad du dbang du 'gyur ro// rkang pa'i rje dar la btags na/ rlung gi phung po dang po'i stobs kyi shugs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / 
170a7(mdo): cung zad tsam song bas/ dpag tshad stong phrag bcur 'gro zhing slar yang bar 'gyur/ nyin mtshan gyis stong gsum ki stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rlung chen po'i shugs kyi stobs dang / brtson 'grus/ 
170a8(mdo): kyis song ste/ sar yang 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / gang gis kyang gnod par myi 'gyur/ thams cad du dgos pa bsgrub pa thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// lag 'thil la btags na/ sa'i 'og gi dngos gru
170b1(mdo): chen po thob par 'gyur zhing / sa'i 'og gi phug gi sgo thams cad bye bar 'gyur te/ rang ji ltar 'dod pa der 'jug cing / 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bran bzhin du 'gyur ro// skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / 
170b2(mdo): dge sbyong dang / bram ze thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// // nor sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
170b3(mdo): ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag don yod grub kyi bum pa rab pachog ces bgyi ba'i sgrub pa'i cho ga chen po mchis te/ don yod
170b4(mdo): pa'i zhags pa'i snying po yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs kyi ma thu bstan pa ji lta ba der de ltar bcom ldan 'das bum pa chen po'i bsgrub pa'i cho ga 'di rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis myi khyab
170b5(mdo): pa bsgrub pa grub par 'gyur ba lags so// rigs sngags 'chang rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir de kho na nyid yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur lags so// de nas gser ram dngu/ 
170b6(mdo): lam/ zangs sam/ kham pa'i bum pa tshad dang ldan zhing kun nas shin tu zlum pa/ mgo bo 'am 'grin par phyin pa'i tshad shin tu 'jam zhing / thag thug dang / shang shong myed pa/ dbyibs legs shing byi dor
170b7(mdo): legs par byas pa/ kun nas yongasu gang ba la mtshal gyi mtshon gyis// bad ma 'dab ma brgya ma brgyad pa bri bar bya ste/ mgrin par pad ma'i snying po dang ze ba bri/ 'phags pa byan ras gzigs dbang phyug tha
170b8(mdo): bar bya ste/ shar phyogs su zhal bri/ lhor gyi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag nub tu dbugs 'byin pa'i phyag/ byang du yid bzhin gyi nor bu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dkyil mo krung du bzhugs pa bya'o// 
171a1(mdo): pad pa'i 'dab ma la dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / bram ze dang / drang srong gi tshogs dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha dang / khyab bdag dang / brgya byin dang / rdo rje 'chang dang / 
171a2(mdo): lha'i tshogs gzhan dag bri bar bya zhing / me dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / lha mo sgrol ma dang / 'khro gnyer can dang / pho nya mo kar mo dang / tshogs kyi bdag po dang / gzhon nu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi
171a3(mdo): dang / drag po dang / khyab 'jug bri bar bya'o// pad ma'i 'dab ma'i 'khor dag tu pad ma'i 'phreng ba bri'o// de nas bum pa tshon sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya zhing / gser gi rgyan gyis brgyan par bya/ rim po'i cha
171a4(mdo): bkra zhing mdzes par bya'o// de nas zang shing las pad ma'i/ gdan zlum pa shong ba tsam gyis tshad du byas la/ de'i steng du bu/ pa bzhag la/ bum pa de yungs kar dkar pos bkang ste/ 
171a5(mdo): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya/ ras dkar pos bcing bar bya/ steng du yungs kar dang / gla rtsi dang / 'gi'u wang dang / rje bgros bzhag par bya/ bum pa'i kha ras dmar pos g.yog par bya
171a6(mdo): rin po che sna bdun gzhag par bya/ de nas rigs sngags 'chang thang mas gos phrang ma bgos la/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa 'phang du 'khru gang bar bya ste/ ba grang gi lci ba dang / sar bsres pas byugs ste
171a7(mdo): cha mnyam par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor de'i steng du dri thams cad kyis byugs la/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i dbus su tsan dan dkar pos dkyil 'khor zhu gang klu bzhi pa byas la/ kur kum dang / me to/ 
171a8(mdo): pad mas mchod par bya ste/ pad ma 'dab ma sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa bris la/ pad pa'i ze ba'i steng du bum pa gzhag ste/ 'phan gdugs sna tshogs kyis brgyad par bya/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying po khor yug/ tu
171b1(mdo): spos dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / byug spos sna tshogs dang / mchod yon gyi sdod sna tshogs dang / bum pa gang ba mdzes pa dang / 'dug spos kyi bye ma rnam pa ma po gzhag par bya/ me ton / sna tshogs dang /

171b3(mdo): 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mtshan ma gsal bar bya/ mda' dpa pa dan khor yug tu bzhag par bya/ mtshon skud sna lngas bskor bar bya/ ro rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dkar gsum ci 'byor da pa gzhag par bya
171b4(mdo): 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya/ me tog sna tshogs dkram par bya/ me tog 'phreng ba bzang po kun tu gzhag par bya/ bdug spos kyi snod dang / bum pa gang ba kun tu
171b5(mdo): gzhag par/ pog phor bzhi bzhag par bya// dri chab kyi/ phor bu bzhi bzhag par bya/ snod bzhi dang / kham por brgya/ da gzhag par bya/ sna tshogs kyi rtor ma dkar po rnam pa mang
171b6(mdo): po gzhag par bya/ mar gyi mar me kar ba drug bcu gcig dbul bar bya/ 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dkram par bya'o// chang dang sha dang / breg tsong dang / ke'u dang / 'bags pa dang / zas
171b7(mdo): ngan pa dang / btung ba spang bar bya/ mgo nyes yang ba byas te/ zang mas kos cang ma bgos la/ zla ba nya la bsgrub par bya'o// bsrung ba'i tshogs bdag srung ba dang / thor tshugs bcing ba dang /

172a1(mdo): 'di ni yang dag par bstan to// bum pa bsgrub pa ni mchog ste/ zhag lnga spyad pa byas nas/ gsang sngags bsgrub par bya ste/ dus mtshams gsum du bum pa dang / sangs rgyas la mchod par bya'o// 
172a2(mdo): myi smra bar dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs te/ dkyil mo krung du phyogs nas/ lag pa g.yas pa bum pa'i star du bzhag la/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ chu dang yungs kar kyis
172a3(mdo): dbang bskur la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong phrag bcu bzlas so// yid la byed pa che gcig pas/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje lhur bya zhing / sangs rgyas yid la bya ba
172a4(mdo): bsgoms la/ bzlas brjod bya'o// de'i 'og tu tshes bcwo/ de lnga'i nya'i thun tha ma'i nang par dbyig gi bum pa cher g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po yang drag par
172a5(mdo): 'gyur te/ bum pa chen po de yang 'bar zhing / 'od zeratog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur// rigs sngags 'cha ba da ga' bar 'gyur/ dri ma myed cing yongs su dag la/ dri ma dang
172a6(mdo): bral bar 'gyur/ medog yongs su dag cing / me tog pad ma dang / ku mu ta ltar dkar zhing 'jam pa dang / bum pa de'i sku gzugs rnams rang rang gi lus las 'od gzer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de na
172a7(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa rgya chen po bya/ rigs sngags 'chang bum pa 'di bsgrub pa 'di ni grub po// de'i 'og tu rigs sngags 'chang gis chu dang /

172b1(mdo): legs so// khyod kyis bum pa bzang po grub ste/ bum pa bzang po ji lta ba bzhin du don yod pa'i snying po'i bum pa bzang po yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po yang de bzhin gyis ji ltar 'dod par longs khyod ce/

173b5(mdo): gi sgor brkos te bzhag na/ dge slong thams cad bde ba'i rje ga pa la gnas pas gnas par 'gyur/ rtag tu byams pa'i sems kyis gnas par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun

174a8(mdo): gyi nang du brko te kazhag na/ lo tog mang por 'byor par 'gyur ro// brag phug brkos te gzhag na brag phug gi sgo bye bar 'gyur ro// phug gi skor byugs na/ phug gi sgo thams cad bye bar 'gyur ro/ 
174b1(mdo): bu ka'i gnas su byugs na ro thams cad 'dzag par 'gyur ro// nags kyi phug tu bgos te bzhig na/ nags kyi lha thams cad rang gi mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro// dgos pa gang byed pa de 'brung/
