175b2(mdo): kyi snying po 'di ji lta ba de bzhin du bum pa bzang po 'di yang bstand par bya ste/ de gnyi ga yang rdzu 'phrul mdzad par snang ba mthun pa yin te/ 'di la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par myi bya'o// 
175b3(mdo): bum pa sgrub pa don yod pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug
175b4(mdo): gi drabu'i spyi bor bzhag ste/ bka' saHlad pa/ mchog tu dad du byung ba zhes bya ba'i cho ga zhib mor grub pa/ bla na myed pa don yod pa chen po'i bum pa sgrub pa'i rigs sngags 'chang ba
175b5(mdo): rnams kyis grags pas grub pa 'dzam bu gling pa'i ris bzhiba'i 'jig rtend la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don tu rab tu byiphyin pa dang / sgrub pa shi nad tu kra shis pa bla na byed pa/ rang gi
175b6(mdo): byin gi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ don yod pa'i chen po'i cho 'phrul sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' bla na myed pa/ grub pa yang dag par sgrub pa che zhing che ba/ byang chub kyi snying po'i chos
175b7(mdo): kyi 'khor los bskor ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'arlabs pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir dbugs 'byin pa chen po 'jig rtend du gzhag pa ni
175b8(mdo): sems dpa' chen po legs so// legs so// mchog tu grub pa bran myed pa sgrub pa/ klags pas 'grub pa/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ba/ rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad pa/ rtag tu sbyor bar
176a1(mdo): mdzad pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gyad ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod la yong su rtad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chenan
176a2(mdo): 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog tu yid dga' ste/ bzhin 'dzum nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
176a3(mdo): bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtend gyi khams kyi srog chags su
176a4(mdo): gyu rad pa ji snyed ri dgas dang / bya ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bdag gis yongs su bzung bar bgyi zhing / sdug bsngal mas cad las yongs su tha dad par bgyi ba dang / byang chub chen po'i
176a5(mdo): lam la dgod pa'i phyir/ snying rje chen po rnam par dag pas rjesu bzung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das mngon par brtson pa de dag ni bdag gis thams cad kyi mchog tu yongasu grol bar bgyi'o/ 
176a6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das yang dag par grub par byed pa'i rig pa 'dzind pa thams cad kyis bdag dran na bcom ldan 'das sems can de ni bdag gis rtag tu blta bar bgyi'o// rtag tu rjes su dran pa dang / rtag tu
176a7(mdo): rjes su bsrung bar bgyi'o// / bam po bcu gnyis pa'o// / 'phags pa yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhipa mo 'a rgyal po// / sa yang g.yo bar bya'o// de nas rigs
176a8(mdo): sngags 'chang bzhin 'dzum pa yid la bya'o// 'bar ba de dang // 'phram mA pu tra ka'i mar dang / lhan cig tu sbyar la bdag gi lus la bsku bar bya'o// bskus pa tsam gyi mod la rang gi lus kyi pags pa
176b1(mdo): gser gi mdog tu 'gyur ro// lus rdo rje'i snying po bzhin du myi chod pa dang / myi shigs par gyur nas/ 'khor brgya phrag skyong dang / 'phung bar 'gyur ro// smra bskus na mA spu gser gi mdog tu 'gyur / 
176b2(mdo): sen mo la bskus na sen mo gser du 'gyur ro// so bskus na so gser du 'gyur ro// s+ye lus kang dang gang du bskus pa de dang de nyid gser mdog tu 'gyur ro// til mar bzhag ste/ bcud kyis len mchog
176b3(mdo): 'asrang gcig gis/ zangs srang stong gser du 'gyur ro// til mar dang sbyar ba/ zangs slebs pa la bskus te/ mes bsregs na/ srang gcig kis srang bcu'i gser du 'gyur ro// bcud kyis len
176b4(mdo): mchog 'di dang / ba'i 'o ma dang / zhun mar bzhi cha gcig/ dang sbyar myi che bas bskol te/ tshos par reg pa dang / 'di de nas phywa dral/ khrus legs par byas shing / gos sar pa bgos la chang
176b5(mdo): mar byas te/ thog mar ba'i rnam lnga la reg par bya'o// de nas chu dron po dang bcud kyis len gyi mchog 'di btung bar bya'o// sbyor ba zhag bdun du byas na/ de'i lus rnam par dag par 'gyur/ 
176b6(mdo): sdig pa thams cad zad pa dang / mod la nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / nad thams cad byang ba dang / mod la dug thams cad sel ba dang / dug slar zhen par myi 'gyur ba dang / mtshon gyis ma yin
176b7(mdo): chus khyer bar myi 'gyur/ mes tshugs par myi 'gyur/ yang dug ma rungs pa gzhan gis myi tshugs par 'gyur ro// zhag bcu bzhir sbyor ba byas na/ nad thams cad byang ba dang / 'di'i pags pa rnam par dag
176b8(mdo): pa dang / sgra kor myed par 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyor ba byas na/ byis pa lo bcu pa pad ma dkar sha ma dang 'dra ba'i mdog can gyi lus su 'gyur ro// pad ma'i lo ma dang / ku mu ta ltar 'jam pa
177a1(mdo): dang / ud pa la lta bu'i lha'i myig dang / myi 'am ci'i dbyangs lta bur ma zhum pa dang / shu spu 'khyil la 'khyil cing / bung ba ltar mdog gnag pa lta rdzas lta bur 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig tu
177a2(mdo): sbyor ba byas na/ lo stong phrag bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i tshogs kyis kyi tshugs par 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang / sdig pa byed pa gzhan rnams kyis kyang de byi madz+ra
177a3(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// lo gcig tshang bar bsnyen na lha'i bu mo dag dang lhan cig rtse zhing / lha rdzas kyi longs spyod dang / gzhal myed khang dang / ji ltar lha rnams che ba bzhin du 'gyur ro// dro bar gyurd pa sprang rtsi dang / 
177a4(mdo): lhan cig zos na/ lo nyis stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// namaHkha lel 'gro bar 'gyur ro// zangs srang stong dang / bcud kyis le ngan pa'i mchog srang cig dang / dngul srang bcu zangs dang sbyar te/ 
177a5(mdo): bzhun bcud kyis len mchog dngul srang stong du 'gyur ro// srang gcig gis zangs srang stong dngul du 'gyur ro// kha tog sna tshon sa kyi 'od zer byung na ne/ kha tog sna tshogs su 'gyur te/ gzu
177a6(mdo): mdog sna tshogs kyi nor bu rin po che 'chang zhing / dngul dang / gasnor bzhu la til mar dang lhan cig bskol te/ mgo bo bskus pa tsam gyi mod la/ sgra mdog sna tshogs su 'gyur ro// lus bskus na kha tog
177a7(mdo): sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// myig bskus na nam mkhal la 'gro zhing / khyim thams cad kyi sgo bye ba mthong ste/ khyim thams cad gi dngos po dang / rgyal por 'gyur ro// bral bar thig le byas na/ 
177a8(mdo): bye snang bar 'gyur ro// khar bcangs na gang dang smra ba de/ nor gyi dbang dang / bdag gi dbang du 'gyur ro// yang na ba ser skya'i zhun mar mar kar dang / 'o ma dang / bcud kyis len gyi mchog 'bar ba dang / 
177b1(mdo): lhan cig bskol te/ ka ra bzhin du legs par tshos pa dang / blangs la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas te/ rigs sngags 'chang ba bdag nyid la bskus pa tsam gyi mod la thos
177b2(mdo): cad rig 'dzin gyi 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa chen po bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// bar gyi bskal par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po mchog tu lung bsta/ 
177b3(mdo): pa thob par 'gyur ro// thog le byas na nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro// oM zhes bya ba'i sgras tshangs pa'i gnas nas/ phyir 'byung bar 'gyur/ me kol rtogs pa tsam gyi mod la/ 'og sbyin gyi bar
177b4(mdo): du 'gro zhing phyir yang 'ong bar 'byung ngo // nam gyi che 'chi ba 'i dus byed par 'gyur ba/ de'i tshe bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi/ mas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni skye ba za ma yin zhing mang
177b5(mdo): na gnas pa las yongs su thar pa yin na// / de nas don yod pa'i ril su brjod par bya ste/ ri/ sngags 'chang ba sgrub par byed pa lags par sbyab na/ rig
177b6(mdo): sngags 'chang ba legs par zhus byas zhing / kos phang mar bya'o// pad ma dpa li ka bu rkyeg dang / na ka ke yar dang / 'gi'u wa ba dang / mud pa ya ra nI dang / phyir kha 'dal dang / ma ka ru rnams de ban/ 
177b7(mdo): da dag cha ba snyams te/ zhib mor btags la kha ra dang sbyar te gser dang rdus bkri zhing / zangs kyis kyang bkri ste/ tsan dan dkar po'i gab tshe'i nang du bcug la lag pa'i snyim par bcang bar bya
177b8(mdo): rnab yar mi cho sa brgyad dang / bcu bani la srung ba byas te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs kyi khyan sngang/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i phying po stob cwa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ 'jo/ 
178a1(mdo): rgyal po brgya brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ gsang sngags rgyal po stongab rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas 'gul bar gyur ngan de grangs te / kha ba bcugan gyi sdang bar 'gyur ro// lo stong thub par 'thun
178a2(mdo): sor bzhi tsam gyis rkang pa sa la myi reg par 'gyur ro// dpag tshad brgyar 'gro zhing / phyir yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// me tog can gyi rig 'dzin 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// lus las ku mu ta dang
178a3(mdo): ud pa la'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ud pa la sngon po dang / tsam pa ka dang / ke du'i mye tog dang / de dag cha bsnyams te sbyar la mkhas pas spab rtsi dang lhan cig sbyar te/ ri lu byas la gser dang
178a4(mdo): dngul dang / zangs kyis bkres te/ zla ba yar tshes drug nas tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bcu gnyis nas bcu bzhi 'am bcu ga/ sum nas bcwa lnga'i tshe/ nyin zhag gsum du bsnyung ba bya'o// 
178a5(mdo): shin tu khrus byas shing gos chang ma bgos te/ chang bar bya/ 'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags pa s+yan// ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs ras la bris pa la mchod
178a6(mdo): pa rgya chen po byas te/ shing sa shod za las byas pa'i kabace lo nang du ri lu bcug la/ lag pa'i snyim par bcug la ri mo'i spyan sngar ji srid du/ khol ba'i sgra byung ba de srid du bzlas brjod bya'o// 
178a7(mdo): de nas grub pa yin te/ de las 'ang bcug na/ dpag tshad stong du 'di 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / swar yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ 2/ sor brgyad tsam du rkang pa pa la myi rig par 'gyur ro// mo stong phrag bcu
178a8(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// myig ud pa la sngon po lta bur 'gyur ro// ud pa la sngon po'i dri kha nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzhin yongs su rgyas pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur 'gyur ro// mdog pad ma phru
178b1(mdo): kur 'gyur ro// lus las tsam pa ka'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rig 'dzin nam mkha' thams cad kyi 'kho lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// tsan dan gyi bye ma dang / a ka ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos dang / 
178b2(mdo): a ru ra dang / pa ni na dang / de dag rnams cha bsnyams te/ zhi ba mor btags la/ du rus ka'i mar gyis ril lu bya'o// gser dang / dngul dang / zangs kyis bkr-i'o// tsan dan dkar po las byas
178b3(mdo): pa'i sbom pur bcug ste/ ches bcu gsum nas nya'i bar du/ nyin zhag gsum myi nyal bar/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa rgya cher bya
178b4(mdo): zhing / rtor ma yang rgya cher sbyin la/ dur ba'i stan la/ 'dug ste/ lag pa'i snyim par bcug nas/ don yod pa'i zha gas pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o// 
178b5(mdo): 'khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas ril su 'gul bar gyur da na/ rig sngags 'chang bas des na grub pa yin par rig par bya ste/ re lu grub pa ni de yin no// 
178b6(mdo): de nas rig sngags 'chang bas 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bya ste/ nam nangs ka skya reng ser por 'char ba'i dus su bza' bar bya'o// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
178b7(mdo): thams cad la phyag byas nas/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems bya'o// grogs byed pa la yang byin te/ ri lu gcig khar gzhug par bya'o// ri lu khar bcug pa tsam gyi mod la/ myi snang bar
178b8(mdo): 'gyur nam mkhal la 'phro bar 'gyur/ dpag tshad lnga stong du 'gro zhing / srang yang 'ong bar 'gyur/ ri lu sgrub par byed pa tshogs myed par grub pa rnams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ tshe lo stong thub
179a1(mdo): bar 'gyur/ 'khrug pa tsam gyis rkang pa sa la myi reg par 'gyur ro// / de nas rter ko bar 'dod pas/ gnas gang na ter yod par dogs pa'i gnas der/ ba'i lci bas ma 'das byas la/ 
179a2(mdo): me tog rtor zhing / gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug cing / rtor ma tshang ma dang / sha dang / khrag dang gtor ma dang / phye zan dang / 'bras bu dang / pad ma'i rtor ma dang / rtor ma rnam pa gsum sbyin par bya'o// 
179a3(mdo): 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bya'o// stong phrag bcu bzlas brjod bya'o// stong phrag bcu chang ba dang / gnas gang na rter yod pa'i gnas der / rter bsrung ba mngon du 'gyur zhing / 
179a4(mdo): rter 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rter bsrung ba la rtor ma dang / ma chod yon sbyin par byas na/ rter srung ba de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du la nas byed par 'gyur ro// gang du mngags pa dang / gang bsgo
179a5(mdo): ba'i las de thams cad byed par 'gyur/ sungs kar dang thal ba la don yod pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod bya ste/ phyogs bzhir tor na bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod
179a6(mdo): sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// mtshams chen po bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro// log 'dren phung bar byas na/ yungs mar dang / yungs kar dang / ku gul dang / 
179a7(mdo): ske tse'i 'bru dang / lan tsa rnams sprang zhi dang / bsres la shing ka ra bi ra'i yam sreg shing gis me bus te/ nyin mar dus gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/ log 'dren thams cad bcom par
179a8(mdo): 'gyur zhing / rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// dmag bcing ba 'dod pas/ yungs kar dang / dug dang / skye che'i 'bru dang / sa bon rten rnams spang phra dang smar la/ dpag gi bdun du nim pa'i me sAs
179b1(mdo): thog par brgyad brgya byas na dmag bcings par 'gyur ro// lan gnyis byas na nad chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// brgyad brgya bzlas brjod lan gsum pa byas na/ dmag thams cad zhig par 'gyur zhing
179b2(mdo): phyir yang lan 'ag yang 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// // de nas dbyug pa sgrub par 'dod na/ dbyug pa ser ldeng las gshin rje'i dbyug pa'i chad khru do bar bya'o// de nas 'phags pa s+yan ras gzag
179b3(mdo): kyi spyan sngar zas dkar gsum zos te/ stong phrag bcur bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas ches bco lnga tshang ba'i tshe/ bsnyung ba byas te/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// 
179b4(mdo): 'khro ba'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/ de nas dbyug pa 'bar ngo // de nas grub pa yin par shes par bya'o// dron yod pa'i dbyug pa zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
179b5(mdo): de nas 'phags pa sun ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas/ dbyug pa blangs tekun tu lan bdun bskor bar bya'o// de nas dbyug pa des
179b6(mdo): pa la bdab par bya'o// dbyug pa sa la gru bzhir gzhal ba byas na/ kun tu gru bzhi lham pa'i khyim chen po gzhal byed khang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ phun sum tshogs pa pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
179b7(mdo): lha'i gzhal byed 'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zung byed dang / skyes pa dang / bu mo'i tshogs kyis gang bar 'gyur ro// de nas lnga mo rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ bzang ba mdzes pa bas par 'am pa
179b8(mdo): na 'o ma nas/ rin po'i 'dun lal rgyam mem snod bum po gang bzhig thogs shing sgo'i nang na 'dug go// denas sa mo de na me rig sngags 'chang/ rang gi khyim yin gyis nang sa zhugs gon ce/ 
180a1(mdo): smra bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang bas snying po myed par gyur pa'i khyim gzhal myed 'ang 'dis ci zhig bya zhes brjod par bya'o// de na re snod gang ba 'di long shig dang / rgya che 'phen
180a2(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang bas rlig ces 'khros pa byas pa dang / lha mo de dus te ji ltar char pa khabs cher 'bebs pa de bzhin 'di'i myig nas/ mchis byung ba dang
180a3(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang bas blang bar bya zhing / bskus pa tsam kyai mod la 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser lta bu'i lus su 'gyur ro// tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / gor shi sha'i dri lus las 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
180a4(mdo): khar bcug na lha rdzas kyi ud pa la'i dri kha nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mchog myig tu bskus na lha rdzas ud pa la sngon po 'dra ba'i lha'i myig tu 'gyur ro// ska bskus na lha'i rma byi'i mdog 'dra ba'i sgrar
180a5(mdo): 'gyur zhing / sra 'khyil la 'khyil par 'gyur ro// rna ba'i bu kar blugs na lha'i snyan du 'gyur te/ dpag tshad stong phrag ka/ sum du zos par 'gyur ro// 'thungs na bskal pa stong phrag
180a6(mdo): bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// bar gyi bskol par rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// kar thabs dang / tro ta ga dang / brda khrod pa dang / bstam bcos dang / b+ha ra ta dang / ra ma ya na dang / sngon ki tam snying dang / 
180a7(mdo): tshul dang / 'dul ba dang / skyes rabs dang / snyan dgas dang / bye brag thams cad dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsapa sngags dang / gzungs dang / mdo sde dang / 
180a8(mdo): chos mngon pa dang / theg pa chen po dang / de dag thams cad mngon du phyogs par gnas so// thams cad du rtogs pa khong du chud pa chen por 'gyur ro// de nas bud myed de na re/ rje btsun dam pa
180b1(mdo): rang gi khab mchog tu ga/ srol / zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang bas/ brjod par bya zhing / rang gi rkang pa rims kyis 'jug par bya'o// de nas bud de nu ma gnyis ston par byed na/ rin na
180b2(mdo): sngags 'chang bas/ nu ma gnyis bzung la bcer na de la 'o ma 'dzag par 'gyur zhing / de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas/ blang bar bya/ btung bar bya/ rkang pa'isku bar byas na/ bskus pa tsam
180b3(mdo): mod la 'khor stong dang / lha po de dang / lhan cig du nam mkhal la 'phur te 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rlung gi phung po la zhon par 'gyur ro// rig 'dzin 'khor lo sgyur ba/ stong phrag brgya bcu rtsa bzhi rnams
180b4(mdo): kyi rig 'dzin 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / dpon por/ 'gyur ro// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nyid rig 'dzin rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur te/ 
180b5(mdo): 'jig rte nad pa'i cho ga sgrub pa yin no// dbyug pa lag pa g.yas par bzung ste/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po lan nye/ shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya zhing / lan+ma bdun skor ba byas
180b6(mdo): na/ gang 'dod pa de dag thams cad skad cig tu 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang dgug pa de thams cad bkug cing / mdun na gnas par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo dkrug par 'dod na/ @
180b7(mdo): gi ri mo bris la byug pa la don yod pa'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bya zhing / gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo'i steng du bskor bar bya'o// ku gul gyi 'dug pa sbyin par bya'o// tor ma dkar po can gyi
180b8(mdo): snod bus par bya'o// lan bdun paskor 'anum gi yod pa/ gnod byin dang / gnodan sbyin mo bdun na 'dug cing / bka' bzhin du byed par 'gyur ro// gang bi mo ba'i las de byed par 'gyur ro// ma
181a1(mdo): cad ma chang ba byed par bsgrub par 'gyur ro// nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram dang / kos dang / mas stand dang / chos gos dang / rgyan
181a2(mdo): kyis rnam pa la rdzogs pa bsgrub par byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan gang bsgo ba de thams cad bsgrub par byed do// dpal lha mo'i mdun du bskor na/ nor ki mchog rnam pa mang du sbyin par byed do// mdun na/ 
181a3(mdo): rang gi ngo bo gnas par 'gyur ro// gang 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin par byed do// rnam thos kyi zhabs la lan bdun brdab cing / don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dran par byas na
181a4(mdo): rnam thos kyi sras mdun na rgyug cing gnas par 'gyur ro// no dar mang du sbyin par mdzad do// ga pa 'dod pa de thams cad mdzadad par 'gyur ro// myi smra bar dbyug pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gtsi/ 
181a5(mdo): bzlas brjod bya zhipa/ rgyal po'i sgor lan bdun bskor ba bya sa na/ rgyal po dang btsun mo'i 'khor rnams bdag nyid dang / nor la dbang bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi sgor bskor na
181a6(mdo): grong khyer na gnas pa'i bud myed dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dbang du 'gyur zhing gnas so// de gcig pu mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad phran po dang / bran mo bzhin du
181a7(mdo): rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// lha kang du song nas lha'i spyan sngar bskor zhing / don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas brjod byas na/ lha de rang gi ngo bo mdun na gnas par 'gyur ro// gang bsgo ba
181a8(mdo): de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// gang 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe/ nyi ma'i mdun du bskor bar bya zhing / don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas brjod byas na
181b1(mdo): nyi ma babs te/ mchog kang 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// zla ba nya'i zhal du bskor zhing // do yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod byed na/ zla ba dang / rgyun dang / smang pa'i
181b2(mdo): tshogs dang bcas te babs par 'gyur ro// mchog bsam pa thams cad sbyin par byed do/ deng srel dang bcas pa'i mchod rtem la bskor ba byed cing / don yod pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod byed
181b3(mdo): dbyug pa bskor na/ mchod rten 'bar zhing sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang bsams pa de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// gang 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa
181b4(mdo): la bskor ba byas te/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas brjod byed cing / dbyug pa bskor na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thos cad mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thos
181b5(mdo): cad dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa dang / bsam pa dang / re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro// yang na 'a/ pags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ka rang gi sku bzhin thun
181b6(mdo): rangs kying/ mdun na 'azhugs par 'gyur ro// bcog 'phrum thamams cad sbyin par mdad par 'gyur ro// dranam pa thams cad rtsub pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/ don yod pa'i byub pa rig 'dzin
181b7(mdo): 'khor los sgyur ba thob par 'gyur ro// char myi 'bab pa'i tshe klu'i gnas su mong ste/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par bya/ dbyug pa bskor bar bya'o// bskor ba tsam gyi mod la klu rnams char ba'i
181b8(mdo): rgyan chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ci 'dod par char gyi rgyun 'bebs so// char ches na khang thog tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po skad drag pos brjod de dbyug pa bskor na/ char ches pa chad par 'gyu
182a1(mdo): ser ba 'bab pa'i tshe/ srin logs su bltas te khros pas 'khro bo'i rgyal po skad chen pos dran par bya zhing / 'khros pas dbyug pa bskor na/ sad dang rlung dang / ser ba myi 'bab par
182a2(mdo): 'gyur ro// dpag tshad tshun chad du mtshams chen po kun tu bcad par 'gyur ro// gdon kun kyis zin pa la 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun dran par bya zhing dbyug pa bstand na/ gdon thams cad du zhing 'bros
182a3(mdo): par 'gyur ro// brjed byed la phyogs pa'i bar la bstan pa tsam gyis 'bros par 'gyur ro// / rimapa thams cad la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying pos bya bas na/ byabs pa tsam gyi mod la/ rims thams cad las
182a4(mdo): tha rad par 'gyur ro// zhag bzhi pa'i rimapa ni ngu zhing 'bros pa dar 'gyur ro// kayul 'gyed cing 'thab pa'i tshe/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying 'khros pas bzlas brjod byas shing dbyug pa bskor
182a5(mdo): ba byas na/ mtshon dang / dkra cha dang / lag cha thams cad rgya snang bar 'gyur zhing / pha rol kyi dpu rnams kyi hud rgya hud zer zhing 'bros par 'gyur ro// 'brog dkon pa'i nang du
182a6(mdo): 'gron po rnams song ba na/ don yod pa'i rgyal po dran par bya zhing / dbyug pa bskor ba byas na rkun po dang / chom po dang / myi rgod dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / drang dang / dug myi bzad pa dang / kan
182a7(mdo): zan khro bo dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang / dug dang / bcas pa'i srog chags de dag thams cad myi snang bar 'gyur ro// rang gi khyim du bde bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// myings thams cad dang / ba lang gi nang
182a8(mdo): dang / phyugs ngas chen po dang / rta dad chen po dang / bud myed dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo nad chen po byung ba'i tshe/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dang / 'khro bo'i rgyal po skad chen pos dran par byas
182b1(mdo): zhing / dbyug pa grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir skor ba byas na/ bsor pa tsam gyi mod la/ byings dang / gnod pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / 'jug pa thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / thod pa dang / 'byed pa/ 
182b2(mdo): dang / 'chang 'bru ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// bud myed dam/ skyes pa dgug par 'dod na/ gnas mthon por 'dug ste/ skad chen pos don yod
182b3(mdo): pa'i rgyal po'i snying po/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dran par bya'o// dbyug pa bskor bar bya'o// gang gi don tu bya ba de mying brjod pa byas na/ dpag tshad brgya nas kyang de 'ong zhing / bdag dang nor la dbang ba yod cing
182b4(mdo): gnas par 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro/ 'on te nor bu bzang po'i sras dgug par 'dod na/ za ba mar bya ches bcu bzhi la bsrung ba byas te/ dbyug pa la don yod pa'i
182b5(mdo): rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu waM gcig bzlas brjod bya ste/ nor bzangs kyi sras kyi lto ba'i steng du gzhag par bya/ 'khro bo/ 'i rgyal po'i bzlas pa byas na bzhi thun gyi tho rangs tsam na
182b6(mdo): nor bu bzang po'i sras rang nyid/ rigs sngags 'chang gi mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur zhing / gser gyi dong che stong phrag bcu sbyin par mdzad do// de las dkon mchog gsum gyi sku skal dbul bar bya/ 'pham
182b7(mdo): ba s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya/ nor bu bzang po'i sras la mchod yon gyi chab dbul bar bya// nyi ma re re zhing nor bzangs kyi sras la mchod yon gyi chab phul na/ nam mtsho'i bar du nyi ma re re/ 
182b8(mdo): zhing gser gyi dong ce sbyin par mdzad do// de las rigs sngags 'chang bas phyed dang / bzhi rtsa gcig dgod par bya ste/ sbyin pa byin par bya/ bsod nams bsag par byas la/ nor bu bzang po'i sras dang / 
183a1(mdo): lhan cig rjes su yi rang bar bya'o// 'brog dgon pa'i nang du song ba na/ mu dkon par dbyug pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlam brjod bya zhi ga ga na ne'u
183a2(mdo): ka sing sngon po yod pa'i gnas dang / sa la lan bdun gdab cing bskor te/ skad drag pos don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par bya/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la/ nyams zag zag
183a3(mdo): skad du byas te/ de nas gang du brdabs pa'i gnas der / lha rdzas kyi chu ha cang drang ba yang myin/ ha cang dro ba yang byin/ ro dang / chas pa'i rdzing bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas
183a4(mdo): dbyug pa la 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod bya ste/ rdzing bu'i nang du chu la bdab par bya'o// de nas rdzing bu'i nang nas/ mye ser skya bo cig byung ste/ de nas rig sngags 'chang ba la
183a5(mdo): thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas/ 'dug ste/ rigs sngags 'chang ba ci 'dod ces smra bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang ba sa bdag ni kha zas kyi ched du lags kyis gsal du gsol
183a6(mdo): zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas/ myi de la shis pa'i tshig brjod par bya'o// de nas myi de rdzing bu'i nang du zhugs pa dang / skad cig thang cig yud tsam la khe zas dang / btung
183a7(mdo): ba ro zhim po rnam pa sna tshogs yod par byed cing / rigs sngags 'chang ba la sbyin par byed de/ skye bo stong phrag brgya'i ston mo byar yod cing / yo byad phun sum tshogs pa shin tu mang por 'gyur ro// gal te/ 
183a8(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang bas rdzing bu myed par myi byed na/ rdzing bu de dus rtag tu gnas par 'gyur/ mye snang bar myi 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad dang / 'dod pa thams cad la yo byad thams cad kyis 'brel
183b1(mdo): pa myed par 'byung ba pa 'gyur ro// 'on te don yod pa sna tshogs bya bar 'dod na/ rig sngags 'chang ba/ des lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pa'i dri chus khrus byas la gyi chug bcing bar bya'o// 
183b2(mdo): myi smra bar dbyug pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ bskor bar bya'o// des na 'khor dang / skye bo mang po 'khor zhing rmongs par 'gyur ro// de nas dbyug pa bskor ba byas na/ yid la ji ltar
183b3(mdo): sems pa'i ngo bo nyid de bzhin du thams cad ston par byed do// 'bras bu dang / me tog char 'bebs so// sgyu ma rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed do// de nas longs bslang bar 'dod na/ rigs sngags
183b4(mdo): 'chang ba des/ legs par khrus byas shing / gos sar ba bgos te/ gtsang mas khrus byas la dur khrod du song ste/ dbyug pa la don yod pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas la/ 'khro
183b5(mdo): bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod byed cing / dur khrod kyi na/ nga du bskor ba byas na/ dpag tshad tshun chad du kun tu mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro// bgegs thams cad dang / gnod sbyin
183b6(mdo): dang / srin po ma rungs pa thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chad kyis myi ro langs te bkru bar bya'o// ba'i rnam lngas sbyang bar bya'o// ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi
183b7(mdo): lham par bya'o// seng sdeng kyi phur pa chad por bcu gnyis pa/ kra bzhir gzugs par bya'o// tshon sA lnga'i skud pas/ dkyil 'khor kun tu bskor par bya'o// ri mo ras dkar pos bkri bar bya'o// dkyi/ 
183b8(mdo): 'khor dbus su gzhag par bya'o// me tog gis gtor bar bya'o// me tog dkar po gzhag par bya'o// mchod yon gyi chu bzhag par bya'o// ku gul gyi bdug po sbyin par bya'o// rigs sngags 'chang sa
184a1(mdo): shar phyogs su kha bltas te/ 'dug la/ dbyug pa lag pa g.yas par bzhag ste/ rig pa'i rgyal po gdon par bya'o// 'khro bo'i rgyal po lan drug bcu dran par bya'o// g.yas pas byab par bya'o// 
184a2(mdo): lag pa g.yas pa'i/ dbyug pa gdab par byas na/ ri mo de 'gul bar 'gyur/ g.yol bar 'gyur/ langs te phyogs bcur lta bar 'gyur/ rigs sngags 'chang bas/ dbyug pa de spyi bor gzhag pa
184a3(mdo): byas na/ mye ro de tshig smra bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang bas/ gsang sngags dran par bya'o// yid kyis bsams par byas na/ mi ro de thams cad smra bar 'gyur zhing / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
184a4(mdo): pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa na 'byung ba/ sma ba ra 'gyur ro// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas dbyug pa snying ka/ ra bzhag pa byas na/ khrag tu skyug par 'gyur ro// khrag de
184a5(mdo): thig le byas na/ khyim thams cad la sgo srungs byed cing / sgo tha/ mas cad gdangs par 'gyur ro// bud myed dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing / 'dug go// 
184a6(mdo): dbyug pa snying kar btsir na skyug par 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang bas blangs te mtha' dge bza' bar bya'o// zos pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'byung ba chen po'i bdag po dang / 
184a7(mdo): dbang phyug chen po 'dra bar 'gyur ro// lha mo'i lo stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// oM zhes bya bas dbyug pas btsir la bsdigs pa byas na/ de nas lce 'byin par 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang bas
184a8(mdo): bcang la rigs sngags 'chang bas blang bar bya'o// blangs pa tsam gyis nam mkhal la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang ba ral gri'i 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyur ro// lo stong phrag bcu ra 'tsho bar 'gyur// 
184b1(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang ba bcwo brgyad kyi 'khor kis bskor bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas phyi ro'i spyi bor dbyug pas brdabs na/ sma 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / shi ba'i ro gcig tu mkhregs pa'i/ 
184b2(mdo): gser yin pas blang ba byas na/ srang gcig gis zangs srang stong gser du 'gyur ro// de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga yin no// // de nas byang chub sems dpal 'phags pa spyan ras gzi
184b3(mdo): dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir bdag gi 'jig rtend pa'i cho ga lags so// de bzhin gshegs
184b4(mdo): pa shag kya thub pas bka' stsal pa/ sems can chen po se rnams can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho ga dam pa gsang ba'i snying po dang / dkyil 'khor
184b5(mdo): dang / blo brtan po 'jigs pa myed pa thob par 'gyur ba dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dam pa sgrub par byed pa de kho na nye grub par 'gyur ba dang / klags pa dang / dran pa tsam dang / 
184b6(mdo): sgrub par byed pa tsam gyis de dag thams cad grub pa chen po thob par 'gyur ba dang / bsam pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par grub par 'gyur ba dang / mchog grub chen po so sor thob par 'gyur ba dang / rig sngags
184b7(mdo): 'chang gi 'dod par rtogs pa bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs par grub par 'gyur ba spros shika/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'dra/ 
184b8(mdo): kyi drung nas dbugs 'byind pa dang bsgo ba zos nas/ shi nad tu yid dga' bar 'gyur te/ de bstan las langs nas pra gos phrag pa cig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
185a1(mdo): 'das ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ me tog dang / 'dug pa dang / rI dang / 'greng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / chos gos dang / 
185a2(mdo): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sdud pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur chen po byas te/ mchod nas 'khor gi dkyil 'khor mang por byang
185a3(mdo): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dkyil 'khor gyi ltar rtogs pa dang gang dag rig 'dzin grub pa dang / gang dag lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / 
185a4(mdo): myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gang dag don yod pa'i zhag ba'i rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig la rje su zhugs pa dang / gung dag ri bo ta la la gnas pa de dag thas cad kyis me tog
185a5(mdo): dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / kos dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / ches dang sdud pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas te/ yid dga' bar gyur to// 'phags pa s+yan
185a6(mdo): ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la stong phrag brgya skor ba byas/ 'khor gi dkyil 'khor de la yang mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'a das ka la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom
185a7(mdo): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyeg kyi 'dum par 'dug te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshig 'jam pos 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la mchis pa'i mang du byung ba rnam par blta ba/ don yod pa'i tshe 'phru
185a8(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba de kho na nyid rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin rlabs dang / dam tshig chen po'i dkyis
185b1(mdo): 'khor don yod pa'i rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / 'jig rtend las 'das pa klags pa dang / sgrub par byed pa grub pa mchog tu gyur da pa'i snying po dang / 'jig rtend las 'das pa mchog sgrub pa/ 
185b2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byan kyis brlabs shang / lung bstand pa lags te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi s+yan sngar bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis/ rigs sngags 'chang thos
185b3(mdo): cad mchog tu grub pa'i bya ba'i phyir dang / sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir dmyal ba dang / yid dgas kyi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend seld pa/ sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa myi bzang
185b4(mdo): pa 'joms pa dang / ngan song thams cad seld pa/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rtend las 'das pa'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa nges parasreg par byed pa/ yongasu bsgrags par bgyi'o// 'cha
185b5(mdo): myed pa lnga dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' spong ba dang / po'i chos spong ba dang / mtshams myed pa la gzhol ba dang / 'phas pa'i dge 'dun la 'khu ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sa/ 
185b6(mdo): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpo'i tshogs thos cad spong bar byed pa/ de dag gis mnyan pa dang / mthong ba tsam dang / sdom pa tsam dang / lan cig 'bad pa tsas dang / 'chad pa tsam dang / thams cad byang bar
185b7(mdo): 'gyur ro// nga mthong ba tsam gis thams cad zad par 'gyur byang bar 'gyur ro// rims zas cad dang / nad thams cad dang / dri ma dang / ser sna dang / 'phra dog thos cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa dang / 
185b8(mdo): smos pa mas cad las song su grol bar 'gyur ro// 'jog rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sdug bsngal skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chib dang / nad dang / mya ngan dang / sme lpags 'dod pa dang / sdug sngal bad
186a1(mdo): yid myi bde ba thas cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / chod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / phung bar byed pa dang / rdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / gsod pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / shags 'gyed pa dang / 
186a2(mdo): btsod su 'dzind pa dang / lcags su bcug pa dang / rkun pa dang / thol ba dang / phyi dod dang / seng ge dang / glang po che dang / sa he dang / nad ngan pa dang / dmu chu dang / sha bkra dang / mdze dang / 'brul bu ga yon
186a3(mdo): can dang / shu ba dang / shu bran dang / g.yan pa dang / klad pa na pa dang / gzhogs byed na ba dang / dom dang / dred dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / sbrul ma rungs par
186a4(mdo): kha gdug pa dang / sprul nag po dang / srog chags go na dang / dug dang bcas pa'i srog chags 'jigs pa sna tshogs dang bcas pa dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon dang / g.yangs dang / khyim rdib pa dang / 
186a5(mdo): grang ba dang / rlung dang / nyin tshan dang / bye ba kha gdug pa'i 'a jigs pa thams cad ni/ klags pa dang / kha ton byas pa dang / ma/ thong ba tsam gyis thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur/ phung pa
186a6(mdo): 'gyur/ mod la phye mar brlags par 'gyur ro// yongasu klags par 'gyur ba 'di la dogs par myi bya/ yid gnyis bskyed par myi bya the tsom myi bya/ sems gnyi su 'gyur ba bskyed par myi bya'o// btso
186a7(mdo): ldan 'das bdag rtag tu mngon par dran par bgyid pa dang / rtag tu yid la byed pa'i blo 'byung bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po yang bzlas par bgyi'o// rmad du byung ba rnam
186a8(mdo): par lta ba/ don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin kyi
186a9(mdo): rlabs/ dab tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor don yod par rnas par lta pa'i zhags pa'i snying pon tig tu nyan gyi 'chad par dus pas cad du med la kha ton du brjod par 'gyi'o// rtag tu tun gyi 'chad par rjesu dran par
186b1(mdo): bsgom pa bgyi'o// de dag dran pa bsgoms pa tsam dang / dran pa tsam gyis 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa zas cad thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi ldog pa zhes bya'o// byir/ 
186b2(mdo): myi ldog pa'i gnas la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thas cad dgongs par 'gyur ro// lung stond pa dang / byin kyis rlob par 'gyur na/ lta ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'phag
186b3(mdo): pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ste/ phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang / dran pa dang / dus gsum du shi nad tu gsal bar yid la byed pa dang / mchod cing phyag byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos ste/ sems can doni
186b4(mdo): nga dang 'dra ba yin pa rig par bya'o// 'jig rtend dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus yin par rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshe gus pa thas cad kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis brlabs pa dang / dbang bsku
186b5(mdo): bas dbang bskur ba yin par rig par bya'o// gang zhig lan ma ra du shi nad tu lhag par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ seMs can/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yin par rig par bya'o// 
186b6(mdo): bdag kyang dus zas cad du rtag tu rje su 'brang bar bgyi'o// dus thos cad du mthong ba sbyin par bgyi'o// bsam pa dang re ba thas cad yong su rdzo gas par bgyi'o// de'i tshe bdag nyid kyis ses can myur ba myur
186b7(mdo): bar byang chub kyi snying popa 'gro ba ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gzhag par 'gyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag ni go ma chen po brtan parakham blangs pa la 'tshal ba lags pas/ sos can thas cad
186b8(mdo): basprul pa'i phyir re ba'i mchog thos cad yong su rdzogs par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po rgyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la 'di
186b9(mdo): skad ces bka'asaHlad to// seMs can dag pa'i mchog legs so legs so 'di mchog tu dkon pa ste/ 'jig rtend las 'das pa'i cho ga de ni/ mying 'dzind pa tsam gyis sos can yongasu grol bar 'gyuran
187a1(mdo): lta ba dang / klog pa dang / sgrub pa'i chog byed pa dang / sdom pa la gnas pa lta spos kyang ci dgos/ seMs can de ni bran myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir gyi ldog par 'gyur ro// 
187a2(mdo): seMs can dag pa dus la bab pa gang yin par shes na smros shig/ de nas byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta zhing 'dzum ste/ don
187a3(mdo): yod pa'i rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po smras so// dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thas cad la phyag 'tshal lo// rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
187a4(mdo): thas cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa byams pa la sochog/ pu/ 'phags pa byang chub seMs dpa'i tshogs kyi mchog la phyag 'tsha dal lo// 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha gshin/ 
187a5(mdo): rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / drang srong gi tshogs kyi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po 'phags
187a6(mdo): pa s+yan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste// / oM sarba ta tha ga ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ pA sha hrid ye/ dz+wa la dzA la/ dAr ma drA du/ kaD+h+we/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ma ha pad
187a7(mdo): ma b+hu dze/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA pa sha dA re/ ba ra ba ra ba ra/ ra shI/ sha ta sa ta sra pra ti man Ni ta/ sha rI re/ ta ra ta ra/ bi pu la te dza da re/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ Shad par myi tA/ pa ri pU ra ne/ ka la ka la/ 
187a8(mdo): ma ha pra ma ma be sha d+ha re/ ma la ma la/ sarba pa pa/ a ba ra na ma hA ki la bi la Sha/ nA sha ne/ dUr+ya d+hu ru/ bod d+hi sad tra/ bu shud d+he/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ pad sa le/ ya ma ba ru na/ ku be ra/ na mo s+the te
187b1(mdo): hu ru hu ru/ pra sta/ bi Sh+Ta/ ma he sha rA/ ku pA ra/ nan di ke shwa ra/ i kA ra/ ma te shwa ra/ de ba pu tra/ bAdi ta/ na ma s+thi te/ bi lid+ha/ ma Ni mo 'u li d+ha re/ a si tra bA dzi na/ ma ku ta/ d+ha re/ di bya/ mar+Na/ 
187b2(mdo): ka na ka/ badz+ra/ br-i dU d+ya/ ma ra ka ta/ pad sa raka/ in dra ni la/ di bya mug ti ka/ a lang kri ta/ sha ringar/ she ta/ yang nyo ba bi ta/ d+ha ra dza ta/ ma ku ta/ man Ni ta/ na ba can tra ra tsi ta/ pad ma
187b3(mdo): ra/ pad pa A sa na/ pad ma dU dza/ tri lo tsa na/ hri shu la d+ha ra/ pA sha d+ha ra/ pA sha d+ha ra/ sarba ta tha ga ta/ so b+he shig ta/ sa ra sa ra/ sarba bA pa/ pra sha ma na ka ra/ ma ha ka ru ni ka/ tu ru tu ru/ sa
187b4(mdo): rba ba ra d+ha ya ka/ b+ho ta bo ti/ sa rba ta tha ka ta/ a ba lo ki/ te/ bo b+hi/ man d+ha/ a ba lo ki te/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma hA shA rA/ ma hA tsin d+ha mo naM/ d+ha ra/ bi shwa ru pa/ ma hA so 'u mya/ ban d+ha na/ 
187b5(mdo): ma hA ka ru Ne ka/ bu d+ha bu b+haHbo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ ba ga bA sarba ta thA ga ta/ a ba lo ka ti ga rbe/ ma ha pu n+ya te dza/ d+ha ra/ pra ba ra/ si dwi ka ra/ sarba b+hu dwi ha ra/ sarba sa tad ya ba ra/ 
187b6(mdo): sarba tu kha/ pra mo tsa ka/ ma ha ka ru Ni ka/ na mo stu te swA hA// / bcom ldan 'das bdag gi 'di ni rmad du byung ba/ rnam par lto ba'i zhags pa'i snying po'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po/ 
187b7(mdo): rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gzungs kyi snying po'o// 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi snying po'o// gzugs sna tshogs chen po'o// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzind
187b8(mdo): rnam par 'phrul pa/ myig stong mnga' ba/ dbu' stong mnga' ba/ spyan stod gyis rnam par gzigs pa/ phyag rgya stong gi po byin gyis brlabs pa/ kang ka' krung gi bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag bcu'i bye ba'i
188a1(mdo): rdul shi nad tu phra ba dang / mnyam pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du rje su zhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thas cad kyi de kho na nyid gsang ba la/ 'jug pa/ sangs rgyas thos cad kyi zhing du 'jug pa byang/ 
188a2(mdo): chub kyi snying por 'grod pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar ba bdud la sotogs pa'i ma rungs pa thams cad kyi bdud 'joms pa/ chos kyi dung 'bud pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba
188a3(mdo): dmyal ba thas cad sel pa/ cho ga zhib mo zas cad grub par mdzad pa/ cho ga bsgrub pa thas cad kyi mchog/ sa bcu chen po la so sor 'jug pa/ phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la rjesu 'jug pa/ de bzhin gshegs/ 
188a4(mdo): pa thas cad kyis dbang bskur pa dang / byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gis brlabs pa/ don yod pa'i mchog phun gsum tshogs pa thob par mdzad pa/ don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rnam
188a5(mdo): par sprul pa/ don yod par seMs can rgya mtsho snyed yang dag par 'dzind pa/ don yod par ses can sa bon la so sor 'jog pa don yod pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'jug pa
188a6(mdo): don yod par de bzhin gshegs pa thos cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yong su sgrogs pa/ don yod par de bzhin gshegs pa zas cad mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur gyi sprin rab tu byed pa/ don yod par seMs ca
188a7(mdo): zas cad kyi 'jigs pa'i khyim du 'jud pa/ don yod par sbyin pa chen po'i pha rol tu phyind pa drug yong su rdzogs pa/ don yod par lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / 
188a8(mdo): phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / ko pa dang / rgyan dang / chos gos sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bebs pa/ don yod pa'i tshe/ yong su brjes te/ sangs rgyas kyon
188b1(mdo): kun tu brgyand pa/ sna tshogs su de bzhin gshegs pa thas cad yang dag par lta ba/ don yod par bsod nams kyi phung po chen po rab tu rdzogs pa/ don yod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed pa/ don yod pa/ 
188b2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par mthong ba dang / grub pa dang / cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bstand pa/ don yod par dbang phyug sgrub pa/ don yod pa rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang
188b3(mdo): phyag rgya dang / rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo yang dag par stond pa/ don yod par grub par mthong ba/ don yod par cho ga mthong ba/ don yod par tshe rab tu 'phel ba/ don yod par snyan par grag sa
188b4(mdo): pa rab tu stond pa/ don yod par 'khor ba las rab tu sgrol ba/ don yod par skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba las yongasu sgrol ba/ da ngan yod par mchog rab tu sbyin pa/ don yod par bzlas brjod/ 
188b5(mdo): cho ga rab tu rdzogs pa/ don yod par dran pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu rdzogs pa/ don yod par rig 'dzind 'khor los sgyur/ pa/ thob pa yang dag ston pa/ don yod par lha'i gnas
188b6(mdo): gzhal myed khang sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi lha'i gnas su 'jug pa don yod par dga' ldan gyi gnas su 'jug pa/ don yod par 'og myin gyi gnas kyi bar du 'jug pa/ don yod par sum bcu rtsa gsu
188b7(mdo): gyi gnas su brgya byin lha'i rgyal por 'jug pa/ don yod par ri rab chen po lag pa cig gis skul ba/ don yod par rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs stond pa/ don yod par myi snang bar stond pa/ don yod par
188b8(mdo): stobs 'phel ba/ don yod par gling bzhi sa dbang ba'i 'khor lo sgyur ba/ so sor thob pa stond pa/ don yod par yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa/ don yod pa
189a1(mdo): 'bru'i char 'bebs pa/ don yod par gos kyi char 'bebs pa/ don yod par rgyan dang / chos gos dang / mu tika gi chun 'phyang dang / gdul 'khor dang / gser gi tshong tsong dang / gdu zu dang
189a2(mdo): dpung rgyan sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa yang dag par stond pa/ don yod par ro rnam pa sna tshogs ro'i mchog/ ro brgya'i kha zas kyi char 'bebs pa/ don yod par ses can sna tshogs grol bar stond pa/ don yod
189a3(mdo): par ste nad chos dang / tshig le'ur bcad pa dang / tshul dang 'dul ba dang / mdo sde dang lung bstand pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng bzhi dang / de lta bu byung ba dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang
189a4(mdo): shin tu rgyas pa dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi man ngag sna tshogs dang / chos mngon pa sna tshogs kyi gtam yang dag par stond pa dang / don yod par theg pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs rgya mtsho la 'jug pa/ 
189a5(mdo): rab tu stond pa/ don yod par gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / byung po dang / sha za dang / yi dgas dang / grul bum dang / brjed byed dang / bgyegs dang / log 'dren sna tshogs nyes pa dang
189a6(mdo): gsod pa dang / shind tu selang pa yang dag par stond pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das de ltar na yon tan chen po can gyi gzungs ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba/ zas cad du myi 'jigs pa'i gnas
189a7(mdo): rab tu stond pa/ 'jig rtend las 'das pa'i lam legs par rab tu stond pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam rab tu stond pa/ phyir myi ldog pa'i gnas dang / sangs rgyas nyid sbyin par mdzad pa lags/ 
189a8(mdo): bcom ldan 'das don yod pa la rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po gzungs chen po/ 'phags pa yun ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po yon tan khyad par yongasu bsgrags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa zas
189b1(mdo): cad kyi snying po gsang ba la rab tu gnas pa lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas byang chub seMs dpa' s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' aHlad to// 
189b2(mdo): seMs dpa' chen po mchog tu dgon pa'i gzungs 'di'i snying po 'jig rtend las 'das pa rnam par 'phrul pa bshad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub ses dpo'i tshogs zas cad rdzu 'phrul rnam
189b3(mdo): par 'phrul pa/ gsang ba'i snying pos yongs su bsgrags pa legs so legs so// de dag ni seMs can thams cad la lam mchog shi nad tu mchog tu gyur pa gya nom pa bla na byed pa mchog tu dkon pa'i gzungs kyi
189b4(mdo): snying po gsang ba yongasu bsgrags pa ste/ gang gis 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las seMs can pha rol tu sgrol ba yin no// s+yan ras kar+b+hadags dbang phyug rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am
189b5(mdo): dge slong ba 'ab/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ ge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs gang la la zhig gam/ 
189b6(mdo): ses can gzhan kang yang rung bas don yod pa'i rnam par lta ba'i snying po 'di dang / rmad du byung ba rnam par lta ba don yod pa'i snying po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil la'o
189b7(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa thos cad yang du byung ba'i de kho na nyid rnam par 'phrul pa/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyi rlabs dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi phying 'dzin pa cas kyis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po 'tshogs pa 'byor
189b8(mdo): masod napas kyi phung po chen po dang / ldan pa yongs 'dzid pangs pa 'gyur ro// gang ka'i klung gi 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma'i dul phra ra ba dang / mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa da / 
190a1(mdo): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon tu mngon du mthong ba dang / mngon du chos thos pa dang / mngon du dbyangs thos pa dang / mngon du lung bstand pa thos par 'byur ba'i seMs can chen po de
190a2(mdo): dag gis ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po shi nad tu che ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongasu bzung bar 'gyur ro// sems can de gzugs gang yin pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga dang / byed sna tshogs da ltar thos pa
190a3(mdo): dang / yang na klog pa dang / yang na lta ba tsam mthong ba ni/ de dag mnyam pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu po 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo/ de ni bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i za ba dang / ldan par 'gyur ba yang de dang / 
190a4(mdo): mnyam pa yin no// dka' ba byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te de ba nga bzhin gshegs pa dang / mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba dang / thos par 'gyur ro// gang zhig gzungs 'di'i dkyil 'khor 'bad de/ stobs dang bcwo
190a5(mdo): 'grus kyis pha ros gnon par byed pa dang / 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga byed pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs/ sgrub par byed pa dang / 'bad par byed pa de ni dkal ba chen po
190a6(mdo): zhugs pa yin te/ de dang mnyam pa yin no// dkal ba gang zhe na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya sa shag kya thub pas/ bskal pa grangs myed pa gsum du dka' ba
190a7(mdo): la zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bam yin no// rigs kyi bu po 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ba 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge
190a8(mdo): myong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyas rig sa sas/ rnge'u rigs pas/ dmangs rigs gang yin pa 'am/ sems can gapa yang rung bas gzungs 'di'i dkyil 'khor dang / chog stob pa chen po dang / pha rol
190b1(mdo): gnon pa'i brtson 'grus kyis sgrub par byed pa 'di ni/ 'jig rtend las 'das pa'i cho ga tshol ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ 'dra ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / bzlas brjod byed pa dang / bzlas brjod byed
190b2(mdo): pa dang / cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor lta ba dang / 'jug pa dang / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya bcings te sgrub pa dang / 'di lta ste zos pa dang / 'dzind pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la
190b3(mdo): byed pa dang / seMs dpa' dang / 'dus gsum du lan gsum don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran pa dang / khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang skur ba dang / gzungs 'di yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas brjod dang / cho ga dran pa
190b4(mdo): dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / byams pas snying brlan pa dang / ses can thos cad la snying brtse ba lhur byed pa de ni/ dka' bar spyod/ da pa chen po la zhugs pa yin no// bskal pa grangs myed pa gsu
190b5(mdo): du dka' bar spyod pa dang / zhugs pa dang / 'dra ba 'am/ lhag pa yin no// de'i tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyur ba dang 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas nyid du sos
190b6(mdo): gnas pa yin no// / 'phags pa don yod pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po bcu bzhi pa'o// // bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i phra ba brtsegs par 'gyur ro// rtag tu 'jig
190b7(mdo): rtend dbang phyug rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu phyag g.yas pa byang chub sems dpa' de'i spyi bo la 'jog par 'gyur ro// rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// rtag tu zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro// 
190b8(mdo): de ltar na yon tan chen po brjod pa'i gzungs dang / dkyis 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga 'di ni mchog tu dkon pa yin no// gzungs dpang dkyil 'khoram dmar po 'am/ yang na gur kum 'dra ba'i mdog
191a1(mdo): ma rdul dkar po sdum pa ni// mar sar 'dra bar 'jam pa ni// sa'i khyad par dbye ba de// de bzhin gshegs pa kun kis bsngags// byang chub snying po sa der mtshungs// ring bsrel bzhugs pa'i
191a2(mdo): mchod rtend dang // de ni mtshungs par gyur pa yin// brkos pa'i nang du mkhas pa yis// slar yang sa de dgang bar bya// ji srid dong bu mnyam par dkang // de ni dkyil 'khor yang dag pa'o// nyung dang lhag/ 
191a3(mdo): par bsgrag sa pa byin// 'dir ni grub pa byed par bstan// 'khru ni sum bcu rtsa gnyis chad// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig dag gdab// yang na khro na bcu drug dang // yang na khwa ni brdo lnga bya// mnyam zhe
191a4(mdo): bzhi legs par bya// ba'i lci ba dag dang ni// sa dang bsres na te bsku bya ba// shin tu zhen par gdig pa dang // 'jam zhing mnye na par bya ba yin// de la dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa// sna tshog
191a5(mdo): 'tshon gyis kun tu dbyel// sgo bzhi rnam par 'bas pa dang rta babs bzhi dang ldan par bya// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi snying po// ni// rnam par phye ste gru bzhi tshad// khru gsum yang na khru bzhin
191a6(mdo): thig skud 'tshod kyis rnam par dbyel// nang gi thig gi tshad dag tu// mdung rtse gsum pa dag dang ni// nor bu rin chen sna tshogs bya// bar gi thig gi tshad dag tu// pad ma dang ni rdo rje dag/ kun tu bri bar bya ba yAM
191a7(mdo): phyi'i tshig gi tshad dag tu// rdo rje rnam pa'i stegs bu dang // rin chen sna tshogs gzhal byed khang // stegs bu dag kyang bri bar bya// pad ma'i dbus su gzhal myed 'ang// gzhal yas khang gnas par bya// dkyil 'chi
191a8(mdo): dbus kyi na pa la// rnam par sngang mdzad thub pa bya// g.yon du 'od ni dpag byed pa// g.yas phyog su ni de bzhin gshegs// shag kya'i rgyal po dag dang ni// don yod rgyal po 'jig rten ki// dbang phyug mgon la 'do sa
191b1(mdo): btud de thal mo sbyar ba ni// phyag bzhi par ni bya ba yin// phyag gnyis kyis ni sna tshogs pa'i// me tog rnams ni 'chang ba dang // rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bya// 'od dpag byed pa'i bdun du ni// 'gro ba'i rgyas/ 
191b2(mdo): po phyag bzhi pa// btud de thal mo sbyar ba dang // lha rdzas me tog sna tshogs dag/ lag pa gnyis na thogs pa dang // sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan par bya// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor legs brgyan pa// sna chog
191b3(mdo): dar gyis mdzes par bya// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya che// pad mo'i rgyan dang rnam brgyan pa// 'bar ba'i nang na yod par bya// gra bzhi dag ni byas nas ni// gnyis kyi bar gyi cha bzhi ste// dbus kyi gnas su
191b4(mdo): 'jigs byed pa// shar gyi gnas su gnas pa ni// lha mo sgra la ma rnam par brgyan// g.yon gyi gnas su gnas pa ni// gosadar mo ni rnam par brgyan// nub kyi gnas na gnas pa ni// lham
191b5(mdo): kar mo rnam par brgyan// byang gi gnas na gnas pa ni// lha mo pad ma mdzes dga' brgyan// dkyil 'khor phyi rim grwa rnams rgyal chen bzhi ni gzhag par bya// bar ga~M gnas su gzhag po ni
191b6(mdo): ral pa gcig mo gtum mo shar// nub du pho nya bzhin sbyar ma// g.yas phyogs su ni bzhin sbyar ma// rdo rje lcags sgrog bya ba yin// byang du srin mo 'khro gnyer gdong // kun kyang me dbus 'jigs pa myed/ 
191b7(mdo): dkyil 'khor dbus su bkod pa bzhin// phyi rol thig la pad mo 'breng // rdo rje rtse gsum zhags pa ni// kun tu 'bar ba 'phreng ba bcas// phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu ni// bri bya rtags dang phyag rgya dang // lha ni
191b8(mdo): dbang phyug dbang phyug che// tshangs pa khyab 'jug gshin rje dang // chu sta dbang po lus ngan po// dbang bsgyur dgal ldan gnas dag gi// lha nas 'og myin ga nas b+hir// lha rnams bri bar bya ba yin// 
193a1(mdo): sum bcu rtsa gsum su rnams dang / tags min mu ma tshogs dang / kun kyang pad ma'i bdam la gnas// de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo dang / rdo rje rtse lnga rdo rje dang / zhags pa/ 
193a2(mdo): dang di dgra sta dang / legs mthong 'khor lo de bzhin no// mdud rtse gsum dang brdzis// ngos la dbyug 'gro ba dang // rdo rje dkyil 'khor pad ma'i 'breng// 'khor lo'i rlung dang 'ga'
193a3(mdo): ta dang / ral gri dang ni tom rab// bum pa grang ba dag nang ni// myi snga ba'i 'bag sha dang // pad ma dang ni ud pa la// rgyal mtshan gdugs dang nor bu dang / dbyus pa dang ni rdo rje dang
193a4(mdo): grwa bzhir rdo rje mtshan ma yin// nor bu rdo rje dag dang ni// phyag rgya bzhi dang dga' ba 'khyil// bya ma gsum dang ku do 'di dang // ril ba bying ga ri dong ngo // ri dgas e ne pags
193a5(mdo): pa la// mchod phyir thogs pa'i snam bu dang // steng du rgyu skar bcas pa'i// zla ba nyi ma de bzhin no// kun tu/ ra 'bar ba'i nang 'dug bya// so sor cha ni dbye bar bya// 
193a6(mdo): mkhas pas rang gi skor bri bA// 'bying bag mthor na 'jigs su rung // lag na rdo rje 'jigs pa myed// rdo rje 'chang ba 'bar ba'i nang // ki li ki li gtam pa che// lho phyogs kyi ni
193a7(mdo): sgo ru gzhag/ nub pu dzo dze bi drAg la// mthong na 'jigs su rung ba'i// byang du nges par gnon modzes bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu ni// pang mo'i 'ther rang ud pa la 'gre
193a8(mdo): grwa dag dang ni gla rnams su// klu'i rgyal po bzhi rnams bri// blo srung ba dag thi ba ni// nor bu bzang dang gang pa bzang // myos kyi sku dang lngas chen yin// sgo'i gnas gi bar dag tu// 
193b1(mdo): chu bo bzhi ni bri byam// kar ka dang ni sin ta dang / bka shu dang ni sin du yin// 'phreng ba'i nang rol thog tag tu// dpal gyi lha mo bson te// dpe' myed ma dang mo'i lha'o// lo tog sman gi
193b2(mdo): lha mo dang // sgra dbyangs ma dang 'jigs ldan ma// de bzhin me'i lgang pa dang // 'phrog ma dang ni dung can ma// gtum mo dang ni me tog so// de dag bri bya ba yin// khrus byas 'di mkhan
193b3(mdo): rtsar ma yis// phar mo'i snod du tshon rnams ni// lhags sbyin pas kun tu bri// zas ni kar gsum grub par bya// khyad par 'dod pas zas dran pa// snyed par bya ba 'ang nya dang sha// tsong dang
193b4(mdo): srog skye ke'u rnams// 'arjes pa sapa par bya ba ni// yo 'dzin grags tshol snang phyir ro// khrus byas gos ni mar pa bgos/ 6/ cha mas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil
193b5(mdo): 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs kyi// kun tu brgyan par bya ba ni/ ba da rnam pa sna tshogs dang // rnam pa sna tshogs mad dang de// lha rdzas dang ni byung ba dang // ma dan ya ni spang pa
193b6(mdo): mtshon srung sna lnga yi srang bu yis// kund tu yongs su bskor bar bya'o// zangs las byas pa'i pad ma'i tshad// sor ba'i 'dab ma kha phye ba mdzes pa gra bzhir gzugs par bya// snying po'i
193b7(mdo): dkyil 'khor gri rnams su// padam brgyad ni bzhag pa dag/ gsem las byas pa bzhi bzhag cing // de bzhin dungul las byas pa bzhi// kun tu bye ru'i 'am ba dang / chu tig 'brer pa
193b8(mdo): de bzhin no// kun tu gsor kyi mang bu dang // rin chen sna tshogs gzhag par bya// snying po'i dkyis kyi mig par bya// gser gyi snod de bzhis dag dang // dngus gi sdod ni pani bzhag go// 
194a1(mdo): dbus kyi bum pa gang sa bzhis// dadus dang gse dang 'angs las byas pa'i// me ton/ smras pa mgo gas kyis smras pa gzhag par bya'o// gnang ni zhum pa bzhi bzhan pal/ 
194a2(mdo): a mu tika dang / kye chu dang/ sang sa dag kA dang / mar gang dang / in mchi la dang / dngul dang / gsem dang / me tog gis snyam pa'i mgo sogs suzhug par bya'o// mchi dang / gtsum dang / ku kun das
194a3(mdo): lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas gser gyi snod bkang ba dang / drungul gyi sdong gi nang du gser gi me tog dang / dngul ki me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog mu tig gis brgyan cing / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs
194a4(mdo): kyis smras pa gzhag par bya'o// cod pan gyi brgyal maHna bzhi gzhag khar bya rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bzhi gzhag par bya// tshon sna tshogs can dang / dang dmar po spyad par bya'o// 
194a5(mdo): dngul gi yog por bzhi gzhag ste// bla rtsi dang / ga pur dang gur kum gis bdug khas khra drug par bya/ sa las byas kho'i bu ma pa kaser gis g.yogs pa'i nang du dri cha ba rnam sna tshogs
194a6(mdo): kyis bkang ste/ rin po che bdun dang ldan par bgyis la/ bkang ba la dang kyis bcings la/ rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i steng du/ zangs las byas pa'i me tog bzhag nas/ snying po
194a7(mdo): 'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gzhag par bya'o// de nas phyi rol da dkyi dkyil 'khor thog thag tu rdzi dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu la stsogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang
194a8(mdo): mchod yon gyi che ba shes rdul gi snod dang / zangs kyi snod bkang pa drug cu rtsa bzhi gzhag par bya'o// lugs kyi bum pa kang drug cu rtsa bzhi gzhag khar bya'o// me tog dang / mgo spogs
194b1(mdo): dang / pog phor bkar ba drug cu rtsa bzhi gzhag par bya ste/ bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdug par bya'o// sgo bzhir dri chab kyi bum pa dang gis brgya na cing spud pa gzhag par bya'o// sA ma'i
194b2(mdo): me tog gi gdu bu'i steng du mda' la ba dan btags pa drug cu rtsa bzhi gzhag te/ tshon sna tshogs kyis bkri' bar byas pa'i mda' dang / nor bu'i 'phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor
194b3(mdo): brgyad par bya'o// de nas phyi rol kyi dkyil 'khor thog thag tu/ sa dang bsres pa'i lji pas dkyil 'khor byas la dri chab gis bskus te/ tshor sna lnga'i med bus thig btab la/ sgo bzhir nan
194b4(mdo): bar bya ste/ seng ldeng ki phur bu'i sor bcu gnyis pa rlug cu rtsa bzhi ga dab po/ tsho lnga'i srad bus dkyil 'khor kan tu bskor bar bya'o// bum bu dang / bum pa dang / bya ma
194b5(mdo): bum drug cu zhi gtor ma sna tshogs kyis kar ba bzhag rgakham por zlum po drug cu rtsa bzhi gtor ma sna tshogs kyis pra kang ba gzhag go/ gtor ma sna tshogs pa drug cu rtsa bzhi
194b6(mdo): so sor bzhag go// snod tshon snga lnga pa drug cu pa bzhi kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang pa dang / bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs blugs pa dang / gtor ma dkar po rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag go// 
194b7(mdo): yo byad thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba/ ro rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag ko// 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs bkram mo// 'phreng ba brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig dkyil 'khor
194b8(mdo): tu sum par bya ste/ byang phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la drug cu po zhe snying po'i dkyil 'khor la sum bcu rtsa gnyis ka dgas so// me mar gi sdong bu bzhi bud par bya'o// gtor ma brgya drug cu/ 
195a1(mdo): rtsa bzhi dang / dkyil 'khor log zag tu mar me nus bya'o// chang dang sha dang breg cod dang / srog kyi dang / ki'u dang / cod sngon po dang / sa thug sangs pa'i gtor ma gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs
195a2(mdo): gzhag par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol kra bzhir don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo'i sA klag par bya'o// sgo re rer bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi rol tu phyind pa bklag par bya ste/ chos klag pa
195a3(mdo): legs par khrus byas ste/ lha rdzas kyi byakris te/ rdza ma la hri rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bskos po'i gos rnam pa sna tshogs bgos te/ chos kyi stan shi na tu brgyan pa lha rdzas kyi stan la 'dugs nas
195a4(mdo): tshig 'jam po 'jam pos tshig mnyen pos klog par bya'o// nub phyogs kyi cha la dkyil 'khor mthon po la bde ba can bkod pa bris pa/ 'od dpag myed dang 'phags pa sun
195a5(mdo): ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob pa'i gzugs bris pa'i ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon tu 'phyogs par gzhag par bya'o// shar phyogs cha la
195a6(mdo): dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mthon po byas la/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor la shas kyi thub pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i 'gro bo'i gzugs bris ras kyi sku
195a7(mdo): gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon tu 'phyogs par bzhag go// lho phyogs kyi cha la ri 'dra ba'i kanas mthon po byas la/ de bzhin bshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po dang / 'jam dpal dang
195a8(mdo): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa ras la bris pa dkyil 'khor la mngon par 'phyogs par gzhag go// byang gi phyogs cha la khro bo'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin
195b1(mdo): gshegs pa rnam par snga mdzad dang / byams pa dang / sa'i snying po bris pa'i ras kyi sku gzugs kyis dkyil 'khor la mngon du 'phyogs par gzhag go// stegs bu'i rnam pa mthon por byas pa thams
195b2(mdo): cad kyang legs par brgyan par bya'o// dar gyi 'jeng bas brgyan par bya'o// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang / bum pa gang ba bzhag pa dang / dris kyang dkyil 'khor bya ba dang / ro'i mchog rnam pa
195b3(mdo): tshogs bza' ba'i ngo bo rnam ya ru sha'i khabs kyi dbul ba dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ldan pa'i masod ba snyoms gzhag pa dang / tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / ru dus skra dang / g.yur dang
195b4(mdo): bla mi dang / kur kum dang bsres pa'i bdug pa ras kyi sku gzu dgas la 'bul lo// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas dus gsum du khrus byas zhing / gos lan gsum du brdzes te
195b5(mdo): dus gsum du bzlas brjod dang cho ga bya'o// ches brgyad nas 'tshams te/ tshes bco lnga tshang gi bar bud don yod/ pa'i zhags pa lan nyi shu ma cig bzlas brjod bya'o// 
195b6(mdo): khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa cig bzlas brjod bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu nyi shu rtsa cig dang / don yod pa'i rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par
195b7(mdo): 'phrul ba stan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa stong lnga brgyad/ bzlas mdzod bya ba dang / rnam par grol pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
195b8(mdo): zhags pa'i snying po stong cha brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// zla ba nyar thug gi bar du zas kar gsum bza' bar bya'o// tshes bco lnga'i nyin mtshan thog zag tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying
196a1(mdo): dpag tu myed par bzlas brjod bya'o// mtshan thog zag tu bzlas brjod byas kyang ral pa myed pa dang / lus snyoms pa dang bral bas bzlas brjod bya'o// byams pa dang / sta~M ngi dzI
196a2(mdo): lhag pa'i khasam pa mi sems su bya'o// bzlas brjod kyi chog yin nas/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'tshams bcad pa dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / bdag srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang / dkyil
196a3(mdo): bsnyam par byas nas/ de nas 'khor rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bya dam tshig la gzhug par bya'o// dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyis mazin nas mchod pa 'tsham mo// mchod thI
196a4(mdo): cho ga yin pa dang / de nas bzlas brjod patsham par bya ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khon spyan snga ma 'dus nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod byas la
196a5(mdo): khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro// bzla sa brjod lan nyi shu cha cig dang / dbang bskur ma thag tu ras kyi sku gzugs dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kun tu 'bar
196a6(mdo): di pa 'od zer sna tshogs 'byin cing / legs so zhes bya ba'i 'awa byin par 'gyur ro// rigs bsngags 'chang ba'i snying dga' zhing lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
196a7(mdo): kyi dbang phyug zhin du 'bar zhing 'od 'gro ba nyis stor bas lhag+sa pa'i 'od zer can/ don song ba'i zhags pa tshangs kyi'i cha byang 'chang ba/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi nang nas mngon tu shegs te/ 
196a8(mdo): phyogs bcu dkyil 'khor kun tu rnam par gzigs shing / rigs bsngags 'chang ba la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ste/ phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste// rigs bsngags 'chang ba'i spyi bo
196b1(mdo): la gzhag ste/ dkyil 'khor ki mchog shin tu brgyan cing / smras pa 'di ni shi nad tu bzang pa yin te/ legs so lams so 'di ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yon pa'i zhags pa'i rnam par
196b2(mdo): 'phrul pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis khyas byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
196b3(mdo): gsang ba/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / su ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am cing dpa/ lto 'phye che po dang / srin po rnams kyi dam tshig kyi dkyil 'khor bdud thams cad
196b4(mdo): 'pham par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor bkyegs dang // rnam par loga'arjen thams cad 'joms pa/ bud myed dang / skyes pa/ dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rje'u
196b5(mdo): rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / tha na byol po na skye gnas su gtogs pa'i bya yang rung ste/ sems canams cad 'khor ba'i chong rong las sgrol ba yin no// 'di na
196b6(mdo): sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / dmyal ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / nang dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / las yongs su tha da pa
196b7(mdo): byed cing/ 'jigs pa myed pa'i khyim du 'dug par byed pa yin no/ 'di ni rnam par thar par byed pa'i dkyil 'khos po snying po dang / gsang sngags su bcas pa rnam par grol ba
196b8(mdo): dkyis 'khor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems cad kyis phyag byas pa 'di ga 'chang ba de dang / des myir brjod pa dang / gang dran pa tshas la tshogs pa dang / 'a ba dang nyan pa dang / phying
197a1(mdo): 'dzind pa yang 'khor bI pa yos bcu ba zhal bar 'gyur ro// phyin gyi ldon pa nyid dus bucu bgrod nas/ bla na myed pa ya pa dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mi ldog pa thog par
197a2(mdo): a 'gyur ro// de gang zhe na/ gang zhig dkyil 'khor chen po 'di 'dra ba mchom du mthong ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i gzungs 'jigs rten las 'das pa'i gas ngag sngags kyi tshig pa bzlas brjod
197a3(mdo): klog pa dang / dran pa dang / 'chad pa dang lan 'ga' sbyang bas mthong ba dang / zar cig dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam gis mthong ba na/ nga dang mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa yin no zhes nga' spa'o// 
197a4(mdo): bdag ni sems can de la de bzhin gshegs pa yin par ya pa 'dzin te/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yin pas/ spyi 'o// ra bkur bar bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang bas zung
197a5(mdo): shig dang / mchog ji ltar 'dod pa dang / ji ltar yid la re ba dang / bsam pa de thams cad rjes su bzung zhing sman par mdzad do// de'i tshe rigs sngags 'chang bas yid
197a6(mdo): ji ltar bsam pa'i mchog sasan/ dem pan sbyin par mdzad cing / don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa rnam par grol ba'i dris myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin po ba par 'gyur ro// gzhan
197a7(mdo): yang gang ka'i klung gi bye ma dang / mnyam pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gis nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor de'i dam tshig tu zhugs
197a8(mdo): ba ni/ dam tshig shes pa'i rjes su zhugs pa yin te/ de dag thams cad yul rab tu gnas pa yin te/ 'od lta ste bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog par 'gyur gyi
197b1(mdo): phyir myi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ba yin/ lung bstan da pa dang / byin gis brlabs par 'gyur ba yin/ de ni mngal na gnas khar skye ba'i tha ma ste/ phyis mangs na gnas pa'i drims gos par myi
197b2(mdo): 'gyur ro// shi nas bde ba can gi 'jig rten gi khams u ma skye bar 'gyur ro// de pad ma'i nang nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs kun tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyuraro// 
197b3(mdo): don yod pa'i rgyal po yun gsum tshogs pa/ cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po chos kyi 'khor lo
197b4(mdo): skor ba/ dam tshig chen po 'di kha don du byed na/ phyogs pa cu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing na// byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs par mthong bar 'gyuraro// 
197b5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar len po zhes ba thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu skye ba blangs pa legs bar skyes la yin pas legs so legs so// phyir gyi
197b6(mdo): ldog par bla na mye ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'od zer 'bum
197b7(mdo): zag bye bas mdzes par gyurd cing / bson nams kyi brgyan pa'i phyag gser gi mdog can brkyang nas/ skye bor 'jog cing dbugs 'byin pa yang mdzad do// byang chub kyi snying po la zug gi bar du
197b8(mdo): chos kyi 'breb pa'i gtam mngon gsum tu sgrogs par mdzad do// za na dkyil 'khor chen po rol mo'i sgo rnga bo che dang / rnga bran dang / dung dang / dza dza dang / rol mo sma gang dag drag pa la sems can
198a1(mdo): gang dag gis sbe thos nas/ na pa'i bum ga mam du song 'di dag thams ca dbyin gyi log par 'gyur zhing / za byed las d+ma dgu pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// 
198a2(mdo): za na byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i bya'i na par smra zos bde dag thos cad kyang phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// de ltar rnam par 'phrul po 'tsho 'phrul ba yin no// rigs kyi bu bo 'am/ rigs kyi bu
198a3(mdo): mo 'am/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma 'am/ sems can gzhan gang yang dung ba/ dge sbyong dam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs
198a4(mdo): rigs dang / 'gro zhig glo rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gi cho ga 'di 'khor mang po'i nang du klog pa dang / sems can gang gis smre thos nas/ sma dbyangs de dang mying zos
198a5(mdo): ba rna ba'i bu gar song bar 'gyur da ba de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang / sdig pa myi bzang pa bzang pa las bral khar 'gyur ro/ sngon gi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa las rnam par grol b.ra'
198a6(mdo): 'gyur ro// phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyisas su rig par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi seMs gru bo yin no// rtag par 'phags pa spyan ras
198a7(mdo): gzigs dbang phyug grogs mdzad cing rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu dbugs 'byind pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// mthar byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du rtag tu rjes su bsrung bar
198a8(mdo): 'gyur ro// sems can gang zhig dkyil 'khor de'i sa phyogs su song ste/ sa gzhi snang tsam mthong ba de dag thams cad phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs shing / sgrib
198b1(mdo): thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// de'i sa'i rdul drung gis bdag te/ de lus la phog pa kang yin pa de yang / za na sems can dad pa ya bdud ste/ de dag thams cad phyir myi ldog pa'i gnas/ 
198b2(mdo): la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad las yongs su grol ba dang / 'bags la spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
198b3(mdo): dgongs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbugs phyung bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis bsrungs par 'gyur ro// bsod nams khyer po chen po yongs su gzung bar
198b4(mdo): 'gyur ro// dag pa'i wa ba chen po dang ldan 'ar 'gyur ro// de ltar na sla thos bcam dang / phying 'dzin pa tsam gis ladazas bu chen po thob par 'gyur ro// de nas rnam khar
198b5(mdo): grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gi spyod bsregs kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ sdig pa dang / sleb pa thams cad sreg cing / sdug bsnga la drag po las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba dang / nyon mong
198b6(mdo): pa drag po'i rgya mtsho la dang / 'khor ba las sgrol bar 'gyur ba/ phyir myi ldog pa'i gnas bla na myed par dbugs 'byind par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten
198b7(mdo): las 'das po'i sam bla na myed pa ston dpa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ston dpa/ spro'i stegs pa sbyin sregs byas pa tsam gyi mod la/ the tsom skyed par me lha dang / dbang po dang / khya
198b8(mdo): 'dug dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus nangan po dang / gzhon surna mas sbyin legs byas pa'i 'di tsam gyim yod la khams cad 'ong par 'gyur ro// 
199a1(mdo): the tsom myed par spu dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ljin dang / hUM 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / za dang / kyu bum thams cad
