216a7(mdo): chang sha dang / breg cong dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u dang 'dres par byas pa'i 'dres pa'i zas yongs su spang pa dang shin tu spags pa dang / de dag pa khyad par 'dod pas yongs su spang bar byas
216a8(mdo): na/ las 'dis ni mod la thams cad mngon du mamyong par 'gyur ro// dka' thub spyod pas pas brnyas sems myi bya/ myi gus pa myi bya ba ni/ lkog tu yang myi bya'o// rjes su
216b1(mdo): bstan pa de dag mchog yin no// sgrub par bya ba de dag ni 'jig rten dbang phyug/ 'akon pos bkal tsas pa yin no// rdul las me long chu zheng du sor bcu drug pa byas la
216b2(mdo): zangs las pad ma'i ba dan sdod du dang bcas par bya'o// me long gi gong du rdul lam gser las byas pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dpang phyag tshad sor bzhi pa ba dan pad mo
216b3(mdo): bzhi la mdung rtse gsum pa dang zhags pa dang / pad ma dang / nor bu rin po che thogs par bya ba ni/ 'jog spyod legs par byas/ 'jam po 'od phyinod pa tsam du spyang bar bya'o// de nas
216b4(mdo): rigs sngags 'chang bas/ me long gi gong ki 'jig rte/ nang dbang phyug gi sku la/ ra srel gzhag par bya'o// ga pur dang / bla cis skus la mchod par bya'o// me long
216b5(mdo): gi nye 'khor thog zag tu rdul gi me tog dang gser ni me tog rin po che sna tshogs kyis smras pa'i 'phreng pa gagus par bya'o// dbang bskur ba'i dar gdags
216b6(mdo): par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas me long de la/ nyi ma re zhing dus gsum du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste/ ji tsam brgya stong tsha
216b7(mdo): gi bar du bya'o// 'khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bsku bya'o// de nas me lob 'bar 'gyur ro// gtsog kho nar kha dog sna tshogs 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dbang
216b8(mdo): phyag gi sku gzugs de las lha rdzas kyi chu 'jas so// 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung ngo // de nas rig sngags 'chang ba'i lus 'bar zhing dga' 'gyur ro// don yod par dka' bar jim
217a1(mdo): myed pa zhes bya ma ngam mo pa'i rnags pa'i snyo po tog zhis mo 'grul thob par 'gyur ro// sus gan du nas kyang cing yongs su dan par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags
217a2(mdo): a/ 'chang bas/ 'jig rtend thams cad kyi mngon gsu ru yod zhigs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'grub pang bstan dpar bya dgos pas/ de nas rig sngags 'chang bams dang ba'i khro ba bsres pa'i
217a3(mdo): dkyil 'khor/ rgyar gru bzhi 'phang du khru do pa byas pas shi nang tu ma khregs pa shin dbu'ajam par bya'o// thig skud kyi rnam par bye ste/ mtshon ldarnam par dbye' zhing / so bzhi rnam par bye nas
217a4(mdo): dkyil 'khor gyi snying po rnam par phye ste/ pad ma 'dab ma pa/ rgya rtsa brgyad mtshon gyi gsal bar bris zhing / bar ma'i dkyis du ge sar dang ze ba bya'o// stegs bu mu bzhi la ring po che
217a5(mdo): sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang / stegs su gra bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi ko cha bkos pa/ 'atum pa 'jigs par byedabri bar bya'o// stegs bu li dbus kyi gnas par bar phul
217a6(mdo): dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshig rje dang / chu lha dang / gzho nu dang / lus ngan po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha dbang phyug dang / phyag na rdo rje
217a7(mdo): dang/ ral ba gcig ma dang / sgrol ma dang / kar mo dang / zo gnyer ma dang / rdo rje pho nya mo rnams tshon sna tshogs kyis bri zhing / rgyan thams cad kyis rgyan pa me tog sna tshogs thogs par bya'o// 
217a8(mdo): stegs bu'i phyi rol tu ma dung che gsum pa'i 'bed pa dang / rdo rje'i 'breng ba dang / pad ma'i 'theng ba kun tu bya'o// 'brang ba'i b.rang dbus dang / ma'i bar dbus dang / bla'i bar du
217b1(mdo): lha mo brgyad byas te/ 'jigs byed ma dang / dpe myed ma dang / ba san ti dang / dpal sma dbyangs dang / sa'i lha'i mo dang / dung can ma dang / pus ma ngan te rnams rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa// me tog sna/ 
217b2(mdo): tshogs dang / rin po che'i sdod thogs par bya'o// phyi rol thog thag tu 'phreng ba'i bar bar du rdzi sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor bsku zhing / tsan dan dkar po dang / kur gum gyis mchod pa sna tshogs bya'o// 
217b3(mdo): ga pur dang / hagyis mchod cing dkyil 'khor kun tu dar sna lnga'i rgyal mtshan dang / mda' dang rta babs kyis brgyan par bya'o// dngul go snod bzhi cung peng go bkang ste/ bzhag par bya'o// dngul
217b4(mdo): gyi sdod bzhi gtor ma dkar gsu gyis par bya'o// dngul gyi/ snod bzhir mchod yon gyi chu gzhag par bya'o// snod pa rgyang dri sna tshogs kyi gtor mas dkang bar bya'o// 'bras bu
217b5(mdo): rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o// kha zas bza' ba dang rtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o// pri sna tshogs dang / byun pas dngul gyi snod dkar ste bzhag par bya'o// 
217b6(mdo): 'phagasu pa yod na yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// / bam po bcu drug pa'o// de nas gsang sngags la 'jug pa rnams kyis dgos pa thams cad sas
217b7(mdo): 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ oM zhes bya ba don yod pa'i zhags pa'i pad ma cug tor gyi dkyil 'khom thams cad du gsangapa sngags yi ge gcig po 'jig rten 'gon po'i spyan sngar 'bum dran par byas na/ 
217b8(mdo): ma dang po sa gnas par 'gyur ro// sngon sdig pa bsags pa/ sems can dpyas pa myi bzad pa gang rtsos b.rung pa de dag thams cad ji ltar du bgyis phyag dang gtor po bzhin 'jig par 'gyur// 
218a1(mdo): dngos rgyal mams cad mal par 'gyur/ don thams cad kyi rjes su 'dus par 'gyur/ de bzhin ga shegs pams dang / kAng dkyis 'khon kyis gzhan dag kyang dkris pa
218a2(mdo): 'gyur la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad do// gsang sngags oM zhes bya ba ldan nas tshe 'phos pa ni/ 'jig rten gi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar
218a3(mdo): 'gyur ro// gsang sngags kyi oM kaM gcig pa 'o// mi 'bru yi ga gnyis pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas gnyis pa zan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha la las kyi smon sa su
218a4(mdo): 'dug par 'gyur te/ mchog yams cad rjes su sbyin pamangad sdig pa thams can rnam par dag par mdzad/ sngon nad kyang sos khar 'gyur/ nom gi de'ang phyug/ nor du bzang
218a5(mdo): bu dbang du 'gyur zhing nye bar gnas par 'gyur/ phy-i/ paka pa zhes kyang phyir zhing bar chad byed par gyi 'gyur/ tshe 'bonas nas dri rgyu 'dzid du skye bar 'gyur/ don yod pa'i
218a6(mdo): zhags pa'i dngas dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro// oM lad me/ gsang sngags ye shes shus bzlas brjod byas na/ so gsum pa la yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur/ pad ma yangs
218a7(mdo): pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang / kasang sngags gang yin pa thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhon nus cha byad can/ mdun na zhugs par
218a8(mdo): 'gyur zhing 'dod pa thams cad gi mchog rjes su sbyin par mdzad/ don yod pa'i zhags pa yi pad ma tsuka gtor gyi dkyil 'khor stond par mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gas
218b1(mdo): pa'i dkyis 'khor rnams stond par mdzad/ thams cad du dngos grub rjes su dran pa sbyin par mdzad do// au 'dam hri/ gsang sngags yi ge bzhi pa 'bum thag bzlas brjod byas na
218b2(mdo): sa bzhi pa sa 'jug par 'gyur/ 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa myi 'khrugs pa'i sku mdog kaser ga kha dog can mdun na bzhugs shing / dpung pa brgya nas phyag spyi bor 'jog par mdzad la/ 
218b3(mdo): rig sngags 'chang la logs so zhes bya ba rjes su sbyin par mdzad de/ reg sngags 'chang tshur shog/ khyod kyi sdog pa dang smi ba thams cad yongs su dag ste/ rang gi ngo bo thams cad shi na tu
218b4(mdo): ma myed par yongs su dag go// mya'i 'jig rten po 'di nas tshe 'phos nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'ong zhing tshe rabs dran par 'gyur phyir zhing rnams kyang mngal na gnas pas
218b5(mdo): gos par myi 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub 'gyur ro// au pad ma b+hu dze/ gsar sngags yi ge lnga pa'i 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ sa lnga pa la
218b6(mdo): gnas par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pado ma'i bla ma rab tu ston par mdzad/ slob pa thams cad yongs su thar da yar 'gyur/ rigs
218b7(mdo): sngams 'chang ba la legs po zhes bya ba 'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur te/ reg sa gus 'changs gas so legs so// / ljongs pamad rnams kyi phung po chen po smras te/ rig grags 'am na
218b8(mdo): dag pa'i ma chen po bskyed pas rig sngags 'chang khyod tshe rjes na/ de bzhin gshems pa bye ba khram khrig dgu bcul ma gnyis kyi drung du/ dge ma'i rtsa pa mtshungs par bskyed par
219a1(mdo): 'gyur zhing / nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur/ khyod kyimangon yod pa'i zhags la khang macug gtor gi snying po dang / gas pa'i'o dkyil 'khor dang / t+ya phyag rgya chen po ma par phye 'grub
219a2(mdo): cing/ rig sngags 'chang khyod sgrib pa dang / sdigs pa thams cad spangs kyis/ bya ba thams cad gis shig yid la bya ba'i sgrub pa thams cad ji snyam 'dod la de bzhin de dag thams cad gi nang du chus
219a3(mdo): par 'gyur ro// oM pad ma lo ka tai/ gsang sngags yi ge drug pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ sa drug pa'i 'thob ste/ 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang bar mdzad
219a4(mdo): bar 'gyur/ stor gsum go stong chen po'i 'jig rten / mas kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gzigs shing
219a5(mdo): mngon gsum du stong par mdzad/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dang / par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa ma gzigs pa'i rgyal
219a6(mdo): mtshan/ rig sngags 'chang de la yang dag par dbugs 'byinod par mdzad de/ rigs sngags 'chang nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nos byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshur shog/ 
219a7(mdo): las byas pa ni shin tu yongs su zad cing / khyod kyis sems can dmyal ba'i sgo rnams ni bcad / khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhir thams cad kyi sgo rnams bye/ khyod kyang bzhin gshes
219a8(mdo): pa thams cad kyi sa bon dang / rigs kyi spro ni khong du chud/ khyod kyis don yon pa'i zhags pa pa ma tsug tong gi snying po dang / gas pa'i dkyis 'khor ni grub/ khyod kyis thams cad du
219b1(mdo): gnas kyi sgo rnams ni phye bas/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las sgrub pa rnams/ ji ltar yid la byas pa bzhin las thams cad byos shog/ oM bad mjal U hrI/ yi ge bdun/ 
219b2(mdo): pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas ma zag tu ting nge 'dzind pad ma dri ma myed pa'i sgrib pa dang / bral ba dag pa zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur la/ ting nge 'dzin gang thob pas lus shin tu 'bar b.ra'
219b3(mdo): 'gyur zhing / 'od zer rin po che 'bar ba rnam pa sna tshogs su 'gyur// sa bdun pa la gnas par 'gyur/ lus ki sdang ba kang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
219b4(mdo): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi gnas/ rnams spa dpa byed cing / ka pa dang gang du 'od zer rin po che 'bar ba dernam pa sna tshogs dka' ba pa las/ me tog gi cher
219b5(mdo): sna tshogs pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur la/ de bzhin ga ne/ gas pa thams cad la mchod par 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par brdzog
219b6(mdo): ba'i sangs rgyas ni myi ba'i khad 'od zer 'bar ba'i gser gi mdog cad dpung pa brkyang ste/ phyag g.yas pas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bo la 'jog cing legs so zhes bya ba yang byinas
219b7(mdo): dbugs 'byin par mdzad de// rig sngags 'chang leg so legs so// 'don sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snying po gsang sngags bzlas brjod gi cho ga mchod pa'i cho
219b8(mdo): g.yin no// 'dzin 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go snying po gsang ba gces pa'i dkyil 'kho mngon yod pa'o zhags pa yad ma tsug tor gi snying po yang dag pa'o// 
220a1(mdo): rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / pad macu gtor na snying pa chog zhi ba po dang / dzan yod pa'i zhags pa'i rnam par sprul pa gru ba kris
220a2(mdo): rig sngags 'chang nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du so pa la/ sangs rgyas kyis mdzad pa kyis shig/ au a mo lha ma na par me/ gzungs sngags kyi snying po brgyad pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ 
220a3(mdo): yus shind du yong su dag cing dri ma myed par 'gyur/ bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gis nor burin po che chen po shel ltar phyir nad shi nad tu yongs su dag ste/ de ltar rig sngags 'chang gi lus
220a4(mdo): yongs su dag par 'gyur/ sa brgyad pa la gnas par 'as gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'pha dgas pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi lus
220a5(mdo): yongs su dag pa rang gi gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid ston cing rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na gnas la/ rigs sdugs 'cha yang dag par dbugs 'byind par mdzad de/ 
220a6(mdo): phyag g.yas pa 'go po'i spyi 'jog par mdzad/ legs so zhes bya ba yang sbyin par sa dadang / rig sags 'chang legs so sogs so// rig sngags 'chang khyod lhag pa'i 'amam pas
220a7(mdo): dam pa dka' ba la zhugs so// rig sngags 'chang sangs rgyas kyis zhing rnam par 'brel pa'i 'jig rten pa rnam par lta ba tshur shog/ der khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par
220a8(mdo): 'gyur ro// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma cug tor gi snying po dkyil 'khor gsang pa grubo gis/ 'jog rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i basmra ba dam pa bya ba zhes
220b1(mdo): cad kyis shig/ oM pad mo lo tsan hU ru hUM/ gzungs sngags kyi snying po dgu pa 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ sa dgu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
220b2(mdo): dbang phyug gi sras kyi gtso bor 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu pa dgu dag rigs sngags 'cha bo la// mngon gsum
220b3(mdo): du ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs ston par mdzad/ rigs sngags 'chad kyi spyi bor thams cad kyi phyag 'jog par mdzad/ legs so zhes byas la yang spyan
220b4(mdo): par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang chen po legs so// legs so// khyod kyi dril zhing spyad pa'i las legs pa sbubs par byas so// khyod kyi 'jig rten dang 'jog
220b5(mdo): rten las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du bsgrub pa chub/ ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga zhi ba / so smra ba dang / mdo sde lung dang bcas pa bslus pa 'jig
220b6(mdo): rten gi 'dren pas bstand pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad gru pa yin no// oM pad moSh+Ti sha bi ma le hUM phaT/ gsang sA gas kyi snying po yi ge bcu pa 'byam bzlas brjod byas na/ 
220b7(mdo): phyir myi ldog pa nyid du gyur nas/ sa brgyas gnas par 'gyur zhing / lha dang mya'o skye ku dka 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes brjod pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
220b8(mdo): chub sam+b+ha s+ye ldog par 'gyur/ don yod pa pad ma cug tog gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ bdag gis sngar stan pa thams cad la lhag par zhe nang pa/ ca ma chang sAr spyod pa// gos
221a1(mdo): cang ma bgos pa/ byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje skyes pa dang / bden pa smra ba/ bla ma la gus pa/ dkon mchog gsum la dad pa che ba che/ bla ma dang slob dpon la rtag tu mchod pa
221a2(mdo): byed pa 'di ni/ bzlas brjod gi cho ga yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na myed pa bstand to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
221a3(mdo): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bzhin rab tu 'dzum la/ rdo rje skor bzhin du mgo btud nas smras pa/ sems dpa' chen po gsang sngags kyi gzhi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i 'ad ma tsug tor
221a4(mdo): gi snying po gsang ba chen po rgyas pa 'doni shin datu rnyed par dka' ste/ gzung sngags kyi snying po re re po de dag ni/ bzlas brjod tsam gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa 'gyur na/ 
221a5(mdo): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang ches ral zhing dub parabazlas brjod bsgrub pa dang / cho ga rgyas par sgrub pa lta spos kyang ci dgos/ nyin zhag cig bsnyen gnas la gnas
221a6(mdo): sho/ zas bslangs pa dang / 'bras bu dang ldum bu dang / ba bza' ba zos nas/ rig sngags 'di bskyabs na/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i dngos grub ji lta bu zhing 'byung bar
221a7(mdo): gyur/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sme pa/ lag na rdo rje nyin zhag cig sbyang ba la gnas shi pe/ nyan zhag cig tsam bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gos 'bras bu 'grub par 'gyur gan
221a8(mdo): lakan rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge snyen ma 'am/ gzhan yang dge sbyong mgo bregs pa/ rigs kyis 'tsho ba bram/ 
221b1(mdo): ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ skyes pa 'am/ bud myed dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ rnge'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs gang la la skad cig zar cig/ yud tsam ma ma// dus tshigs cig gam
221b2(mdo): dus tshigs gnyis sam/ dus tshogs gsum yongs su rdzogs par gzhan myi smra khar// yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma ts+tshag tog snying po khro bo rigs kyi gsang sngags rim par bye ba/ gzungs sngags
221b3(mdo): chen po bcu po 'di lan cig dran nam/ klog gam/ myi bzu pa ba yang dran nam/ lag na rdo rje dus tshig gcig tu dran pa tsam gos kyis/ de'i mtshams myed pa byed pa// mnad myed par gzhol ba/ 
221b4(mdo): bskal par gnas pa yang de'i thams cad rnams/ 'gyur la/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa bsags pa rnams zad par 'gyur/ lus yongs su dag cing tri myed par 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang
221b5(mdo): sdog pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ tshe rje ba 'phos nas 'jig rte/ na gaM khams bde ba can tu pa da ma las dz+nyAs te skyes par 'gyur/ tsha rabs su cher bas sa dran par 'gyur// nams kyang ngan
221b6(mdo): 'gror 'gro ba par myi 'gyur/ skal pa bye pa 'bum phrag brgyad cung 'khor los sgyur ba mchog tu 'gyur/ bskal pa bye ba 'bum phrag brgya bcu da/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du bde ba myong bA1
221b7(mdo): bskal pa 'bum zag drug cu la gnyis kyu 'jig rten dgi khams mngon par dag pa dzad pa myong bar 'gyur bskal dpa'abum phrag bdun bcu la cha gnyis su/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig rten rnam lnga
221b8(mdo): gzigs pa skye bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag bcu gnyis su/ nor bu 'chang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ bskal pa khri zag brgya bcu
222a1(mdo): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas dri drug 'dzin du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa stong phrag dgu brgya rtsa dgur / 'on myin ki lha rnams gi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ bskal/ 
222a2(mdo): pa 'bum phrag brgya bcu dgo' ldan ke lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ bskal dpa 'bum du sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lce'i nang du brgya byi nyid byed par 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phag lnga bcu ma gnyis
222a3(mdo): su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su 'jug par 'gyur/ bskal pa stong pag nyi shur 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la spyod par 'gyur te/ nams kyang ma'i mangs du skye bar myi 'gyur zhing
222a4(mdo): kang dang kang du bskye bar 'gyur ba thams cad du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ thams cad du tshe rabs yang 'dran par 'gyur te// / lag na rdo rje de ltar rig sngags lan cig dran pa tsam
222a5(mdo): kis dge pa'i cha pa bsod nams kyi phus chen po dang ldan/ par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje gal te/ shige zhag cig ka ma lan cig sbyang ba gnas te/ bzlas brjod dang bcas pa byed na/ 
222a6(mdo): lag na rdo rje do ni tshe 'di nyid la myo'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo nyid na slob pa dang bral nas/ don yod pa chen po dri ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// don yod rnam par gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya/ 
222a7(mdo): ba'i ting nge 'dzind 'thob bo// pad ma tsug tor mthar phyid pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind thob po// don yod pa 'bar ba'i tsug tor gyi stong po gsang ba grub pa thob bo// / de bzhin
222a8(mdo): gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dge ba'i cha ba bskyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams gi phung po che po dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshe rjesan/ 
222b1(mdo): 'jig rte nang gi khams bde ba can du pad ma nga// rdzus te skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di do yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo// don yod pa pang matsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor cho mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang
222b2(mdo): phyag rgya dang bcas pa cho ga zhi ba mo mtha' dka rdzogs par kha ton du lobs par 'gyur zhing / don yod pa'i ro ge sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po par ma tsug tor kau
222b3(mdo): dkyil 'khor ga snying po sngags smrab pa'i cho ga ste/ sgrub pa'i cho ga gnyis pa'o// / de nas gnod gi skyon gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
222b4(mdo): gas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras// bcom ldan 'das don yod pa pad ma n+ya ka tor kyi dkyil 'kho mdon yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i bya ba'i cho ga dang
222b5(mdo): sgrub pa'i cho ga dang bcas pa bshad par gsol // btsom ldan 'das rig sngags kun gyi grub pa bsam pa yongs su/ rdzogs pa/ dngos grub paslabs pa'i cho ga de kho na bshad
222b6(mdo): du gsolang // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod sbyin ka sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// 
222b7(mdo): lag na rdo rje bya ba'i cho ga dang / smra ba pa'i cho ga bshad par byo 'is nyon cig/ lag na rdo rje gsang sngags rtsa ba yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma tsug tor go snying po gas pa pa 'di'i ro ge sngags 'chad
222b8(mdo): rigs kyis bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'a/ kau/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma lan cig tsam dran pa yid la byed pa yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid snying rje chen po dang / byas
223a1(mdo): pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i bsum pas/ sems can thams cad la dmyigs pa'i sems can gang yang dung / ngan song gsum du skye bar myi 'gyur te/ sems dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i
223a2(mdo): skye gnas sam/ yi dgas kyi yul rnams shi kanas de dag myed de/ de ltar sems can thams cad bsgrub pa dge ba'i cha ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lan gnyis brjod pa tsam gis nad thams
223a3(mdo): cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan gsum brjod pa tsam kis dug dang / 'brus bu dang / 'bras dang / ldog pa dang / ka shu dang / mdze dang / g.yan pa la stsogs pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// 
223a4(mdo): san bzhi brjod pacam kyis dbyig dug pa dang / byang thams kyi dang sel bar 'gyur ro// sems brjod pa tsam zhes 'tha' yin pa dang / chod pa dang / bkyed pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par/ 
223a5(mdo): 'gyur ro// / san drug brjod pa tsam gis 'jigs pa dang / gdon dang / rims thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// san bdun brjod pa tsam gis dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jin/ 
223a6(mdo): pa thams cad dang / sems can thams cad gi yis kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// las na rdo rje de lta ba san/ sems can thams cad kyi don du nyin re zhing gzhan gyi smra yar lan bdun dran pa
223a7(mdo): bya'o// sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar pa zhi ba dang / dge slong gangs la 'aslab pa'i sdom pa dang / tshul khrims kyi sdom yangal pa dang / mkhan lo dang / slob dpon la gus par ma byas pa/ 
223a8(mdo): bai de'i don bya/ byem pang ma blangs la/ lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas rgya khrod dam/ ro ba rtsegs pa'am/ mchad bder byem gtor bar bya'o// ka dang ga pad sems can gang dag gi dus / 
223b1(mdo): yod par bye ma gtor ma thab tu de dang der bye ma 'bab pa'i sems can de dag/ sems can dmyal ba'am/ yid dgas sam/ sha zar bskyes pa 'am/ gnod sbyin gi skye gnas su skyes ma
223b2(mdo): de de'i mod la che rjes nas thams cad mtho ris su gzhol ba 'gyur zhing / rnams kyang sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar myi 'gyur ro// ya pa dkro ka la bris nas/ mchod rtend kyi nang du bcug ni/ 
223b3(mdo): gnas der rkang gnyis pa'am/ rkang bzhi pa ka bdag nye bar 'ongs pa de dag thams cad bri ma phog pa tsam gos sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag cing / thams cad mtho'i ris su
223b4(mdo): gzhol bar 'gyur ro// tha na ri dgas dang / bya dang / lAdang sko skad dang / ni'u li dang / sdig pa dang / sprul dang / khyi da ru sbal dang / lag 'gro dang / dkyil 'khor de la grib ma
223b5(mdo): bab pa tsam gos thams cad kyi las kyi slob pa rnams rnam sa par dag par 'gyur zhing / de dag thams cad mtho' ris kyi/ 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// du la lan bdun
223b6(mdo): bzlas brjod byas nas/ ka nas mthon po bus na/ sems can gang dag du bde'i sgra thos pa skyes pa dang / bud mye de dang / khye 'u dang / bu mo dang / ri dgas dang / bya dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtog
223b7(mdo): ba de dag thams cad mtho' ris gse 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyur ro// gang dag tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / sems can gang dag spyon pa ya dga' ba dang / gang dag bsnyen gnas
223b8(mdo): la gnas pa dang / gang dag skyabs gsum 'acu po ba dang / gang des byang chub sems dpa'i thos pas bsdams pa de dag kyang rung kyi sgra thos nas/ sems ca yang ga thams cad kyi myi ldog par
224a1(mdo): 'gyur zhing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thol par 'gyur la/ tshe nges nas 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par yang
224a2(mdo): 'gyur ro// tsan dan la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas/ dge 'dun ni kun dga' ra ba 'am/ mchod rten gi 'khor sa 'am/ dge 'dun ga ne nga ma/ skye bo mang po'i nang ngam/ rgyal po'i po zab
224a3(mdo): tu bdugs na/ gang dag der bsnams pa'i sems can de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos gos la bdugs nas gang gi lus la gyon pa de'i sdig pa dang / 
224a4(mdo): sgrib pa thams cad rnam para'9par 'jog par 'gyur ro// lus la khab pa tsam gyis drin ma dang / ser sna dang skyon tham das cad spangs par 'gyur ro// gos bcangs pa tsam rgya
224a5(mdo): 'jig rtend thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// bdag nyid kyis gos de 'dugs nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du zhugs ma/ rgyal po la btsun mo'i 'khor du zhugs na// rgyal lo// 
224a6(mdo): 'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur/ mchod nas chen por 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar yang 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi nang bya zhugs na/ dge' slong / 
224a7(mdo): thams cad kyi mchod nas chen po 'os par 'gyur ro// skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na/ nor chen po 'phel bar 'gyur zhi de/ mchod pa chen po'i 'os su 'gyur ro// ri'i rtse mo nyi ma
224a8(mdo): 'char ba'i khar 'dus nas gsang sngags za pa lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ mod la nyi ma 'bab par 'gyur zhing / 'dod pa mchog kun rjes su sbyin par byed do// ku gul dang 'asres nas lha/ 
224b1(mdo): mo'i 'dun du bdug par bya zhin/ gsang sngags dam pa lan bdun bya ba byas na/ mod nyid la lha chen po 'bab par 'gyur zhi pa/ rig pa sngags 'chang gi mdun du 'dugs nas/ bsam thams cad yongs su/ 
224b2(mdo): skor bar byed do// bo la dang / tsan dan dang / gu kul bsres nas/ sred myed kyi bu'i mdun du 'dug par bya zhing / kasang sngags mkhas lan nyi shu ma gcig lus kyi yan lag ngag la khyab pa byas ma
224b3(mdo): sred myed kyi bu rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing / 'dod pa mchog kun rjes su sbyin pa byed la/ dngos po sna tshogs kyi sbyin par byed do// yungs kar dang / bsres nas tshangs pa la bdug cing
224b4(mdo): gsang sngags pa ba lan bcu bzhi bya ba pa byas na/ tshangs par dang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'du ga la/ mchog thams cad sI/ na par byed do// pad ma'i phye ma dang / sres nas nag po chen po
224b5(mdo): dad mo'i tshog la bdugs na nag po chen po dang / ma mo'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyi sa mdA na 'dug cing / mchog dang bya ba bsgrub pa thams cad basbyin par byed do// 
224b6(mdo): nag bus pa dang / sbrul gyi shun pa dang / bsres pa'i bdug la klu'i mtshor bdug cing / gas pa sngags rtsa ba lan bdun sungs kar la bzlas brjod byas nas/ klu'i mtshor gtor na/ don yod
224b7(mdo): pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mdo lan cig brjod cing / dran par byas na/ klu dang klu mo dang / klu'i bya bo dang / klu'i mo thams cad gnas kun nas byung ba nas/ rig sngags 'char kyi rkang pa gnyis la 'dud
224b8(mdo): cing / kapa bsgo ba de dag thams cad byed la 'dod pa thams cad sbyin zhing dbang po 'gyur ro// lan gsum sbyar many+dzu'i rgyal po brgya mtsho la ya ba 'ong ngo // klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga'
225a1(mdo): yang 'ong zhing / thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed la/ dbang du gyu rang nas 'dug go// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dkrug par 'dod pas dur khrod kyi nang du myi ro bsregs pa'i sol bas 'dugs la/ 
225a2(mdo): gsang sngags ma pa mthon pos lan bdun brjod cing dranas gnod sbyin dang / srin po dag rgyu gcing 'od la/ rigs sngags 'chang kyi rkang pa gnyis la btud nas/ rje btsun bka' stsol cig ces zer ba dang / 
225a3(mdo): de bsgo ba ji lta ba bzhin byas na/ bsgo ba thams cad byed la/ mngag pa'i las byed par 'gyur zhing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dug go// bod pa sbyar ba la yan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas bdug pas
225a4(mdo): btugs na/ 'byung po thams cad kun nas 'ong zhing thams cad dbang du gyur la/ las byed par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin mo dbab par 'dod pas/ btsag gos gnod sbyin mo bris la
225a5(mdo): ba lwang gi lci ba'i dkyil 'khor bya sa? phyes pad ma'i ri mo/ bri zhing / phye'i gtor ma pad ma lta bur byas pa bzhag la/ bdug pa 'dis gdug cing / gsang sngags ba brgyar
225a6(mdo): brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ sungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod bya sa nas/ gnod sbyin mo la brdeg par byas na/ gnod sbyin mo rang gi ka zugs kyis mudAn na 'dag cing lha'i 'jig rten kyi bar du 'grol
225a7(mdo): slar yang 'ong ste/ don gas pa thams cad bsgo ba tsam gos byed par 'gyur ro// yang na ma 'am/ chung ma 'am/ sri ma yin no// zhes smrasmra/ bar bya ste/ gal te mar byas mabu la sdug pas long spyod
225a8(mdo): dang / gzhal myed khang thams cad kyi nang du 'jugs rgyal po'i bu bzhin du yongs su skyong bar byed do// gal te srin mor byas na rnam thos la 'jam dpar 'gyur ro// gal te chung mar byas na sum bcu
225b1(mdo): raH gsum gi bdag po ltar dka' ba'i long spyod la rtser 'jug par byed do// lha mo dpal 'dukA nags pa sngags 'aca pa lan bdun bzlas brjod byas zhing / lha mo dpal gi 'go' la byugs ma/ lha mo chen po/ 
225b2(mdo): dpal rang ga gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing / nor gi phung po chen po 'bul par byed de/ de nam 'tsho'i bar du khyim na 'dug cor/ nor chen po nyid 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rnam thos kyi bu la 'dugs na/ kas
225b3(mdo): srang stong pa sbyin par byed do// nor bu bzang po'i bu la bdugs na kaser gyi dong rtse stong sbyin par byed do// tshal gseb du bdugs na/ tshal na gnas pa'i lha gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing / rdzas dang
225b4(mdo): sman da thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug go// do raM rnams la bdugs na/ tra dang shing gel pa dang / sman dang / rdzas thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer bzhi'i sgo
225b5(mdo): rnams su bdugs na/ grong khyer kun yangs kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / nad thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar/ 
225b6(mdo): 'gyur ro// 'brog pu bdugs na kun ma dang / g.yon can dang / gnod byed dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / sbrul dang / dred dang / ros gi 'jig pa thams cad 'byung bar myi 'gyur zhing / ri dgas gtum po
225b7(mdo): 'dogs pa thams cad 'byung bar 'amyi 'gyur ro// rims thams cad la bdugs na/ rims thams cad las tha rad par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad 'gegs pa/ tsan dan gyi bdug pa bsgrub
225b8(mdo): ba'i cho ga ste gsum pa'o// // de nas thig le yang dag par bshad par bya ste/ rigs sngags kyi rgyal po'i sngags/ bsgrub po ni nya ma'i gzil brjid dang / mtshungs shing skar ma'i rnam pa ltar 'bar
226a1(mdo): pa yang te/ gzi' brjod gi brgyal po de gnyis kyis 'bar pa 'gyur ba ni/ bsod nams kyi phu ba po rnam par 'phel lo// lha rnams kyi nang na lha'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug/ 
226a2(mdo): adang / dbang phyug chen po dang / bcas pas rtag tu mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur gis/ reg sngags 'chang gA the tsom myi bya'o// dpral po'i ste du thi ge le byed/ pa ni rtag tu mdzes pa yin te/ nyi ma ltar 'od
226a3(mdo): zer gyi sdeb stong gis gsal zhing shel ltar dka la/ mdog kar sham tri zhim pa dang / glang po che'i bya la dang / dpral ba dang / ba glang gi gnas ltar skyon myed cing mnyam par mthun la/ shi nad du dul ba
226a4(mdo): ded dpon gcig pu'i nor bur gyur pa cing / gas pa sngags 'du dam bzlas pas legs pa bsgrub cing / gser dang gos lta kun tu' 'bar ba ni thethig so yin no// sbyin mtshas
226a5(mdo): kyi bar 'phrul pa na/ shi ne tu pra pa rtag tu rtag par mdzes pa ni/ zla ba nyal mkha' la 'gro' ba lta bu yin la/ skye bo'ingabus na gsal ba ni/ rgyu skad kyi rgyal po zla ba dbus na
226a6(mdo): gnas bzhin rang gi 'khor gi dbus na lha rnams kyi rgyal po brgya byin lta bu yin la/ skye ba'i dbus na ni 'jig rten dag rgyal po gdugs gcig pa lha 'bar po yin/ 'jig rten pa'i nang na gdugs cig
226a7(mdo): bde bar gshegs pa lta ra gi nang du dul po yan la/ shag kya rigs kyi rgyud ltar sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pa de bzhin du/ nor bu mchog rnam par dag pa ni sems can thams cad la
226a8(mdo): phan par 'dod pa yin no// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ pi ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug cig pu ltar mchog dang / rab mchog sems can thams cad kyis don tu smyon par byed de/ de ltar zag/ 
226b1(mdo): le nor bu'i mthu' ni/ 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par byed do// lA dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / bcas pa' dbang du 'gyur/ sum brgya ra gsum gi bdag po dbang po dbang du 'gyur bar rjes su
226b2(mdo): 'gro ba dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldi pa dang / myi 'am ji dang / lto 'phye chen po 'dod par gyurang pa/ thams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur ba ni/ mkha' la skar ma ltar dpral bar rtag tu dbang du
226b3(mdo): 'gyur ba yin te/ seman thams cad kyi mgo bos rkang pa'i drung du rtag tu btud la/ mes kyi tshig/ chu yis myi khyer cing / lus la dug dang / sbyar po'i dug dang / bye mo'i dug dang / byang myi bzad pa dang / 
226b4(mdo): ngan sngags dang / sdang ba'i rnam pas myi tshugs par 'gyur te/ nor bu ltar bu'i mthus de dag kyis myi tshugs par 'gyur ro// / rims dang / sdug bsngal pa dang / nad dang / chung dang / 
226b5(mdo): glad nad chen po la thig le byas pa lta bur mod la de dag thams ram/ rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ sems can btson du bzung ba 'am/ chad pas bcad pa 'am/ bcing bar 'os pa la thig le lta bu
226b6(mdo): byas pas de dag thams nad las tha rad par 'gyur/ sprin 'tshams bral bar thig le byas na// de'i mod la gnod sbyin stong dang / srin po drag po'i gzugs can gdon stong rnams lus la 'jugs par
226b7(mdo): phyi 'gyur zhing / glang po che dang / ri dgas kyi bdag po'i khyung dang / chom rkun dang / nod dkyi lam dang / ri'i lam dang / ri'i sul dang / dam srog dang / klog dang / glang ba dang / sbrul dang / sAng
226b8(mdo): 'dugs kyi 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// thig le lta bu'i mthus dgra'i sde stong snyed kyi napar/ 'gyed pa smras myur ba pa nyid du rgyal bar 'gyur/ g.yul dang / zab mo dang / 
227b1(mdo): myi bzang dang / sdig pa las ni kun tu spyad// sngon ga yas ni myi bzad pa// de kun skad cig tsam gyis 'jig/ ri'am sum khrus tsam gyis ni// 'bras dang shu 'ang 'gyur rnams dang / 
227b2(mdo): lhog pa dang ni rke bcu dang // mtshan mar rdol dang me dpal dang // khyi jo mdze dang rkang pa'i nad// myi bzad de rnams kun dang ni// gang dag nor brgyas sdang pas zin// byag pa tsam gis yod la na
227b3(mdo): thams cad dug myed zhi bar 'gyur// ri lu thams cad las byed pa// lha rdzas shi ba sos par 'gyur// ri lu dag ni 'chang byed cing // thig le dag ni byas 'ab yis// thams cad kyis mchod
227b4(mdo): pa 'thob// thams cad du na nor dag 'dra// dpal 'dod pa dpal thob cing // 'bru 'dod 'bru'i phung po 'phel// lha rnams dag ni dga' 'gyur zhing // klu rnams dag ni dag
227b5(mdo): dang bcas// gnod sbyin srin po rdza za dang // lA myed mkha/ ldi myi 'am mi// lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad dga' dang bcas// rtag tu phyag rgya
227b6(mdo): gnas 'gyur zhing // thams cad dbang du bya rang nas 'khod// 'khor kun bran byed ji bya zer// gang zhig ri lu de dag stond// ri su dag la rtag byedas// de bzhin gshegs kun dgongs
227b7(mdo): pa mdzad// 'phags dang spyan ras gzigs dbang // de nyid rig sa rtag tu ni// mchod sbyin dus kun gzigs pa mdzad// bsod nams phung po stong dag ni// nyi ma re re stsogs par byed/ 
227b8(mdo): 'jig rten pa'i bde spyod pa cing // 'jig rten pha rol shi nang tu bdal// che che bani 'phos nas su// bdal ba can du mod la 'gro// gang dang gang du skye ba ni// tshe rabs rtag tu tshe rabs tran
228a1(mdo): lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin che// gnod sbyin bye bas yongs bskor cing // g.yel ba myed par nyin mtshan du// dus kun tu ni bsrung ba dang // skyob dang basbed dang bsrung bar byed// gang zhig bu ni// 
228a2(mdo): a myed pa dang // bu myed bu ni 'dod pa la// ri lu gcig cig sbyar nas su// mnyam par bzhag pas gas dang sngags ni// mkhas pas zla ba yang ga ngos// 'bum ni chan bzlas nas su// zla ba
228a3(mdo): nya ste bco' ldi sa// skyes pa bud myed khrus byas zhing // yan lag yan lag zhig le bya// kun mchog gsum ni legs mchod cing // bram ze dag kyang mchod ston sbyin// bsrung ba'i cho ga bA su// 
228a4(mdo): gtor ma kar gsum mang po bsham// bdag nyi rgyan gyis pa rgyan nas su// gos chang rnams ni bgo bar bya// bya/ mas pa'i sems la yang dag gnas// sa sems cad stug
228a5(mdo): par byed// bsam drag cing des pa dang // bla ma rtag tu gus par bya// me tog sna tshogs rab bkram zhing // dang byug pa sna tshogs dang // tu rus cad danasas kyi
228a6(mdo): lha'i 'dug pas 'dug byas zhing // bu ram mo 'dun dang de// mo su lags bsgyur ba pal bar bya// gsang ba 'di 'thungs mod la ni// btung dag kha zas bza' bar bya// 'gon pa spyan+d+ha ras
228a7(mdo): gamigs kyi dbang/ mchog sbyin ma dzad pam rjog 'bya// byams ya da gnags d+ha du/ mtshan mo nyas dang nang pa na// mthong bas tshag na ga' par 'gyur// 'a
228a8(mdo): ras gzigs bas/ mchog sbyin dang gzugs ston da mdad cing // ga nyid das basbyin 'ams ngas// bungad byed des bu byed cingag// gzugs pa 'ang mchog tus hA// stobs ldan
228b1(mdo): gzugs ni phun sum 'tshogs// lha'i dpal ni rjes su 'gro// chos ldan mkhas shing gsal ba dang // tshe ripa dbang phyug tshad myed 'gyur// dpa' bo dgra las rgyas pa dang / 
228b2(mdo): sdang ba thams cad 'joms par 'gyur// // yang na dran pa'i blo bskyed pa 'dod pas/ thos pa la rten nas 'dug cing/ rigs sngags 'chang chang ma des zhag bdun du nyi rezhipa/ mar dang
228b3(mdo): 'o ma bskol ba der ri lu bdun bdun bcug ste/ zan ma zos pa'i ljon rol tu lan nyi shu pha cig bzlas brjod byas nas/ 'jam tsam pa 'thungs pa/ phyi ma kha zas bza' bar bya/ zhag bdun kas
228b4(mdo): zos po'i rgya mtsho'i chen po bstsags par 'gyur te/ sta na chos thams cad dang / chos lugs dang / 'dul ba dang / snyan dgas dang / brda sprod pa dang / mdo sde dang / dbyangs kyis bcang
228b5(mdo): pa'o sde dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang / gleng bzhi'o sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes/ pa rabs kyi sde dang / chos mngon pa dang / chos dang / cho ga
228b6(mdo): zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya thams cad dang / theg pa chen po thams cad kha tod du lobs par 'gyur ro// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig du sbyar ba byas na/ stobs chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs/ 
228b7(mdo): kyis/ pha rol gnonang par 'gyur te/ glang po che lo'i stobs su 'gyur ro// zla bcig tsam sbyar pa byas na/ lo lnga brgya 'tsho zhing gnyer mo dang / swA kar spangs la sgra lung lo 'khrim zhing 'khyim
228b8(mdo): bar 'gyur bar dang / lus kyi mdog dag shas lta bur 'gyur ro// mo gcig tu sbyar na/ lha'i sngon bcud kyis len mchog la 'jug cing / nam mkha'i steng na lha rnams dang / rgyan cig mthun pa gyul/ 
229a1(mdo): brgya nyid dang / sa ldan cig 'amad par 'gyur/ sngarnams kyim jogs dang / sa'i gnas byed 'ang nang dga' bar byengs dzin pocan lnga 'dud gi gnas gyis pang gzhanasanas dang
229a2(mdo): par 'gyur ro// nyi ma lta bur 'od gtong zhing rgyu la gnas pa bzang po rnams kyis 'gro bar byed do// gzi'i brjod 'bar ba shind tu gsal ba myi bzod pa cing rnam pa dag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la
229a3(mdo): the tsom myi bya'o// las thams cad bsgrub pa'i thig le dang / ril lu bsgrub pa'i cho ga ste bzhi bya'o// // de nas myi snang bar bya ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i sman gi mchog don yod pa'i mthus grub/ 
229a4(mdo): par bshad par bya ste/ rigs sngag 'chang rnams kyi grub pa mtsho kra de kho na nyid yin no// sran dngul chu dang / za 'i kI dang / su ban ci gar dang / shel brdzobs pa dang / kuka kr-i dang / 
229a5(mdo): su kan b+hi dang / ki kuSh+Ta skyon myed pa dang / ud pa la bzar/ po dang / pad maka kra dang / ku gul dang / phe lu pha tra dang / sur ku ma dang / na ga pus pa la dang bcas pa dang / spang sa / 
229a6(mdo): shi yi sha'i me tog dang / tsan dan bkar po dang bcas pas bsre sa nas zhi ba du btags pa'i phye ma la/ don yod pa'i pad ma ka tsug tor gau ke sang po'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal po'i sngags kyis
229a7(mdo): nad tu bton par lan brkyang babargya bzlas brjod byas na/ khro bo'i/ gsang sngags na rgyad bstong bzlas brjod byas pas lan nyi shu cha cig tu bang bskur la/ e e gcig ma lan 'bum bzlas
229a8(mdo): brjod bya/ de'i ma gzungs sngags brgyal po so sor lan nyi shu pa me bzlas 'dzod bya ste/ gsang sngags thams cad rdzogs par bzlas 'arjod byas nas// sman ngom yod pa'i rgya che ba gsal
229b1(mdo): ba zhes bya ba sman gyi mchog/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags spyad ras gzigs dbang byaka gi zhabs drung du bzha// grib a la bskams par bya'o// yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gtsug tor gis lan
229b2(mdo): brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas nas/ snod kyi nang du bcug la/ nam dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe'i thams cad bsgrub pa'i dgos pa thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang chang mar gyu rad pas/ 
229b3(mdo): sus legs par khrus byas la/ spos chus byugs te gos cang ma bgo bar bya/ swan ki mchog 'di yungs mar gi s+ye basprul la/ dki lus la byAg pa ra bya ste/ lan cig bskus pa tsam gi so myaM
229b4(mdo): snang bar 'gyur/ kanas par bya ba'i bya ba'i sgo bcad pa tham/ mas cad mthong bar 'gyur/ gnas thams cad du ji lta ba la dod pa bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur ro// don thams cad byed
229b5(mdo): bar 'byung/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za la stsogs pa'i tso bo rgyal por 'gyur zhing / de dgathams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed la/ 
229b6(mdo): ngasro de 'tsho'i bar du nyer ba gnas nas/ las su bya ba'i dgos pa thams cad kyi rje su 'jug par 'gyur ro// klu'i gnas kyi sgo bcad pa thams cad na 'dug pa/ klu 'khor dang bcas pa zos/ 
229b7(mdo): cang mdun du 'khod nas/ bya ba thams cad ya rtsi bgyi ba zhes bya ba byed par 'gyur zhing / sas su bya ba dang / dges pa thams cad byed par 'gyur// ji srod 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'kho cing / nyan maH/ 
229b8(mdo): su gnas la/ de nas klu thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// sran la yid ta dzi tra dang / ba'i yo dang sbya pas mgo kun byugs na/ ji sum yings byam pa dang / rang gi blos 'dod pa 'i
230a1(mdo): sna tshogs stond par byed/ gnas su gtogs pa thams cad ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin stond par byed/ gnas su rtogs pa thams cad 'khor gi nang na ji ltar rnam par basprul pa'i gzung// 
230a2(mdo): sna tshogs ston par byed/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'phel ba rnams ston par byed/ ji srid 'cho'i bar du 'phel pa rnams stond par byed cing bya ba thams cad byed do// spos kyi til mar dang / sprul
230a3(mdo): nas byin pa dang rkang pa la bskus na/ nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur zhing / nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur la gar du 'dod par der 'gro bar 'gyur// chu'i steng du 'gro zhing / nams kyang phyi sa
230a4(mdo): la rkang pa 'jog par myi 'gyur/ lag pa g.yas pa la bskus nra/ kang dang kang la re ka pra de 'ong bar 'gyur la// sus kyang mthod par myi 'gyur/ bud myed gzhon nu'i 'o ma dang / bsres
230a5(mdo): nas myig la bskus nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ mthong bar myi 'gyur zhing / don 'dod pa gang yin pa byed do// don gyi rdzas gang yin pa blangs kyang myi mthong ngo // 
230a6(mdo): bud myed gang dang 'thad na sus kyang byi mthong la/ ri mde'aH'bar du 'dug/ kyang sus kyang kyi shes so// khar byugs nas gang dang gad tho gar byed pa dang / gzhang rkang byed pa nyid kyi nang/ 
230a7(mdo): du zhugs pa byas pa thams cad byed la/ lus ni sus kyang myi mthong ngo // bum pa la byugs nas chus bkang na/ chu'i rgyun snang la bum pa de ni myi mngon no// gzhong la chus bkang ba de'i
230a8(mdo): dbus su byugs na/ rgya dga'abar rdzas/ gnod pa don gyi snang / bdag nyid la byugs nas/ bus brgyas bkang pa las na thogs na/ bus pa las ma byung ba ni snang ya/ phyi de'i lus ni kyi lda
230b1(mdo): myig la bskus nas/ skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na/ myi mthong bar 'gyur la ro'i sgra ni thos zhing rab gyi lus ni myi mngod mo// gnas su gtogs pa de thams cad du zhugs na/ rang gi lus khrus
230b2(mdo): ma byas kyi bar du myi mngon do// su yang sa rung ba'i myigs bskus na/ de dag thams cad myi mthong bar 'gyur zhing / gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der myi snang bar 'gyur la// khrus byas pa tsam gas
230b3(mdo): phyir snang bar 'gyur ro// lus kun bskus nas/ mdzod chen po'i nang du zhugs na/ myi mthong bar 'gyur la/ gser dang / dngul dang / pra myen dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / byi ru dang / dung dang // 
230b4(mdo): man shel dang / rdo rje dang / bye du d+ya dang / mar kad dang / mazon ka dang / gos dang / spyad pa dang / rgyan dang / lAb lhub gang yung du ngal nyid 'dod na/ thams cad blangs nas song
230b5(mdo): na/ sus kyang myi mthong la/ kar dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyu ra ro// ji srid du khrus ma byas pa bde srid du rang myi mthong la khrus byas na thams cad du mthong ngo // rigs sngags
230b6(mdo): 'chang bud myed kyi nang du 'jug par 'dod pas/ yang mas zhus bya'o// de'i 'og bya ba'i gcin gyi khrus bya'o// yang gur kum gyi chus zhus bya'o// de'i 'og ngu ba'i rnam lngas zhus bya'o// 
230b7(mdo): de'i 'og du smos gtol mar dang lhan cig du bsres pa des lu bskur bar bya'o// de'i 'og du bud myed gzhon nu'i zho dang sbyar bas myig bskus na/ de nas ri lu gsum dpung pa g.yas pa la
230b8(mdo): gdags par bya'o// de nas gos chang ma bgos nas/ gsapa sngags brjod cing dran par byas la/ rgyal po'i pho brang bu zhugs na/ myi mthong bar 'gyur te/ lus sus kyang myi mthong ngo // 
231a1(mdo): nyis ga gsam/ rta gnyis / nyis bdun dam/ nyis rtul / ma su nus byam sa/ bud kyi dag na pa de che zhi dka' bar byed sa yongs su spyod
231a2(mdo): byed kyang / sus kyang myi shes la/ 'jug cing phyir 'gro lan/ sus kyang brags myi rnye nga/ ngo mo du khrums byas kyi bAr bya/ rang gyi lus kyi snang bar 'gyur ngo ro// phug pu 'byug na lus kun sos
231a3(mdo): gtol mar gis byugs/ phug du zhugs na/ phum gi sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur gis/ gnas de'i nang du zhugs la/ ji ltar ji ltar las su bya ba de ltar de ltar gyis shi ga chu'i nang du zhugs na
231a4(mdo): ji ltar khyim gas nang na 'dug pa bzhin chus myi rlan la rgyas gos par yang myi 'gyur ro// mye'i nang du zhugs na/ me'i lus la myi reg cing / tsan dan ltar bsil bar 'gyur ro// 
231a5(mdo): klu'i gnas mtshor zhugs na/ gnas na 'khod pa rnams rgya sa de myi mthong kis/ ji ltar rang gi yo de la los su bya bar// 'dod pa'i las kyi rnams pa gzhan dag kyang gyis shog// 
231a6(mdo): myi snang bar bya bar ri lu bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// bam po yu luma'o// 'phags pa don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhi ma'i rgyal po// // phyag rgya gsum ni rnam sprul pa// phyag
231a7(mdo): rgya de dag yang dag stan/ bzang po gtso bo chen po ste// mchog dang rab mchog nyid yin no// phyag rgya gya nom bla na myed// 'jig rten 'dren pas bstand pa yin// snying po de nyid gyur pa ste/ 
231a8(mdo): phyag rgya dkyis chen yang dag bsgrubs// sangs rgyas/ byang chub phyag rgya 'di// des gsum rtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs// kun gyis 'odon byin gyis brlabs// phyag rgya dus gsum gshegs
231b1(mdo): pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pas phyag rgyar btab// de bzhin sangs rgyas chen po la// zab pa snang ba da kyis kyang btag// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dkyis kyi// gsang nyid kun tu zhus
231b2(mdo): pa yin// de nas gsang sngags gsang ba nyid// dngos rgya ba bla myed bshad par bya// oM a mo b+ha hr-i da ya/ pad ma u khing / sad+ha ya/ g+hang sa ma g+ha la/ ma hA pad me swa hA/ bskul pa dang / sman
231b3(mdo): drang pa dang / gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so// oM pad ma u Shi a mo g+ha/ man da la hUM/ dkyil 'khor upa pa dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / ni chab dang / chu dang yungs kar
231b4(mdo): bsres pa la/ lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bya'o// oM pa ma ni khe ts+tsha/ spyi phug btsong bang yin te/ lan pa/ dun bzlas 'dzod byas pas so// au pad ma u sh-i 9/ a ma
231b5(mdo): gA dza le hUM/ khrus bya ba'i sngags so// yungs kar dang / tshul lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so// / ba me ye shud b+he hUM/ nye reg bya ba'i sngags so// oM sa chad yang ba
231b6(mdo): me hUM/ gos bgo pa'i sngags so// oM mo la mo li shud d+he hUM/ lus yongs su sngags te/ ba'i rnam lnga'i chu la sanaHbdun bzlas brjod byas so// au pad ma uSh+NI a mo g+ha a bi shi ne tsa
231b7(mdo): ad ma shud de hUM/ dbang skur ba'isate/ dri che ba lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas so// au pad ma ka ba tse/ ri rdzA bA da hUM dza la sa hA/ ko cha'i sngags te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod
231b8(mdo): byas pas so// / oM badz+ra a tiSha na pad me hUM/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags so// / oM ngas pad me d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM/ sa'i sngags so// oM ba dam a shra ya/ ru ha tsa la tsa la hUM/ bdan gi sngag so/ 
232a1(mdo): au dbye bya bad me hUM/ me tog gi sngags so// au pad ma a mo g+ha sa ma pA ra ni sa hA/ 'dug spos ka3/ 6/ au pad ma gan b+ha mi she re/ byAg spos kau sngags so// au bad ma pra ki me Ne/ d+ha ra/ 
232a2(mdo): nas me swa hA// 'bras yos dang / me tog bkram pa'i mags so// oM bar mjal su gan b+ha pa ti hUM/ mchod yon dbul ba'i sngags so// au shug la ba me sa ya shud d+hastAM/ lha bshos ka
232a3(mdo): sngags so// oM su ru su ru/ kum bA b+his sA// gtor ma'i sngags so// oM pad ma a shr-i na sa 'di ni hUM/ gtor ma thar gzhug pa'i sngags so// oM pa la 'i shud d+hapra pa ra hU~M/ 'bras bu'i sak+sha/ 
232a4(mdo): so// au pra ra pu Sh+TeSh+Ta pai sA hA/ 'phreng ba'i sngags so// AM dzi la dze la ya ra sa ras/ kr-i ni hAM/ gtor ma bcos pa'isngags so// au pad ma 'di pa ya/ dza la hUM/ mar me'i
232a5(mdo): sngags so// au sa ma pa da ma b+ha ba ne shu sa ra hUM/ 'jug/ pa'i sngags so// au pad ma uSh+Ti sha/ a mo ga mu ni hUM/ phyag bya ba'i sngags so// au tsaka kra ma naT le/ sa man ta pad
232a6(mdo): sa man ta pad me hUM/ bskor ba'i sngags so// o sa man br-i ki ren pad mesas pa ra hUM/ me tog gtor ba'i sngags so// oM pad ma sa ma sa mya shISha/ ma ta a mo gA sa ma ya hUM/ dam tshig gi sngags
232a7(mdo): sa man ta/ sa d+ha ra ran/ baT me hUM phaT/ dkyil mo t+yang gi sngags so// u pa myi ta/ dza la bad me hUM/ bgrang 'bred kyi sngags so// og ta sa ha ha dza yi ta pad me/ b+ha b+hahUM// bzlas/ 
232a8(mdo): brjod ka sngags so// A sa man ta b+ha bi sha na pad me hAM/ byi lam gyi sngags so// o sa man ta/ raka kA ra na pad me hUM/ bsrung ba'i sngags so// oM sa man ta me r+tha pri/ !sI re hAM/ ra ba'i sngagaso// 
232b1(mdo): oM sa man ta/ dza la ma sa kA d+h+we/ dza lA dzA sa mata'ad m+be dzA le hUM// me'i sngags so// au du ru du ru/ pra sa ra/ b+h+ya sa ri man tre swa pA/ bsreg blugs kyi sngags so// oM sa man ta/ a ba lo ka tai mu h+ye/ 
232b2(mdo): ba yu rape padam be ki na~M sa hA// nam mkhalas 'gro ba'i sngags so// au shU b+ha stA ra ni/ padas pU dze hUM/ mtshon cha'i sngags so// oM sa man ta/ a kar sha ni/ pra sa ra k+Sha d+he hUM/ drab 'a'i sngags ma
232b3(mdo): na mo tri b+hu ba na/ i shA ra ya/ lo ke sha ra/ ma he sha ra/ b+ha ra d+ha ra/ a man ta/ a ba lo ta gu he a gad cha b+ha ka ban/ d+hi bi d+hi raM/ ma pha bi ya ma ni ka na ka/ badz+ra bi'i du t+ya/ ma ra ka ta/ 
232b4(mdo): pad ma ma ra ga/ id tra ni la/ ma a muka ti ka/ bi byA shi ta/ sha ri re/ ma ha pa daM ma pU dza/ a mo g+ha ba sha d+ha ra/ sa man ta/ a ba lo ko te/ ba ra da/ ba ra da ya ka/ dz+wa la dza ya/ sa man ta
232b5(mdo): a ba lo ka ta/ a kad dza a ga da dza/ b+ha ga bAng+ga/ shri g+ha sa ma ya ma/ na swa/ ra pi bi b+ha bi Sha d+ha ra/ ya ma ba ru NA/ ku be ra na ma s+thi pha/ a sha ra/ ma he' sha ra/ pad me shwa ra/ a he b+ha bA
232b6(mdo): b+han/ shri grA ma gad tsha/ sarba byid d+ha man d+ha la/ sa ma ya ma nu sA ra/ da ri sha na/ sa ru pan bi bi d+ha ta dza da ra/ sa man ta ra sI/ dza la gar ba sha ri ra/ ma ha ka ru ni ke/ spyom mya mu kha/ pa ri pU ra Na
232b7(mdo): tsan rba man Na la/ na ba tsan rA dza ta d+ha ra/ a me ta b+ha/ sa kya ta d+ha ra/ ma ha pra ma be sha pA ra/ tri lo tsa na/ a kyA/ ba ra d+ha/ g+hu ru pu ru/ ma ha ka ru rdzi ka/ bad ma ya sha a pa so ki ta/ shud d+ha sa !
232b8(mdo): ba ra b+ha ya ka na mo stu te sa hA// / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gshegs su gsol pa'i sngags so// rigs 'dri ku ku la nag po la lan se dud brgya cha brgyad bzlas brjod
233a1(mdo): byas nas/ 'phags pa spyad ras gzigs dbang phyug la bdas bya'o// bdugs pa tsam gyi mod nyid la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis ston par mdzad cing
233a2(mdo): mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// gal te mtshams myed pa lnga byed pa mnar myed pa gzhol bar des kyang bdug pa tsam gri nges par stonod par mdzad na// dge slong tshangs par spyod pa bsam pa dag

233a7(mdo): bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed pa thams cad du dngos pa smrab chen po sgrub par byed do// tshogs kyi dang byug la 'dug na/ dbyigs dang log 'dren thams cad bcangs par 'gyur ro// 'dad 'ang
233a8(mdo): dang byams 'dun pa gang 'a dang / bdud dang / bar cad byed pa gzhan gang yin pa mams cad banings pa 'gyur dang / kyi ldang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i sgong 'dug na/ rgyam thong

233b4(mdo): pa 'am ma zin pa la bdug na mod la 'ong ngo // rur khrod kyi/ myo ro la ba dugA na/ ro langs ldang par 'gyur ro// zod pa/ del bdugs na/ 'bapa cing kar byed/ klu len rgyug par byed

233b7(mdo): 'gro bar byed do// ral gri la bdugs na 'bab par byed la/ rang nyid 'gro bar byed do// du pal bdugs nas bus nas/ skra ga pu du grags par de dag thams cad 'thab pa dang / 'thab
233b8(mdo): mo dang / thod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'gro ba yin dang / 'khrug pa la dang / nad thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / sdog pa dang / gdug pa
234a1(mdo): thams cad dang / dgral thams cad las zabab pa 'gyur zhing/ rims thams cad la bdugs na/ rims thams cad 'ang zhi bar 'gyur ro// rims nyin bzhi la pa la bdugs/ 
234a2(mdo): cing gsang sngags kyi rje su dran na// rims nyid bzhi bku mo 'don cing bros par 'gyur ro// ku'i 'tshor bdug na mod nyid sa char gyi rgyun chen po 'bebs par byed do// chang ches na gnas

234a4(mdo): ki khang du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// ri mthon po'i rtse mor bdug na/ phyogs bzhi la thams cad kyi rol kyi dmag tshogs dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dam
234a5(mdo): thams cad dpag tshad stong gi bar du rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / bcings 'dapa 'gyuras/ dpag da glang gi mang du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro//

234a8(mdo): ko sa la bdugs na/ gos 'pho' bar 'gyur ro// me tog dang 'bras la btug so nas gang la byon pa de dag nyid dam/ nor go sgo nas dbang du 'gyur ro// 'phreng ba la 'dugs la gsang sngags lan bdun
234b1(mdo): bzlas brjod byas na// gang gi 'gol bcings pa de 'bab par byed cings du byung mtshan byung ba dang byung bar smra'o// 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang la bdug sa na/ rigs sngags chen po'i dngos po skyab thob par 'gyur ni/ 
234b2(mdo): las byed par 'gyur la/ nga sras 'cha' bar du nye bar 'dug ka// sbyar ba ma la bdugs na sbyar ba ma thams cad dang mkha/ 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ston par mdzad la/ dgos pa thams cad smra ba
234b3(mdo): bar mang // gnod skyon mo'i gzugs thim pas 'dug pa la gas sngags lan bdun dran por byas la/ gnod sbyin po 'ongs nas 'dod pa thams cad skyon zhing / la mi byed par 'gyur la/ ji ma de'i
234b4(mdo): li 'bar du nye bar 'dug go// sbyor ba mo la bdug na sbyoramo thams cad dpa 'kha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du gyurang nas/ 'ji srid 'tsho'o bar du nye ba pa 'dug go// 'dod dbur sbyar ba'i
234b5(mdo): gzugs la brlags na/ 'dod sbyar ba'i gzugs can mo'o sa nas chung mar bya'o zhes smras nas/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar bya yo byad dang / long spyod bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed la/ 'dod
234b6(mdo): pa'i yon tan lnga la bsepas dgal bar 'gyur ba dang / nam thob kyi bu la 'gran par 'gyur ro// dril bu la bdugs nas smra bkrol na/ 'jig pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur la/ 'amyang ba chen po byas
234b7(mdo): par 'gyur/ khyim ka nang du bkrol na/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yid dgas dang / brjed byed dang / ki bi kanon thams cad byung nas/ phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur ro// ongam mos
234b8(mdo): ba sha pad ma/ uSh+NI Sha/ ta ra ta ra/ a ba ta ra tu/ b+ha ga ban/ ga tshan tu/ sa b+ha ba nan/ tu ru t+yaM/ ma ha pad ma b+hu dze sa hA/ s+phar ka shegs su gsol pa'i sngags te/ 'dug spos dang / ku gu la dang / chu dang / 
235a1(mdo): nyungs kar bsres pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ thams cad du slar gsheg su gsol pa'i sngags byas par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags rim par bye ba'i cho ga dang bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// 
235a2(mdo): a de nas lha mo chen mo smom ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa rje bo 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyun/ la ba der song ste/ byin nas/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ngas
235a3(mdo): gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la 'go bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lha'i mchod pa'i sprin chen pos ma chod de/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mgo' btud de/ thal mo sbyar nas// byang chub sems dpa'
235a4(mdo): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyus/ la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags da chen po 'jig rten du cher bstan lags so// gsang ba chen
235a5(mdo): po dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhi ba/ mo dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa/ pad ma gtsuka tor gi reg pA gas kyi rgyal po chen po'i snying po rike sngags 'chang thams can
235a6(mdo): kyi don dang / sems cad thams cad la phan pa dang / bdel bar bkyi sgo sring du 'dzam bu m+bing du bzhag lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyis kyang / don yod pa pad ma gtsug gtor gi rig sngam
235a7(mdo): kyi rgyal po de'i snying po dang / cho ga zhib mo don yod par sgrol par dri ma myed pa/ pad ma gtsug tor gizhags pa zhes bgyi pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po snying po bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang gang gis dran pa
235a8(mdo): tsam gis bdag bkug cing / kayang drangs par 'gyur/ rig snga gas 'chang ki rig sngags bsgrub cing / yongs su spyod pa la rim 'gro bgyid pa dang / rig sngags bsgrub pa'i dngos grub mchog sul
235b1(mdo): bar bgyi ba dang / bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du/ yongs su bkang bar bgyi 'di dag gi bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor ma po 'dus pa'i mngon gsum du/ rig sngags
235b2(mdo): kyi rgyal po bshad par bya'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shag kyang thub pas lha mo sgrol ma la 'di skad ces bka' su lad to// lha mo sgrol ma rang gi re ge sngags gi rgyal po de dam bzhin gshegs par
235b3(mdo): nga'i byin gyi rlabs kyis shod cig// // de nas lha mo chen mo sgrol ma/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar don yod pa sgrol ba dri ma myed ma pad ma cug tor bzhags pa zhes bya bar rig sngags kyi snying po
235b4(mdo): sbas pa/ na mo sde'i yo b+hika nan/ ta tha ga ta nan/ shaHdkya mdza.a bi ste na/ na ma skr-i tA nan/ na mo rad nga tra yA yA/ nam u bya ba morga te sha ra A/ g+hon+ti sa tu ya/ mahA sa ta ya/ 
235b5(mdo): mahA ka ru ni ka ya/ na mo ta rA ye/ ma hA dwe bye/ auHrAHta ra Ni ta re 'das bi b+hu Shi ta b+hir/ ma ne kA na ko bo cing tIH/ ma le/ dza ham kuT ma na pIH par me mU du pU ru/ padam
235b6(mdo): pa sha b+hu dza/ a mo bA gA nA ha ste/ ta ra ya/ ba ga bA ti/ ma ha sid b+hi ba med/ tu du tu ru/ ma hA tA rA ni/ ba ra de/ sa p+ta ya say+Ya/ i b+hes mo k+ta/ ba re de swa hA// / au a mo g+ha pad me
235b7(mdo): na tra re sa~M hA/ snying po'o// gro la ni tA re hU~M// nyon snying po'o// bcom ldan 'das 'ang mi bdag gi gsang sngags nor bu blo che lo snying po'o// don mong ba yi nags pa'i pangs
235b8(mdo): gtsug gtor gi rog sngags kyi snying po'i zhags pa cho ga zhib mo// rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad la mchog stsal pa rab tu stsal
236a1(mdo): par bgyi ba'i slad du rjes su bsu lad pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i yo byad dang cho ga bshad par bgyi ste// du ru ska dang / gu gul dang / sA
236a2(mdo): ka gcig tu bams la gsang sngags pa snying po 'dis lan brgyal rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la bdugs na/ bdug pa tsam gi mad la/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
236a3(mdo): bkug pa dang / g.yang drangs par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das rig bsngags 'di smrab pa'i tshe/ rang kyi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing / bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du
236a4(mdo): dngos grub rjes su ba lad par bgyid/ bgegs dang / ka 'dren thams cad bzlog par bgyi/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha ba thams can bzlog par ba h+yaM/ 
236a5(mdo): 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / cod pa dang / 'byed pa thams rtsa/ da rab tu zhi bar bgyi/ bsam pa thams cad yod bzhin du rdzogs par bkyi/ mchog gsal bar gyi// bde
236a6(mdo): legs dang / bde bas bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das mchis nyal pa na/ bdug spos kyi rgyal po 'ongs bdag la 'dugs shing / bdag gi snyos
236a7(mdo): po nor bu rin po che chen po'i snying po gsum po de dag lan nyi shu pha cig brjod na bdugs pa tsam gi mod dang / dran pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rang gi gzugs yongs su dag
236a8(mdo): pa bstand cing / mngon gsum du mchis par bgyi ba/ mchog thams cad rjes su gsal bar bgyi/ 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba'i bka' mchid babya'o// dran pa tsam gis mod dang / 
236b1(mdo): don yod pa pad ma gtsug gtor gi zhags pa'i snying po 'di rjen pa tsas kI bcom ldan 'das bdag rig sngags 'chang ngo'i mdun na mchis shing / bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 6/ 
236b2(mdo): sdar ba dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / bgyegs dang log 'dres thams cad so sor bzlog par bkyi// dngos grub chen po bsgrub pa rjes su gsal bar bgyi// bkra shA kya sgra thams cad 'byung bar bgyi'o// 
236b3(mdo): rig sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad rjes su gasngal par 'gyi/ cho ga zhim mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par bya ba li dngos chub thams cad rjes su su la yang 'gyi/ bsod nams drang / 
236b4(mdo): pa'i dngos khyab thams cad rjes su chal bar bgyi/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad po sor bzlog par bgyi/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par
236b5(mdo): bgyi/ rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ rtag tu rgyun mya chad par rig sngags 'chang gi dgegs dang log 'dren thams cad so sor bzlog par 'gyi/ nad thams cad
236b6(mdo): bsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'jig sngags 'chang 'grus pa'i tshe// rnam par shes pa tha ma la bab pa de/ bcom ldan 'das gis rtag tu mngon gsum du bstan cing / mdun
236b7(mdo): na nye bar mchis par 'byo// sangs rgyas yongs bgyid par sha nad tu dran pas dus las 'ad bar bgyis pa dang / ji ltar sprul 'gas pa 'dzes pa bzhin du lus rjes nas 'jig rten ni khams
236b8(mdo): bde ba can gi skal pa dang mnyam par pad ma dag la brngas te skye la/ brgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa dang / tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs
237a1(mdo): su bzung zhing byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ lus rdor rjer 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams du chud par 'gyur// sa bcu la la gnas par 'gyur/ phyir myi ldog pa'is la gnas
237a2(mdo): par yang 'gyur/ de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad kyis lung bstand par yang 'gyur/ dge ba'i cha pa thams cad bskyed par yang 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon gsum du stond par 'gyur
237a3(mdo): bson nams kyi tshogs thams cad bstsogs par 'gyur/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / bdugs pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams bcad kyi dge ba'i che ba
237a4(mdo): 'idam chog dang gtogs pa dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor che dan po'o dam tshig byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug pa'i bar du'atshal bar 'gyur lags so// deg nas bcom ldan
237a5(mdo): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas/ lha mo spros ma la legs so zhes bya bar byin te/ lha mo chen mo legs so// legs so// rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po 'di
237a6(mdo): khyod kyi ba sha ma legs so// cho ga zhib mo 'di rdzogs par bya ba dang / rig sngags 'chang de yang yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir dang / dngos mu pa rab tu sbyin
237a7(mdo): phyir khyod kyi sa yongs su bskyang bar bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin gi sde dpon chen ldag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha
237a8(mdo): rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / tshogs kyi bdag po nag po chen po dang rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor ko lha bum dang / nor bu' bzang po'i bye dang / rnga len dpa/ gar 'khan mchog dang
237b1(mdo): stobs can dang / stobs po chen dang / ldang sngon dang / dung can dang / de bzhin du 'jigs byed dang / dbyangs ldan ma dang / dpe' myed ma dang / lha mo chen mo dpal dang / rald pa gcig ma dang / me tog/ 
237b2(mdo): tshems de thams cad 'dus nas/ mthun par stan dang las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
237b3(mdo): su thal mo spya te bas btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dis skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang phyi ma'i tshe rig sngags 'chang dang / rig sngags smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am
237b4(mdo): rigs gi bu mo 'am dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge snyen nam/ dge la bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan yang skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang zhig don
237b5(mdo): yod pa'i zhags pa gtsug gtor 'di bsgrub par bgyid dam klog parabagyi dngam/ 'don tam/ zan mying tsam yanga'anang par bgyid na bcom ldan 'das de la bdag cag
237b6(mdo): kun 'dus nas/ 'thun par rta/ rjes su 'brang zhing / bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar gyi gzi brjid gzhug par bgyi// dngos grub chen po'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ 
237b7(mdo): bsam pa thams cad kyi mchog yongs su rdzogs par bgyi// nyes par bgyis pa thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi/ sdig pa dang smib pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bgyi/ byang chub kyi mthang
237b8(mdo): zug gi bar du rjesu 'brang bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du thogs po dag legs so legs so// khyed kyis bya ba de ltar yin te rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po 'di nges gdams
238a1(mdo): shing yongs su gtad to zhes bka' stsa lad to// don yod pa'i zhags pa pad ma cug tor rdo rje chen po'i snying po'i gas ba rdzogs s+ho// // rnam par thar pa chen po dkyil la
238a2(mdo): 'khor gyi snying gsang ba bstand pa klags pas grub pa cho ga zhib mo rgyas pa mchog tu bzang ba mtha' dag rdzogs pa yong su rdzogs s+ho// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
238a3(mdo): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dang phyug/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ myig myi 'dzum par bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bstan bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
238a4(mdo): gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das 'don bdag la pad ma s+yang sa pa'i dkyil 'khor pad ma rigs kyi snying por gyur da pa gsang de kho na nyid bstand pa mchis te// rnam par tha rad pa'i dkyil
238a5(mdo): 'khor gi gsad pa don yod pa'i zhags pa snying po 'khro ba/ 'i rgyal po rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po/ bcom ldan 'ang sa kyi spyan sngar ngo bo tha dad pa/ phyag rgya tha dad pa dang / gsang
238a6(mdo): sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gzugs bri ba yongs su spags par bgyi/ sems can thams cad rjes su bzung ba'i slad du rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi de kho nar myur pa 'ad legs te/ rim
238a7(mdo): sngags thams cad kyi gnas/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor pad ma yangs pa 'i dam tshig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga rjes su yu lad par bgyin/ bcom ldan 'das de bdag la snang bar
238a8(mdo): mdzad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig byin gyi brlabs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / pad ma'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / spyi'o das/ 
238b1(mdo): tshig 'grub par 'gyur/ spyi'i byid kyi chabs dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i dkyis 'khor dang / gzugs zi dang / phyag rgya rim lam bye ba sa rjes su 'dug par 'gyur// cho ga zhi ba mo sgrub pa thams cad/ 
238b2(mdo): kyi dngos grub de kho na nyid du 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dam tshig gi byon gyi rlabs kyi de kho na nyid du 'gyur
238b3(mdo): lags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kyang thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzo gas dpa
238b4(mdo): phyug la 'di skad ces bka' saHsad to// snying rje chen po// dang ldan pa don yod pa'i dam tshig rnam par tha da pa chen po da dal 'khod par 'phrul pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
238b5(mdo): thams cad kyi dam tshi ga dkyil 'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba cho ga zhib mo de'i dus sa dbab par shes na nod/ cig/ ras byin gyis brlabs shing/ rjes su ya~M rang la
238b6(mdo): phyag rgya chen pos btab nas/ byin gyis brlabs so// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa gang ko'i kle bye ma khra ka khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu ha dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs
238b7(mdo): kyis byin gyis rlabs so// sems can gyi don du de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bla na myed pa phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig chen por byin gyis brlabs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
238b8(mdo): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhin 'dzum zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang pa/ rnam par tha rang pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul pa bkod pa don / 
239a1(mdo): pa mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa tu byas nas/ ting nge 'dzi du stong gsus kyi grong chen po'i 'dzig rten gyi / sangs rgyas kyi ni mams cad 'od cir gis snang bar byas/ kwa'i gdam
239a2(mdo): a can snang bar byas// klu'i gnas thams cad lnga ma byas// gnod dru nga min po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ 'byung po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ lA ma yin dang / nam mkhal sdong dang / rgya
239a3(mdo): 'am ci dang / ltol 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ so'i 'og tu gtogs pa 'og na gnas pa thams cad snang bar byas/ bar snang ga gnas nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha rnams sdang bar
239a4(mdo): byas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten dkyi/ snas kun nas g.yo ba chen por 'gyur la dang / g.yol ba 'im zhus des de dag thams cad bskul par 'gyur ro// bskus
239a5(mdo): btsam gyi mdo nyid yod dag thams cad lhags te/ ri gru dzi mad 'khor mang po 'dus nas spags nas 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phag pa sman
239a6(mdo): ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor mang po 'dus par mkhyen nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha byad du zhugs shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus nas/ 'od lung de bzhin gshegs pa'i gas
239a7(mdo): ba thams cad du rigs/ spyil po tshig gi tshul du zhugs la yang za'i tho tsugs kyis 'argyan pa/ rgyal po 'od dpag byed zor rgyags su thogs pa/ tshangs pa'i gzugs can phyag bcol brgyad la
239a8(mdo): rang gi ngo bo zhags pa thogs pa/ thal mo sbyar ba sku phyed na phyag g.yon pa brtan pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa bsdus pa/ rol bla blugs dang bgrang 'breng bsdams pa/ pad ma bsnams pa
239b1(mdo): pad ma'i phyag rgya snams pa/ yid bzhin gi nor bu dang / rgyal mtshan bsnams pa me tog gi pur ma dang / bi dze pU ra ka bsdus pa/ dbugs 'byin pa 'dzad pa/ rin po che'i char 'bebs par

239b3(mdo): gzugs zhi ba spyan gsum pa/ mchod phyir thogs pa/ bdad pa da ma/ sku 'od zer sna tshogs 'tshogs 'bar ba/ sgrol ma bdun rjes su 'brang ba/ pha rol tu phyi rked pa bcus bskor ba brgya byin dang
239b4(mdo): tshangs pa dang / ka shin rje dang / chu lha dang / sus ngan pos skong ba/ dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang lha'i bu dang / med myed kyi bu dang / dbang chen dang / rgya mtsho'i
239b5(mdo): dga' bo dang / nye 'daga' bo 'khor dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das shig kyang thub pa'i spyan sngar 'khod nas// myig myi 'dzums shing bzhin 'dzum pas me tog sna tshogs pa rnams
239b6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la gtor te/ 'di lta ste me tog sha la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / a ti muka ta ka dang / sho ka pa ra rta dang / kha phye 'khyil ba dang / mAn d+ha pa li shi ka dang / mthon ka chen po dang / 
239b7(mdo): ka dam pa dang / mdog mdzes dang / sum n+ya ka dang / skya snang dang / cher gral dang / dri myed gzi brjid dang / pI dka' dang / rab sam dang / ba la sha dang / za ba ma ran dag dang / gzi brjid bsil ma dang
239b8(mdo): tra myed dang / gza' yangs ldan dang / shi nad tu brtan dang / lha dga' dang yi dga' dang / yu thi ka dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma kar po dang / ud pa la dang / ud pa la dmar po dang / ta
240a1(mdo): na sum d+ya dang / gser dang / rdul dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa da/ mngon masum su rnams pa mtha rad pa'i dkyil la
240a2(mdo): a 'khor gas pa la don yod pa'i rgyal po 'ong smras so// dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
240a3(mdo): thams cad kyi gsang ba rigs kyi dam tshig la phyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa rnam par thard pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rigs dang / phyag rgya thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa dang
240a4(mdo): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge/ 'dun thams cad laSh+ka tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa ni sa la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams
240a5(mdo): sa phyag 'tshal lo// blo gros chen po sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyag 'alwa lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'gas pa spyan ras gzigs kyi mchog rnams la phyag/ 'tsha'o/ 
240a6(mdo): 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs par dgra sa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag myed pa phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
240a7(mdo): chen po thugs rjes chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// drang srong chen po de dang dag dang / 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi mchog de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ 
240a8(mdo): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas byung ba/ don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par tha rad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon gsum du gsungs pa 'di 'khor
240b1(mdo): mang po'i na nga bdag gis da bzlas kyis// bdag gi dgos pa grub par gyur da cig/ 'jigs pa thams cad las srung bar gyur da cig// tad ya tra/ mA car tsam/ tsi tso mi/ tsu ru ru
240b2(mdo): ma hA ka pu Ni ka/ tha ma 'am/ yor ba me/ tsi ma tsi ri/ pha mams ta ka ru ni ki/ sau ri mo mi/ ci'i tsom/ pi yo'i mye/ ma'o ba dzi/ sa su 'das paH/ gas ka sa/ ga mi ga sa/ ku sa kus/ sa hA ku
240b3(mdo): mdaSh+Ta/ mai Ne p+te/ bud s+thA bu b+ta/ d+ha ba d+hA pa/ kaN kaH/ ki Ni ko Ni/ kur+b+ha kuN+Da/ ba ras zhud rmAs / ka ra ka ra/ kaur ko mi/ ku ru ku mu/ sa hA snyam za ba ta/ tsa la tsa la/ san ces
240b4(mdo): btsal e ta ta me ta ta/ b+hA b+ha ra/ b+hai ra~M b+hai mi/ pU tsa ha~M/ oM paka nu NIka/ ma pa pa shu la ti/ be+e Sha d+ham/ / sar sa pa/ tsar tsam/ ha ra ha ra/ pA hA hA hA/ 
240b5(mdo): tI hAM bI s+t+ri/ hU hu hu hU/ ka ra mamra/ b+he Shad+harad+ha b+har/ b+hi d+ha ri/ ru ru pu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa pa/ par 'am/ tsar tsar/ ba ra ba ra/ pam+bin tas pas
