240b7(mdo): mu ru rba sa/ sa na kum bdud tra/ bA sa pA/ bI Sh+Ta b+hand/ de ba mag ga 5/ ba hUM bi bi pA pe kha p+ta ra/ d+ha ma d+ha ra/ d+hi bo d+hi ra// mUng mu ru/ thar tha ra/ kA ra k+Sha/ sa ra ya ra/ yang la ra/ 
240b8(mdo): ha ma/ ma mas sa/ pa ya la / ma sa ma/ pa ma~M mA ma ga/ saman ta/ a pa la ko ki/ ba mo ki ta/ arba shA ra/ mu ru mu h+ya/ mu~M ru mu ru/ mu la mu~M ya ha~M/ mun tsa mum // bcom ldan
241a1(mdo): 'das 'phags pa sun ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag dang / sems can thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang gnod pa thams cad dang / yams kyi nad thams cad dang / gdon thams car/ 
241a2(mdo): dang / nad thams cad las bsru pud gsol/ skyang du gsol/ gnod pa dang / 'ching ba dang / rdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / gnod byed dang / me dang / chu dang / ru ka dang / 
241a3(mdo): mtshan las yongs su thar par mdzad pa/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Na ka Na/ ku N+Da kuN+Da/ tsa ra tsa ra/ Ane tri ya/ las bod dung ka/ mA ra ka/ tsa tu ra r+ya sad ta/ sam pra kA sha ka/ ta ma ta ma/ da ma da ma/ sha ma sha ma/ 
241a4(mdo): sam sa ma/ ma ta mon b+ha ka ra/ bi d+ha ma na// rad pA ra myi tA/ dab ri bu ka/ mi la mo yi/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ [।।।]/ rbi Tarbarba mu mak+Sha/ e na ya/ tsa ra ma kri te/ e h+ye hi/ i shAr/ 
241a5(mdo): ma he sha ra/ ma hA pU b+ha ga na/ b+han dza ka/ ku ru ku ru/ ba ra ba ra/ ka ta ka ta/ ma ta ma ta/ bai shud b+ha/ ba Sha ya/ ni be si na/ ma ha ka ru ni ka/ she ta yang nyo ba b+hi te/ ra na ma gu ta/ 
241a6(mdo): dza yA d+ha ra/ madz+ra de/ 1 ne oM kr-i ta/ ma ku ha/ ma ha pU d+h+ya/ ka sa sa mi te/ ka ra ta sa/ spyan sam d+hi/ mi mogs/ sa pa kas bya ba chu sa tra/ san ta ti/ ba ra pA tsika/ ma phag puni ke/ sa rdzagapa
241a7(mdo): ma me ba ran bi sho d+ha ka/ sarba bya snyim mo cig/ sa pa mA na pa 'i srung ka/ sa rba sadra ta/ sa mA sha sa nakar/ na mo stu te sa hA// mo prA hA/ be sha d+ha / d+ha ra d+ha pa/ ti dzo ri/ du du d+ha ru/ sa san ta/ dzam/ 
241a8(mdo): ma man ta dza ya/ sa so g+ha hUM/ don yod pa'i snying po'o// oM yi ge gcig po ni kun nas gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig dang / pad ma yangs pa'i rokyis 'khor du zhugs pa
241b1(mdo): rigs thams cad kyi spyo'o yon te/ krugs pas grub pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs da'ang phyag gis snying po yi ge gcin kun nas// de bzhin gshegs
241b2(mdo): pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba spyi'i rnam par thar da pa'i dkyil 'khor smras pa tsam gis/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug du g.yos shing / lha'i me tog gi cher rab tu pha ba la
241b3(mdo): kun nas rin po che yi rab tu bab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa kang ka'i klung gyi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong kun nas gshegs nas// nam mkha'i dkyilen rdzu 'phrul kas bzhugs so// don yod pa'i
241b4(mdo): rim par bye ba'i sprin lta'i rin po che sna bdun 'phrul la 'bas sa khyabs pa dang / lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog rnams dang / sA'i rgya mang bas gos sna tshogs pa'i chem bcom ldan 'das dang
241b5(mdo): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs don yod pa'i rgyal po'i tshul du/ bzhugs pa la mchod pa dang / bkur sti bya ba'i byorarab stsa b.lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang legs/ 
241b6(mdo): so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par mdzad de/ sems pa dag pa chen po khyed kyis sangs rgyas byung ba mchog bstan pa legs so// legs so// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gas pa
241b7(mdo): pa phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / rigs sngags kyi gnas rim par phye ba rnam par tharang pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / yi ge gcig tu rjes su zhugs pa ni/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
241b8(mdo): khams su nyi ma gcig shar ba yin no// gang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong chan gsum gi stong chen po 'jig rte nad gi khams gi rdul phra mo snyed kyi
242a1(mdo): 'byung ba rdzogs par sangs rgyas 'byung ba cig gis thams cad rjes su zhugs pa yin zhing / snying po yo gai gcig gise rjes su zhugs pa yin la/ phyag rgya dang / dkyis 'khor rim par phye ba dang / 
242a2(mdo): dam tshig cig gis rjes su zhugs pa yin no// don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par thard pa'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bzang po'i 'od don yod pa'i gsang sngags gshegs pas
242a3(mdo): trangs shau / skra gcig gi dam tshig la bkod pa yin te/ de sa na don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes bya bar byin kyis brlabs so// snying po yaM ge gcig pa'i gzung sa sngags ni/ rtag tu klags par grub
242a4(mdo): pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs pa na no// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bshag/ kyang thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
242a5(mdo): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes/ bya ba byin te/ snying rje chen po dang / ldan pa legs so legs/ so// de kho na nyid basmra ba pa grub pa de bzhin gshegs
242a6(mdo): ba'i rishes 'i dam tshig sgrub pa/ don yod pa'i nags pa'i smrab bklags pas 'grub la/ 'do na mchog tu bzang pa man gas yon tan ga sung bzhog ceg/ rta ma ma ki 'di ni ngon yod pa
242a7(mdo): 'i zhags pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// bsgrub pa de'i klags pas grub pa/ phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sku gzugs ri mo dang bcas pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga bla na myed pa yin no// de nas bya
242a8(mdo): chub sems dpa sems dpa 'chen po 'phags laspyan ngam gzigs dbang byug gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di bskad ces gsolar to// bcom ldan 'das dang yod pa'i zhags pa'ang sa
242b1(mdo): yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / pad ma rigs kyi rnam par tha rad po'i dkyil 'khor dang / de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig gsang ba chen po dang / rigs spyi'i sgrub pa klags pas grub pa 'di yi yo byad dang / cho ga bshad/ 
242b2(mdo): bar bkyi yis/ bcom ldan 'das byin gyis brlab pu gsol// bcom ldan 'das gang gis dran pa tsam kase bdag mdun na nye bar mchis shi po/ bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par
242b3(mdo): bgyi/ rigs kyi dngos kyi grub thams cad rjes su gsal bar bar bkyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi bkal ngastsa lad pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug legs so// legs so// de ltar khyod kyi sems
242b4(mdo): can thams cad be sbal par bya zhi de/ rigs sngags 'chang / rnams kyi dngos grub dam pa mchog de khyod kyi sa rab tu sbyin par gyi sa shi ga/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po gsang pa'i dam tshig
242b5(mdo): dang / yi ge gcig po rigs spyi'i rjes su zhugs ya de bzhin/ gshegs pa'i byin kyis brlabs da kyi sa yo byad dang / basmA btsuHpa'i cho ga shod mo ke/ de nas bya nga chub sems dpa' sems
242b6(mdo): dpa' chen po 'phags sman ras gzigs dpang phyug/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs phyung pa dag zos nas snying shin u/ ste yo byad dang / cho ga smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mngon gsum du sdig pa sreg
242b7(mdo): ci dem lus par zad par bgyid pa/ sems can dmyal bar thanas 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga smras pa/ dkyil 'khor grub bzhir byas nas su// dbus su pad pa'i 'khor lo bya// tshon po'i/ 
242b8(mdo): rnam pas rnam par dbyed// pad ma'i the yi dbyas su mi// s+yan ras gzigs dbang bzhugs par bya// bum pa bkang dang / pad rnams kyis// dkyil 'khor kun nas brgyan par bya// me tog
243a1(mdo): sna tshogs legs par dgram// spos dri bzang pos bskos pa'i// mar me'i 'phreng ba kun tu bud// mchod yon chu dag gzhag par bya// a ga ru dang du rus ka// bdug
243a2(mdo): spos sna bzhi rag nas bdug/ rig sngags 'chang ba zhus byas nas// gos chang bkos te smyung ba la/ nye bar gnas pas tshes brgyad dam// bcul gzhi tshes ni bco lnga ste// zla ba ma nga
243a3(mdo): bsgrub// shar du kha bltas 'du ga nas su// dod yod zhags pa dus gsum du// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya// snying po brgya brgyad du bzlas// yi ge gcig po 'bus du ni// 
243a4(mdo): mtshan mo khar chad myed par bzlas// skya rengs shar nas 'jig rten dbang // ze ba'i dbus na 'byung 'byung zhing // 'gul 'gyur 'bul ba de yis ni// dmyal ba chen
243a5(mdo): po bcu drug gi// sgo rnams dag ni phye bar 'gyur// dmyal ba'i gnas nas shugs chen gyis// g.yo la g.yo sa pa tsam gi se ni// dmyal ba tshor ba kun rnam par 'jig/ 
243a6(mdo): dmyal ba des parnam par 'joms// sems can dmyal yang dag ni// thar nga nas phyogs bcur byug pa 'i// dmyal ba'i zug sngal kun las grol// mtho 'a ngas lam du zhugs par/ 
243a7(mdo): 'gyur// // dud 'grolo skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thams cad dud 'gro rnams las yongs su grol bar 'gyur// bdag nyid kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dang / sdug bsngal myi bzad pa thams cad
243a8(mdo): mthar gtugs pam yongs su zad par 'gyur// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// gal te ldog pa thams cad zad par gyur das/ ro'i 'tshe 'phags pa sa/ 
243b1(mdo): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku mdog gser gi mdog can du ston par mdzad la// mchog thams cad sbyin par ma ngad do// don yod pa dri ma myed pa'i ye shes bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob/

243b3(mdo): dbu po rnams mod la nyid la mngon gsum du stond par mdzad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag g.yas pa la mgo' bo'i spyi bor 'jog par mdzad nga / bsod nas kyi phung po chen po dang
243b4(mdo): ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba'i che ba chen po yongs su bzlababar 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa kun gyi cog pu mchod pa chen po byas pam 'gyur/ gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / zla ba dang /

243b6(mdo): byed par 'gyur/ dngos gru pa dang / dgos pa thams cad rtsub par 'gyur/ gal te sdig pa thams cad zad par ma gyu rad na/ de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ki m+me/ mdog gser gi kha dog
243b7(mdo): can du myi mthong ngo // de sgrib pa dang sdig pa lhag ma ma lus par shes par bya ste/ de nyid du bzlas brjod gi cho ga spyang par byas pa dang / sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rtsa ba dang bcas pa thams cad
243b8(mdo): byung bar 'gyur ro// gal te bzlas brjod go cho ga sbyang ba gsum byed na/ bzlas brjod go cho ga gsum pa rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi phyag g.yas pa brkyang na sa rig rdza kle
244a1(mdo): 'chang bteg te mod la 'jig rtend kyi khams bde ba can du 'od dpag tu myed kyi spyan sngar 'jog par mdzad la/ mngon gsum du bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag myed kyis//

245a1(mdo): dkyil 'khor kun tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dang / me tog gi 'bre dgod cing / kun tu 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dkram par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang chang mar gyur bas

245b1(mdo): khyim dang / thams cad du kra shi se kis mchod pacho ga zhib mo thams cad dang / de bzhin du dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / bzlas brjod thams cad dang / gas pag sngags thams cad kyi/

245b8(mdo): gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dgongs shing / snang ba rnam/ 
246a1(mdo): par dag pa thol bar 'gyur// nyin zhag gsum du sbyar/ na ngag rnam par dag pa 'thob bo// nyin zhag snga byas na/ dran pa rnam par dag pa 'thob bo// nyid zhag bdun du sbya na/ rigs

246a3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig gi dngos grub chen po 'thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba de kho na nyid
246a4(mdo): kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub 'thob bo// zla ba cig du sbyar na 'phags pa spyad ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dngos grub sgyu ma lta bus brgyan pa 'thob cing / tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur ro//

246a6(mdo): par 'gyur te/ myig mthon zing mdog bung ba lta bu/ skar ba yu 'khyil par 'gyur/ tshe lo bdun pa lta bu'i gzugs dang mthun par 'gyur/ tshe skal pa 'bum thub par 'gyur ro// 'dar nas/ 
246a7(mdo): bdag nyid la byugs na/ kang tri bsnams pa tsam gis bgyegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha ba dang / yi dgra dang / skye ma byed dang / brjed byed dang / 
246a8(mdo): grib gnon thams cad dang / ka don thams cad dang / gdug pa thams cad dang / dgra thams cad dpag tshad stong du 'bros so// gal te myur du myi 'bros na/ spyi bo dum bu 'bum tu 'gas
246b1(mdo): shing / yan lag dang nyin lag rnams zhig par 'gyur ya/ bu dang chu ba mar bcas pa 'jig par 'gyur/ sngon go sgrib pa dang / sdig pa rnams kyis myi tshugs par 'gyur/ sems can dmyal ba
246b2(mdo): myong bar 'gyur ba mtshams myed pa lnga dag 'jig par 'gyur/ rmyi lam ngan pa dang / lhas ngan pa dang / myi shes pa dang / kra myi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ spos bsnams
246b3(mdo): pa tsam kis rgyal phod pa/ rgyal po'i blon po dang / bram ze dang/ khyim bdag dang / rgyal riges dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs jib kyi zhes bya ba byed la dbang du gyur nas 'khod do// 
246b4(mdo): byugs pa tsam gis 'bras dang / rol byig dang / lhoH/ dpa dang / myed pas dang / rkang shu dang g.yan pa dang mdze dang / khyi dzo pa/ shu ba dang / 'brum bu 'phra mo dang / ma dang / 
246b5(mdo): gi rma yongs su mos par 'gyur ro// dug thams can dang / zos pa dang / dug myos pa dang / sbyar dug drug pa dang / phyag sbyar ba dang / spyar dug phye ma dang / byad rnams la bskus
246b6(mdo): pa tsam dang / tshwa dron mo 'thungs pa tsam gis dug myed par 'gyur ro// dI tsam gose klu'i rgyal po 'jog po'o dug kyang myed par 'gyur ro// rims nyin bzhi pas thebs pa'i bral ba la
246b7(mdo): bskus na/ ku co 'dod cing 'bros so// rims thams cad dang / nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / rlung las gyur da pa dang / mkhris pa las gyurang ba dang / 
246b8(mdo): bad kan las gyu rad pa dang / 'dus pa las bya dad pa dang / lwa ba dang / pho ba'i nad mchin pa na la dang / stob na ba dang / sran dang / gcan tho ba dang / ci ba logs ma pa dang / mgul pa na
247a1(mdo): pa dang / kha na pa dang / 'khyil zhi ngan pa dang / tshad pa dang / 'doms na pa dang / yan lag dang / nyid lag ma bachu dron mo 'byungs pa tsam kas yongs su sos par 'gyur ro//

247a3(mdo): za ba'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan khro ba'i 'jigs pa las thard par 'gyur zhing / 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su tha dad par 'gyur/ lag pa gdangs par 'byung bar myi 'gyur/ 
247a4(mdo): mi ma yin gang gis kyang mdangs 'phrog par myi 'gyur zhi bar chad bya bar myi nus so// mkha' 'gro ma thams cad mthong ba tsam gas dbang du gyurang nas 'khor ro// 
247a5(mdo): rgyal po btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bces pa'i mchod kan sa chen pos 'gyur ro// gzhan yang kang dang gang du smra/ ra ba'i rang gi blos bye ba phrag 'bum sbyar na las sgrub par
247a6(mdo): byed ste/ 'dun gi mchog shin dbya 'ab par bsgrub par bya'o// / sman gyi dkyis 'khor ga choga'o// // de nas de la phyir gser gi la su 'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ yong/ 
247a7(mdo): rtend dbang phyug go don yod po'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod pa rnam par gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma cug tor kas rgyal po zhes bya bas byin gos brlabla/ 
247a8(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mi/ snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug 'od gis bka' stsa la dpa// gzhan yang
247b1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa ka ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig/ 'bum phrag dku bcu ljang dbus gsungs shing sngags pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ dbang bskurang ba// rjes su zhugs rangs/ 
247b2(mdo): lung bstan pa/ mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kau gtsug gi nor bu cod pan 'chang pa/ rgyal ba 'od dpag myed kyi gtsug tor gi mtshan nyid kyi thig le yid bzhin ni nor bu
247b3(mdo): rgyal mtshan kaM nor bu chen po'i rgyal po mchog tu bskyab par rog sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi gsang pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
247b4(mdo): kyi rigs kyi dam tshig spyi'i sku'i snying po gang gis mthong ba tsam la stsogs pa 'dir tshad bstand par lta su zhig kas nus mo dkyi/ 'od kyang de bzhin gshegs pa kang ka'i rlung gi bye
247b5(mdo): ma snyed bye ma dang / dus gsum ka de bzhin gshegs pa// pa rdzogs par mngon gsum du mthong ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag nyid mngon gsum du man
247b6(mdo): par bzung pa dang / lung bstand pa thob par 'gyur/ de bzhi na gshegs pa de dag gi mngon gsum du dge' ba'i ha ba bsod nams kyi phung dang ldan par 'gyur ro// nor bu gser gi kha dog
247b7(mdo): dra bstand pa'i ro lu 'di keng kos mthong zhi pa 'chang ba ni// dge ba lapha ba bsod nams kyi phung po chen po skyed par 'gyur/ nor bu r-i lu 'di mthong ba tsam gyis sgrib pa dang sdig pa dang / gdug par
247b8(mdo): mtshams myed pa/ dpa dang / mnar myed lnga gzhol pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa' la bskur pa 'debs pa dang / sngon gyi tshe rabs nas bsugs pa'i slob pa thams cad rnam hA/ 
248a1(mdo): 'dzag cing brnam par 'gyur/ dzas dpa na thams cad yongs su tha rang par 'gyur/ gang gi lagang sla 'di yod par gyur pa'i sems can deni sung bsun par 'gyur ro// dri mu gangs
248a2(mdo): yod pa ni// phyir gyi ldog pas bstan cing // mgon po sems can dag la gnas// rtag tu mno// 'gyur ba ste// sku gsung stong po'i bdag nyid can// rtag tu sangs rgyas bdag nyid 'byung/ 
248a3(mdo): dus gsum dag la bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa kang // sangs rgyad po de kun de// sras cig tu na brjod pa yin/ 'don de bzhin gshegs pa'i mas// thugs las skyes
248a4(mdo): dang zhal nas skyes// chos kyi dbyings sprul chos las skyes// // 'jig rtend dbang phyug mchog spron 'gon// rtag tu rje/ sa su 'brang bar 'gyur// phyag g.yas rkyag tu spyi bor

248a8(mdo): dkyigs dpa log 'dren dag// nams kyang 'dzag par myo 'gyur la// sems dpa' phyag bya'i gnas su 'gyur// ka la nor rgyal 'di yod ya// rgyal po chen po bzhi yo dag// dpung
248b1(mdo): dang / bcas par 'khor dang bcas// rtag tu srung phyir gnas byed de// 'didon nyon mtshan de bzhin no// lha tshogs thams cad bsrung bar mi// the tsom myed par byed par 'gyur// gzis
248b2(mdo): brjid dpal yang rab tu 'phel// de la legs par 'jug par 'gyur// 'jigs myed rtag tu rmi lam ni// dngos po chen po sna tshogs mthong // grul 'dzin ri la gzham myed khab// tshal
248b3(mdo): dang bcas shi rin chen bcas// gnas dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur// lha ngaklu dang gnod sbyind dang / dri za lha ma ni ka sang ba pa// nam mkha' lnga pa dang myi 'am ci// de bzhin lho chen
248b4(mdo): 'khor dang bcas// byan sems dpa'i 'khor rnams ni// kun nas bskor pa mthong bar 'gyur// rin chen lha'i med ge/ li ba dan/ khang pa chags pa rin chen dang / nor bu chen pos

249a1(mdo): 'byung // 'jig pa la myi 'azad brgyad las thar na// de la dug dang sbyar ba'i dus// dug spyar drag pos myi tshugs shing // des byad kyis tshugs myi 'gyur// dang

251b7(mdo): smad par bya ba yin// lha rnams kyis ni yongs su btang // ma rungs pa ni bdud kyis zos// ma rungs pa ni 'byegs kyis zin// bslab bzhi tshul khrims nyams pa dang // 'gon po'i bstan pa sun 'byin
251b8(mdo): 5/ de la dngos grub ji ltar 'byung // de la skyob pa gang yang myed// mgon myed kun tu spa pa yin// de bas de la dngos grub mi// chung ngu'ang myed sa nges pa yos// gsang sngags dpani spen myi 'grub
252a1(mdo): nyes pa de dag rang gis byas// gzhan yang ma rungs byed pa yin// de bas sems can mkhas la sbyin// slob par 'dod cing yon tan dka'/ snying rje'i bdag nyid byams la gnas// sems can kun la
252a2(mdo): a brtse ba'i mchog/ de'i lag tu basbyin bya ste// de'i dngos grub bla na myed// // gsang pa 'di ni shi nid tu gsang pa yin te/ 'jig rten pa dbang phyug gi stong po kas ngo bo snying po de yang dige sngags 'chang rnams kyi de kho na nyid
252a3(mdo): kyi gsang ba gsang sngags dang phyag rgya bsgrub sla ste/ klags pas grub pa de bzhin du// sman nor 'di la rtag tu 'jug cing / dngos gru'og de kho na nyid rab tu ston par byed pa yin no// rig sngags 'chang ni bdag nyid
252a4(mdo): kyis// mchog tu gsang ba bsgrub bya ba// rig sngags 'ang ni brtsa ma yis// khrus byas gos bcang byon byed la// 'dar ni nyin zhag sbyar ba dang // dad dang gus pas mchod par bya
252a5(mdo): don yod 'khor la bsgrub byed pas// dngos sgrub dkyis 'khor ras sprub sman sI ka dang / tsan don gyi byes dang / a ga du dang / pad ma ge sar dang / bad pa dang / pad ma'i sum bu dang / pad mtsho
252a6(mdo): 'dab ma dang de bzhin du 'gi wa pa dang / sdong gros dang / tsam pa ka dang / su man ste/ de bzhin cha ni mnyam spyar ste// bye ma dag ni byas nas ni// de nas don yod rgyal po yis// tshes brgyad nas ni bco lnga'i 'ang // brgya
252a7(mdo): brgyad du bzlas brjod bya// khro ba'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad// bzlas brjod byas nas dbang bskur // de'i 'og tu cha lngar byas te/ myig sgru ba dang / ri lu dang / bye ma dang / ti le mA chos pa dang / kha gdong 'bru zhing / 
252a8(mdo): khrus byal ba'o// myig sman so'u phyi raM dang / lhan cig spus la don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya'o// ri lu ni s+pha rtsi dkar po dang lhan cig spu'o// bye ma ni 'jig rten dbang phyug la phul ba'i me tog dang / 
252b1(mdo): lhan cig spu'o// til mar btsos pa ni pra ha tI yai ste/ shing pa la sha'i mer dang lhan cig spu'o// kha gdong bkru ba na tsan dan dkar po'i rkye dpa cig bsdu zhing / su ma na dang / kur ku pa dang / spos chus lhan cig smra sa ya/ so sor
252b2(mdo): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ 'khro bo'i rgyal pos nyi shu ca cig bzlas brjod byas nas dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang nyin zhag cig skung ba byas pas cig tu bskul pa ste// rdul gyi snod kyi nang du bcug
252b3(mdo): la/ so sar brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/ shar phyogs kyi sgo nas dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor mchog la phyag dang bskor ba byas la/ de nas so ang dar gyis kha bcad de/ dkyil 'khor lo
252b4(mdo): snying por gzhag la/ don yod pa'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas parjod bya/ 'khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas da bang bskur bar bya/ dbang bskur ba byas nas kyang / rig sngags
252b5(mdo): 'chang gis dbang bskur bar bya// de nas dkyil 'khor snying por ni 'jig rten dbang phyug mchod bya ste/ bdug spos dag dang dbul bar bya// a ku ru dang tsan dan dang // sI ka su gus du dus ka/ 
252b6(mdo): mchod yod snod ni lnga dbul zhing // gtor ma lnga ni dkang bya ste// ro ldan sna tshogs dag gis dgapa// snod ldan 'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i// gtor ma cha lnga dbul bar bya// kun tu 'phre pa nyi shu dang // mar me nyi shu
252b7(mdo): lnga dag dang / sa kyi phyem lnga ga dang // thos kyi cha sngar bye bas byug/ phan 'bra nyi shu sAng gdags// mtshon ci jams mengs par bya// gser dang dngus gos gsogs pam// mu 'gang ba nyi shu lnga// rin
252b8(mdo): 'o che ni lnga bzhag go// sgo bzhi grwa bzhi bum pa brgyad// brgya dpa nyi shu pA nyid// dkyil 'khor me tog 'bram yos dang // yungs kar nyid kyis mngon par dgram// slob dpon bla ma mchod pa ni// gos da
253a1(mdo): snod dang yon gyis so// thub pa 'jig rten dbang phyug sbyar// ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas su// dkyil 'khor bsgol dpon mchod byas nas// de nas dkyil 'khor gshegs par gsol// den pa
253a2(mdo): alas rnams bya ba ni// ji ltar yid la sna tshogs byas// don yod chen po gzhal myed khang // rig sngags 'chang gi rtag tu gas // de nyid dngos grul bsgrubs pa// de bzhin nor bu sman sngags so// don 'di
253a3(mdo): shining du kri shis ste// mkham pa'i phyi yis bya ba yin// pha ma'i chog kyang myi bsten te// brdzun ni rnams kyang sA myi bya// 'di ni bsgrub pa'i de nyid de// des grub bathe tsom byed// 'di ni dkyil 'khor bshad par bya
253a4(mdo): kun nas gru bzhi snyam ma ste// gral bzhi'i tshe ni legs pa rang dbye// ko la'i tshad du legs par dang// sna tshogs tshon kau thig skud kyis// dkyil 'khor das pa thig gdab bo// dkyil 'khor
253a5(mdo): dbus kyi zhing por ni// 'khor lo bzang po tho bar bya// dung sa kyi lte bar pang ma'i// 'khor logasas pa mi par bya// bad po'i stong po gser ba ni// dngus dang can dang las byas pa
253a6(mdo): bar bar 'jig rten da'ang phyug bzhugs// 'khor po kun dang thathoms dang ni/ 'asu byab dag gis mang bya'o// dkyis mthong rnam po ma mnams dag/ sna'i dbang po tshangs pa dang / khyab 'dug rab phyag ched pa/ 
253a7(mdo): kun kya sbya nas 'das/ bang pa 'phreng pa nams kyi/ byor ba gas na/ nas rgyan pa ste// rlung na
253a8(mdo): ni brtson pa sa gsas// dbyug so mdang brtenapapa'o// gnams kun pa 'bri ba gi/ toganas pa tshogs papas// gan na kyis ba rtsa// mnye ga di brgyas dang // sum da / 
253b1(mdo): ni gzhon du bri// dkyil 'khor phra bzhi rnams su ni// rgyal po chen po bzhin po dag// go cha sem par bgos pa dang // 'khro bor lta ba 'jigs myed bri// 'dini dkyil 'khor mchog yin te// dkyil 'khor/ 
253b2(mdo): kyi ni dgos pa rnams// legs par yongs su rdzogs pa da// rig sngags pa bzhin bstan dpa yin// de nas legs par khrus byas la// gos yang bgos pa 'jigs myed pas// sman mchog bzung
253b3(mdo): ste las bya'o// rmongs pa'i rdzal sna tshogs dang // sgyum lta bu yin ma sprul pa// gang gis ngan 'gro ba pa' 'gyur ba// sems cad kun la bstan par bya// rtag tu dgal dang dang bu dang // gus pa de nyid thob
253b4(mdo): bar 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang gis bsgrub pa'i mchog/ dngos gru ba la de nyid no babar 'gyur// / rig sngags 'chang gis sngar khrus byas la/ rdzas kyi dri chab chal mngon yod pa'i rgyas pos

253b8(mdo): 25/ skye ba yi napa ngam/ 'dus pa chen po 'am/ dge 'dun gi nang ngam// tshogs dang / 'phad pa 'am/ de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang dung ste/ de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten 'gon po'i gzugs dang
254a1(mdo): 'don du mam nganing / pa'i nyebadam na pa 'khrug cam gis lags tu 'dug sa/ ji ltar 'dus pa rnams kyi dadapa/ des de sbyang gzugs rnams smod par byed de/ rgyal ba'am/ 'kho pos srung

254b8(mdo): brgya rtsa brgyad badz+rad bzlas brjod byas nas// chang ba gang mi'i nang du gtor// char pa gang phyogs bzhi kun tu gtor na/ kun nas mar me'i 'theng ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/ ji srid dgos pa de srid du 'bar ro// gtsug lag khang /

256b1(mdo): 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi na' du gtor na/ thams cad bong bu dang / wa dang khyo'i gzugs can du 'gyur ro// sbyor ma'i khyim 'ad+mor gtor na/ sbyor ba thams cad 'bar ya/ ma he'i gzugs can du snang ngo // shi ba'i du steng bu

256b8(mdo): rgyal po chen po rdo rje sgrog/ klu'i dbang po stobs kyis gnon// mgon po kos sngon kon pa dang // dbyug sngon dgra las rgyal ba dang // 'jig rten dbang phyug pad ma'i lce// phyag na padam 'dam byug / de bzhin
257a1(mdo): 'jigs pa brgyad sel dab// de bzhin mchod rten 'jig rten tha// sna tshogs gzugs dang bzang po dang // sre ba phyed bu dbatshangs pa dang // drag po dro da dbang phyug dang // nag po chen lo gzhon mu dag/

257a7(mdo): don yod zhags pa sgrub po'i phyir// de nyid dngos klub rab ston pa// mchod rten dkon pa gtsug lag khang // lha'i gnas dang de bzhin klong // gong khyer nyid dang 'bab rgya'i dong // mtshe'u dang ste ka chu bo dang / 
257a8(mdo): dzing dang de bzhin cha 'bas dang // 'byug spogs dben sngo// dang // gzhan yang be ni 'bar ba dang // dud pa'i phung po sde 'gyed dang // skyes bu go cha byon pa dang // de bzhin mtshon cha sna tshogs mthong // rgya mchog
257b1(mdo): grub pa mthong ba dang // de bzhin rmad du 'byung ba ste// rdzas nyungs bsgyur ba nyung byud kyang // de nyid dngos grub bla na myed// sems can rnams la phan 'tshal nas// bcom ldan de nyid bdag gis bshad// rigs sAmra/ 
257b2(mdo): 'chang rnams klags pas grub pa// dbul po rnams ni nor thob cing // sdad pa rnams ni byams par bgyid// mu stegs can rnams dad par bgyid// mkhas pa rnams ni dga' bar bgyid// gdul dka' rnams ni thar pa
257b3(mdo): 'tshal// dge slong rnams ni bsam gtan thob// ting 'dzin bla na byed pa thob// chos 'dod nams ni sas rgyas mthong // sdig byed pa rnams sdikri pa 'jog/ myo rigs byed rnams tha dad pa lol// mtshams
257b4(mdo): byed lnga rnams rnam dag don// dbugs ma 'byind rnams pa/ bugs 'byin mchog/ sa rul ba rnams de bzhin dul// marga/ la ba rnams sgrol ba'i skye// tha rang po'i lam du 'gro bar gnas// 
257b5(mdo): ma grol ngan 'gro kun lus grol// sdog pa kun las rnamapar grol// lung ma bstand pa sung ston byed// skyon dang drim sdig pa rnams// thams cad mod la spong bgyid de// de la
257b6(mdo): stsogs pa'i las rnams ni// klags pas grub par bgyid pa lags// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// don gi 'ongs khyab blan myed// gang dang du gang du sbyor bar bgyid// dgos pa thams cad 'bru
257b7(mdo): 'gyur// yid la bsas pa rtsub par 'gyur// 'dor ni yod kyis rnam bsams pa// ji ltar yod la 'dod pa dang // ji ltar ngo bo kun bsams pa// de sur rnam 'phrul ston par bgyid// chos grangs su
257b8(mdo): skar sbyar gyi 'tshal// bsnyud pa bgyi ba myi 'tshal te// cho ga ji bzhin dus ji bzhin// tshogs rig sngags rgyal po bzlalo// reg sngags 'chang ba cang 'gyur cing // legs par khrus bgyis gos ca
258a1(mdo): dag/ bgos pa 'ded pa la dang// bla ma yon gus byed pa// rtag tu byams pa 'i sems sa gnas// sems can kun sa 'che ba'i mchog/ sdom la gnas shing tshangs par srung // chos ma/ 
258a2(mdo): yin pa spong byed pa// gal te de nyid srub 'dod na// chang dang sha dang skrun tshong dang // 'dres dang zas 'phro spags pa spangs// sems can ngan pa sun 'byed pa// rig sngags chu dang cho ga rku// chos rku gas
258a3(mdo): sngags rku ba dang // de bzhin yi ge rku ba dang // ser sna rtag tu spang bar gyis// de dag la dngos grub myed// ma rungs pa ni dam tshig nyams// yid gcugs pa ni myed par byed// sdig pa'i chos ni kun tu
258a4(mdo): spyo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis spang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis smed// rtag tu chos gis sdong dum gyur// shi nas sems can dmyal bar gzhol// rtag tu spad pa/ 
258a5(mdo): gnas su 'gyur// dngul po su ni skems pa dang // mdze dang / khyi ngos 'debs pa dang // sdug sA la kun mchos sum 'byin// sa rku ba'i lus can mo// 'jig rted 'dir ni 'der byi 'gyur// 
258a6(mdo): 'jig rten da 'a ros dag la bde// sems can dmyal bar gzhol bu yod// de lta bas na chen po 'dod pas na// rtag sudas pa'i chos kyis rjes su 'brang bar bya zhing // rtag tu dkon mchog gsum dang / ba dang / ma dang / bla ma
258a7(mdo): dang / stond pa ni/ skyabs dang / dbu pa gnyen mdzad la/ ston pa mchog sbyin pa/ dngos grub dang byi 'jigs pa smon 'o// rga shi las thar dbyed pa/ dbang phyug sbyin pa// nor sbyid pa/ longs spyod sbyin pa la dad pa// mchog
258a8(mdo): bskyed pa/ de nyid 'jig rtend kyi bla ma/ mgon po 'jig rtend dbang phyug chen po// dbang phyug mgon po mchog sbyin par mdzad pa// gzugs sna tshogs sngon par mdzad pa// dngos grub sna tshogs sbyin par 'byid pa
258b1(mdo): 'gon po sdug bsngal sna tshogs las yongs su tha da par bgyid pa/ nad sna tshogs spyod par grub pa rin po che sna tshogs rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ 'jig rtend sdig pa sna tshogs sel bar bgyid pa/ bla ma la gus sna tshogs
258b2(mdo): bgyid pa lags te/ de lta bas na rtag tu 'bad pas dgos pa thams cad rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/ rtag tu 'bad pas// na tu gus par bgyi ba lags so// de nas rdzas kyi sman sgrub pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bshad par
258b3(mdo): bgyi ste/ seng ge'i lce dang / snying dang / myig dang / de bzhin du nya phyis kyi phye ma dang / ldong gros dang / bra mo la 'o ma dang / kugul dang / pad ma dang / pad ma'i ze ba dang / ud pas sngon po dang / na ga pus pa dang / li shi dang / rgya spos
258b4(mdo): dang / de bzhin du 'gyi wang dang / p+la hi dang / ka pur dang / ku/ ra kum dang / tsan dan kar po dang / s+phoka dang / de dza pa ti ste/ de ltar cha/ mnyam par byas pa de dag thams cad/ phye ma zhi ba mor byas la
258b5(mdo): dngul gi snod bkang ste/ dar kyis g.yog/ don yod pa ma rgyal po spyad ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du dus gsum du khri zlas brjod bya'o// dus su gsum du kho bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu
258b6(mdo): gcig rnas parji ma / @ kya sabyas dang / ti la dang / da dang khyig 'dus pa
258b7(mdo): pa dang / ma lnga'o// byem ni padas su du ka'i phyi ma da sbyanas khri bzlas brjod bya'o// kho ba'i rgyal po sod pa skyong ngo // til mar nis pa du rings 'grub ste/ baphyad stong bzlal brjod bya'o// kho bo'i rgyas
258b8(mdo): 'os bzhi stong ngo // nor bu'i sprul gi khrag gis smras te/ khri gcig stong bzlam brjod bya'o// 'gro lo 'o rgyal pos lnga stong lnga brgya'o// myig ldan nirma bya'i phyog chu dang / 'ug pa'i myig dang / blang ba dang
259a1(mdo): sbyar la/ khro chog stong bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal pos stong sa brgyad bya'o// bram te'i la sang nyi shu/ gan dang ba' te'i la srang brgyad/ nyungs kar srang bcu drug/ 'o sa mang brgyal/ ba ser mo grub pa'i'o// 
259a2(mdo): ma dang / ba'i lci ba dang / ba'i gcin mang bdun// du dus ska sra gnyis te/ rdzas 'od rnams rgya dang bsres nas pad ma'i sngon bkrug cibartsi'i phangs sdongad du btso 'o// mnyam par gzhag pas gsang sngags pa zlas// mo dag gis bsrum
259a3(mdo): par bya/ cho ga bzhin du gtor ma spyad// me tog bdug spos dag gos bdug/ ti e mar mchog ni bsgrub par bya// chu dur me 'bud grub pa mchog// spos kyi shing kos bud pa bzang // 'di ltar grub par shes par dang / 
259a4(mdo): 'khro bo'i rgyal po dbang bskur ba// nyi shu tsa ke tu dbang skur ro// til ma bde ni snod cang ma// zangs snod yang na rdul snod bzang / ne/ s+pho ga ma'o snod du gzhag par bya// de nas rigs sngags brgyad
259a5(mdo): stong dang // 'kho bo'i rgyal po brgyad stong nyid// so so ngag du nga zlas brjod bya// dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par deng gzhan par bya ba ni// ji ltar dkyil 'khor go cho gang bya bar de ltar byas nas
259a6(mdo): gzhag cing / slob dpon gi mes kyang bya ste/ ji lud dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa dang / 'dug pa dang / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dbang srung ba dang / mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor 'thong ba dang / phyag bya dang / spyig cug bcing ba dang
259a7(mdo): phyag rgya bcing ba dang / brkyang ba chog dang / nye reg bya ba dang / gos bgo ba dang / mchod phyir thogs pa ste/ dkyil 'khor gi slob dpon kun gis de dag thams cad bstan bar bya'o// dedas dkyis 'khor zhi shus gyis nam
259a8(mdo): bor gzhag la/ rig sngags 'chang sbya ba'i cho ga byas pas/ 'phags pa dod yod pa'i zhags pa'i stong po che stong pa brkyang bzlas brjod bya// kho ba'i rgyal pos kyang stong brgyang du dbang bskur ba// phyag rgyas kyang stong
259b1(mdo): rgyang du dbang bskur la/ phyag rgya bcings nas nas gsum 'dra bar dbang bskur ngo // denas lam thams cad bya ste/ sungs kar dkar po grub pa la/ rigs sngags 'cha gis brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas la/ pad ma'i mchogs cam
259b2(mdo): changam// chabs pa byas pa/ legs pam bkrus pa/ sbyangs pa bye ma zhob du btags pa/ thal ba lta bu la brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas nas snod dgapa/ ku gul dang / tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / sI ka la brgya rtsa brgyad brdzas
259b3(mdo): brjod byas nas snod ki nang du bkang sa/ dbus ka dkyil 'khor pad pa'i steng du so sor gzhag go// de nas 'khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur cing / phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ba byas na/ gang gi che don du bya ba byung ba de'i tshe
259b4(mdo): bya ba thams cad byed do// gser ram yang mang ngul lam zangs las pad ma'i chang du byas pa 'dab ma nyo shum tshig dang / snying po dang / theb can dang de bzhon du sor bcu gnyis pa'i chang la/ sdong bu sor bcu drug/ 
259b5(mdo): pa'i tshad rdo rje rnam ba can du bya/ skud la dbang po'i zhags pa 'ang ma 'i tshon dbang pos bzhen pa/ gnon nus bkas pa grub pa dang / de dgas brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya/ 'gro bo'i rgyal pos dpa
259b6(mdo): bskur cing / phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur bar byas la/ mkhas pas gseng po'i gnas su gzhag go// gang gi tshe don du bya ba byung ba de'i tshe/ las thams can sgrub pa stond to// shi nad thugs bar bya ste/ su la yang myi ston/ 
259b7(mdo): sangs rgyas rnams la sku brnyas par gyu rad pa/ dam tshig nyams pa yang ba la bgyegs 'jug par 'gyur zhing / 'phral du mtshams skyed pa lnga byed pa rmongs po'i dra ba de la dngos grub rnams kyang shes par myed 'gyur ro// 
259b8(mdo): gzhan ni sangs rgyas la gus shing / sangs rgyas chos la stend byed pa/ 'phags po'i chos la dad pa' dang // byams sems snying rje'i bdag nyid can// de'i lag tu rab tu sbyin// bdag gi srog bzhin btang bar bya/ 
260a1(mdo): de dag dngos rgyab mchog yin te// grags dang 'dod brtsam gyis ni// ji ltar song la byas pa bzhin// rjes su mthun pa la lam byed do// 'jig rten 'dobod rtag tu bde// 'jig rten pa ros 'de ba
260a2(mdo): yin// 'gro ba'i lamra ni bde bar 'gro// gangad na 'od dpag myed pa bzhugs// bde ba can du rtag tu 'gro// brdzus te skye ba'i pad ma las// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyad// tshengs dag ni chen
260a3(mdo): 'gyur te// sngon gi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// de nas rig sngags 'chang rmongs pa chen po'i dam tshig stond par 'dod pa/ chang mas legs par khrus bya/ gos yang ma bgos nas nyin zhag cig snyung byas pas/ 
260a4(mdo): laka na rdo rje dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugazhal mngon du bzhag ste/ me tog dang / bdug spos dbul zhing 'ang gas pa spyan ras gzigs kyi sku gzugs dang / phyag na rdo rje'i sku
260a5(mdo): gzugs la mchod pa bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la ka ru'i bdug spos gis 'dug/ las na rdo rje la gu muHgi 'dug spos kyis 'dug/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
260a6(mdo): byuphyophyags lha bshos dkar po dbul/ lan na rdo rje la ro sna tshogs dang / ldan pa'i lha bshos phul ka/ nyan par don yod pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bya/ mtshan mongs pa myed par bzlas brjod bya ste// kha gdong 'khro gnyer skyed/ 
260a7(mdo): pa dang / rmim dang / seng sna myed pas nas rangs kyi bar du bzlas brjod byas pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'bar bar 'gyur la/ lakan rdo rje yang pus mo 'dugs par 'gyur te/ de gnyis kyi myo/ 
260a8(mdo): nas 'dzag pa/ rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas thig se byas na/ byi snang bar 'gyur ro// phyog la bsgrub na nam mkha' la 'gro'o// khar bcug na rig sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / 
260b1(mdo): dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur/ lag rdo rje'i stobs dang / shugs dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol gno par 'gyur// lag na rdo rje gzugs kyis mdun na nye bar 'dug cing / 'dod pa thams cad gi mchod
260b2(mdo): rjes su sbyin par byed la/ rang gi gzugs kyis spyod pa byed// lag na rdo rje'i stobs dang / shugs dang / brtson 'grus kyis pha rol dang gnon par byed de/ de ltar lag na rdo rjel 'khrugs par 'gyur ro// nyi ma 'char
260b3(mdo): ba'i dus su til ma pa chen po ran par bdag nyid la bskus myig sman gis myig byug/ phye mas gtor zhing bdag nyid thig le byaM/ nor bu 'go la gzhag nas ku yul gis bdug/ bdag nyid du sdigs bgos nas
260b4(mdo): sangs rgyas yid la bya ba bsgom zhing / zhi ba dang dul ba'i yid kyis sde can go rin dam/ dge 'dun gi nang du bcug par bya'o// de nas dge slong de dag gi sde can gyi nang du zhugs sam
260b5(mdo): dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs pa'i rog sngags 'chang de/ brtsom/ ldan 'das kyi sku dang / mdog dang / rtags dang / spyod lam du mthong ste// mtshan nyi shu cha brgyad pa yod cing / 'od 'dom ga
260b6(mdo): stan pad ma/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i mdun gyis bdang pa lha'i tshogs kyi gzugs mthong bar stond to// dge slong de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang mdog tu mthong nas// thams cad zhabs
260b7(mdo): gnyis la 'dud par byed do// rigs sngags 'chang des brnyas par myi bya ste/ bdag la stod pa yang myi bya/ brta sa pa tsam gyis khyod bsod nams yongs su nyams par myo 'byung bar bya'o// 'phags pa'i dge slong
260b8(mdo): gi dgel 'dun du 'phrul chen pos stobs bcu dang ldan par dbugs byung bar bya ste/ mya des na brtas par myi bya'o// de nas grong khyer dang / rgyal mo'i po bra du 'jug par bya/ de das 'dus pa'i nang du 'dug
261a1(mdo): bar bya/ de nas grong dang tshang tshing dang / yul dang / ri brags kyi nang du 'jug par bya/ de nas btsun mo nang du 'jug par bya ste/ yul gyi skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / de dag thams cad
261a2(mdo): kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / mdog dang / rtags dang dbyibs su mthong zhing mchod pa chen po dang / rim 'gro sna tshogs byed par 'gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas yin no// zhes sla ste/ de bzhin gshegs
261a3(mdo): pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga 'thob po// yungs kar dang / til mar gyis rang gi 'khor gi spyi bor gtor cing byugs na/ thams cad lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / tri ze dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myo 'am
261a4(mdo): tsi dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs stond to// rkang pa til mar gis bskus la/ sa'i steng nas sor brgyad tsam gyis 'phags te/ nam/ nam mkha' la 'gro ste/ ji srid bum bkrus pa de srid du sangs rgyas
261a5(mdo): kyi cha byad du stonod to// mgon po s+yad ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang bde nang par sngar langs nas chang ma khrus byas te/ gos chang ma bgos nas khang steng du 'dug la/ 
261a6(mdo): yungs kar la ti la mar gos byugs nas/ phyogs bzhin gtor na/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / rgyal rig dang / bram ze dang / btsun mo dang / skyes dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad sgyu ma chen pos rmongs
261a7(mdo): par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang des nor bu bzhis dbu brgyan dang / 'theng ba byas la 'gos gdags so// tis mar gas yan sag cam sa bskus 'ar bya'o// bras pa thig le bya/ myig smad gyis phyis
261a8(mdo): bskyal/ byams bdag nyid la gda'/ ras bzang po mugacig 'go/ byang chub sems dpa'i byad du bya/ dong bu dang du bu dang / dbu brgyad dang / gapes srung gi bcings na/ de dag thams cad brgyad dang / 
261b1(mdo): sdud pa dang / nor bu dang / rdul dang / rdo rje dang / bye dur+ya sna tshogs kyis lus brgyan par snang ngo // yaka na pad ma thogs na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ki gzugs su snang ngo // yid la ji ltar/ 
261b2(mdo): bsams pa'i dod yod pa'i zhags pa'i tshul dang / tshangs pa'i rgyal dang / 'jig brgyad dang / yid bzhin nong bu dang / rgod ma'i kha dang / mgul sngon dang / rta 'phrin bya ston to// ji ltar gzugs yid la byas/ bde
261b3(mdo): ltar stond te/ ji srid du thig le yod cing / dbu brgyan thogs pa de srid du tshul sna tshogs stond par byed do// ti le mar dang nyangs kar bsres nas/ kyi de ku shA dang / lhan cig bsdus nas lus la bsku/ lag pa
261b4(mdo): g.yas na rdo rje phral par dbang phyug chen po'i thog le byas nas/ pad ma'i phye mas gtor ya/ nor bu'i spyi gtsug du bcing / myi deg sman kase mya ke bsku/ ku gu la kis bdug sa la/ shes rab can
261b5(mdo): khro bo'i lta ba'i tshul du byas na mngon sum du rdo rje 'chang ba'i thugs su snang ste/ de la the tso myo bya'o// ji srid du bdag khru sa byas pa/ de srid du rdo rje'i gzugs can snang la las sna tshogs
261b6(mdo): byed cing / myi dang 'jig rten thams cad kyis rdo rje 'chang nyid du sems te/ de la the tsom myi bya'o// seng ke'i khrag ki sa ti la mar dang nor bung smras nas// lus la bskus na mya'o me ge chen po'i gzugs su stond
261b7(mdo): to// phag gi khrag gis smras nas lus la skus na/ bag gi gzugs chen po stonang to// til ya dang phye ma lhan cig cig bslus nas/ yungs kar dang shing pa la sha'i mdog du byas la lus la skus na/ 
261b8(mdo): sred myed gise bu'i gzugs su bston to// rig sngags 'chang gis pad ma dang / tis a lhan cig smras la sus bskus na/ dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su stonang to// shipa ma rga li 'om dang nyis / 
262a1(mdo): 6/ dang mnyam par bskyab la bskul da/ tshangs pa'i gzugs su stod to// nang po che'i zhan dang tis mar spya nas bskus na/ tshogs kyis dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su stodang to// nga'i khrag dang / 
262a2(mdo): sbrus la lus su byugs na nga'i gzugs su stonang to// tes yar dang thing shod dang / pad sa 'i khyis dang / glang po che'i thog dang lhan tsog sbyar nas lus la bskus na/ nag la chen po'i gzugs mngon gsum du dang
262a3(mdo): ga gzugs su ston dal/ gang dang gang dag la rig le byas na/ gra mo'i tshogs kyi gzugs su ston to// sbrul gi khran dang / brags pa dang / til ma na rgyal po dang / lhad cig sprul pa// 
262a4(mdo): tshigs su bsdus zhing / dpung pa g.yon par bskus na/ klul rgyal po chen po li gzugs su ston to// ji ltar ji skad ka dang sbyar zhing / ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa de lce de ska gzus
262a5(mdo): su bston doto// de nas gnas myed khang la khang 'dod na/ yungs kar la tas mar gos baH/ sa nas/ dge 'dun gyi nang du sreng 'og/ du gtor/ phyems na bu'i rgyal mtshan na rtse mo kun tu bskus na/ 'dag 'dun nam
262a6(mdo): rims su bkang ba'i dbus su gzhas khang chen po rgyan gis brgyan pa bston to// dge slong rnams kyi ste ru gtor na/ dge slong thams cad gzugs sna tshogs yid la ji ltar byas pa bzhin/ rgyal po'i gzugs su
262a7(mdo): snang ba dang / gzhan dag blon po dang / gzhan dag 'thabs pa dang / gzhan dag 'dun na 'di na pa dang / gzhan dag yongs su spyod pa'i gzugs su ston na sa/ yungs kar ma bskus par ston na/ slar yang danan
262a8(mdo): 'dun rnams su snang ngo // shing a rka'i los yungs kam la bskus nas/ dge 'dun pa/ dbus su dge slong rnams kyi lam sgron gyi steng du gtor na/ ji lung dge slo thams cad 'khod pa ltar snang ngo po// ral pa'i zor
262b1(mdo): tshugs kyis brgyan pa la gtong na/ rgan po 'khar ba thogs pa'i sgur po stag dge skra dkar can nyams chung bar snang ngo // mas spyan gi steng du yungs kar gtong ba/ kil te mtshan thog thag bzhag na gzhan du myi 'gyur ro// 
262b2(mdo): lus gi steng na snod yod pa la gtor na de zur ma'i gzer dang / sbrul nag po snang ngo // snod ki steng du gtor na/ kham phor du snang bar 'gyur ro// btang ba'i snod spra ba cho sa byugs pa'o steng du gtong na/ phyag dang gau
262b3(mdo): phung por snang ngo // grong khyer ko sgo dang / grong khyer kun tu gtor na/ grong khyer kun nas myi snab par 'gyur ro// grong khyer nakun nas yungs kar dang / pad ma'i phye mas gtor na/ skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu
262b4(mdo): mo myo snang bar thams cad du snang bar 'gyur ro// seng ge'i khrag dang sbyar nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas shi steng du gtor na/ lam zhi gnyis do thams cad du seng ge'i gzugs su ston to// sde drag cing gtum la
262b5(mdo): yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa'i sdeng du gtong na/ thams cad wa'i gzugs su snang la phyogs bcu rgyug go// g.yul 'gyed par gtong na thams cad gnyid log par byas par 'gyur
262b6(mdo): la/ mchon cha thams cad dang go cha thams cad myo sbeng par byas par 'gyur ro// me'i ngam du gtor na myi snang bar rnams snang bar 'gyur ro// ti me par dang sbyar nas me'i nang du gtor na rtag u 'bab 'a
262b7(mdo): 'gyur ro// rgya'i dang du gtor na rgya gyi mngon par 'gyur ro// bum pa rgyas bkang la la gto da/ srog chags chul nang du gnas pa thams cad chu'on nas 'byong zhing / zang la gnas so// chal shinang
262b8(mdo): du yungs gang gis gtong na/ me tog dang 'bras bu kyi snang bar gyur ra pa thams cad sdang zhing shing skam po dang / chal gis zar me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad stod to// nam mkhal sa gto na/ phyogs rje
263a1(mdo): 1/ yi dgel 'dud ginang dram/ 'dus pa'i nang ngas// skye bo mang po'i nang du me tog gi char rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'bab ste/ wA'aM blo legs par sbyin pa yid dga' ba chis par byed pa 'bab po/ 
263a2(mdo): las dang ldan pa'am/ bzo'i las kyi gnas te las kyi snod thams cad la til mar gi rgyal pos byugs la/ phye mas bsku'o// pad ma chen po'i phye mas 'khor gi gnas bsku la/ yungs kar gos phyogs bzhir
263a3(mdo): gtor la// de nas las ko ga zo bzang po ji ltar ba bzhin stond par 'dod na/ las kyi snod de dang de dag nyid g.yol las kyi gzo'i tshul bzang po mthar phyind pa rnam pa du ma dag stond pa byed pa nyon tshod byed pa 'byung
263a4(mdo): ste/ gal te phyir bzlos pas byas na/ rin 'i lha ji lta ba de/ de ltar nyo tshong byed do// rgya dang sungs kar gis bzlog pa byas/ na/ s+yo snang bar 'gyur la/ dpag tshad brgya tsam gi bar du 'dzin
263a5(mdo): de dang de nyid du myi snang bar 'gyur ro// rdza 'khan gi 'khor lo// la phye mas byug cing / yungs kar chags par byas la pad ma chen po'i phye mas gtor nas 'jim pa bzhag la/ snod kyi ngo bo ji ltar
263a6(mdo): 'dod pa bzhin bya ste/ snod ko ngo bo rdul las byas pa 'am/ gsor las byas pa 'am/ zangs las byas pa 'am/ lugs pas byas pa 'am/ lugs lnga las byas pa rin po che bzang po sna tshogs kyis spras
263a7(mdo): pa/ ji lta ba de lta bu'i snod bkram pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur la// nyo tshong byed pa yang 'byung ste/ rin chen pos tshong byed do// yungs kar gyi phye mas dang / pad ma'i phye ma lhan cig sbyar nas
263a8(mdo): tshong dus kyi dbus su gtong na/ kun tu zong bkram pa'i snod myi snang bar byas pa thams cad snang bar byed do// zag pa'i steng du gtor na sprul chen por ston to// khyim dbang ba'i dngos dang / sgo dang / shong sbyarang ba dang / 
263b1(mdo): ka pa'i steng du gtor na khang pa dang / ra ba dang / 'khor gi khyams rnams sprul du stonang to// ji srid dur+tha dang / nyungs kar gi bzlog pa ma byas pa de srid du sprul pa rnams 'dug go// bzlog pa byas na phyi snang bar
263b2(mdo): 'gyur ro// gcugasag khang dang / lha'i gnas ngasas/ khang bzangs kyi ngos la gtor na/ sprul chen por snang ngo // lha'i steng du gto dmyig san gis sku/ re sus yig le byas na/ swA'i gzugs brnyan de kun/ 
263b3(mdo): ku co 'don cing 'gro ste gar 'dod pa der 'gro'o// bzlog pa byas na phyir 'dug go// sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi zhabs la byugs la phye mas gtor na/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs g.yol bar mdzad/ bzhad
263b4(mdo): par mdzad/ 'chang bar mdzad do// tsan dan la bzlas brjod bya/ das nas 'dug na/ phyir bzhugs so// bum pa sprang rtsis byuH/ pa rnams sa gtor na/ g.yo bar byed de ci tsam du phyir bzlog pa ma byas
263b5(mdo): pa de tsam du g.yol// chu dang yungs kar gis bzlog na byi na phyir 'dug go// de nas rdo rje bskyod papa 'dod na/ prang hU~M/ kyil 'khor byas la me tog dgram ste/ mu gul gi bdug pas 'dug
263b6(mdo): de yang yungs kar dang / phye ma dang bcas pas gtor la don yod po'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ rdo rje de dkyil 'khor las langs nas/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar byed/ 'phar bar byed/ 'dug
263b7(mdo): bar byed/ 'bar bar byed cing / phan tshun 'gro bar byed/ mtho' bar 'grol bar byed/ dpal bar 'gro bar byed/ 'bar ba chen pos 'bar bar byed de/ ji srid du bzlog pa ma byas pa de sring bu nam mkha' la'

264a1(mdo): ku kul lo bdug pas kyang bdug nas/ 'khor lo lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas/ til mar kis rgyal pos bsku/ phye mas bsku/ lte' ba'i gnas su thig le byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus

268b1(mdo): myed khang bzhin du de yang gzhal byed khang snang ste/ r-i de la ring po'o shong sdon pa sna tshogs snang ngo // me tog snang tshogs gis gzhal myed khang snang ngo po// sa la dang / ta la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / 
268b2(mdo): a sho ka dang / a hi shug ta ka dang / pa ri sho ka dang / ka dam pa dang / ni la dang / bAta la dang / pa la sha dang / u dum pa la dang / dong ka'i me tog sna tshogs dang / snga ma'i me tog dang / tA na dang / na ba A li ka dang
268b3(mdo): kub bya ka sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ro// bya'i tshogs sna tshogs sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa dang / ridags kyi tshogs sna tshogs kyis gang ba snang bar 'gyur ro// gang ka tshe byad bsdu bar byed par 'dod pa
268b4(mdo): de'i tshe gnas gzhan du 'gro bar 'byed/ gzhan yang dgos pasna tshogs pa sna tshogs la rang gi blo gros la ji ltar snang ba bzhin bya ra'o// dgos pa thams cad la rab tu sbyar ba ni klog pa tsam gas
268b5(mdo): 'grub par 'gyur ro// // don yod pa'i chen po'i dkyil 'khor ka rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga gsang ba'o// don yod pa'i sgyu ma rnam par 'phrul pa' zhes bya'i sgrub pa'i cho ga ni/ de nas
268b6(mdo): de'i 'og tu phyags rgya bri ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ rtags mtshon phyag rgya'i de nyid ni// pad ma rgyas dang sna tshogs mtshon// / pad mkhan byed bye ba/ phyag dag na ni rab tu 'dzind// phyag gnyis phyung zhing
268b7(mdo): brgyan nas kyang // bskum pa 'dzin stangs de nyid kyi// kun nas/ 'phreng ba'i 'bar ba'i rtags// mtshon cha phyag rgya bsnams pa ni// 'di lta ster la kr-i dang / mthung zung dang / mdal po che dang / mdub rtse gsu
268b8(mdo): pa dang / yi de bzhin gyi nor bu dang / rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'breng zhus dang / las ki rdo rje dang / zur gsum sa zhes bya ba dang / 'khor lo dang / dub dang / tho ba dang / 'gas pa dang / dgra sta dang / dbyug tong / 
269a1(mdo): me gtog gi zhum po dang / bum la kang ba dang / rin po che'i snod dang / pad ma'i 'brang ba dang / rdo rje 'phreng 'bum dang / ud pa la 'phred pa dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba dang / pad ma dang / ud pa la dang / zla ba
269a2(mdo): a dang / ri re ba dang / mi pa dang / me long dang / kru dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / be con dang / gshin rje'i be con dang / chu srin gi kha dang / sngags do'i 'phreng ba dang / mdung che gsum pa'i 'phreng zlum
269a3(mdo): dang / bsdigs pa dang / bsgyings pa dang / dbugs 'byind pa dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / mchog sbyin pa dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang / glegs bam bsdams pa dang / 'khar sil dang / lhung gzed dang / gdugs dang / dbul
269a4(mdo): brgyan dang / nor bu brgyus pa dang / gser skud dang / mu tig kazer ba dang / rdu bu dang / dpung brgyan dang / rno cha dang / me'i thab khung du kun nal 'breng phyag rgya de// sna tshogs rmad du byung bas smras/ 
269a5(mdo): mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa'i// pad ma 'dzind la rab tu/ gnas// ras la bris pa 'am dkyil 'khor ram// chog pa/ 'am gang yang rung ba la// mtshon ci rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ 
269a6(mdo): macan ma snacig gang bris pa mthong bde/ ngan 'gromams can dmyas par ni// byang yang 'gro bar myi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dbang gis tug mchog sbyin// migu pa thams cad rnam par spangs// gang zhig
269a7(mdo): nges byas kyi bzod pa/ mtshams myed lnga po byed pa nyid// mnar myed pa'i gnas dang mi// dmyal ba dag tu gzhol ba dang // phyag skyed dag mthong tsam gyis// 'gro ba thams cad zang par 'gyur// skye dang
269a8(mdo): 'chi las rnam par grol// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshol rgyal bar 'gyur// de dag skye ba phyi mer ni// phyir yang mngal gis myi gos te// yang dang yang du pad ma las// rdzus te skye ba dag tu 'gyur// rtag tu'ang ba
269b1(mdo): can du'agro// gang da 'dren pa tshed pag byed/ bzhugs pa'i spyad pa rtag byed pa// skye 'gyung tshotshom sa bzhig/ dod rnams bde bar byab 'gyur dang // rig sngags pa tshogs 'a bar 'gyub// bde ba pa gyis
269b2(mdo): 'khor 'grub 'gyur zhing // rtag tu myo logs gnas 'gyur// phyag sgyu 'di dag mthor tsam gas// sangs rgyas byang chub dang mnyam 'byung // dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la// pra myed dge ma bskyed par
269b3(mdo): 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di deng pha rol tu// bsod nams phung po chen po 'thol// de nas dkyil 'khor rab bshad pa// de nyid grub pa'i phyag rgya rnams// 'jig rten 'di deng pha rol tu// 'dod pa thams cad
269b4(mdo): rab tu sbyin// sdug pa thams cad mod la sel// ka bzhi ngag mtshams myed byed pa dag/ myi 'azad mnar myed gnas pa'i// sdig pa thams cad 'jog par 'gyur// dmyal ba'i sgo
269b5(mdo): rnams bcad nas ni// mtho 'aris sgo phye the tsom myed// sgo bye byur da pa rnams la ni// sangs rgyas zhing rnams sdang b.ra'agyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ 
269b6(mdo): 'gon po 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor mthong gos sems can phyi myi ldog par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di mthong na// shi 'phos pa'o mod sa ni// bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 
269b7(mdo): dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa tsam gyi se kar na thub pa 'dren pa'i 'od dpag myed bzhugs pa'i pho brang du myur du 'jug par 'gyur ro// dkyile 'khor gru bzhi lam pa la// kun nas cha ni mdzes par bya// gru bzhi
269b8(mdo): ko la'i tshad tsam la// sgo bzhi tham smras bzhi yis brgyan// sho nad tu legs par bskus dang ldan// 'jam shing mnyen la mnyam pa'i// sa'i cha dang mnyam pa la// dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis
270a1(mdo): dbyel// dkyil 'khor de nyid thog btab la// phyag rgya bri ba rnam par dbye// phyogs bzhi mchen mnyam pa'i// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor snying po yon// gru bzhi pa la kun nas kha khyed gi rnam pa dang
270a2(mdo): mdupa che gsum kha'i 'breb la rnam papa bya'o// gru bzhi pa'i dbus su phyag don sod pa'o zhags pa'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar la bla na myed pa dang / phyag rgyan gos brgyan 'tshon ci sna tshogs kyis bri'o// dbus kyi dkyil
270a3(mdo): 'khor lo pha rol gyi gnas su/ phyag rgya bri pa yang shinang tu mdzes par bya'o// dkyil 'khor kun nas gos dang ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan gyis rgyan la/ kun tu yungs kang dkar po gtong ngo // phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gi/ 
270a4(mdo): pha rol dkyo gnas su phyogs bzhi kun tu bya ba nisas kau lho bas sa dang bsres la/ shaned tu legs par byugs pa dang / ldan padal mtshon ci phye mas kha khyer kau rnam pa dang / kun nas pad ma chen po sa
270a5(mdo): 'phreng ba'i rkyen chen po dang / mtshon cha bris la/ 'di'i sgo yang na mapar 'byes par bri'o// ji lta phyag rgya dang mthun pa'i ro sa tshogs kau ga tor ma gzhag par bya ste/ phyag rgya re re la yang mchod
270a6(mdo): yon phul sa/ dbyib mgro/ bum pa dang / kham bor dang / rnge'u gtor mas bkang la gzhag go// kun nas bum pa gang ba dang / bdug spos gi ni snod dag dang // me tog 'bras bu snga tshogs pa'i// gtor ma dkar // 
270a7(mdo): dag giseng dag // me tog rnam par bkras byas la// gzha kun tu 'phreng bas gzhag par bya// 'phreng ba 'azang po gzhag nas kyang // de bzhin kun tu bdug spos dbul// a ru dang / can ngan dang / du dum
270a8(mdo): ska dang / sa/ la ki dang / spr-ig ka dang / gu kul dang / sra mi bog dang / sbron shong dang / bla dang / ka pyar go bdug pa' 'di dag gis bdug la/ gtor ma dang / me tog dang lha bshos dbul lo// phyag rgya'i
270b1(mdo): dkyil 'khor du 'jug pas don yod pa'i rgyal po dran par byas ste bskor la/ phyag rgya 'i dkyil 'khor la phyag bya zhi de/ phyag rgya thams cad la dgram zhong me tog rtor ro// gang phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid gsang ba 'di dang / 
270b2(mdo): phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di bsgrul bka dgos pa la/ sngar dkyil 'khor phyag rgyal dang bcas pa mchog tu mdzes par byas la/ phyi selas thams cad bya'o// rig sngags 'chang la chang ma yas// chang ma'i ni
270b3(mdo): gos bgos pa la// dzaM ltar dkyil 'khor cho ga gzhin// dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug par bya// ji ltar dkyil 'khor la dgos pa// de bzhin du ni las bya'o// phyag rgyu'i dkyil 'khor bla myed pa// dkyil
270b4(mdo): 'khor 'dod ni zhugs pa tsam go// thub pa snang mdzad kyis gsungs pa'o// spyi'i rigs ni thams cad du// phyag rgya ladakrigs dang gtams rnams kyi// dam tshig rab tu shes par
270b5(mdo): 'gyur// spyi zhes kun gi cho ga yin// de tshig rjes zhug/ sa de bzhin no// dkyil 'a kun tu zhugs pa dang // rgyal bas lung ni bstond par gyur// kun gzigs de bzhin
270b6(mdo): gshegs pa'o// phyag ni spyi bo 'jog par mdzad// chos kyi ron bdun ci la// gzil brjid mod la 'jug par 'gyur// rnam snang mdzod gsungs dkyis suH/ don yod dngos grub gsol bar mdzad
270b7(mdo): phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gang bzhugs pa// gang du spyi'i rigs rnams kyi// don yod dngos grub mchog myur 'thob// sangs rgyas bye ba gang gi'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu la pha dku'i de
270b8(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du dge ba'i che ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// bsod nams ga phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ yon tan gyi phan yon 'di dag ni// che 'di'i yon par khong du chud par bya'o// bde ba
271a1(mdo): can ka 'jig rten gi khams su bad la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par zhing 'od zer 'bar ba'i lus dang ldan zhi de/ tshe bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu myed par 'gyur ro/ 
271a2(mdo): yon tan thams cad dri ma myed par snang ba don yod par rnam par 'phrul ba bston dang bkod pa zhes bya ba li ting nge 'dzind 'thob ste/ gang ting nge 'dzind thob pas sgyu ma chen po lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdzu
271a3(mdo): 'phrul gyi tshe/ bstan pa bston par byed do// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lho'i spyi'o// rogs de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi rjes su 'jug papa 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod
271a4(mdo): sbyin dang / rdzi za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkhal lding dang / lto/ 'phye chen po dang / mya nga myi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du gyu rang nas rtag tu rjes su 'brad byur 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang
271a5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor 'byord/ ba kazigs nas/ bsrung ba dang / bskya pa dang / sba ba mdzadapar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad phyi bzhin 'bra
271a6(mdo): zhib/ mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro// rgyal po lo btsun mo la 'khor dang bcas pa rnams pa kyis mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyis gcig tu bla mar byed par
271a7(mdo): 'gyur ro// nad thams cad skyed par 'gyur ro// sgrib pa thams cad nam yang dag par 'gyur ro// mtshan ma zhi ba'i phyag rgya rgyal 'khor rdzog na'o// // de das sbyin grags kyi cho dkyis 'am
271a8(mdo): bshad par bya ste// rig sngags 'chang ba rnam par dag gi de nyid bsgrub pa bslab pa'i byor// lci'o ngogs rnams thams cad kyi// cho ga zhib mo bu myed yin// gang gos sbyin srigs byas tsam gyis
271b1(mdo): phyogs kun rnam par gzigs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa byon 'byung tsom// byang chub sems dpa' dgongs par 'gyur// rig sngags dngos byab rjes su tshol cing // rtag bya baphru mdzad par 'gyur/ 
271b2(mdo): 'gon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// thetsom byed par myur du byon// 'gon po 'khor bcas gnas nyid na// rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur// 'dod pa thams cad rtag tu grol// rtag tu
271b3(mdo): mchog ni stsol ba nyid// nyid dang mtshan du rtaka bar ni// rnam par gzigs 'byung the tshom myed// dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi shi nad tu mdzes par bya ba ni// rgya mam 'o ko la'i
271b4(mdo): tshad tsam la legs 'ang byugs yazhon bu 'jam pa/ shi dang tu gsal pa/ gru bzhi pa/ sgo bzhi dang / thes smras pa zhi dang ldan pa/ rnam par 'byes pa/ mchod tu mdzem
271b5(mdo): dbus kyi dkyil 'khor lo snying po yang bya'o// me'i gnas kyi 'akyil 'khor no// phra bzhi nyid kyi rnam pa la// kun na sa them skas bzhi de/ ngag dang // steng du kra ni bzhi pa bya// 
271b6(mdo): rtag tu pad ma'i snying po dang // snying po rgyas pa'i ster du yang // / kun nas pad ma mdzes par bya// grA grar pad ma'i 'phreng ba bya// de bzhin du grA gnyis kar rdo rje pad ma dang bcas pa bya'o// 
271b7(mdo): gsum par mdung che gsum pa pad ma dang bcas pa'o// bzhil bar 'khor lo pad ma bcas pa'o// lnga 'a bum pag pa bzhag go// sna tshogs mtshon gyis rnam par mdzes 'a ba li// kun nas
271b8(mdo): pad ma'i myu gu bya// rin na snod ni bkang ba dang // me tog 'phreng bang dang ba dang // bye ma pad mar bcas pa dang // de bzhin me tog rigs dag nyid// de bzhin sna tshogs brgyan pa'o// nub
272a1(mdo): kyi gnas dang kra dag tu// pad ma li 'ong ba ma ud pa la bcas// bum pa rung bas bkang ba bri// tsha ba'i bum pa dbu ma la// 'dir ni kha khyer thig dang gdang // de nas dkyil 'khor
272a2(mdo): mdzes bya ba// thig kau smye nas cha bsnyam zhig/ sgo bzhi mdzes par bya ba ni// tshon snga lnga'i skud pas gdape// me 'bar mdog can bri ba'i ni// kun nas 'bar ba'i 'breng ba can// mA dang mrar ni me
272a3(mdo): lha bri// sus ni mi mdog 'bar ba dang // ya ka na me 'bar 'dzin pa dang // mtshan ma sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang // cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga bzhin// ba dan mda' dang sna
272a4(mdo): lnga'i// skud pas bum pa kang kris dang // de bzhin// bdug spos snod dag gis// kun nas dkyil 'khor brgyan pa/ ra bya// sna tshogs gzugs can rgya che ba'i// sna tshogs
272a5(mdo): gtos gzhag/ rnge'u kham por rnam pa gsun // dkar pos bkang ba gzhag par bya// rnge'u dang dpag dumano// gtong mas bkang ba kun tu gzhag/ 'bras bu rnam
272a6(mdo): sna tshogs gzhag/ kun nas me tog dgras bya zhing // 'brel ba sna tshogs gzhag par bya// 'bras gos grangs kang gtor nas ni// kun tum me 'bar ba dang // sna tshogs ni da de bzhin du/ 
272a7(mdo): rje bye ma lhan pa zhes dag/ dkyil 'khor kun la gzhag par bya// dkyis 'khor dag na sems cad la// thugs gzang du ba rtag tu gzhag/ shing mi ma na na mi dang // yungs kar 'anaman
272a8(mdo): mo ba dang // zhun mar dpa na mar gang dang // kun tusan dan kor 'ongs// spyan sreg cho ga 'di bzhag ste// dus gsum tag tu ga 'dzin gyis// skyon sreg brgyad cha 'argyang rgya
272b1(mdo): rig pa 'dzid pa chang ma'i// chang malani gos bgos la// kar gsum kyi ni zas bza' zhing // gzhan ni bza' dang spyad myi bya// dkyil 'khor zhi/ nub sgo nas// dkyil 'khor shes pa 'jun/ 
272b2(mdo): bya zhib// rung pa'i stan la dkyil klung du// shar phyogs kha bltas 'dug par bya// byams pa'i sems la mnyam bzhag ste// don yod rgyal pos dran bya zhing // snga dro'i dus su sbyin sreg bya// 
272b3(mdo): kur la slob ma gzhug bya nog// s+ya'o ngogs kyi bsreg lugs ni// phye 'brid dadus su bya'o// gang zhig dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa// sbyin ses dkyil 'khor de nyid dang // grub pa kun tu / 
272b4(mdo): kayis// bdag nyid dbang skur byed kun gyi// sbyin sreg byed pa'i mchog tu gsungs// kun tu gnas ni thams cadan// rgyas pa gnas mchog ra cig dang // gar dge de ba'i
272b5(mdo): phur bu dang // mdun na 'dod pa me lha'i no// skyon sreg byed pa 'jig rten par// mtshungs shes stond pasalung bstond to// 'jig rten 'das pa'i las sgrub pa/ 
272b6(mdo): rig 'dzin dbang po chen po dang // phyag rdo rje tshangs pa dong // khyam 'jug dbang phyug chen po dang // mnyam pa bas kyang lhag pa nyid// myo'i skyon sregs byed pa la// de bzhin gshegs
272b7(mdo): kun byin gyis brlol// gas te zhag 'dun dus gsuM du// de las stsogs pa'i las rnams ni// me ma sbyin sregs byed pa mo// maungs mngon shes lnga thob ces// de dang 'jig rten
272b8(mdo): 'dren pa gsung // las 'di byas nas de nas ni// sbyin sregs las ni brtsam par bya// bsreg lugs sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis// las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyung // lha rnams rtag tu
273a1(mdo): 'od 'byung zhing // de bzhin gshegs kun dgyes par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' byon nas ni// mod la mthong ba sbyin par mdzad// sdig pa thams cad sregs par 'gyur// shin cu s+yai/ 
273a2(mdo): bzad sngon go las// bsreg lugs tsam gyi mod la bsreg// 'bar ba'i me yis phye leb bzhin// de la spogs pa'i ldog pa ni// sreg 'gyur 'don the tsom myed// sdang 'byor ni rgyal nyid dang // dge
273a3(mdo): zhing yod na bde ba dang // lus can dag ni thams cad la// rtag tu dga' bar byed cing gnas// rtag tu myili lha nyid ni// rgyun gyi mthong 'ar 'dod pa yis// skyes sbyin sregs byas tsam byis// me lha nyi na
273a4(mdo): zhugs 'gyur te// rtag tu las ni thams cad mdzad// rgyunang tu bya bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// lA ni rtag tu 'ong 'gyur zhing thams cad dun mthong ba ste// rgyu skar zla ba nyi ma dang // shid
273a5(mdo): rje dang ni rtse lha dang // rgyal po chen po bzhin po dag// dpung bcas gzhon par bcas pa 'am// nyin dang mtshan du rtag tu no// rjes 'bra srung zhing the tsom myed// dza m+b+hi rig sngags 'chang ngo/ 
273a6(mdo): yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po sgrub par 'don na/ rig sngags 'a pacha'am des shin tu khrus byas la/ gos changs bgo bar bya/ nyon zhag cig ltung ba byas zhing / shibs rgam sam bsreg shing gas
273a7(mdo): swAngs/ pad sa dang / kun mong dang / 'bras mo pa'i skyon meg brgyad brgyad byas na/ bsreg sugs gan cig byas pas// mtshams myed pa su myod pa mang 'gyur te/ 'das bcom myong pa dang / yid
273a8(mdo): gnyis bskyed par myi bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tu spyi'i rogs kyi dngos su pa 'dod// ngag sngags 'chang ngas byang chub kyi na ngag mi mar ya/ rigs sor ba sa dang / ud pas thos
273b1(mdo): dang / yungs kar dkar po dang / zhun mar bsres pa'i spyon sreg brgyad brgya byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams can gyi s+ya'i rigs kyi dngos grub thob ste/ thams cad cho ga chen po zho be mo dang spyi/ sreg chen po'i
273b2(mdo): cho gar 'gyur ro// de nas pha rold kyi dag tshogs gzhom par 'dod na/ rig sngags 'chang chang ma des shin tu khrus byas la/ gom chang ma bgos te me pa ldeng go me s+phar la/ zho dang zhun mar dang / yungs kar
273b3(mdo): dang / ku gul ka bsreg lugs kyis sbyin sregs brgyad stong byas na/ dpag tshad sto/ cad kyi dpag tshogs btso pe la bya la 'gyur ro// phra rol dkyi dmag tshogs dang / dgra bcom par 'dod pa dang / dpung
273b4(mdo): gshig par 'dod na/ de nas rige sngags 'chang kos shing ka/ ra bi ra ka'i ma spar la/ sbrul ga legs pa rjes pa dang / skye tshe'o// sa bon lanaH/ 'bras sa lu dang / bsres pa yungs kar dang
273b5(mdo): sbyar bar sbyin sreg byas na/ dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi pha rol kyi dmag tshogs dang / dgral la kan ma lugs chen po dang / rmya zang mo 'bab pas 'phongs pa dang / yid myo bdel bskyed par
273b6(mdo): 'gyur/ ngam thams cad rnam par 'jog par 'gyur ro// klus char 'babs par 'dod na/ rig sngags 'chang des nyid zhag cig sbyang ba byas/ shinang tu khrus byas mams dri sna tshogs dang / me tog go
273b7(mdo): 'breng pa dang yungs kar dang / sha ta pus pa zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i skyod sreg mtshan gcig la dus gsum du byas na/ klu'i rgyal po chen pos cha ga rgyun chen po 'bebs te/ 'jas pa slong mtha' dag tu zhag
273b8(mdo): bdun ka bor du cang 'bab par 'gyur ro// char de nyid gtsa ngo ches na thal ba nas mkha' la gtong na/ ha cha tsha ches pachad par 'gyur ro// yang ma lha'obabam 'dod cing // rang ko ga zugs su ma nga
274a1(mdo): 'dod na/ rig sngags 'chang chang ma/ des gos tshang ma bgos la nyin zhag chog gnas pa gyur dbas/ rgo snga ma'i yi spangal 'bras so la dang / zhun mar dang / bu ma kha dang bcas pa dang / 
274a2(mdo): cha ba gsum dang / sna ba'i me tog bsres pa brgyad stong sbyin meg bya'o// brgyad stob pa pa dang / skye lA mye'i nang nas lus phyed phyung ste/ 'dug nas rig sngag 'chabs kyi gyi bka' tshul cig ces zer zhing / 
274a3(mdo): ji ltar rige sngags 'chang gi cho ga'adon du 'gyur ya bzhin du smra'o// thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba mchog thams cad ston pa zhes bya ba bdun mi 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i me'i kha kha'i mchog smyon par byed/ 
274a4(mdo): kang bdud tsa 'bar ba'i me'i kha thob pas/ gang du dbugs/ byang la/ brngubs pa de mye 'bar bar 'byung bar 'byur ro// kadu phu zhes bya ba der 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mun nas du dbyugs
274a5(mdo): byang na// s+ye 'bar te snang bar 'gyur ro// tsan dan kar po sbyin sregs brgya dam brgyad byas pas// 'phags pa spyan ras kags dbang phyug nyid kyi gzugs ston par mdzad do// ma 'on/ 
274a6(mdo): bdun gyi skyon sreg gis ni nad thams cad sbyin par byed do// 'bras so ba'i spyon sreg gis ni rgyal po dang dbang du byed do// byab sa dang / lan cha'i skyon sreg gos na zhe 'ams par byed do// 'bras lungs dang / 
274a7(mdo): yungs kar gi skyon sreg gis ni sems can dbang du byed do// nyungs kar dang ka gul dang / zhun mar dang sbyin sreg gis ni gnod sbyin 'gugs so// kar bi re'i me tog dang / ku gu u pa dang sprul ba'i spyosbyin
274a8(mdo): sregs kas srin mo 'gugs so// de bzhin du 'dir las thams cad byed do// sbyin sregs ka dkyil 'khor ga cho ga'o// ri mo'i'angadakyil 'khor gyi bsgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste// kun tu thun
274b1(mdo): mor sgrub pa'i mchog/ dge ba'i las kun byed pa ste// sangs rgyas thams cad mthong 'gyur zhi // bla myed bsod nams chen po stsogs// don yod pa'i rgyal po de nyid ni// rnam par sna sna tshogs gzugs
274b2(mdo): dag tu// 'jig rten 'dren pa snang bar bya// mthul dang dngos grub sna chog pa'i// 'jig rten 'dren pa'i gzugs bya ba// grub pa'i sna tshogs byed pa'i gnas// so so gzugs su bya ba ni// ngas sam
274b3(mdo): yang na dang dka la// 'jigs pa myed pas gzugs bya'o// don yod pa'i rgya 'on khyag tsam gi tshed dam/ yang na tshad shind tu rnam par mdzes la/ pad ma'i mdog lta bu phyag brgyad pa/ dbu' gsu
274b4(mdo): ba de bzhin du spyan sum pa zhi ba'o zhal du bri bar bya ste/ de ba zhin du zhags pa 'dzin par dang // pad ma 'dzind pa dpas dang tshe gsum pa dang / ril ba spyi'u lugs 'dzind pa dang
274b5(mdo): yid bzhin gyi nor bu dpa/ be con dang / dbyugs 'byin pa/ dang / 'dra ba 'phreng dang/ me tog ko zlum po 'dzin par bya'o// g.yon du ni ker mo so// g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma
274b6(mdo): thal mo sbyar la dbya' yod tsam 'dud pa/ rgyan thams cad gis brgyan pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kau ral pa'i thor tshugs can/ dpya brgyan 'od dpag myed kyis brgyan pa
274b7(mdo): g.yas phyogs kyi rebu zla ba tshes pas brgyan pa ri dgas kyi pags pa banabs pa/ mchod phyir thog pa rgyan thams can kyis rgyan pa/ 'od 'dom kang dang ldan pa'o// nang rime du pad sal 'phreng ba byan// 
274b8(mdo): rim pa gnyis la rdo rje'i 'phreng ba lugs kyu dang bcas par ro// rim pa gsum pa nor bu rin po che'i 'phreng ba dang / rin blo sna tshogs mdzes pa'o// rim pa bzhi par mdung che gsum pa'i 'phreng ba'o// 
275a1(mdo): rim pa lnga par kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba bya'o// steng dang g.yas phyogs kyis gnas su dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po me tog sna tshogs thogs par bya'o// 
275a2(mdo): agayon du gzhon nu dang / gshin rje dang / lus ngan dang / dbang phyug dang / lha'i bu rnams bya ba na me tog sna tshogs par thogs par bya'o// lha mo sgrol ma'i rgyab tu khro bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i zhags pa bya
275a3(mdo): ba ni khros pa gtum kha'i gzugs 'chang ba phyag bzhi pa 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs pa/ sku rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ral ba 'chang ba 'od dpag myed kyi dbu rgyan can s+yan gsum pa/ g.yas
275a4(mdo): bzla bas brgyan tsong / ral gro 'dzind pa dang / zhags pa 'dzi dand pa dang / mdung tshe gsum po 'dzind pa dang / dgra sta 'dzin da bar bya'o// kar mo'i rgyaladu rig sngags kyi rgyal po
275a5(mdo): dbu gsum pa bya ba ni zho ba'i zhalangs can/ rgyan thams cadakyis brgyan pa/ dbu rgyan rgyal ba 'od dpag myed can thogs papad ma 'dzind pa dang / nor bu rin po che chen po 'dzind par
275a6(mdo): 'gyur ro// 'og tu pho nya mo dang / dbyangs can ma dang / du can ma dang / dpal mo dang / gnas ma dang / dpe' myed pa dang / ral bcig ma dang / pho nya mo bzhi dang / me tog ki lha dang / sa'i lha dang / rgyal po
275a7(mdo): chen po bzhi bya'o// steng dang g.yas phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi ske gzugs dkyil mo krung bcas pa sor bzhi'o ched tsam bya'o// nyi me dang zla b.li lha'i rgyu skar dang bcas pa bya'o// ri mo'o gzum
275a8(mdo): kyi phyi rol kyi rim pa kun tu phyag rgya dang phyag mtshan sna tshog rdzogs par bri'o// klu brgyad bya zhing kun nas 'bar ba dang bcas par bya'o// rig sngags dngos grub bla myed pa'i// ri mo'i cho ga'i kanra/ 
275b1(mdo): 'di ni// sdig pa thams cad mod la sel// mtshams myed lnga pho spyod par byed// phyag rgya dang ni dkyil 'khor dang // bcas pa dngos grub 'di ni spyi'o rags thams cad du 'jug par stond pa yin no
275b2(mdo): spyi'i rigs thams cad kyi de khong nyid kyi ri mo'i dkyil 'khom 'di ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs pa'o// don yod pa'i byin brlabs
275b3(mdo): kyi ri mo 'di ni// thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi ni/ rlabs pa ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i de kho na nyid snying por gyur da pa bde kho na nyid gsang ba 'od mthong ba tsam gis rnam par thard pa 'thob cing lung
275b4(mdo): bstan par 'gyur ro// mthong ba tsam gi ma cho ga zhi la mo \u0f7fdan myed pa thams cad 'gyub 'o// rnam par mdzad snad kyi 'khorakau dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan par sna ba byed pa gang ga
275b5(mdo): klung gi bye ma brgya stong phrag dgu bcul chang dgu'i mngon gsu ma du mthong bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags cho ga bla myed pa// spyir zhes 'di nyid mthong ba ni// thub pa rnam pabasnang
275b6(mdo): sadad kyis bstan// de bzhin gshegs rig grub pa dang // kong yang bang ba'i rigs de bzhin// nor rigs de nyid 'byung ba dang / rdo rje'i rigs gang bu byed la// spyir shes 'di nyid mthong ba ni
275b7(mdo): ri mo mthong ba'i khyad par yin// phyir yang ngan 'gror myi 'gro zhing // dmyal ba li ngan 'gro'i sgo bcad de// mtho 'a ris kyi ni sgo yang phye// bla na myed pa ston dpa'i// phyag rgya mo dkyil 'khor 'di
275b8(mdo): bsod nams phran byed pa yin// ji ste don yod payi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong bar 'dod na/ rigs sngags 'cha bdes cad dan kapa 'o sas 'phags pa byang ngas gzigs dbang phyug song rgyad / 
276a1(mdo): tshad tsam byas la gnad byi gnas kyi che'i sor tshad kyi shin tu rnam par mdzes pa dbu dang / 'gur dang / rkyed pa dang / pus mo dang / yan lag dang / zhabs kyi tshogs dang / phyag sor dang / phyag so rga/ 
276a2(mdo): tshigs dang / sen mo thams cad mnyam zhing mdzes pa dang / ral pa dang / sen mo tshad shin tu mdzes shing cod pan gyi rgyal ba'i g.yas phyogs na thags can/ zhi ba'i gzugs can spyan gsum pa/ phyag shin
276a3(mdo): tu mdzes pa dang / dbul sgra shi nad tu mdzes pa/ rkyen thams kyis brgyan pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ zhags pa 'dzind pa/ g.yon pa 'od dpag myed can phyag na pad ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas na mdupa che gsum
276a4(mdo): pa dang / dbugs 'byin cing rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad pa/ pad ma'i bdan la bzhug par bya'o// sgrol ma dang dkar mo yang 'od 'dom gang dang bcas par dgod do// 'gon po shi nad tu mdzes
276a5(mdo): pa nor bu dang / mu tig gi rkyen po mtshams su gser gi rkyen rgyas g.yogs pa'i cod pan nam/ yang na spyi chug du ring sel gzha ga par byas la/ tsan dan kar po'i dkyil 'khor byo zhing / gur chu
276a6(mdo): dang / b+h+ra rtsi dang / ga pung gis mchod la/ dkyil 'khor gi snying po 'ang li dbus su pad ma ke sar dang bcas pa/ snying po dang bcas pa/ 'dab ma sum brgya cha gnyis pa bris la/ de'i dbus su 'jigs pa myed du/ 
276a7(mdo): 'jig rten dbang phyug dang gi cod pan gyis bcings pa gzhag la/ a ka ru dang / tsan dan gyi bdug pa dbul zhing / me tog bkram par bya/ me tog gi 'breng bas mchod par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang chang mar gyur
276a8(mdo): bzhind du khrus byas pa/ gos tshangs bgos pas sbyang ba byas la/ 'gon po 'jig rten dbang phyu/ mngon du phyogs par dkyil mo grum bcas te 'dug la/ mchod yon dang lha bshos phul la byams po'i seMs
276b1(mdo): dang mnyam par bzhag ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bsgom mo// sems can thams cad la rtse pA gyu rad pa'i ting nge 'dzind yang bsgom zhing / shi nad tu yongs su sbyang ba legs par spyod cing gzhan myo sme bA
276b2(mdo): 'jig pa myed pas bdag srung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba bskyang ba dang bcas pa yang byas la/ bzlas brjod de nyid stong pa brgyad dang / phyag rgya yang stong pa brgyad pa rtsams na
276b3(mdo): 'phags pa s+yad ras gzigs dbang phyug 'bar zhing g.yol ba dang / bdag kyang 'bar ba dang / snying dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin par mdzad pa'i phyag spyi bor
276b4(mdo): gzhag ste/ legs so legs so// reg sngags 'chang khyod kyi/ sa mchod pa dam pa dang / gsang sngags kyi cho ga chen po byas so// / bsgrub pa dam pa byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi'i rig
276b5(mdo): 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi cho ga zhi ba mo gsang ba dang / phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor go cho ga dang / thams cad du spyi'i dngos grub rigs/ 'chang khyod la 'grub gis
276b6(mdo): khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rjes su zung shig dang / rigs sngags 'chang ji ska yid la byed pa de ltar 'dod pa dang / mchog thams cad ji ltar yid la bsams pa de thams cad rjes su sbyin no// 'di ni khyon
276b7(mdo): kyi skye la'i 'khor 'am ma yin te/ skye ba dang dga' ba dang / 'chil dang / zangs phuganas pa las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// rigs sngags 'chang khyod shi 'bogs nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'ang
276b8(mdo): las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs 'tshed pag byed mdod gsum su mthong bar 'byung ba/ mngod gsu du chos nyan par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar bye che'i tshad rgas pa brgya 'a ston
277a1(mdo): dpag tu myed grangs myed bzang du byed par 'gyur ro// zhes tshig tu gsung pong de nas rig sngags 'amang gis 'jo ba'i rgyal po drung la 'tsho bo'i rgyas chom po tog bcod pan la mngon du gtongon
277a2(mdo): den 'phags pa yun ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi skyer bzhugs te/ reg sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro zhing / don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa tri sa myong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// yongs pa
277a3(mdo): chen po'i rnam par thadad pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ro// sku gzugs bsgrub pa de/ yod nyid gces pa 'do gal te rig sngags 'tshang skam brgyang ba mor dbyed par
277a4(mdo): gzhol pa/ mtshams myed la lnga byed pas de las cig nges par sgrubs bcam zhis// mdun du rang gi gzugs kyis nges pa 'chis par bgyi'o// gal nyed pazhin gshegs pa thams cad
277a5(mdo): dang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la sdang bas Sha/ kau dbyung bar sems bskyed pa des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mas cad dang / rus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
277a6(mdo): dgongs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i byin gyi brlabs de dag sngags 'chang bsgrub na rmi lam du bdag gi gzugs mthong bar su la dpar bgyi zhing yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyi'o// mchog
277a7(mdo): thams cad rjes su brtsal bar bgyi zhing / sdig pa'i slob pa thams cad rnam par dag par bgyi'o// dri ma myed par rnam par tha rad pa'i 'od zer gi dkyil 'khor la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob po/

277b1(mdo): bya ba'i lus yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag gis mthong bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang bral zhing nyon mongs par dang bral bar

277b3(mdo): bar bgyin/ myi gyu rang ba dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba sdom la brtson can gis smos kyang ci 'tshal te// dran pa tsam kis bdag rang gri gzugs gis mdun na mchis par bgyi zhing / yod la bsams pa thams cad yong/

278a1(mdo): mnar sems dang / sdang bas khrag 'byin par bgyid pa dag 'byung ngo // bdag la yang 'khu bar 'byid pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyis 'khor dang / spyil rigs kyi dmachig sum na/
