301a8(mdo): 'chir ngab tubab bo// chom kha dog sna tshogs pa'i 'angs kyi gos dang / bdan sna tshogs pa'i cha dang 'gyung la'o// rdzas kyi me tog pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / padas kar po dang / ud pa la sngon po dang
301b1(mdo): b+ha ri shi ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / a d+hi mug ta ka dang / a sho ka dang / s+ya snar dang / ka dam pa dang / man d+ha ra dang / man d+ha ra ba chen po'i me tog gi cher rab tu pha ba ste/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa
301b2(mdo): thams cad la mchod pa'i las byed do// bcom ldan 'das shag kyang thub pa'i yang rin po che sna bdun gi khang pa brtsegs pa yang dag par gnas par gyur da te/ gru bzhi be ka pa bzhi deng / sgo bzhi
301b3(mdo): dang ldan pa/ sho nad tu 'bar ba/ lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs lan kan gyis yongs su bskong tsang / mu tig gi dre ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ gser gi dril bu sna tshogs 'byung
301b4(mdo): kos sna tshogs kyi 'phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ chu sha na rgyal mtshan sna tshogs bsgreng la/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs bkra/ rnam pa/ grwar lA rdzas ki rje yab sna tshogs gis mdzes par byas
301b5(mdo): ba/ go skabs rgya che ba'i 'khor ka dkyil 'khor chen por 'argya/ bzhing ldang // nam mkha'i dkyil na yang lhanams lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / 'dug pos dang / dri dang
301b6(mdo): 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos kos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i sde sna tshogs dang / sol snyan dang / beka rdol bas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed cing 'khod do// 
301b7(mdo): de ltar ngon yod pa'i cho 'phrul ko rnam par 'phrul pa 'i byin go berlabs rmad du 'byung ba chen po'i chen po rab tu bstan de cing / ya mtshan rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul go cho 'phrul chen po'i chen po sngar bstan to// 
301b8(mdo): dbyang chub chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go rdzu 'phrul gi rnam par 'phrul pa 'o cho 'phrul 'jibastan pa nas rnam par 'phrul la li 'akod pa chen po'i ring gi snyan
302a1(mdo): las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ka la kha de logs su song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon du bltas nas/ bla gos
302a2(mdo): zag pa gcig tug pas te/ pum gas pa po'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das g.yel de logs su thas mo myur ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gamo yod to// com ldar
302a3(mdo): 'das bdag la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i stong po rnam par thar da rAkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba/ ga snga sngags kyi snying po
302a4(mdo): gsang ba/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po/ bdag gi stong pogs pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i sngags kyu dang / don yod pa'i 'khror po'i lcags kyu dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po don
302a5(mdo): yod pa'i 'dren pa/ nor bu rin po chen po gsum mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan/ 'khor mang po'i nang du yongs su bsgrags par bgyi'o// gang gis
302a6(mdo): dran pa tsam gos don yod pa'o zhegs pa'i sgo po'i cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga rim par bya ba/ mtha' dag rdzogs par mngon tu gnas par gyu ra to// thams cad
302a7(mdo): so so nyid du gnas so// gsang sngags 'dis gzir pas thams cad mdun na gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs bshag kya grub pas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ngas
302a8(mdo): gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis s+yan ngas gzigs rab cunas snying po mngan ldanas rgya chum ma dan yod pa'i lugs kyu/ A'i pa legs po med pa / 
302b1(mdo): rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi don dang / sems can thams cad kyi don chen po'i phyir/ sems cad dag pa chen po khyod kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na da spros shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
302b2(mdo): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul par rige nas bzhin 'dzum zhing mya ke mya 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su mngon gsum du 'byog
302b3(mdo): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du 'phags ma h+ya sa nA R+sha pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go stong po'i lcags kyu'i don yod pa'i zhags pa'i de smras so// dus gsum du gshegs shing so so na
302b4(mdo): bzhags po'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub semasadapa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin rog sngag spyo dbang po chen po 'khor gi tshogs dang / bcas pa la
302b5(mdo): phyag 'tshal lo// dkyil 'khor go rog sngags kyi lhaHmas cad dang / phyag rgya dang / gas pa sngags rim par bye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad la phyag 'tshal so// rang sangs rgyas dang / 
302b6(mdo): 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa byams pa la stsogs pa dga' ldan ki byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i/ 'khor te
302b7(mdo): tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od dpag myed bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen tha'o 'khor gi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// phyogs bcul
302b8(mdo): mtha' yas mu skyed pa'i 'jig rten dgi khams gi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya rim par bye ba cho ga zhi ba mo dang / bcas pa thams cad la phyag
303a1(mdo): 'tshas lo// dkon mchog gsum gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngam/ 
303a2(mdo): dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sku sems can thams cad la byams pa/ kun nas don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor kyi ge sdang ga sngags kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// dgyegs log 'dren dpa / sdang ba dang
303a3(mdo): bdud la stsogs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa'i sems dpa' chen po mchog spr-i ne lcags kyu la phyag 'tshal lo// // ta da yA thA/ au a kar sha ya/ pad ha sta/ ma ha A mo ka/ ang gu shau
303a4(mdo): tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra/ sad tsa ra/ sa man tre na/ ma hA pA sha/ a gu sha/ g+hung ba ra da/ pU dza ang ku sha/ pA sha dar/ d+ha ra b+har/ ma man ta mun tra/ man tra/ man N+Da la paT la/ d+ha raM/ 
303a5(mdo): a ku sha pA shwe nA d+hA ra ya hUM hU~M/ ma ha bras mA/ b+he Sha d+ha ra a mo gA ru ba/ ang gu sha d+ha ra/ ha ra ta ra/ ta ta ra/ san tA ra ya ma ha mud drA ma na Na lA/ a mo kA/ Ang mu sha ba rA da/ ma ha ku
303a6(mdo): ru rdzi ka hri l-i tsi ne/ pa shu pa ti bai Sha b+ha ra/ mA~M sha ya/ ma he shar ba ra ma kI ru dzi ka/ ma ha b+hu d+de sha ra/ ya ma kha ruH/ na ma skr-i ta/ ku sa mra/ kuk+She ra/ tre log kya ba ra da/ da ma ka/ sha ma ka/ shas
303a7(mdo): ran ka/ mam byin gyi/ ma mo san dus ru dza~M t+te/ ngadanas su ta/ sa lA / rlung phyung / oM tsa mang shun/ mak+ka tA/ nga ma/ hU~M hU~M/ b+ha ra lgang / mas stsa bas ma 'ang/ sa can ta su dzA/ ldan
303a8(mdo): mnan las srungs/ hUM hU~M/ rjo la ma gu sho/ a ba lo ka ya/ sem snga la pa / a ka na yA/ u ngas ma dzumam rdul/ pa ta las/ sa pa ya/ thig snyan na sa/ snyam sa ma/ Nam
303b1(mdo): sarba lA pA ka li bshangs/ mAd sar ta/ hu ru h+ya ru/ ma hA ang bu zh-i/ hUM hU~M bud pa budaH/ pro d+ha sa bo tra yA/ tu ru h+ya ru/ ma hA sgol / sad ta ma pa ku sha ra da na badz+rasha b+ha ra/ nan byi tsod pra.a pa ya ni po byi na
303b2(mdo): te/ a mi ta bI dze na ma ku Ta d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ pad ma pA sha ang ku sha d+ha ra/ sarba bid bya man tra/ mud tra man pA la pA pa ra sa d+ha ya/ sA d+ha ya/ ba sha ru ba d+ha ra/ sa ha sra lu dza sa he sra ned tra/ so'u mya mu kha/ 
303b3(mdo): yaya na ka ru dza ka/ sad ta bad/ sa la sa rba an tra mthu dA/ pra ma d+hak+Sha/ a ha ba rad sad tran mo stu tre/ A mo snyam cu na/ pad ma b+hu dza swA hA// / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
303b4(mdo): 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di smes ma thag/ tu ra bau ta la chen po bA ka dang nags tshal dang / bskyed mo tshal du bdeces pa'i gnas kau gzhal myed khang rnam pa drug du g.yos te/ lha rdzas
303b5(mdo): kyi mis tog ka cher chen po bab bo// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i stong po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par tha dad pa'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / 
303b6(mdo): bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i cho ga zhi ba mo 'di yang so sor le'u phye ba mtha' dag rdzogs par nam mkha' la gnas so// gsang sngags kyi yi ga 'bru yang gser la bye du d+yas yi ge ker br-i se ya smi ne gi
303b7(mdo): rim pa na snang ste/ yi ge ke li 'phreng ba mnyam zhing gsal la zung 'byon byon par bris pa/ 'og ko/ 'phreng ba ba shi bral brgyan pa sdang ngo // gang lag pa'i phyag rgya yang pad ma'i nang nas/ byung ba phyag rgya ba/ 
303b8(mdo): ba sna tshogs 'od zer 'bar ba nam mkha' la gnas so// gang mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ya ba rin po che sna bdun go ya sa la rab tu gnas pa/ nam mkhal la shanas par gyur da to// gangangs na so mo'i chu
304a1(mdo): gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ rnam par bkra ba cho ga dang yo byad dang / bcas pa rim par phye brim pa yang nam mkha' la gnas so// kang dkyil 'khor ngom par bye dkyil 'a
304a2(mdo): rnam par sna tshogs gra bzhi be// gru bzhi be mnyam pa rnam par phye ba/ dkyile 'khor shaM ni tu pras sho de brgyan pa gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa'o me zhal med khang ya nam mkha' la gnas so// 
304a3(mdo): dkyil 'khor chen po na gnas pa'i rog sngags kyi lha pho nya mo dang / 'khro bo dang bcas pa gzhal myed khang na rjes su rgyu ba dag kyang nam mkha'i dkyi len gnas te mchod pa byed do// phyogs so so'i de bzhin
304a4(mdo): gshegs pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ga paka'ik+Shapa ki bye ma snyed kyang phyogs bcu'i kun kyi nas mkha'i dkyil da na/ de bzhini gshegs pa'i sku bzhugs par gyu rang to// de
304a5(mdo): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad kyang / byang sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ra gzigs dbang phyugs sems sa legs so bya ba byin te/ spyan
304a6(mdo): ras gzigs dbang phyug legs so legs so// rig sngags kyi mchog dam pa don yod pa'i sngags kyu gsang sngags kyi rgyal pomathal ga rdzogs par smras pa gang gi don yod pa'i nags kyin
304a7(mdo): bsnying po rnam par thar pa'i kyis 'khor gi cho ga na'i mor gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / bsad sngags rim par bye ba de thams cad don yod pa'i lugs kyu'i gsang sngags gi zhi'as pas kun/ 
304a8(mdo): nas dngas so// 'khor 'di'i deng mnam mkha 'i kyis na rab tu gnas pa de/ phyi ma'i khyi ma'i dus ni rigs kyi bu 'am rig sa bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam den slong ma 'am dge bsnyen nas/ dngo
304b1(mdo): bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong dam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyas rogs sam/ rje'u ri kes sam/ dngas rigs sam/ gzhan gang yang rung ba/ bud myed dam skyes pa'am/ khye'u 'am// bu mo rigs 'dzind pa thams/ 
304b2(mdo): cad kyi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'o gzungs 'od dran par byed pa/ lan cig dran pa tsam gis kyang / mod la don yod pa'i zhams pa'i snying po/ 
304b3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po rnam par thard bar dkyil 'khor ka phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor ros par
304b4(mdo): bye ba dang / cho ga zhi ba yo thams cad so sor de la kha don te/ da du gnas te/ de dag thams cad rime gis dran pa dang / blo rgya mtsho'i bsags pa dang / shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ro// 
304b5(mdo): sang sngags dang phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rigadabye ba so so la blo 'jug par 'gyur ro// nam yang blo na par myi 'gyur te/ nam yang brjed ngas par myi 'gyur ro// de nas
304b6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das shaka kya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya byin te/ mchog chen po sbyin pa/ laka na par
304b7(mdo): mo mchog du snying rje can khyod kyis cho ga rgya chen po smras sa legs so legs so// de nas mchod sbyin te sde dpon chen po lag no rdo rjes rdzu 'phrul gi rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho ga 'phrul po yon tan mtha
304b8(mdo): mas pal 'di mthong nas/ dbugs 'byin par gyur datsong / mchog tu dga' ba thob bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gise/ bcom
305a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan lnga 'khor gan 'aspyanangs gzigs rang byun na stong pa dang song pa'i rgyan pargya rgya sa rgyud can dang // chom ldan 'das ded pa 'i cwan
305a2(mdo): 'chang kang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi/ 'byis pa/ rnam par tha rad pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di sgrub papa 'tshal pa dang / gang yang
305a3(mdo): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong pa 'am dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ je'u rig sa sam/ dpangs rigs sam/ gzhan su
305a4(mdo): yang du ba bud myed dam/ skyes pa 'am khye'u 'am/ bu mo don yoda'i zhags pa'i ltob po 'di klog par 'chal pa dang / bstan dbanga'atshal la dang / bzlas 'arjod gi mos kyi khang 'tshal ba dang / mthal ngas/ 
305a5(mdo): rdzogs par bsgrub pam 'chal ba des/ sngon rol tu phyogs bcud/ bal mo spyas te phyag 'tshal nas/ shar daphyogs su kha smras te/ mchis la gzhan gyi smras pa don yod pa'i sngags kyu'i stong lo
305a6(mdo): 'di lan gsum lnga bar 'gyi zhing yang thal mo sbyar te phyag bgyi'o// des na dran pa tsam gi mod la byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras ka'i gas dbang phyug bkun par 'byung te/ re lo ta la
305a7(mdo): li gzhal myed khang dang bcas pa dang / 'khor lo dkyil 'khor dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / rmi ma dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkhal sngo dang / myo ma tsong dang / lho 'phye chen po dang / bcas la bkug lapa 'gyuraro// 
305a8(mdo): 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhis mo la rgyal po// bam po / don yod pa'i nags pa'i lto'i lo byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag 'gyis pa/ rnam
305b1(mdo): par thar dpa' dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang bcas pa kasang sngags rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga yin ma pa rgya chen po mtha' dag rdzogs pa 'di yang 'gug par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor na
305b2(mdo): gnas pa'i rigs sngags kyi lha 'khor dang bcas pa bkug par gyur da te/ thams cad yod rab tu dgal 'ang 'gyur bas/ dngos gru ba dam pa rjes su tshol bar 'gyur ro// de nas don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran
305b3(mdo): bar 'byi ste/ ji ltar shin tu rgya chen yi la bgyis pa de ltar 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi nas dran pa mnyen zhing rgya che ba dang / glo dang mdangs tri ma mchis par 'jug
305b4(mdo): bar bgyi ste/ bzhugs pa tsam gau mod la sde pad ma'i 'dab ma/ lta bur 'jam par 'gyur zhing / kha nas ud pa la'i dro 'byung ba da 'gyur ro// dbyangs snyan cing mnyen pa dang 'jam pa dang / zab pa dang
305b5(mdo): rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// myi 'am ci sa li dbyangs sgra snyan pa da pa/ dbyangs mnyen pa dang / dga' bar byed pa'i dbyangs su 'gyur na/ ka la byi ka l-i dbyangs su 'gyur ro// ci ste dus gsum du lan ga rtsu
305b6(mdo): du dran par 'gyi des/ gas pa sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya ril bye ba dang / cho ga thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rigs spyi 'i dngos grub de rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / spyod
305b7(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// batshogs dpa sog 'dzin dang / brgyad sa rdzogs pa'i sadra bas 'jigs pa rnams cad bral bar 'gyur ro// bod ni sprul ba dang dbyas pa mtsho ba'i ldog pa sems cad dang bras par 'gyu
305b8(mdo): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi stong 'o// rigs sngags kyi rgyal me na yod la su gas kyi 'di lan gsum dran par 'byos btsas kyi skad cing de nyid kyi yongs 'ang ga rang dang / rang gi gnas gi kha
306a1(mdo): rangan slob ma dang / bsnyen bkur dang / 'khor dang bcas pa gyi chang la ya 'chang bar 'gyur ro// yongs sum dag pa ya ban na bya yongs su dag par 'gyur ma ma da' bcas pa yang shin da tsu drim ma mchis pan
306a2(mdo): 'gyur ro// zhe sdang dang bcas pa yang zhe sdang dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gti mug dang bcas pa yang gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'dod chags dang bcas pa yang 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sgrig yang pa bas
306a3(mdo): pa yang sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// bkyegs dang bcas pa dang / brgyad dang log 'dren gis yongs su yangs zi nad pa yang brtsegs dang / log 'dren dang / 'dud las stsogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sems
306a4(mdo): kyi ldog pa yang sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// thun mong ma mchis pa yang thun mong du gyu rad cing / bsrungs par 'gyur ro// myi spa ba/ to'artul zhugs ma mchis pa' yang myi smra ba'i rtul zhugs chen
306a5(mdo): po dang ldan par 'gyur lo// sprub pa ma bgyis pa yang smra ba la bgyis bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi gnas dang / yul dpa' khor kau dkyil 'khor thams cad du tshangs par myi dpyod pa yang tshangs/ 
306a6(mdo): par khyod 'chen por 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i gan marjon po la gnas par 'gyur ro// dge bamyi yod pa yang dge pa chen po dang lda par 'gyur ro// chos kyi myong ba yang spyod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 
306a7(mdo): 'bangasas pa kyi bgyid pa sang 'ayod napas kyi phung po da 'a bar 'byung // rum po'i spyod ba sa mchis pa ya sa pa spyod pa dang ldan pa 'gyur mi// kyim ma nga/ rgya
306a8(mdo): gas sngags ma mthong ba dang / dam tshigs ma mchis pa yang dkyis 'khor dang pyod rgya dang / gsang sngags mthong ba dang / dam tshig 'amal bar 'byung // rig sags kyi gnas dang / dkyis 'kho masas
306b1(mdo): cad su sangs rgyas dang / chos mthong bar myi 'tshal ba yang byang chub dang / chos dpadam tshi ga dang ldan par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sa ma bsams la yang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis
306b2(mdo): bsams par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi sa bon gi yul du ma gyur pa yang byang chub kyi sa bon dang ldan par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyind pa drug gi 'apyod pa dang myi 'bral zhing / pha rol tu phyi nad pa drug yongs su
306b3(mdo): rdzogs par bgyis pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims dang myi bral zhipa/ ting nge 'dzin na rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// sprond pa dang yongs su gtong ba dang myi bral zhing / sbyin pa dang yongs su gtong ba dang
306b4(mdo): sbyin pa'i tshogs chen po dang ldan pa 'gyur ro// bzod pa dang myi 'bral da zhing bzod pa chen po'i bzod pa'i rjes su spyod par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus dang myi 'bral zhing brtson 'grus kyi stobs chen
306b5(mdo): po'o go cha brtan pa bgos par 'gyur ro// bsam ka tan dang myi 'dra/ la zhing / bsam gtan chen po 'thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzind/ dang ldan 'bar 'gyur ro// shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa
306b6(mdo): zhan pa yang shes rab dang thabs mkhas pa rgya chen por 'gyur ro// rig sngags dang gas pasngags nyams pa yang gas pa sngags dang / phyag rgya yongs su tshang ba dang / cho ga la mkhas par 'gyur ro// dgel ba'i ban/ 
306b7(mdo): gnyen dang bral ba yang dge ba'i ye shes gnyen chen po'i lam la rab tu gnas par 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi stod du sdug pa dang / bla mar bgyis par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad
306b8(mdo): kyis mchod pa dang / mngon du phyag bgyi bar 'gyur ro// tshig btsun par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan yongs su dag par yang 'gyur ro// de ltar don yod pa'i cho ga rgya chen po 'di dag ni thams cad du dngos grub dor/ 
307a1(mdo): yod pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba/ dge ba don yod pa 'di don yod pa'i lcags kyus 'dren par 'gyir ro// dngos grub thams cad 'bugs par 'gyid do// sgrub pa thams cad 'dren par 'gyid
307a2(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi chos ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs brgya dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcol brgyad dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 'phags pa 'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin
307a3(mdo): nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mthal dang / don dmapa dang / stong pa nyid 'dren par bgyid de/ don yod pa'i lum sa kyu 'dis 'dren par 'gyur/ yangs par 'gyid dngos grub mchog 'dren par bgyid do// 
307a4(mdo): de ltar mthul che ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / yon tan chen po brjod pas/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po col bar bgyi'o// de ltar dge ba'i chem pa chen po dang ldan zhing / kun tu chogs
307a5(mdo): par babyis pas/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lugs rgyu 'phags pa spyan ras gis gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po na mchog tu grub pa bla na myed pa lags so// de nas rig+sas
307a6(mdo): sngags 'chang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyed nam/ dge snyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam// rje'u rigs sam/ 
307a7(mdo): dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan su yang rung ba bud myed dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am bu mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi reng gi gzugs gi sa dgug par 'tshal ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras
307a8(mdo): gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'tshal bar des cho ga 'di brgya// wang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos cang ma bgos pa/ bI rnam lnga'i rgyas 'phangs pa li mchod byir thogs
307b1(mdo): pa btags pas ras dmar po'i skud pa'i mchod phyire thogs pa/ kha tog bza log nas bdun du yongs su bzung ste/ tshogs ma dang / s+ya hu ga bcing ba dang / kan sa gsum po dpung gnyis u btso pa dag/ ka/ 
307b2(mdo): dedang / de nas byed par bcings sa phyogs chang mar 'dug nas sam/ gnas gzhan gang yang rung bar dben zhipa 'khrug pa ma mchis la dang / dkyil 'khor bgyi ste gru bzhi pa/ shin tu rnam par bye
307b3(mdo): 'khru bzhi'i ched tsam la/ dpung sor brgyad kyi tshad tsam kya nas zlum po// sems par byags la shin tu 'jam par bgyi'o// de nas tshon sna tshogs kyi skud pas rnam par mdzes par thig gdab
307b4(mdo): cing tshon sna tshogs kyis bri bar bgyi'o// snying po'i dkyil / dar ni 'khru dang gi tshad la/ gru bzhi pa rnam par phye ba/ nin/ na tu mdzes pa/ gru bzhi la/ kun nas kha khyed gi rnam
307b5(mdo): pa can po gyi'o// dbus su pad ma bgyi ste/ 'dab ma rtsa brgya 5/ 'dab ma thams cad la lcags kyu zi zhong/ dbus kyi / phyo ga a pa dang bcas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis
307b6(mdo): brgyan pa bri'o// 'od kyi 'phreng ba zlum po mtshon ci sna tshogs kyis rnam par 'byes par bgyi'o// snying po lo dkyil 'khor gyi bre bzhir lugs kyu dang / zhags pa kun nas zlum pa yang bgyi'o// 
307b7(mdo): phyi rol kyi dkyis 'khor kun bya mtshan ma'i phyag rgya sna tshogs kyang bri bar bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhi rnam par 'byes par rgyal po chen po bzhi 'bab pa'i nang na ko cha 'gos pa/ drag shul na
307b8(mdo): shugs can 'jigs par bgyid pa bri'o// rnam sgo bzhi rnam par phye ba yang dkyil 'khor gyi lha bro ba ba kyi ste/ shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje 'chang zhi ba'i gzugs can bzhin 'dzum pa/ rdo rje la
308a1(mdo): 'byim bag tu 'dzin pa/ rab kyi ste ngan 'bam pa'i steng na mchis pa bri'o// oM phyogs kyi sgor mtsho ba'i rgyal po jug thum gyi gzugs can 'jigs par 'gyid pa padas dang / zhags pa/ 
308a2(mdo): thogs pa/ me tog kha bye ba'i steng na 'bar ba'i nang na mchis so// nub phyogs kyi sgor dbang po rdo rje thogs pa/ myig gsum pa ro'o steng na 'bar ba'i nang na mchis pa bri'o// pad ma dang / byang byo/ 
308a3(mdo): kyo sgo don yod pa'i zhags pa 'i rdong 'khro gnyer can/ pad sa dang / zhags pa thogs pa/ pad ma'i 'dab ma'i steng na 'bar ba'i nang na lcags kyu dang / lhan cig mchis pa bri'o// dkyil 'khor khor
308a4(mdo): khor yug tu gos dang / ba nad dang / mda' dang / rgyal mtshan kun kyis brgyan par babyi'o// tshon sna lnga'i skud pas kho ra khor yug tu bri bar bkyi'o// rtor ma thams cad dkar po
308a5(mdo): bzhag go// dkyil 'khor kyi phyi ma kun tu dngul dang / ra kyi snod rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag go// snying po'i dkyisa'akhor kho ra khor yug tu dngul gyi snang bkang ba bzhi dang
308a6(mdo): loms bkang ba bzhi dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil ba bzhi snod bzhi dang / tra mo snod bzhi dang / dngul go pog por ma gsungs/ pu ru ma ka'i bdun spos bsregs pa bzhi bzhag go// phyi rol po kyi
308a7(mdo): 'khor khor khor yug phyas las byas pa'i snod bkang ba dang / tor ba'i snod bum pa yongs su bka ba drug rgyas bzhi dang / 'dug pa sna tshogs bsregs pa'o khog khor brgyad 'jigs pa myed pas bzhan
308a8(mdo): par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ches su zhi dang / zla ba nye'o chos bco lnga'i nye'i bar gyi nyon gcig 'askyang ba bgyis pas/ 'bras yos dang / nyungs kang sa don yod pa'i rgyal po'i stong po/ 
308b1(mdo): na ba rgya brgyad yongs su 'thus pas/ kyis mam kud du tor bar rgyas// srungs gang dang / mi sa ba'i rgyang songs su mnas pas kyi yo na da
308b2(mdo): dkyil 'khor dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor go phyi rol gi meng me drug cu rtsa bzhi sa bar bgyi'o// me tog ji snyed pa ma' po dgram zhing kho ra khor yug tu 'phreng bzhag par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang
308b3(mdo): gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyus nyungs kar la lan nyi shu gcig yongs su bzlas pas/ dkyil 'khor kun dang phyogs bzhi dang / steng 'og tu rtog na dkyil 'khor bcing bar bkyis par 'gyur ro// 
308b4(mdo): phyogs bcing ba dang / spyi phyag bcing ba dang / bdag srung ba bgyis pa dar 'gyur ro// 'byegs dang / log 'dren dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'dud la rdzogs pa thams cad
308b5(mdo): bcings par babyis par 'gyur ro// phyags bcang ba dang / s+ya dang r+m+ma/ dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam kha' lnga dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po ga bdag ma nA
308b6(mdo): 5/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi 'dzind pa de thams cad bkrug par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor kun nas bsrung ba'i slad du gshin rje dang rgya lha dang / gzhon dang / ku be ra dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi'i
308b7(mdo): dpung dang / 'khor dang bcas pa lcags kyu dang / zhags pas bkug pa mi 'gyur te/ dkyil 'khor bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / srab bgyid 'ar 'gyur ro// 'og kau ma'i lha mo sa'i 'og na gnas pa rnams dang
308b8(mdo): snyan cig dkyil 'khor srung ba dang / bskyal ba dang / sba ba'i slad du mchis par 'gyur ro// steng nas nam mkha' la tshangs yadang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang / mtshan mo'i lha dang / 
309a1(mdo): nyi sa dang / zla ba rgyu nar dang bcas bsrung ba dang / bskyal ba dang / swa ba'i slad du mchim par 'gyur ro// de das rig sngags 'chang gis rgyas bgyi ba 'ilam 'phyo ste/ rig sngags 'chang gis
309a2(mdo): ku sha'i bam po'i steng du shar phyogs kyi sgo / dkyil 'khor la mngon du 'phyogs par dkyil mo krung bcas te/ mchis la gzhan myi smra bar don yod pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa bgyis la
309a3(mdo): dkyil 'khor gyi stong por 'phags pa spyan ras gzi shes dbang phyug bzhag par bkyil zhing / me tog re re la bzlas brjod 'gyis pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go medus nopar bgyi'o// de nas 'khra
309a4(mdo): bobo'i rgyal pos yungs kar gyi 'bru re re la/ lan brgya rtsa brgya// da bzlas brjod bgyis par rtong bar bgyi'o// de nas 'phag/ das pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags
309a5(mdo): pa'i lugs kyus/ bzlas brjod stong sa brkyang bkyis bdabul bar bgyi'o// ri lu re re la bzlas brjod pagyis pa'i 'dunaspos dbul bar bgyi'o// nyungs kar re re la 'azlas brjod
309a6(mdo): bgyim la ka rnying na ma dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dong bar 'gyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / thun ma yin pa yin ma nangs kar bya nom pa yod 'ong zhing dgal ba dang / rab tu dgal bar 'gyid par g.yo bar
309a7(mdo): 'gyur zhing / grwa mnyen pa dang / bsnyen cing mdzes pa dang / yid du 'ong ba zab mo zab pa dang / ka sa byi ka dang / phyi 'amatshal sgra dbyangs la/ su 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'cha gas sems brtan por/ 
309a8(mdo): na ma/ sa byags yongs ba/ 'thug 'dzid pa 'tsho'o// 'da' kyim mngon nying 'odapa/ 'ad kyi rnas 'a bcod ma mngar 'byung dang / byinas nga byasas@
309b1(mdo): mchil zhing / snang bar 'gyur te/ nam mkha'i dkyil na tshegs pa'i phub po bzhin du 'od zer gyi gdugs su gyur nas/ gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas sngon ma byung ba la rje nam po rmad du byung ba 'gyur ro// mA'i can/ 
309b2(mdo): dad kor shi she l-i tsan dan dang / tsan dan sbrul ka snying po dang / ka bur dang / bla tsi'i 'byung ste/ dpag chad brgya kho ra khor yug tu dri kanas par 'gyur ro// lha rdzas kyi 'dug spos kyi dri zhim po sngon ma byung ba rmad du byung bye du
309b3(mdo): r+ya sngon po'i smon chags pa lta bu'i bdug spos kyi spron/ nam mkha'i dkyilen gnas par gyur te/ phyogs bcul kun tu bdug spos kyi dro rgyas par 'gyur ro// de nas snying po li dkyil 'khor gyis dbus su 'phags
309b4(mdo): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid rang ko gzugs kyis 'byar 'gyur te/ tshangs pa bzang po'i cha lugs can/ ral pa'i zor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/ don yod pa'i zhagal gzugs lag
309b5(mdo): ba bzhi pa/ pad ma dang zhags pa thogs pa rgyal ba 'dod dpagamyed pa'i dbu rgyan can/ dpya rgyan zla ba tshes pas brgyan pa/ mad+ya ba che gsum pa thogs shing / dbugs 'byon pa/ rgyan thos
309b6(mdo): cad kyis brgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po pa brgyan pa/ rang gi 'od dpa gzol brjid kyis shin tu 'bar ba/ bzhin 'drem zhing nyam sto pas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyi snang ba dang ldan pa/ 'bru brgyad tsam
309b7(mdo): kyi lus bzang pos dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i pad ma'i stan las langs te/ nam mkhal la mchis nas/ zhi ba'i gzugs can byams pa'i sems dang / stobarje chen po seM la 'gyid pas/ dkyil 'khom
309b8(mdo): kun tu tu lu zhing / phyogs bcur rtog par bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ste/ rig sngags 'chang chen po lags so legs so// laka pa g.yas pa brkya
310a1(mdo): kau lag pa phyi bor bzhag ma thag tu/ de nas rig sngags 'chang de nam mkha' la mchis te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa dang / lugs kyu rgya chen po la 'od zer snang ba bkod pa/ rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba
310a2(mdo): spyam lta bu'i shugs kyi rorgyal 'khor zhes bya ba'o tong nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ ting nge 'dzind gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma snyed 'thob bo// kun tu don yod dpar lta ba'i nor bu'i snying po rgya chen
310a3(mdo): bor brags pa/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gzungs 'phagasapa s+yan ras gzags dbang phyug gi ba snying po'i gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ gang gos gzungs thob bo'i mod la don yod pa'i
310a4(mdo): zhags pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang / gas sngags rim par bye ba 'i cho ga zhi ba mo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil
310a5(mdo): 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa' don nyid du gnas so// gzhan ya pa pad ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang / rdo rje lo gas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rogs dang / glang po sa
310a6(mdo): tshe'i rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'a thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang / gsapa' chen po'i snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / bcas pa'igs pa sngags rim par phye ba gas pa dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rnam par
310a7(mdo): thams cad kha don nyid du gnas so// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba/ bye ba khrag khrog brgya stong phrag gang ka'i klung ki bye ma dgu bcu ma gnyis po rnams kyi tso bo dang / mchog dang / rig sngags la
310b1(mdo): 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gos/ rig sngags 'chang de la smras pa/ rig sngaklas 'chang ji ltar yid la babyed pa dang
310b2(mdo): bsam pa smros shig dang / mchog de thams cad rjes su bskyon par byed do// de nas ri ge sngags 'cha ba go sa ji ltar yi de la bsams pa dang / mchog mngon par 'dod pa de thams cad smra zhing / mchog yo de la
310b3(mdo): byed pa thams cad byin par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa sna tshogs da sa dbyung ba rnams smra zhing / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da lwa maH smra'o// 
310b4(mdo): lo legs pa dang / so nyes par dang / bde ba dang / nad dang 'jigs pa dang / lhag par 'jigs pa dang / pha rol ni dmag tshogs dang / rang gi dmag tshogs dang / byir rgol dang / 
310b5(mdo): dpra 'o dang / yams kyi nad dang / myo nges dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'tshe ba dang / gza' 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / cod pa dang / 'tshang 'bru ba dang / 'gyed pa
310b6(mdo): dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / char che ba dang / char dkon pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i cher dang / tshe ring ba dang / tshe thung ba dang / tshe yongs su zad pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / 'byor da pa dang / 
310b7(mdo): rgud pa dang / dge ba dang / myi dge ba dang / skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / 'grub pa dang / myi 'grub pa dang / bgyegs dang / bgyegs myed pa dang / bdud kyi bar chad dang / 'bru 'phel ba dang / nor 'phel ba
310b8(mdo): dang / nad dang bral bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang la smra bar 'gyur ro// sems can
311a1(mdo): dmyal ba dang / yid dgas dang / lha ma yin gi 'jig rten dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / rgyal bum dang / myi 'am yi dang / s+ho 'phye chen po dang / myi dang
311a2(mdo): amyi me yin pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / rigs dang / bya'i skye ba dang / 'chi ba de thams cad phyin tsam log par smra zhing / de dag gi thabs thams cad kyang ston par 'gyur ro// lhang skyes
311a3(mdo): pa dang / rlung skyes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhong du skyes pa dang / rgyal po nyid dang / bud myed dang / skyes pa nyid dang / bu rnyed pa dems cad smra bar 'gyur ro// bram ze'i ngogs su skye ba dang
311a4(mdo): rgyal rigs su skye ba dang / khyim bdag kau ro kes shing sa la chen po lta bur skye ba de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// zhan yang rigs mthon po dang / dma' ba dang / smad pa'i rigs
311a5(mdo): mu skye ba de thams cad ston cing sA la/ thabs kyang ston par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gos ji ltar ba sam ma tho 'don de thams cad 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyun
311a6(mdo): mngon sum du smra/ zhing thams cad rgyam mer ro// gzhan yapa 'jig rten pa'i mchog sa tshogs dang / bsgrub pa dang / grub pa de thams cad des tshol par bgyid de/ 'di lta lho nor sbyar ba yA la dang / ni
311a7(mdo): dong// phyog ldan gi dngos rgyal dang / rmyi sna ba dang / myig 'bras dang / 9kha dang / phrag kyi 'dun pa dang / dgas su 'jug pa dang / ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / 
311a8(mdo): langs bslang ba dang / dad ni por bya dang / gomi 'thob pa dang / rmong thob pa dang / yul gi bdag zi nyid dang / chu chung chen po zhes pa dang / drug 'ba' ba dang / gas thogs cog ma rtsub pa'i dngos
311b1(mdo): grub dang 'jig pa chen po brgyad zhi bar bya ba dang / 'gugs pa dang / grad pa de thams cad tshol bar bkyid do// gzhan yang ji ltar yid la bgyid pa de thams cad smra zhing / thams cad gsol bar
311b2(mdo): bgyid do// de dag thams cad kyi dgos pa thams cad don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu'i snying pos 'dren cing / don yod pa'i zhags pas bcing bar 'gyur ro// bsam pa dang don du gnyer ba dang / yid
311b3(mdo): la re ba'i dgos pa de thams cad shin tu ring po nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pas bcings nas drangs te lag tu thob par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa mchog zhi dngos grub de kho na nyid thams cad 'grub par mya
311b4(mdo): snang bar 'gyur/ reg sngags 'chang nam mkha' la mchis/ par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gi khams kang du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang du kang du mchi bar 'tshal ba de dang de thams cad du
311b5(mdo): mtsha' bar 'gyur te/ thams cad tso bor 'gyur/ thams cad du mchod par 'gyur ro// ji ste ji ste rmi lam mthong bar 'tshal na/ gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas/ 
311b6(mdo): nas/ nyal kar 'phags pa la spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bdug spos su phul te/ nyal na/ 'phags pa spyan ras ko zigs dbang phyug rgyal po'i tshe byad du mthong ba col cing / gang bsams pa dang // 
311b7(mdo): ga dris pa de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar bsams pa'i mchog pol cing sgrib pa dang / ldog pa thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur ro// stobs dpabacom 'grus dang / mdangs 'jug par
311b8(mdo): 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dgug par 'tshal zhong mthong bar 'tshal na de'i che shing a rga'o lom dang / gu gul dang / rgya skyags ro lur byas pa la bzlas brjod brgya pa brgyad bgyis la/ tshangs pa la bdus
312a1(mdo): spos phul na/ tshangs pa dang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing / mchog 'tshal ba thams cad rjes su tshol lo// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug pa'i bar du tshangs pa'i gnas dang / gzhal
312a2(mdo): a myed khang mthong bar 'gyur zhing / tshangs pa'i gzugs kyi cha byang 'chang ba'i mchog tshol bar 'gyur ro// su'i gnas thams cad mes 'o yon no zhes mngon par brjod par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams
312a3(mdo): cad dang / 'dzam bu gleng ba'i myi bud myed dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rig sa de thams cad tshangs pa'o zhes
312a4(mdo): sems par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i ba tsA mo dang / 'khor du bcas pa'i mchod pa'i sprin chen po'i chen po bgyid par 'gyu// ra ro// de nas sred myed kyi bu dbyug par 'tshal na/ des lnga'i
312a5(mdo): gnas su sred myed kyi bu'i gzugs rnyan gyi mdun du nye bar spyon/ sreg gi cho ga 'bye ste/ rig sngags 'chang chang mang byu dpa/ shin tu khrus pabyis pa/ gos tshangs bgos pas/ snu ma dang ni
312a6(mdo): a ka li lam theg shing gi me bA ba la ku phul dang / yungs kar dang / smang rtsi dang / zhun mar bsres pa'i spyo sreg brgya stong brgya'o// brgyad stong rdzogs pa dang / sred myed kyi bu rang gi gzugs kyis mdun
312a7(mdo): na mchis zhing / rige sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so zhes smras so// sgrub pa dam pa 'di don yod pa'i lcags kyus 'bugs shing rigasa? kyi rgyal po'i chos luh+la chen pos bkug
312a8(mdo): na/ rigasma/ 'chang ba tso bye dgos pa ni mo zhog yod/ mchog tu ni ci zho ga gnyer ba de smros shig dang / thams cad rjes su sbyin par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang kis don gang gis yod la bsams
312b1(mdo): te spras pa de thams cad rtsol bar 'gyur ro// gzugs sna tshogs pa'i mchog kyang rjes su tshol bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gzugs sna tshogs pa mchog tso bo dang / dgos pa'i sas sgrub pa'i mchog
312b2(mdo): rjes su mol par 'gyur ro// de nas lha chen pos dgug par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang chang pa shin tu khrus 'byos pa/ kos cad ma bgos pa/ des lha'i gnas su mchis la/ spu chen po'i mdun
312b3(mdo): du gu gul dang / pad ma'i phye ma dang zhun mar bsres pa'i skyon sreg stong ha brgyad 'bye'o// stong cha brgyad rdzogs pa dang / lha chen po rang gi gzugs kyi medun na mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas na ka
312b4(mdo): po chen po dgug par 'tshal na/ rog sngags 'chang shin tu khrus bgyis pa/ kos capam bgos pas dur khrod du mchis la/ zla ba ma go ngo tshas brgya bzhi la nyin zhag gtsog sbyang
312b5(mdo): babyis pas/ pad ma sar pa'i phye ma dang / ku ku la dang / ra'i khrag dang / ny+yangs kar dang / zhun mar dang / sbyar ba/ brgyad stong don yod pa'i lugs kyus bzlas 'arjod kyis du
312b6(mdo): khrod kyi sho pa kaM me la bzlas brjod bgyi'o// ma khrag gi rtom sa dang / 'bras thug pa che'i chen gi lta ba nas dang / me tog dam pa gong bul bar bgyi'o// las 'di yongs su rdzogs 'a bgyis na
312b7(mdo): nan po chen lam ma mtshogs kyi'i kho pad bcas pa mdun nang / rig grags 'a la sogs po zhes bya bcom te/ rig lags 'ang legs so legs so// sgrub pa'ichog pa
312b8(mdo): 'dis bdag yongs su 'gyu/ tshig sngags 'chang skam shig dang chog su sbyin par 'gyi'o// mchog 'do la rnams ca sa su ma nan dang / nges pa ma la byed pa don ma pa pa
313a1(mdo): sbyin par brgya'o// khyod bsrung ba dang / yongs su bsgrung ba 'i ngon du bdag rtag tu ngas su 'byung bar 'gyi'o// de nas rig mgrus 'chang gis mchod yon dang / nam
313a2(mdo): bsil dbul bar bgyi'o// ji lta bsams pa de mngon sum du smras pa/ gang don du gnyer lde de thas can 'thob cing / thams cad rjes su 'bra' bar 'gyung ngo ro// thams cad bgyin par 'gyur ro// 
313a3(mdo): dran pa tsam las stsogs pas thams cad bgyid nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// rtag tu lha zhing sbyor ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs pa dang / las su bgyi ba 'khyad par
313a4(mdo): 'gyur ro// ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad dab du gyu rad te gnas te/ las thams cad slo ba bzhin du bapyod pa dar 'gyur te/ nam yang nyams par myi bgyid do// thams cad
313a5(mdo): rjes su 'brang zhing las thams cad 'byid par 'gyur/ do// ji ste 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma 'gugs paral na/ den pa rigs sngags 'chang chang ma shin su khrus 'argya/ 
313a6(mdo): 5/ gos na pam bgos pas/ shin tu dri zhong po dros lus lag par bsgos la/ gsan me tog gi shi pe ljon pa deng mchis la// zla ba ang gi de'i tshes bcu bzhi la nyid zhag cig spru sa bgyis
313a7(mdo): 5/ shin du dri zhim lo la shi ba gi e swA pa la/ pu shel ci dpa ta ka re dang / spa smos dang/ yungs kar dang / zho dang sAb cing pa/ zhun par dang / sbya ba'i sbyin sregs lan stongs brgyad bgyi'o//

313b2(mdo): las yongs su rdzogs pa dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma bzang mo de lha'i gzhal myed khang dang / mchis zhing mdun na mchis te/ de mthong nas ma'am grob mo 'am rgya ba la 'ang/ las byed pa 'am

319a8(mdo): gzhol ba dag gis sgra thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad byang ste/ bde' bar 'chi bu'i las byas nas bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// kos la bdugs na bdag nyid mchod pa chen po 'thob cing thos
319b1(mdo): cad la dbang byed par gnas pa dang / don grub pa bla na myed pa yin no// nor dang 'bru rab tu 'phel zhing dgos pa bya ba pa bla na myed pa yin no// thams cad du mchod pa dang rtag tu tshig bzung bar 'os par
319b2(mdo): 'gyur ro// rgyal gang la 'khros pa las rgod cing smra bar 'gyur ro// bud myed rnams kyi ke nang chen du 'gyung zhing rtag tund myed par 'gyur ro// rtag tu 'artson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa
319b3(mdo): dang / rtag tu dpal dang gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu glang po che brtsa'i stobs dang ldan pa dang / she nas mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro// // 'phags pa s+yan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
319b4(mdo): go 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la yang skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la mchis pa ni don yon pa'i zhags
319b5(mdo): pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba/ don yod pa'i lugs kyu'i gzung sa chen po'i cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor dang / don yod pa'i zhe gas pa'i snying po dang / dkyil 'khor chen po lta ba dang / bsgrub
319b6(mdo): pa bsgrub pa dang / klags pas 'grub pa/ don yod pa chen po rnam par 'phrul ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byon gyis rlabs kyis dam tshig 'grub pa yin no// gang gos pad ma rgyas pa'i dkyil
319b7(mdo): 'khor chen po mtha' dang / phyag rgya dang / rim par bye ba dang / gsang sngags dang cho ga dang / bde bar bsgrub pa mtha' dag de/ rigs kyi spyi'i thams cad kyi dem tshig chen po'i rjes su 'jug par 'grub
319b8(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// 'dis zlar bzhin gshegs pa'i tshigs dang / pad ma 'o rigs dang / ponga'i tshogs dang / norang bu'i rigs kyi dkyis 'a'akho 'dod pag tu byed pa na ba'i mchog ma rdo rje na
320a1(mdo): rtse mo'i mchog dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi ri mchog la thams cad du rjes su zhugs shing // dam tshig shes par 'gyur la dang / thams cad du byin gyis brlabs kyis brlabs par 'gyur ba de/ 
320a2(mdo): rig sngag pa 'chang thams mchog tu 'grub par bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sems cad thams cad la rjes su nye ba'i slad du/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ 'khor mang po'i dbus su bsgrag par
320a3(mdo): bgyi'o// rigs bzhi'o 'jig rten gyi bud myed dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyis bsdig pa dang / slob pa thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir bshad par bgyi'o// grub pa yang dag par
320a4(mdo): rdzas su su lad par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de ba/ bzhin gshegs pa shag kya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sa rnams dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyano ras gzigs dbang
320a5(mdo): phyag la 'di skad ces bka' saHlad to// sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis dge ba'i rgyu ba rnams dag cing shi nad tu yodasu dag pa yin te/ legs so legs so// rigs sngags
320a6(mdo): 'cha ba thams cad dang / sems cad thams cad dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyasaHke pa dedu rje' shes dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud myed dang / skyes pa' dang / khye'u dang / bu mo nas
320a7(mdo): la bstan par bya ba shod cog dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis spyan ras gzigs rna ba rkyen la/ gas thams nyid kyi so/ bye ba pa// dam tshig gos rjes su 'jug par byin kyis brlabs so// 
320a8(mdo): ngas kyang de dag byin gyis brlabs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags sbyin pa thugs pang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar don yod pa'i rgyal po'omed pa'i snying po'
320b1(mdo): dkyil 'khor chen po bshad pa/ don yod pa'i srog sa rgya mas ngan cho ldan sna ma rlom bye bzhinanan dun nang bya mdzes pa nyin
320b2(mdo): 'jas bor bya'o// tshon sna sbas rnam pa dbye ba na khri dang bcas pa nam na nga nga bye ba shes gdab 'ani
320b3(mdo): mnyam par thig gis dbye bar bya ba ste/ sgo bzhid dbye bar bya'o// chu zheng du kaN+Tha dbyes kyi ngo la'ikhor n-i shi khya 'arlabs tshon sna lnga'i skal
320b4(mdo): dang / tshon sa las dbye bar bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khord kyi snying po la med ma/ rnaM kho bya zlum por bya'o// 6/ 'das bye ba'i rlabs su na sa po dang // sngags kyu dang par
320b5(mdo): ma gnas par bya ba ni// klu 'pho'i gdeng pa ka 'dra ba dang / rmugs kyu dang bcas pa dang / log pa dngabacas pas pa mI'o lcags kyu 'dzind bye ra pa'i nang na 'dus
320b6(mdo): par bya'o// tshon sna tshogs kyise bri'o// pad ma kha bye ba'i phyir rol gyi skal bu no lugs dang bcas pa liskal bur bya'o// nad dang phyil bar du na ring po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya'o// 
320b7(mdo): lugs kyu'i phyi rol gyi skal bu ni// zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma myed pa'i me tog gis bya'o// zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma myed pa'i phyi rol gyi skal kuni medu ma skyes khri bar bya'o// mdung che gsum pa
320b8(mdo): 'phreng ba'i phyir rol gyi skal bu ni phyag rgya phyag na thog pa bri bar bya ste/ mtshon cha sna tshogs pa dang me tog rnams so// kun la 'ab rlom 'je bA dang / 'ong+ge zer kha dog sna tshogs pa dri
321a1(mdo): par bya'o// phyag gi phyag rgya phyi rol khyo tsun stegs su 'dra bar bya'o// stegs bu'i byo ros gyi nas bu'i 'khor ba'i lugs kyu mi ba la bya'o// snyim tho ma cos 'khor gyi na da/ 
321a2(mdo): rgyal po chen po bzhi ga bgos pa/ sngags kyu dang / mdu che gcig pa thogs pa/ 'bar ba'i nang na 'dug pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan da b+h+yaH/ dkyil mo klu ba byed du bcas te/ pad ma'i 'dad la 'dug
321a3(mdo): bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du thog tag tu 'jigs pa myed pas phyag mtshan rnams thams cad 'dam sa 'dug pa bri bar bya'o// sgo bzhi'o gnas su 'dam pa kyil 'khor gyis rnams bri ba ni/ shar
321a4(mdo): gyi sgor lag na rdo rje/ lhor ral pa tsog ma/ nub tu rdo rje luka/ sa sprog ma/ byang du pho nya mo dang / rika sngags kyi lha mo rnams bri lar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi skal bu ni me tog gi

321a6(mdo): dang / dri'o snod bkang bas brgyan cing byug pa'i rgyas bkang ba dang / bdug pa'i snod kyis brgyan pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang / dro chab dang / mchod yon gyi che ba dang / 'bras dang / yon chab dang /

321a8(mdo): bzhin du brgyan te/ dkyil 'khor kun du dung dang bil ba dang / rdza du dang gser dang dngul gyis brgyan par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi don du mchod pa'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor gyi lA kra shis pa rnams dang / sgo ban

321b4(mdo): bdug pa dbul po na/ a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / du dus ka dang / sprig rnams kyi bdug pa ka phur dang / bla chi bskos pa bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi pha rol gyi 'dug pa ni gu gu la/

322a1(mdo): dkrug pa dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang / de bzhin du yang dag par bskul 'dung / las thams cad rig sngags 'cha bas khams cad bu sbya na/ byung zhi rjo/ 
322a2(mdo): bar 'cha zhi des na/ rtsub pa bla na myed pa 'gyur ro// bzang 'breng dang / 'khrig ma'i kedu bu dang srang bu se rel kha cha'am dang / rung ba dang / yungs kar dang / rgyas bsres pa dang /

325a3(mdo): dbang phyug gi rgyab du rin po che'i sho de sug phan dang yal ka dang bcas pas rin po che sna tshogs kyis smras pa bya'o// ne tso dang / ri skyegs dang / shar shar te lu dang / rma bya dang / bya ka sa byi karan
325a4(mdo): po che'o kase pa na rgyu bar bya'o// shaM pa kau ka pa bye bo la/ khang byA legs pa dang bcas pa'i gzhal myed khang gi nang du/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsum rgyan thams cad kyis brgya nang pa
325a5(mdo): bzhugs par bya'o// spyan ras gzegs dbang phyug gi gtso na du sri mo ral la gci ga ma bya'o// g.yas su phya ka na rdo rje khros pa'i kar mo 'byin pa'i gzugs mche la batshogs pa
325a6(mdo): sgra gyen du 'dzes pa/ skyob mo dbacod pan gyis brgyan / da rje tho gras shing rdo rje gsor nam mkha' la lta bar bya'o// slad du gshin rje dang / rgyasA dang / sum ngan po dang / gan nu dang / rgyal po chen
325a7(mdo): babazhi bya'o// shing bya dbang po de 'i khyu dang / dbang phyug chen po mi pa'i bu/ bcom ladu'adas la chong 'byed pa phyi'o// zhesas phyogs su tshangs pa dang / khyab 'dun dang / da
325a8(mdo): chen po rnams brgyad te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// g.yon du dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / klu ma rgyal po rgya mtsho rnams bcom ldan 'das sa mchod pa byed pa bya'o// 
325b1(mdo): g.yas kyi gnas gcig tu rige sngams 'cha/ 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs rlung du pus mo btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lha zhing me tog sna tshogs kyi sdong bu dang
325b2(mdo): 'og por dang / bgrang 'breng lag na thogs pa bya'o// phyogs bzhi ngos kun tu ros bskor ba la ri dgasas kyi tshogs sna tshogs gis gang bshing sna tshogs me tog dang lkug ma can bya'o// 
325b3(mdo): rdzing bu chu zag pa bya'o// 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi shing dang lcug ma bya'o// gnas so sor drang srong rnams dang thul bus kyi shing bya'o// chu de lta bur don yod pa'i lugs kyu ngas la bris te/ gnas
325b4(mdo): katsang mar dben par gzhag pa la rig sngags 'chang bas 'a da' chen pos mchod par bya'o// ma ka ru dang / ru ru ska dang tsan dan kis bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// ci nus pa don yod pa'i/ 
325b5(mdo): lcags kyu'i reg pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bya'o// nyi ma re re ra sa la sku gzugs bris pa mthong ba tsam gyi mod la mtshams myed pa lnga la stsogs pa'i sdig pa dang sme be ba dang / mnar myed
325b6(mdo): par gzhol pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams yongs su dag cing zad par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dpa'ajig rten las 'das pa'i bsdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa myi bzad pa dang / nad thams cad yongs su zad
325b7(mdo): pa dang / rnam parar dag par 'gyur ro// rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// rdzam dang bral bar 'gyur ro// ser sna dang pa dog dang pral m+b+hi byung ngo ro// gzungs grub pa chen po so so 'thob par 'gyur ro// mthong
325b8(mdo): tsam gyis mod la de ma thag tu 'bras bu chen po brnyed pa rgya chen por 'gyur ro// lan 'ag ya log par lhung bar 'gro bar myi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba/ thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub
326a1(mdo): sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis rtag tu bsrungs shing rjes su bzung bar 'gyur ro// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
326a2(mdo): mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon tu mthong ba dang / 'dra bar rig par bya'o// gang zhig ras kyi skye rgyu zugs 'od la legs par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis bya ba byed pa dang
326a3(mdo): mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa de ni phyogs brgya kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhong gapaka'i kleng gi bye ma ra ku bcu cha jug dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi
326a4(mdo): zhi la mchod par 'gyur ro// de nas rangarangagos sangs rgyas kyi zho pan ral tu bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi phyeng po chen yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i
326a5(mdo): ba rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa tha mas cad kyi phyir ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro// dge pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// / 
326a6(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ros gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis reg sngags 'a
326a7(mdo): thams cad 'grus bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sems cad kyi don dang / bon pa dngabade bar bgyi khor byar dang / sdon pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar bgyi ba'i phyir/ don yod pa'i lugs kyu rogs
326a8(mdo): gas kyi rgyam mdzam par bye ba rnams bstan pa lags so// bcog ldan 'das yang bdag la mchis pan dod yod pa'i sngags kyu latsho na mi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor te/ rig sngag pa 'pha gas pa cad kyi khon
326b1(mdo): las grub pa mchog du 'gyur ba dang / bsam dang yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma rungs pa brtson pa myed pa/ bache ba'i bsam pa myed pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dang
326b2(mdo): 'byu po da / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lnga pa dpa/ myo 'am ci deng / lho 'phye chen po da / mya de m+bi me yin pa thas cad 'jug pa/ ma rungs pa'i be bye gas dang log 'dren thams cad ra pa b+ha' dA la par mdzad pa
326b3(mdo): bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / phung bar byed pa sems can ma rungs pa thams cad skrag par byed pa/ phyir rgol ya dang ngag thams cad 'chi ba dang / gcod pa dpa' bikres pa dang / rngub pa
326b4(mdo): dang / gtor ba dang / lus rnam par zhig bar byed pa de ni/ bcom lda dan 'das 'diste/ gis pad mo rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i dkyir 'khor gyi skabs su
326b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi s+yan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du don yod pa'i 'khro po'i lugs kyo'i rigs sngags brjod par bkyi ste/ dkyi les 'khor dang / cho ga zhi be mo thams cad du srung bar byed pa 'chos par
326b6(mdo): byed pa/ dam tshig 'dzind pa ka nas thams cad la rjes su skyong ba ste/ de ni sgrub pa 'grub pa mchog de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs che ba chen po'i slad du bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po chen po byin gyis brlab
326b7(mdo): cing rjes su gnang ba mdzad cig dang / rig sngags thems cod mchog tu skye ma thil sto so ga sems cad thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs su por 'gyi ba'i slang du/ bcom ldan 'das rjes su mul bar
326b8(mdo): bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shaka kya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa baspyan dam gzig sa dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' maHlayang to// s+yan
327a1(mdo): gzigs dbang phyug phyag rgya chen rgya chen pos phyag rgyas btab te/ ngas kyang byin gyis brlabs sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang phyag rgyas btab cing
327a2(mdo): byin kyis brlabs kyis smos shig/ gsang ba pa laka na rdo dzi dang / rdo rje 'chang dang / rdo rje snying po thams cad dang / dam tshig la gnas pa'i lce dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri ze dang / lha ma yin dang / nam ma/ 
327a3(mdo): sdong dang / myi 'am ci dang / ltol 'phye chen po thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba smos shi ke/ s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'tsha ba thams cad kyis bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i go skabs dang
327a4(mdo): mchog grub par byos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gos bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bsgo zhing dbugs phyung ba thos nas snying
327a5(mdo): dka'/ skyon ma bskums/ dpral ba phyed 'khros par byas/ gdong 'khrog nyar du byas/ mche ba brtsigs pa'i spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus 'khor mang po'i nang du bcom ldan 'dra
327a6(mdo): kyi rgyan sngar 'dug nas don yod pa'i zhags pa 'kho bo'i rgyal po 'od smras pa/ dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la la phyag 'tshal mo// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang 'phags/ 
327a7(mdo): pa rdo rje 'chang dang / dkyis 'khor chen po'i lha rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa dpam 'ongs pa dmed ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang / 'bad pa pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tsha lo// 
327a8(mdo): yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag/ 'tshal lo// sha ra dwa ti 'i'u blo gros chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// drang srong chen po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// 
327b1(mdo): rgyal chab du da'ang bskur ba byams pa la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad lpa'atshal lo// khams gsum pa'i bdag po nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba la phyag 'tshal lo// 
327b2(mdo): de bzhin de gshegs pa 'od dpag tu myed pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khro bo'i rgyal po rigs sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i tshogs pa phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dang
327b3(mdo): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad yA thA/ au ba kra ta ba da na/ ma hA kro dud+ba dza/ b+ha ya kar/ ma hA bA wA/ mad ta/ ha sa/ dza la NA
327b4(mdo): lam hA dza lA ma la/ ma ha ro lud/ ru pa/ b+ha yang ka ra na/ ha na ha na/ sarba puSh+TA/ ya kA/ dAk+kha/ sAn/ da ha da ha/ sarba du shA/ na ga nan/ pa tsa pa tsa/ sa tra d+ya Sh+Ta/ bi sAd+ha/ bi nA ya gan
327b5(mdo): pA ta ya/ bA ta ya/ sarba duSh+Ta/ sa tAn/ g+ho g+haM/ ma hA kro dA/ ra dza/ mau Ni/ ka na ka/ badz+ra/ be dUr+ya/ a lwang kr-i tesha ri rin/ badz+ra ba rash+tsa/ yasha sha sta ya ma ha 'di ma AM ku na
327b6(mdo): g+ha dza ya/ ma ha pad ma/ a sa na ya/ ma ha pad mo bai ka tsa/ ga r+d+ha ya/ e mo ga/ a pra ti ha ta/ ba la ba rA/ kra mA ya/ kra mA ya/ sa ha sra/ bA r+ya ya/ sarba pU ta lha yang ka rA ya/ sarba de ba
327b7(mdo): b+ha me na/ kam ba ud g+ha bA ya/ ma ha bi kro te/ pa da nA ya na ra/ side hA/ mya ShA ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ badz+ra dza la drA pa/ d+hu du d+hA ru/ ya ha tsan Ta/ be ba d+haR+sha/ tsa ri tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra tsa tsa ra/ ni ka tsa pa/ mai nA
327b8(mdo): ra/ b+h+r-i ku Ti mu Sha/ hUM hUM phaT/ sa ra sa ra/ ma sa ra sa pa/ sarba bA ba/ kau la bi ShA ha ra/ ma hA na te dza d+ha rA/ pad ma ho s+yA/ swo pad ma/ aM ku sha/ b+hu dze tra ra yA/ mAn tra sa ya/ bi k+tA/ sha sa ya
328a1(mdo): kya rjes pa da/ rgya che/ nas kr-i/ nga nga du'i// / du / da
328a2(mdo): sa g+ha ra/ b+hi ro b+ha ra b+hu ru b+hu ru/ sa rba man Ta la/ a tiSh+Te ta/ sa ma ya/ sa hA/ sa rba mu tra a tiSh+Te ta mu tra ya sA ha/ au a swo g+ha/ ba ra de/ mA hA dang / Sh+Ta/ aM gu Sha/ badz+ra hU~M/ ma ha pad ma A
328a3(mdo): ga ma dang / na mo s+yA te a mo ga/ oM ku na hU~M baT swA hA// 'kho bo'i rgyal po'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / lha'i gnas dang / bcas pa dang / ri ba dang bcas pa'i rgya mtsho' gnas dang
328a4(mdo): bcas pa' dang / gzhal myed khang rnams kun tu 'gul to// testong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten kyi khams rnam pa cu ga tu g.yos so// ma rungs pa'i klu dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin
328a5(mdo): dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha ma thams cad dang / bdud la sogs pa dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa dang / gdon ma tshungs pa rnams kha spub du 'gyed do// ma rungs pa thams cad kyi khyim kun tu tshig ste/ 
328a6(mdo): 'bar gyun tu rab tu 'bapa/ 'bar ba gcig tu byung da cing 'asregs pa dang / ru zhing 'dre log ste// tsher ba drag po gyi bzad pa// chen po myong ngo // lha thams cad shind tu 'khrugs shing skrag go// bdud kyi ros
328a7(mdo): rnams bred khas btags so// 'jig rten gsum gyi dag po sems cad kun tu 'khrugs so// rgya mtshon gnas pa'i klu dang / rgya mtsho'i klu chen po dka' bo dang / bsnyen dka' bo dag kyang kun
328b1(mdo): tu 'khrugs shing shi nad tu smag ste snying 'dang ngo po// gzhan yang sa'i steng na/ klu stong phrag brgya gnas dang / rgya mtsho ni chu'i nang gi klu gang dang / ril gnas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kun du 'khrugs/ 
328b2(mdo): skad cig tu 'bar bar gyur da cing gdungs so// rgyal po bzhi rnams gnas na 'dug na skrag go// nag po chen po dang / tshogs chen po'i gtso bo dang / ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba de dag thams
328b3(mdo): cad skrag tsang snying 'dad do// gnas la rtend pa'i bdud kyi gnas rnams 'dar ro// 'bang kun tu 'bar te/ gnas dang bcas par bsregs so// de nas 'khor de'i nang gi lha dang / klu nas
328b4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyi ste rol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya pa'i phyir me tog sna tshogs 'thor ro// sta rnams kyi rgyan spyad pa sna tshogs dang chos gos kyi char pa la
328b5(mdo): 'phobs so// / mchod pa'i las byed cing / tsan dan gyi chu'i char pas sa sa chag chag 'debs so// lha rdzas kyiH/ ser dang / rdul gyi me tog dang / rin po che sna bdun rnam par sna tshog
328b6(mdo): kyi cha pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes lus 'bar zhing rdo rje gsor te/ shin das+ya 'byong bag du sing ge 'gros kis/ byang chub sems
328b7(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'a s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyag ka la ba de logs su song ste/ nye bar phyi nad nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
328b8(mdo): dbang phyug ga zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ zla ba yod pa'ong bo dri ma myed pa'i me tog rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i 'phreng ba/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na 'ad ma la phul te/ zla ba yid du 'ong
329a1(mdo): ba tI me myed pa me tog gi 'phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyi se smras pa'o the ba/ 'di la dbu la long spyod pa'i phyir dang / bdag la thugs patse ba'i slad du/ thugs rje chen pos bzhes su gsol gang
329a2(mdo): gis bdag yun ring por phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur lags so// 'khro bo chen po'i yang chen po bshad cing gang dran pa tsam nyid kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po li 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos
329a3(mdo): kang dag bdud ma rungs pa dang / gang dag klu ma rungs pa dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za ma rungs pa dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa rnams khyim dang bcas te lus kun tu chag cing / rab tu 'ab nas kha spu ba
329a4(mdo): tu 'gyel cing bsregs so// shaM ye thug pa dang / srog skams par 'gyur ba'i don yod pa'i lugs kyu 'tsho bo'i rgyal po ni dus tham/ mas cad du 'go bo'i skye bong blar bar bgyi'o// bcang ngo // bsgom mo// 
329a5(mdo): mchod do// rgyas par bgyi'o// rigs sngags 'chang ba gang ko le/ ka na khro ba'i rgyal po 'chang bar 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / dge slong la dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge
329a6(mdo): bsnyen ma dang / dge ba sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyas rigs dang / rnge'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs ka a ka na thogs pa 'am/ lus la thogs pa'am/ lta ba 'am/ 'dri pa 'am/ tha na 'khro bo'i rgyal
329a7(mdo): nyan pa tsam de yang bcom ldan 'das bdag gis khur du bkur bar bgyi'o// spyi bos blang bar bgyi'o// bsrung ltar bgyi'o// yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o// bsam ga dang yid la le ba thams cad yongs su rdzog
329a8(mdo): bar bkyi'o// grub pa chen po'i chen po rjes phul bar bkyilo// gnod spyond dang / srin po dang / brtsegs dang / log 'dzin ma rungs pa thams cad so sor bsal bar bgyi'o// rtag su rjes su 'brang zhing bsku
329b1(mdo): ba dang / bskyab pa dang / spa bar bgyi'o// rtag tu dus thams cad du mthong ba rjes su bsul bar bgyi'o// rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par yod byad thams cad kyis myi 'breld cing phun sum 'tshogs pa yongs su bskyed
329b2(mdo): bar bgyi'o// / lus la stobs dang / 'phon 'argyas dang / gzi byon bskyed cing / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi grogs bgyi'o// dgra thams cad so sor bsal bar 'gyi'o// nor dang / 'bru dang / bza' ba dang / btung
329b3(mdo): ba dang / kos dang / byug pa dang / rgyan rjes su bstsal bar bgyi'o// bu cig dang / 'dral bar rjes su bskyang bar bgyi'o// dad pa dang gus pas dus kun tu mchog tu mos par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
329b4(mdo): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ gis/ gnod sbyin gyis dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// lag na rdo rje khyod kyis khas blangs pa mchog tu bzang pos
329b5(mdo): byas pa 'di legs so legs so// zhes smras so// lag pa ka sa pa brkyang nas/ zla ba yid du 'ong ba'i dri ma myed pa'i me tog/ ki 'phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis smras pa blangs te/ lag na rdo rje la
329b6(mdo): rjes su bache ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir dang / dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyis yongs su long spyad pa'i phyir dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod
329b7(mdo): sbyin dang / dri ze dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldong dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myo ma yin pa thams cad dkyil 'khor kang yin pa 'di rasu 'dug cing / dam tshig la gnas pa rnams yongs
329b8(mdo): su long spyad pa'i phyir/ ji ltar ba bzhin du 'dug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa li dbya'o gong du gtong ngo // de nas 'phreng ba de nam mkha' gtor ma thag tu phyogs bcu'o de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbu'i steng du/ 
330a1(mdo): zla ba yid du 'ong ba ShI ma myed pa'i me tog gi khang bu batshegs pa rin po sna tshogs kyis smras pa/ 'od 'tsher la/ ka ba bzhi dang / sgo bzhi legs par rnam par byas pa/ bru bzhi lces pa chu zheng shi nad tu/ 
330a2(mdo): rgya che bag shin tu nang yangs la me tog ka ta li dag gis mdzes pa/ gzhal myed sna tshogs su yongs su gyu rad te gnas so// de dag byang chub sems dpa'i dbu'o steng thad kar yang de bzhin du zla ba la yod du 'ong
330a3(mdo): ba tri myed pa'i me tog rin po chos spras pa'i kha pa bachags pa'i gzhal myed khang du shin tu gnas so// de lag na rdo rje'i bu'i steng kau thad kar yang zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma myed pa'i me tog gi khang bu brtsegs
330a4(mdo): bar gnod tu gnas so// de 'phag+sa pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang dbyug kaM steng thog zag tu yang zla ba yid du 'ong ba tri ma myed pa'i me tog gi khang bu batshegs pa nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ 
330a5(mdo): me tog ka ta las mdzes par byas te gnas so// khang pa la tshigs pa'i nyen 'khor kun gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / dka' bo dang / bsnyen dka' bo dang/ dbang phyug dang
330a6(mdo): dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams lag pa rdza yab thogs nas g.yob cing 'dug ko/ de dag kyang 'khor 'dus pa chen po mang pos yongs su bskor te// 
330a7(mdo): mdun du byas so// dkyil 'khor lo rig pa'i rgyal po'i lha de dag thams cad kyang / nam mkhams zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma myed pa'i me tog kha gu 'chags pa 'i 'breng ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis smras pa'i khang / 
330a8(mdo): ba brtsegs po'i nang na/ 'khod pa ni nyo ma dang zla ba sa bzhin dang / nam mkhalas zla ba rtab rgyu ska dang / skar ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor la ba bzhin du satra'ab 'gyur ro// me tog de dag nang na lhangs/ 
330b1(mdo): kyi zla ba yid du 'ong ba drim myed pa'i me tog sna tshogs dang / lha rdzas kyi pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pun ta ri ka dang / man da rab dang / sa ha man ta ra ba dang / me tog ro tse dang / pa ha ro tsa dang / me tog sa la da
330b2(mdo): tra la dang / me toka mA sa dang / tsam pa ka dang / me tog a d+hi muka ta ka dang / a sho ka dang / me tog pa ta la dang / me tog ni la dang / mA hA na la dang / me tog kan b+ha dang / ba sha ka dang / me tog su man dang/ 
330b3(mdo): dpan dang / ku s+ya ka'i me tog gi char gyi rgyan 'bas so// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir dang / dkyil 'khor chen po la mchod pa'i phyir/ lha rdzas kyi chos gos srung pa dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyi char
330b4(mdo): srid du char 'bab cing / phyogs brgya'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'o// de ltar na cho 'phyal che ba'o che ba dag snang ngo po// / rol mo'i sgra yan lag lnga pa dag kyang ma brdungs par nam mkha'
330b5(mdo): la smra byung ngo // / 'phags pa don yo// da pa'i zhags pa'i sbong po'i mo ga zhib mo'i rgyal po// 
330b6(mdo): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan res gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba'i byin te/ sems
330b7(mdo): can dag pa chen po mchog tu dkon po'i 'khro bo'i rgyal po 'di smras te// rog sngags 'chang thams cad mchog tu grub par bya ba'i phyi re/ ma rungs pa thams cad 'joms pa/ sdig pa thams cad sreg par
330b8(mdo): bshad pa legs so legs so// 'di ni phye me'i tshe phyi ma'i des na rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis lan cig dran pa tsam gyis dgos pa thams cad slar 'gyur/ yi de la re ba thams cad yongs su
331a1(mdo): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugamathong ba sbyin par 'gyur/ gnas thams
331a2(mdo): cad du rtogs pa'i grub pa chen po rab tu stond par 'gyur/ rigs sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi yangs shing rgya
331a3(mdo): che ba chen po thams cad byed par 'gyur/ phyi ma'i dus ma 'di ni 'jig rten las
331a4(mdo): 'das pa gcig pu mchog tu grub para'agyur te las sgrub pa yang dag par/ 
331a5(mdo): 'grub pa'i phyir ro// de nas 'khros pa'i kod rgyangs skye chug 'bar ba zhes bya
331a6(mdo): dra'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnod sbyin chen po stong phrag brgya
331a7(mdo): li bdag po stobs che ba/ yung che ba brtan cing pha rol gnod pa chen po gang gis
331a8(mdo): lag mtha'i gcig gis ro'i rgyas tho lhun po chen po sprul par byed pa lha'i gnas gzhal myed khang
331b1(mdo): ldan 'das ga sogs ba gi nye bar phyin nachom ldan 'das na sus na
331b2(mdo): sa da' sems pa che gas phyin pas gzigs dang byug namam pa ga la rig
332a1(mdo): ldan 'das gzhal myed khang gnas dang bcas te bsregs so// gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'khor dang bcas pa 'bar pa cig tu gyur da te bsregs so// bcom ldan 'das bdag/ 
332a2(mdo): ni zhags te tshig cing zhu bar gyur da to// bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi bdag la skyob ba su lags/ dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba su lags/ bcom ldan 'das pa da/ 
332a3(mdo): de srog rnam par zhig go// dus kyi zhags pas bcings so// bcom ldan 'das po dag la phan gdags su gsol/ bdel bar gshegs pa bdag la bskyab du gsol// de nas de bzhin
332a4(mdo): shegs pa bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pas/ 'khros pa'i kA n+ye dra rgyangs kyi myig 'bur ba gnod sbyid kyi sde dpon chen po la dade skad ces bka' stsa lad to// gnod sbyin gyi sde dngon
332a5(mdo): chen po khyod ma 'jigs par 'khro bo'i rgyal po lcags kyu'i dkyil 'a// khor gyi rjes su song zhi/ byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug
332a6(mdo): 'di na khyod kyi skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / skyob pa dang / rten du 'gyur te/ sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa byad ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni khyod kyi skyabs dang
332a7(mdo): sa da // gyi tshogs pa'i gad ldan pa rgya phrag dang do// 
332a8(mdo): rgya sa rgyas / ra thas pa gang rgyas kyi na ma pa 'an las kyis ya phru
332b1(mdo): rgyam sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phags pa rgyan ramo gzigs dbang phyug gas pa de legs su so ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa 'phags pa khyen ras gzinyis
332b2(mdo): dbang phyug la bye zhidi sag pa brgyad ste/ zhabs sa btud de 'di skad ces ga sol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la skyabs su gsol/ thugs rje chen po bdag la bskyabs su gsol
332b3(mdo): bdag theg gcal la mdzad rmugs med/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsregs shing gcig pu 'bar bar gyu dad to// bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin du ma stong phrag bye ba 'khor dang bcas pa sros
332b4(mdo): dang bral bar gyur da to// shes pa ni sbyor/ stobs dang / rtsom 'grus dang / spro bar byed pa na nyams na/ bcom dan 'das kyi lus su zhig gsol bar bgyid/ byang chub
332b5(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzin/ sa dbang phyug gis 'khros pa'i gad rgyangs kyi sudrug 'a ra ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces
332b6(mdo): bka' stsal to// kye gnod sbyin kyi sde dpon chen po nyon cig/ paji srid ston gyi bar du yud tsam zhig sdod cig/ gnod sbyid kyi bdag po khyod kyis 'bram bu'i gling gi sems can mang po la
332b7(mdo): rnam par 'tshal ba byas/ khyod kyi bud myed dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang zhu ma mang ba na thos/ khyod kyis 'phags pa'i gyad mang po na nyims par byas/ byed kyis rigs sngags dang / 
332b8(mdo): dkyil 'bar dang / chog zhib mo mang po'i bar chad na byas/ grub pa rnams ni byed par byas/ ma grub pa rnams kyang myed par byas/ skal ba can mang po ni myeng par byas/ skal
333a1(mdo): myeng pa ni yod par byas byi 'am ba dang srog dang song khyod kyi bde' ba ni myed pas byas// 'am pa dang srog rnam khar 'jig pa ni 'phel bar byas// khyod kyis legs par bshad
333a2(mdo): pa ni yongs su bor/ khyod kyis nyes par bshad pa dang / ser sna ni mdudu byas/ rigs sngags 'chang thams cad dang / sems can thams cad la khyod nag po dang / rnam par 'jig par
333a3(mdo): rab tug nas khyod kyis ngan 'grothams cad ni sel/ khyod kyis dgal ba'i ma la rnams ni nub par byas/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na byed shin tu myi'i bad pa sdig pa can yin

333a5(mdo): pa yin pas/ kye gan spun gyi bdag po dam cig dang / 'aslab pa dang sdom pa khas blang bar bya ba dang / dag tha'i chos byos shig/ 'od kyang 'o bo khyod kyi skyabs dang
333a6(mdo): dpung gnyen du 'gyur bar bya'o// khyod kyi sdug bsngal bas nyam sa zag pa dang / bcings pa myi bzad pa dang / me 'bar ba myi bzang ba'i/ 'jigs pa las ngas yongs su thar bar bya'o//

333a8(mdo): dpal sems dpa' chen pos 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhabs gnyis la btud nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
333b1(mdo): dbang phyug la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ding slad chad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+ya na res gzigs dbang phyug khyod kyi bka' lung bzhin bgyi ste/

333b3(mdo): za zhugs kyu'i gzungs dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gang yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / dge' slong dang / dge'al slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge la bsnyen ma rnams yongs su
333b4(mdo): bskyang bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gzungs rig/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga kun spyod pa de la ni
333b5(mdo): bdag gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma rnams kyis 'og dang / thar nga phyogs bzhi'i kun tu bsod nams su dmyigs te/ bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab par bgyi'o// yongs su
333b6(mdo): bskyang bar bkya'o// lus la stobs dang / spro ba dang / gzi'i byin mang du bgyi'o// de'i yul phyogs su 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / 'chang 'du ba dang / ma legs pa dang / lo

334a5(mdo): yod pas gnas par bkye'o// thams cad du bdag mchil bar bgyi'o// / ji ltar bdag gi srog 'di yongs su bskyang bar bzhin du / gzungs dang / rigs sngags bsgrub pa 'di yang yongs su

334a7(mdo): kyi chad pas so sor bzlog par bgyi'o// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis khros pa'i gad rgyangs su myug 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
334a8(mdo): chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po legs so legs so// khyod kyis de bzhin du bya bar rigs so// sems cad thams cad rjes su gzung ba chen thos gzun
334b1(mdo): bar bya'o// rigs sngags 'chang pa la bdag nyid kyis srung ba dang bcad bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po de skyabs gsum la gnas shing dkyis 'khor chen po'idam tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs
334b2(mdo): pa'i bslab tshigs 'dzind pa la gnas par gyurd to// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pas/ byang

335a1(mdo): ngo'i ches bcwa lnga la/ 'bras chan dang 'om za zhing nang bar sngar langs lasa' bags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar dkyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas/ myi smra bar 'gan

335b7(mdo): ma tu la dang / pad ma dang / ku thA nas gnyis dang / ra dzi na dang / yungs kar dang / shing zhun dang / nar pad ma dang / bi sha ra dang / tsan tri ka rnams ragacin kyis smras te/ ri lu nas kyi mdze

336a1(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams ri dang nags tshal dang cor rong dang bcas pa rnams 'gul lo// rgya mtsho'i chen po ni 'khrugs so// mi ba chen po/ ni g.yos so// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi gnas

336a3(mdo): gnod sbyin de dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / brjed byed dang / gsang ba dang / tshangs pa'i srin po dang / bgyegs dang gzhan rngon myi bzad pa gzhan ma rungs pa de dag thams cad dri
