336b5(mdo): byed do// rims drag po ma rungs pa kun tu 'jug pa'i rin sa myi bzang pa drag po'i rims dang / rims drag po'i na rigs pa chen po dang / me 'bar shin tu che ba dang / zhag bzhi
336b6(mdo): ba'i rims myi bzang ba dang / drang ba'i rims sdug bsnga la che ba dang / rims gang dag 'chi ba'i zhags pa 'bar ba/ 'khrug pa drag po mya bzad pa/ zlos pa'i rims gso' dka' ba dang
336b7(mdo): nyin cig pa'i rims dang / nyid gnyis pa'i rims dang / nyin gsum pa'i rims dang / de bzhin du rlung las gyurd pa dang / 'khris pa las gyu ba dang / bad kan las gyurd ba dang / 'dus
336b8(mdo): ba las gyu da pa dang / rims rting pa dang / khrag gzer dang / gzhang 'brum dang gcin srib myi bzad pa dang / rims thams cad la bdugs bcam gyis the tsom myed par rnam par 'jig
337a1(mdo): par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / gang dag myi 'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / phyi ma yin pa'i gdon dang / gang dag gzhan myi'i gdon thams
337a2(mdo): ma cad bdug pa bdugs pa des mod la thams cad rnam par bral bar 'gyur ro// lcags kyu'i gsang sngags dam pa lan cig dran par byas na/ skyems byed dang / skams pa dang / brjed byed dang / 
337a3(mdo): gdon ra zal ya shwA dang / bdag nyid ngan par 'byung ba dang / grib gnon dang 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa gang du skye bo zhe sdang ba rnams 'byung ba dang / gang du gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / nyon
337a4(mdo): mongs pa mang po rnams la yid du 'ong ba bdags pa tsam gyis thams cad las de thar da par 'gyur ro// rgyal po nya khros pa dgang zhing rkun po dang / myi rgod kyi nang du song ngam/ cong ro
337a5(mdo): bgrod dka' ba'i nang ngam/ dog pa myi bzad pa'i nang du chud pa la lcags kyu lan cig dran pa dang / bdug pa mchog gis bdugs na thams cad du rtag tu bde la 'gro ba dang
337a6(mdo): gang dang gdudu 'gro ba na bde' bar 'gyur ro// de 'i lus la mes kyi tshugs/ chu chen pos khyer bar myi 'gyur ro// lpags kyu'i rigs sngags dran pa dang / bdug pa mchog gis bdugs
337a7(mdo): nas thams cad pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bde zhing legs par shi nad tu rgyas par 'gyur ro// de'i lus la mtshon gyis mya rgyags/ drug gis ma yin/ gsang sngags mchog du drag pos
337a8(mdo): ma yin/ de la byad kyis myi tshugs/ nad kyis ma yin/ nyon mongs pa drag pos ma yin no// gsang sngags dran pa dang / bdug pas bdag gdug pa ni thams cad du 'jigs pa
337b1(mdo): thams cad las tha rad bar 'gyur te 'di la dogs par myi bya'o// dkri dang phyir rgol po'i myi sems can ma rungs pa myi bzad pa rnams dang / 'thab mo 'gyed cing g.yul 'gyed pa na/ bdag
337b2(mdo): nyid gdug pas 'dug cing rig sngags lan cig dran par byas na/ thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur te mthong ba tsam la dogs par myi bya'o// gang rig sngags 'grub par myi 'gyur ba dang
337b3(mdo): gang zhig baphyogs kyis zin te nyams pa dang / blo zhan ci me mo can la bdug pa 'di sbyar ba bya zhing / gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod byas na/ des mchog tu dkon pa 'grub par
337b4(mdo): 'gyung mo// rgal ba myed pa bdag nyid gdug pa dang / ri lu ma chog gis bkru' ba dang / phyig bsgru ba dang / ga gi thog le byas na thams cad du skal ba can dang / dka'
337b5(mdo): ba dang dbang phyug mtshungs pa myed par 'gyur ro// no// ra dang 'bru 'phel zhing rgyal po dang 'dre bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du stobs thogs pa myed par 'gyur ro// thams cad
337b6(mdo): bya mchog grub pa dang / rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par dusathams cad du gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bzhi la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya ba'i phyir nyin mtshan du rjes su 'brang
337b7(mdo): zhing gnas par 'gyur ro// bsrung ba'i phyir rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung 'khor dang bcas pas// derigs sngags kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// bde' ba thams cad kyis tshim pa thob par 'gyu
337b8(mdo): gnas cig nas la yu bdun blangs pa la/ 'khro bo'i lcags kyi lan nyi shu rtsa ka cig bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas rigs sngags 'chang ba 'am gzhan gang yang rung ba nas/ dgel
338a1(mdo): skyong dang / bram ze bkren pa sdug 'phongs pa'i bud myed dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am bu mo'i don tu ri mu cig gis khrus bya/ cig gis bdag bdug cig gis gos bdug
338a2(mdo): macig ni ma yinam lnga dang sbyar te btung ba bya gcig ni gyo bor gzhag/ gcig ni dpung pa g.yas par gdags/ risu cig ni rnyed par btags na/ thams cad du 'byor pa thob par 'gyur zhing
338a3(mdo): thams cad du mchog bla na khyod 'a grub por 'gyur/ bsam 'grub par 'gyur/ rgud pa thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro// ma dang nyam chung ba dang / de bzhin du chag drugs dang / 
338a4(mdo): gyegs kyis zin pa dang / gdon ra za yag skyes zin pa de dag thams cad rab tu sbyar da ba tsam gyis rnam par zhig bar 'gyur te/ dogs par myi bya'o// sgrib pa thams cad rnam
338a5(mdo): par zhig par 'gyur ro// sngon bsags pa'i slob pa zam/ sa cad mod la rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ gsang sngag/ sa lan cig dran pa dang / bdug pa mchog gis bdug pa byas pas
338a6(mdo): dogs par myi bya'o// mnar myed pa myi bzad pa'i sdig pa dang dug dang / sems can ma rungs pa dang / las ngan pa dang phung ba rnams thams cad myong la myed par 'gyur ro// mes phye ma leb bzhin du rtag tu/ 
338a7(mdo): myur du sreg par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags lan cig dran par bya zhing / budag pa 'das bdugs na/ dus ma yin par 'chi'i ba thams cad zhig par 'gyur zhing thams cad du sbyar ba la dogs par bya bya'o// 
338a8(mdo): 'khor los sgyur ba thams cad kyi 'khro bo'i lcags kyu kyi zhug 'bar ba zhes bya ba 'i budrug pa'i rgyal pos khyis dang / sgo chen por nam nangs ka dang / nam sros kar 'dug cing gsang sngags lan cig
338b1(mdo): dran par byas nakhyib kyi nang der gang dag myi sdang bar 'dug par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed dbyed dang / grib gnon ma tshungs pa dang / myi ma
338b2(mdo): yin pa thams cad sdang ba bzhin du phyir byung zhing dus te/ kyi hud zer ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro// khyi ba gang yin pa 'gul pa dang / khyim dang rta babs rnams 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / dmyal ba'i
338b3(mdo): srungs ma mya bzad pa thams cad phyogs bslang bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / tri ze dang myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang
338b4(mdo): klu mthul po che thams cad bdug pa'i dri bla na myed pas skrag bam 'gyur ro// bsam bdun pa gang dag gnas pa'i khyim thams cad 'bar ba dang / lus bsregs pa dang / phyogs dang phyogs
338b5(mdo): mtshams 'khrul pa dang / bdug pa'i rgyal po'i mi thus la/ jigs pa myi bzad pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// g.yul 'byed pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab cing
338b6(mdo): 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing / rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro// bdel zhing legs par rgyal ba 'grub pa dang / thams cad du dpal thob par 'gyur ro// lha dpa lham yin dang / 
338b7(mdo): dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / klu rnams kyis bskyang ba'i phyir nyin mtshan du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rjes su skyong ba dang / dus thams cad du bla na myed pa'i gzi byin
338b8(mdo): skyed par byed do// 'khro ba'i legs kyu'i bla na myed pa'i grub pa'i thig le brjod par bya'o// thig le skar ma lta bu ni// lha'i nyi ma bzhin du sa// nyam byed pa'i 'od dang mtshungs// bsod/ 
339a1(mdo): rnams kaza'i brjid dag gis 'bar// mun khrod sgron chen ji bzhin du// mun po'i nang na sdang bar 'gyur// tshogs kyi dkyis na mdzes pa ni// skar mo'i tshogs ldan zla ba bzhin
339a2(mdo): abasod nams bye ba stong phrag dang // dpag tshad gzhal du myed pa yis// lus 'di dag ni brgya dad par 'gyur// mkhal la rin chen mchod sdong ltar// mtshan dang dpel byang babang pos brgya dang // 
339a3(mdo): risu bstend par byas nas ni// lus ni bsod nams tshogs kyis bskyed// gang zhig lus ni 'bar ba dang / shin tu bzang ba kho nar 'gyur// 'jig rten 'gon po dus rtag tu// phyag ni spyi bor
339a4(mdo): 'jog par mdzad// rtag tu mchog ni sbyin pa dang // kun tu bla myed par 'grub par 'gyur// cho ga zhib mo grub pa dang// gsang sngags grub cing phyag rgya dang // dkyil 'khor 'grub
339a5(mdo): cing dkyil 'khor gyi// rim par bye ba 'grub 'gyur te// na tu 'grub pa bla na myed// / 'ge'u wang dang / gur gum dang / ru rta cha bsnyams te/ sbya la/ 
339a6(mdo): 'khro bol lcags kyu'i gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ tshangs par myong ba mnyam par gzhag pa/ khrus legs par byas pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos shing / rtsang mas zla ba/ 
339a7(mdo): yar gyi ngo ches bcu gsum skar ma rgyal la bab pa'i che/ chu rtsang ma dang zhib tu btags la/ rgya shug gi 'bru tsam byas te/ grib ma la bskams la gang gi tshe dgos pa rtsom pa de'i tshe/ 'khro bo'i
339a8(mdo): lcags kyu lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ sprin 'tshams su thig le bya'o// sbyin 'tshams su thig le bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis
339b1(mdo): brlabs pa5/ mtshan nyid bzhin du theg le byas te/ byin gyis brlabs pa byas pa'i mod la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tsug tor gyi mtshan nyid rnam par mdzes pa'i thig le dang mnyam par
339b2(mdo): mtshungs par brgyan par bya'o// thams cad du mchod pa byas pa dang / rtag tu bla ma la gus pas mnyan par bya ba dang / rgyal po dang mtshungs pa'i blon po dang / btsun mo'i ning du song na thams cad dga' bar
339b3(mdo): 'gyur zhing thams cad mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// sems can kun gus pa dang / dga' ba ji ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa la bya ba bzhin byed do// nor dang 'bru dang / lha'i dpal thob par 'gyuraro//

339b7(mdo): cad spangs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par grol ba dang / nyon mongs pa dri ma dang / sdig pa dang dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms dang / dpag gi g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du rtag tu thams ca
339b8(mdo): du rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// dgra' dang phyir rgol ba rnams las gnas thams cad du kun tu rgyal ba chen po sbyin par 'gyur ro// thig le de lta bu byas te/ 'khro bo'i sngags kyu lan cig dran
340a1(mdo): par byas la/ grangs kang la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te/ drug gi skong gto dmug thams cad gzho gdangs par 'gyur ro// ji skar dka' bar 'jug par bya'o// lan gsum
340a2(mdo): azhugs kyi bar du sgo brtan gzhug pa'i gnas su 'khro bo'i lcags kyu 'ba' zhig bzlas brjod byas na de'i tshe lha'i bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgya nad pa bzang zhing mdzes pa blta bar 'os pa mchog tu mdog stug cing
340a3(mdo): 'phrig pa dang ldan pa dpal gyis shi ning tu spa zhing 'bar ba bzhin mo dzum pa/ lus ngo mcha ltar byed pa/ 'gros 'gying bag tu 'ong bar 'gyur te/ rgya tho me tsam bdud nas/ gser gyi snong rin po ches
340a4(mdo): bkang ba thogs ste/ rigs sngags 'chang ba la 'bul bar byed do// rigs sngags 'chang bas cad kyi smra bar bya'o// rin po che'i snod kyang thang bar myi bya'o// gsang sngags 'dra zhig dran

340a7(mdo): cing 'khros pa'i gzugs kyis dran par byas na/ de'i tshe de sa la 'gyel te 'gre ldog cing / kye rigs sngags 'chang rje btsun khyod rigs sngags 'chang khyab 'jug gi gzugs can gum mo gum mo zhes sgra
340a8(mdo): chen po 'byi nid to// de nas rigs sngags 'chang bas rjes su brtags te/ gal te kha chung bu bar byung na/ rigs sngags 'chang bas de grangs la/ rkang pa dang byin pa la bskus na rlung gi phung po bdun pa'i

340b4(mdo): sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i brgya stong phrag dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi 'khor gyis bskor bar 'gyur ro// gnas thanadas cad du dpon por 'gyur ro// gal te thig le byas te myi snang bar

340b7(mdo): byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// gal te 'go ba'i tshigs mar thig le byas na/ brgya byin dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po'i lha dang / sum bcu ma gsum pa'i ris kyi lnga'i bu/

341a1(mdo): kun tu gyod par 'gyur ro// che wA'i lo stong legs par grub par 'gyur ro// lte ba'i gnas su mig le byas te/ klu'i mtshor zhugs bcas kyi yod la/ klu'i rgyal po dpung dang g.yog/

341a4(mdo): bgyi'o// nor thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs gser dang dmyal dang bye dUr+ya dang / shang ka shi la dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang // gser dang / mu tika

342b1(mdo): bltas na/ dpal lha mo chen mo bka' stsol cing / mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// nor shin tu mang po rnyed pa sbyin par mdzad do// dpal lha mo chen mo khyim na rtag tu gnas par/

342b7(mdo): tha rad par 'gyur ro// 'phrag pa gnyis la thig le bya zhing / khro bo lan cig dran par byas na/ 'phrag pa gnyis 'bar bar 'gyur ro// mtshal dang sbyar te dri che ba dang bsres nas/ lag pa dang rkang

343a1(mdo): byas na/ dbugs rgyu ba rnams me 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lus mtha' dag bsku zhing / gsang sngags yang du brjod byas na/ lus mtha' dag 'bar bar 'gyur ro// chu dang / 
343a2(mdo): ang nyungs kyis bskrad nas// bum pa dang / bum bu la zhi ba'i thig le byas te/ dri chus steng du gtor pa dang / bcas pa byas na/ phyir yang gnas par 'gyur ro// ral gri dpa/ gtun shing dang / dgra
343a3(mdo): sta dang / 'khor lo dang / mudung rtse gsum pa dang / rdo rje dang / zo ba dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung la bsku zhing rjes su dran par byas na/ skad cig tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro// lhung bzed la bskus
343a4(mdo): na 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'gro bskus na skra 'bar bar 'gyur ro// du la bskus te/ gnas mthon por bus na/ sgra gang du thos pa tsam gyi sems can thams cad kyi 'khro ba thams cad
343a5(mdo): dang / sdig thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// ngan pa dang / ma rungs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// sprin logs su bus na rlung sprin dang / ser ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ 
343a6(mdo): grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir bus na/ byur dang gnod pa thams cad dang / lo nyes dang / nad ma rungs pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'byed pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / myi bde' ba dang / 
343a7(mdo): 'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang // sha ba dang / yi dgas dang / skyem byed dang / grib gnon dang / 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// / 
343a8(mdo): rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// sang sngags dang / byad dang / sbod tong dang / drug gis 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su tha dad bar 'gyur ro// 
343b1(mdo): rgyal po'i sgor bus na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa thams cad dang / dkra dang / phyir rgol ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing / lan 'ga' yang 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// ba lang
343b2(mdo): 'chi ba dang / phyugs 'ching ba dang / myi 'chi ba dang / rta 'chi ba dang / glang po che 'chi ba dang / rnga mo 'chi ba dang / byung dang / lo nyos dang / nad dang / myig nad dang / nad thams cad kyi 'jigs pa chen
343b3(mdo): po byung ba la khang ba'i steng du/ skad drag bor lan cig dung sgrar 'bud cing / bzlas brjod byas na/ bud pa tsam gyi mod la/ thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// char myi 'bab pa'i che/ klu'i gnas mcho
343b4(mdo): 'dra bu da bus na/ mod la klu'i rgyal po rnams/ char ba'i rgyu na gtong bar 'gyur ro// char ches pa'i sprin logs su dus na/ shA nad tu char ches bzhi par 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang mtshan
343b5(mdo): ma ngan pa dang / bkra myi shis pa 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// mtshams chen po bcad nas/ rim thon po'i khar bus te/ ci tsam du dung smra thos pa de tsam tshun chad 'tshams chen po bcad pa byas
343b6(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gyi 'tshams bcad na/ bskor zhing bus dang / dkyil 'khor 'tshams bcad pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khro bo'i rgyal po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bsgrub pa/ bla na myed pa thams/ 
343b7(mdo): cad bya la la/ sems can zhi bar bya ba ni nas dang nyungs kar mar dang 'asres dang / shing ar ka'i mes bus te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas pa tsam gyis dpag tshad kyi nang kun tu zhi ba chen por 'gyur/ 
343b8(mdo): ro// yams kyi nad kyi gnod pa thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / brtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan brgyas brgyad sbyid sreg byas na/ dpag chad stong kun tu zhi bachen
344a1(mdo): kyi sa sa kyi thul ba po/ na dang / sungs sa dang / gang 'bres te/ se sa ca rgyamam sreg shing gi mi seM te/ sbyin sreg san ba na dam nyig rtsa gtsigags/ rgya
344a2(mdo): brgya de byas na yid la ji ltar sems shing 'dod pa thams cad du mngon skyed kyi las rnams byed par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags klu dab par byed 'dod na/ 'bras yos dang / nyungs kar dang / zho dang / 
344a3(mdo): sbrang ci rnams mar dang sbyar te/ shing a rga'i yam sreg shing gi sa me sbar te/ sbyin sreg lan bdun byas na/ rang gi 'khro ra 'igasang sngags bsgral ba 'grub par 'gyur ro// lan bcu bzhir/ 
344a4(mdo): byas na dang yongad pa'i sngags kyu thub par 'gyur ro// sa makla kri bzlas brjod dang / byin theg byas na/ den yod pa'i segs pa'i nyi 'grub bur 'gyur ro// sa sa rgyas brgyang 'thos brjod dang / 
344a5(mdo): rnams so// gzhan yang 'gro ma chen po stong zag pargya ma chog tu chug pa chen por 'gyur ro// tis dang 'bras so pa dang / zho nga spang tsa dang / mar gyur te/ sangs pa bdun gyi'i srig byas na/ 
344b1(mdo): thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/ brgya byin la stsogs pa lha thams cad/ lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa yang 'ong zhing rig sngags 'chang ba la bsnyen bkur byed cing dbang
344b2(mdo): tu 'gyur ro// nyi ma dang zla ba dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa la mdud par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dbang du byana'abras sa lu dang / til
344b3(mdo): dang / yungs kar dang gu gul dang zho dang / sbrad rtsi rnams mar dang bsres te/ sbyini sreg lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i tshogs rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// klu char 'bebs par
344b4(mdo): bya na/ 'bras yos dang / nyungs kar dang / na ga pus pa dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na/ de nas klu rnams char pa'i rgyun chen po 'bebs par

346a1(mdo): sog les 'ag sa zagags pa ltang kun dga' so ma reg pa yang de dang ldam// kun dga' bos 'jigs shig bdag cag gis khyod wa'i sted du bdag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung /

348b8(mdo): mngom pi ni d+ha ni/ byin d+ha ya nan/ bka krA ni/ na sha ni/ khang d+yanan ka la bI nA sha ni/ dad ma sa/ b+ha sma/ b+ha swanaM/ ma sa ni/ bAn d+ha ni swA hA// / kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gyi sde/

349a2(mdo): dus kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi rjes su zhugs nas/ gang 'od zer de dag gis gang la reg pa 'od zer gyi dri bas reg nas rims su 'gyur ro// de yang gcad do// kun dga' bo ro langs kha cig pa zhes bya ba zhig
349a3(mdo): yod de/ de yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdu bar bya'o// klu'i rgyal pos 'dzand ces bya ba yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdu bar bya'o// klu thams cad dang / grul bu thams cad dang / yi dgas thams cad dang / sha za'
349a4(mdo): thams cad 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus// nam mkha' lding yang de nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ de bzhin du blon po dang bcas pa/ dang / 'khor dang bcas pa sa 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdu bar bya'o// 
349a5(mdo): kun nas dpag tshad brgya dag tu// nga yis chad pa trag byasapas/ pal 'byung pos byar ci yod// nga yis sdang ba thams cad bcom// gsod par gyur pa stobs po che/ 
349a6(mdo): ro langs dag gis byar ci yod/ de dag kyang ni nga'i zhags pa yis// kun nas yongs su bskor ba yani// / zhags pa kun gyis de dag kyang // rmugs shing shi nad tu mongs par byas// 'di yis bdag
349a7(mdo): gi don grub cing // gsang sngags tshig rnams grub 'gyur cig// na ma sid d+han na/ si d+yan tu man tra ba da/ sa stir me sArba sad tA nan tsa/ swa hA// / sangs rgyas kun gyi stongab
349a8(mdo): gang dang / dgra bcom rnams kyi stobs gang dang // dam pa'i chos kyi gzi brjid kyis// bde la legs su ni rib gyu rad cig/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis// rtag tu 'jigs pa/ 
349b1(mdo): thams cad la swA hA// cho ga ni lan drug bcu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya ste/ kai me ru dang bal gtsang ma la stsogs po'i skud pa dmar po la mdud pa dor // de bzhin byab pa yang bya'o// 'byung / 
349b2(mdo): po thams cad dang / brjed byed dang / sems rnam par g.yengs byed la stsogs pa dang / drug byin pa dang / rus byas pa dang / rkang bzhi pa rnams las kun tu 'gro ba grub pa mchog yin no// bcom ldan
349b3(mdo): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mya dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
349b4(mdo): bar bstod do// // 'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// 
349b5(mdo): rgya gar gyi mkhan po pa R+Sha r+ya sa ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsha ba/ rgya kar gyi mkhan po'i shi tA/ sa da ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur/ 
349b6(mdo): rgya kar skad du/ a n+ya danyal na skanamadar ni sarba ka ti/ ba ri no di rdi// bod skad du/ 'phags pa ye shes ta la ya zhes bya ba'i
349b7(mdo): gzungs/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sdig sbyong ba dang / thams cad mkhyend/ pa la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom
349b8(mdo): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ta la la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshe gas pa gser gyi 'od rtsigs snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i sku
350a1(mdo): sgrogs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpal 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzungs
350a2(mdo): sa myong ba'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po de dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag pa dang nyi ma'i gnas na bzhugs so// de nas lha'i bu zla ba
350a3(mdo): dang / nyi ma gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ka la bzhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag ga la ba der song nas/ de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa seng ge'i khre la
350a4(mdo): bzhugs pa rnams dang / khang pa brtsegs pa 'dzam bu'i rgyalamatshan brtsegs bdag gi nang na/ byang chub sems dang / 'di dag bkod pa yang mthong ngo // de nas lha'i bu zla ba dang / 
350a5(mdo): nyi ma gnyis la ci sems te/ ji ltar byas na bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'i de rnams las sems can la snang ba sbyin pa dang / mun pa mun
350a6(mdo): nag bsal ba'i phyir shar ba'i gzungs sngags phyogs bcur khyab pa'i blo can zhes bya ba gang gi mthus bdag cag sems can thams cad la snang ba byed pa thob par 'gyur zhig go snyam mo// de nas de bzhin
350a7(mdo): gshegs pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gse lha'i bu zla ba dang nyi ma de dag ga sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis ma byen nas/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa
350a8(mdo): dang bcas pa de dag gis gzungs sngags 'od dag bkas su lad to// sad+ya thA den tsag shur da da/ tsag kU sha pa/ d+hu ya me thA/ ka ya \u0f7f/ id zed za na/ sa su ra t+ya/ sa ra Ta// su thAs
350b1(mdo): nasas nas urtan/ Ang ni/ me ni/ r+b+ba / can \u0f7fnus/ na ku tin su ti/ d+hari rdi ri/ tsun d+huH/ na dang / sa ka / 
350b2(mdo): sum pani zhum pa ni/ shes// di// ka kan/ sa na ste/ // 
350b3(mdo): da su da su/ da su ha su/ shes pa ni/ swa ha// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos/ lga'i bu zla ba dang / nyi ma dag la/ 'di skad ces
350b4(mdo): smras so// kye rigs kyi bu dag gzungs sngags 'di ni sem sa can ngan song du 'gro ba rnams la phan gdags pa'iphyir sangs rgyas bye ba blag brgyad bcurtsa brgyad kyis gsungs
350b5(mdo): yin te/ rigs kyi zud/ sranas 'ab pa'i me tog na ches nyed par pa'i gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dga'ajig rten du 'byung bdi des bu ma yid do// rigs kyi mu
350b6(mdo): dge gsungs sngags kyi tshig 'ang dag ni ches rnyed par sgra'i/ 'di dag 'chang ba'am/ thog pa ni de ltam yi no// rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams nyid par sla'o// zungs sngags
350b7(mdo): ga da dang 'dig byed du gyung ba ni da ma yin no// rigs kyi bu dgagal te sems can pa dang byed pa nas 'khod pags pa gnas pa tshams byed pa la byed pa/ mas sun slong na
351a1(mdo): pa'i sems can de dag gi phyir gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum brjod na/ de'i gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gi mthus sems
351a2(mdo): cad dmyal ba chen po mnar myed pa kha brgya gyes par gyur da la/ sems can de dag kyang yongs su tha rad bar gyur da na/ 'dzam bu'i gling ba'i myi rnams su ji smos te/ gang dag na sam du grag par gyur pa
351a3(mdo): de dag gis bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po rnams dang / zla ba dang nyi ma rnams kyis yongs su zin pa yin no// snyam du shes pa kho nar bya ste/ 
351a4(mdo): 'di sa som nyi 'am/ yidadi gnyis bskyed par myi bya'o// tad ya thA/ d+hu na ti/ d+hu na Ti/ ma da d+hu na Ti/ su ru su nu swa hA/ shug kla b+hi sho d+ha ni/ ta ra ta ra sa ha/ dze ti sha ra d+hi bai
351a5(mdo): tu ru tu nu swA hA/ pad ma ma la ni si Sh+ya ta ra bud ti/ hu ru huHsa hA/ s+yAd t+ya b+hud d+hi s+yAd t+ya a pa lo ka dzI/ ka ra karaki ri ki ri si hA/ d+hur na brud dz+haM/ a pra ti ha ta/ thung ti
351a6(mdo): tsu nu n+ya ru/ swA hA/ lag shan tsi ti/ byam pa'i hi re/ mu n+ya ru/ khu du wu n+ya ku ru sa twA/ de dar/ ma hA dang / d+ha ma d+ha ra/ yan NI ye+e swA hA/ su pra te/ su ma te/ ma ba dz+ra \u0f7f
351a7(mdo): sata b+hu rni/ d+har d+had skar/ yan ti ye swA hA// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ta la la la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi 'od babregs sngang
351a8(mdo): thal phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa bden gsungs la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// sa dA/ 'phags pa
351b1(mdo): ye shes ta la la zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba rdzogs s+ho// 
351b2(mdo): rgya kar skad du/ ma hA shA ni ma dad da sha ka// / bod skad du/ dpal chen mo'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa/ sangs rgyas
351b3(mdo): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams bdel ba can na bzhugs te
351b4(mdo): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags ba s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 
351b5(mdo): phyogs cig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas/ s+yan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong
351b6(mdo): dam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan sems can gang la la zhig gis dpal chen mo'i mying bcu gnyis po 'di shes sam/ 'jani da ta ma/ klog gam/ sgrub
351b7(mdo): bam/ brjod na/ de dbul ba dang bral te phyug por 'gyur ro// de nas 'byung po thams cad kyis de ltar gyur da cig ces smras so// de la mying bcu gnyis pa ni 'di lta ste/ bkra ga shis ma dang / 
351b8(mdo): dpal ldan ma dang / pad ma'i 'phreng dang / nor bdun ma dang / kar sham ma dang / snyan pa che ldan ma dang / pad ma'i spyan dang / grags ldan ma dang / gzo'i' chen ma dang / zas sbyin ma dang / 
352a1(mdo): rin chen 'od ldan ma dang / dpal chen mo'o// / tad ya thA/ dza ni g+h+na ni sarba kA r+ya s+ya d+ha ni si mi si mi/ ni mi ni mi a lag sh+na me na sha ya swa hA/ sangs rgyas thams
352a2(mdo): cad la phyag 'tshal lo// lan gsum bzlas brjod bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa s+yan ras dbang
352a3(mdo): phyag yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par ma stod do// / 'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho/ 
352a4(mdo): n+ya kar ska dad du a r+ya dA ma sa ga ra na ma ma ha ya na su tra/ 
352a5(mdo): bod skad du/ 'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtshol zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'ams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i
352a6(mdo): dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das pa ra na se trang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na/ dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
352a7(mdo): kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal da pa/ dge slong dag ngas na chom zab mo mthong bar dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba/ cha 'phra ba/ brtag par mkhas shing shes pas rig par bya ba rtogs so
352a8(mdo): ras ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang / lha rnams dang / myi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir chos kyi/ 
352b1(mdo): kyi 'khor lo yang bskor to// ras thogs pa myed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir nges pa kho nar bsgrub par bya'o// dge slong dag chos kyi rgya mtshol zhes bya ba'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi na
352b2(mdo): grangs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ blo gros kyi blo dang ldan pa/ rtogs pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ bstan pa'i blo dang / shes rab kyi blo
352b3(mdo): dang ldan pa/ gsung gi mchog dang ldan pa/ spobs pa mchog dang ldan pa/ mkhyen cing gzigs pa dag gis bstan cing bshad pa yod de/ gang dag de shes pa dang gang dag de 'dzin pa de dag gi
352b4(mdo): ni myur ba kho na chos lnga thob par 'gyur ro// lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ zos pa 'dzind pa'i dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / brjed ngas myed pa'i dran pa dang ldan zhipa/ chos bzung ba
352b5(mdo): rnams chud zla bar 'gyur ba'i blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba da pa/ rnon po thob pa'i rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang nga/ yi ge dang don dang tshig la 'jug pa'i spobs pa thogs pa
352b6(mdo): byed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems cadan rnams kyi rgyu'i lam mngon par shes nas/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa la mkhas par 'gyur te// chos lnga po 'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin
352b7(mdo): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bzhag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis che ldan pa kun dga' zo la bka' stsal da pa/ kun dga' bo chos thams
352b8(mdo): cad kyis sdom gyi gzhi bsdu ba khyod la bstan bar bya ste/ des na khyod kyis ma thos pa'i chos rnams ni thos par 'gyur ro// zos pa'i chos rnams ni 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bzung ba'i chos rnam
353a1(mdo): ni nyams su len par 'gyur ro// nyams su blangs pa'i chos rnams ni gzhan dag la khong du chud par byed do// tshig gi rab tu dbye ba lnga ni 'od lta ste/ 'du byed kyi tshig gi
353a2(mdo): rab tu dbye ba dang / de bzhin ma thos pa'i tshig gi tshig rab tu dbye ba dang / bla na myed pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba dang / sa nas sar brtag pa'i yi ge'i tshig rab tu dbye ba dang / nges pa'i tshig dang
353a3(mdo): brda' sna tshogs kyi tshig gis rab tu dbye ba'o// de la 'di dag ni gzi byin brtag par byed pa'o// rig sngags dang ldan pa ste/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnod sbyin dang / 
353a4(mdo): srin po dang / grul bum dang / yid dgas dang / sha za 'dzam bu'i kwing du lhags pa thams cad kyis/ kang zag de la zas kyi sna grangs rnams dang / sman rnams sbyin
353a5(mdo): bar 'gyur ba'o// de la gsang sngags kyi tshig chos las byung ba/ gzhan dag la myi gnod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
353a6(mdo): dang / dris rnams kyis mnos pa bstan pa yongs su 'dzin pa ni 'di dag yin te/ kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag nyon cig khyod phyis 'gyod ta re/ sad ma ze ngan/ ka man
353a7(mdo): ta ma bud tse/ ra di su ra ti/ kan tra ma/ thu ma na ne'i la ta/ a sa ku la swab+hU mi/ a nu s+pha ri/ as+dza ga ma/ mi shi sA na/ a na a pug+ta twe/ yA mu ga g+hu ma b+h+re/ pA b+he/ 
353a8(mdo): ma gu ra ba ya ba/ a s+ya bka kya s+ye/ bi lang ka be lA pa ta/ shr-i ba ba ri/ pan tsa ka/ pra sa te dza na sa ba be la/ a dra pe la/ ni sha ku/ mu tse d+hu me u dze/ 'dzu me
353b1(mdo): kun dga' bo 'di ni gnod sbyin dbab 'a grub pa dang / gnan sbyin gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung mthong ba yang bsnyen bkur yang byed
353b2(mdo): byed/ rim gro yang byed byed pa/ rnams 'ching ste/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis de gnod sbyin dbang pa grub pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa rnams zung shing / kun dga' bog pa la la
353b3(mdo): gsang sngags kyi tshig skyon myed pa'i tshig 'di dag 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / kun chub par byed pa de la ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi sems bzhin du gnas so// kun dga' bo
353b4(mdo): gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bzung bas ni dran pa dang / ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rnams dang bral/ par myi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo shar gyi lus 'phags kyi/ 
353b5(mdo): kra da ni gnod sbyid srid pa sdang byed ces bya ba gnas so// kun dka' bo nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi klung na ni/ gnod skyon cher pyod ces bya ba gnas so// kun dga' bo byang gi
353b6(mdo): sgra gyi snyan gyi klong na ni/ gnod sbyin rnam grangs zhes bya ba gnas so// kun dga' bo 'dzam bu'i klung ni ni/ gnod sbyin rnam grangs thob ces bya ba gnas te/ kun dka' bo gnod/ 
353b7(mdo): sbyin de dag kyang dran par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gnod sbyin de dag las gzhan gza'i byin za ba gang yin pa de dag kyang dad pa thob par 'gyur ro// dad par gyur nas kyang dad pa myi byed pa
353b8(mdo): bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar byed do// kun dag pa po de la 'di dag ni shes bzhin gyi tshig drang srong gis bstan pa dag yin te/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong gi mchog ga
354a1(mdo): cig gi mchog/ srog chags 'byung po thams cad la/ rnam par myi 'che ba'i tshig rnams zung shig dang / ngas bshad do// kun dga' bo de la ni nga'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i
354a2(mdo): gnod sbyin de dag gis kyang bar chad byed kyi nus so// mad la n+de dan/ dan dir/ man da ra/ ba ran/ rung dra dra/ tib+da/ in tra/ man d+hu/ na pa le/ sa dang / sad+h+yas te/ 
354a3(mdo): mi la la ba ma te/ ma bi ti/ ta ra bar/ yaM bi shwa sa dA ma bi tiSh+Tha/ ba rib ta/ i sha brta/ sad Sha stA/ kra ma kra ma ti nan/ sa si pa \u0f7f/ ma la bi na da'i tha sha su re/ d+hur
354a4(mdo): d+hA ra ra/ su pra gra ug rdza/ muka dra ba ti bi rir sa kra ma ni// thams cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / 
354a5(mdo): grul bum dang / yid dgas dang / lus skyal po dang / klu dang / tri ba dang / sha ba gnas pa kang yang rung ba de dag gis khyim gyi nang na gnas pa dang / lam du shugs da
354a6(mdo): rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i tshig 'di dag zos nas dga' bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zung shig phyis 'gyor ta re/ de nas
354a7(mdo): dam che bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gnod sbyin grub pa 'di dag nI/ gling bzhi dag na mo zhes bya/ gsang sngags 'di dag su 'chang ba// de'i dran pa
354a8(mdo): 'phel bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa'i// gnod sbyin de dag lhags nas ni// chos rgyal rnams kyis bstan pa dag/ nyan par gyur ba de la ston // dpag/ 
354b1(mdo): chad brgya phrag mang por yang // mthard kyis su ni song nas kyang // zab cing don dang ldan pa'i// tshig 'di dag ni ldan pa'i// tshig 'di dag ni mnyan par bya// 'di dag chos kun rtsa pa ste/ 
354b2(mdo): 'di dag khams rnams mnyan par gyis// drag po dag gis thos na yang // phyi nas mchog tu dga' ba skyed// gang la bde'i dang sdug bsngal mying // de la de ni dga' bar 'gyur// sa 'di
354b3(mdo): chags pa myed pa ste// sangs rgyas sa ni bsam myi khyab// chags pa myed par bstan pa'i// bsam yas sa de thob gyurd nas// nyi ma smin las byung ba ltar// de ni sa stengs de bzhin sdang
354b4(mdo): 'di la skye mched phung po rnams// bden dang byang chub yan lag dbang // dge ba'i chos ni zab mo rnams// sangs rgyas gsung ba ci yang yod// de'i thos pa tshogs rnams gang
354b5(mdo): rnams kyang chud zar myi 'gyur te// ma thob chos rnams 'ang/ dag thos// nyes dang nyes myin rnams la mkhas// / rtogs par khong du chud pa'i mchog/ myi bzangs rnams
354b6(mdo): kyang dag par 'gyur// 'chang ba dang ni ston byed pa// de ni// ga tu sangs rgyas bsngags// sangs rgyas bsngags ni chos rnams la// the tsom myi za bden pa kang // bden des bdag
354b7(mdo): la lung mnos pa// ci yod thams cad gnas gyur da cig/ sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung rnams la// byams pas gnas pa'i bden pa des// rang gi sems dang gzhan sems la/ 
354b8(mdo): ston pa rab tu gnas gyurd cig/ gling bzhi gnas kyi gnod sbyin dag/ ma dad pa ni dad par bstand// ga la rtogs pa myi snang ba// de la de kun don ston 'gyur// gnod sbyin sku
355a1(mdo): gdong gang yin dang // klang chen na dang khyad par stobs// drag po dga' byed gsod byed dang // zla ba 'gon myed lus gsod pa// dga' sde dang ni lag dpa' dang // srin po
355a2(mdo): dang ni sa 'dzin pa// sdang bu ka dang rna bzangs dang // ral gyi spu can bong bu rnams// thams cad grub par byed pa'i tshig/ gsang sngags 'di dag su 'dzin dpa// gnod sbyin srin po de dag
355a3(mdo): ni// spro bar gyur nas 'dzum par byed// rtag tu de'i spobs pa dang // tshig rnams dang ni lung bstan dang // nges pa'i tshig dang chos kun dang // yi ge rnams la mkhas par 'gyur// 
355a4(mdo): sung mnos pa yang chud myi za// rtogs pa mtha' yas 'phe la bar 'gyur// rtag tu don dngos yi ge la// de'i she sa pa 'phel bar 'gyur// sum bcu rtsa gsum lha rnams
355a5(mdo): dang / myi mjed bdag po lha rnams dang // myi mjed pa dag/ po tshangs pa yang // de'i legs bshad nyan pa rnams / de'i mo la dran par byed// s+yad ya thA dan/ mu kun
355a6(mdo): ha ra Na bi di ra na/ bi da sad kra ma na/ o ma su mu kha/ ta ga na/ a pa pri ya/ a s+tha me go ba ha te/ u ru pa/ phra ba na dan/ sa kra me pa ha/ dza ga re/ i sha ga re/ pra bi sha ga re
355a7(mdo): kun d+ha ba na/ ud ta na/ bi ku na i sha kun/ a tu la tu la/ i ti bi ti/ ba ri tsa mo sha/ ha ra dza ga he/ e pa sam pra mu khe/ e ga ba re/ dzA hu sa hu/ hi ti yA tha hu/ ra tu ra di
355a8(mdo): ka ya na/ tha sum hu/ mug kra nu/ rna mas su/ sa kra ha/ a biki kra ha/ prad ta bi b+hi I/ bsus su/ ka ra ku tu/ d+ha sa h+ya/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gsang sngags kyi
355b1(mdo): ni tshig 'di dag/ gang gi lag dang lus la yod// de ni thos la rmongs pa myed// de ni shes rab myed mya 'gyur// skad bda' ji bzhin nyi ma bzhin// zla ba ji ltar snang ba bzhin// de ltar thos
355b2(mdo): dang don kyis kyang // mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar la reg/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal da to// s+yAd ya thA dan/ tsar te bI tsa ra d+ha/ a ma gu
355b3(mdo): te/ a ti ma ti/ pa ra ha re/ g+hA na b+he/ di bi ra me/ ma da pra ti/ b+ha ha ne/ dza ye dza ya/ a nu ke la ba me/ uka kra ba ti/ swa ma sa ra/ ma bi sa re/ bu ku ma te/ pra bi bar ste/ sa
355b4(mdo): a dzi ta dza ye/ nu pa le/ s+ya ko ma n+ya/ san d+hi/ ni gu ma no/ sa kle/ tsa pA tsa pA/ tsu su nu lu/ pu lu pu lu/ bya ba pra sa re/ ka ra ka ra ban d+he/ dzi ba bI dza/ a ba pra
355b5(mdo): ti/ san b+hi/ nA da bu ma ti/ Na N+ya ma te/ a ri da si dzaSh+Tanu ma na tAM/ a sang gra ha ba ti rig sngags bsdus pa ligasang sngags kyi tshig 'di lus la thogs te/ 'tshang na
355b6(mdo): gling bzhi pa chen po bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / sha za gnas pa/ de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing / 
355b7(mdo): dbang du ma gyurd pa rnams kyang dbang du 'gyur ro// don thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba bzhin du/ 'chol ba'i mthar thug gi bar du 'chi bar myi 'gyur// myed par myi 'gyur ro// 
355b8(mdo): de la cho ga ni 'di yin te/ dgon par 'dug la/ gzungs sngags 'di dag thams cad zhag bdun gyi bar du brjod do// nyin lan gsuM mtshan lan gsum dran par bya'o// 
356a1(mdo): de nas zhag bdun lon pa'i 'og tu bsam pa rnams cad grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa la nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
356a2(mdo): bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang myi dang / lham yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
356a3(mdo): bar bstod do// / 'phags pa chos kyi rgya mtshol zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdol// rdzogs s+ho// 
356a4(mdo): rgya kar skad tu/ ar+ya ba na sha ba ri na ma ha d+ha ra ni/ bodaH/ da du/ 'phags pa ri khrod ma lo mo byon ta'i gzungs
356a5(mdo): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag myed la phyag 'tshal lo// 
356a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phaklas pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' chen po mthul chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// sbyin
356a7(mdo): thuphan za mo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das ma mi'u thung ma ri grod ma lo ma gyon ma sha za mo khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// zhags pa dang / dgra sta thogs pa/ bdag gi
356a8(mdo): 'jigs pa gang dag ci yang rung ba dang / yams kyi nad gang dag ci yang rung pa dang / 'chi byed kang dag ci yang rung ba dang / 'chi byed chen po gang dag ci yang rung ba thams cad dang
356b1(mdo): gnod pa gang dag ci yang rung ba thams cad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad ci yang rung ba thams cad dang / 'o du gnod pa'i nad gang dag ci yang rung ba thams cad dang / 'go nad dang / 
356b2(mdo): 'gakha'i nad dang / 'brel ba de dag thams cad ni byis pa kho na las byung gi/ mkhas pa dag la ni ma yin te/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshige des song shig/ mkhas pas byin gyis
356b3(mdo): brlabs pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis bdag cag rnams bsrung ba gyis shig/ yongs su bzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba da
356b4(mdo): chud pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / phyag gzhil pa dang / dag gsad pa dang / drug mnan pa dang / mtshamasabacad pa dang / sa bcing ba gyis shig/ tad ya thA
356b5(mdo): au a mr-i te ka a mri te// a sha ste/ a sha stang ge/ ma ma ra/ ma ma ra/ sha ma/ pra shra ma/ a ba sha ma/ du mu bi/ d+hu lu hu lu du mu ye/ na mo sha pa rI nan/ 
356b6(mdo): na po ma da sha pa rinan/ bi sha rtse brda sha pa ri swA hA// / bi sha tse pa na sha pa ri sa dA ma ri/ serbA mA ri pra sha ma ni/ sarba du stan ban d+ha mu khye ni hUM phaT swa hA// 'phags par
356b7(mdo): khrod ma lo mgyon ma'i// gzungs rdzogs sngo// @/ rgya kar skad du/ bo d+ha min da a lang kA ra na mA d+har ni u pa ma yA// 
356b8(mdo): bod skad du/ byang chub kyi snying po'i rkyen ces bya ba'i gzugs kyi chog/ thams cad mkhyend pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'adus cig na
357a1(mdo): bcom ldan 'das par na ser ba ran se'i 'khor gyi khyams nad yangs pa na/ dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge' 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ 
357a2(mdo): bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur 'or ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpal lnga brgyal dang / thabs cig tu
357a3(mdo): bzhugs so// de nas yong bcom ldan 'das zla ba nya'i tshes bcwo la chos kyi 'brel pa'i gtam gyi slad du 'azhugs pa dang / sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag 'dun
357a4(mdo): bar gyurd te/ bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / s+yod pacan dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu dang / zhan mu stegs can dang / rgyas pa pa dang / bye brag pa dang / 
357a5(mdo): nam khar 'byed pa pa dang / cur khrod pa dang / phyag dang khrod ba dang / bkang gi tshul zhugs can dang / ri blugs na byargyas zhugs spyod pa de dag thams cad dang / 
357a6(mdo): dang / k+Sha dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lham yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ni dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mye dang myi ma yin pa mang pos yongs su basmra cing/ mdun du
357a7(mdo): 'ad bzhin du 'dus te/ com ldan 'das las kyi 'jigs par zhugs pa'i lem mnyan par 'dod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gyen snga 'khod do// lharnams kyi dbang po 'am byon
357a8(mdo): 'tsha sum bcu rtsa gsum ska'i bu brgya stong mang po dag gis yongs su bskom ba dang / myi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang tshangs ris kyi zhi'i bu brgya stong dang lhan cig tu lhags me/ 
357b1(mdo): nyi ma dang tha ba dang / nor bu 'azang po'i bu dang / gang ba bzang po dang / stobs kyi sgra dang / lha chen po dang / sred myed kyi bu dang / gshin rje dang / lus ngan po dang / rgyal ze chen po gzhan dag dang / 
357b2(mdo): dpal dang / tshig ldan ma dang / dung can ma dang / me tog gi so can ma dang / 'brog ma'i bu lnga brgyal 'khor dang rgya mtshol dang / dka' bo dang / nye dga' bo klu'i rgyal po stong phrag du mas yongs su
357b3(mdo): bskor cing mdun du bdar ba de dag kun kyang 'dus te 'khod do// 'khor nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang / myi 'am ci'i dbang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po phal po chos yongs su bskor cing mdun tu
357b4(mdo): bdang pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la yo ngas su bskor te/ mchod pa mngon par 'du bya ba byas nasachos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do// 
357b5(mdo): yang 'khor mang po don bram ze chen po khyab 'jug sbyin zhes bya ba grong khyer dmar bu can na gnas pa/ phyug pa/ nor mang pa/ long spyod che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu dang 'gran pa
357b6(mdo): mkhas pa/ bzol pa/ gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa/ dge ba'i don la brtson pa/ dad pa can/ bsam pa dge ba/ 'di lta ste/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ba/ dge bsnyen
357b7(mdo): dam pa zhig 'dug pa de/ bu myed par gyur nas de 'di snyam du bdag gi khyim nas bu byung ba myed do// gzhan yang bram ze rnams kyi rang bzhin 'di lta bu yin te/ rigs kyi bu sa bon myed par som
357b8(mdo): bar byed/ rigs myed pas de'i phyir 'gro ba rnams rigs kyi sa bon myed par sems par byed do// snyam du sems so// yang bram ze chen po khyab 'jug sbyin te/ 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das
358a1(mdo): nam ldananas / sa pa na na// lags 'ge 'a dunan rnam pa sa na dngag
358a2(mdo): sa dag tu yang bdag gi skye bzhin tu shes pa yin no// gzhan yang bdag gis ras gang nig gnas par bya ba bcom ldan 'das la bya bar bya zhing / tsam cin tho gang gis dge ba'i rtsal thams cad/ 
358a3(mdo): thu mo du bya ba dang / tha byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar bya ba dang / bdag rtag tu dkon mchog gsum dang thun mong du 'gyur ba dang / bdag gi
358a4(mdo): khyim nas bu bcal bar 'gyur ba de dang ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba bcom ldan 'das la yongs su zhu bar bya'o snyam tu sems so// de nas bram ze chen po khyab 'jug sbyin grong khyer dam/ 
358a5(mdo): bu can nas/ bcom ldan 'das g.ya ba der song ste phyin nasabacom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas ste/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba 'dud
358a6(mdo): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'od skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji la na chos cig gis dge pa'i rtsa pa thams cad bskyed cing 'di lta ste/ blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'an
358a7(mdo): rgyab dang / dkon mchog gsum dang thun mong du 'gyur ba rdotho/ bcom ldan 'das ji ka na bdag gis bu rnyed par 'gyurar la lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
358a8(mdo): stsal pa/ bram ze chen po khyed kyis zhu ga legs par zhu bas pa legs so legs so// bram ze chen po khyod kyis zhu ba'i gzhi bzang po zhus pa yang legs so// de lta bas nangs mitsam du yongs
358b1(mdo): su bsgrubs pa legs par rab tu yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bram ze chen po byang chub kyi snying po la rkyen ces bya ba'i gzungs gang gis khyod dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad bskyed par
358b2(mdo): gyur ba dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba yod de/ bram ze chen po sngon 'byung ba krang khyer chen po ma brgyan gyi nang sgo'i phyogs shi ka na/ lha ma yin gyi gnas zhes bya bani
358b3(mdo): skyed mos chas zhig yod de/ skyed mo mtshal de'i nang ma srin mo me tog l+h+wa ma yin ces bya ba phrag po bu sums can/ mdangs ma brog ma dpag tshad stong du yang skyes pa dang / bud byed dang / rkyen
358b4(mdo): dang / bu mo dag gi mdangs 'phrog par byed pa zhig gnas ba dang / grong khyer dmar bu can pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams skrag cing myi dga' nas/ bdag cag gis thabs ci zhig
358b5(mdo): bya zhes brjod par byed do// de nas grong khyer dmar bu can gyi skye bo rnams kyi nang nas/ rgan rabs zhig gis skye ba dag cig nyon cig/ kho bos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
358b6(mdo): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od rab tu mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung bar thos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i thad du deng la yongs su gus shig/ 
358b7(mdo): dang / bcom ldan 'das de skyob par 'gyur ro// zhes smras pa dang / de nas skye po'i tshigs de dag gis myi rgan po de la bcom ldan 'das de ka la bzhugs zhes dris pa dang / yul lnga yin
358b8(mdo): ra shugs zhes smras so// de nas skye ba'i tshigs de dag 'di ga du sa pas yi go bya zhes smras pa dang/ rkyenani pa de de/ kyi rgya rnams dpal phyogs kyang ma me da pa dang / ba 'a na/ 
359a1(mdo): lci bas dkyil 'khor gyis la/ sgo bzhi shin tu rnam par phye nas/ me tog sna tshogs dag bkram/ bum pa gang ba bzhi yang bzhag/ pog por bzhi dang / sna bshos kyi bu
359a2(mdo): AtsA ba bzhi yang bzhag/ phyogs bzhir mar me'i sdong po yang bzhagabya chus bkang la steng du yang chems shing yang bzhag nas/ sang gdugs tshad la s+yan 'dren to// zhes gsol pa
359a3(mdo): thob shig/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba mkhyend pa yin la/ bcom ldan 'das de ni sems can rnams srid pa'i btson ra nas bskal pa dang / 
359a4(mdo): sems can dmyal ba dang / rgyud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ma las 'asgral bar bzhed cing brtson pa yin pas/ bcom ldan 'das de phyi de nyin
359a5(mdo): bar 'khor mang po dang / rdzu 'phrul chen pos grong khyer mar bu can 'dir byon par 'gyur ro// de nas grong khyer dmar bu can gyi skye bo'i tshi gas de dag cig tu 'dus nas
359a6(mdo): sa phyogs mthon po zhig tu song ste/ gnas snang mar 'jo ba pa sang gi lci ba dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor byas nas/ me tog sdu rdzogs ni bkram// bum pa gang gang bas ni brgyad/ 
359a7(mdo): lha bshos kyi bum pa ni bzhag/ gdug pa mang pos ni gdugs/ phyogs bzhir yang mar me'i sdong po bzhag nas mar me sbar/ rol mo'i sgra chen po na bi sgrags/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yang
359a8(mdo): gser gyi bya rin po che spras pa chus bkang ba/ steng du tshams shing gzhag pa bzhag nasanatso dang ga zha'i sgra chen po 'don zhing lan gsum gyi bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang / 
359b1(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od rab tu mdzes pa'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo// thub pa sems can kun la byams mdzad pa/ bcom ldan de la phyag
359b2(mdo): 'tshal lo// ngo mtshar 'byung ba chos nyid can// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba nyams zag 'di dag bskyab tu gsol// sang gi gdugs chod la ni spyan 'dren
359b3(mdo): gyis/ thub pa bcom ldan gshegs par mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan sems can thams cad dbyugs phyung ste// 'gon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen mdzad nas ni// 'phongs 'gyur gyi
359b4(mdo): bzad 'di las bsgral tu gsol// zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas skye bo rnams kyis cig car dug de brjod pa tsam gyis phyogs de yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos
359b5(mdo): bya'i chu de yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bo nas rdzing chen po chu bzang po dro dang ldan bu yid du 'ong ba tshim par byed pa ro zhim ba/ ha cang yang myi grang ha cang yang myi dro bas gang pa/ me ton
359b6(mdo): ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu dang / pad makar pos khyebs pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/ 'bab stegs bzhi dang ldan pang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis smras pa/ lan kan gyis
359b7(mdo): kun brgyan pa bzhin du red de/ tshems shing de yang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa 'phang du ni dpag chad drug pa/ rgyar ni dpag tshad brgyad pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang
359b8(mdo): yal ka dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma can zhib du red do// sa phyogs de yang rgyar ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa/ zheng du ni 'khor gyi khyams chen po tsam du thag khru yang
360a1(mdo): par kun tu gnas shing dgal dka' lta bu shin tu mdzes pa zhig tu gyur da nas me tog skam las skyes pa dang / chu las skyes pa sna tshogs yang 'thungs/ bya sna tshogs
360a2(mdo): A dad pa dang / bzhad dang / ne tshe dang / re skegs dang / ma bya dpa / shang sha de'u dang / drar ba dang / ka ran da dang / 'ji ba dang / kun la dang / dezhan yang bya rnam pa sna tshogs gser gyi
360a3(mdo): chu dang / gser gyi mgo' dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi 'dal ma can dag kyang sgra sgrogs par 'gyur// me tog ta ma la dang / mya ngan chang dang / a ti mug ta ka dang / ba ri sha dang / satam
360a4(mdo): ba dang / mthon ka chen po dang / 'bra go dang / ta ra ni dang mi lan du ka dang / yu ti ka dang / sin du ba ga la stsogs pa me tog shing sna tshogs dag gis kyang brgyan/ 
360a5(mdo): 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'od rab tu mdzes pa'i rto ga gi byin gyi rlabs dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad pam dang / byang chub kyi khyad par gyi rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs
360a6(mdo): 'dadi'i mi thus cho 'phrul chen po de lta bu dag byung bar gyur to// de nas grong khyer dmar bu can gyi skye bo'i tshogs de dag thams cad ya mtshan du gyurd nas/ cho 'phrul chen po shin tu ngo mtshar che ba
360a7(mdo): yang snang / snga ltas chen po zhig kyang byung bar gyur ngan 'di su'i mthu/ 'di mu'i rnam par 'phrul ba yin zhig ku/ 'dzam bu'i gling na don chen po snang ba dang / yon tan gyi khyad par chen/ 
360a8(mdo): po byung ba dang // thun mong gi mtshan ma chen po byung ba las 'jig rten du don chen po zhig/ 'byung kor ma chag ces brjod par byed do// de nas skye bo'i tshogs de dag phan tshun 'di skad kye khyed
360b1(mdo): deng la/ bcom ldan 'das sang gdugs chod la spyan drangs pa'i phyir bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba mang po dag sta gon gyis shig ces 'dze rad to// de nas skye bo'i tshogs de
360b2(mdo): dag rings pa rings par rang rang gi gnas su dong ste/ de nyid kyi nub mo bza' ba dang btung ba dang / mang po mang po thams cad bsdogs nas/ rang rang gi bla re dang / me tog dang
360b3(mdo): bArtag pa dang / spos dang // 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / bud pa dang / pheg dag thogs te/ lam kar bsgags nas/ 'khor

360b5(mdo): mang po dang / yul lnga len na sems can rnams brtul te/ chos stond par mdzad pa'i 'dus pa chen po dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i
360b6(mdo): bya chus bkang ba zhig dang / tshams shing zhig byung bar gyurang nas brgyan snga na 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'dum pa dang bcas cing mkhyen bzhin du myang bas phyag mtshan mdog
360b7(mdo): bzang po brgya stong gis brgyand cing / me tog 'phreng ba brgya stong gis brgya nad pa bkang ste/ bya de yang bzhes tshems shing de yang bzhes nas cad myi gsung bas gnang ba mdzad do// de nas
360b8(mdo): 'khor mang po de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das spyan 'dren pa 'di ga las 'ongs snyam mo// de nas 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blogs shin
361a1(mdo): tu rnam dag ces bya ba zhig gnas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas lan gsu bskor ba byas te/ bcom
361a2(mdo): aldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das s+yan 'dren pa'i snga ltas bya chab kyis gang ba byung ba 'dig las mchis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
361a3(mdo): spyan 'dren gyi bya chus bkang ba 'od ni grong khyer chen po dpar bu can nas 'ongs kyis/ glo gros rnam dag song la chul shing brims shig/ gang gis grong khyer dmar bu can du 'gro 'dod pa de/ srung
361a4(mdo): nang par rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu' chen pos grong khyer dmar bu can du dong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na pos blo gros rnam dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung thos/ 
361a5(mdo): nas/ rings pa rings par song ste tshul shing brims shig/ nyan thos rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ gang zhig rdzu 'phrul gyi khyad par mngon par spyod pa de tshul
361a6(mdo): shing bzhes shig dang / sang gi gdugs chod la spyan 'dren gyis/ grong khyer dmar bu can du gshegs par bgyi'o// zhes smra bar byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' klo gros rnam dag
361a7(mdo): gis tshul shing brims nas bcom ldan 'das la gdas par gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das nang par kyi dus kyi che/ na bza' ba rnams te/ bkod pa chen po dang / 'khor yang
361a8(mdo): zo dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin phyi rlabs chen pos nam mkha' la gshegs bzhin du/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / myi 'am ci dang / nam mkha' lding dang
361b1(mdo): lha ma yin dang / lto 'phye chen po mang po rnga dang phyeg rdob pa dang / klu dbyangs lend pa phal po chos me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang
361b2(mdo): rgyan dang / bzhag pa dang / chas sna tshogs rnams kyis nam mkha'i ngos na/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus/ skad cig tsam
361b3(mdo): kyi grong khyer chen po dmar bu can du 'khor kyi khyams zag rgya chen po gan pa'i sa phyogs der byon te/ nam mkha'i ngos nas babs nas 'tshad kyi khams su gshegs nas/ com ldan
361b4(mdo): 'das seng ga'i khri la bzhugs pa dang / skye bo mang po mni kas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa mngon pa dar 'du bya ba chen pos mchod/ labang byang chub sems
361b5(mdo): dpa'i tshogs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang 'khor lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za mang po de dag thams cad la yang mchod nas dus la bab par rig pa dang
361b6(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la gdugs chod bza' ba dang ban pa dang / myang ba mang po meng ba dag 'dris par byed do// bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par tshim par byas/ ci bdir
361b7(mdo): bsdus nas/ lhung bzed bzhag/ phyag bcabs pa dang / na bza' sna tshogs gsol/ mchod pa mngon par 'du bya ba chen pos mchod// 'khor mang po de dag kyang mchod nas lan gsum
361b8(mdo): bskor ba byas ste/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi spyad sngar 'khod nas tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das grong khyer dmar bu can 'di'i shar sgo'i phyogs shig na/ rnam
362a1(mdo): yin gyi nags tshal zhes bya ba ni/ skyed tshal gyi nang na/ srin mo me tog lngam yin zhes bgyi'i ba drag mo gzu lums can gtum mo// skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u/ 
362a2(mdo): dang / bu ma la 'tshal pa/ mdangs 'phrog pa/ mche bar bgyid pa/ gdugs mtshan rtag tu rnam par 'tshe ba'i bsam pa la brtson pa zhig gnas lags na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das
362a3(mdo): kyis thabs cis bzlog tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rab tu mdzes pa'i tog gis skye bo'i tshogs mang po dag dbugs phyubyung ste/ cang myi gsung bas gnang
362a4(mdo): ba mdzad nas/ zhal mdzum pa bstand to// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal 'dzum pa bstand pa des/ zhal gyi sgo na sa 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa dag 'thon ste/ 'od zer bya
362a5(mdo): snang ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po la 'jig rten gyi khams kyang snang bar byas// lha ma yin gyi nakas tshal zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal de dang / sran mo me tog lha ma yin zhes
362a6(mdo): bya ba 'khor brgya stong can gyi gnas thams cad kyang snang bar byas nas/ gnas thams cad 'bab pa cig tu gyur da pa dang / lha ma yin pa thams cad thong blong por gyur da te/ rgyug rgyug rab tu rgyug
362a7(mdo): kun tu rgyug cing / phyogs bzhir 'ber bar byed/ phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams su rgyug cing / nyams zag pa ling ros bdag cag su la skyabs su bsgrub// su zhig ni skyob par 'gyur zhes
362a8(mdo): 'dod 'bod do// de nas grong khyer de'i lha zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'od rab tu mdzes pa'i tog la skyabs su nye bar ded shig dang / de na khyed cig 'chol bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so// 
362b1(mdo): de nas srin mo me tog lha ma yin zhes bya ba'i 'khor brgya stong dang / rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btud do// phyag bcal
362b2(mdo): nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la skyab tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bskyab du gsol// bcom ldan 'das slan chad sems
362b3(mdo): can rnams la 'che bar yang myi bgyid/ gnod par yang mya bgyid lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ 'od rab tu mdzes po'i tog gis/ srin mo la cang myi gsung bas
362b4(mdo): gnang bar mdzad de/ byang chub kyi snying po rnam par 'phrul pa'i snying po rnam par 'phrul ba'i byin gyi rlabs shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa
362b5(mdo): zhugs ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad da snang bar gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang snang zhing 'khor dang bcas pa chos ston pa yang grag
362b6(mdo): byang chub kyi snying po'i rkyen ces bya ba'i gzungs de yang bshad par bsdams pa dang / phyogs btsun bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te
362b7(mdo): de bzhini gshegs pa 'od rab tu mdzes pa'i tog leg so logs so// bcom ldan 'das de khyod kyis byang chub kyi snying po'i rkyen ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po bshad pa dang / 
362b8(mdo): srin mo me tog lha ma yin 'khor dang bcas pa btul te/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang / skye bo de dag phyir myi ldog pa'i sa la bkod cing dge ba'i lam la bzhag pa na
363a1(mdo): legs par bka' stsal to// de'i tshe sa gzhi chen po yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rnyeng bzhin du gnas par 'gyur/ rin po che sna bdun gyi char yang bab ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling
363a2(mdo): sa ba 'byor da pa dang / rgyas pa dang / lo legs par gyur to// bram ze chen po de'i dris kyi che// ra tshe rabs bdun gyi bar du bram ze gzhon nur gyurd to// de'i 'og tu ngas gzungs 'di thos te/ 
363a3(mdo): phyir sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa sa dad pa thob nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bo// yang bram ze de'i tshe de'i dus na sran mo me tog lnga
363a4(mdo): ma yin zhes bya ba de/ gzhan yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi ma yid gnyis za na de ltar myi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod kyang srin mo me tog lha ma yin zhes bya ba der gyur/ 
363a5(mdo): yang de'i tshe de'i dris na grang byer dmang bu cas gyi skye bo tsho/ sa rnams gzhan yin snyam du ma ma nyi'as/ de/ nyes pa na de ltar gyi lasa'o// dma'i phyir zhe na/ de dge
363a6(mdo): nyid lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po ba'i 'khor 'dus pa ni ma yin no// yang bram ze che
363a7(mdo): po de'i tshe de'i dus na srin mo me tog lham yin gyi 'khor brgya stong de dag gzhan yin no// snyam du som nyi'am yid gnyis za na de ltar myi lta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag nyid 'dus
363a8(mdo): pa 'di bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rgyu ba dang / kun tu rgyu ba dang / gcer bu pa dang / rgyas pa pa dang / bye brag pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa ba dang / dur khrod pa dang / phyag dang
363b1(mdo): khrod pa dang / ri brags na brtul zhugs spyod pa lhags pa 'dadi dag yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gtam 'di dag bka' stsal nas/ nang rgya/ 
363b2(mdo): gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas 'dus pa chen po de dag gis sngon gyi gtam 'di thos nas thams cad ya mtshan du gyur nas/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / 
363b3(mdo): phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bla re dag thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa mngon par 'du bya
363b4(mdo): bas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum tu bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabase la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gso lod do// bcom ldan 'das
363b5(mdo): byang chub kyi snying po'i rkyen ces bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad du gsol// bdel bar gshegs pa rig pa'i rgyal po gang gis na sems can rnams la snang bar bgyid par
363b6(mdo): 'gyur ba dang / slad ma'i tshe slad mo'i dus na/ sems can rnams kyi ri ba yongs su bskang bar 'gyur ba 'di bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor mang po la cang myi
363b7(mdo): gsung bas gnab ba mdzad nas 'dzum pa bsta nad to// 'dzum pa bstan ma thag tu 'od gzer sna tshogs dag 'thon te/ 'od gzer gyi snang ba des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
363b8(mdo): thams cad snang bar byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang snang la/ de dag gis chos bstan pa'i gsung gzi snyad kyang
364a1(mdo): drag go// sa 'di la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa rnams skyes me tog sna tshogs bkra maH/ 'dzam bu'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling du rnam
364a2(mdo): bar 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs bzang po dga' dga' lta bu shi nad tu mdzes pa dag sdang ngo // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas cho 'phrul chen po de yang mthong // bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum
364a3(mdo): pa bstan pa yang mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ phyind nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan
364a4(mdo): 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bco ma ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom lda na 'das byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi rtog pa'i
364a5(mdo): rgyal po bshad du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa sems can rnams la sman pa'i don dang yongs su bskyang ba mdzod cig dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskrun pa yongs su rdzogs par
364a6(mdo): 'gyur ba lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pas gsol ba btab pa mkhyend nas/ sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs pa'i
364a7(mdo): snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu skad cig thang gcig de nyid la/ phyogs bcu 'i sangs rgyas kyi zhiben bzhug
364a8(mdo): ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mda' rgyang ga tsam gyi zag na snang ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ge'i klung brgya stong phrag bye ba dgu bcu snyed gshegs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom
364b1(mdo): ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom bshag kya thub pa legs so zhes bya ba bos te/ de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pa legs so// legs so// khyod gzungs chen
364b2(mdo): po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad/ byin gyis brlabs/ rjes su yid rang bar mdzad pa 'di bshad par bzhed pa ni
364b3(mdo): legs par gsungs lags ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying po rgyan ces bgyi ba'i gzungs chos kyi rnam grangs rtog pa'i cho ga chen po sangs pa shin tu rgya che ba bshad du gsol// de nas 'jas da
364b4(mdo): gnon nu myu da bas lhung bzed blangs te/ de bzhin gshe gas pa las 'khrungs pa'i chos kyi ring sril gyis kyang bka/ dang nas bcom ldan 'das la phul lo// de nas bcom ldan
364b5(mdo): 'das de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pas phyag gser gyi ma dog can brkyang ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da ba la sa lhung bzed pa zhes nas nam mkhal la 'phangs so// lhung
364b6(mdo): bzed de 'phangs ma thag tu nam mkha' khyebs nas/ skad cig zang cig de nyid la chos kyi ring srel las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sha stag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhug
364b7(mdo): bar gyurd to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba bos te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pa legs so
364b8(mdo): legs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re'i spyan snga na yang / de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pa bzhugs pa la/ 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad na yang 'jam dpal gzhon nu
365a1(mdo): gyur dpa/ lhung bzed chos kyi ring srel gyi sku gdung gis bkang ba 'bul bar byed pa// 'jig rten du rdzu 'phrul gyi mo 'phrul chen po byung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dang
365a2(mdo): sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes dpal gzhon nu ma gyur dpas 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa shind tu ya mtshan che ba'i cho 'phrul yang snang / de bzhin gshegs
365a3(mdo): ba'i sku mang po 'dus pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba yang snang na 'di ji'i snga ltas shig sdud/ rgyu ni gang rkyen ni gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po 'dus par snang ba 'di ni su'i mthu yin/ 'jam
365a4(mdo): dpas kyis smrasapa/ na rje mo ma kyi 'di / gyi zhes/ kun rdo rjes smras pas dpa' 'kho ni/ tshe'aphram chen po dang / 
365a5(mdo): gshegs pa meng po gyu pa 'di mamang / @ byed de/ 'das dpal mthu 'dzin snod ma mthong ba zhi/ ldang ngo // denas byang chus sem
365a6(mdo): mas dpa' chen po sakun rdo rje/ rdo rjeg mo zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsus bkod 'byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyan sngang bcug ste/ com ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
365a7(mdo): gsapa to/ na 'das kyi ni// gsung bar ba danamachen pa'i sa gag 'a nyen du 'thung ba stegs/ ldan 'dus kyi da
365a8(mdo): tshig sam ldad cig dang dadu mi byed kyi mngon gsum du ldang bar 'gyur ro// de nas skad cig cad cig sud tsam de nyings/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyan thang rin po'i lnga bdun gyi po'i
365b1(mdo): dbang tu dpag bdun stong pa/ rgyar dpag tshad lnga stong pa/ bzang po dga' dga' ltar 'dug pashin tu mdzes pa legs par rnam par bye ba/ 'tsher ba 'bar ba/ dad dpa 'phreng ba bzang pos
365b2(mdo): mdzes par byas pa/ dril bu g.yer ka'i tra ba brgyus pa/ gser gi dril bu sbyangs pa/ me tog gi 'phreng ba sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa zhig sa rtol nas byung ste/ lha'i bu brgya stong bye ba
365b3(mdo): phrag tu ma nam mkha'i ngos la rdzu 'phrul gyis dong ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod sdod de la mngon par mchod par byed par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
365b4(mdo): chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// lagan rdo rje khyod song sa mchod sdong gi dbus su sgo phye shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje thor tshugs 'bar bar
365b5(mdo): byas pa/ cod pan 'bar ba mgo la bcings rdo rje 'bar ba lag na thogs/ gdong bsgyur 'khros pa'i gzugs su byas nasamachod sdong de'i drung du song ste/ lag pa brkyang nas de'i sgo
365b6(mdo): bye'o// sgo de phye ba dang / mchod sdong ga ning de na seng ge'i 'dzam bu'i chu bo'ig ser las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis spras la/ shing bal star 'jam pa'i gos sna tshogs bting ba zhig bshams
365b7(mdo): te/ de'i steng na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nas chen po kyi chug 'bar ba'i 'od zer gtong ba'i dog can zhes bya ba bzhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzini
365b8(mdo): ba bzhin tu snyoms par zhugs par snang ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhas chen po khyi nyug/ 'od zer gtong ba'i tog can gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
366a1(mdo): pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thul pa la legs so zhes bya ba bos te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pa 'jig rten du cho 'phrul byung bar gyur pa dang / 
366a2(mdo): a/ de bzhin gshegs pa mang po 'dus par gda' ba legs so legs so// bdag kyis kyang sngon 'dus pa dang / cho 'phral 'di lta bu bstand to// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
366a3(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mang po 'dus pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu bstand to// de lta bas na legs so legs so// bcom ldan
366a4(mdo): 'das byang chub kyi snying po'i rkyen ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po bshad par mdzod cig dang / sman pa chen po bgyis bar 'gyur te/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po
366a5(mdo): la bde' ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brdze bar 'gyur lag/ sa so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus pa dang / mchod
366a6(mdo): sdong gda' ba 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan gyi gzungs 'odi nyid kyi mthus cho 'phrul gda' ste/ 'di nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi snga ltas su gda' lags so// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas
366a7(mdo): na/ byang chub kyi snying po'i rkyed ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bshag kya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhal chen po'i/ 
366a8(mdo): myi thug 'od zer gtor ba'i tog can gyis bcol bar mkhyend nas/ byang chub kyi snying po'i rkyen gyi gzungs 'di bka' stsal to// na mo b+ha ga pa ti/ bi bu la ba da na/ kAn pA pa k+She tu mU
366b1(mdo): d+ha ye thA ga tA ya/ namo bags te shag kya mu ne we/ ta thA ga te yA/ a raha tA sa pa rgyags ma zud rnam tad ya mA mA~M b+hon dz+hini// rjo rni ShI d+hi/ sas tathA kata/ ko tsar d+hu re/ 
366b2(mdo): hang ha ma?/ pra da ra pra ha ra/ mu na b+hod+b+ha tsi ta da re/ nu lu tsu lu/ sha ta rash+mi sa na tsa daM daM/ sarba ta thA ka ta rbe shika te/ kun nas te/ sarba bud d+ha ku k+She ba g+hA se/ mi li mi li/ !
366b3(mdo): ga na ta le sarba ta tha ga ta aR+sha shI te/ na b+ha sta la sha ma sha me/ pra sha ma pra sha maH/ sa rba pa bA pra sha ma ne/ swa rba ba pa bi sho da ne/ h+ya lu hu su/ ma da n+dod+ha marga sam/ prasti ste
366b4(mdo): sarba ta thA ga ta su pra ti shwa da shud de swA hA// de nas byang chub kyi snying po'i rkyen ces bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di bshad pa tsam gyis phyogs bcu'i
366b5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po de dag gis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
366b6(mdo): shag kya thub pa legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir gzungs kyi rgyas za za shad pa ni legs par gsungs so// de'i tshes 'di yang rnam
366b7(mdo): badrug tu g.yos so// me tog gi char chen po yang 'bab par gyur to// spos kyi cher chen po dang / gos dang rgyan gyi char chen po dang / gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi chun po dang / 
366b8(mdo): rtsu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / se mo do'i chir dag kyang 'bab par gyurd to// lha'i bu rnams kyang nam mkha' la rnga dang / phyeg dag rdob cing ku co dang gzha'i sgra chen po byung
367a1(mdo): nas/ me tog ud pal dang / pad ma dang / pad ma dkar po dang / ma snang ba dang / ma d+ha ra pa chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / man 'du sha ka dang / 
367a2(mdo): man 'dzul na ka chen po dang / pa yin dang / tsam pa ka dang / tri zhim pa la sogs pa'i char dbab brtsam zhing / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya bar mngon par brtson par gyur to// 
367a3(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po 'dus pa de'i nang nas kha cig gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid mngon gsum du byas/ kha cig gis ni rang byang chub/ kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir
367a4(mdo): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob zo// kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi sems skyed/ kha cig gis ni
367a5(mdo): phyir myi ldog pa'i sa thob kha cig gis ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thobakha cig gis ni lhar skye ba thob/ sems can gang dag
367a6(mdo): dmyal bar skyes pa de dag gi sa ni dmyal pa rnams las yongs su tha dad/ gang dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa rnams dang / gang dag dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa rnams dang / 
367a7(mdo): gang dag yid dgas kyi nang du skyes pa de dag kyang / yi dgas kyi skye gnas las yongs su tha rad de/ de dag thams cad bde 'grol lim la bkod par gyur to// 'dzam bu'i gling du yang
367a8(mdo): rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul chen po byung bar gyur/ bde' ba dang / yid bde' ba dang / 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa chen po da/ lo legs pa dang / skye bo phal po che dang / byis gang bar
367b1(mdo): bar gyur da nas/ de dag thams cad bde' bar tshim par gyur to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po log na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ 
367b2(mdo): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di bshad pa ni/ shin tu rnyed par dka' lags na/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngam
367b3(mdo): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig gzungs 'dzind par bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ kun chub par bgyi/ chu la
367b4(mdo): bzhin yid la bgyid/ de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam zhig skye bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka/ da'astsal dab/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na jo
367b5(mdo): legs so legs so// lag na rdo rje khyod kyis yongs su zhus pa ni legs par yongs su zhus so// yang lag na rdo rje song la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa la yongs
367b6(mdo): su tris shig dang / 'di des stond par 'gyur ro// de nas gdod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag rdo rje 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas
367b7(mdo): nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da ba gang zhig byang chub kyi snying po'i rkyen ces bya ba'i gzungs 'di 'dzind par byed/ klog par
367b8(mdo): byed/ kun chub par byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam zhig skye bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyu rang bas smras pa/ lag na rdo rje gson
368a1(mdo): cig dang / don de khong du chud par bya ba'i phyid khyodas dpa' bstan to// mgran rdo rdzogang gis stong gsum gyi thong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyis phyogs mam mi 'am/ 
368a2(mdo): ro khrod kyang rung sa phyogs de thams cad skra'i rtse mo tsam du gshog pa'am/ lug gi spu nyag ma cig gis reg par byed na yang / gang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi sku gdung myi bzhugs
368a3(mdo): pa'i gnas kyis phyogs de ni rdul phra rab tsam yang ma mthong zhing / nam mkhal la yang gapan de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi ring srel dang / gdung gi ring srel dang / chos kyi ring spel dang
368a4(mdo): yungs 'bru tsam gyis ring srel gyis ma gang ba sgo'i rtse mo gzugs pa tsam yang myed la sems can mthu' chen po/ rdzu 'phrul chen po 'ga' zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring spel thams
368a5(mdo): cad kyang bgrang bar byed/ 'jal bar byed/ dpyod par byed sa/ 'dzam bu'i kli de 'di gang ba'i nus phra rab kyi rdul rnams kyang bgrang bar byed/ 'jal bar byed/ dpyod par/ 
368a6(mdo): byed la/ lag na rdo rje ci sems can de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin no// snyam du rig par bya'am/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni shin tu ya mtshan che ba dang / dkon pa yi
368a7(mdo): no snyam du rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurd pas smras pa/ lag na rdo rje gson cig/ de thams bgrang ba dang / gzhal ba dang / dpyad par nus myod kyi/ lag rdo rje
368a8(mdo): ring srel gang dag yin pa dang / rdul phra rab gang dag yin pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur da pa de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa brgya la 'am
368b1(mdo): stong du gzungs kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di bsod nams kyi phung po brjod du ben kyang / brjod pa 'am dpa' mtshon par myi gyod do// lag na rdo rje de lta na byang chub kyi snying po'i gzungs 'di mthu che ba
368b2(mdo): debaste/ klag pa dang / mchod pa dang / kun chug par byas na/ bsod rnams kyi phung po skye bar 'gyur ro// dedam ma nga myang ba 'dus pa de kan ka dang dang / nad sbyin dang / 
368b3(mdo): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas pa'i sems cad de dag gis/ 'jas dpal gzhon nur gyur da pas bstan pa 'di thos nas/ de dag sems
368b4(mdo): zad kyis phyir myi ldog pa'i sa 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag pa kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstand pa thob nasalan gsum tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
368b5(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya thub pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhi na gshegs pa rmad du byung ba'i mngon par shes pa can de la
368b6(mdo): phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshas lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mang cu byung ba'i 'phrin las mdzad pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshal lo// zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod par byed do
